sentences.chinese: 你可以用这笔钱改善家居。

sentences.english: Many wines improve with age (= get better as they get older ).
sentences.chinese: 很多葡萄酒年代越久越香醇。

detailed_translations.english: to make something better, or to become better
to make something better, or to become better

name: idyllic
trans: 田园诗般的， 田园风光的， 牧歌的

sentences.english: This idyllic pastoral scene is only part of the picture.
sentences.chinese: 但这种田园诗般的乡村风光仅仅是一个侧面。

sentences.english: Some believe that lemurians were much more like early humans living in a sort of idyllic paradise largely agrarian with lush forests and an abundance of flowers and fruit trees.
sentences.chinese: 一些就相信利莫里亚更加像早期的人类，生活在一种田园诗般的天堂里，主要地与繁荣的森林，盛开的花朵和结果的树在一起。

sentences.english: I don't mind a bit of idiosyncrasy, but that strange ideology you believe in , coupled with your idyllic ideas on life, suggest to me that all you're doing is looking for some idol to follow.
sentences.chinese: 你有一点特殊的癖性我不在乎，但你相信的那种奇怪的意识形态，加上你向往田园诗般生活的想法，给我的印象是你在做的就是要找到一个偶像来效仿。

detailed_translations.chinese: 田园诗般的， 田园风光的， 牧歌的

sentences.english: Oil thieves sometimes hawk stolen gasoline on the side of highways.
sentences.chinese: 石油大盗们有时在公路边上兜售偷来的石油。

detailed_translations.english: a large bird that hunts and eats small birds and animals
to try to sell goods, usually by going from place to place and trying to persuade people to buy them

sentences.english: AIM: To investigate the relation between left ventricular torsion(LVtor)/ rotation and cardiac cycle in normal persons by speckle tracking imaging(STI).
sentences.chinese: 目的：探讨斑点追踪显像技术（STI）评价正常人心肌旋转及左室扭转与心动周期时相关系的价值。

detailed_translations.english: a small or slight mark usually of a contrasting colour, as on the skin, a bird's plumage, or eggs

name: emanate
trans: 散发； 表现， 显示

sentences.english: Intelligence and cunning emanated from him.
sentences.chinese: 聪明和机灵从他身上散发出来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 放射（过去式emanated，过去分词emanated，现在分词emanating，第三人称单数emanates，形容词emanative）；发散
detailed_translations.english: If a quality emanates from you, or if you emanate a quality, you give people a strong sense that you have that quality

sentences.english: The exterior walls need a new coat of paint.
sentences.chinese: 外墙需要刷新漆了。

detailed_translations.english: on the outside of something
the outside of something, especially a building

sentences.english: The hostages were released from captivity.
sentences.chinese: 人质被释放了。

detailed_translations.english: when a person or animal is kept in a prison,  cage  etc and not allowed to go where they want

name: levy
trans: 征收额； 税款； 征兵

sentences.english: ...an annual levy on all drivers.
sentences.chinese: …向所有司机征收的年税。

sentences.english: a new tax levied on all electrical goods
sentences.chinese: 对所有电器商品征收的一种新税

detailed_translations.english: an additional sum of money, usually paid as a tax
to officially say that people must pay a tax or charge

name: effective
trans: 有效的， 生效的； 显著的； 实际的， 事实上的

sentences.english: The cheaper drugs are just as effective in treating arthritis.
sentences.chinese: 较便宜的药品对治疗关节炎同样有效。

sentences.english: the painting’s highly effective use of colour
sentences.chinese: 绘画中得心应手的色彩运用

sentences.english: Training is often much less effective than expected.
sentences.chinese: 训练的效果往往远低于预期。

sentences.english: the most effective ways of reducing inner city congestion
sentences.chinese: 减少旧城区交通拥挤最有效的办法

detailed_translations.english: successful, and working in the way that was intended

name: muscle
trans: 肌肉； 体力， 力量， 实力； 影响力

sentences.english: Relax your stomach muscles , then stretch again.
sentences.chinese: 放松腹部肌肉，然后再绷紧。

sentences.english: Regular exercise will help to strengthen your muscles .
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼有助于强健肌肉。

sentences.english: It took muscle to work in an old-fashioned kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 在老式厨房里干活很费力。

detailed_translations.english: one of the pieces of flesh inside your body that you use in order to move, and that connect your bones together

name: generous
trans: 慷慨的， 大方的； 大量的， 丰富的； 宽厚的， 宽宏大量的

sentences.english: Dietler is generous with his time and money.
sentences.chinese: 迪特勒在他的时间和金钱方面慷慨大方。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is generous is willing to give money, spend time etc, in order to help people or give them pleasure

sentences.english: Everything is in flux at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 眼下一切都变化不定。

detailed_translations.chinese: [流][机] 流量；变迁；不稳定；流出

sentences.english: raspberry jelly
sentences.chinese: 山莓果冻

detailed_translations.english: a soft sweet food made from fruit juice and gelatin
to jellify

name: probe
trans: 探针； 探测器； 探索， 调查

sentences.english: a fibre-optic probe
sentences.chinese: 一根光纤探针

sentences.english: The surgeon would pick up his instruments, probe, repair, and stitch up again.
sentences.chinese: 外科医生会拿起器械进行探查、修复，然后再缝合。

detailed_translations.english: a long thin metal instrument that doctors and scientists use to examine parts of the body
to look for something or examine something, using a long thin object

name: crescent
trans: 新月； 新月形， 月牙形

sentences.english: a small crescent of pastry topped with cheese
sentences.chinese: 顶上浇有奶酪的新月形油酥小糕点

sentences.english: a crescent moon
sentences.chinese: 新月

detailed_translations.chinese: 新月；新月状物；伊斯兰教的标记；土耳其的新月形国徽
detailed_translations.english: a curved shape that is wider in the middle and pointed at the ends

detailed_translations.chinese: 以新月形物装饰；使成新月形

name: inflate
trans: 充气， 膨胀； 鼓吹， 吹捧； 涨价

sentences.english: It took us half an hour to inflate the dinghy.
sentences.chinese: 我们用了半小时给橡皮筏充好气。

sentences.english: Her life jacket failed to inflate.
sentences.chinese: 她的救生衣未能充进去气。

detailed_translations.english: to fill something with air or gas so it becomes larger, or to become filled with air or gas

name: stable
trans: 稳定的，安定的；牢固的；沉稳的

sentences.english: A wide base will make the structure much more stable.
sentences.chinese: 宽大的底座会使结构牢固许多。

sentences.english: Children like a stable environment.
sentences.chinese: 儿童喜欢稳定的环境。

detailed_translations.chinese: 稳定的，不变的；沉稳的，持重的
detailed_translations.english: steady and not likely to move or change
a building where horses are kept

sentences.english: We need to do a proper quantitative analysis of this problem.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要对这个问题作一个正确的定量分析。

detailed_translations.english: relating to amounts rather than to the quality or standard of something

sentences.english: On weekdays, the marmosets steered clear of the roar of traffic, and on Sundays they shunned the clamor of visiting crowds.
sentences.chinese: 工作日的时候，这些狨猴避开嘈杂的交通，星期天的时候它们就会避开喧闹的游客。

name: harness
trans: 利用…产生动力；给上挽具

sentences.english: We can harness the power of the wind to generate electricity.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以利用风力发电。

detailed_translations.english: to control and use the natural force or power of something

name: foment
trans: 煽动， 挑起， 激起

sentences.english: They were accused of fomenting rebellion.
sentences.chinese: 他们被指控煽动叛乱。

detailed_translations.english: to cause trouble and make people start fighting each other or opposing the government

name: respond
trans: 回答， 答复； 作出反应； 响应

sentences.english: They are likely to respond positively to the president's request for aid.
sentences.chinese: 他们有可能积极地回应该总统的援助请求。

detailed_translations.chinese: 回答， 答复； 作出反应， 响应
detailed_translations.english: to do something as a reaction to something that has been said or done

name: incident
trans: 事情， 事件； 摩擦， 冲突

sentences.english: His bad behaviour was just an isolated incident.
sentences.chinese: 他的不良行为只是个别事件。

sentences.english: Roads were sealed off because of a major incident.
sentences.chinese: 因为发生重大事故，道路被封锁了。

detailed_translations.english: something that happens, especially sth unusual or unpleasant

name: cluster
trans: 成群， 成串； 丛生； 群集

sentences.english: Do this for all nodes in the cluster.
sentences.chinese: 对集群中的所有节点都这样做。

sentences.english: This can be done on any server of the cluster.
sentences.chinese: 可以在集群的任何服务器中这样做。

sentences.english: However, there are some problems in the cluster environment.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在集群环境中却存在一些问题。

detailed_translations.english: a group of things of the same kind that are very close together
if a group of people or things cluster somewhere, or are clustered somewhere, they form a small group in that place

name: prey
trans: 猎物； 受害者， 牺牲品

sentences.english: a tiger stalking its prey
sentences.chinese: 潜行跟踪猎物的老虎

sentences.english: Cats prey on birds and mice.
sentences.chinese: 猫捕食鸟和老鼠。

detailed_translations.english: an animal, bird etc that is hunted and eaten by another animal
(of an animal or a bird) to hunt and kill another animal for food

sentences.english: business attire
sentences.chinese: 商务着装，正装

detailed_translations.english: clothes

sentences.english: The woman gently tugged his arm.
sentences.chinese: 那女人轻轻拽了拽他的胳膊。

sentences.english: She removed the bandage with a sharp tug.
sentences.chinese: 她猛地一拉，扯下绷带。

detailed_translations.english: to pull with one or more short, quick pulls
a sudden strong pull

sentences.english: A neuron has only one axon.
sentences.chinese: 一个神经元只有一个轴突。

sentences.english: Between any neurons, between the axon of one neuron and the dendrite of another, there's a tiny gap.
sentences.chinese: 在神经元之间，在一个神经元的轴突，和另一个神经元的树突之间，有一个细小的缝隙。

sentences.english: But they don't know exactly what goes into that neuron to store the memory, or how to dissolve that synaptic connection if you want to forget something.
sentences.chinese: 但是他们不十分准确的了解存储记忆的时候是什么被带进了神经元，如果你想要忘记某些事情，有如何让连接的触突解散。

detailed_translations.english: a type of cell that makes up the nervous system and sends messages to other parts of the body or the brain

sentences.english: Because these cells are among the largest in the vertebrate brain, they were the first neurons to be identified.
sentences.chinese: 由于这些细胞是脊椎动物大脑中最大的细胞，它们是最早被识别出来的神经元。

sentences.english: Zoonoses are defined by the WHO as “Any disease or infection which is naturally transmissible from vertebrate animals to man".
sentences.chinese: 世界卫生组织将人畜共患病定义为“任何自然地从脊椎动物传播到人类的疾病或传染病”。

detailed_translations.english: a living creature that has a backbone

sentences.english: an expedition to the North Pole
sentences.chinese: 北极探险

sentences.english: another Qomolangma expedition
sentences.chinese: 又一次珠穆朗玛峰探险

detailed_translations.english: a long and carefully organized journey, especially to a dangerous or unfamiliar place, or the people that make this journey

name: concert
trans: 音乐会， 演奏会； 一致

sentences.english: a rock concert
sentences.chinese: 摇滚音乐会

sentences.english: a concert of French choral music
sentences.chinese: 法国合唱音乐会

sentences.english: We were going to a concert in Bath Abbey.
sentences.chinese: 我们要去听一场在巴斯修道院内举行的音乐会。

sentences.english: She still does about 100 concerts every year.
sentences.chinese: 她每年仍然举行100场左右的演唱会。

detailed_translations.english: a performance given by musicians or singers

detailed_translations.chinese: 音乐会用的；在音乐会上演出的

name: absorb
trans: 吸收； 理解， 掌握； 吸引…的注意， 使全神贯注； 使并入， 同化

sentences.english: Plants absorb nutrients from the soil.
sentences.chinese: 植物从土壤中吸收养分。

sentences.english: The movement and noise of the machines absorbed him completely.
sentences.chinese: 机器的运转和声响把他完全吸引住了。

detailed_translations.english: to take in liquid, gas, or another substance from the surface or space around something

name: supply
trans: 供给， 供应； 满足， 弥补

sentences.english: The nation’s fuel supplies will not last forever.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家的燃料供应不会无穷无尽。

sentences.english: To protect the food supply , the government ordered the slaughter of affected cattle.
sentences.chinese: 为保护食品供应，政府下令宰杀被感染的牛。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of something that is available to be used

name: concern
trans: 涉及，关系到；使关心，使担忧
关心， 挂念； 关系； 有关的事， 负责的事； 公司， 企业

sentences.english: He was moved by her obvious concern.
sentences.chinese: 她明显的关心使他感动。

detailed_translations.chinese: 关切的事，有关的事；关心，挂念；关系，关联；公司，企业
detailed_translations.english: a feeling of wanting someone to be happy and healthy

detailed_translations.chinese: 涉及， 有关； 使关心， 使担心
detailed_translations.english: if a story, book, report etc concerns someone or something, it is about them

name: circulate
trans: 循环； 流通； 传播， 流传

sentences.english: Swimming helps to get the blood circulating through the muscles.
sentences.chinese: 游泳有助于肌肉的血液循环。

sentences.english: Ceiling fans circulated warm air around the room.
sentences.chinese: 吊扇使暖空气在房间里循环。

detailed_translations.english: to move around within a system, or to make something do this
to move around within a system, or to make something do this

name: incubate
trans: 孵化； 培育； 潜伏

sentences.english: The birds returned to their nests and continued to incubate the eggs.
sentences.chinese: 那些鸟儿返巢继续孵卵。

detailed_translations.chinese: 孵化；培养；温育；逐渐发展
detailed_translations.english: if a bird incubates its eggs, or if the eggs incubate, they are kept warm until they hatch(= the birds inside are born )

name: rectify
trans: 矫正， 纠正； 整顿

sentences.english: I did my best to rectify the situation, but the damage was already done.
sentences.chinese: 我竭尽全力去挽回局面，但损害已经造成了。

detailed_translations.english: to correct something that is wrong

sentences.english: a dictionary of synonyms and antonyms
sentences.chinese: 同义词和反义词词典

detailed_translations.english: a word that means the opposite of another word

sentences.english: I have always regarded him as a man of integrity.
sentences.chinese: 我一直把他当作一个正直诚实的人。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being honest and strong about what you believe to be right

sentences.english: Mrs. Hardie refrained from making any comment.
sentences.chinese: 哈迪太太忍住了没做任何评论。

detailed_translations.english: to not do something that you want to do
part of a song or poem that is repeated, especially at the end of each  verse

name: pact
trans: 协议， 条约， 公约

sentences.english: the Warsaw pact
sentences.chinese: 华沙条约

detailed_translations.english: a formal agreement between two groups, countries, or people, especially to help each other or to stop fighting

sentences.english: Musical notation was conceived for the C major scale and each line and space represents a note in this scale.
sentences.chinese: 乐谱为C大音阶而构思，在这个音阶中的每一个线和间都代表一个音符。

detailed_translations.english: a system of written marks or signs used to represent something such as music, mathematics, or scientific ideas

name: liable
trans: 有责任的， 有义务的； 易于…的

sentences.english: The car is liable to overheat on long trips.
sentences.chinese: 这辆汽车跑长途容易过热。

detailed_translations.english: likely to be affected by a particular kind of problem, illness etc

sentences.english: All the cars are fitted with electronic homing devices.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些汽车都安装了电子自动导向仪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 回家的；自动导引的；有返回性的
detailed_translations.english: a bird or animal that has a homing instinct has a special ability that helps it find its way home over long distances

name: state
trans: 陈述， 说明， 声明； 规定

sentences.english: She was in an extremely confused state of mind .
sentences.chinese: 她思绪纷乱。

sentences.english: She can’t go home now. Look at the state of her!
sentences.chinese: 她现在不能回家。看看她这副样子！

sentences.english: The country was in a state of war (= officially fighting a war ) .
sentences.chinese: 这个国家正处于战争状态。

sentences.english: Water exists in three states: liquid, gaseous, and solid.
sentences.chinese: 水有三种形态: 液态、气态和固态。

sentences.english: ...reform of the state social-security system.
sentences.chinese: …国家社会保障体制的改革。

detailed_translations.english: the physical or mental condition that someone or something is in
to formally say or write a piece of information or your opinion
State industries or organizations are financed and organized by the government rather than private companies

sentences.english: a cargo plane
sentences.chinese: 货机

detailed_translations.english: the goods that are being carried in a ship or plane

name: press
trans: 压， 按， 挤； 压榨， 压迫； 催促， 逼迫
报刊；新闻界，新闻工作者；报道，评论；出版社；印刷厂；压，按，挤

sentences.english: Oxford University Press
sentences.chinese: 牛津大学出版社

sentences.english: We were able to watch the books rolling off the presses.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以看到书本从印刷机上源源不断地印出。

detailed_translations.english: a business that prints and publishes books

name: jumble
trans: 杂乱的一堆， 混乱的一团

sentences.english: The photographs were all jumbled up.
sentences.chinese: 照片乱七八糟地堆在一起。

sentences.english: Ben’s words became jumbled.
sentences.chinese: 本开始语无伦次起来。

detailed_translations.english: to mix things together in an untidy way, without any order
a lot of different things mixed together in an untidy way, without any order

sentences.english: Business and management elements are built into the course.
sentences.chinese: 本课程加入了商务和管理方面的内容。

sentences.english: Hydrogen is a one-valence element.
sentences.chinese: 氢是一价的元素。

detailed_translations.english: one part or feature of a whole system, plan, piece of work etc, especially one that is basic or important

name: environmental
trans: 有关环境的， 自然环境的， 生态环境的； 环境的

sentences.english: the environmental damage caused by the chemical industry
sentences.chinese: 化学工业对环境造成的破坏

sentences.english: an international meeting to discuss environmental issues
sentences.chinese: 探讨环境问题的国际会议

sentences.english: the environmental impact of pollution from cars
sentences.chinese: 汽车造成的污染对环境的影响

sentences.english: an environmental group
sentences.chinese: 环境保护组织

detailed_translations.english: concerning or affecting the air, land, or water on Earth

name: picky
trans: 挑剔的， 难以取悦的

sentences.english: He’s a very picky eater .
sentences.chinese: 他很挑食。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is picky only likes particular things and not others, and so is not easy to please

sentences.english: Researchers found the 70-millimeter crustacean in the dark shale of an Oklahoma quarry.
sentences.chinese: 研究者在俄克拉荷马采石场的页岩层发现这些70毫米的甲壳纲动物。

sentences.english: This is the world's largest crustacean and the seven king crabs introduced here from the North Pacific by Russian scientists in 1961 have multiplied at an astonishing rate.
sentences.chinese: 这是世界上最大的甲壳类动物。 俄罗斯科学家在1961年从北太平洋引进这里的七只帝王蟹已以惊人的速度成倍增长。

sentences.english: Daphnia has a large number of never-before seen genes, as well as a big chunk of the same genes found in humans, the most of any insects or crustacean so far known to scientists.
sentences.chinese: 水蚤有大量之前从未见过的基因，也有一大堆在人类身上就发现的相同基因，其数量是至今科学家所知的昆虫或甲壳类生物中最多的。

detailed_translations.english: an animal such as a  lobster  or a  crab  that has a hard outer shell and several pairs of legs, and usually lives in water

sentences.english: ‘No!’ she exclaimed in shock.
sentences.chinese: “不！”她惊呼道。

detailed_translations.english: to say something suddenly and loudly because you are surprised, angry, or excited

sentences.english: I thought the medicine would make him sleep, but it had the opposite effect.
sentences.chinese: 我以为这药会让他睡觉，但是它却起了反作用。

sentences.english: At the opposite extreme, Ashworth’s style is very simple and modern.
sentences.chinese: 截然相反的是，阿什沃思的风格非常简单和现代。

sentences.english: Bob was quicker than Ed? It’s usually the opposite way round.
sentences.chinese: 鲍勃比埃德快？通常是反过来的。

detailed_translations.english: as different as possible from something else
a person or thing that is as different as possible from someone or something else

sentences.english: I forgot to pack my razor.
sentences.chinese: 我忘记把剃须刀放入行李包了。

sentences.english: Hundreds of people packed into the mosque.
sentences.chinese: 成百上千的人挤进了清真寺。

sentences.english: Send away for your free information pack today.
sentences.chinese: 今天就来函索取免费资料包吧。

detailed_translations.english: to put things into cases, bags etc ready for a trip somewhere
something wrapped in paper or packed in a box and then sent by post or taken somewhere

name: restraint
trans: 抑制， 克制； 限制； 约束力； 管制措施

sentences.english: The police were praised for their restraint in handling the demonstrators.
sentences.chinese: 警方因对待示威者时所表现出的克制而受到赞扬。

detailed_translations.english: calm sensible controlled behaviour, especially in a situation when it is difficult to stay calm

sentences.english: In the aftermath of the coup, the troops opened fire on the demonstrators.
sentences.chinese: 在那次政变的余波之中，军队向示威者开了枪。

detailed_translations.english: the period of time after something such as a war, storm, or accident when people are still dealing with the results

name: pollutant
trans: 污染物质， 有害物质

sentences.english: a dumping ground for toxic pollutants
sentences.chinese: 有毒污染物堆放场

detailed_translations.english: a substance that makes air, water, soil etc dangerously dirty, and is caused by cars, factories etc

name: untapped
trans: 未开发的， 未使用的

sentences.english: Older people are an untapped resource in the employment market.
sentences.chinese: 年龄较大的人是就业市场中有待利用的资源。

sentences.english: We believe there is untapped potential.
sentences.chinese: 我们相信还有潜力没有挖掘出来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 未开发的；未使用的；塞子未开的
detailed_translations.english: an untapped supply, market, or talent is available but has not yet been used

sentences.english: She stood nervously in the wings waiting for her cue.
sentences.chinese: 她紧张地站在台侧等待出场的提示。

detailed_translations.english: an action or event that is a signal for something else to happen
to give someone a sign that it is the right moment for them to speak or do something, especially during a performance

name: effluent
trans: 流出物， 废水， 污水

sentences.english: The effluent from the factory was dumped into the river.
sentences.chinese: 那家工厂的污水被排到了河里。

detailed_translations.english: liquid waste, especially chemicals or sewage

name: untamed
trans: 未驯服的， 难驾驭的

sentences.english: This is the issue for Socrates, how to channel this wild and untamed passion of spirit or heart, how to channel this to some kind of common good.
sentences.chinese: 这是苏格拉底面临的难题，如何引导，这野性不驯的精神或内心热情，如何将其引导至某种共同的良善。

detailed_translations.chinese: 未驯服的， 难驾驭的
detailed_translations.english: untamed land is still in its natural state and has not been developed by people

name: stereotype
trans: 陈规；固定形式，老套；刻板印象

sentences.english: There's always been a stereotype about successful businessmen.
sentences.chinese: 对成功的商人们总有一种成见。

detailed_translations.english: a belief or idea of what a particular type of person or thing is like. Stereotypes are often unfair or untrue.

name: enroll
trans: 登记， 注册； 招收

sentences.english: You need to enroll before the end of August.
sentences.chinese: 你必须在八月底前注册。

detailed_translations.english: to officially arrange to join a school, university, or course, or to arrange for someone else to do this

name: sweeping
trans: 彻底的，广泛的；〈贬〉笼统的，一概而论的
清扫， 扫除； 垃圾

sentences.english: sweeping generalizations about women drivers
sentences.chinese: 对女性司机一概而论的看法

detailed_translations.english: affecting many things, or making an important difference to something

detailed_translations.chinese: 打扫；扫除（sweep的现在分词形式）

name: ardent
trans: 热心的， 热情洋溢的

sentences.english: an ardent supporter of free trade
sentences.chinese: 自由贸易的热心支持者

detailed_translations.chinese: 热情的；热心的；激烈的；燃烧般的
detailed_translations.english: showing strong positive feelings about an activity and determination to succeed at it

name: cohesive
trans: 黏着的； 使凝结的， 使内聚的

sentences.english: a cohesive community
sentences.chinese: 团结的社区

detailed_translations.english: connected or related in a reasonable way to form a whole

name: battery
trans: 电池； 排炮； 一系列， 一批

sentences.english: You have to take the top off to change the batteries .
sentences.chinese: 你得把顶盖拿掉才能更换电池。

sentences.english: When the red light comes on, you should recharge the battery .
sentences.chinese: 红灯亮起的时候你就应该给电池充电了。

sentences.english: The car’s got a flat battery .
sentences.chinese: 汽车的蓄电池没电了。

sentences.english: a battery-operated hairdryer
sentences.chinese: 使用电池的吹风机

detailed_translations.english: an object that provides a supply of electricity for something such as a radio, car, or toy

sentences.english: Bricks are made from clay.
sentences.chinese: 砖是用黏土制成的。

detailed_translations.chinese: [土壤] 粘土；泥土；肉体；似黏土的东西
detailed_translations.english: a type of heavy sticky earth that can be used for making pots, bricks etc

sentences.english: his irreverent sense of humour
sentences.chinese: 他失礼的幽默感

sentences.english: She has an irreverent attitude towards marriage.
sentences.chinese: 她对婚姻有一种不当回事的态度。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is irreverent does not show respect for organizations, customs, beliefs etc that most other people respect – often used to show approval

name: promote
trans: 促进； 提升； 宣传， 推销

sentences.english: You don't have to sacrifice environmental protection to promote economic growth.
sentences.chinese: 你们没有必要牺牲环保来促进经济增长。

detailed_translations.english: If people promote something, they help or encourage it to happen, increase, or spread

sentences.english: an impressive building with a red brick facade
sentences.chinese: 正面为红砖的雄伟建筑

detailed_translations.english: the front of a building, especially a large and important one

name: divorce
trans: 与…离婚； 使分离， 使脱离

sentences.english: David’s parents divorced when he was six.
sentences.chinese: 戴维的父母在他六岁时离婚了。

sentences.english: My father threatened to divorce her.
sentences.chinese: 我父亲威胁说要和她离婚。

detailed_translations.chinese: 离婚； 分离， 脱离
detailed_translations.english: if someone divorces their husband or wife, or if two people divorce, they legally end their marriage
the legal ending of a marriage

name: distribute
trans: 分配， 分发； 散布

sentences.english: a man distributing leaflets to passers-by
sentences.chinese: 一个向路人派发传单的男子

sentences.english: Make sure that your weight is evenly distributed.
sentences.chinese: 注意让你的重量分布均匀。

detailed_translations.english: to share things among a group of people, especially in a planned way

name: attach
trans: 连接； 依附于； 系， 贴， 连接； 使依恋， 使喜爱 ； 认为有

sentences.english: When approving a merger, the commission can attach conditions.
sentences.chinese: 委员会在批准公司合并时可能附加条件。

detailed_translations.chinese: 缚， 系， 贴， 附加； 使依恋， 使喜爱； 使附属； 认为有
detailed_translations.english: to allow something to happen, but only if someone agrees to do a particular thing or accept a particular idea

name: cornerstone
trans: 墙角石， 奠基石； 基础

sentences.english: Research is the cornerstone of the profession.
sentences.chinese: 研究是该职业的基石。

detailed_translations.english: something that is extremely important because everything else depends on it

name: quiz
trans: 测验； 盘问， 查问， 询问

sentences.english: a love quiz in a magazine
sentences.chinese: 杂志上的爱情问答

sentences.english: a general knowledge quiz
sentences.chinese: 常识问答竞赛

detailed_translations.chinese: 智力竞赛，问答比赛；小测验
detailed_translations.english: a competition or game in which people have to answer questions
to ask someone a lot of questions

name: inclination
trans: 爱好， 意愿； 趋向， 趋势； 倾斜度

sentences.english: My natural inclination was to say no.
sentences.chinese: 我生性爱说“不”。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling that makes you want to do something

sentences.english: Some members refused to participate.
sentences.chinese: 有些会员拒绝参加。

detailed_translations.english: to take part in an activity or event

name: ingredient
trans: 成分， 要素； 原料

sentences.english: Combine all the ingredients in a large bowl.
sentences.chinese: 把所有食材都放在一个大碗里。

sentences.english: The food is home-cooked using fresh ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 这种食物是用新鲜的食材在家里烹制的。

detailed_translations.english: one of the foods that you use to make a particular food or dish

sentences.english: The company has consolidated its position as the country’s leading gas supplier.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司巩固了作为该国主要煤气供应商的地位。

sentences.english: We consolidate information from a wide range of sources.
sentences.chinese: 我们把来自各种渠道的信息加以汇总。

detailed_translations.english: to strengthen the position of power or success that you have, so that it becomes more effective or continues for longer

name: biochemical
trans: 生物化学的， 生化的

sentences.english: Starvation brings biochemical changes in the body.
sentences.chinese: 饥饿引起体内的生化变化。

detailed_translations.chinese: 生物化学的， 生化的
detailed_translations.english: Biochemical changes, reactions, and mechanisms relate to the chemical processes that happen in living things

name: librarian
trans: 图书馆馆长； 图书管理员

sentences.english: The new librarian is a friend of mine.
sentences.chinese: 这位新来的图书管理员是我的朋友。

detailed_translations.english: someone who works in a library

sentences.english: the contours of the hills
sentences.chinese: 群山的轮廓

sentences.english: the contours of her face
sentences.chinese: 她脸部的轮廓

detailed_translations.chinese: 轮廓；等高线；周线；电路；概要
detailed_translations.english: the shape of the outer edges of something such as an area of land or someone’s body

sentences.english: Wordsworth was one of the greatest lyric poets of his time.
sentences.chinese: 华兹华斯是他那个时代最伟大的抒情诗人之一。

detailed_translations.english: expressing strong personal emotions such as love, in a way that is similar to music in its sounds and  rhythm
the words of a song

name: suborn
trans: 收买， 买通， 唆使

sentences.english: an attempt to suborn a witness
sentences.chinese: 收买证人的企图

detailed_translations.english: to persuade someone to tell lies in a court of law or to do something else that is illegal, especially for money

name: clan
trans: 家族， 宗族， 氏族； 帮派

sentences.english: the Campbell clan
sentences.chinese: 坎贝尔家族

sentences.english: warring clans
sentences.chinese: 交战的各氏族

detailed_translations.english: a large group of families who often share the same name

sentences.english: A purple may be made by dyeing a blue over a red.
sentences.chinese: 红色染上蓝色便可成为紫色。

sentences.english: She had a purple dress on with a silver-white necklace.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着一条紫色的连衣裙配着一条银白色的项链。

detailed_translations.english: a dark colour that is a mixture of red and blue
having a dark colour that is a mixture of red and blue

name: quit
trans: 停止； 放弃； 离开； 辞

sentences.english: He quit his job after an argument with a colleague.
sentences.chinese: 他和一个同事争吵后就辞职了。

sentences.english: I quit school at 16.
sentences.chinese: 我十六岁辍学。

sentences.english: She has decided to quit show business.
sentences.chinese: 她已决定退出娱乐圈。

sentences.english: People are now calling on the chairman to quit.
sentences.chinese: 人们现在正要求主席辞职。

sentences.english: I've quit smoking.
sentences.chinese: 我戒了烟。

detailed_translations.english: to leave a job, school etc, especially without finishing it completely

name: clam
trans: 蛤， 蛤肉； 〈口〉守口如瓶的人， 寡言的人

sentences.english: clam chowder (= a type of soup )
sentences.chinese: 蛤蜊杂烩汤

detailed_translations.chinese: 捞蛤；保持沉默，闭嘴不言

detailed_translations.english: a  shellfish  you can eat that has a shell in two parts that open up

name: economical
trans: 经济的， 实惠的； 节俭的， 节约的； 精打细算的

sentences.english: A small car is more economical to run.
sentences.chinese: 开小型汽车比较省油。

sentences.english: good-quality clothes at economical prices
sentences.chinese: 物美价廉的衣服

detailed_translations.english: using money, time, goods etc carefully and without wasting any

name: polish
trans: 磨光， 擦亮； 修改， 润色

sentences.english: Your essay is good, you just need to polish it a bit.
sentences.chinese: 你的文章不错，只要稍加润色就可以了。

detailed_translations.english: to improve a piece of writing, a speech etc by making slight changes to it before it is completely finished
a liquid, powder, or other substance that you rub into a surface to make it smooth and shiny

name: cabinet
trans: 内阁； 储藏柜， 陈列柜

sentences.english: The President chose loyal supporters to serve in his cabinet.
sentences.chinese: 总统选择了忠诚的支持者到他的内阁服务。

sentences.english: Every year we used the State of the Union as an organizing tool for the cabinet and staff to come up with new policy ideas, and then we worked hard on how best to present them.
sentences.chinese: 每年国情咨文都被内阁和幕僚们作为我们提出新政策思路的一个组织工具，然后我们努力下功夫，让它们以最佳方式呈现在人们面前。

detailed_translations.english: the politicians with important positions in a government who meet to make decisions or advise the leader of the government

sentences.english: You can count and order, but not measure, ordinal data.
sentences.chinese: 对于有顺序的数据，您可以计数和排序，但不能测量。

sentences.english: Net of all the other variables included in the ordinal multiple regression equations, education is not significantly correlated with the frequency of binge drinking and getting drunk.
sentences.chinese: 与多重序数回归中的其他变量交互比较后发现，受教育水平与狂欢式饮酒及醉酒频率的相关并不显著。

detailed_translations.english: denoting a certain position in a sequence of numbers

name: insurance
trans: 保险； 保险费； 保险业

sentences.english: Your father took out insurance to cover the mortgage.
sentences.chinese: 你父亲购买了抵押借款保险。

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement with a company in which you pay them money, especially regularly, and they pay the costs if something bad happens, for example if you become ill or your car is damaged

name: principle
trans: 原则； 原理； 道德准则， 行为规范； 信念

sentences.english: Schools try to teach children a set of principles.
sentences.chinese: 学校设法教给孩子们一套道德准则。

sentences.english: He’s got no principles at all!
sentences.chinese: 他毫无道德准则！

sentences.english: It’s against my principles to accept gifts from clients.
sentences.chinese: 收受客户礼物违背我的原则。

detailed_translations.english: a moral rule or belief about what is right and wrong, that influences how you behave

name: tedious
trans: 单调乏味的， 令人厌烦的

sentences.english: The audience coughed down the tedious speaker.
sentences.chinese: 听众用咳嗽声阻挠演讲人的沉闷发言。

sentences.english: There's no point in labouring at a tedious task.
sentences.chinese: 辛苦地干单调乏味的工作没有意义。

name: source
trans: 源， 源泉； 来源， 出处； 信息来源

sentences.english: They get their money from various sources.
sentences.chinese: 他们从各种途径弄到钱。

detailed_translations.english: a thing, place, activity etc that you get something from

sentences.english: If large media and telecommunication companies decide to close their offerings to the web, I am convinced the web will route around it.
sentences.chinese: 如果大型媒体和电信公司决定停止向万维网提供内容，我很确信万维网会绕过这一点。

sentences.english: He became rich through his well diversified conglomerates which deal with oil, banking and telecommunication business in his homeland, Russia.
sentences.chinese: 他在他的祖国俄罗斯通过分类得当的联合企业集团以经营石油、银行业务及电信业务获得财富。

detailed_translations.english: the telegraphic or telephonic communication of audio, video, or digital information over a distance by means of radio waves, optical signals, etc, or along a transmission line

sentences.english: If you have time – please answer a comment of another participant.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有时间-请答复另外一个参与者的评论。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is taking part in an activity or event

name: initiate
trans: 发起， 开始， 创始； 接纳， 让…加入

sentences.english: They have decided to initiate legal proceedings against the newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定向该报提起法律诉讼。

sentences.english: Intellectuals have initiated a debate on terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 知识分子就恐怖主义发起了辩论。

detailed_translations.chinese: 开始， 创造， 发起； 使初步了解； 接纳， 让…加入
detailed_translations.english: to arrange for something important to start, such as an official process or a new plan
someone who has been allowed to join a particular organization, club, or group and has been taught its secrets

name: domestic
trans: 国内的； 家庭的； 驯养的

sentences.english: ...over 100 domestic flights a day to 30 leading U.S. destinations.
sentences.chinese: …每天飞往美国30个主要目的地的100多个国内航班。

detailed_translations.english: relating to or happening in one particular country and not involving any other countries

sentences.english: During dry place, keep within the new air circulation, avoid rain and insolate, also can use some detergent to remove odor.
sentences.chinese: 在晾置期间，要保持新居内空气的流通，避免雨淋及曝晒，还可采用一些去除气味的清洁剂。

detailed_translations.english: a liquid or powder used for washing clothes, dishes etc

name: glare
trans: 怒目而视； 发出刺眼的光

sentences.english: The old woman glared at him.
sentences.chinese: 那个老妇人怒视着他。

sentences.english: The sun glared down on us.
sentences.chinese: 刺眼的阳光照在我们身上。

sentences.english: She gave him a hostile glare.
sentences.chinese: 她狠狠地瞪了他一眼。

sentences.english: a special screen to reduce glare
sentences.chinese: 一种可以减弱刺眼强光的特殊屏幕

detailed_translations.english: to look angrily at someone for a long time
a long angry look

name: terrestrial
trans: 陆地的， 陆生的， 陆栖的； 地球的

sentences.english: ...terrestrial life forms.
sentences.chinese: …地球上的生命形态。

detailed_translations.chinese: 地球的；陆地的，[生物] 陆生的；人间的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the Earth rather than to the moon or other  planets

name: deception
trans: 骗局； 诡计； 欺骗， 欺诈

sentences.english: She didn’t have the courage to admit to her deception.
sentences.chinese: 她没有勇气承认自己的欺骗行为。

sentences.english: He was convicted of obtaining money by deception .
sentences.chinese: 他被判犯有诈骗钱财罪。

detailed_translations.english: the act of deliberately making someone believe something that is not true

name: compile
trans: 汇编； 编辑， 编纂

sentences.english: The document was compiled by the Department of Health.
sentences.chinese: 这份文件是由卫生部汇编的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 编译；编制；编辑；[图情] 汇编
detailed_translations.english: to make a book, list, record etc, using different pieces of information, music etc

sentences.english: Students were evaluated without bias.
sentences.chinese: 对学生的评估都是公正的。

detailed_translations.english: an opinion about whether a person, group, or idea is good or bad that influences how you deal with it

sentences.english: ...car exhaust fumes.
sentences.chinese: …汽车尾气。

detailed_translations.english: Fumes are the unpleasant and often unhealthy smoke and gases that are produced by fires or by things such as chemicals, fuel, or cooking
to give off smoke or gases

sentences.english: We’ll have to budget more carefully.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须更仔细地安排开支。

sentences.english: This scheme enables you to budget the cost through fixed monthly payments.
sentences.chinese: 这个计划可以让你把费用分摊在每个月里等额偿还。

sentences.english: Cheap flights are available from budget travel agents from $240.
sentences.chinese: 起价$240的廉价机票可从一些经济旅行社那里买到。

detailed_translations.english: to carefully plan and control how much money you spend and what you will buy with it

detailed_translations.chinese: 低廉的， 收费公道的
detailed_translations.english: Budget is used in advertising to suggest that something is being sold cheaply
the money that is available to an organization or person, or a plan of how it will be spent

name: radiate
trans: 辐射， 发射； 流露， 显示； 自中心向各方伸展

sentences.english: He radiated calm confidence.
sentences.chinese: 他身上散发着沉稳自信的气质。

detailed_translations.chinese: 辐射；传播；流露；发射；广播
detailed_translations.english: if someone radiates a feeling, or if it radiates from them, it is very easy to see that this is how they feel

name: tension
trans: 紧张； 拉紧； 张力

sentences.english: The tension was becoming unbearable, and I wanted to scream.
sentences.chinese: 这种紧张变得难以忍受，我真想大声尖叫。

sentences.english: Muscle tension can be a sign of stress.
sentences.chinese: 肌肉紧张可能是压力大的迹象。

sentences.english: This wire will take 50 pounds tension.

sentences.chinese: 通过成像技术和基因检测，科学家发现了成活在幼年蝾螈胚胎细胞中的藻类——甚至存在于一些成年雌性的生殖道中。

sentences.chinese: 更重要的是，有迹象表明这种细胞内的水藻可以直接将光合作用的产物氧气和二氧化碳给容纳它的蝾螈细胞。

a heavy abrupt fall or the sound of this

sentences.chinese: 那辆车追上来与杰克并行时，他一下子就认出了驾车的人。

detailed_translations.english: to walk, ride etc next to each other, all facing the same way

后退， 退缩； 反冲， 后坐力

Recoil is also a noun

trans: 交互式的； 合作的， 互相配合的

sentences.chinese: 交互式电脑系统

sentences.chinese: 特雷莎在1989年做了一次移植手术，而正当她刚刚从那可怕的磨难中逐渐恢复时，又患了脑溢血。

sentences.chinese: 云层稀薄而纤细，并泛着蓝光，和无尽的黑暗太空形成对比（右上部分）。

name: premise
trans: 房屋和地基， 经营场址； 前提， 假设

sentences.english: Schools may earn extra money by renting out their premises.
sentences.chinese: 学校通过出租房屋场地可以获取额外收入。

trans: 聚居于， 大批生长于； 开拓殖民地， 移居于

sentences.chinese: 被蚂蚁占据的一棵死树

detailed_translations.english: to establish political control over an area or over another country, and send your citizens there to settle

trans: 季节； 时节； 时期

sentences.chinese: 一个把山谷淹掉来建造水坝的极具争议的计划

to succeed in achieving something after trying for a long time

sentences.chinese: 有些古典派画廊也会陈列出明亮色彩的现代派绘画。

sentences.english: Statement and portrait together form a single image of a thinker. (See the interactive gallery, “Why Philosophy?
sentences.chinese: 陈述和肖像一起构成了一位思想家的独有影像。 （参见互动画廊，“何为哲学？”）

sentences.english: Whether you just want to browse our huge image gallery or want to share your personal photos with others, this is the site for you!
sentences.chinese: 无论你是想要浏览我们众多的画廊图片还是想要和其他人分享你的个人照片,这个网站绝对对你的味口。

苍白的；淡色的；暗淡的，微弱的

sentences.chinese: 他看上去非常苍白憔悴。

sentences.chinese: 为保证绝对安全，你需要一个花费约为两百美元的硬件。

sentences.chinese: 这工作太单调了，我希望能做些更有创造性的事情。

sentences.chinese: 他乘坐华盛顿－纽约的往返班机。

sentences.english: Personal safety is of primary importance .

sentences.chinese: 原木燃烧的熊熊大火

sentences.chinese: 一些动物作为神和军事的力量的象征置放在他的周围——美洲狮、狼、鹰、隼、猫头鹰、响尾蛇——装在笼子里一起活埋。

sentences.chinese: 我看不到通风设备，连窗户或至少一个通风扇也没有。

sentences.chinese: 基地内的任何地方都没有单一的玻璃窗格，而且唯一的机械通风设备安装在了画廊中。

sentences.chinese: 日食

sentences.chinese: 一些能效最高的冰箱比传统型号少消耗70%的电。

sentences.chinese: 峡谷中壮观的岩层

name: psychoanalysis
trans: 心理分析， 精神分析

sentences.english: In theory, psychoanalysis is the philosophy of the unconscious mind; in practice it is a means by which mental disorders can be cured.
sentences.chinese: 在理论上，精神分析是一门关于无意识心理的哲学；在实践上，它又是一种治愈心理紊乱的方法。

sentences.english: ASK someone to name a famous psychologist, and chances are they will pick Sigmund Freud (pictured), the bearded Austrian academic who came up with the idea of psychoanalysis.
sentences.chinese: 说起著名的心理学家，人们可能会想到西格蒙德弗洛伊德（如图），这位满脸大胡子的奥地利学者提出了精神分析的概念。

sentences.english: For the woman, her love can turn a frog into a beautiful man, while for the man love reduces the woman to what psychoanalysis calls a "partial object", that in you which makes me desire you.
sentences.chinese: 对女人而言，她的爱可以让一只青蛙变成一位英俊的男性，而对男人来说，他的爱则把女人降低为了精神分析所谓的“部分客体”，在你身上使我欲望你的东西。

sentences.english: I recently had the pleasure of conducting an interview with him on bilingualism, translation, and interpreting.
sentences.chinese: 我最近有幸就双语教育，笔译和口译方面的有关问题对他进行了一次采访。

sentences.english: The scientists who studied this were motivated by earlier studies which showed that bilingualism enhances mental abilities in both children and older adults.
sentences.chinese: 科学家研究它的动机其实来源于早先的研究，这些研究显示了，双语能增强孩子和大人的大脑的能力。

detailed_translations.english: Bilingualism is the ability to speak two languages equally well

name: competence
trans: 能力， 胜任； 权限； 技能

sentences.english: Typing is considered by most employers to be a basic competence.
sentences.chinese: 大多数雇主认为打字是一项基本技能。

detailed_translations.chinese: 能力，胜任；权限；作证能力；足以过舒适生活的收入
detailed_translations.english: the ability to do something well

name: fuse
trans: 融合；熔接；熔化；因保险丝烧断而断电；合并
保险丝； 引信； 导火线

sentences.english: two 13 amp fuses
sentences.chinese: 两根13安培的保险丝

sentences.english: I taught him how to change a fuse .
sentences.chinese: 我教他怎么换保险丝。

sentences.english: A bomb was deactivated at the last moment, after the fuse had been lit.
sentences.chinese: 一枚炸弹在导火线已被点燃后的最后一刻被解除。

sentences.english: The skull bones fuse between the ages of fifteen and twenty-five.
sentences.chinese: 颅骨在15和25岁之间长合。

detailed_translations.english: if electrical equipment fuses, or if you fuse it, it stops working because a fuse has melted

name: frivolous

sentences.chinese: 我只是认定自己有点儿太轻率，不适合当医生。

detailed_translations.english: If you describe someone as frivolous, you mean they behave in a silly or light-hearted way, rather than being serious and sensible

sentences.english: He’ll phone on some pretext or other.
sentences.chinese: 他会以这样或那样的理由打电话的。

detailed_translations.english: a false reason given for an action, in order to hide the real reason

name: emergent
trans: 突现的； 新兴的； 紧急的

sentences.english: Discovering these patterns is the key to emergent design.
sentences.chinese: 发现这些模式是紧急设计的关键。

sentences.english: The real trick in emergent design is discovering these patterns.
sentences.chinese: 紧急设计的真正诀窍就是发现这些模式。

sentences.english: The document is genuine, I can assure you .
sentences.chinese: 我能向你保证，这文件是真的。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone that something will definitely happen or is definitely true so that they are less worried

name: consult
trans: 请教； 商议； 参考， 翻阅

sentences.chinese: 如果症状持续的话，马上咨询医生。

sentences.english: Have you consulted a dictionary?
sentences.chinese: 你查过词典了吗？

detailed_translations.english: to ask for information or advice from someone because it is their job to know something

name: funding
trans: 基金， 资金； 提供资金

sentences.english: They hope for government funding for the programme.
sentences.chinese: 他们希望得到政府为这一计划提供的资金。

detailed_translations.chinese: 基金， 资金； 提供资金

name: survive
trans: 幸免， 幸存； 继续存在， 存货； 艰难度过； 比…长命

sentences.english: Only 12 of the 140 passengers survived.
sentences.chinese: 140 名乘客中只有 12 人生还。

sentences.english: She survived the attack.
sentences.chinese: 她在袭击中幸免于难。

sentences.english: people who survive cancer
sentences.chinese: 癌症幸存者

detailed_translations.english: to continue to live after an accident, war, or illness

sentences.chinese: 5,000英镑的初始投资

sentences.english: The initial response has been encouraging.
sentences.chinese: 最初的反应情况很乐观。

the first letter of someone’s first name

name: rudimentary
trans: 未充分发展的， 原始的； 基本的， 基础的

sentences.english: Gradually, I acquired a rudimentary knowledge of music.
sentences.chinese: 我逐渐掌握了基本的音乐知识。

sentences.english: my rudimentary German
sentences.chinese: 我粗浅的德语

detailed_translations.chinese: 基本的；初步的；退化的；残遗的；未发展的
detailed_translations.english: a rudimentary knowledge or understanding of a subject is very simple and basic

sentences.english: His business rivals knew they could expect no quarter from such a ruthless adversary.
sentences.chinese: 他的业务对手都知道他们不能指望这样无情的对手的慈悲。

sentences.english: They tell us, sir, that we are weak -- unable to cope with so formidable an adversary.
sentences.chinese: 先生，他们告诉我们，我们是弱小的——不能应付如此强大的对手。

sentences.english: If we use exponentiation to encrypt or decrypt , the adversary can use logarithm to attack .
sentences.chinese: 如果我们运用求幂运算来加密和解密，对手就可以运用对数进行攻击。

detailed_translations.english: a country or person you are fighting or competing against

sentences.english: He dismissed arguments postulating differing standards for human rights in different cultures and regions.
sentences.chinese: 他无法接受的是假定人权标准在不同文化和地区有所不同。

detailed_translations.chinese: 假定；要求；视…为理所当然
detailed_translations.english: to suggest that something might have happened or be true
something believed to be true, on which an argument or scientific discussion is based

name: infest
trans: 大批滋生， 大批出没于

sentences.english: ...pests like aphids which infest cereal crops.
sentences.chinese: …像蚜虫那样大肆侵害谷类作物的害虫。

detailed_translations.chinese: 骚扰；寄生于；大批出没；大批滋生
detailed_translations.english: if insects, rats etc infest a place, there are a lot of them and they usually cause damage

sentences.english: Of or relating to a genre of prose fiction that originated in Spain and depicts in realistic detail the adventures of a roguish hero, often with satiric or humorous effects.
sentences.chinese: 流浪汉体裁小说的流浪汉体裁小说的，这种叙述性小说体源于西班牙，以现实主义的细节描写了一个流浪汉式主人公的历险，通常具有讽刺或幽默的效果；或关于这种小说的

sentences.english: 1940 - The Great Dictator, a satiric social commentary film by and starring Charlie Chaplin, is released.
sentences.chinese: 1940年的今天，由查理卓别林创作并主演的讽刺社会现象的电影《大独裁者》发行。

sentences.english: the Christian promise of eternal life
sentences.chinese: 基督教承诺的永生

sentences.english: She’s an eternal optimist (= she always expects that good things will happen ).
sentences.chinese: 她永远是个乐观主义者。

detailed_translations.english: continuing for ever and having no end

name: crumple
trans: 变皱， 起皱； 破裂； 崩溃， 垮台

sentences.english: She crumpled the paper in her hand.
sentences.chinese: 她把手中的纸揉成了一团。

sentences.english: She crumpled up her coffee cup.
sentences.chinese: 她挤瘪了咖啡杯。

detailed_translations.english: If you crumple something such as paper or cloth, or if it crumples, it is squashed and becomes full of untidy creases and folds
Crumple up means the same as

name: satire
trans: 讽刺文学， 讽刺作品； 讽刺

sentences.english: the characteristic use of satire in Jonson’s work
sentences.chinese: 琼森作品中讽刺手法的独到运用

detailed_translations.chinese: 讽刺；讽刺文学，讽刺作品
detailed_translations.english: a way of criticizing something such as a group of people or a system, in which you deliberately make them seem funny so that people will see their faults

sentences.english: the prevalent belief in astrology
sentences.chinese: 对占星术的普遍相信

detailed_translations.english: common at a particular time, in a particular place, or among a particular group of people

name: cling
trans: 附着， 黏住； 紧紧抓住； 挨近

sentences.english: His wet shirt clung to his body.
sentences.chinese: 他的湿衬衫紧紧地贴在身上。

sentences.english: After her mother's death, Sara clung to her aunt more than ever.
sentences.chinese: 萨拉在母亲去世后比以往任何时候都更依附于她的姨妈。

sentences.english: Throughout the trial she had clung to the belief that he was innocent.
sentences.chinese: 在整个审判中，她都坚持相信他是清白的。

detailed_translations.english: to stick to someone or something, or seem to surround them

name: clip
trans: 夹子， 回形针， 别针； 弹夹， 弹仓； 电影片段， 剪报

sentences.english: a stack of bills clipped together
sentences.chinese: 夹在一起的一沓钞票

detailed_translations.english: to fasten something together or to be fastened together using a clip
to cut small amounts of something in order to make it tidier
a small metal or plastic object that holds or fastens things together

sentences.english: The immaculately tended gardens are an oasis in the midst of Cairo's urban sprawl.
sentences.chinese: 那些打理得非常整洁的花园是杂乱扩张的开罗市区中的一片绿洲。

detailed_translations.english: a place with water and trees in a desert

sentences.english: The plant absorbs nutrients from the soil.
sentences.chinese: 植物从土壤中吸取养分。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical or food that provides what is needed for plants or animals to live and grow

sentences.english: The compact design of the machine allows it to be stored easily.
sentences.chinese: 这台机器的设计小巧灵便，易于存放。

sentences.english: The students’ rooms were compact, with a desk, bed, and closet built in.
sentences.chinese: 学生的房间很小巧，配有一张书桌、一张床和一个壁橱。

detailed_translations.english: small, but arranged so that everything fits neatly into the space available – used to show approval
to press something together so that it becomes smaller or more solid
an official contract or agreement

name: outlaw
trans: 罪犯， 歹徒， 亡命之徒； 被剥夺法律权益者

sentences.english: Jesse was an outlaw, a bandit, a criminal.
sentences.chinese: 杰西曾是个逃犯、土匪、罪犯。

sentences.english: In some states gambling was outlawed.
sentences.chinese: 在一些州赌博被宣布为非法。

sentences.english: The German government has outlawed some fascist groups.
sentences.chinese: 德国政府已宣布一些法西斯团体为非法。

detailed_translations.chinese: 歹徒；罪犯；亡命之徒；被剥夺法律保护者
detailed_translations.english: someone who has done something illegal, and who is hiding in order to avoid punishment – used especially about criminals in the past

detailed_translations.chinese: 宣布…为不合法；将…放逐；剥夺…的法律保护
detailed_translations.english: When something is outlawed, it is made illegal

sentences.english: The water in Lake Powell is used to irrigate the area.
sentences.chinese: 包尔湖的水被用来灌溉该地区。

detailed_translations.english: to supply land or crops with water

sentences.english: The leaves change colour, then shrivel.
sentences.chinese: 树叶变了颜色，然后干枯了。

detailed_translations.english: if something shrivels, or if it is shrivelled, it becomes smaller and its surface becomes covered in lines because it is very dry or old

name: encrust
trans: 在表面形成硬壳， 结壳； 用…装饰外层

detailed_translations.chinese: 在表面形成硬壳， 结壳； 用…装饰外层
detailed_translations.english: to cover or overlay with or as with a crust or hard coating

sentences.english: A new upsurge in construction is in the making.
sentences.chinese: 一个建设的新高潮正在兴起。

sentences.english: The last big locust upsurge ended early in 2005 and the current alert level is green or calm.
sentences.chinese: 上次大规模蝗虫高潮在2005年年初结束，目前的警报级别为绿色或平静。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden strong feeling

sentences.english: They built a dam along the seashore to retain the seawater.
sentences.chinese: 他们沿海岸筑起一道堤坝以拦住海水。

detailed_translations.english: to stop the water in a river or stream from flowing by building a special wall across it
a special wall built across a river or stream to stop the water from flowing, especially in order to make a lake or produce electricity

sentences.english: These plants bloom in spring.
sentences.chinese: 这些植物在春天开花。

sentences.english: They bloom for a month and fade away in no time.
sentences.chinese: 它们开花为一个月的时间和逐渐消失很快。

sentences.english: We noticed that these women began to bloom into greater self-confidence and even to shed unhealthy relationships. At that point we knew we were onto something big.
sentences.chinese: 我们注意到，这些妇女开始开花到更大的自信，甚至摆脱不健康的关系。在这一点上，我们知道我们正在做一件大事。

detailed_translations.english: if a plant or a flower blooms, its flowers appear or open

detailed_translations.chinese: 花，开花，开花期；青春焕发
detailed_translations.english: a flower or flowers

name: denote
trans: 表示， 意指； 标示， 预示， 象征

sentences.english: What does the word ‘curriculum’ denote that ‘course’ does not?
sentences.chinese: curriculum一词的哪些含义是course没有的？

detailed_translations.english: to mean something

name: zone
trans: 将…划做特殊区域；分区，划分地带
地区， 地域， 地带； 气候带

sentences.english: San Francisco and Tokyo are both located in earthquake zones.
sentences.chinese: 旧金山和东京都位于地震带。

sentences.english: The government has set up a special economic zone to promote private enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 政府设立了一个经济特区来推动私营企业的发展。

detailed_translations.english: a large area that is different from other areas around it in some way

sentences.english: His voice was barely audible (=  could only just be heard  ) above the roar of the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 人声嘈杂，几乎听不见他的说话声。

detailed_translations.english: a sound that is audible is loud enough for you to hear it

name: exhort
trans: 劝告， 规劝， 告诫

sentences.english: Kennedy exhorted his listeners to turn away from violence.
sentences.chinese: 肯尼迪劝告他的听众要远离暴力。

sentences.english: He exhorted his companions, "Try to accomplish your aim with diligence."
sentences.chinese: 他勉励他的同志，“尝试以勤奋来实现目标。”

detailed_translations.english: If you exhort someone to do something, you try hard to persuade or encourage them to do it

name: propagate
trans: 繁殖； 散布， 传播

sentences.english: The group launched a website to propagate its ideas.
sentences.chinese: 这个团体建了一个网站来宣扬他们的主张。

sentences.english: The plant can be propagated from seed.
sentences.chinese: 这种植物可由种子繁殖。

detailed_translations.english: to spread an idea, belief etc to many people

name: checked
trans: 格子花纹的； 棋盘状的

sentences.english: He was wearing blue jeans and a checked shirt.
sentences.chinese: 他穿着蓝色牛仔裤和一件格子衬衫。

detailed_translations.chinese: 格子花纹的； 棋盘状的
detailed_translations.english: Something that is checked has a pattern of small squares, usually of two colours

sentences.english: Lack of money necessitated a change of plan.
sentences.chinese: 由于缺乏资金，只能改变计划。

detailed_translations.english: to make it necessary for you to do something

sentences.english: orthodox medical treatments
sentences.chinese: 传统疗法

sentences.english: He challenged the orthodox views on education.
sentences.chinese: 他对传统的教育观念提出了质疑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 正统的；传统的；惯常的；东正教的
detailed_translations.english: orthodox ideas, methods, or behaviour are accepted by most people to be correct and right

name: depredation
trans: 劫掠， 掠夺， 破坏

sentences.english: Much of the region's environmental depredation is a result of poor planning.
sentences.chinese: 这个地区的环境破坏大都是规划不周的结果。

detailed_translations.english: an act of taking or destroying something

name: combination
trans: 结合， 混合； 化合； 组合

sentences.english: a combination nightclub and café
sentences.chinese: 夜总会兼咖啡馆

detailed_translations.english: two or more different things that exist together or are used or put together

sentences.english: The soldiers were killed in an ambush.
sentences.chinese: 那些士兵遭伏击身亡。

sentences.english: In winter the danger of ambush is much reduced.
sentences.chinese: 冬天，遭伏击的危险大大减少。

sentences.english: The Guatemalan army says rebels ambushed and killed 10 patrolmen.
sentences.chinese: 危地马拉军方称叛军伏击并杀死了10名巡逻兵。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden attack on someone by people who have been hiding and waiting for them, or the place where this happens
If a group of people ambush their enemies, they attack them after hiding and waiting for them

sentences.english: We have purchased some valuable jewelry.
sentences.chinese: 我们购置了几件贵重的珠宝饰物。

sentences.english: The robbers buried the jewelry chest on the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 盗贼们把珠宝箱埋藏在山上。

sentences.english: They buy jewelry and clothes for themselves with images of cats on them.
sentences.chinese: 他们为自己购买带有猫咪图象的珠宝饰物和衣服。

name: obtain
trans: 获得； 通用， 流行

sentences.english: These conditions no longer obtain.
sentences.chinese: 这些状况已不复存在。

detailed_translations.chinese: 通用， 流行； 存在
detailed_translations.english: if a situation, system, or rule obtains, it continues to exist
to get something that you want, especially through your own effort, skill, or work

sentences.english: a respected elder statesman
sentences.chinese: 一位受人尊敬的政界元老

detailed_translations.english: a political or government leader, especially one who is respected as being wise and fair

sentences.english: The subjects were given quadruple the normal dosage of the drug.
sentences.chinese: 让实验对象服用了四倍于正常剂量的药物。

detailed_translations.english: four times as big or as many
to increase and become four times as big or as high, or to make something increase in this way

sentences.english: I’m afraid she’s also an adept liar.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕她还是一个撒谎专家。

detailed_translations.english: good at something that needs care and skill

name: curiosity
trans: 好奇心， 求知欲； 罕见而有趣之物， 珍品

sentences.english: I opened the packet just to satisfy my curiosity .
sentences.chinese: 我打开包裹只是为了满足我的好奇心。

sentences.english: The news aroused a lot of curiosity among local people.
sentences.chinese: 这条消息在当地人中间引起了很大的好奇心。

sentences.english: She decided to follow him out of curiosity .
sentences.chinese: 她出于好奇决定跟踪他。

sentences.english: Margaret looked at him with curiosity .
sentences.chinese: 玛格丽特好奇地看着他。

sentences.english: a man of immense intellectual curiosity
sentences.chinese: 求知欲极强的一个男人

sentences.english: It was idle curiosity that made me ask.
sentences.chinese: 我只是好奇地随便问了一下。

detailed_translations.english: the desire to know about something

sentences.english: Under his leadership, the U.N.'s repute has risen immeasurably.
sentences.chinese: 在他的领导下，联合国的名望得到了极大提升。

detailed_translations.english: reputation

sentences.english: nimble fingers
sentences.chinese: 灵巧的手指

sentences.english: a nimble climber
sentences.chinese: 敏捷的攀登者

detailed_translations.english: able to move quickly and easily with light neat movements

name: amiable
trans: 可爱的； 友好的， 和蔼的， 亲切的

sentences.english: The driver was an amiable young man.
sentences.chinese: 司机是位友善的年轻人。

sentences.english: She was in an amiable mood.
sentences.chinese: 她心情很好。

detailed_translations.english: friendly and easy to like

detailed_translations.chinese: (Amiable)人名；(法)阿米亚布勒；(英)阿米娅布尔

sentences.english: The courses were run to a consistent format.
sentences.chinese: 这些课程的编排是有连续性的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 设计，安排；格式，样式，版式
detailed_translations.english: the way in which something such as a television show or meeting is organized or arranged
to organize the space on a computer  disk  so that information can be stored on it

name: sacrifice
trans: 牺牲， 献身； 献祭， 祭品

sentences.english: The minister stressed the need for economic sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 部长强调了在经济上作出牺牲的必要性。

sentences.english: The workforce were willing to make sacrifices in order to preserve jobs.
sentences.chinese: 雇员为了保住饭碗情愿作出牺牲。

sentences.english: She brought three children up single-handedly, often at great personal sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 她独自一人把三个孩子带大，常常需要作出巨大的个人牺牲。

sentences.english: They made sacrifices to ensure a good harvest.
sentences.chinese: 他们举行献祭以保丰收。

sentences.english: He sacrificed a promising career to look after his kids.
sentences.chinese: 他为了照看孩子牺牲了很有前途的事业。

detailed_translations.english: when you decide not to have something valuable, in order to get something that is more important
to willingly stop having something you want or doing something you like in order to get something more important

name: particular
trans: 特定的；独特的；详细的；挑剔的

sentences.english: In this particular case, no one else was involved.
sentences.chinese: 这件事没有其他人牵涉其中。

sentences.english: Most students choose one particular area for research.
sentences.chinese: 大多数学生选择一个特定领域进行研究。

sentences.english: Marty’s very particular about his food.
sentences.chinese: 马蒂对食物很挑剔。

detailed_translations.chinese: 特别的，特指的；讲究的；挑剔的，吹毛求疵的
detailed_translations.english: a particular thing or person is the one that you are talking about, and not any other

name: corps
trans: 军团， 兵团； 特种部队； 一群人， 一组人

sentences.english: My corps ! your corps ! our corps ! maring corps !
sentences.chinese: 我的、你的、大家的海军陆战队！

sentences.english: The corps' corn in the corner is scorned by the stubborn corporation.
sentences.chinese: 军团在角落里的谷物受到了顽固的公司司（社团）的嘲笑。

detailed_translations.english: a trained army unit made of two or more  divisions (= groups of soldiers )

sentences.english: There was a pause while Alice changed the tape.
sentences.chinese: 艾丽斯换磁带的时候出现了短暂的停顿。

sentences.english: After a long pause , she went on.
sentences.chinese: 停了好一会儿，她才继续下去。

detailed_translations.english: a short time during which someone stops speaking or doing something before starting again
to stop speaking or doing something for a short time before starting again

name: formal
trans: 正规的， 正式的； 形式的

sentences.english: formal recognition of the reformed church
sentences.chinese: 改革后的教会所获得的官方承认

sentences.english: a formal agreement between the countries
sentences.chinese: 两国间的正式协议

sentences.english: There is no formal structure for negotiating pay increases.
sentences.chinese: 加薪谈判没有正式的框架可循。

detailed_translations.english: made or done officially or publicly

sentences.english: ...silk and satin in every shade of the rainbow.
sentences.chinese: …如彩虹般五颜六色的丝绸与锦缎。

detailed_translations.chinese: 彩虹；五彩缤纷的排列；幻想
detailed_translations.english: a large curve of different colours that can appear in the sky when there is both sun and rain

detailed_translations.chinese: 使呈彩虹状；如彩虹般装饰

name: instructor
trans: 导师， 讲师； 教练， 指导员

sentences.english: a driving instructor
sentences.chinese: 驾驶教练

sentences.english: ski instructors
sentences.chinese: 滑雪教练

detailed_translations.english: someone who teaches a sport or practical skill

sentences.english: He took up the cause with evangelical fervor .
sentences.chinese: 他以传道者般的热情投身于这一事业。

sentences.english: The cathedral at Chartres is an expression of the religious fervor of the Middle Ages.
sentences.chinese: 在查特雷斯的大教堂是中世纪时期宗教热情的表现之一。

sentences.english: As social conflicts continue tosharpen, the party needs to divert attention, and of course a parade is a goodway to do that by whipping up nationalist fervor.
sentences.chinese: 随着社会冲突继续深化，中共需要转移人们的注意力，而阅兵就是实现这一点的好办法，可以激起人们的民族主义热情。

name: ample
trans: 富足的， 充足的， 丰富的； 宽敞的

sentences.english: an ample bosom
sentences.chinese: 丰满的胸部

detailed_translations.english: more than enough

name: cohesion
trans: 内聚力； 凝聚力； 团结， 结合

sentences.english: a sense of community and social cohesion
sentences.chinese: 社区意识和社会凝聚力

detailed_translations.chinese: 凝聚；结合；[力] 内聚力
detailed_translations.english: if there is cohesion among a group of people, a set of ideas etc, all the parts or members of it are connected or related in a reasonable way to form a whole

name: entertain
trans: 招待， 款待； 使快乐， 娱乐

sentences.english: A museum should aim to entertain as well as educate.
sentences.chinese: 博物馆应该致力于成为娱乐和教育功能并重的场所。

sentences.english: Mark usually does the cooking when we entertain.
sentences.chinese: 我们招待客人时通常都是马克下厨。

sentences.english: Do you get an allowance for entertaining clients?
sentences.chinese: 你招待客户有补助吗？

detailed_translations.english: to amuse or interest people in a way that gives them pleasure

sentences.english: She lived a life of ease.
sentences.chinese: 她过着悠闲自在的生活。

sentences.english: The plan should ease traffic congestion in the town.
sentences.chinese: 这项计划对城里的交通拥挤状况应该有所缓解。

detailed_translations.english: lack of difficulty
to become or to make sth less unpleasant, painful, severe, etc.

sentences.english: Friendship is not only the condiment but also the anodyne of life.
sentences.chinese: 友谊是人生的调味品，也是人生的止痛药。

detailed_translations.english: a powder or liquid, such as salt or  ketchup  , that you use to give a special taste to food

name: certitude
trans: 确定， 确信； 必然性

sentences.english: Doubt and certitude are subjective reactions to the evidence.
sentences.chinese: 怀疑与确信都是对于证据的主观反映。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being or feeling certain about something

sentences.english: cost overruns of £2 billion
sentences.chinese: 20亿英镑的超额费用

detailed_translations.english: Overrun is also a noun
if unwanted things or people overrun a place, they spread over it in great numbers

name: deceptive
trans: 欺骗性的， 导致误解的

sentences.english: Some snakes move with deceptive speed (= move faster than you think or expect ) .
sentences.chinese: 有些蛇的爬行速度出乎意料地快。

sentences.english: Gwen’s students may look angelic, but appearances can be deceptive .
sentences.chinese: 格温的学生也许看起来像天使，不过人不可貌相。

detailed_translations.english: something that is deceptive seems to be one thing but is in fact very different

sentences.english: ...a professor of mathematics at Boston College.
sentences.chinese: …一位波士顿大学的数学教授。

detailed_translations.english: the science of numbers and of shapes, including  algebra  ,  geometry  , and  arithmetic

sentences.english: Where do you all live? Do you live near a reactor?
sentences.chinese: 你们都住在哪，你们接近一个反应堆吗？

sentences.english: Then you have, in terms of the barrier integrity, reactor cooling systems activity, cladding failure.
sentences.chinese: 然后你们会有，在屏障完整性，反应堆冷却系统行为，覆盖层失效。

sentences.english: For almost three years, AECL went through its calculations, but nothing changed: if its model of how the reactor functioned was correct, the PCR should be negative.
sentences.chinese: 在将近三年中，AECL仔细检查了枫叶的计算过程，但结果仍然如此：如果它的反应堆运行模式无误，那么PCR就应该是负值。

detailed_translations.english: a  nuclear reactor

sentences.english: a cookout on the beach
sentences.chinese: 海滩上的露天烧烤

detailed_translations.english: a party or occasion when a meal is cooked and eaten outdoors

name: envision
trans: 想象， 展望， 预想

sentences.english: I envisioned a future of educational excellence.
sentences.chinese: 我展望了一个有着优质教育的未来。

detailed_translations.english: to imagine something that you think might happen in the future, especially something that you think will be good

name: outcry
trans: 大声疾呼， 强烈的抗议

sentences.english: The closure of the local hospital has caused a huge public outcry.
sentences.chinese: 当地医院的关闭激起了大规模的公众抗议。

detailed_translations.chinese: 强烈抗议；大声疾呼；尖叫；倒彩
detailed_translations.english: an angry protest by a lot of ordinary people

name: penetrate
trans: 刺穿； 渗透； 洞察

sentences.english: bullets that penetrate thick armour plating
sentences.chinese: 穿过厚装甲的子弹

sentences.english: Sunlight barely penetrated the dirty windows.
sentences.chinese: 阳光几乎照不进那些肮脏的窗户。

detailed_translations.english: to enter something and pass or spread through it, especially when this is difficult

name: paddle
trans: 用桨划船； 涉水， 戏水

sentences.english: Each man had a paddle for an hour and then a rest.
sentences.chinese: 每人划一小时桨， 然后休息一下。

sentences.english: We strive to paddle to follow the stream, however, we are unsure if how and when we will reach the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 我们沿着河流奋力划桨，但是我们无法确定我们什么时候和怎样才能到达地平线。

sentences.english: If you run your team as if they were self-leading, but in reality they’re chaos, then before long you’ll be heading up a certain creek without a paddle.
sentences.chinese: 如果你当他们是自我引导型的团队在运作，但其实他们事实上还是在混乱的状态，那么不久你就会在一条河上像没有桨似的乱窜。

detailed_translations.english: a short pole that is wide and flat at the end, used for moving a small boat in water
to move a small light boat through water, using one or more paddles

name: reschedule
trans: 重新计划， 重订…的时间表

sentences.english: Since I'll be away, I'd like to reschedule the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 既然我将要离开，我想重新安排一下这次会议的时间。

detailed_translations.chinese: 重新计划， 重订…的时间表
detailed_translations.english: to arrange for something to happen at a different time from the one that was previously planned

name: principal
trans: 校长； 资本； 主角

sentences.english: His principal reason for making the journey was to visit his family.
sentences.chinese: 他那次旅程的首要目的是探访家人。

sentences.english: Teaching is her principal source of income.
sentences.chinese: 教书是她主要的收入来源。

sentences.english: the principal character in the book
sentences.chinese: 书里的主人公

detailed_translations.english: most important

detailed_translations.chinese: 负责人， 校长； 资本， 本金； 主要演员， 主角
detailed_translations.english: someone who is in charge of a school

name: tend
trans: 趋于， 易于； 照料， 看护

sentences.english: Sofia was in the bedroom tending to her son.
sentences.chinese: 索菲娅在卧室里照料她的儿子。

detailed_translations.chinese: 照管， 照料， 护理
detailed_translations.english: to look after someone or something
if something tends to happen, it happens often and is likely to happen again

sentences.english: In the somber archives of a sedate museum a large archaic volume is somewhat conspicuously displayed.
sentences.chinese: 在一个平静的博物馆中昏暗的档案室里，一本厚厚的古书被摆在了很显著的位置。

sentences.english: Her 71-year-old husband, looking somber and composed, was brought into the church in a wheelchair and did not speak at the service.
sentences.chinese: 凯西71岁高龄的丈夫被人用轮椅推进教堂，看起来沉默忧郁，在葬礼仪式上也没有发言。

sentences.english: Don't ignore it because it makes you laugh — director Paul Feig's 2011 hit deserves as much respect as any somber, wintry, subtitled drama.
sentences.chinese: 不要因为它让你开怀大笑而忽略了它——总监保罗·法伊格在2011年引起的这场轩然大波与其他任何忧郁、寒冷、次要的戏剧一样值得尊重。

sentences.english: The term "industrial democracy" is often used as a synonym for worker participation.
sentences.chinese: “工业民主”这一词语常被用作“工人参与”的同义词。

detailed_translations.english: a word with the same meaning as another word in the same language

sentences.english: an equitable distribution of food supplies
sentences.chinese: 所供应食品的合理分配

detailed_translations.chinese: 公平的，公正的；平衡法的
detailed_translations.english: treating all people in a fair and equal way

name: inconspicuous
trans: 不引人瞩目的， 不显眼的

sentences.english: an inconspicuous little restaurant
sentences.chinese: 一家不起眼的小饭店

sentences.english: She stood by the wall, trying to look inconspicuous.
sentences.chinese: 她贴墙站着，尽量不引人注目。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不显眼的,不引人注意的
detailed_translations.english: not easily seen or noticed

name: specimen
trans: 标本， 样本； 范例； 抽样

sentences.english: a blood specimen
sentences.chinese: 血样

detailed_translations.english: a small amount or piece that is taken from something, so that it can be tested or examined

name: exotic
trans: 外来的， 来自异国的； 奇异的

sentences.english: exotic birds
sentences.chinese: 外国的奇异鸟类

sentences.english: exotic places
sentences.chinese: 有异国风情的地方

detailed_translations.chinese: 异国的；外来的；异国情调的
detailed_translations.english: something that is exotic seems unusual and interesting because it is related to a foreign country – use this to show approval

name: relief
trans: 缓解， 减轻， 轻松； 援救， 救济； 宽慰； 浮雕

sentences.english: Marijuana can provide pain relief for some cancer patients.
sentences.chinese: 大麻可以为一些癌症患者减轻疼痛。

sentences.english: money raised for the relief effort
sentences.chinese: 为赈灾筹集的钱款

detailed_translations.english: when something reduces someone’s pain or unhappy feelings

name: boycott
trans: 联合抵制， 拒绝购买

sentences.english: We boycott all products tested on animals.
sentences.chinese: 我们抵制所有拿动物做试验的产品。

sentences.english: They are now trying to organize a boycott.
sentences.chinese: 他们正试图组织一场抵制行动。

detailed_translations.english: to refuse to buy something, use something, or take part in something as a way of protesting
an act of boycotting something, or the period of time when it is boycotted

name: introduction
trans: 介绍； 传入， 引进； 导言， 绪论

sentences.english: Pete, are you going to make the introductions?
sentences.chinese: 皮特，你来作一下介绍吧。

sentences.english: Our first contestant needs no introduction (= everyone already knows the person ).
sentences.chinese: 我们的第一位参赛者就不用介绍了。

sentences.english: the introduction of Buddhism to China nearly 2,000 years ago
sentences.chinese: 约2,000年前佛教传入中国

sentences.english: In the introduction, he explains why he wrote the book.
sentences.chinese: 在引言里，他解释了写这本书的原因。

detailed_translations.english: the act of formally telling two people each other’s names when they first meet

name: subscribe
trans: 订购， 订阅； 申请， 预订； 捐助， 赞助

sentences.english: My main reason for subscribing to New Scientist is to keep abreast of advances in science.
sentences.chinese: 我订阅《新科学家》的主要原因是要跟上科学的进步。

sentences.english: Each employee may subscribe for up to £2,000 worth of shares.
sentences.chinese: 每位员工最高可以认购价值 2,000 英镑的股份。

sentences.english: The tour of Edinburgh is fully subscribed.
sentences.chinese: 去爱丁堡旅游的名额已经满了。

detailed_translations.english: to pay money, usually once a year, to have copies of a newspaper or magazine sent to you, or to have some other service

sentences.english: new drug therapies
sentences.chinese: 新的药物疗法

sentences.english: radiation therapy for cancer treatment
sentences.chinese: 治疗癌症的放射疗法

detailed_translations.english: the treatment of an illness or injury over a fairly long period of time

sentences.english: Do we have a chromosome like that?
sentences.chinese: 那么我们真的有那么一条染色体么？

sentences.english: She is part of the chromosome of Kolkata.
sentences.chinese: 她就是加尔各答染色体的一部分。

sentences.english: The distances are additive along the length of the chromosome .
sentences.chinese: 其距离值就是沿着染色体长度方向的累加。

detailed_translations.english: a part of every living cell that is shaped like a thread and contains the  gene s  that control the size, shape etc that a plant or animal has

name: concentration
trans: 专注， 专心； 浓度， 含量； 集中， 聚集

sentences.english: She needed all her powers of concentration to stop herself from slipping on the icy road.
sentences.chinese: 她需要集中全部注意力才能不让自己在结冰的路上滑倒。

sentences.english: Lack of concentration was a real problem.
sentences.chinese: 注意力不集中是个大问题。

sentences.english: I lost my concentration and fell asleep.
sentences.chinese: 我精神一放松就睡着了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 集中； 专注， 专心； 浓缩； 浓度
detailed_translations.english: the ability to think about something carefully or for a long time

name: velocity
trans: 速度， 速率； 迅速

sentences.english: the velocity of light
sentences.chinese: 光速

sentences.english: The speedboat reached a velocity of 120 mph.
sentences.chinese: 快艇的时速达到了120英里。

sentences.english: a high velocity bullet
sentences.chinese: 高速子弹

detailed_translations.english: the speed of something that is moving in a particular direction

name: fellowship
trans: 友谊； 奖学金； 团体， 协会

sentences.english: Regular outings contribute to a sense of fellowship among co-workers.
sentences.chinese: 经常外出游玩可以增进同事之间的友谊。

sentences.english: ...the National Schizophrenia Fellowship.
sentences.chinese: …全国精神分裂协会。

detailed_translations.chinese: 伙伴关系,友情,友谊；团体
detailed_translations.english: a feeling of friendship resulting from shared interests or experiences

sentences.english: a colleague of mine from the bank
sentences.chinese: 我在银行的一位同事

sentences.english: She discussed the idea with some of her colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 她和几位同事讨论了这个想法。

detailed_translations.english: someone you work with – used especially by professional people

sentences.english: They liked their churches to be unadorned.
sentences.chinese: 他们希望他们的教堂朴素无华。

detailed_translations.english: without unnecessary or special features or decorations

name: confession
trans: 供认， 招供， 坦白； 供词； 承认

sentences.english: Sanchez’s confession was read out to the court.
sentences.chinese: 桑切斯的供词在法庭上宣读了出来。

sentences.english: At 3 a.m. Higgins broke down and made a full confession .
sentences.chinese: 凌晨三点，希金斯崩溃了，交代了一切。

sentences.english: I have a confession – I like Britney Spears’ music.
sentences.chinese: 我得承认，我喜欢布兰妮•斯皮尔斯的音乐。

detailed_translations.english: a statement that you have done something wrong, illegal, or embarras-sing, especially a formal statement

sentences.english: Yes this is the…is the prime meridian if you like.
sentences.chinese: 是的，这就是本初子午线，它把地球分为东半球和西半球。

sentences.english: The prime meridian of longitude is in greenwich south london.
sentences.chinese: 经度的本初子午线在伦敦南部的格林威治。

detailed_translations.english: one of the imaginary lines from the North Pole to the South Pole, drawn on a map of the Earth

name: interfere
trans: 干涉， 干扰， 妨碍

sentences.english: My daughter-in-law said that I was interfering, but I was only trying to help.
sentences.chinese: 我的儿媳说我多管闲事，但我只是想帮忙。

detailed_translations.english: to deliberately get involved in a situation where you are not wanted or needed

sentences.english: She lives in a small apartment.
sentences.chinese: 她住在一套小公寓里。

detailed_translations.english: a set of rooms on one floor of a large building, where someone lives

name: tolerate
trans: 忍受； 容许， 承认

sentences.english: We simply will not tolerate vigilante groups on our streets.
sentences.chinese: 我们决不容许有自行惩办犯罪的组织出现在我们的街头。

sentences.english: This sort of behaviour will not be tolerated.
sentences.chinese: 这种行为是不能容许的。

detailed_translations.english: to allow people to do, say, or believe something without criticizing or punishing them

sentences.english: stacks of dirty dishes
sentences.chinese: 一摞摞脏盘子

sentences.english: Mrs. Cathiard was stacking the clean bottles in crates.
sentences.chinese: 卡提亚夫人当时正在把干净的瓶子堆放到板条箱里。

detailed_translations.english: a neat pile of things
If you stack a number of things, you arrange them in neat piles

name: resent
trans: 憎恶， 愤恨， 怨恨

sentences.english: Paul resented the fact that Carol didn’t trust him.
sentences.chinese: 保罗非常气愤，因为卡萝尔不信任他。

detailed_translations.english: to feel angry or upset about a situation or about something that someone has done, especially because you think that it is not fair

name: fiery
trans: 似火的； 易怒的， 暴躁的

sentences.english: He has a fiery temper .
sentences.chinese: 他脾气火爆。

detailed_translations.chinese: 热烈的，炽烈的；暴躁的；燃烧般的
detailed_translations.english: becoming angry or excited very quickly

name: mime
trans: 喜剧； 哑剧； 哑剧演员； 模拟表演

sentences.english: The children learn through role-play, dance and mime.
sentences.chinese: 儿童通过角色表演、舞蹈和哑剧来学习。

sentences.english: They will perform a short mime later.
sentences.chinese: 稍后他们将表演一个哑剧小品。

sentences.english: a professional mime artist
sentences.chinese: 专业的哑剧表演艺术家

detailed_translations.english: the use of movements to express what you want to say without using words, or a play where the actors use only movements
to describe or express something, using movements not words

name: ambiguous
trans: 不明确的， 模棱两可的

sentences.english: The language in the Minister’s statement is highly ambiguous.
sentences.chinese: 部长的声明措辞很含糊。

sentences.english: His role in the affair is ambiguous.
sentences.chinese: 他在这起事件中的角色并不明确。

detailed_translations.english: that can be understood in more than one way; having different meanings

sentences.english: They demanded a free parliament and press.
sentences.chinese: 他们要求议会自由和新闻自由。

detailed_translations.english: the group of people who are elected to make a country’s laws and discuss important national affairs

sentences.english: The president made a statement to allay public anxiety.
sentences.chinese: 总统发表了一项声明以缓解公众的忧虑。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel less afraid, worried etc

name: path
trans: 道路； 路线； 小路， 小径

sentences.english: I walked nervously up the garden path towards the front door.
sentences.chinese: 我提心吊胆地沿着花园的小道向前门走去。

sentences.english: a well-worn path across the grass
sentences.chinese: 草地上被踏出的小径

sentences.english: Follow the path along the river to the bridge.
sentences.chinese: 沿着河边的小路走到那座桥。

sentences.english: a path leading to the summer house
sentences.chinese: 通往避暑别墅的小径
