detailed_translations.english: a track that has been made deliberately or made by many people walking over the same ground

name: crack
trans: 破裂，断裂；发出爆裂声；重击，猛击；崩溃，

sentences.english: Don’t put boiling water in the glass or it will crack.
sentences.chinese: 不要把沸水倒进这个玻璃杯里，否则它会破裂的。

sentences.english: Concrete is liable to crack in very cold weather.
sentences.chinese: 在严寒的天气条件下混凝土可能会开裂。

sentences.english: He picked up a piece of rock and cracked it in half.
sentences.chinese: 他捡起一块石头，把它击碎成两半。

sentences.english: She fell and cracked a bone in her leg.
sentences.chinese: 她摔了一跤，结果一根腿骨骨折。

sentences.english: He cracked a couple of eggs into a pan.
sentences.chinese: 他往平底锅里打了几个鸡蛋。

detailed_translations.english: to break or to make something break, either so that it gets lines on its surface, or so that it breaks into pieces
a very narrow space between two things or two parts of something

sentences.english: He dotes on his nine-year-old son.
sentences.chinese: 他对自己9岁的儿子十分溺爱。

detailed_translations.english: If you say that someone dotes on a person or a thing, you mean that they love or care about them very much and ignore any faults they may have

name: retrieval
trans: 数据检索； 取回， 索回

sentences.english: a new system that should speed up information retrieval
sentences.chinese: 能加速信息检索的新系统

detailed_translations.english: the process of getting back information stored on a computer system

name: conceivable
trans: 可能的； 可信的， 可想象的

sentences.english: It is conceivable that you may get full compensation, but it’s not likely.
sentences.chinese: 你可能会得到全额赔偿，但可能性不大。

sentences.english: We were discussing the problems from every conceivable angle.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在从各个能想到的角度对问题进行讨论。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可能的；想得到的，可想像的
detailed_translations.english: able to be believed or imagined

name: cube
trans: 立方体； 立方形的东西； 立方

sentences.english: a sugar cube
sentences.chinese: 一块方糖

sentences.english: an ice cube
sentences.chinese: 一小方块冰

sentences.english: Cut the meat into small cubes.
sentences.chinese: 把肉切成丁。

detailed_translations.english: a solid object with six equal square sides

detailed_translations.chinese: 使成立方形；使自乘二次；量…的体积
detailed_translations.english: to multiply a number by itself twice

sentences.english: It was virtually impossible to synchronize our lives so as to take vacations and weekends together.
sentences.chinese: 为了一起度假和过周末而要让我们的生活同步几乎是不可能的。

sentences.english: Synchronize the score with the film action.
sentences.chinese: 让配乐和电影动作同步。

detailed_translations.english: If you synchronize two activities, processes, or movements, or if you synchronize one activity, process, or movement with another, you cause them to happen at the same time and speed as each other

sentences.english: ...a grove of majestic sequoias.
sentences.chinese: ...一片高大的红杉树林。

detailed_translations.english: a tree from the western US that can grow to be very tall

name: impact
trans: 影响； 冲击， 撞击
影响； 冲击， 撞击

sentences.english: Such schemes mean little unless they impact people.
sentences.chinese: 除非能对人们造成影响，否则这样的计划意义不大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 影响， 作用， 冲击
detailed_translations.english: to have an important or noticeable effect on someone or something
the effect or influence that an event, situation etc has on someone or something

name: mild
trans: 轻微的； 温和的； 随和的

sentences.english: His voice was soft and mild.
sentences.chinese: 他的声音轻柔温和。

sentences.english: a mild herbicide
sentences.chinese: 药力温和的除草剂

detailed_translations.english: a mild person has a gentle character and does not easily get angry

name: profile
trans: 人物专访；概述，传略，人物简介；面部的侧影；轮廓，外形

sentences.english: Dani has a lovely profile.
sentences.chinese: 达尼的侧面轮廓很好看。

detailed_translations.chinese: 侧面；人物简介；轮廓，形象；姿态，引人注目的状态
detailed_translations.english: a side view of someone’s head
to write or give a short description of someone or something

name: bill
trans: 账单；纸币，钞票；议案，法案；节目单；招贴，海报
用招贴宣布； 给…开账单

sentences.english: Have you paid the phone bill?
sentences.chinese: 电话费你付了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a written list showing how much you have to pay for services you have received, work that has been done etc

sentences.english: ...the Napo river, a tributary of the Amazon.
sentences.chinese: ...纳波河，亚马孙河的一条支流。

detailed_translations.english: a stream or river that flows into a larger river

sentences.english: tourists whose cars clog the roads each summer
sentences.chinese: 每年夏天开着汽车堵塞道路的游客

detailed_translations.english: to block something or become blocked
a shoe made of wood with a leather top that covers the front of your foot but not your heel

sentences.english: Seniors can get a 10% discount.
sentences.chinese: 老年人可以享受10%的折扣。

detailed_translations.english: a  senior citizen

name: dilate
trans: 膨胀， 扩大； 详述

sentences.english: dilated pupils
sentences.chinese: 扩大的瞳孔

detailed_translations.english: if a hollow part of your body dilates or if something dilates it, it becomes wider

sentences.english: Looking after the house was viewed as a woman’s domain.
sentences.chinese: 料理家务被认为是女性的份内之事。

detailed_translations.english: an area of activity, interest, or knowledge, especially one that a particular person, organization etc deals with

name: census
trans: 人口普查， 人口统计

sentences.english: He and Mary journeyed to Bethlehem to be counted in the Roman census, and while they were there the child was born.
sentences.chinese: 他和玛利亚一起去到伯利恒，罗马的人口普查把他们统计在内。 他们在那里时，孩子降生了。

detailed_translations.english: an official process of counting a country’s population and finding out about the people

name: smear
trans: 胡乱涂抹；弄脏；诽谤，诋毁
污迹， 污斑； 诽谤， 诋毁； 涂片

sentences.english: smeared windows
sentences.chinese: 脏了的窗户

detailed_translations.english: to put dirty or oily marks on something
a  smear test

name: willful
trans: 成心的， 有意的； 任性的

sentences.english: There is a willful self-destructiveness in the air here as if America has all the time and money in the world for petty politics.
sentences.chinese: 这里的空气里中弥漫着一种故意自我毁灭的气息，为了狭隘的政治，美国好像在全世界有的是金钱和时间。

sentences.english: Even the best ones can be foiled, though, by a sufficiently willful programmer committed to ignoring basic principles of memory management.
sentences.chinese: 但是，即使最优秀的编程人员也可能会被忽略内存管理基本原则的非常任性的编程人员搅乱。

sentences.english: The relative merits of both approaches have to be considered.
sentences.chinese: 两种方法的相对优点都得考虑在内。

sentences.english: her opponent’s relative lack of experience
sentences.chinese: 她的对手相对来说缺少经验

sentences.english: You may think you’re poor, but it’s all relative (= you are not poor compared to some people ) .
sentences.chinese: 你可能认为自己很穷，但一切都是相对的。

detailed_translations.english: having a particular quality when compared with something else
a member of your family

sentences.english: The average American has not even thought about next year’s election.
sentences.chinese: 普通的美国人甚至还没有想过明年的选举。

sentences.english: In an average week I drive about 250 miles.
sentences.chinese: 平常我每周开车约250英里。

detailed_translations.english: having qualities that are typical of most people or things

name: compare
trans: 比较， 相比， 对比

sentences.english: The report compares the different types of home computer available.
sentences.chinese: 这份报告比较了市场上不同类型的家用计算机。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比较， 对照； 把…比作
detailed_translations.english: to consider two or more things or people, in order to show how they are similar or different

name: pluralism
trans: 多元化， 多元性； 多元主义

sentences.english: a nation characterized by cultural pluralism
sentences.chinese: 以多元文化为特色的国家

detailed_translations.english: when people of many different races, religions, and political beliefs live together in the same society, or the belief that this can happen successfully

name: influential
trans: 有影响力的； 有权势的

sentences.english: He had influential friends.
sentences.chinese: 他有一些有影响力的朋友。

sentences.english: a highly influential art magazine
sentences.chinese: 一本极有影响力的艺术杂志

detailed_translations.english: having a lot of influence and therefore changing the way people think and behave

sentences.english: The hotel is in the city centre, close to shops and local amenities.
sentences.chinese: 该酒店位于市中心，紧邻商店和当地的便利设施。

sentences.english: houses that lack basic amenities
sentences.chinese: 缺乏基本生活设施的房屋

detailed_translations.chinese: 舒适；礼仪；愉快；便利设施
detailed_translations.english: something that makes a place comfortable or easy to live in

sentences.english: He bequeathed all his silver to his children.
sentences.chinese: 他把所有的银币都留给了他的孩子们。

detailed_translations.chinese: 遗赠；把…遗赠给；把…传下去
detailed_translations.english: to officially arrange for someone to have something that you own after your death

name: transparent
trans: 透明的； 明显的， 显而易见的； 直率的

sentences.english: a transparent plastic container
sentences.chinese: 透明的塑料容器

sentences.english: Am I that transparent (= are my intentions that obvious) ?
sentences.chinese: 我就那么没有城府？

detailed_translations.english: allowing you to see through it

name: adaptive
trans: 适合的， 有适应性的

sentences.english: Societies need to develop highly adaptive behavioural rules for survival.
sentences.chinese: 社会要生存需要建立有高度适应性的行为准则。

detailed_translations.english: Adaptive means having the ability or tendency to adapt to different situations

name: mint
trans: 薄荷； 造币厂； 大量的钱

sentences.english: new potatoes sprinkled with chopped mint
sentences.chinese: 撒上薄荷屑的嫩马铃薯

sentences.english: roast lamb with mint sauce
sentences.chinese: 配薄荷调味汁的烤羔羊肉

sentences.english: Decorate with a sprig of mint .
sentences.chinese: 用小薄荷枝装饰。

detailed_translations.chinese: 薄荷；[金融] 造币厂，巨款
detailed_translations.english: a small plant with green leaves that have a fresh smell and taste and are used in cooking
to make a coin
looking new and in perfect condition

name: grasp
trans: 抓住； 掌握， 理解， 领会

sentences.english: I grasped his arm firmly and led him away.
sentences.chinese: 我紧紧抓住他的胳膊把他带走。

sentences.english: Alan grasped the handle and pulled it.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦抓住手柄一拉。

sentences.english: A short opening paragraph enables the reader to quickly grasp what the article is about.
sentences.chinese: 开篇的小段落使读者很快就能掌握文章的大意。

sentences.english: Luke took her arm in a firm grasp and led her through the gate.
sentences.chinese: 卢克紧紧抓着她的胳膊，领她进了门。

detailed_translations.english: to take and hold something firmly
the way you hold something or your ability to hold it

name: journal
trans: 期刊， 杂志； 日记， 日志

sentences.english: the British Medical Journal
sentences.chinese: 《英国医学杂志》

sentences.english: He decided to keep a journal.
sentences.chinese: 他决定记日记。

detailed_translations.english: a serious magazine produced for professional people or those with a particular interest

sentences.english: a paved courtyard
sentences.chinese: 地面铺砌过的院子

detailed_translations.english: to cover a path, road, area etc with a hard level surface such as blocks of stone or  concrete

sentences.english: a rock band with a distinctive sound
sentences.chinese: 音色独特的摇滚乐队

detailed_translations.english: having a special quality, character, or appearance that is different and easy to recognize

sentences.english: a chaotic mixture of images
sentences.chinese: 杂乱无章的各种图像

detailed_translations.english: a chaotic situation is one in which everything is happening in a confused way

name: brag
trans: 吹嘘， 自夸， 自吹自擂

sentences.english: Do not brag or bluff.
sentences.chinese: 不要自夸和虚张声势。

sentences.english: It is not in good form to brag of your learning.
sentences.chinese: 吹嘘自己的学识是欠妥的。

sentences.english: These are the people that have every right to brag and maybe be a bit arrogant, yet they remain humble.
sentences.chinese: 这些人有理由吹嘘自己的成功，甚至理应有点自傲，但是他们仍然保持着低调的作风。

detailed_translations.english: to talk too proudly about what you have done, what you own etc – used to show disapproval

sentences.english: I’ll be annoyed if we don’t finish by eight.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们8点还未完成，我会生气的。

detailed_translations.english: slightly angry

detailed_translations.chinese: 使烦恼；打扰（annoy的过去分词）

sentences.english: So when you go from head to toe, you're seeing a mosaic creature that is neither chimpanzee, nor is it human.
sentences.chinese: 所以从头到脚，让人看到的是一个在黑猩猩和人类之间模棱两可的生物，这就是始祖地人猿。

sentences.english: By hunting or gathering away from the group, both chimpanzee and dolphin moms ensure that what they find goes to their young.
sentences.chinese: 黑猩猩和海豚妈妈们远离群体打猎和收集食物，并保证他们所找到的食物都给孩子们。

sentences.english: It was, if I can give a chimpanzee language, I can empty the contents of his mind. He can tell me what he's thinking, how he sees the world.
sentences.chinese: 他的想法是，如果我能交给黑猩猩一种语言的话，我就可以掏空他的想法，他可以告诉我他在想什么，他是怎样看这个世界的。

detailed_translations.english: an intelligent African animal that is like a large monkey without a tail

name: term
trans: 学期；期限，期间；条件，条款；术语

sentences.english: Teachers often feel overworked in term time (= during the term ) .
sentences.chinese: 教师在学期内经常觉得工作担子过重。

detailed_translations.chinese: 术语；学期；期限；条款；(代数式等的)项
detailed_translations.english: a word or expression with a particular meaning, especially one that is used for a specific subject or type of language
to use a particular word or expression to name or describe something

sentences.english: Pompeii was destroyed when the volcano erupted in 79 AD.
sentences.chinese: 庞贝城于公元79年在火山爆发中毁灭。

detailed_translations.english: a mountain with a large hole at the top, through which lava is sometimes forced out

name: acquisition
trans: 习得， 获得； 收购， 购置

sentences.english: the acquisition of language
sentences.chinese: 语言的习得

detailed_translations.english: the process by which you gain knowledge or learn a skill

name: rigid
trans: 严格的； 刚硬的， 不易弯曲的； 死板的， 刻板的； 僵硬的

sentences.english: rigid plastic
sentences.chinese: 硬塑料

detailed_translations.english: stiff and not moving or bending

name: deadline
trans: 最后期限， 截止时间

sentences.english: I’m always working under pressure to meet deadlines (= finish something on time ) .
sentences.chinese: 我总是在赶工期的压力下工作。

detailed_translations.english: a date or time by which you have to do or complete something

sentences.english: The so-called experts couldn’t tell us what was wrong.
sentences.chinese: 那些所谓的专家说不出问题出在哪里。

detailed_translations.english: used to describe someone or something that has been given a name that you think is wrong

name: mine
trans: 矿， 矿井； 地雷， 水雷

sentences.english: It was Glen’s idea, not mine.
sentences.chinese: 这是格伦的主意，不是我的。

sentences.english: ‘Is that your car?’ ‘No, mine is parked over the road.’
sentences.chinese: “那是你的车吗？”“不是，我的车停在路对面。”

sentences.english: You’ve got good legs – mine are too thin.
sentences.chinese: 你的腿很美——我的腿太细了。

sentences.english: His English is better than mine.
sentences.chinese: 他英语比我好。

detailed_translations.english: used by the person speaking or writing to refer to something that belongs to or is connected with himself or herself

name: advent
trans: 到来， 来临； 出现

sentences.english: the advent of the computer
sentences.chinese: 计算机的问世

detailed_translations.chinese: 到来；出现；基督降临；基督降临节
detailed_translations.english: the time when something first begins to be widely used

sentences.english: These spices were first brought to Italy from the East in medieval times.
sentences.chinese: 这些香料最早是在中世纪时从东方被带到了意大利。

sentences.english: a medieval castle
sentences.chinese: 一座中世纪城堡

detailed_translations.english: connected with the Middle Ages (= the period between about 1100 and 1500 AD )

name: staff
trans: 全体职工；行政人员；棍棒
为…配备人员； 任职于

sentences.english: The staff were very good.
sentences.chinese: 员工们都很棒。

sentences.english: 10 staff were allocated to the task.
sentences.chinese: 10名员工被分派做这项任务。

detailed_translations.chinese: 全体职员，员工；工作人员；参谋
detailed_translations.english: the people who work for an organization

name: involve
trans: 包含； 牵涉， 牵连； 使参加

sentences.english: What will the job involve?
sentences.chinese: 这份工作包括什么？

sentences.english: I didn’t realize putting on a play involved so much work.
sentences.chinese: 我没想到上演一出戏剧需要做这么多的工作。

detailed_translations.english: if an activity or situation involves something, that thing is part of it or a result of it

sentences.english: We’re getting to the stage where we hardly ever go out together.
sentences.chinese: 我们快要到几乎不一起外出的地步了。

sentences.english: She is on stage for most of the play.
sentences.chinese: 这出戏的大部分时间里她都在台上

detailed_translations.english: a particular time or state that something reaches as it grows or develops

sentences.english: a complicated pattern
sentences.chinese: 复杂的图案

sentences.english: The human brain is an incredibly complicated organ.
sentences.chinese: 人脑是一个结构极其复杂的器官。

detailed_translations.english: consisting of many closely connected parts

sentences.english: The car has a maximum speed of 120 mph.
sentences.chinese: 这辆汽车的最高时速为120英里。

sentences.english: They made maximum use of the resources available.
sentences.chinese: 他们充分利用可获取的资源。

sentences.english: To get the maximum benefit, do the exercises slowly.
sentences.chinese: 要想获得最佳的效果，这些运动要做得慢一点。

sentences.english: Display the hologram under a strong light for maximum effect.
sentences.chinese: 把立体全息图放在强光下展示以得到最佳效果。

sentences.english: The plant is operating at maximum capacity .
sentences.chinese: 这家工厂正在开足马力生产。

sentences.english: The award will consist of a lump sum to a maximum value of $5,000.
sentences.chinese: 奖学金最高将是5,000美元，一次性给付。

detailed_translations.chinese: 最大的； 最高的； 顶点的
detailed_translations.english: the maximum amount, quantity, speed etc is the largest that is possible or allowed
the largest number or amount that is possible or is allowed

sentences.english: We wake every morning to the sound of a finch singing.
sentences.chinese: 每天早晨醒来时还能听到燕雀的歌唱。

sentences.english: One species of finch learned to pick up a cactus needle to poke for insects.
sentences.chinese: 有一种雀科小鸟学会捡起仙人掌针去戳得昆虫猎物。

detailed_translations.english: a small bird with a short beak

name: syllabus
trans: 教学大纲， 课程提纲

sentences.english: The course syllabus consisted mainly of novels by African-American authors, male and female.
sentences.chinese: 该课程的教学大纲主要包括了非裔美国男女作家的小说。

detailed_translations.english: a plan that states exactly what students at a school or college should learn in a particular subject

sentences.english: fragrant flowers
sentences.chinese: 芳香的花朵

detailed_translations.english: having a pleasant smell

sentences.english: a tolerant society
sentences.chinese: 宽容的社会

sentences.english: trees that are tolerant of salt sea winds
sentences.chinese: 能耐海风的树木

detailed_translations.english: allowing people to do, say, or believe what they want without criticizing or punishing them

sentences.english: the local dialect
sentences.chinese: 当地方言

detailed_translations.chinese: 方言，土话；同源语；行话；个人用语特征
detailed_translations.english: a form of a language which is spoken only in one area, with words or grammar that are slightly different from other forms of the same language

sentences.english: We are not so much testing as proposal-thinning, and we can add rigor such as traceability and other documentation as the leading architectural candidates emerge.
sentences.chinese: 我们不像细化提议那样做太多测试，随着最主要的架构候选的出现，我们可以添加严密，如可溯性和其他文档。

sentences.english: The towers, not only ground the buildings with their visual weight, but they also contribute to the rigor of rhythmic play needed in such expansive internal spaces and environment.
sentences.chinese: 这些塔楼不仅利用其视觉上的厚重感将建筑物固定在地面上，还有助于生成这种开阔的内部空间和环境所需的严谨的韵律感。

name: dim
trans: 模糊的；暗淡的；朦胧的；不乐观的

sentences.english: in the dim light of the early dawn
sentences.chinese: 在微弱的晨曦里

sentences.english: a dim glow
sentences.chinese: 昏暗的微光

sentences.english: I could see a dim shape in the doorway.
sentences.chinese: 我模模糊糊看见门口有个人影。

detailed_translations.english: fairly dark or not giving much light, so that you cannot see well

sentences.english: ...the courage and competitiveness which impels him to take risks.
sentences.chinese: ...驱策他冒险的勇气和竞争精神。

detailed_translations.english: if something impels you to do something, it makes you feel very strongly that you must do it

sentences.english: In recognition of their vulnerability, the lichen fields have been marked off on maps and with fences.
sentences.chinese: 人们意识到它们的脆弱，因此地衣区被从地图上标注出来同时也被栅栏围起来。

sentences.english: The lichen tests were conducted in Spain and at Utah’s Mars Desert Research Station, where two of the researchers donned spacesuits and lived for two weeks in the field as astronauts.
sentences.chinese: 这些地衣测试是在西班牙和犹他州的火星沙漠研究站进行的。 两个研究人员穿着者宇航服如同宇航员般的过了两周。

detailed_translations.english: a grey, green, or yellow plant that spreads over the surface of stones and trees

name: paralyze
trans: 使瘫痪， 使麻痹； 使无效

sentences.english: You can bet that would truly paralyze the flow of credit: Does anyone believe Washington can manage banks?
sentences.chinese: 你可以打赌，这会使流动的信贷真正限于瘫痪：真有人相信华盛顿可以经营银行吗？

sentences.english: I think we would all agree that it is well worth it, yet many of us still choose to let this innate fear paralyze us and settle into comfortable, secure positions despite being unhappy in them.
sentences.chinese: 我想每个人都认同这些东西是值得的，但是我们中许多人尽管对目前处境不甚满意，仍然选择麻痹于内在的恐惧，停滞于安逸，保险的职位。

sentences.english: In April 655, Osman’s palace was besieged by rebels.
sentences.chinese: 公元655年4月，奥斯曼的宫殿遭到叛军围攻。

detailed_translations.english: to surround a city or castle with military force until the people inside let you take control

sentences.english: a company with an exemplary record on environmental issues
sentences.chinese: 在处理环境问题方面可作为楷模的公司

detailed_translations.chinese: 可作楷模的， 典范的
detailed_translations.english: excellent and providing a good example for people to follow

name: faculty
trans: 学院； 全体教职员工； 能力

sentences.english: Both faculty and students oppose the measures.
sentences.chinese: 教师和学生都反对这些措施。

detailed_translations.english: all the teachers in a university

sentences.english: Different photodissociation spectra, the action spectrum as function of laser wavelength, and ratio curve of different channels were obtained.
sentences.chinese: 得到了反应的光解谱和作为波长函数的光解行为光谱以及各反应通道的分支比。

sentences.english: The oxygen in the atmosphere had to come from another source. The likely possibility involves the photodissociation of water vapor by high energy rays from the sun.
sentences.chinese: 大气中的氧气必须从其它途径获取，很可能是光解作用，即由太阳反射的高能射线分解水蒸汽。

name: adamant
trans: 坚定不移的， 坚决的； 固执的

sentences.english: She begged me to change my mind, but I remained adamant .
sentences.chinese: 她求我改变主意，但我坚决不肯。

detailed_translations.chinese: 固执的，坚强的；坚定不移的；坚硬无比的
detailed_translations.english: determined not to change your opinion or a decision that you have made

name: hydraulic
trans: 水力的， 液压的； 液压驱动的； 与水力系统有关的

sentences.english: a hydraulic pump
sentences.chinese: 水压泵，液压泵

sentences.english: hydraulic brakes
sentences.chinese: 液压制动器

detailed_translations.chinese: 液压的；水力的；水力学的
detailed_translations.english: moved or operated by the pressure of water or other liquid

name: habit
trans: 习惯； 习性， 脾性

sentences.english: Regular exercise is a good habit.
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼是个好习惯。

sentences.english: Thinking negatively can become a habit.
sentences.chinese: 消极的思维方式会成为一种习惯。

sentences.english: She has a habit of playing with her hair when she’s nervous.
sentences.chinese: 她有一个习惯，一紧张就拨弄自己的头发。

sentences.english: Some people drink alcohol as much from habit as from desire.
sentences.chinese: 有些人喝酒既是因为想喝，也是出于习惯。

detailed_translations.english: something that you do regularly or usually, often without thinking about it because you have done it so many times before

sentences.english: ...high limestone cliffs.
sentences.chinese: …高耸的石灰岩峭壁。

detailed_translations.english: a type of rock that contains calcium

name: considerate
trans: 考虑周到的， 体贴的， 体谅的

sentences.english: He was always kind and considerate.
sentences.chinese: 他总是很善良，为别人着想。

detailed_translations.english: always thinking of what other people need or want and being careful not to upset them

sentences.english: The heavy rains and flooding killed scores of livestock.
sentences.chinese: 大雨和洪水淹死了许多家畜。

detailed_translations.english: animals such as cows and sheep that are kept on a farm

sentences.english: Police have found a vital clue .
sentences.chinese: 警方发现了至关重要的线索。

sentences.english: Archaeological evidence will provide clues about what the building was used for.
sentences.chinese: 考古证据将为这幢建筑的用途提供线索。

sentences.english: a desperate search for clues
sentences.chinese: 拼命寻找线索

detailed_translations.english: an object or piece of information that helps someone solve a crime or mystery

sentences.english: I close the meteorite room and try the door across thecorridor.
sentences.chinese: 我关上陨石房间的门，又打开了走廊对面的门。

sentences.english: If the contamination were terrestrial, one could expect equal amounts of the molecules (or less) to be present in the meteorite samples, certainly not more.
sentences.chinese: 如果污染是来自地面的，在陨石样品中有可能会发现等量（或者较少）的分子，但肯定不会多。

sentences.english: The group, based at Imperial College London, found some of the base building blocks for life, nucleobases, in dust from the Murchison meteorite which fell to Earth in 1969.
sentences.chinese: 研究小组由伦敦帝国学院创建，他们在1969年坠入地球的默奇森陨石尘埃中发现了碱基，这是构建生命的基本成分。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of rock or metal from space that has landed on Earth

sentences.english: molten iron
sentences.chinese: 熔铁

detailed_translations.english: molten metal or rock has been made into a liquid by being heated to a very high temperature

name: radius
trans: 半径； 周围， 范围

sentences.english: The shock of the explosion was felt over a radius of forty miles.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸引起的剧烈震动在方圆40英里内都能感觉得到。

detailed_translations.english: an area that covers a particular distance in all directions from a central point

sentences.english: He pressed the red alarm signal to see if it was on or off.
sentences.chinese: 他按了一下红色报警信号钮，检查一下它是开著的还是关著的。

detailed_translations.english: important
a sound or action that you make in order to give information to someone or tell them to do something
to make a sound or action in order to give information or tell someone to do something

sentences.english: a scruffy old pair of jeans
sentences.chinese: 一条不干净的旧牛仔裤

sentences.english: scruffy shops
sentences.chinese: 凌乱的商店

detailed_translations.english: dirty and untidy

sentences.english: The illness had impaired his ability to think and concentrate.
sentences.chinese: 这种疾病损害了他的思维能力和注意力。

detailed_translations.english: to damage something or make it not as good as it should be

sentences.english: a sumptuous feast
sentences.chinese: 盛宴

sentences.english: a sumptuous palace
sentences.chinese: 一座富丽堂皇的宫殿

detailed_translations.english: very impressive and expensive

sentences.english: This will limit the number of stray dogs in the area.
sentences.chinese: 这将会减少流浪狗在这一区域的数量。

sentences.english: As for her personal safety, she said she isn't overly worried but does think about what a stray lunatic could do.
sentences.chinese: 至于她个人的安全，她说她并没有过度担心，但是她的确在考虑一个流浪疯子可以做些什么。

sentences.english: Then let's say you get into horrible, disastrous debt and have to go begging to the government, like a sad little stray.
sentences.chinese: 另外，比如说，你陷入了讨厌的、损失惨重的债务，而且必须像一个可怜的小流浪儿一样向政府祈求。

detailed_translations.english: an animal that is lost or has no home

name: static
trans: 静态的， 静止的； 静电的； 静力的

sentences.english: The number of young people obtaining qualifications has remained static or decreased.
sentences.chinese: 获得各种资格证书的年轻人的数量一直保持不变或者已经减少。

detailed_translations.english: Something that is static does not move or change
noise caused by electricity in the air that blocks or spoils the sound from radio or TV

name: kinship
trans: 血缘关系， 亲属关系

sentences.english: the ties of kinship
sentences.chinese: 亲属关系

detailed_translations.english: a family relationship

name: exhaust
trans: 用尽， 耗尽； 使非常疲倦； 详尽讨论

sentences.english: A full day’s teaching exhausts me.
sentences.chinese: 讲一整天课令我精疲力竭。

sentences.english: We are in danger of exhausting the world’s oil supply.
sentences.chinese: 我们面临世界石油储备耗尽的危险。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel extremely tired

sentences.english: soluble aspirin
sentences.chinese: 可溶性阿司匹林

detailed_translations.english: a soluble substance can be  dissolved  in a liquid

sentences.english: a varied diet
sentences.chinese: 丰富多样的饮食

sentences.english: The responsibilities of government are many, and they are varied.
sentences.chinese: 政府有很多职责，而且各不相同。

detailed_translations.english: consisting of or including many different kinds of things or people, especially in a way that seems interesting

name: intriguing
trans: 引起兴趣的， 吸引人的

sentences.english: The magazine carries an intriguing mixture of high fashion, gossip and racing.
sentences.chinese: 这本杂志内容丰富有趣，有关时尚、花边新闻和赛马的内容都有。

detailed_translations.english: something that is intriguing is very interesting because it is strange, mysterious, or unexpected

name: strap
trans: 用带捆扎， 束牢； 用绷带包扎

sentences.english: The strap of my bag is broken.
sentences.chinese: 我包上的带子断了。

sentences.english: soldiers with grenades strapped to their belts
sentences.chinese: 腰带上绑着手榴弹的士兵

detailed_translations.english: a narrow band of strong material that is used to fasten, hang, or hold onto something
to fasten something or someone in place with one or more straps

sentences.english: We need to diversify the economy.
sentences.chinese: 我们要使经济多元化。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使多样化，使变化；增加产品种类以扩大
detailed_translations.english: if a business, company, country etc diversifies, it increases the range of goods or services it produces

sentences.english: Martin showed me a graph of their recent sales.
sentences.chinese: 马丁给我看了他们最近销售情况的图表。

detailed_translations.english: a drawing that uses a line or lines to show how two or more sets of measurements are related to each other

sentences.english: They feasted well into the afternoon on mutton and corn stew.
sentences.chinese: 他们尽情享用玉米炖羊肉，一直吃到下午。

detailed_translations.chinese: 尽情地吃， 宴饮； 参加宴会
detailed_translations.english: If you feast on a particular food, you eat a large amount of it with great enjoyment
a large meal where a lot of people celebrate a special occasion

sentences.english: ...one level teaspoon of sodium bicarbonate powder.
sentences.chinese: 一平茶匙碳酸氢钠粉末

detailed_translations.english: a common silver-white metal that usually exists in combination with other substances, for example in salt. It is a chemical element: symbol Na

sentences.english: Both men imbibed considerable quantities of gin.
sentences.chinese: 这两个男人都喝了大量的杜松子酒。

detailed_translations.english: to drink something, especially alcohol – sometimes used humorously

name: impermeable
trans: 不可渗透的， 不透水的

sentences.english: No paint is impermeable to water vapour.
sentences.chinese: 没有哪种涂料是不透水汽的。

detailed_translations.english: not allowing liquids or gases to pass through

sentences.english: More troops were sent to the area as a precautionary measure .
sentences.chinese: 为谨慎起见，更多的军队被派往该地区。

detailed_translations.english: done in order to prevent something dangerous or unpleasant from happening

sentences.english: a pretentious film
sentences.chinese: 矫饰的电影

detailed_translations.english: if someone or something is pretentious, they try to seem more important, intelligent, or high class than they really are in order to be impressive

sentences.english: There is more than one way to tackle the problem.
sentences.chinese: 解决这个问题不止一个办法。

sentences.english: fishing tackle
sentences.chinese: 渔具

detailed_translations.english: to try to deal with a difficult problem
the equipment used in some sports and activities, especially fishing

name: solvent
trans: 有溶解力的； 有偿付能力的

sentences.english: They're going to have to show that the company is now solvent.
sentences.chinese: 他们将不得不证明公司现在是具备偿债能力的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 有偿付能力的；有溶解力的
detailed_translations.english: having enough money to pay your debts
a chemical that is used to  dissolve  another substance

sentences.english: I did some work as a nude model when I was in college.
sentences.chinese: 我上大学的时候当过裸体模特。

sentences.english: Have you ever posed nude (= been photographed or painted while nude )?
sentences.chinese: 你拍过裸体照吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 裸的，裸体的；无装饰的；与生俱有的
detailed_translations.english: not wearing any clothes
a painting, statue etc of someone not wearing clothes

name: distract
trans: 分散注意力， 使分心

sentences.english: Try not to distract the other students.
sentences.chinese: 尽量不要让其他学生分心。

detailed_translations.english: to take someone’s attention away from something by making them look at or listen to something else

name: palate
trans: 上腭； 味觉， 品尝力

sentences.english: It tasted very strange, at least to my untrained palate.
sentences.chinese: 这东西尝起来怪怪的，至少对于我这未经训练的味觉来说是如此。

sentences.english: a collection of dishes to tempt your palate
sentences.chinese: 让人胃口大开的一系列菜肴

detailed_translations.english: the sense of taste, and especially your ability to enjoy or judge food

sentences.english: All the medical workers in the region helped to put down the influenza epidemic.
sentences.chinese: 这个地区的所有医务工作者参加了消灭流行性感冒的工作。

sentences.english: People should therefore continue to seek seasonal influenza vaccination like any other year.
sentences.chinese: 因此，人们应当像以往一样继续接种季节性流感疫苗。

detailed_translations.english: an infectious disease that is like a very bad cold

name: loan
trans: 贷款；出借，借出；暂借的东西

sentences.english: We obtained a loan from the government.
sentences.chinese: 我们得了一笔政府贷款。

sentences.english: If you ask him for a loan, he'll come through.
sentences.chinese: 如果你向他贷款，他会满足你的要求的。

sentences.english: The company won't keep going unless we can get some loan.
sentences.chinese: 除非我们能搞到贷款，否则公司就维持不下去了。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that you borrow from a bank etc

name: virtual
trans: 模拟的， 虚拟的； 实际上的， 事实上的

sentences.english: The website allows you to take a virtual tour of the art gallery.
sentences.chinese: 这个网站可让你对美术馆作一番虚拟参观。

sentences.english: constructing virtual worlds
sentences.chinese: 构筑虚拟世界

detailed_translations.english: made, done, seen etc on the Internet or on a computer, rather than in the real world

name: squeeze
trans: 挤压；挤入；挤过，塞入；压榨，榨取；

sentences.english: She smiled as he squeezed her hand.
sentences.chinese: 他捏了捏她的手，她笑了。

sentences.english: He squeezed the trigger, but nothing happened.
sentences.chinese: 他扣动扳机，但没有反应。

detailed_translations.english: to press something firmly together with your fingers or hand

detailed_translations.chinese: 挤； 握手； 拮据， 紧缺
detailed_translations.english: an act of pressing something firmly with your fingers or hand

name: endless
trans: 无止境的， 无穷尽的

sentences.english: an endless stream of visitors
sentences.chinese: 川流不息的游客

sentences.english: The possibilities are endless.
sentences.chinese: 有无限的可能性。

sentences.english: He’s been in a lot of trouble – drugs, guns, blackmail – the list is endless.
sentences.chinese: 他麻烦太多了——毒品、枪支、敲诈——说都说不完。

detailed_translations.english: very large in amount, size, or number

sentences.english: They spent over a thousand pounds.
sentences.chinese: 他们花了一千多英镑。

sentences.english: a multi-million pound business
sentences.chinese: 一笔几百万英镑的生意

sentences.english: a five pound note
sentences.chinese: 五英镑的纸币

sentences.english: She pounded the corn kernels.
sentences.chinese: 她捣碎了玉米粒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 英镑；重击，重击声；兽栏；拘留所
detailed_translations.english: the standard unit of money in Britain, which is divided into 100 pence
If you pound something, you crush it into a paste or a powder or into very small pieces

sentences.english: Have you finished loading up?
sentences.chinese: 你装完货了吗？

sentences.english: It took an hour to load the van.
sentences.chinese: 给小型货车装货花了一小时。

sentences.english: Will you help me load the dishwasher?
sentences.chinese: 你帮我把碗碟放进洗碗机好吗？

sentences.english: The plane was carrying afull loadof fuel.
sentences.chinese: 飞机载满燃料。

detailed_translations.english: to put a large quantity of something into a vehicle or container
a large quantity of something that is carried by a vehicle, person etc

sentences.english: a rubber plantation
sentences.chinese: 橡胶园

detailed_translations.chinese: 适用于种植园或热带、亚热带国家的

name: ignore
trans: 忽视； 不顾， 不理

sentences.english: The phone rang, but she ignored it.
sentences.chinese: 电话铃响了，但她只当没听见。

sentences.english: Sam rudely ignored the question.
sentences.chinese: 萨姆粗鲁地对这个问题不予理睬。

detailed_translations.english: to behave as if you had not heard or seen someone or something

sentences.english: the Northern hemisphere
sentences.chinese: 北半球

detailed_translations.english: a half of the Earth, especially one of the halves above and below the equator

name: continuation
trans: 延长， 延续， 持续； 延长物， 扩建物； 延续部分

sentences.english: It's the coalition forces who are to blame for the continuation of the war.
sentences.chinese: 是联军应对战争的持续负责。

detailed_translations.chinese: 继续；续集；延长；附加部分；扩建物
detailed_translations.english: something that continues or follows something else that has happened before, without a stop or change

name: applaud
trans: 鼓掌， 喝彩； 称赞

sentences.english: The audience applauded loudly.
sentences.chinese: 观众掌声雷动。

sentences.english: A crowd of 300 supporters warmly applauded her speech.
sentences.chinese: 300名支持者为她的演讲热烈鼓掌。

detailed_translations.english: to hit your open hands together, to show that you have enjoyed a play, concert, speaker etc
to express strong approval of an idea, plan etc

sentences.english: studies of the lunar surface
sentences.chinese: 对月球表面的研究

sentences.english: a lunar eclipse
sentences.chinese: 月食

detailed_translations.english: relating to the Moon or to travel to the Moon

name: poetry
trans: 诗歌； 诗集； 诗意

sentences.english: He reads a lot of poetry.
sentences.chinese: 他大量阅读诗歌。

sentences.english: a poetry magazine
sentences.chinese: 诗歌杂志

detailed_translations.english: poems in general, or the art of writing them

sentences.english: He was unbearably arrogant.
sentences.chinese: 他的傲慢让人无法忍受。

sentences.english: an arrogant attitude
sentences.chinese: 傲慢的态度

detailed_translations.english: behaving in an unpleasant or rude way because you think you are more important than other people

name: relay
trans: 转播； 传达， 转述
接替人员， 轮换者； 接力赛； 中继设备

sentences.english: He quickly relayed this news to the other members of staff.
sentences.chinese: 他马上就把这个消息转告给了其他员工。

sentences.english: The game was relayed by satellite to audiences all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 这场比赛通过卫星向全世界的观众进行了转播。

detailed_translations.english: to pass a message from one person or place to another

name: permission
trans: 允许， 同意； 许可证， 书面许可

sentences.english: He asked permission to leave the room.
sentences.chinese: 他请求离开房间的许可。

sentences.english: They cannot leave the country without permission.
sentences.chinese: 没有许可他们不得离开这个国家。

detailed_translations.english: the act of allowing sb to do sth, especially when this is done by sb in a position of authority

sentences.english: The smell of diesel oil permeated the air.
sentences.chinese: 空气里充斥着柴油的气味。

detailed_translations.english: if liquid, gas etc permeates something, it enters it and spreads through every part of it

name: monogamous
trans: 一夫一妻制的； 单配的

sentences.english: So birds are monogamous but they cheat as well, within limits.
sentences.chinese: 所以鸟类是一夫一妻制，但它们也背叛，有限度地。

sentences.english: Unlike most other fish, they are monogamous and mate for life.
sentences.chinese: 不像其他的鱼类，它们是一夫一妻制并终生厮守。

sentences.english: Many birds are socially monogamous, which is to say that the male and female form an exclusive bond and spend a great deal of their time together.
sentences.chinese: 许多种鸟类都实行社会化的一夫一妻制：雄性与雌性组成独占性的结合，一起度过生命中的大部分时间。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一夫一妻的, 单配的

name: schedule
trans: 时刻表， 日程表； 清单， 明细表

sentences.english: How can he fit everything into his busy schedule ?
sentences.chinese: 他是怎么把所有的事情都排进自己忙碌的时间表的？

sentences.english: I’m going to be working to a very tight schedule (= including a lot of things that must be done in a short time ) .
sentences.chinese: 我的工作安排将会非常紧。

detailed_translations.english: a plan of what someone is going to do and when they are going to do it

name: apprehend
trans: 逮捕； 领会， 理解

sentences.english: The police have failed to apprehend the culprits.
sentences.chinese: 警方未能拘捕罪犯。

detailed_translations.english: if the police apprehend a criminal, they catch him or her

name: crippling
trans: 令人震惊的； 严重损害身体的； 极其有害的

sentences.english: the crippling effects of war on the economy
sentences.chinese: 战争给经济造成的毁灭性影响

detailed_translations.chinese: 令人震惊的； 严重损害身体的； 极其有害的
detailed_translations.english: causing so much damage or harm that something no longer works or is no longer effective

sentences.english: inherited wealth
sentences.chinese: 继承的财富

detailed_translations.english: to receive money, property etc from someone after they have died
to receive money, property etc from someone after they have died

sentences.english: ...a long, hot and arduous trip.
sentences.chinese: …一段漫长、灼热、艰难的旅程。

detailed_translations.english: involving a lot of strength and effort

name: interpret
trans: 解释， 说明； 理解； 翻译

sentences.english: They spoke good Spanish, and promised to interpret for me.
sentences.chinese: 他们西班牙语说得很好，答应替我翻译。

sentences.english: Freud’s attempts to interpret the meaning of dreams
sentences.chinese: 弗洛伊德对梦的含义的解析

detailed_translations.english: to translate spoken words from one language into another

name: faction
trans: 派别， 派系， 小集团； 派系斗争

sentences.english: struggles between the different factions within the party
sentences.chinese: 党内的派系斗争

sentences.english: the leaders of the warring factions
sentences.chinese: 交战各派的领导人

detailed_translations.english: a small group of people within a larger group, who have different ideas from the other members, and who try to get their own ideas accepted

name: beach
trans: 海滩， 湖滩， 河滩

sentences.english: a sandy beach
sentences.chinese: 沙滩

sentences.english: surfers on the beach
sentences.chinese: 沙滩上的冲浪者

detailed_translations.english: an area of sand or small stones at the edge of the sea or a lake

sentences.english: Einstein's equations showed the universe to be expanding.
sentences.chinese: 爱因斯坦的方程式表明宇宙正在扩大。

detailed_translations.english: all space, including all the stars and planets

sentences.english: She huddled herself in the blanket.
sentences.chinese: 她用毯子紧紧裹住自己。

sentences.english: They muffled up her head with a blanket.
sentences.chinese: 他们用毯子蒙住了她的头。

sentences.english: He lapped his daughter in a warm blanket.
sentences.chinese: 他把女儿裹在一个暖和的毯子里。

detailed_translations.english: a cover for a bed, usually made of wool

name: grant
trans: 给予，授予；允许，同意；承认
拨款； 津贴； 授予物

sentences.english: Britain could grant Spain’s request .
sentences.chinese: 英国可能会同意西班牙的请求。

sentences.english: I would love to be able to grant her wish.
sentences.chinese: 我很希望能够满足她的愿望。

detailed_translations.english: to give someone something or allow them to have something that they have asked for

sentences.english: The movie will have to be a huge hit to recoup its cost.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影必须大获成功才能收回成本。

sentences.english: He was desperate to try and recoup his losses.
sentences.chinese: 他不顾一切地试图挽回损失。

detailed_translations.english: to get back an amount of money you have lost or spent

sentences.english: A long-term maintenance regime relies solely on natural methods to protect the watershed and aquifer.
sentences.chinese: 而对于流域及蓄水层的长期性维护制度将仅依靠自然实现。

sentences.english: The Ogallala aquifer is a major source of drinking and irrigation water for America's central plains.
sentences.chinese: 奥加拉拉蓄水层是美国中部平原饮用和灌溉用水的主要来源。

sentences.english: However, decline or rise of water level anomaly depends on the tectonic position where the well aquifer lies in the process of stress regulation and re accumulation.
sentences.chinese: 而水位异常图像出现的上升或下降形态，取决于井孔含水层系统在大震孕育过程的应力调整再积累阶段所处的构造部位。

detailed_translations.english: In geology, an aquifer is an area of rock underneath the surface of the earth which absorbs and holds water

sentences.english: She appended a note at the end of the letter.
sentences.chinese: 她在信件尾部附加了一个说明。

detailed_translations.english: to add something to a piece of writing

detailed_translations.chinese: 设置数据文件的搜索路径

sentences.english: The society publishes a newsletter twice a year.
sentences.chinese: 该社团一年出版两次简报。

detailed_translations.english: a short written report of news about a club, organization etc that is sent regularly to people who are interested

sentences.english: That's me, the copilot, and one of the air stewardesses.
sentences.chinese: 那是我、副驾驶员还有我们的一名女乘务员。

sentences.english: That's me, the copilot, and one of the air stewardesses is a recording.
sentences.chinese: 那是我、 副驾驶员还有我们的一名女乘务员。

sentences.english: The guard looked at us with a frigid stare.
sentences.chinese: 守卫冷冷地盯着我们。

detailed_translations.english: a woman who is frigid does not like having sex

name: relic
trans: 遗物， 遗迹， 遗风

sentences.english: Roman relics found in a field
sentences.chinese: 在野外发现的古罗马遗迹

detailed_translations.english: an old object or custom that reminds people of the past or that has lived on from a past time

sentences.english: Music bellows from his insides.
sentences.chinese: 来自他的肚子的音乐风箱。

sentences.english: Yawning helps keep the brain cool, and the sinuses play a role in that process by acting as bellows, a new report suggests.
sentences.chinese: 一份新的报道显示，哈欠能够帮助大脑保持凉爽，鼻窦在这个过程中所起的作用就像是风箱。

sentences.english: Or every bellows burst, be happy Still.
sentences.chinese: 每一只风箱爆炸，她也能开颜。

detailed_translations.english: A bellows is or bellows are a device used for blowing air into a fire in order to make it burn more fiercely

name: discount
trans: 把…打折扣； 不全信， 漠视， 低估

sentences.english: They are often available at a discount.
sentences.chinese: 它们经常可以以折扣价买到。

sentences.english: This has forced airlines to discount fares heavily in order to spur demand.
sentences.chinese: 这已经迫使多家航空公司对机票大幅打折以刺激需求。

detailed_translations.english: a reduction in the usual price of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 将…打折扣； 不信； 漠视， 低估
detailed_translations.english: If a shop or company discounts an amount or percentage from something that they are selling, they take the amount or percentage off the usual price

name: convert
trans: 改变； 转变， 转化

sentences.english: a 19th-century converted barn
sentences.chinese: 由19世纪谷仓改建的房子

detailed_translations.english: to change something into a different form, or to change something so that it can be used for a different purpose or in a different way

sentences.english: There are plans to construct a new road bridge across the river.
sentences.chinese: 有计划要建造一条新的跨河公路桥。

detailed_translations.english: to build something such as a house, bridge, road etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 建筑物； 构想； 观念
detailed_translations.english: an idea formed by combining several pieces of information or knowledge

sentences.english: Weather conditions prevented them from attempting the jump.
sentences.chinese: 天气状况使他们无法尝试跳伞。

detailed_translations.chinese: 尝试， 试图， 努力
detailed_translations.english: to try to do something, especially something difficult

sentences.english: The two players have developed a friendly rivalry .
sentences.chinese: 这两名选手之间已形成一种友好的竞争关系。

sentences.english: She had never overcome her feelings of sibling rivalry (= rivalry between brothers and sisters ) .
sentences.chinese: 她一直没有克服和兄弟姐妹较劲的那种心理。

detailed_translations.chinese: 竞争， 竞赛； 对抗
detailed_translations.english: a situation in which two or more people, teams, or companies are competing for something, especially over a long period of time, and the feeling of competition between them

name: charisma
trans: 超凡魅力； 感召力； 号召力

sentences.english: He lacks charisma.
sentences.chinese: 他缺乏个人魅力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 魅力；神授的能力；非凡的领导力
detailed_translations.english: a natural ability to attract and interest other people and make them admire you

name: division
trans: 除， 除法； 分开， 分隔； 分配； 部分； 分歧， 分裂； 部门

sentences.english: the division sign (÷)
sentences.chinese: 除号

sentences.english: the Computer Services Division
sentences.chinese: 电脑维修部

detailed_translations.english: the process of finding out how many times one number is contained in another

name: balance
trans: 天平， 秤； 平衡； 差额； 余款

sentences.english: She balanced the cup on her knee.
sentences.chinese: 她把杯子在膝盖上放稳。

detailed_translations.english: to put your body or sth else into a position where it is steady and does not fall
an instrument for weighing things, with two dishes that hang from a bar

name: stalk
trans: 偷偷接近； 跟踪； 趾高气扬地走

sentences.english: celery stalks
sentences.chinese: 芹菜茎

detailed_translations.english: to walk in a proud or angry way, with long steps
a long narrow part of a plant that supports leaves, fruits, or flowers
to follow a person or animal quietly in order to catch and attack or kill them

sentences.english: And actually it damages the pancreas itself, after a while.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，一段时间之后它对胰腺本身也会产生伤害。

sentences.english: In people with diabetes, however, the pancreas either produces little or no insulin, or the cells do not respond appropriately to the insulin that is produced.
sentences.chinese: 然而，有糖尿病的人，胰腺要么生成一点或根本没有生成胰岛素，或者是细胞没有正确的反应胰腺分泌的胰岛素。

sentences.english: The scientists claim the rat stem cells grew in the niche left by the absent mouse pancreas and so almost any organ could be produced in this way.
sentences.chinese: 科学家们声称大鼠干细胞刚好在小白鼠缺失的胰腺所在位置生长，所以几乎任何器官都可以通过这种方法生成。

detailed_translations.english: a  gland  inside your body, near your stomach, that produces  insulin  and a liquid that helps your body to use the food that you eat

name: supplier
trans: 供应者， 供应商， 供货方

sentences.english: ...one of the country's biggest food suppliers.
sentences.chinese: …该国最大的食品供应商之一。

detailed_translations.chinese: 供应厂商，供应国；供应者
detailed_translations.english: a company or person that provides a particular product

name: patriarchic
trans: 家长的， 族长的； 德高望重的

detailed_translations.chinese: 家长的， 族长的； 德高望重的

sentences.english: He could mimic all the teachers’ accents.
sentences.chinese: 他能模仿所有老师的口音。

sentences.english: ‘I’m so sorry,’ she mimicked.
sentences.chinese: “很抱歉。”她学着说道。

detailed_translations.english: to copy the way someone speaks or behaves, especially in order to make people laugh

detailed_translations.chinese: 效颦者，模仿者；仿制品；小丑

name: pitch
trans: 音高，音调；倾斜度；沥青，柏油；

sentences.english: She crumpled up the page and pitched it into the fire.
sentences.chinese: 她把那页纸揉成团，扔进了火里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 投掷， 扔； 猛然倒下； (船、 飞机)颠簸
detailed_translations.english: to fall or be moved suddenly in a particular direction, or to make someone or something do this

detailed_translations.chinese: 球场；程度，强度；高度，高音；沥青；顶点
detailed_translations.english: a marked out area of ground on which a sport is played

detailed_translations.chinese: 销售；投掷，扔；使猛然倒下；表达；把…定于特定程度；定调；架设，搭，营
detailed_translations.english: to fall or be moved suddenly in a particular direction, or to make someone or something do this

sentences.english: A racing car is an extraordinary feat of engineering.
sentences.chinese: 赛车是工程学的一项非凡业绩。

detailed_translations.english: something that is an impressive achievement, because it needs a lot of skill, strength etc to do

sentences.english: The child’s incessant talking started to irritate her.
sentences.chinese: 这孩子喋喋不休，她开始烦躁起来。

sentences.english: incessant rain
sentences.chinese: 连绵的雨

detailed_translations.english: continuing without stopping

name: torrent
trans: 洪流， 急流； 爆发， 迸发

sentences.english: After five days of heavy rain the Telle river was a raging torrent (= a very violent torrent ) .
sentences.chinese: 下了五天的大雨之后，泰勒河急流汹涌。

detailed_translations.english: a large amount of water moving very quickly and strongly in a particular direction

name: appreciation
trans: 欣赏； 理解， 体谅； 感激； 鉴定， 评价

sentences.english: He was presented with a watch in appreciation of his long service.
sentences.chinese: 他获赠一块手表，作为对其长期服务的感谢。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of being grateful for something someone has done

sentences.english: Churchill’s statue stands outside the parliament building.
sentences.chinese: 丘吉尔的塑像矗立在议会大厦外。

sentences.english: A bronze statue was erected in his honour.
sentences.chinese: 人们立了一座铜像纪念他。

detailed_translations.english: an image of a person or animal that is made in solid material such as stone or metal and is usually large

name: sense
trans: 感官，官能；感觉；判断力；意义，意思

sentences.english: Cats have a very acute sense of hearing (= very good, so that they can hear even the smallest sound ) .
sentences.chinese: 猫的听觉非常敏锐。

sentences.english: Employees need the sense of being appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 雇员需要被赏识的感觉。

sentences.english: It was dark and he had completely lost his sense of direction.
sentences.chinese: 天黑了，他完全失去了方向感。

sentences.english: This is true in a general sense.
sentences.chinese: 从一般意义上来讲，这是对的。

sentences.english: Perhaps he sensed your distrust.
sentences.chinese: 也许他感觉到了你的不信任。

detailed_translations.chinese: 感官；感觉；理解力；判断力；意义
detailed_translations.english: one of the five natural powers of sight, hearing, feeling, taste, and smell, that give us information about the things around us
if you sense something, you feel that it exists or is true, without being told or having proof

name: brew
trans: 酿造；冲泡；酝酿，行将发生

sentences.english: Every beer on the menu was brewed locally.
sentences.chinese: 酒单上的所有啤酒都是本地酿造的。

detailed_translations.english: to make beer
to make beer
a drink that is brewed, especially tea

name: pretension
trans: 要求， 主张； 自命不凡； 虚饰

sentences.english: the humbleness and lack of pretension of Jordan’s cafe
sentences.chinese: 乔丹的咖啡馆的朴实和低调

detailed_translations.chinese: 自负；要求；主张；借口；骄傲

sentences.english: He deflected the blow with his forearm.
sentences.chinese: 他用前臂挡开了打来的一拳。

detailed_translations.english: if someone or something deflects something that is moving, or if it deflects, it turns in a different direction

name: virtuous
trans: 有道德的， 品行端正的， 品德高的； 〈贬〉自命清高的， 自以为是的

sentences.english: a virtuous man
sentences.chinese: 品行端正的男子

sentences.english: Sue considered herself very virtuous because she neither drank nor smoked.
sentences.chinese: 休认为自己品行非常端正，因为她既不喝酒也不抽烟。

detailed_translations.chinese: 善良的；有道德的；贞洁的；正直的；有效力的
detailed_translations.english: behaving in a very honest and moral way

name: invalid
trans: 无效的； 无可靠根据的， 站不住脚的

sentences.english: Without the right date stamped on it, your ticket will be invalid.
sentences.chinese: 票上若没有加盖正确日期就是废票。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无效的，作废的；无可靠根据的，站不住脚的
detailed_translations.english: a contract, ticket, claim etc that is invalid is not legally or officially acceptable
someone who cannot look after themselves because of illness, old age, or injury

name: legitimate
trans: 合法的， 法定的； 正当合理的， 合情合理的

sentences.english: So all of this is a legitimate source of concern.
sentences.chinese: 因此，这些情况都是引发忧虑的合理根源。

sentences.english: Even though I had legitimate reasons ( bullshit ). You know I have to make them dividends ( bullshit ).
sentences.chinese: 即使我有合法的理由（胡说）。你知道我必须支付利息（胡说）。

sentences.english: Often, as in this case, there is no intentional hoaxing: It is a legitimate, straightforward photograph of something curious.
sentences.chinese: 就像此事一样，它们通常都是无意的闹剧：这是某些稀奇的东西合法的、易懂的照片。

detailed_translations.chinese: 正当的， 合理的； 合法的
detailed_translations.english: fair or reasonable

name: interval
trans: 间隔时间； 间距； 幕间休息

sentences.english: He left the room, returning after a short interval with a message.
sentences.chinese: 他离开房间，过了一会儿就带回来一条消息。

sentences.english: We can get some drinks in the interval.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以在幕间休息时喝点什么。

sentences.english: Trees had been planted at regular intervals.
sentences.chinese: 树已按均距栽种。

detailed_translations.english: the period of time between two events, activities etc

sentences.english: a proposal whereby EU citizens would be allowed to reside anywhere in the EU
sentences.chinese: 允许欧盟公民在欧盟任何地方居住的一项提议

detailed_translations.english: by means of which or according to which

sentences.english: You should be able to evaluate your own work.
sentences.chinese: 你应该能够评估自己的工作。

sentences.english: We need to evaluate the success of the campaign.
sentences.chinese: 我们要评估一下这次运动是否成功。

sentences.english: It can be difficult to evaluate the effectiveness of different treatments.
sentences.chinese: 要对各种治疗方法的效果作出评估会很难。

detailed_translations.english: to judge how good, useful, or successful something is

name: status
trans: 身份， 地位； 情况

sentences.english: These documents have no legal status in Britain.
sentences.chinese: 这些文件在英国并无法律效力。

sentences.english: What is your marital status (= are you married or not ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你的婚姻状况是什么？

detailed_translations.english: the official legal position or condition of a person, group, country etc

name: ooze
trans: 渗出，慢慢流出；洋溢着，充满

sentences.english: A cut on his cheek was still oozing blood.
sentences.chinese: 他脸上的伤口还在渗血。

detailed_translations.english: if a thick liquid oozes from something or if something oozes a thick liquid, that liquid flows from it very slowly
very soft mud, especially at the bottom of a lake or sea

sentences.english: He achieved some renown as a football player.
sentences.chinese: 作为足球运动员，他小有名气。

detailed_translations.english: when you are famous and a lot of people admire you for a special skill, achievement, or quality

sentences.english: He did not want to enter into a semantic debate.
sentences.chinese: 他不想卷入一场关于语义的争论。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the meanings of words

name: upset
trans: 心烦意乱的； 不适的
使心烦意乱； 颠覆， 推翻； 搅乱
困扰， 麻烦； 出乎意料的结局； 苦恼

sentences.english: You’re not still upset with me, are you?
sentences.chinese: 你不是还在生我的气吧？

detailed_translations.chinese: 心烦的， 苦恼的； 不适的
detailed_translations.english: unhappy and worried because something unpleasant or disappointing has happened

detailed_translations.chinese: 使心烦意乱，使苦恼，使不适；搅乱；弄翻，倾覆
detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel unhappy or worried
an illness that affects the stomach and makes you feel sick

name: diffusion
trans: 散布， 扩散； 传播

sentences.english: Dissemination, as of news; diffusion.
sentences.chinese: 散布，如消息的传开；扩散。

sentences.english: A diffusion method for the preparation of ferrous oxalate in a gel system was presented.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种在凝胶体系中用扩散法制备草酸亚铁的结晶方法。

sentences.english: The crack grouting diffusion radius is the basic gist of the grouting construction design and grouting craftwork control.
sentences.chinese: 灌浆扩散半径是进行灌浆结构设计和灌浆工艺流程控制的基本依据。

name: curve
trans: 曲线； 曲线图； 弯曲

sentences.english: a sweeping curve of railroad track
sentences.chinese: 铁轨的大弧线

sentences.english: The car took the curve much too quickly.
sentences.chinese: 那辆汽车拐弯太快了。

sentences.english: The track curved round the side of the hill.
sentences.chinese: 小路弯弯曲曲，依山盘旋。

detailed_translations.english: a line that gradually bends like part of a circle
to bend or move in the shape of a curve, or to make something do this

name: dot
trans: 星罗棋布于；打点于；点缀
点， 圆点； 小数点

sentences.english: a pattern of dots
sentences.chinese: 圆点图案

sentences.english: She never dots her i’s.
sentences.chinese: 她从来不在i上面加点。

detailed_translations.english: a small round mark or spot
to mark something by putting a dot on it or above it

name: skim
trans: 撇去； 掠过， 擦过； 浏览， 略读

sentences.english: seagulls skimming the waves
sentences.chinese: 掠过浪尖的海鸥

sentences.english: Julie skimmed the sports page.
sentences.chinese: 朱莉浏览了体育版。

detailed_translations.english: to move along quickly over a surface, never touching it or not touching it often

name: skip
trans: 跳；跳过，略过，漏过；不出席

sentences.english: They saw the man with a little girl skipping along behind him.
sentences.chinese: 他们看到那个男人身后跟着一个蹦蹦跳跳的小女孩。

detailed_translations.english: to go from one subject to another in no fixed order
a skipping movement

sentences.english: Her findings have been widely disseminated .
sentences.chinese: 她的发现已广为传播。

detailed_translations.english: to spread information or ideas to as many people as possible

sentences.english: A process that is used to liquefy nitrogen.
sentences.chinese: 用来使氮液化的过程。

sentences.english: You can liquefy the carbon dioxide to separate it from the other constituents.
sentences.chinese: 可以将二氧化碳液化，以便和其他成分分开。

sentences.english: The alternative is to liquefy the hydrogen at great expense and transport it in road tankers refrigerated with liquid nitrogen.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的代替方法是花大价钱用液氮作为冷却剂液化氢气，用罐车从公路上运输。

detailed_translations.english: to become liquid, or make something become liquid

name: exodus
trans: 大批离去， 成群外出

sentences.english: The medical system is facing collapse because of an exodus of doctors.
sentences.chinese: 由于医生大批离去，该医疗体系正面临崩溃。

detailed_translations.english: If there is an exodus of people from a place, a lot of people leave that place at the same time

sentences.english: Was my name mentioned at all?
sentences.chinese: 我的名字被提到过吗？

sentences.english: Some of the problems were mentioned in his report.
sentences.chinese: 其中的一些问题在他的报告里提到了。

sentences.english: (= it is important enough to mention ) that they only studied a very small number of cases.
sentences.chinese: 必须说明的是他们仅研究了几个个案。

sentences.english: As I mentioned earlier , there have been a lot of changes recently.
sentences.chinese: 正如我刚才所说的，最近变化很大。

sentences.english: She mentioned in passing (= mentioned in a quick unimportant way ) that you had just been to Rome.
sentences.chinese: 她只是随口提了一下你刚刚去过罗马。

sentences.english: They all get a mention (= they are all mentioned ) in the book.
sentences.chinese: 他们在书中全都被提到了。

detailed_translations.english: to talk or write about something or someone, usually quickly and without saying very much or giving details
when someone mentions something or someone in a conversation, piece of writing etc

sentences.english: Tears streamed down their faces.
sentences.chinese: 泪水顺着他们的脸颊流下来。

detailed_translations.english: to flow quickly and in great amounts
a natural flow of water that moves across the land and is narrower than a river

name: laundry
trans: 洗衣店， 洗衣房； 洗好的衣服； 待洗的衣服

sentences.english: She did the laundry (= washed the clothes etc ) and hung it out to dry.
sentences.chinese: 她洗了衣服，然后挂出去晾干。

sentences.english: a pile of dirty laundry
sentences.chinese: 一堆待洗的脏衣服

detailed_translations.english: clothes, sheets etc that need to be washed or have just been washed

name: digression
trans: 离题， 扯到枝节上； 题外话， 枝节内容

sentences.english: Thee direct address of an absent or imaginary person or of a personified abstraction, especially as a digression in the course of a speech or composition.
sentences.chinese: 呼语：直接称呼不在场或虚构的人物或称呼拟人的事物，尤指作为演讲或作文过程中的离题话。 。

sentences.english: In that speech in Alexandria, though, Nasser chose to delve back even further into history, in a long digression on the building of the Suez canal a century earlier.
sentences.chinese: 但是，在亚历山大港的那次演说，纳赛尔选择的是远远的向回探究历史，离题很远地谈到了早在一个世纪之前苏伊士运河的修建。

sentences.english: After this digression we return now to our original problem.
sentences.chinese: 在这一段插话以后，现在回到原来的问题。

name: grudge
trans: 勉强做； 不情愿地给

sentences.english: Mr Gillis was not normally a man to bear grudges .
sentences.chinese: 吉利斯先生通常不是那种会积怨的人。

sentences.english: I’m not harbouring some secret grudge against you.
sentences.chinese: 我没有对你暗地里怀恨在心。

sentences.english: It could be the work of someone with a grudge against the company.
sentences.chinese: 这事可能是某些对公司怀有怨愤的人干的。

sentences.english: You let nasty little personal grudges creep in.
sentences.chinese: 你就由着怨恨的情绪一点一点滋长。

detailed_translations.chinese: 勉强做； 不情愿地给
detailed_translations.english: to do or give something very unwillingly
a feeling of dislike for someone because you cannot forget that they harmed you in the past

name: herald
trans: 信使； 预示， 预兆

sentences.english: A flash of lightning heralded torrential rain.
sentences.chinese: 一道闪电预示着暴雨即将来临。

sentences.english: Flashing blue lights heralded the arrival of the police.
sentences.chinese: 闪烁的蓝色灯光预示警察就要到达。

sentences.english: I welcome the report as a herald of more freedom.
sentences.chinese: 我欢迎这份报告，认为它预示着更多的自由。

detailed_translations.english: to be a sign of something that is going to come or happen soon

detailed_translations.chinese: 信使； 预示， 预兆
detailed_translations.english: Something that is a herald of a future event or situation is a sign that it is going to happen or appear

name: accumulate
trans: 积累， 积聚， 堆积

sentences.english: It is unjust that a privileged few should continue to accumulate wealth.
sentences.chinese: 少数特权阶级继续积聚财富，这是不公平的。

detailed_translations.english: to gradually get more and more money, possessions, knowledge etc over a period of time
to gradually get more and more money, possessions, knowledge etc over a period of time

name: coalition
trans: 联盟， 同盟； 结合， 联合

sentences.english: the centre-right coalition government
sentences.chinese: 政治上中间偏右的联合政府

sentences.english: an emergency meeting of the three coalition parties
sentences.chinese: 三个联盟政党召开的一次紧急会议

detailed_translations.chinese: 结合体， 同盟； 结合， 联合
detailed_translations.english: a union of two or more political parties that allows them to form a government or fight an election together

name: dwarf
trans: 使显得矮小，使相形见绌

sentences.english: The cathedral is dwarfed by the surrounding skyscrapers.
sentences.chinese: 周围的摩天大楼使得大教堂显得很矮小。

detailed_translations.english: to be so big that other things are made to seem very small
a person who is a dwarf has not continued to grow to the normal height because of a medical condition. Many people think that this use is offensive.
a dwarf plant or animal is much smaller than the usual size

sentences.english: We moved here because there was very little crime.
sentences.chinese: 我们搬到这里来是因为这里的犯罪率很低。

sentences.english: Police officers are being given new powers to help combat crime.
sentences.chinese: 警官们被赋予新的权力帮助他们打击犯罪。

sentences.english: a police crackdown on car crime
sentences.chinese: 警察对汽车犯罪活动的一次严厉打击

sentences.english: a town with a relatively low crime rate
sentences.chinese: 犯罪率相对较低的一个城镇

detailed_translations.english: illegal activities in general

sentences.english: Most people now enjoy shorter working hours and more leisure time.
sentences.chinese: 现在大多数人都喜欢工作时间短些，闲暇时间多些。

sentences.english: Watching television is now the nation’s most popular leisure activity.
sentences.chinese: 看电视是当前国民最普遍的消遣活动。

sentences.english: The hotel offers various leisure facilities such as a swimming pool and sauna.
sentences.chinese: 酒店提供游泳池、桑拿浴室等各种休闲设施。

sentences.english: The leisure industry (= the business of providing leisure activities ) is now an important part of the economy.
sentences.chinese: 现在休闲娱乐行业是经济的一个重要组成部分。

detailed_translations.english: time when you are not working or studying and can relax and do things you enjoy

name: surround
trans: 包围， 圈住； 围绕， 环绕

sentences.english: He glared at the people who surrounded the tent.
sentences.chinese: 他怒视着围住帐篷的那些人。

detailed_translations.english: to be all around someone or something on every side

sentences.english: Their wedding was marred by the death of Jenny’s mother a week earlier.
sentences.chinese: 一周之前珍妮母亲的过世使他们的婚礼蒙上了一层阴影。

sentences.english: A frown marred his handsome features.
sentences.chinese: 紧锁的眉头破坏了他俊美的面容。

detailed_translations.english: to make something less attractive or enjoyable

sentences.english: Wipe your feet on the mat.
sentences.chinese: 在地垫上蹭蹭你的鞋底。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of thick rough material which covers part of a floor
to tangle or weave or become tangled or woven into a dense mass

sentences.english: He leaned forward , his elbows resting on the table.
sentences.chinese: 他身体前倾，胳膊肘撑在桌子上。

sentences.english: The crowd surged forwards.
sentences.chinese: 人群向前涌去。

sentences.english: The next scene takes the story forward five years.
sentences.chinese: 下一个场面是描述故事中五年后的情况。

detailed_translations.english: towards a place or position that is in front of you

sentences.english: If cure is undeserved, activationed its melanin cell, sequential meeting is more serious ah.
sentences.chinese: 假如治疗不当，激活了它的黑色素细胞，后果会更严重的啊。

sentences.english: This caused them to lose their ongoing ability to make new melanin, the pigment that gives color to hair and skin.
sentences.chinese: 这将致使其失去现有制造新黑色素的功能，而正是由于这种色素，毛发和皮肤才有颜色。

sentences.english: Galanin, cocaine and amphetamine regulated transcript peptide (CART) and melanin concentrating hormone (MCH), etc. , which were related to the regulation of appetite, were expressed in pituitary.
sentences.chinese: 垂体表达甘丙肽、可卡因和安非他明调节的转录肽（CART）及黑色素浓集激素（MCH）等与食欲调节有关的激素。

detailed_translations.english: a natural dark brown colour in human skin, hair, and eyes

name: assimilate
trans: 透彻理解， 吸收， 消化； 同化

sentences.english: It will take time to assimilate all these facts.
sentences.chinese: 充分掌握所有这些情况需要时间。

detailed_translations.english: to completely understand and begin to use new ideas, information etc
if people assimilate, or are assimilated into a country or group, they become part of that group and are accepted by the people in that group

sentences.english: The president must have the highest ethical standards.
sentences.chinese: 总统必须具备最高的道德水准。

detailed_translations.chinese: 伦理的；道德的；凭处方出售的
detailed_translations.english: relating to principles of what is right and wrong

name: zealous
trans: 狂热的， 热烈的， 充满激情的

sentences.english: a zealous preacher
sentences.chinese: 热心的讲道者

sentences.english: zealous political activists
sentences.chinese: 积极的政治活动家

detailed_translations.english: someone who is zealous does or supports something with great energy

name: comparable
trans: 可比较的， 类似的； 比得上的

sentences.english: A car of comparable size would cost far more abroad.
sentences.chinese: 同样大小的汽车在国外要贵得多。

detailed_translations.english: similar to something else in size, number, quality etc, so that you can make a comparison

sentences.english: We used worms as bait.
sentences.chinese: 我们用小虫子作诱饵。

sentences.english: The fish wouldn’t take the bait .
sentences.chinese: 鱼儿不上钩。

sentences.english: He baited his hook with pie.
sentences.chinese: 他把馅饼放在钓钩上作饵。

sentences.english: The boys dug pits and baited them so that they could spear their prey.
sentences.chinese: 男孩子们挖了陷阱，在里面放上诱饵，以便用矛刺杀猎物。

detailed_translations.english: food used to attract fish, animals, or birds so that you can catch them
If you bait a hook or trap, you put bait on it or in it

sentences.english: You shouldn’t read other people’s mail.
sentences.chinese: 你不应该看别人的信件。

sentences.english: He found a mountain of mail waiting for him.
sentences.chinese: 他发现有堆积如山的邮件等着他处理。

sentences.english: She promised to forward my mail to my new address (= send it from your old home or office to your new one ) .
sentences.chinese: 她答应把我的邮件转寄到我的新地址。

sentences.english: He gets sacks of fan mail (= letters from people who admire him ) .
sentences.chinese: 他收到成堆仰慕者的来信。

sentences.english: The weekly newsletter is mailed to women all over the country.
sentences.chinese: 每周一期的简报邮寄给全国各地的妇女。

detailed_translations.english: the letters and packages that are delivered to you
to send a letter or package to someone

sentences.english: Of particular note is the deviation threshold parameter and the dimensional shift parameters.
sentences.chinese: 需要特别注意的是偏差阈值参数和空间移位参数。

sentences.english: The formula on definite proportion exists not only in plane figure but also in three-dimensional figure.
sentences.chinese: 平面图形中有定比分点公式，在空间图形中也存在同样的定比分点公式。

sentences.english: If the dimensional shift in either direction is greater than our previously set threshold, increment the total deviation by the amount moved in both directions.
sentences.chinese: 如果在任意方向上的空间移位大于我们先前设定的阈值，就按照两个方向上移动的量增加总偏差。

sentences.english: Paul has strong opinions on most subjects.
sentences.chinese: 保罗在大多数问题上观点激烈。

sentences.english: The subjects covered in this chapter are exercise and nutrition.
sentences.chinese: 本章涵盖的主题是运动和营养。

detailed_translations.chinese: 题目； 学科； 主语
detailed_translations.english: the thing you are talking about or considering in a conversation, discussion, book, film etc
to force a country or group of people to be ruled by you, and control them very strictly

name: recognition
trans: 承认， 认同； 认出， 识别， 辨认； 赏识

sentences.english: He stared at her, but there was no sign of recognition .
sentences.chinese: 他盯着她看，但似乎没认出她来。

detailed_translations.english: the act of knowing someone or something because you have known or learned about them in the past

name: disinterest
trans: 无兴趣， 冷漠； 客观， 公正

sentences.english: His total disinterest in money puzzled his family.
sentences.chinese: 他对金钱毫无兴趣使他的家人感到迷惑不解。

sentences.english: Thus, the corporation is not damaged by the death or disinterest of a particular person.
sentences.chinese: 因此当某一股东死亡或失去对公司的兴趣时， 公司不受损害。

detailed_translations.english: a lack of interest

sentences.english: He lunged at me, grabbing me violently.
sentences.chinese: 他向我猛冲过来，狠狠地抓住了我。

detailed_translations.english: a rope used in training or exercising a horse
If you lunge in a particular direction, you move in that direction suddenly and clumsily

name: convene
trans: 召集， 召开； 聚集， 集合

sentences.english: a report by experts convened by the National Institutes of Health
sentences.chinese: 由全国健康协会召集的专家提出的一份报告

detailed_translations.english: if a group of people convene, or someone convenes them, they come together, especially for a formal meeting
if a group of people convene, or someone convenes them, they come together, especially for a formal meeting

sentences.english: advertising revenue
sentences.chinese: 广告收入

sentences.english: Strikes have cost £20 million in lost revenues .
sentences.chinese: 罢工造成的收入损失达到2,000万英镑。

detailed_translations.english: money that a business or organization receives over a period of time, especially from selling goods or services

name: strip
trans: 条， 带状物； 条纹

sentences.english: Strip the beds and wash the sheets.
sentences.chinese: 把床单撤下来清洗。

sentences.english: a strip of paper
sentences.chinese: 一张纸条

detailed_translations.english: to remove something that is covering the surface of something else
a long narrow piece of paper, cloth etc

name: monopoly
trans: 垄断， 专卖； 垄断商品， 专卖商品； 独占， 专利

sentences.english: In the past central government had a monopoly on television broadcasting.
sentences.chinese: 过去，中央政府对电视节目播放实行垄断。

sentences.english: A good education should not be the monopoly of the rich.
sentences.chinese: 良好的教育不应该成为富人的专利。

detailed_translations.english: the complete control of trade in particular goods or the supply of a particular service; a type of goods or a service that is controlled in this way

name: negotiation
trans: 商议， 谈判； 流通

sentences.english: The trader was obstinate in the negotiation.
sentences.chinese: 这个商人在谈判中拗强固执。

detailed_translations.english: official discussions between the repre­sentatives of opposing groups who are trying to reach an agreement, especially in business or politics

name: grain
trans: 谷物； 颗粒； 纹理； 少量

sentences.english: There were crumbs and grains of sugar on the table.
sentences.chinese: 桌子上有面包屑和糖粒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 谷物， 谷粒， 颗粒； 少量， 微量
detailed_translations.english: a single very small piece of a substance such as sand or salt

name: credit
trans: 荣誉； 学分； 信用； 贷款

sentences.english: We found his statement hard to credit.
sentences.chinese: 我们觉得他的说法令人难以信服。

sentences.english: The witness’s story gained credit with the jury.
sentences.chinese: 证人的陈述被陪审团采信了。

detailed_translations.english: to believe that something is true
the belief that something is true or correct

sentences.english: The human brain needs to be without oxygen for only four minutes before permanent damage occurs.
sentences.chinese: 人脑缺氧只需4分钟就会造成永久性损伤。

detailed_translations.english: a gas that has no colour or smell, is present in air, and is necessary for most animals and plants to live. It is a chemical element: symbol O

sentences.english: Diets are most effective when combined with exercise.
sentences.chinese: 节食和锻炼相结合是最有效的。

sentences.english: Ruth hesitated, uncertain of how to combine honesty and diplomacy in her answer.
sentences.chinese: 露丝犹豫了，她不知道怎样回答才能既诚实又婉转。

detailed_translations.english: if you combine two or more different things, or if they combine, they begin to exist or work together

detailed_translations.chinese: 联合企业； 联合收割机
detailed_translations.english: a machine used by farmers to cut grain, separate the seeds from it, and clean it

sentences.english: Her face hadn’t altered much over the years.
sentences.chinese: 过了这么多年，她的容貌并没有多大改变。

sentences.english: The city centre has altered beyond recognition (=  changed very much  ) .
sentences.chinese: 市中心变得都认不出来了。

sentences.english: Nothing can alter the fact that the refugees are our responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 我们有责任帮助难民，这一事实无法改变。

detailed_translations.english: to change, or to make someone or something change

sentences.english: a fraudulent insurance claim
sentences.chinese: 欺诈性保险索赔

sentences.english: a fraudulent statement
sentences.chinese: 骗人的声明

detailed_translations.english: intended to deceive people in an illegal way, in order to gain money, power etc

sentences.english: excessive waste in state spending
sentences.chinese: 政府支出方面的过度浪费

detailed_translations.chinese: 浪费；废物；荒地；损耗；地面风化物
detailed_translations.english: when something such as money or skills are not used in a way that is effective, useful, or sensible
to use more money, time, energy etc than is useful or sensible
waste materials, substances etc are unwanted because the good part of them has been removed

sentences.english: That is a fair approximation of the way in which the next boss is being chosen.
sentences.chinese: 那是一个挑选下任老板的大体近似方式。

detailed_translations.chinese: [数] 近似法；接近；[数] 近似值
detailed_translations.english: a number, amount etc that is not exact, but is almost correct

sentences.english: The accent falls on the third syllable.
sentences.chinese: 重音落在第三个音节上。

sentences.english: The stress falls on the second syllable.
sentences.chinese: 重音在第二个音节上。

sentences.english: Accentuate the word “accent”on the first syllable.
sentences.chinese: 在“accent”一词的第一个音节上加重音符号。

detailed_translations.english: a word or part of a word which contains a single vowel sound

name: comedy
trans: 喜剧； 喜剧性， 滑稽， 幽默

sentences.english: a career in stand-up comedy
sentences.chinese: 单口喜剧表演职业

detailed_translations.english: entertainment that is intended to make people laugh

name: literacy
trans: 有文化， 有教养； 读写能力

sentences.english: a new adult literacy campaign
sentences.chinese: 新一轮成人识字[扫盲]运动

detailed_translations.chinese: 识字， 有文化， 读写能力
detailed_translations.english: the state of being able to read and write

name: originate
trans: 起源； 发起； 创立

sentences.english: The disease originated in Africa.
sentences.chinese: 这种疾病起源于非洲。

sentences.english: All carbohydrates originate from plants.
sentences.chinese: 所有的碳水化合物均来源于植物。

detailed_translations.english: When something originates or when someone originates it, it begins to happen or exist

detailed_translations.chinese: 创造， 创始， 开创
detailed_translations.english: to have the idea for something and start it

sentences.english: a map and compass
sentences.chinese: 地图和指南针

detailed_translations.english: an instrument that shows directions and has a needle that always points north

name: soloist
trans: 独奏者， 独唱者， 单独表演者

sentences.english: cello soloist Yo Yo Ma
sentences.chinese: 大提琴独奏家马友友

detailed_translations.english: a musician who performs alone or plays an instrument alone

name: nonetheless
trans: 虽然如此， 但是， 依然

sentences.english: The region was extremely beautiful. Nonetheless Gerard could not imagine spending the rest of his life there.
sentences.chinese: 那个地区非常漂亮，然而杰拉德却无法想象自己要在那里度过余生。

sentences.english: The paintings are complex, but have plenty of appeal nonetheless.
sentences.chinese: 这些画复杂难懂，不过还是不乏吸引力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 尽管如此， 依然， 然而
detailed_translations.english: in spite of the fact that has just been mentioned

name: dispose
trans: 安排， 布置； 使倾向于

sentences.english: Chinese vases are disposed around the gallery.
sentences.chinese: 中国花瓶摆放在展馆四周。

detailed_translations.english: to arrange things or put them in their places

name: disconcert
trans: 使惊慌， 使不安； 使困惑

sentences.english: His compliments disconcerted her a little.
sentences.chinese: 他的恭维让她有点儿尴尬。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使仓皇失措；使困惑；破坏
detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel slightly confused, embarrassed, or worried
