name: constitution
trans: 宪法， 章程； 体质； 构成

sentences.english: The right to speak freely is written into the Constitution of the United States.
sentences.chinese: 言论自由的权利被写入美国宪法。

sentences.english: She’s got a strong constitution – she’ll recover in no time.
sentences.chinese: 她体质强壮，很快就会恢复。

sentences.english: What’s the chemical constitution of the dye?
sentences.chinese: 这种染料的化学成分是什么？

detailed_translations.english: a set of basic laws and principles that a country or organization is governed by

sentences.english: ...a new paradigm of production.
sentences.chinese: …一种新的生产范例。

detailed_translations.english: a very clear or typical example of something

sentences.english: Blend the sugar, eggs, and flour.
sentences.chinese: 把糖、鸡蛋和面粉掺在一起。

sentences.english: a blend of tea
sentences.chinese: 混合茶叶

detailed_translations.english: to thoroughly mix together soft or liquid substances to form a single smooth substance
a mixture of different types of the same thing

name: overact
trans: 把表演得过火； 表现做作

sentences.english: Sometimes he had overacted in his role as Prince.
sentences.chinese: 有时，他把王子的角色过度演绎了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 把表演得过火； 表现做作
detailed_translations.english: to act in a play with too much emotion or movement – used to show disapproval

name: fidelity
trans: 忠诚， 忠实； 精确， 逼真

sentences.english: the importance of marital fidelity
sentences.chinese: 对婚姻忠贞的重要性

detailed_translations.english: when you are loyal to your husband, girlfriend etc, by not having sex with anyone else

name: conceive
trans: 构思， 构想， 设想； 怀孕

sentences.english: He conceived the idea of transforming the old power station into an arts centre.
sentences.chinese: 他想出了一个把旧发电站改造为艺术中心的主意。

sentences.english: God is often conceived of as male.
sentences.chinese: 上帝常常被想象为男性。

sentences.english: She is unable to conceive.
sentences.chinese: 她不能怀孕。

sentences.english: Their first child was conceived on their wedding night.
sentences.chinese: 他们的第一个小孩是在新婚之夜怀上的。

detailed_translations.english: to form an idea, a plan, etc. in your mind; to imagine sth

name: incursion
trans: 袭击， 突然入侵； 介入

sentences.english: ...armed incursions into border areas by rebel forces.
sentences.chinese: ...叛军武装入侵边境地区。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden attack into an area that belongs to other people

name: nonsense
trans: 胡说， 废话； 冒失的行为

sentences.english: ‘I’m a prisoner in my own home.’ ‘Nonsense!’
sentences.chinese: “我在自己家里就像个囚犯。”“胡说！”

sentences.english: If you ask me, these modern teaching methods are a load of nonsense (= a lot of nonsense ).
sentences.chinese: 要我说，这些现代教学方法全是一派胡言。

sentences.english: He was talking utter nonsense as usual.
sentences.chinese: 他像平常一样又在胡说八道了。

sentences.english: By 1832 the idea had become an economic nonsense.
sentences.chinese: 到了1832年，那种观点已经成为经济学的谬论。

detailed_translations.chinese: 胡说， 废话； 冒失的行动
detailed_translations.english: ideas, opinions, statements etc that are not true or that seem very stupid

sentences.english: We’ve decided to stain the shelves blue.
sentences.chinese: 我们决定把架子涂成蓝色。

detailed_translations.english: to change the colour of something, especially something made of wood, by using a special liquid
a mark that is difficult to remove, especially one made by a liquid such as blood, coffee, or ink

name: balk
trans: 畏缩； 阻止； 妨碍

sentences.english: Even biology undergraduates may balk at animal experiments.
sentences.chinese: 即使是生物专业的大学生都可能会反对动物实验。

detailed_translations.english: to stop someone or something from getting or achieving what they want

sentences.english: The monkeys have electrodes implanted into the brain to measure their brain activity.
sentences.chinese: 这些猴子的脑中植入了电极，以监测其大脑活动。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of metal or a wire that is used to send electricity through a system or through a person’s body

name: airborne
trans: 空气传播的； 空运的

sentences.english: airborne pollutants
sentences.chinese: 空气传播的污染物

detailed_translations.chinese: 空运的, 空气传播的
detailed_translations.english: airborne soldiers are trained to fight in areas that they get to by jumping out of a plane

name: reckless
trans: 轻率的， 鲁莽的， 无所顾忌的

sentences.english: He was accused of causing death by reckless driving .
sentences.chinese: 他被控因鲁莽驾驶致人死亡。

sentences.english: a reckless disregard for safety
sentences.chinese: 不顾安全的鲁莽行为

sentences.english: He ran into the burning house with reckless abandon (= without caring about the danger ) .
sentences.chinese: 他不顾危险冲入着火的房子里。

detailed_translations.english: not caring or worrying about the possible bad or dangerous results of your actions

sentences.english: Sorry I'm late. I overslept.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉我迟到了，我睡过头了。

detailed_translations.chinese: (过去式 overslept, 过去分词 overslept) 睡过头；睡得太久
detailed_translations.english: to sleep for longer than you intended

name: bald
trans: 光秃的， 秃头的； 简单的， 单调的

sentences.english: a bald man
sentences.chinese: 一名秃顶男子

sentences.english: his shiny bald head
sentences.chinese: 他那亮闪闪的光头

sentences.english: Dad started going bald when he was in his thirties.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸在三十多岁的时候开始谢顶。

sentences.english: He combed his hair and tried to hide his bald patch (=  part of someone’s head where there is no hair  ).
sentences.chinese: 他梳了梳头，试图把头顶的秃块遮掩起来。

detailed_translations.english: having little or no hair on your head

name: paradox
trans: 似非而是的论点； 自相矛盾的话

sentences.english: The paradox is that fishermen would catch more fish if they fished less.
sentences.chinese: 悖论就是: 如果渔夫减少捕鱼，反而会打到更多的鱼。

detailed_translations.english: a statement that seems impossible because it contains two opposing ideas that are both true

sentences.english: Its peaks are the symphony and the oratorio.
sentences.chinese: 其顶峰为交响乐和清唱剧。

sentences.english: Haydn wrote his oratorio The Creation and another equally splendid work for voices, The Seasons.
sentences.chinese: 海顿写了清唱剧《创世纪》和另一首也同样很出色的声乐作品《四季》。

sentences.english: In an oratorio, soloists take the roles of characters in a loosely constructed story while the chorus adds detail and responds to the action.
sentences.chinese: 在清唱剧中，独奏者们在松散的构建故事中扮演了角色并对此做了反应。

detailed_translations.english: a long piece of music in which a large group of people sing

name: X-ray
trans: X射线， X光； X光照片

sentences.english: The X-ray showed that her leg was not broken.
sentences.chinese: X光片显示她的腿没有骨折。

detailed_translations.english: a beam of radiation1 that can go through solid objects and is used for photographing the inside of the body
to photograph the inside of someone’s body using X-rays

name: physical
trans: 物理的；物质的，有形的；身体的，肉体的

sentences.english: She was in constant physical pain.
sentences.chinese: 她一直感到身上疼痛。

sentences.english: the physical and emotional needs of young adults
sentences.chinese: 青年人的身心需求

sentences.english: people with severe physical disabilities
sentences.chinese: 身体重度残疾的人

sentences.english: Don’t be put off by his physical appearance .
sentences.chinese: 别因为他的外貌讨厌他。

sentences.english: He was obsessed with physical fitness .
sentences.chinese: 他对健身着了迷。

detailed_translations.english: related to someone’s body rather than their mind or emotions

name: categorize
trans: 将…分类， 把…加以分类

sentences.english: Lindsay, like his films, is hard to categorize.
sentences.chinese: 就像他演的电影难于归类一样，很难说林赛属于哪一类演员。

sentences.english: Make a list of your child's toys and then categorize them as sociable or antisocial.
sentences.chinese: 把你孩子的玩具列个清单，然后将之分为交际型和非交际型。

detailed_translations.english: If you categorize people or things, you divide them into sets or you say which set they belong to

name: mania
trans: 躁狂； 狂热； 癖好

sentences.english: The mania for dinosaurs began in the late 1800s.
sentences.chinese: 恐龙热兴起于19世纪晚期。

detailed_translations.chinese: [医]颠狂, 狂躁, 癖好, 狂热
detailed_translations.english: a strong desire for something or interest in something, especially one that affects a lot of people at the same time

sentences.english: poetic expression
sentences.chinese: 诗歌的表达方式

detailed_translations.chinese: 诗的，诗歌的；诗意的；诗人的
detailed_translations.english: relating to poetry, or typical of poetry

name: opposed
trans: 反对的； 截然不同的

sentences.english: I am utterly opposed to any form of terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 我坚决反对任何形式的恐怖主义。

sentences.english: The principles of capitalism and socialism are diametrically opposed (= completely opposite ).
sentences.chinese: 资本主义的原则与社会主义的原则截然相反。

detailed_translations.english: If you are opposed to something, you disagree with it or disapprove of it.

sentences.english: Employees must familiarize themselves with the health and safety manual.
sentences.chinese: 雇员必须熟悉健康和安全手册。

detailed_translations.english: to learn about something so that you understand it, or to teach someone else about something so that they understand it

name: apportionment
trans: 分派， 分摊， 分配

detailed_translations.chinese: 分派， 分摊， 分配
detailed_translations.english: the act of apportioning

sentences.english: I’m looking for a needle and thread.
sentences.chinese: 我在找针线。

sentences.english: hand-sewn with gold and silver thread
sentences.chinese: 用金线和银线手工缝制的

sentences.english: His mind wandered, and he lost the thread of what she was saying (= was no longer able to understand it ) .
sentences.chinese: 他走神了，跟不上她的思路。

detailed_translations.english: a long thin string of cotton, silk etc used to sew or weave cloth

name: enrollment
trans: 登记， 注册； 入学

sentences.english: Class enrollment, where each student has all of the course schedule selections, each student having his own bucket in the CGTT.
sentences.chinese: 班级入学，每个学生都有所有的课程安排选择，每个学生都将自己的选择放在 CGTT 中。

name: tyrannical
trans: 专制的， 残暴的， 专横的

sentences.english: a tyrannical parent
sentences.chinese: 一位专横的家长

sentences.english: tyrannical laws
sentences.chinese: 专制的法令

detailed_translations.chinese: 暴虐的, 压制的, 残暴的
detailed_translations.english: behaving in a cruel and unfair way towards someone you have power over

sentences.english: They have to win the contract – thousands of jobs are at stake.
sentences.chinese: 他们必须拿下这份合同，这关系到数千个工作岗位。

sentences.english: National pride is at stake in next week’s game against England.
sentences.chinese: 下星期对英格兰队的比赛关乎民族尊严。

detailed_translations.english: if something that you value very much is at stake, you will lose it if a plan or action is not successful

name: fortify
trans: 支持， 给…以勇气； 加强， 增强； 筑防御工事于

sentences.english: Her position was fortified by election successes and economic recovery.
sentences.chinese: 她的地位因为选举获胜及经济复苏而得到巩固。

detailed_translations.english: to encourage an attitude or feeling and make it stronger
to build towers, walls etc around an area or city in order to defend it

name: due
trans: 到期的； 预期的； 应得的； 恰当的， 适当的； 应支付的

sentences.english: The team are due to fly to Italy next month.
sentences.chinese: 该球队预定下个月飞往意大利。

sentences.english: Any money due you will be sent by cheque through the post.
sentences.chinese: 应该支付给你的款项将会以支票邮寄给你。

detailed_translations.english: expected to happen or arrive at a particular time

sentences.english: The apples were ripening on the trees.
sentences.chinese: 树上的苹果都熟了。

detailed_translations.english: to become ripe or to make something ripe

name: conform
trans: 遵守， 服从； 符合； 适应

sentences.english: The building does not conform with safety regulations.
sentences.chinese: 例句：这座建筑物不符合安全条例。

sentences.english: It did not conform to the usual stereotype of an industrial city.
sentences.chinese: 这和一座常规的工业城市那种千篇一律的格局不一样。

detailed_translations.english: to obey a law, rule etc

sentences.english: I’m baking some bread.
sentences.chinese: 我在烤一些面包。

sentences.english: baked potatoes
sentences.chinese: 烤马铃薯

sentences.english: Bake at 250 degrees for 20 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 用250度的温度烤20分钟。

sentences.english: The bricks were baked in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 砖块放在太阳光下晒硬。

detailed_translations.english: to cook something using dry heat, in an oven

name: authentic
trans: 真正的， 真实的； 逼真的； 可靠的

sentences.english: an authentic account
sentences.chinese: 真实可信的说法

detailed_translations.chinese: 真的， 真正的； 可靠的， 可信的
detailed_translations.english: based on facts

detailed_translations.chinese: 猫眼石，蛋白石；乳白玻璃
detailed_translations.english: a type of white stone with changing colours in it, often used in jewellery

name: lodge
trans: 正式提出； 租住， 借宿； 为…提供住宿； 寄存

sentences.english: a building used to lodge prisoners of war
sentences.chinese: 一座关押战俘的建筑物

sentences.english: The bullet lodged in the sergeant's leg, shattering his thigh bone.
sentences.chinese: 子弹射入这个军士的腿部，击碎了他的大腿骨。

detailed_translations.english: to pay to live in a room in someone’s house
If an object lodges somewhere, it becomes stuck there

detailed_translations.chinese: 乡间小屋， 旅舍； 寄宿者， 投宿者
detailed_translations.english: a small house on the land of a large country house, usually at the main entrance gate

name: threat
trans: 恐吓， 威胁； 坏兆头， 危险迹象

sentences.english: Your threats don’t scare me.
sentences.chinese: 你的那些威胁吓不倒我。

sentences.english: threats made against his wife and children
sentences.chinese: 对他妻儿的威胁

sentences.english: Nichols never carried out his threat to resign.
sentences.chinese: 尼科尔斯威胁过要辞职，但从未付诸行动。

sentences.english: The government will not give in to terrorist threats .
sentences.chinese: 政府不会屈服于恐怖分子的威胁。

sentences.english: She dismissed the statement as an empty threat .
sentences.chinese: 她无视这项声明，认为是个空口威胁。

sentences.english: They warned him with veiled threats not to mention anything he had witnessed.
sentences.chinese: 他们话中有话地威胁他不要提及他所目睹的事。

sentences.english: The police are investigating death threats made against the two men.
sentences.chinese: 警方正在调查针对这两名男子的死亡恐吓。

sentences.english: Officials at the school say they received a bomb threat at approximately 11:30 a.m. today.
sentences.chinese: 学校的官员说他们在今天上午11点半左右收到过炸弹恐吓。

detailed_translations.english: a statement in which you tell someone that you will cause them harm or trouble if they do not do what you want

sentences.english: a rayon shirt
sentences.chinese: 人造丝衬衫

detailed_translations.english: a smooth artificial cloth used for making clothes

sentences.english: We humans appear to be meaning-seeking creatures that have the misfortune to be thrown into a world devoid of intrinsic meaning.
sentences.chinese: 我们人类似乎是寻求意义的生物，而很不幸，我们却进入了一个本质上缺乏意义的世界。

sentences.english: Rice cakes may seem like a good option – after all they're fat-free and low in calories – but they're also devoid of fibre and protein and can make you crave something more satisfying.
sentences.chinese: 大米蛋糕似乎是好的选择-毕竟它们无脂肪，低卡路里-但是它们也缺乏纤维和蛋白质，会使你渴望更令人满意的东西。

name: mercy
trans: 宽恕； 仁慈； 恩惠， 幸运

sentences.english: He showed no mercy to his enemies.
sentences.chinese: 他对敌人毫不仁慈。

sentences.english: God have mercy on his soul.
sentences.chinese: 愿上帝宽恕他的灵魂。

detailed_translations.english: if someone shows mercy, they choose to forgive or to be kind to someone who they have the power to hurt or punish

name: curl
trans: 卷发； 卷曲状； 卷曲物

sentences.english: She has hair that refuses to curl.
sentences.chinese: 她的头发怎么也不卷。

sentences.english: Maria had curled her hair for the event.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚为这次活动卷了头发。

sentences.english: a little boy with beautiful blonde curls
sentences.chinese: 满头漂亮的金色鬈发的小男孩

sentences.english: Decorate the cake with chocolate curls.
sentences.chinese: 用巧克力圈装饰蛋糕。

detailed_translations.english: to form a twisted or curved shape, or to make something do this
a piece of hair that hangs in a curved shape

name: inform
trans: 通知， 通告； 了解， 熟悉； 告发， 检举， 告密

sentences.english: They would inform him of any progress they had made.
sentences.chinese: 他们将把自己所取得的任何进展都告诉他。

sentences.english: My daughter informed me that she was pregnant.
sentences.chinese: 我女儿告诉我她怀孕了。

detailed_translations.english: If you inform someone of something, you tell them about it
to officially tell someone about something or give them information

name: depend
trans: 依靠， 依赖； 取决于

sentences.english: He depended on his writing for his income.
sentences.chinese: 他靠写作谋生。

sentences.english: You can depend on Jane – she always keeps her promises.
sentences.chinese: 你可以相信简——她一向都信守诺言。

detailed_translations.english: to need the support, help, or existence of someone or something in order to exist, be healthy, be successful etc

sentences.english: EXCEPT as Pearl, in the dearth of human playmates, was thrown more upon the visionary throng which she created.
sentences.chinese: 只不过是由于缺乏玩伴，她同自己创造出来的幻想中的人群更加接近而己。

sentences.english: So for now, this dearth of data means that scientists must rely on climate models to estimate the effects of large-scale burning by aborigines.
sentences.chinese: 所以现在数据的缺乏也就意味着科学家必须依靠气候模型来估计土著大规模焚烧对于气候的影响。

sentences.english: See there is no dearth of knowledge and entrepreneurial skills in we Indians. The only question is that shall we be considered while opting for technology from abroad?
sentences.chinese: 看到没有，我们印度人并不缺乏知识与创业技能。唯一的问题在于我们在追求外国技术的同时有没有考虑去挖掘自身的能力。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which there are very few of something that people want or need

name: commit
trans: 承诺； 犯错； 犯罪； 忠于

sentences.english: Women commit fewer crimes than men.
sentences.chinese: 女性犯罪比男性少。

detailed_translations.chinese: 犯， 干； 使承诺； 把…托付给； 调拨…供使用， 拨出
detailed_translations.english: to do something wrong or illegal

name: patch
trans: 小片， 小块； 补丁； 小块土地

sentences.english: Look out for icy patches on the road.
sentences.chinese: 小心路上结冰的地方。

sentences.english: a cat with a white patch on its chest
sentences.chinese: 胸部有一块白斑的猫

sentences.english: He combs his hair over his bald patch .
sentences.chinese: 他把头发梳过来盖住秃掉的地方。

detailed_translations.chinese: 眼罩；斑点；碎片；小块土地
detailed_translations.english: a small area of something that is different from the area around it
to repair a hole in something by putting a piece of something else over it

sentences.english: Roosevelt was elected four times to the presidency of the US.
sentences.chinese: 罗斯福四次当选美国总统。

sentences.english: There were few real improvements during his presidency.
sentences.chinese: 在他的总统任期内几乎没有什么真正的改善。

detailed_translations.english: the position of being the president of a country or organization, or the period of time during which someone is president

sentences.english: People were scurrying off to work.
sentences.chinese: 人们急匆匆赶着去上班。

detailed_translations.chinese: 急跑；短距离赛跑（或赛马）

detailed_translations.english: to move quickly with short steps, especially because you are in a hurry

sentences.english: a scornful look
sentences.chinese: 轻蔑的表情

detailed_translations.english: feeling or showing scorn

sentences.english: So why would you want to lower your cholesterol?
sentences.chinese: 那么为什么你想降低你的胆固醇呢？

sentences.english: If it does, you should discuss with your physician other approaches to cholesterol control.
sentences.chinese: 若确实如此，您应该与您的医生讨论其他控制胆固醇方法。

sentences.english: "In order to prevent this oxidation of cholesterol, we need to consume antioxidants, preferably natural antioxidants that you get from fruits and vegetables, " he said in an interview.
sentences.chinese: “为了防止这种胆固醇氧化，我们需要消耗抗氧化剂，最好是从水果和蔬菜得到的天然抗氧化剂， ”他在接受采访时说道。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical substance found in your blood. Too much cholesterol in your body may cause heart disease.

name: magnetic
trans: 磁的， 磁石的； 有磁性的； 有吸引力的

sentences.english: magnetic forces
sentences.chinese: 磁力

sentences.english: a magnetic personality
sentences.chinese: 富有魅力的个性

detailed_translations.english: concerning or produced by  magnetism

name: stick
trans: 刺，戳，插；粘住，粘贴；放置；卡住

sentences.english: a pair of drum sticks
sentences.chinese: 一对鼓槌

sentences.english: a measuring stick
sentences.chinese: 量尺

sentences.english: Aunt Lou walks with a stick (= uses a stick to help her walk ) .
sentences.chinese: 卢姑妈走路要拄拐棍。

detailed_translations.english: a long thin piece of wood, plastic etc that you use for a particular purpose
if a pointed object sticks into something, or if you stick it there, it is pushed into it

sentences.english: Mars and Earth have orbits which change with time.
sentences.chinese: 火星和地球的轨道随着时间而发生改变。

detailed_translations.english: the curved path travelled by an object which is moving around another much larger object such as the Earth, the Sun etc
to travel in a curved path around a much larger object such as the Earth, the Sun etc

name: band
trans: 乐队； 群， 伙； 带； 波段， 频带

sentences.english: The band was playing old Beatles songs.
sentences.chinese: 乐队正在演奏披头士的老歌。

sentences.english: I grew up playing in rock bands.
sentences.chinese: 我是在摇滚乐队里玩音乐长大的。

sentences.english: Smith joined the band in 1989.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯在1989年加入这个乐队。

sentences.english: They formed a band when they were still at school.
sentences.chinese: 他们还在读书的时候就组建了一个乐队。

sentences.english: The entertainment includes a disco and live band .
sentences.chinese: 娱乐活动有跳迪斯科和乐队现场演奏。

sentences.english: interviews with band members
sentences.chinese: 对乐队成员的采访

detailed_translations.english: a group of musicians, especially a group that plays popular music

name: beneficent
trans: 有益的； 行善的， 慈善的

sentences.english: the beneficent properties of natural remedies
sentences.chinese: 自然疗法的益处

detailed_translations.english: helping people, or resulting in something good

sentences.english: The house comprises two bedrooms, a kitchen, and a living room.
sentences.chinese: 这座房子有两间卧室、一间厨房和一间起居室。

sentences.english: Women comprise a high proportion of part-time workers.
sentences.chinese: 兼职人员中妇女占了很大一部分。

detailed_translations.english: to consist of particular parts, groups etc

name: moderate
trans: 适度的； 温和的； 普通的

sentences.english: Even moderate amounts of alcohol can be dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 喝酒即使不多也会有危险。

sentences.english: a moderate degree of success
sentences.chinese: 一定程度上的成功

sentences.english: a student of moderate ability
sentences.chinese: 能力一般的学生

sentences.english: Moderate exercise, such as walking, is recommended.
sentences.chinese: 建议适度锻炼，比如散步。

sentences.english: Bake the pie for 30 minutes in a moderate oven.
sentences.chinese: 馅饼用中火烘烤30分钟。

sentences.english: moderate to strong winds
sentences.chinese: 中到大风

detailed_translations.english: not very large or very small, very hot or very cold, very fast or very slow etc
someone whose opinions or beliefs, especially about politics, are not extreme and are considered reasonable by most people
to make something less extreme or violent, or to become less extreme or violent

name: resident
trans: 居民； 住宿者， 旅客； 住院实习医生

sentences.english: As one local resident put it in May, "By day there is government.
sentences.chinese: 正如一位当地居民在五月份对它的描述”白天有政府。

sentences.english: A resident said, "I think we should write it down on paper or tell our family members.
sentences.chinese: 一位居民说：“我觉得我们应该把遗嘱写在纸上或者告诉给自己的家人。

sentences.english: Few of her former comrades enjoy this comfort; but, as another resident explained, the authorities like them to live there "to do propaganda and education work".
sentences.chinese: 她以前的同志，很少人能享受能这种舒适生活；不过另一个居民解释说，当局希望他们住在那以“进行宣传教育工作”。

name: upheaval
trans: 剧变， 动乱， 大变动

sentences.english: political upheaval
sentences.chinese: 政治剧变

sentences.english: Moving house is a major upheaval.
sentences.chinese: 搬家很折腾。

detailed_translations.english: a very big change that often causes problems

name: receiver
trans: 接收器； 听筒； 接收者； 官方接管人

sentences.english: a satellite receiver
sentences.chinese: 卫星信号接收器

sentences.english: She picked up the receiver and dialled his number.
sentences.chinese: 她拿起听筒，拨了他的电话号码。

sentences.english: The business is in the hands of the receivers .
sentences.chinese: 公司现在由破产管理人接管。

detailed_translations.chinese: 电话听筒；接收器；〔破产企业或公司的〕管理人，接管人
detailed_translations.english: the part of a telephone that you hold next to your mouth and ear

name: gilding
trans: 镀金； 贴金层， 镀金层； 金色涂层

sentences.english: A thin layer of gold or something simulating gold that is applied in gilding.
sentences.chinese: 镀金，包金一层薄的涂金层或其适用于镀金的仿金物。

detailed_translations.chinese: 镀金； 贴金层， 镀金层； 金色涂层
detailed_translations.english: Gilding is a layer of gold or gold paint that is put on something

name: execute
trans: 执行， 履行， 实施； 将…处死， 处决； 完成

sentences.english: 13 people were summarily executed (= killed without any trial or legal process ) by the guerrillas.
sentences.chinese: 有13人被游击队员就地处决。

sentences.english: The job involves drawing up and executing a plan of nursing care.
sentences.chinese: 这项工作包括拟订和实施一个护理计划。

detailed_translations.english: to kill someone, especially legally as a punishment

name: substantial
trans: 实质的； 坚固的； 可观的， 大量的

sentences.english: We have the support of a substantial number of parents.
sentences.chinese: 我们有相当多家长的支持。

sentences.english: a substantial salary
sentences.chinese: 丰厚的薪水

sentences.english: a substantial breakfast
sentences.chinese: 丰盛的早餐

sentences.english: The document requires substantial changes.
sentences.chinese: 文件需要作大量修改。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可观的， 大量的； 物质的， 坚固的； 实质的， 真实的
detailed_translations.english: large in amount or number

name: balm
trans: 香脂油， 药膏； 镇痛剂， 安慰剂

sentences.english: lip balm
sentences.chinese: 润唇膏

detailed_translations.chinese: 香油；镇痛软膏；香峰草，香树膏
detailed_translations.english: an oily liquid with a strong pleasant smell that you rub into your skin, often to reduce pain

sentences.english: Paleolithic man could only make the most basic stone tools.
sentences.chinese: 旧石器时代的人类只能制造最简单的石器。

sentences.english: A group of caverns of northern Spain west-southwest of Santander. The caves contain magnificent specimens of Paleolithic art discovered in 1879.
sentences.chinese: 奥尔塔米拉岩窟：西班牙北部的一组岩窟，位于桑坦德西南偏西，洞穴里有1879年发现的旧石器时期艺术的宏伟的标本。

sentences.english: Hilazon Tachtit was occupied by the Natufians, hunter-gatherers who began to build permanent dwellings during the transition between the prefarming Paleolithic and the agricultural Neolithic periods.
sentences.chinese: 希拉松塔奇提特洞穴一直被纳图夫人所占据，并且在旧石器时代到新石器时代的过度阶段开始在那里建造永久性的住房。

sentences.english: They are working together to benefit the whole community.
sentences.chinese: 他们在为整个社区的利益共同努力。

detailed_translations.english: if you benefit from something, or it benefits you, it gives you an advantage, improves your life, or helps you in some way

detailed_translations.chinese: 利益，恩惠；救济金，保险金，津贴
detailed_translations.english: money provided by the government to people who are sick, unemployed, or have little money

name: quality
trans: 质，质量；品德，品质；性质，特性

sentences.english: Much of the land was of poor quality.
sentences.chinese: 很多地的土质很差。

sentences.english: Use only high quality ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 只使用上等的材料。

sentences.english: the drug’s addictive quality
sentences.chinese: 毒品令人上瘾的特性

detailed_translations.english: how good or bad something is

name: unique
trans: 唯一的； 独特的， 罕见的； 特有的

sentences.english: Each person’s fingerprints are unique.
sentences.chinese: 每个人的指纹都是独一无二的。

detailed_translations.english: being the only one of its kind

name: boost
trans: 提高，推进；替…做广告，宣扬

sentences.english: The new resort area has boosted tourism.
sentences.chinese: 新的度假区促进了旅游业的发展。

detailed_translations.chinese: 推动， 促进， 激励； 替…做广告， 宣扬； 提高， 使增长
detailed_translations.english: to increase or improve something and make it more successful
something that gives someone more confidence, or that helps something increase, improve, or become successful

name: sober
trans: 清醒的，未醉的；持重的，冷静的；素净的

sentences.english: He’s a nice guy when he’s sober.
sentences.chinese: 他没喝醉时是个不错的家伙。

detailed_translations.english: not drunk

sentences.english: a deep male voice
sentences.chinese: 低沉的男声

sentences.english: traditional male values
sentences.chinese: 传统的男性价值观

sentences.english: Motor-racing has largely been a male preserve (= something that only men have been involved with ) .
sentences.chinese: 赛车基本上是男人的专利。

detailed_translations.english: typical of or relating to men or boys
a man

sentences.english: Annie was wonderfully warm and maternal.
sentences.chinese: 安妮非常亲切慈爱。

sentences.english: She seems to have a strong maternal instinct (= desire to have babies and take care of them ) .
sentences.chinese: 她似乎有很强的母性。

detailed_translations.chinese: 母亲的；母性的；母系的；母体遗传的
detailed_translations.english: typical of the way a good mother behaves or feels

name: prolific
trans: 多产的； 富有创造力的

sentences.english: Handel’s prolific output of opera
sentences.chinese: 韩德尔丰富的歌剧作品

detailed_translations.english: a prolific artist, writer etc produces many works of art, books etc

name: expel
trans: 开除； 驱逐； 排出

sentences.english: Two girls were expelled from school for taking drugs.
sentences.chinese: 两名女生因吸毒而被学校开除。

sentences.english: Foreign priests were expelled from the country.
sentences.chinese: 外国牧师被驱逐出境。

sentences.english: As the lungs exhale this waste, gas is expelled into the atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 当肺呼出这股废气，气体就被排到空气中。

name: shelter
trans: 掩蔽处，庇护所；居所，住所；掩蔽，保护
保护， 掩蔽； 躲避

sentences.english: The men took shelter in a bombed-out farmhouse.
sentences.chinese: 那些男人躲在一间被炸毁的农舍里。

sentences.english: All around me, people were running for shelter .
sentences.chinese: 我周围的人都在奔跑着寻找地方躲避。

sentences.english: ...a wooden house, sheltered by a low pointed roof.
sentences.chinese: …一座由低矮的尖屋顶遮蔽的木房子。

detailed_translations.english: protection from danger or from wind, rain, hot sun etc
If a place or thing is sheltered by something, it is protected by that thing from wind and rain
the state or condition of being external

sentences.english: The birds breed in northern latitudes.
sentences.chinese: 这些鸟在北纬地区繁殖。

detailed_translations.english: The latitude of a place is its distance from the equator.

sentences.english: If you want to retain youthful vigor,you have to take regular exercise.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想保持青春活力，你就得经常锻炼。

sentences.english: In fact, the huge inheritance does not do him any good, but tends to undermine his vigor and passion for life.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，这么大笔的遗产对他不仅没有什么好处，反而会损害他的活力和对生活的激情。

sentences.english: They would be lying there in the tree like, 'Oh, just let me just die up here, ' because they lacked any kind of vigor.
sentences.chinese: 因为它们一点活力都没有, 他们会整天在树下躺着，一付‘噢，实在活不起了，让我死在这里好了’的样子。

name: scan
trans: 细察，审视；扫描；粗略地看，浏览

sentences.english: He scanned the horizon, but there was no sign of the ship.
sentences.chinese: 他朝地平线处仔细眺望，但是找不到那艘船的踪影。

sentences.english: She scanned his face, looking for signs of what he was thinking.
sentences.chinese: 她端详着他的脸，想知道他在想些什么。

sentences.english: Video cameras scanned the car park.
sentences.chinese: 摄像机监视着停车场。

sentences.english: She scanned through the paper.
sentences.chinese: 她浏览了一下报纸。

sentences.english: 英文例句:You scan the text into the computer, then edit it.
sentences.chinese: 把文本扫描进电脑，然后进行编辑。

detailed_translations.english: to examine an area carefully but quickly, often because you are looking for a particular person or thing

name: industry
trans: 勤劳， 勤奋； 工业， 行业

sentences.english: I work in the oil industry.
sentences.chinese: 我在石油行业工作。

sentences.english: Italy’s thriving tourist industry
sentences.chinese: 意大利蓬勃发展的旅游业

sentences.english: Gould is a man of great industry.
sentences.chinese: 古尔德是一个很勤劳的人。

detailed_translations.english: businesses that produce a particular type of thing or provide a particular service

sentences.english: a ruthless dictator who eliminated all his rivals
sentences.chinese: 铲除所有异己的残酷独裁者

detailed_translations.english: to completely get rid of something that is unnecessary or unwanted

sentences.english: Any surplus was sold to augment their income.
sentences.chinese: 所有多余的东西被售卖一空来增加他们的收入。

detailed_translations.english: to increase the value, amount, effectiveness etc of something

sentences.english: Both of approaching and returning movements are along the tangent of the circle.
sentences.chinese: 绕转之后移动方向为自南向北，也是沿圆周的切线运动。

sentences.english: The setting of road shape instruction along highway in mountain area was discussed using tangent offset method in road survey.
sentences.chinese: 运用公路测量学上的切线支距法对线形诱导标在山区高速公路的设置进行了探讨。

sentences.english: Of a dielectric the product of dielectric constant and the tangent of its dielectric loss angle; a measure of the heating effect which occurs in dielectrics.
sentences.chinese: 对于电介质来说，它是介电常数和介质损耗角的正切的乘积，这是对出现在电介质中的热效应的量度。

detailed_translations.english: a straight line that touches the outside of a curve but does not cut across it

name: benign
trans: 良性的； 有利的； 善良的， 和蔼的

sentences.english: He shook his head in benign amusement.
sentences.chinese: 他被逗乐了，和蔼地摇了摇头。

detailed_translations.chinese: 良性的；和蔼的，亲切的；吉利的
detailed_translations.english: kind and gentle

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["weapons of mass destruction"]}
sentences.chinese: 大规模杀伤性武器

sentences.english: the environmental destruction caused by the road building programme
sentences.chinese: 筑路工程造成的环境破坏

sentences.english: The floods brought death and destruction to the area.
sentences.chinese: 洪水给该地区带来了死亡和破坏。

detailed_translations.chinese: 破坏， 毁灭； 消灭
detailed_translations.english: the act or process of destroying something or of being destroyed

sentences.english: All the defendants were acquitted.
sentences.chinese: 所有被告都被判无罪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无罪释放；表现；脱卸义务和责任；清偿
detailed_translations.english: to do something well, especially something difficult that you do for the first time in front of other people

name: stiff
trans: 极其， 非常； 僵硬地
硬的，僵直的；呆板的；拘谨的；艰难的，费劲的；强烈的

sentences.english: I never felt stiff after training until I was in my thirties.
sentences.chinese: 三十岁之前，我训练后从不会感到身体发僵。

detailed_translations.chinese: 呆板的；坚硬的；严厉的；拘谨的
detailed_translations.english: a stiff punishment is great or severe

detailed_translations.chinese: 死尸；令人讨厌者；流通票据；劳动者
detailed_translations.english: the body of a dead person

name: prosper
trans: 繁荣， 兴旺； 成功

sentences.english: His business continued to prosper.
sentences.chinese: 他的生意持续兴隆。

detailed_translations.english: If people or businesses prosper, they are successful and do well

sentences.english: We got stuck in a blizzard.
sentences.chinese: 我们被暴风雪困住了。

detailed_translations.english: a severe snowstorm

name: appeal
trans: 上诉，起诉；呼吁，恳求；吸引
上诉， 申诉； 呼吁， 恳求； 感染力， 吸引力

sentences.english: The girl’s family have made a public appeal for help to try and catch her killer.
sentences.chinese: 那名遇害女孩的家人吁请公众协助捉拿凶手。

sentences.english: an appeal to the European Court of Human Rights
sentences.chinese: 向欧洲人权法庭提出的上诉

sentences.english: Farmers have appealed to the government for help.
sentences.chinese: 农场主请求政府帮助。

sentences.english: She is not happy with the decision and plans to appeal.
sentences.chinese: 她不服判决，打算上诉

detailed_translations.english: an urgent request for something important
to make a serious public request for help, money, information etc

name: swamp
trans: 使陷入， 淹没； 使应接不暇， 使疲于应对

sentences.english: I spent one whole night by a swamp behind the road listening to frogs.
sentences.chinese: 我整个晚上都在这条路后面的一个沼泽地旁听蛙鸣。

sentences.english: Their electronic navigation failed and a rogue wave swamped the boat.
sentences.chinese: 他们的电子导航装置失灵了，一个巨浪吞没了那只船。

detailed_translations.english: land that is always very wet or covered with a layer of water

detailed_translations.chinese: 使陷于沼泽；使沉没；使陷入困境
detailed_translations.english: If something swamps a place or object, it fills it with water

sentences.english: “You have to be an optimist to be an inventor or entrepreneur, ” he concludes.
sentences.chinese: 要成为一位发明家或企业家，你必须得是个乐天派。

sentences.english: If any of you end up being entrepreneur, which I hope you will be, what do you have in store for yourself, and what does that journey look like?
sentences.chinese: 如果你们当中任何一个人成了企业家，这也是我希望你们做到的，你自己会有什么样的储备，那样的一段旅程又将是什么样的？

sentences.english: How would you define personal growth as an entrepreneur?
sentences.chinese: 你会如何定义,一个企业家的个人成长？

detailed_translations.english: someone who starts a new business or arranges business deals in order to make money, often in a way that involves financial risks

name: transportation
trans: 运输； 运输系统， 运输工具

sentences.english: The city needs to improve its public transportation (= buses, trains etc ) .
sentences.chinese: 这座城市需要改善公共交通。

detailed_translations.english: a system or method for carrying passengers or goods from one place to another

name: dedicate
trans: 致力于， 奉献给； 题献词于上

sentences.english: The actress now dedicates herself to children’s charity work.
sentences.chinese: 这名女演员现在致力于儿童慈善工作。

detailed_translations.english: to give all your attention and effort to one particular thing

sentences.english: The women prepared, spun, and dyed the wool.
sentences.chinese: 妇女们将羊毛预备、纺线并染色。

sentences.english: hair dye
sentences.chinese: 染发剂

detailed_translations.english: to give something a different colour using a dye
a substance you use to change the colour of your clothes, hair etc

name: extensive
trans: 广大的， 广阔的； 广泛的， 大量的

sentences.english: The house stands in extensive grounds.
sentences.chinese: 这栋房子占地面积很大。

sentences.english: Fire has caused extensive damage to the island’s forests.
sentences.chinese: 大火严重毁坏了岛上的森林。

sentences.english: the extensive use of pesticides
sentences.chinese: 杀虫剂的大量使用

sentences.english: The exhibition has received extensive coverage in the national press.
sentences.chinese: 这次展览会被全国媒体广泛报道。

detailed_translations.english: large in size, amount, or degree

sentences.english: a monotonous diet
sentences.chinese: 单调的饮食

sentences.english: a little boy who wet his bed with monotonous regularity
sentences.chinese: 一个老是尿床的小男孩

detailed_translations.english: boring because of always being the same

sentences.english: Efforts to expand the tourist industry could be negated by reports that the sea is highly polluted.
sentences.chinese: 有关海洋受到严重污染的报道可能会使拓展旅游业的努力完全白费。

detailed_translations.english: to prevent something from having any effect

name: impart
trans: 传授； 传达； 给予

sentences.english: Use a piece of fresh ginger to impart a East Asian flavour to simple ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 用一片鲜姜给简单的原料添上东亚的风味。

sentences.english: She had information that she couldn’t wait to impart.
sentences.chinese: 她得到了消息，迫不及待地想告诉别人。

detailed_translations.english: to give a particular quality to something

name: inspire
trans: 鼓舞， 激励； 给…以灵感

sentences.english: We need someone who can inspire the team.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要一个能鼓舞团队士气的人。

sentences.english: Inspired by the sunny weather, I decided to explore the woods.
sentences.chinese: 阳光明媚的天气令人振奋，我决定到森林里寻幽探胜。

sentences.english: The story was inspired by a chance meeting with an old Russian duke.
sentences.chinese: 这个故事的创作灵感来自与一位俄国老公爵的不期而遇。

detailed_translations.english: to encourage someone by making them feel confident and eager to do something

name: bureaucracy
trans: 官僚主义， 官僚作风； 政府机构， 官僚机构

sentences.english: the reduction of unnecessary bureaucracy
sentences.chinese: 消除不必要的官僚体制

detailed_translations.english: a complicated official system that is annoying or confusing because it has a lot of rules, processes etc

sentences.english: the very ordered way in which mathematics and geometry describe nature
sentences.chinese: 数学和几何学描述自然的条理性

detailed_translations.english: the study in  mathematics  of the angles and shapes formed by the relationships of lines, surfaces, and solid objects in space

sentences.english: He decided to devote the rest of his life to scientific investigation.
sentences.chinese: 他决定把余生奉献给科学研究。

detailed_translations.english: to use all or most of your time, effort etc in order to do something or help someone

name: delectable
trans: 美味可口的； 有吸引力的； 令人喜爱的， 赏心悦目的

sentences.english: ...delectable wine.
sentences.chinese: ...美味可口的葡萄酒。

detailed_translations.english: If you describe something, especially food or drink, as delectable, you mean that it is very pleasant

name: barb
trans: 鱼钩， 倒钩； 挖苦的话

sentences.english: The barb stung her exactly the way he hoped it would.
sentences.chinese: 他的讽刺如期伤到了她。

detailed_translations.chinese: 箭头鱼钩等的倒钩；伤人的话
detailed_translations.english: the sharp curved point of a hook,  arrow  etc that prevents it from being easily pulled out

sentences.english: President Kennedy was an alumnus of Harvard University.
sentences.chinese: 肯尼迪总统是哈佛大学的毕业生。

detailed_translations.english: a former student of a school, college etc

sentences.english: All this may sound a bit far-fetched, but companies are already developing ‘intelligent’ homes.
sentences.chinese: 这一切听起来也许有点难以置信，但的确有一些公司已经在开发“智能”房屋了。

detailed_translations.english: extremely unlikely to be true or to happen

sentences.english: For each approximate solution of a parameterized problem, the app also displays the margin of error.
sentences.chinese: 对于每一个参数化问题的近似结果，这个程序也会显示误差的边界。

sentences.english: Until the versions released in 1995, chunks were left unsorted within bins, so that the best-fit strategy was only approximate .
sentences.chinese: 直到1995年发布的半本，块在箱子里还是未排序的，所以最佳适合策略还只是近似的。

sentences.english: The model downloaded to a smart phone finds an approximate solution for a new set of parameters by reference to the precomputed solutions.
sentences.chinese: 这个模型会被下载到智能手机上，通过引用预先计算好的结果来找到一个对应新的参数组的近似结果。

detailed_translations.english: to be close to a particular number
an approximate number, amount, or time is close to the exact number, amount etc, but could be a little bit more or less than it

name: craftsman
trans: 能工巧匠， 手艺人， 工艺师

sentences.english: The table in the kitchen was made by a local craftsman.
sentences.chinese: 厨房里的桌子是当地一名工匠做的。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is very skilled at a particular  craft

name: project
trans: 放映； 规划； 预测， 推想
方案； 课题， 项目； 工程

sentences.english: The project aims to provide an analysis of children’s emotions.
sentences.chinese: 该计划旨在对儿童情绪作出分析。

sentences.english: a three-year research project
sentences.chinese: 一项为期三年的研究计划

sentences.english: The scheme will now be extended after a successful pilot project (= a small trial to test if an idea will be successful ) .
sentences.chinese: 试行成功后，该方案现在将得到推广。

sentences.english: The project is funded by Wellcome plc.
sentences.chinese: 这个项目由威康公司资助。

sentences.english: a project manager
sentences.chinese: 项目经理

sentences.english: a geography project
sentences.chinese: 一个地理课题

detailed_translations.english: a carefully planned piece of work to get information about something, to build something, to improve something etc

sentences.english: aberrant behaviour
sentences.chinese: 异常行为

detailed_translations.chinese: 异常的；畸变的；脱离常轨的；迷乱的
detailed_translations.english: not usual or normal

sentences.english: Do you know my lope?
sentences.chinese: 你知道我能大步慢跑吗?。

detailed_translations.english: to run easily with long steps

name: lateral
trans: 侧面的， 旁边的； 横向的

sentences.english: The wall is weak and requires lateral support.
sentences.chinese: 墙体不坚固，需要从侧面加以支撑。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the sides of something, or movement to the side

name: hinterland
trans: 内地， 腹地； 内地贸易区

sentences.english: the rural hinterland
sentences.chinese: 内地乡村

detailed_translations.chinese: 内地；穷乡僻壤；靠港口供应的内地贸易区
detailed_translations.english: an area of land that is far from the coast, large rivers, or the places where people live

name: nominate
trans: 任命， 指定； 提名， 推荐

sentences.english: Ferraro was the first woman to be nominated for the job of vice president.
sentences.chinese: 费拉罗是第一位获得副总统职位提名的女性。

sentences.english: Next year Mr Jenks will retire and Mr Broadbent will be nominated as his replacement.
sentences.chinese: 明年詹克斯先生退休，布罗德本特先生将获任命接替他的职位。

detailed_translations.english: to officially suggest someone or something for an important position, duty, or prize

name: tread
trans: 轮胎面； 脚步声； 步法

sentences.english: The fat, broad tyres had a good depth of tread.
sentences.chinese: 鼓鼓的宽轮胎上有一道很深的花纹。

detailed_translations.chinese: 踏；胎面；步态；鞋底；踏板；梯级
detailed_translations.english: the pattern of lines on the part of a tyre that touches the road
to put your foot on or in something while you are walking

sentences.english: Draw a circle six centimetres in diameter.
sentences.chinese: 画一个直径为六厘米的圆。

detailed_translations.english: a straight line from one side of a circle to the other side, passing through the centre of the circle, or the length of this line

name: stationary
trans: 静止的； 固定的， 稳定的， 不变的

sentences.english: How did you manage to drive into a stationary vehicle?
sentences.chinese: 你是怎么开车的，竟会撞上一辆停着的车子？

detailed_translations.chinese: 固定的， 静止不动的
detailed_translations.english: standing still instead of moving

sentences.english: The barn was heaped with grain.
sentences.chinese: 谷仓里堆满了粮食。

sentences.english: The dilapidated barn detracts charm from the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 圮废失修的谷仓有损景色的美。

sentences.english: The grain is liable to mildew when the humidity in the barn is too high.
sentences.chinese: 仓库里潮气太大， 粮食就容易发霉。

detailed_translations.english: a large farm building for storing crops, or for keeping animals in

sentences.english: In Finland purists insist that only birch bark should be added.
sentences.chinese: 在芬兰，纯化论者坚持说只能加白桦树皮。

sentences.english: Cork bark is closely intertwined with the lives of the people in these regions.
sentences.chinese: 软木橡树的树皮与这些地方的百姓生活密切地交织在一起。

sentences.english: In his workshop, a Kakunodate craftsman prepares the cherry bark before applying this as a veneer to a range of objects.
sentences.chinese: 在将这种工艺作为一系列物体的单板运用之前，角馆的工匠在自己的作坊准备樱花树皮。

detailed_translations.english: the outer covering of a tree

sentences.english: Once you have chosen a kennel, make a booking for your pet.
sentences.chinese: 一旦您选定了养狗场，请为您的宠物预约。

detailed_translations.english: a small building made for a dog to sleep in
to put or go into a kennel; keep or stay in a kennel

sentences.english: The Earth orbits in an ellipse.
sentences.chinese: 地球沿椭圆形轨道运动。

detailed_translations.english: a curved shape like a circle, but with two slightly longer and flatter sides

name: bare
trans: 赤裸的；光秃的，无遮盖的；最基本的

sentences.english: a ragged child with bare feet
sentences.chinese: 一个衣衫褴褛、光着脚的小孩

sentences.english: She felt the sun warm on her bare arms.
sentences.chinese: 她感觉到阳光照在她裸露双臂上的暖意。

sentences.english: He got 40% – a bare pass.
sentences.chinese: 他得了40分，勉强及格。

detailed_translations.english: not covered by clothes

sentences.english: A child was toddling along the sidewalk.
sentences.chinese: 一个小孩正沿着人行道蹒跚行走。

sentences.english: The blind man tapped his cane on the sidewalk.
sentences.chinese: 盲人用手杖敲击人行道。

sentences.english: Then I noticed he was on the sidewalk behind me.
sentences.chinese: 然后在人行道上我注意到他在我后面。

detailed_translations.english: a hard surface or path at the side of a street for people to walk on

name: formidable
trans: 难对付的； 强大的； 令人敬畏的

sentences.english: The building is grey, formidable, not at all picturesque.
sentences.chinese: 那幢建筑呈灰色，气势凛然，与漂亮沾不上边。

sentences.english: The new range of computers have formidable processing power.
sentences.chinese: 该系列的新型计算机处理能力惊人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可怕的；令人敬畏的，令人惊叹的
detailed_translations.english: very powerful or impressive, and often frightening

name: abound
trans: 富于； 大量存在； 充满

sentences.english: Rumors of such coordination abound, but as with many rumors, they have no basis in fact.
sentences.chinese: 关于这类协调的谣传很多；但如同许多其他谣传一样，它们没有事实根据。

sentences.english: Finally, offer this closing prayer to the Lord: May the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, that you may abound in hope by the power of the Holy Spirit.
sentences.chinese: 最后，将结束的祷告告诉主：愿在你拥有信仰的时候希望的上帝用快乐与和平充满你的人生，让你在圣灵的力量下富于希望。

sentences.english: It did not take Andrew long to pack a suitcase.
sentences.chinese: 安德鲁没有用多长时间就整理好了手提箱。

detailed_translations.english: a large case with a handle, used for carrying clothes and possessions when you travel

name: invert
trans: 使倒转， 使倒置， 使颠倒

sentences.english: Invert the cake onto a serving plate.
sentences.chinese: 把蛋糕倒扣过来放到一个盘子上。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使…转化；使…颠倒；使…反转；使…前后倒置
detailed_translations.english: to put something in the opposite position to the one it was in before, especially by turning it upside down (= the bottom is on the top and the top is on the bottom )

detailed_translations.chinese: 颠倒的事物；倒置物；倒悬者

name: discrete
trans: 分离的， 个别的； 离散的

sentences.english: The change happens in a series of discrete steps.
sentences.chinese: 这个变化在一系列分离的步骤中发生。

detailed_translations.english: clearly separate

name: temperate
trans: 气候温和的， 温带的； 温和的， 自我克制的

sentences.english: The Nile Valley keeps a temperate climate throughout the year.
sentences.chinese: 尼罗河流域全年气候温和。

detailed_translations.chinese: 温和的；适度的；有节制的
detailed_translations.english: behaviour that is temperate is calm and sensible

name: immutable
trans: 不可改变的， 永恒不变的

sentences.english: This decision should not be seen as immutable.
sentences.chinese: 不该把这个决定看成是不可改变的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不变的；不可变的；不能变的
detailed_translations.english: never changing or impossible to change

name: disrupt
trans: 使中断； 扰乱； 使分裂， 使瓦解

sentences.english: Traffic was disrupted by a hoax bomb.
sentences.chinese: 有人虚报有炸弹，造成了交通混乱。

sentences.english: Climate change could disrupt the agricultural economy.
sentences.chinese: 气候变化可能给农业经济带来不良影响。

detailed_translations.english: to prevent something from continuing in its usual way by causing problems

name: scar
trans: 给…留下疤痕；给…留下精神创伤；损害…的外观

sentences.english: His hands were badly scarred by the fire.
sentences.chinese: 他的双手被那次大火烧得疤痕累累。

sentences.english: She will probably be scarred for life .
sentences.chinese: 她有可能留下永久的疤痕。

detailed_translations.english: if a wound or cut scars you, it leaves a permanent mark on your body
a permanent mark that is left on your skin after you have had a cut or wound

name: abort
trans: 夭折， 中止； 使流产

sentences.english: The disease causes pregnant animals to abort.
sentences.chinese: 这种疾病会导致怀孕的动物流产。

detailed_translations.chinese: 流产；堕胎；夭折；发育不全
detailed_translations.english: to deliberately end a  pregnancy  when the baby is still too young to live

sentences.english: The question is purely hypothetical .
sentences.chinese: 这个问题完全基于假设。

detailed_translations.english: based on a situation that is not real, but that might happen

sentences.english: In 8pq, the coefficient of pq is 8.
sentences.chinese: 在8pq中pq的系数为8。

detailed_translations.english: the number by which an unknown quantity is multiplied

sentences.english: It lets me converse with the distinct voices of my past and quilt together a narrative about movement in place.
sentences.chinese: 它让我能够用可以彰显我的过去的独特声音与人交谈，并拼凑出一通有关地点变换的叙述。

sentences.english: From outside, from those who you love, converse, and make community with, telling you that you belong with them, if only you will give up those annoying, unacceptable parts, please.
sentences.chinese: 来自外界，来自那些你爱的、与你谈话的、与你团结在一起并告诉你你属于他们的人，只要你将放弃那些恼人的、无法接受的部分。

detailed_translations.english: to have a conversation with someone
opposite
the converse of a fact, word, statement etc is the opposite of it

name: gospel
trans: 准则， 信条； 绝对真理； [G-]福音； 福音音乐； 训示

sentences.english: Don’t take everything she says as gospel (= don’t believe everything she says ) .
sentences.chinese: 别把她说的每句话都当真理。

detailed_translations.english: something that is completely true

detailed_translations.chinese: 传播福音的；福音赞美诗的

sentences.english: His eccentric behaviour lost him his job.
sentences.chinese: 他古怪的行为使他丢了工作。

sentences.english: Aunt Nessy was always a bit eccentric.
sentences.chinese: 内西姑妈总是有点古怪。

detailed_translations.english: behaving in a way that is unusual and different from most people
someone who behaves in a way that is different from what is usual or socially accepted

name: appliance
trans: 用具， 器具； 装置

sentences.english: The device most often used to do this is a load balancer, which is an appliance that accepts requests from the outside world and hands them off to the next available application server.
sentences.chinese: 进行这一操作最常用的设备是一个负载均衡器，这是一个从外部接收请求并将它们移交给下一个可用应用程序服务器的装置。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment, especially electrical equipment, such as a  cooker  or  washing machine  , used in people’s homes

sentences.english: Brass is an alloy of copper and zinc.
sentences.chinese: 黄铜是铜和锌的合金。

detailed_translations.english: to mix one metal with another
a metal that consists of two or more metals mixed together

sentences.english: The committee deferred their decision .
sentences.chinese: 委员会延期作出决定。

detailed_translations.english: to delay something until a later date

name: drowsy
trans: 昏昏欲睡的； 催眠的

sentences.english: The drug can make you drowsy.
sentences.chinese: 这种药会让人昏昏欲睡。

detailed_translations.chinese: 昏昏欲睡的；沉寂的；催眠的
detailed_translations.english: tired and almost asleep

name: lore
trans: 学问， 学识； 传说， 传统

sentences.english: According to local lore, a ghost still haunts the castle.
sentences.chinese: 根据当地人的传说，城堡里至今仍然闹鬼。

detailed_translations.chinese: 知识；学问；全部传说；（动物的）眼光知识
detailed_translations.english: knowledge or information about a subject, for example nature or magic, that is not written down but is passed from person to person

name: mast
trans: 船桅； 旗杆； 天线塔

sentences.english: While a ketch offers these advantages to cruisers, they may also be more expensive because of the added mast and sail.
sentences.chinese: 尽管双桅帆给水手们提供了这些优势，它们也因为这额外的桅杆和船帆而造价更加昂贵。

sentences.english: She says the boat would be shaped like a capsule, powered by a small nuclear engine, and though there would be no sail, it would have a mast to hold a camera.
sentences.chinese: 斯托芬表示，探测船将被制成胶囊状，并由一个小型核动力引擎驱动，尽管不会有帆，但船上会有一个固定照相机的桅杆。

sentences.english: She has also studied everything from how to stitch her own wounds to how to cope with sleep deprivation and how to put out fires on board her 11.5-metre twin-mast ketch.
sentences.chinese: 她还学习了相关知识，从如何缝合伤口，到如何应付睡眠不足的状况，再到如何扑灭高11.5米的双桅杆帆船上的火情，可谓应有尽有。

detailed_translations.english: a tall pole on which the sails or flags on a ship are hung
to equip with a mast or masts

name: mass
trans: 质量；块，团；众多；群众，平民百姓

sentences.english: a mass protest
sentences.chinese: 大规模的抗议

sentences.english: weapons of mass destruction
sentences.chinese: 大规模杀伤性武器

sentences.english: the problem of mass unemployment
sentences.chinese: 大批人失业的问题

detailed_translations.english: involving or intended for a very large number of people
to come together, or to make people or things come together, in a large group

detailed_translations.chinese: 众多，大量；团，块，堆；群众；质量
detailed_translations.english: a large crowd

sentences.english: It was muggy and overcast.
sentences.chinese: 那天天气闷热又潮湿，阴沉沉的。

detailed_translations.english: muggy weather is unpleasantly warm and the air seems wet

name: revoke
trans: 撤销， 撤回； 取消， 废除

sentences.english: Their work permits have been revoked.
sentences.chinese: 他们的工作许可证被吊销了。

detailed_translations.english: to officially state that a law, decision, or agreement is no longer effective

name: proper
trans: 正确的； 合乎体统的， 适当的； 固有的， 特有的

sentences.english: It is right and proper that parents take responsibility for their children's attendance at school.
sentences.chinese: 父母负责督促子女上学上课，这是天经地义的事。

sentences.english: He is always perfectly proper in his behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 他的行为举止向来是无可挑剔的。

detailed_translations.english: socially and morally acceptable

name: renaissance
trans: [the R-] 文艺复兴， 文艺复兴时期； 复兴， 再生

sentences.english: ...the Renaissance masterpieces in London's galleries.
sentences.chinese: …伦敦美术馆里文艺复兴时期的杰作。

detailed_translations.english: a new interest in something, especially a particular form of art, music etc, that has not been popular for a long period

name: poisonous
trans: 有毒的， 有害的； 恶毒的

sentences.english: Some mushrooms are extremely poisonous.
sentences.chinese: 一些蘑菇有剧毒。

sentences.english: poisonous gases such as hydrogen sulfide
sentences.chinese: 硫化氢等有毒气体

sentences.english: poisonous substances
sentences.chinese: 有毒物质

sentences.english: She was bitten on the ankle by a poisonous snake .
sentences.chinese: 她被毒蛇咬了脚踝。

detailed_translations.english: containing poison or producing poison

sentences.english: Eight drawings by French artist Jean Cocteau will be auctioned next week.
sentences.chinese: 法国艺术家让·科克托的8幅画作将在下周拍卖。

detailed_translations.english: to sell something at an auction
a public meeting where land, buildings, paintings etc are sold to the person who offers the most money for them

name: allot
trans: 分配， 配给， 拨给

sentences.english: The seats are allotted to the candidates who have won the most votes.
sentences.chinese: 这些席位被分配给了赢得了最多选票的候选人。

detailed_translations.english: to use a particular amount of time for something, or give a particular share of money, space etc to someone or something

detailed_translations.chinese: (Allot)人名；(英)阿洛特；(西)阿略特；(法)阿洛

name: propel
trans: 推进， 驱使； 激励

sentences.english: a boat propelled by a small motor
sentences.chinese: 由小马达驱动的小船

sentences.english: One of our students was unable to propel her wheelchair up the ramp.
sentences.chinese: 我们有名学生无法把她的轮椅推上坡道。

detailed_translations.english: to move, drive, or push something forward

name: admit
trans: 承认； 准许…进入， 接纳

sentences.english: ‘Okay, so maybe I was a little bit scared,’ Jenny admitted.
sentences.chinese: “行了，也许我是有点害怕。”珍妮承认道。

sentences.english: I must admit , I didn’t actually do anything to help her.
sentences.chinese: 我必须承认，实际上我并没有帮她什么忙。

sentences.english: Admit it! I’m right, aren’t I?
sentences.chinese: 承认吧！我对了，是不是？

detailed_translations.english: to agree unwillingly that something is true or that someone else is right
to agree unwillingly that something is true or that someone else is right

name: rampant
trans: 猖獗的， 肆虐的； 蔓生的

sentences.english: Pickpocketing is rampant in the downtown area.
sentences.chinese: 闹市区扒窃活动猖獗。

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["rampant inflation"]}
sentences.chinese: 失控的通货膨胀

detailed_translations.chinese: 猖獗的；蔓延的；狂暴的；奔放的
detailed_translations.english: if something bad, such as crime or disease, is rampant, there is a lot of it and it is very difficult to control

name: interest
trans: 兴趣，关注；业余爱好；利息；利害关系
使感兴趣， 引起…关注

sentences.english: I watched the first few episodes, but soon lost interest.
sentences.chinese: 我看了前几集，但很快就失去了兴趣。

sentences.english: The last round of bidding aroused considerable interest.
sentences.chinese: 最后一轮竞价引起人们相当大的兴趣。

sentences.english: Our survey reveals a disturbing lack of interest in teacher training.
sentences.chinese: 我们的调查显示人们对教师培训失去了兴趣，这很令人不安。

sentences.english: I read your article with great interest.
sentences.chinese: 我兴致勃勃地拜读了您的文章。

sentences.english: to promote/protect/safeguard sb's interests
sentences.chinese: 为某人的利益游说；保护 / 维护某人的利益

sentences.english: The money was repaid with interest.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱是带息偿还的。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that you have when you want to know or learn more about sb/sth

name: uneven
trans: 不平均的； 不平坦的； 不规则的； 不势均力敌的； 不公平的

sentences.english: She walked back carefully over the uneven ground.
sentences.chinese: 她小心翼翼地从凹凸不平的地面上走回来。

detailed_translations.english: not smooth, flat, or level

sentences.english: There is the bird, sitting on a twig halfway up the tree.
sentences.chinese: 鸟儿在那里，栖息在树中段的一根细枝上。

detailed_translations.english: to understand (something)
a small very thin stem of wood that grows from a branch on a tree

name: immature
trans: 未成熟的， 未充分发展的

sentences.english: He forgave his son’s immature behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 他原谅了儿子的幼稚行为。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不成熟的, 未完全发展的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is immature behaves or thinks in a way that is typical of someone much younger – used to show disapproval

name: organic
trans: 有机的； 器官的； 有机体的

sentences.english: Organic farming is better for the environment.
sentences.chinese: 有机耕作对环境更有利。

sentences.english: organic gardening
sentences.chinese: 有机园艺

detailed_translations.english: relating to farming or gardening methods of growing food without using artificial chemicals, or produced or grown by these methods

name: chaste
trans: 贞洁的； 简朴的， 朴实的

sentences.english: She led a chaste decent life.
sentences.chinese: 她过着贞洁正派的生活。

detailed_translations.chinese: 纯洁的；贞洁的；有道德的；朴素的
detailed_translations.english: not having sex with anyone, or not with anyone except your husband or wife

sentences.english: a surgical face mask
sentences.chinese: 外科手术口罩

sentences.english: He was attacked and robbed by two people wearing masks .
sentences.chinese: 他被两个蒙面人袭击并抢劫。

detailed_translations.english: something that covers all or part of your face, to protect or to hide it
if a smell, taste, sound etc is masked by a stronger one, it cannot be noticed because of the stronger one

sentences.english: I ordered the evacuation of all Americans and sent troops to guarantee their safety.
sentences.chinese: 我下令撤离所有的美国人，并派部队去保证他们的安全。

sentences.english: The impact of evacuation and relocation on those with health or functional impairments can be tremendous .
sentences.chinese: 撤离和重新安置对这些健康状况欠佳或身体残疾的人影响极大。

sentences.english: However, it is not only harmful to escape, but also beneficial for smoke to spread quickly to other floors if the smoke moves into the vertical escape evacuation routes while it is on fire.
sentences.chinese: 但是火灾发生后，作为人员逃生的竖向疏散通道如果遭受烟气侵害，不仅对人员的逃生不利，而且会加快烟气向其他楼层的蔓延。

name: patron
trans: 资助人， 赞助人； 老主顾， 顾客

sentences.english: a wealthy patron
sentences.chinese: 富有的赞助人

detailed_translations.english: someone who supports the activities of an organization, for example by giving money

name: apply
trans: 申请， 请求； 适用； 应用， 运用； 涂， 敷， 施

sentences.english: We need to apply for planning permission to build a garage.
sentences.chinese: 我们建车库需要申请规划许可。

detailed_translations.chinese: 应用，实施，使用；适用；申请，请求
detailed_translations.english: to make a formal request, usually written, for something such as a job, a place at a university, or permission to do something
to put or spread something such as paint, liquid, or medicine onto a surface

name: stew
trans: 炖， 煨； 思考； 不安， 担忧

sentences.english: stewed apples
sentences.chinese: 炖苹果

detailed_translations.english: to cook something slowly in liquid
a hot meal made by cooking meat and vegetables slowly in liquid for a long time

name: overlook
trans: 俯瞰， 眺望； 忽略； 对…不予考虑

sentences.english: Our room overlooks the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 我们的房间可以俯视大海。

sentences.english: It is easy to overlook a small detail like that.
sentences.chinese: 那样的小细节很容易被忽略。

sentences.english: She found him entertaining enough to overlook his faults.
sentences.chinese: 她觉得他很有趣，足以让她包容他的缺点。

detailed_translations.english: if a house, room etc overlooks something, it has a view of it, usually from above

name: incredible
trans: 惊人的， 难以置信的

sentences.english: It’s incredible that he survived the fall.
sentences.chinese: 他跌下去竟然能够生还，真不可思议。

sentences.english: It’s incredible how much Tom has changed since he met Sally.
sentences.chinese: 自从遇见萨莉后，汤姆的变化之大简直令人难以置信。

sentences.english: I find it almost incredible that no one noticed these errors.
sentences.chinese: 没人发现这些错误，真让我无法相信。

detailed_translations.english: too strange to be believed, or very difficult to believe

name: layout
trans: 编排， 版面设计； 规划， 布局

sentences.english: All the flats in the building had the same layout.
sentences.chinese: 大楼里所有的公寓布局都是一样的。

detailed_translations.english: the way in which something such as a town, garden, or building is arranged

name: landing
trans: 登陆； 着陆， 降落

sentences.english: take-off and landing procedures
sentences.chinese: 起降程序

sentences.english: the Apollo Moon landings
sentences.chinese: 阿波罗宇宙飞船登月

detailed_translations.english: the action of bringing an aircraft down to the ground after being in the air

name: formula
trans: 公式， 方程式； 分子式； 配方

sentences.english: We’re still searching for a peace formula.
sentences.chinese: 我们仍在寻找和平方案。

sentences.english: There is no magic formula (= a method that is certain to be successful ) that will transform sorrow into happiness.
sentences.chinese: 没有妙方可以化悲为喜。

sentences.english: With viewing figures up a million, the programme has a winning formula .
sentences.chinese: 收视人数增加了一百万，这个节目的确拥有吸引观众的法宝。

sentences.english: the formula for calculating distance
sentences.chinese: 计算距离的公式

detailed_translations.english: a series of numbers or letters that represent a mathematical or scientific rule

sentences.english: Just after the avalanche.
sentences.chinese: 就在这雪崩后不久。

sentences.english: But what if the avalanche happened?
sentences.chinese: 不过，要是发生雪崩怎么办呢？

sentences.english: If the value was much lower than one, on the other hand, the avalanche would soon die out.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，如果结果是一个比一小很多的数字，那么雪崩很快就会停止。

detailed_translations.english: a large mass of snow, ice, and rocks that falls down the side of a mountain

name: revolt
trans: 反叛，反抗；违抗；厌恶，反感
起义， 叛乱， 反抗

sentences.english: The prime minister is now facing a revolt by members of his own party.
sentences.chinese: 首相现在面临着党内倒戈。

sentences.english: the Polish revolt of 1863
sentences.chinese: 1863年的波兰起义

sentences.english: Some members of the government may revolt against this proposed legislation.3
sentences.chinese: 一些政府成员可能会反对这项拟议中的法规。

sentences.english: The peasants threatened to revolt.
sentences.chinese: 农民威胁说要造反。

detailed_translations.english: a refusal to accept someone’s authority or obey rules or laws
to refuse to accept someone’s authority or obey rules or laws

sentences.english: He reached into the bin with a look of disgust on his face.
sentences.chinese: 他把手伸进垃圾箱，脸上带着厌恶的表情。

sentences.english: He disgusted many with his boorish behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 他以其粗鲁的行为使许多人感到厌恶。

detailed_translations.english: a strong feeling of dislike, annoyance, or disapproval
To disgust someone means to make them feel a strong sense of dislike and disapproval

name: tribute
trans: 贡品； 颂词， 称赞； 悼念， 致哀； 礼物

sentences.english: The players wore black armbands as a tribute to their late teammate.
sentences.chinese: 球员们戴着黑纱悼念已故的队友。

sentences.english: I’d like to pay tribute to (= praise and admire publicly ) the party workers for all their hard work.
sentences.chinese: 我谨向党内工作人员致敬，感谢他们的辛苦努力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 礼物；[税收] 贡物；颂词；（尤指对死者的）致敬，悼念，吊唁礼物
detailed_translations.english: something that you say, do, or give in order to express your respect or admiration for someone

sentences.english: Smoking during pregnancy endangers your baby’s life.
sentences.chinese: 孕期吸烟会危及胎儿生命。

detailed_translations.english: to put someone or something in danger of being hurt, damaged, or destroyed

sentences.english: India has a good scientific research base.
sentences.chinese: 印度有良好的科研基础。

detailed_translations.english: the most important part of something, from which new ideas develop
not having good moral principles
to have your main place of work, business etc in a particular place

sentences.english: ‘Writ ’ is the stem of the forms ‘writes ’, ‘writing ’ and ‘written ’.
sentences.chinese: writ是writes、writing和written三个词的词干。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a word that stays the same when different endings are added to it, for example ‘driv-’ in ‘driving’

name: subordinate
trans: 使处于次要地位， 使从属于

sentences.english: a subordinate officer
sentences.chinese: 下级官员

detailed_translations.chinese: 下级的，级别低的；次要的，从属的
detailed_translations.english: in a less important position than someone else
someone who has a lower position and less authority than someone else in an organization

detailed_translations.chinese: 使处于次要地位， 使从属于
detailed_translations.english: to put someone or something in a less important position

sentences.english: The current trend is towards more part-time employment.
sentences.chinese: 当前的趋势是雇用更多的兼职人员。

sentences.english: the general trend towards the centralization of political power
sentences.chinese: 政治权力集中化的普遍趋势

sentences.english: A disturbing trend is that victims of violence are getting younger.
sentences.chinese: 一个令人担心的趋势是，暴力行为的受害者越来越年轻。

sentences.english: The growing trend is for single mothers to bring up children by themselves.
sentences.chinese: 单身母亲独自抚养孩子的趋势在上升。

sentences.english: Even so, the underlying trend is positive.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，基本趋势仍是乐观的。

sentences.english: national and international economic trends
sentences.chinese: 国内和国际的经济趋势

sentences.english: the downward trend in the price of gold
sentences.chinese: 黄金价格的下滑势头

sentences.english: Successive presidents have tried to reverse this trend , but without success.
sentences.chinese: 连续几任总统都试图扭转这一趋势，但均未成功。

detailed_translations.english: a general tendency in the way a situation is changing or developing

sentences.english: a garage mechanic
sentences.chinese: 汽车修理厂的技工

detailed_translations.english: someone who is skilled at repairing motor vehicles and machinery

name: revolution
trans: 革命； 巨变； 旋转

sentences.english: the French Revolution of 1789
sentences.chinese: 1789年法国大革命

sentences.english: the planets’ revolution around the sun
sentences.chinese: 行星围绕太阳的公转

detailed_translations.english: an attempt, by a large number of people, to change the government of a country, especially by violent action

sentences.english: a birth control method that is cheap and reliable
sentences.chinese: 既便宜又可靠的避孕方法

sentences.english: Miller was a quiet and reliable man.
sentences.chinese: 米勒是个话不多且可靠的人。

detailed_translations.english: someone or something that is reliable can be trusted or depended on

sentences.english: As an added incentive, there’s a bottle of champagne for the best team.
sentences.chinese: 给最优秀的队发一瓶香槟作为额外的鼓励。

detailed_translations.english: something that encourages you to work harder, start a new activity etc

name: relate
trans: 叙述， 讲述； 有关联

sentences.english: The report seeks to relate the rise in crime to an increase in unemployment.
sentences.chinese: 报告试图把犯罪率上升和失业增加联系起来。

sentences.english: He later related the whole story to me.
sentences.chinese: 他后来给我讲了整件事的来龙去脉。

detailed_translations.english: if you relate two different things, you show how they are connected

name: preliminary
trans: 初步做法， 起始行为

sentences.english: the preliminary stages of the competition
sentences.chinese: 竞赛的预赛阶段

sentences.english: a preliminary draft
sentences.chinese: 初稿

detailed_translations.english: happening before something that is more important, often in order to prepare for it

detailed_translations.chinese: 初步做法， 起始行为

sentences.english: The tax puts obstacles in the way of companies trying to develop trade overseas.
sentences.chinese: 这项税收为想在海外发展贸易的公司设置了障碍。

sentences.english: Women still have to overcome many obstacles to gain equality.
sentences.chinese: 妇女要获得平等仍需克服重重障碍。

sentences.english: We want to remove all obstacles to travel between the two countries.
sentences.chinese: 我们想要消除在这两个国家之间旅行的所有障碍。

sentences.english: the single biggest obstacle to a Conservative victory in the next election
sentences.chinese: 保守党在下一届大选中获胜的最大障碍

sentences.english: There are formidable obstacles on the road to peace.
sentences.chinese: 通往和平的道路上存在难以逾越的障碍。

detailed_translations.english: something that makes it difficult to achieve some­thing

sentences.english: Give the leftovers to the dog.
sentences.chinese: 把吃剩的饭菜喂狗。

sentences.english: The headmaster was a leftover from the Victorian era.
sentences.chinese: 校长是维多利亚时代的遗老

sentences.english: leftover vegetables
sentences.chinese: 吃剩的蔬菜

detailed_translations.english: food that has not been eaten at the end of a meal
remaining after all the rest has been used, taken, or eaten

sentences.english: ...a collaborative research project.
sentences.chinese: …一个合作研究项目。

detailed_translations.english: a job or piece of work that involves two or more people working together to achieve something

name: constitute
trans: 组成； 设立； 制定

sentences.english: We must redefine what constitutes a family.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须对家庭的构成重新定义。

detailed_translations.english: to be the parts that together form sth

name: indict
trans: 控诉， 起诉， 控告

sentences.english: He was later indicted on corruption charges.
sentences.chinese: 他后来被控贪污。

detailed_translations.english: to officially charge someone with a criminal offence

name: courier
trans: 送急件的人， 信使； 旅游服务员

sentences.english: ...a motorcycle courier.
sentences.chinese: …一名骑摩托车的信使。

detailed_translations.chinese: 导游；情报员，通讯员；送快信的人
detailed_translations.english: A courier is a person who is paid to take letters and packages direct from one place to another

sentences.english: Although I soon convinced him of my innocence, I think he still has serious doubts about my sanity.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我很快就使他相信我是清白的，但是他还是非常怀疑我精神是否正常。

detailed_translations.english: If someone or something convinces you of something, they make you believe that it is true or that it exists

name: mate
trans: 配偶；朋友，伙伴；同事；大副

sentences.english: He has found his ideal mate.
sentences.chinese: 他已经找到了理想的配偶。

detailed_translations.chinese: 助手，大副；配偶；同事；配对物
detailed_translations.english: someone you work with, do an activity with, or share something with
if animals mate, they have sex to produce babies

name: stampede
trans: 逃窜， 狂奔； 热潮， 风尚

sentences.english: a herd of stampeding buffalo
sentences.chinese: 一群狂奔的水牛

detailed_translations.english: to be made frightened or worried so that you do something too quickly, without thinking enough about it

detailed_translations.chinese: 逃窜， 狂奔； 热潮， 风尚
detailed_translations.english: when a group of large animals or people suddenly start running in the same direction because they are frightened or excited

sentences.english: I could spend each day gorging on chocolate.
sentences.chinese: 我可以将每一天都花在狂吃巧克力上。

detailed_translations.english: If you gorge on something or gorge yourself on it, you eat lots of it in a very greedy way
a deep narrow valley with steep sides

sentences.english: The court ruled that the contract must be terminated.
sentences.chinese: 法庭裁决该合同必须终止。

sentences.english: to terminate a pregnancy (= to perform or have an abortion )
sentences.chinese: 终止妊娠（堕胎）

detailed_translations.english: ito end; to make sth end

name: mannerism
trans: 怪癖， 癖性； 过分的独特风格

sentences.english: His mannerisms are more those of a preoccupied maths professor.
sentences.chinese: 他的言谈举止更像是一个全神贯注的数学教授。

detailed_translations.chinese: 特殊习惯；矫揉造作；怪癖
detailed_translations.english: Someone's mannerisms are the gestures or ways of speaking that are very characteristic of them, and which they often use

name: theory
trans: 理论， 原理； 学说； 见解， 看法

sentences.english: Freudian theory has had a great influence on psychology.
sentences.chinese: 弗洛伊德理论对心理学产生过巨大影响。

detailed_translations.english: an idea or set of ideas that is intended to explain something about life or the world, especially an idea that has not yet been proved to be true

name: confederacy
trans: 联盟， 同盟， 联邦； 私党

sentences.english: They've entered this new confederacy because the central government's been unable to control the collapsing economy.
sentences.chinese: 他们已经参加了这个新同盟，因为中央政府已经不能控制摇摇欲坠的经济了。

detailed_translations.english: a confederation

sentences.english: People have been flocking to the exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 看展览的人络绎不绝。

detailed_translations.english: to go or gather together somewhere in large numbers

name: extension
trans: 延长； 延伸； 电话分机， 分机号码

sentences.english: Can I have extension 316, please?
sentences.chinese: 能帮我接316号分机吗？

detailed_translations.english: one of many telephone lines connected to a central system in a large building, which all have different numbers

name: internal
trans: 内在的， 内部的； 国内的， 内政的； 内心的

sentences.english: We have no interest in interfering in the internal affairs of other countries.
sentences.chinese: 我们对干涉其他国家内政不感兴趣。

sentences.english: the threat to internal security
sentences.chinese: 对国内安全的威胁

sentences.english: internal markets
sentences.chinese: 国内市场

sentences.english: There’s to be an internal inquiry into the whole affair.
sentences.chinese: 对整个事件将进行内部调查。

detailed_translations.english: within a particular country

sentences.english: people of the same gender
sentences.chinese: 同性别的人

sentences.english: Discrimination on grounds of race or gender is forbidden.
sentences.chinese: 严禁种族歧视和性别歧视。

sentences.english: There may be gender differences in attitudes to paid work.
sentences.chinese: 对待有偿劳动的态度可能存在着性别差异。

sentences.english: traditional gender roles
sentences.chinese: 传统的性别角色

sentences.english: toys that do not reinforce gender stereotypes
sentences.chinese: 不强化性别模式化观念的玩具

sentences.english: a science fiction story dealing with gender issues
sentences.chinese: 以性别问题为题材的科幻故事

detailed_translations.english: the fact of being male or female

name: literary
trans: 文学的； 文人的， 书卷气的

sentences.english: a literary prize
sentences.chinese: 文学奖

detailed_translations.english: relating to literature

name: architect
trans: 建筑师； 设计师， 缔造者

sentences.english: But I am an architect.
sentences.chinese: 但是我是一名建筑师。

sentences.english: They commissioned an architect to design the new library.
sentences.chinese: 他们委托一位建筑师设计这座新图书馆。

sentences.english: The building was constructed from the design of that architect.
sentences.chinese: 这幢大楼是按那位建筑师的设计建造的。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to design buildings

sentences.english: The tumour was excised.
sentences.chinese: 肿瘤被切除了。

detailed_translations.english: to remove or get rid of something, especially by cutting it out
the government tax that is put on the goods that are produced and used inside a country

name: punch
trans: 重拳击打； 冲床， 打孔机

sentences.english: The guard punched my ticket and I got on.
sentences.chinese: 守卫在我的票上打孔后，我就上去了。

sentences.english: a hole punch
sentences.chinese: 打孔器

detailed_translations.english: to make a hole in something, using a metal tool or other sharp object
a metal tool for cutting holes or for pushing something into a small hole

name: across
trans: 穿过， 越过； 在对面

sentences.english: He walked across the field.
sentences.chinese: 他走过田地。

sentences.english: There's a bank right across the street.
sentences.chinese: 街对面就有一家银行。

detailed_translations.english: from one side to the other side of sth

name: flexibility
trans: 灵活性； 弹性， 韧性； 适应性

sentences.english: Employees expect flexibility in the workplace.
sentences.chinese: 员工们盼望工作安排有弹性。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to change or be changed easily to suit a different situation

name: mortgage
trans: 抵押贷款，按揭；抵押证书

sentences.english: Your building society or bank will help arrange a mortgage.
sentences.chinese: 你加入的购房互助协会或银行将会给你安排抵押贷款。

sentences.english: They’ve taken out a 30 year mortgage (= they will pay for their house over a period of 30 years ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们办理了一笔30年期的抵押贷款。

sentences.english: We decided to use Fred’s redundancy money to pay off the mortgage (= pay back all the money we borrowed for a mortgage ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们决定用弗雷德的遣散费来偿清抵押贷款。

sentences.english: Mortgage rates are set to rise again in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 抵押贷款利率到春季肯定还要上涨。

sentences.english: She was having trouble meeting her mortgage payments .
sentences.chinese: 她还抵押贷款有困难。

detailed_translations.english: a legal arrangement by which you borrow money from a bank or similar organization in order to buy a house, and pay back the money over a period of years

if you mortgage your home, land, or property, you borrow money, usually from a bank, and if you cannot pay back the money within a particular period of time, the bank has the right to sell your property in order to get the money you owe it

name: identity
trans: 身份； 特征， 特性； 同一性

sentences.english: The identity of the killer is still unknown.
sentences.chinese: 凶手的身份仍未查明。

detailed_translations.english: someone’s identity is their name or who they are

name: federal
trans: 联邦的； 联邦制的； 联邦政府的

sentences.english: Switzerland is a federal republic.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士是一个联邦共和国。

detailed_translations.english: a federal country or system of government consists of a group of states which control their own affairs, but which are also controlled by a single national government which makes decisions on foreign affairs, defence etc

sentences.english: I verified the source from which I had that information.
sentences.chinese: 我核实了我获知那条信息的来源。

sentences.english: His statement was verified by several witnesses.
sentences.chinese: 他的说法得到了几位证人的证实。

detailed_translations.english: to discover whether something is correct or true

sentences.english: They've gone on an excursion to York.
sentences.chinese: 他们到约克旅游去了。

detailed_translations.english: a short journey made for pleasure, especially one that has been organized for a group of people

name: inaugurate
trans: 为…举行就职典礼； 为…举行开幕式； 开始， 开创
