sentences.english: Presidents must swear allegiance to the US constitution.
sentences.chinese: 总统必须宣誓效忠美国宪法。

detailed_translations.english: to make a public official promise, especially in a court of law
to use rude and offensive language

name: atmosphere
trans: 大气， 大气层； 空气； 气氛， 氛围

sentences.english: The hotel had a lovely relaxed atmosphere .
sentences.chinese: 那家宾馆的气氛轻松愉快。

sentences.english: The atmosphere at home was rather tense.
sentences.chinese: 家里的气氛很紧张。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that an event or place gives you

sentences.english: The bathroom is decorated in green and yellow.
sentences.chinese: 浴室里是用绿色和黄色装潢的。

sentences.english: We plan to spend the weekend decorating.
sentences.chinese: 我们计划用这个周末来装修。

detailed_translations.english: to paint the inside of a room, put special paper on the walls etc

name: career
trans: 生涯， 经历； 职业

sentences.english: a teaching career
sentences.chinese: 教学事业

sentences.english: He realized that his acting career was over.
sentences.chinese: 他意识到自己的演艺事业已走到了尽头。

sentences.english: a physiotherapist who wanted to make a dramatic career change by becoming an author
sentences.chinese: 想彻底改行当作家的理疗师

sentences.english: Nurses want an improved career structure (= better opportunities to move upwards in their jobs ) .
sentences.chinese: 护士希望有更好的职业架构。

detailed_translations.english: the series of jobs that a person has in a particular area of work, usually involving more responsibility as time passes

name: slacken
trans: 松弛， 放松； 减缓， 放慢

sentences.english: The heavy rain showed no signs of slackening off.
sentences.chinese: 大雨没有减弱的迹象。

detailed_translations.chinese: 松劲，懈怠；变松弛；变缓慢
detailed_translations.english: to gradually become slower, weaker, less active etc, or to make something do this

name: release
trans: 释放； 发布， 公开； 发泄

sentences.english: Police arrested several men, who were later released.
sentences.chinese: 警察逮捕了几个人，后来都释放了。

sentences.english: The bears are eventually released into the wild.
sentences.chinese: 这些熊最后被放回野生环境中。

sentences.english: You need to release the tension in these shoulder muscles.
sentences.chinese: 你需要放松肩部肌肉。

sentences.english: The new trade figures have just been released.
sentences.chinese: 新的贸易数字刚刚公布。

detailed_translations.english: to let someone go free, after having kept them somewhere

name: charter
trans: 特许设立，给予特权；包租
纲领， 宣言； 宪章； 特许状

sentences.english: ...the last charter plane carrying out foreign nationals.
sentences.chinese: …运出外国侨民的最后一班包机。

detailed_translations.english: A charter plane or boat is one which is rented for use by a particular person or group and which is not part of a regular service

detailed_translations.chinese: 宪章，共同纲领；特许状，许可证；包租
detailed_translations.english: a statement of the principles, duties, and purposes of an organization
to pay a company for the use of their aircraft, boat etc

sentences.english: Phil has a deep and abiding love for his family.
sentences.chinese: 菲尔对家人怀有深厚不渝的爱。

detailed_translations.english: an abiding feeling or belief continues for a long time and is not likely to change

detailed_translations.chinese: 遵守；容忍；继续存在（abide的现在分词）

sentences.english: A few days later, our armies liberated the city.
sentences.chinese: 几天以后，我军解放了这座城市。

detailed_translations.english: to free prisoners, a city, a country etc from someone’s control

name: moral
trans: 道德的，道义上的；有道德的，品行端正的；精神的

sentences.english: It is easy to have an opinion on a moral issue like the death penalty for murder.
sentences.chinese: 对于判谋杀犯死刑这种涉及伦理道德的问题，有个观点并非难事。

sentences.english: If we accept that certain babies should be allowed to die, we place doctors in a moral dilemma .
sentences.chinese: 如果我们同意应该允许某些婴儿死去，那就是让医生在道德上处于两难境地了。

sentences.english: Man is gifted with a moral sense by which he distinguishes good from evil.
sentences.chinese: 人类天生有道德意识，能区分善与恶。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the principles of what is right and wrong behaviour, and with the difference between good and evil

detailed_translations.chinese: 品行， 道德规范； 寓意
detailed_translations.english: principles or standards of good behaviour, especially in matters of sex

sentences.english: ...despite a slight diminution in asset value.
sentences.chinese: ...尽管资产价值略有减少。

detailed_translations.english: a reduction in the size, number, or amount of something

name: aspire
trans: 有志于； 热望， 向往

sentences.english: ...people who aspire to public office.
sentences.chinese: …志在获得公职的人们。

detailed_translations.english: to desire and work towards achieving something important

name: explode
trans: 爆炸； 激增； 冲动， 发怒

sentences.english: The device was thrown at an army patrol but failed to explode.
sentences.chinese: 炸弹投向了陆军巡逻队，但没有爆炸。

sentences.english: Far sooner than anyone thought possible, the Russians exploded an atomic bomb.
sentences.chinese: 苏联引爆了一颗原子弹，大大早于任何人的预期。

detailed_translations.english: to burst, or to make something burst, into small pieces, usually with a loud noise and in a way that causes damage
to burst, or to make something burst, into small pieces, usually with a loud noise and in a way that causes damage

sentences.english: a cholera outbreak
sentences.chinese: 霍乱的爆发

detailed_translations.english: if there is an outbreak of fighting or disease in an area, it suddenly starts to happen

sentences.english: an afternoon nap
sentences.chinese: 午睡

detailed_translations.chinese: 小睡，打盹儿；细毛；孤注一掷
detailed_translations.english: a short sleep, especially during the day

name: manipulate
trans: 操作， 处理； 利用， 操纵

sentences.english: He was one of those men who manipulated people.
sentences.chinese: 他是那种要摆布别人的人。

sentences.english: You have the constant feeling you are being manipulated.
sentences.chinese: 你总感觉自己是被人控制着的。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone think and behave exactly as you want them to, by skilfully deceiving or influencing them

sentences.english: We have similar tastes in music.
sentences.chinese: 我们对音乐的品位相近。

sentences.english: Both approaches seem to achieve similar results.
sentences.chinese: 两种方法都得出了相似的结果。

sentences.english: A number of his friends had been affected in a similar way .
sentences.chinese: 他的一些朋友也受到了类似的影响。

sentences.english: The two products look quite similar .
sentences.chinese: 这两种产品看上去很相似。

detailed_translations.english: almost the same

sentences.english: an ecological disaster
sentences.chinese: 生态灾难

detailed_translations.english: connected with the way plants, animals, and people are related to each other and to their environment

name: contradict
trans: 反驳； 同…矛盾， 相抵触

sentences.english: Deborah opened her mouth to contradict, but closed it again.
sentences.chinese: 黛博拉张口想要反驳，但又把嘴闭上了。

sentences.english: Dad just can’t bear to be contradicted.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸就是受不了有人反驳他。

sentences.english: The article flatly contradicts their claims.
sentences.chinese: 这篇文章断然驳斥他们的说法。

detailed_translations.english: to disagree with something, especially by saying that the opposite is true

sentences.english: The picture is digitized by a scanner.
sentences.chinese: 该图通过扫描仪被数字化。

detailed_translations.english: to put information into a digital form

name: partnership
trans: 合伙； 伙伴关系； 合伙人身份

sentences.english: It’s one of the most successful partnerships in the country.
sentences.chinese: 它是该国最成功的合伙企业之一。

detailed_translations.chinese: 合伙；[经管] 合伙企业；合作关系；合伙契约
detailed_translations.english: the state of being a partner in business

name: shape
trans: 形状，外形，样子；体形，身材；形式；幻象；情况，状况
使成为…形状， 塑造； 决定…的形成

sentences.english: What shape is the table?
sentences.chinese: 那张桌子是什么形状的？

sentences.english: You can recognize a tree by the shape of its leaves.
sentences.chinese: 可以根据树叶的形状辨认出是什么树。

sentences.english: His battered old hat had completely lost its shape.
sentences.chinese: 他那顶破旧的帽子已经完全变形了。

sentences.english: The plants grow in every shape and size .
sentences.chinese: 这些植物有各种形状，各种大小。

sentences.english: The children cut out shapes (= squares, triangles etc ) from the piece of cardboard.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们把卡纸片剪成各种形状。

detailed_translations.english: the form that something has, for example round, square,  triangular  etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 形成；塑造，使成形；使符合
detailed_translations.english: to influence something such as a belief, opinion etc and make it develop in a particular way

sentences.english: Urge your child to verbalize his feelings.
sentences.chinese: 鼓励你的孩子用言语表达自己的情感。

detailed_translations.english: to express something in words

sentences.english: a momentous decision
sentences.chinese: 重大决定

sentences.english: Momentous events are taking place in the US.
sentences.chinese: 美国正在发生重大事件。

sentences.english: His colleagues all recognized that this was a momentous occasion .
sentences.chinese: 他的同事都认识到这是一个重要时刻。

sentences.english: one of the most momentous days in British sport
sentences.chinese: 英国体育事业最重要的日子之一

detailed_translations.english: a momentous event, change, or decision is very important because it will have a great influence on the future

name: specify
trans: 使具体化； 明确规定， 详细说明

sentences.english: Payments will be made for a specified number of months.
sentences.chinese: 款项将在规定的几个月内支付。

sentences.english: They specified a spacious entrance hall.
sentences.chinese: 他们明确要求门厅要宽敞。

detailed_translations.english: to state something in an exact and detailed way

name: allegiance
trans: 忠诚， 效忠， 拥戴

sentences.english: an oath of allegiance
sentences.chinese: 效忠宣誓

sentences.english: The people here have strong political allegiances .
sentences.chinese: 这里的民众政治忠诚度很高。

detailed_translations.english: loyalty to a leader, country, belief etc

sentences.english: I wanna be with you.
sentences.chinese: 我想要和你在一起。

sentences.english: I wanna save you, save you, save you tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我想要拯救你，拯救你，拯救你就在今晚。

sentences.english: Am I the one you wanna place in your heart – why me ?
sentences.chinese: 我是你想要放在心上的人吗？为什么是我？

name: crossing
trans: 十字路口， 人行横道； 过境处； 交叉点； 穿越， 横渡

sentences.english: You must give way to any pedestrians on the crossing.
sentences.chinese: 必须让人行横道上的行人先行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 人行横道， 交叉口； 横渡
detailed_translations.english: a place where you can safely cross a road, railway, river etc

name: relevance
trans: 有关， 相关； 中肯， 适当； 重大关系， 意义； 实用性

sentences.english: I think we can all appreciate the relevance of that now.
sentences.chinese: 我想，我们大家现在都能领会这句话中肯。

name: quarry
trans: 采石场，石矿；猎物，追捕的对象

sentences.english: a slate quarry
sentences.chinese: 板岩采石场

detailed_translations.english: a place where large amounts of stone or sand are dug out of the ground
to dig stone or sand from a quarry

sentences.english: a gravel path
sentences.chinese: 石子小道

detailed_translations.english: small stones, used to make a surface for paths, roads etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 用碎石铺；使船搁浅在沙滩上；使困惑

sentences.english: refugees suffering from malnutrition
sentences.chinese: 营养不良的难民

detailed_translations.english: when someone becomes ill or weak because they have not eaten enough good food

sentences.english: Alice submerged herself in work to try and forget about Tom.
sentences.chinese: 艾丽斯埋头工作，试图忘记汤姆。

detailed_translations.english: to make yourself very busy doing something, especially in order to forget about something else
to go under the surface of the water and be completely covered by it

name: converge
trans: 汇聚， 聚集， 聚合； 相交， 会合； 趋于一致

sentences.english: The two rivers converge into one near Pittsburgh.
sentences.chinese: 这两条河在匹兹堡附近汇合。

detailed_translations.chinese: 会合， 互相靠拢； 聚集， 集中； 趋近
detailed_translations.english: to come from different directions and meet at the same point to become one thing

name: pertinent
trans: 相关的； 恰当的， 贴切的

sentences.english: He asked me a lot of very pertinent questions .
sentences.chinese: 他问了我许多直接相关的问题。

detailed_translations.chinese: 相关的，相干的；中肯的；切题的
detailed_translations.english: directly relating to something that is being considered

name: compose
trans: 创作； 组成； 使安定

sentences.english: Barrington has composed the music for a new production of ‘A Midsummer Night’s Dream’.
sentences.chinese: 巴林顿为新版的《仲夏夜之梦》谱了曲。

sentences.english: Water is composed of hydrogen and oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 水由氢和氧组成。

detailed_translations.english: to write a piece of music

sentences.english: I/ you/ we/ they like giraffe.
sentences.chinese: 我/你/我们/他们喜欢长颈鹿。

sentences.english: So they sent me a … giraffe!
sentences.chinese: 于是他们又送我一只…长颈鹿。

sentences.english: Can I get the mommy giraffe for Christmas?
sentences.chinese: 我在圣诞节能得到一个长颈鹿妈妈吗？

detailed_translations.english: a tall African animal with a very long neck and legs and dark spots on its yellow-brown fur

sentences.english: supersonic aircraft
sentences.chinese: 超音速飞机

detailed_translations.english: faster than the speed of sound

name: cell
trans: 细胞； 基层组织； 单人房间； 电池

sentences.english: cancer cells
sentences.chinese: 癌细胞

sentences.english: Embryos grow by cell division (= the splitting of cells ) .
sentences.chinese: 胚胎通过细胞分裂而成长。

detailed_translations.english: the smallest part of a living thing that can exist independently

name: swell
trans: 波浪的涌动； 隆起； 增强， 增加

sentences.english: Her ankle was already starting to swell.
sentences.chinese: 她的脚踝已经开始肿起来了。

sentences.english: The window frame was swollen shut.
sentences.chinese: 窗框膨胀变形，关得死死的。

detailed_translations.english: to become larger and rounder than normal – used especially about parts of the body
the roundness or curved shape of something
very good

name: remind
trans: 提醒； 使想起； 使发生联想

sentences.english: Yes, I’ll be there. Thanks for reminding me.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我会去那里的。 谢谢提醒。

sentences.english: He made a few notes to remind himself of what he wanted to say.
sentences.chinese: 他记了几条，提醒自己要说些什么。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone remember something that they must do

name: crude
trans: 天然的， 未提炼的； 粗糙的； 粗俗的

sentences.english: a crude wooden bridge
sentences.chinese: 粗糙的木桥

sentences.english: crude oil/metal
sentences.chinese: 原油；未经提炼的金属

detailed_translations.english: not developed to a high standard, or made with little skill

name: valid
trans: 有根据的， 合理的； 有效的

sentences.english: a valid credit card
sentences.chinese: 有效信用卡

sentences.english: Your return ticket is valid for three months.
sentences.chinese: 你的往返票有效期为三个月。

sentences.english: Police officers must have a valid reason for stopping motorists.
sentences.chinese: 警察拦下驾车者必须有正当理由。

detailed_translations.english: that is legally or officially acceptable

name: withstand
trans: 经受住， 耐； 抵挡

sentences.english: The Chancellor has withstood the criticism and held firm.
sentences.chinese: 总理顶住批评，坚持立场。

detailed_translations.english: to defend yourself successfully against people who attack, criticize, or oppose you

sentences.english: Inertia carried the plane onto the ground.
sentences.chinese: 飞机靠惯性着陆。

sentences.english: I can't seem to throw off this feeling of inertia.
sentences.chinese: 我好像无法摆脱这种无力的感觉。

detailed_translations.english: the force that keeps an object in the same position or keeps it moving until it is moved or stopped by another force

name: epitomize
trans: 成为…的缩影； 摘要， 概括， 缩写

sentences.english: This building epitomizes the spirit of the nineteenth century.
sentences.chinese: 这栋建筑体现了19世纪的时代精神。

detailed_translations.english: to be a very typical example of something

name: wintry
trans: 冬天的； 寒冷的； 冷淡的

sentences.english: a wintry day
sentences.chinese: 一个冬日

sentences.english: wintry showers
sentences.chinese: 冬季的阵雪

detailed_translations.english: cold or typical of winter

name: encourage
trans: 鼓励， 激励； 促进， 激发

sentences.english: I want to thank everyone who has encouraged and supported me.
sentences.chinese: 我要感谢每一位鼓励和支持过我的人。

detailed_translations.english: to give someone the courage or confidence to do something

sentences.english: I vacuumed the carpets today.
sentences.chinese: 我今天用吸尘器清洁地毯了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 收集； 用真空吸尘器打扫
detailed_translations.english: to clean using a vacuum cleaner
a space that is completely empty of all gas, especially one from which all the air has been taken away

name: era
trans: 纪元， 年代， 时代； 代

sentences.english: His death marked the end of an era.
sentences.chinese: 他的去世标志着一个时代的终结。

sentences.english: the Victorian era
sentences.chinese: 维多利亚时代

detailed_translations.english: a period of time in history that is known for a particular event, or for particular qualities

name: administer
trans: 管理； 执行； 给予， 提供

sentences.english: The money will be administered by local charities.
sentences.chinese: 这笔资金将由当地慈善机构管理。

sentences.english: Our office administers the affairs of the Society.
sentences.chinese: 我们办公室管理协会的事务。

detailed_translations.english: to manage the work or money of a company or organization

name: transplant
trans: 移植； 使迁移， 使移居； 移栽， 移种

sentences.english: The operation to transplant a kidney is now fairly routine.
sentences.chinese: 移植肾脏的手术如今相当常见。

detailed_translations.english: to move an organ, piece of skin etc from one person’s body and put it into another as a form of medical treatment

detailed_translations.chinese: 移植；移植器官；被移植物；移居者
detailed_translations.english: the operation of transplanting an organ, piece of skin etc

name: deficit
trans: 不足额； 赤字， 逆差

sentences.english: the country’s widening budget deficit
sentences.chinese: 这个国家日益严重的预算赤字

sentences.english: the US’s foreign trade deficit
sentences.chinese: 美国的对外贸易逆差

detailed_translations.english: the difference between the amount of something that you have and the higher amount that you need

name: elegant
trans: 优美的， 高雅的； 雅致的， 精美的； 简练的， 简洁的

sentences.english: a tall, elegant young woman
sentences.chinese: 身材高挑、举止优雅的年轻女子

sentences.english: You can dine in elegant surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在雅致的环境中进餐。

detailed_translations.english: beautiful, attractive, or graceful

name: cohere
trans: 连贯， 一致； 黏合； 齐心协力， 团结一致

sentences.english: All the details are there and are correct but they don’t cohere.
sentences.chinese: 所有的细节都摆在那里，而且都正确，但是它们并不一致。

detailed_translations.chinese: 连贯， 一致； 黏合； 齐心协力， 团结一致
detailed_translations.english: if ideas, arguments, beliefs, statements etc cohere, they are connected in a clear and reasonable way

sentences.english: The gift, the snowflake, the starry sky, the moonlight all give you.
sentences.chinese: 礼物，雪花，满天星斗的天空，在月光下的所有给你。

sentences.english: Bell is my greetings, singing is my blessing, snowflake is my card, wine is my kiss, the breeze is I embrace, happiness is my gift!
sentences.chinese: 钟声是我的问候，歌声是我的祝福，雪花是我的贺卡，美酒是我的飞吻，清风是我的拥抱，快乐是我的礼物！

sentences.english: Moonlight Christmas and snowflake bless my speech as you, I give you with blessings, are you happy?
sentences.chinese: 圣诞的月光和雪花都不如你祝福我的话语，我把同的祝福给你，你快乐吗？

detailed_translations.english: a small soft flat piece of frozen water that falls as snow

name: linger
trans: 徘徊， 流连； 继续存留； 缓慢消失

sentences.english: He surprised all the doctors by lingering on for several weeks.
sentences.chinese: 他拖了几个星期才去世，让所有的医生都很惊讶。

detailed_translations.english: to continue looking at or dealing with something for longer than is usual or desirable

sentences.english: One day a grasshopper came upon an ant at work in a garden.
sentences.chinese: 一天， 蚱蜢碰到了一只正在花园里干活的蚂蚁。

sentences.english: I remember that it was summer. I had just come inside from catching grasshoppers and I was sorting them on my sister's bed because I didn't want to get grasshopper guts on mine.
sentences.chinese: 我记得那是夏天，我抓了些蝗虫放到妹妹的床上，根据它们还剩下几只脚来归类，有些蝗虫的内脏都冒出来了，我当然不想弄到自己的床上。

detailed_translations.english: an insect that has long back legs for jumping and that makes short loud noises

name: dispel
trans: 驱散， 驱逐； 消除

sentences.english: We want to dispel the myth that you cannot eat well in Britain.
sentences.chinese: 我们要消除在英国吃不好的误解。

sentences.english: Light poured into the hall, dispelling the shadows.
sentences.chinese: 阳光洒进大厅，驱散了阴影。

detailed_translations.english: to make something go away, especially a belief, idea, or feeling

name: slip
trans: 滑倒，失足；滑落；悄悄疾行，溜；摆脱；下降，跌落；陷入
差错， 纰漏； 滑倒； 纸片

sentences.english: Ben slipped quietly out of the room.
sentences.chinese: 本悄悄地溜出了房间。

sentences.english: One man managed to slip from the club as police arrived.
sentences.chinese: 警察到来时，一个男子设法溜出了俱乐部。

sentences.english: We must be well prepared, there must be no slips.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须好好准备，一定不要有差错。

detailed_translations.chinese: 滑跤，滑落，溜；下降，跌落；悄悄放进
detailed_translations.english: to go somewhere, without attracting other people’s attention
A slip is a small or unimportant mistake

sentences.english: Seven species of birds of prey have been observed.
sentences.chinese: 已有七种猛禽被观察到。

sentences.english: pandas and other endangered species
sentences.chinese: 熊猫以及其他濒危物种

detailed_translations.english: a group of animals or plants whose members are similar and can breed together to produce young animals or plants

name: anchor
trans: 抛锚；使固定；扎根，基于；主持
锚； 给人安全感的物， 精神支柱

sentences.english: We dropped anchor a few yards offshore.
sentences.chinese: 我们在离岸几码远的地方抛锚停航。

sentences.english: The next morning, they weighed anchor (=  lifted the anchor  ) and began to move south again.
sentences.chinese: 第二天早上他们起锚，又开始向南航行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 锚；抛锚停泊；靠山；新闻节目主播
detailed_translations.english: a piece of heavy metal that is lowered to the bottom of the sea, a lake etc to prevent a ship or boat moving
to fasten something firmly so that it cannot move

sentences.english: the Labour Party’s election manifesto
sentences.chinese: 工党的竞选宣言

sentences.english: The Tories are due to publish their manifesto tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 保守党将于明天发表他们的宣言。

detailed_translations.english: a written statement by a political party, saying what they believe in and what they intend to do

sentences.english: a desperate bid to quench the raging flames
sentences.chinese: 为扑灭熊熊大火而不顾一切的努力

detailed_translations.english: to stop a fire from burning

name: spice
trans: 加香料于； 给…增添趣味

sentences.english: herbs and spices
sentences.chinese: 香草和香料

detailed_translations.english: a type of powder or seed, taken from plants, that you put into food you are cooking to give it a special taste
to add interest or excitement to something

sentences.english: I’ve learned as much about teaching from learning about marketing as I have from studying pedagogy – maybe more.
sentences.chinese: 我从销售上学到的有关教育的东西和我研究教育学时候学到的一样多——可能更多。

sentences.english: They are making progress by investing in research, reforming traditional approaches to curricula and pedagogy, and beginning to attract outstanding faculty from abroad.
sentences.chinese: 他们必然要斥巨资投入研究，改革现就的传统的教育模式和课程设置，并积极吸引外国外国教员。

detailed_translations.english: the practice of teaching or the study of teaching

sentences.english: a computer with an 18-inch colour screen
sentences.chinese: 带18英寸彩色屏幕的电脑

sentences.english: He went on staring at the TV screen .
sentences.chinese: 他继续盯着电视屏幕看。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a television or computer where the picture or information appears

detailed_translations.chinese: 掩蔽， 遮蔽； 放映， 播放； 审查， 甄别
detailed_translations.english: if something screens something else, it is in front of it and hides it

name: autonomous
trans: 自治的； 独立自主的

sentences.english: They proudly declared themselves part of a new autonomous province.
sentences.chinese: 他们自豪地宣布自己是新自治省的一部分。

detailed_translations.english: an autonomous place or organization is free to govern or control itself

name: naked
trans: 裸露的， 无遮盖的； 直白的， 露骨的， 不加掩饰的

sentences.english: The children ran naked through the yard.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们光着身子跑过院子。

sentences.english: a picture of a naked man
sentences.chinese: 裸体男子的照片

sentences.english: They found the body lying half naked in the grass.
sentences.chinese: 他们发现尸体半裸着躺在草丛中。

sentences.english: The governor ordered the prisoner to be stripped naked and whipped.
sentences.chinese: 监狱长下令将那个犯人剥光衣服进行鞭笞。

detailed_translations.english: not wearing any clothes or not covered by clothes

sentences.english: the vibrations from the earthquake
sentences.chinese: 地震引起的震动

sentences.english: The microscope must be free from vibration.
sentences.chinese: 显微镜一定要避免震动。

detailed_translations.english: a continuous slight shaking movement

name: aerial
trans: 空中的，地表以上的；从飞行器上的

sentences.english: an aerial attack
sentences.chinese: 空袭

sentences.english: aerial photographs
sentences.chinese: 在空中拍摄的照片

sentences.english: an aerial view of the Three Gorges Dam project
sentences.chinese: 一张三峡大坝工程鸟瞰图

detailed_translations.chinese: 飞机的，航空的；空中的，架空的
detailed_translations.english: from a plane
a piece of equipment for receiving or sending radio or television signals, usually consisting of a piece of metal or wire

name: trial
trans: 审讯； 试验， 试用； 令人伤脑筋的人

sentences.english: The trial is due to start next week.
sentences.chinese: 审理定于下周开始。

detailed_translations.chinese: 试， 试验； 审判； 讨厌的人
detailed_translations.english: a legal process in which a judge and often a  jury  in a court of law examine information to decide whether someone is guilty of a crime

name: perception
trans: 感知， 感觉； 认识， 观念； 洞察力

sentences.english: And when they do, what do you think their perception will be?
sentences.chinese: 当他们这样做时，你觉得他们的知觉是怎样的？

detailed_translations.english: Perception is the recognition of things using your senses, especially the sense of sight

sentences.english: The trial was given saturation coverage by the press.
sentences.chinese: 报刊对这次审讯进行了连篇累牍的报道。

sentences.english: saturation advertising
sentences.chinese: 铺天盖地的广告

detailed_translations.chinese: 饱和；色饱和度；浸透；磁化饱和
detailed_translations.english: when an event or person is given so much attention by newspapers, television etc that everyone has heard about it

name: stylistic
trans: 风格上的， 文体上的

sentences.english: the sculptor’s stylistic development
sentences.chinese: 这位雕刻家艺术风格上的发展

detailed_translations.chinese: 体裁上的；格式上的；文体论的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the particular way an artist, writer, musician etc makes or performs something, especially the technical features or methods they use

name: undertake
trans: 承担； 进行， 从事

sentences.english: University professors both teach and undertake research.
sentences.chinese: 大学教授既要教学又要从事研究工作。

sentences.english: He undertook to pay the money back in six months.
sentences.chinese: 他保证在六个月之内还钱。

detailed_translations.english: to make yourself responsible for sth and start doing it

name: optimize
trans: 使最优化； 充分利用

sentences.english: They need to optimize the use of available resources.
sentences.chinese: 他们需要充分利用手上的资源。

detailed_translations.english: to improve the way that something is done or used so that it is as effective as possible

name: indigenous
trans: 本地的， 本土的； 土产的； 土著的

sentences.english: the many indigenous cultures which existed in Siberia
sentences.chinese: 存在于西伯利亚的许多当地文化

detailed_translations.chinese: 本土的；土著的；国产的；固有的
detailed_translations.english: indigenous people or things have always been in the place where they are, rather than being brought there from somewhere else

name: visualize
trans: 想象， 使形象化； 构思

sentences.english: I tried to visualize the house while he was describing it.
sentences.chinese: 我一边听他描述，一边想象那房子的样子。

detailed_translations.english: to form a picture of someone or something in your mind

name: rejuvenate
trans: 使年轻； 使恢复活力

sentences.english: I came back from holiday feeling rejuvenated.
sentences.chinese: 我度假回来，感到恢复了活力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使年轻；使更新；使恢复精神；使复原
detailed_translations.english: to make someone look or feel young and strong again

sentences.english: The Scheme: When times get tough, write your obituary.
sentences.chinese: 方案：当时间不允许时，撰写你的讣告。

detailed_translations.english: an article in a newspaper about the life of someone who has just died

name: bureau
trans: 局， 署； 办公室； 机构

sentences.english: an employment bureau
sentences.chinese: 职业介绍所

sentences.english: the Citizens Advice Bureau
sentences.chinese: 公民咨询局

detailed_translations.english: an office or organization that collects or provides information

sentences.english: Make sure the soil is moist before planting the seeds.
sentences.chinese: 播种之前要确保土壤湿润。

sentences.english: a rich, moist chocolate cake
sentences.chinese: 香浓软润的巧克力蛋糕

sentences.english: warm moist air
sentences.chinese: 温暖湿润的空气

sentences.english: Her eyes were moist (= she was almost crying ) .
sentences.chinese: 她的眼睛湿润了。

detailed_translations.english: slightly wet, especially in a way that is pleasant or suitable

name: cable
trans: 给…发电报， 用电报传送

sentences.english: The miners rode a conveyance attached to a cable made of braided steel wire.
sentences.chinese: 矿工们乘坐连着钢索的缆车。

sentences.english: cables and switches for computers
sentences.chinese: 电脑的缆线和开关

sentences.english: She sent a cable to her mother.
sentences.chinese: 她给母亲发了封电报。

detailed_translations.english: a thick strong metal rope used on ships, to support bridges etc

name: intense
trans: 强烈的； 热切的； 激烈的

sentences.english: Young people today are under intense pressure to succeed.
sentences.chinese: 如今的年轻人面临要出人头地的巨大压力。

sentences.english: the intense heat of the desert
sentences.chinese: 沙漠的炽热

sentences.english: The pain was so intense I couldn’t sleep.
sentences.chinese: 疼得我都睡不着觉。

sentences.english: He took an intense interest in all religious matters.
sentences.chinese: 他对所有宗教事宜都很感兴趣。

sentences.english: a look of intense dislike
sentences.chinese: 极端厌恶的表情

sentences.english: The job demands intense concentration.
sentences.chinese: 这工作需要全神贯注。

detailed_translations.english: having a very strong effect or felt very strongly

sentences.english: hard-working, thrifty people
sentences.chinese: 勤劳节俭的人们

detailed_translations.english: using money carefully and wisely

sentences.english: Her dog yelped and came to heel.
sentences.chinese: 她的狗汪地叫了一声，紧跟了上来。

detailed_translations.english: If a person or dog yelps, they give a sudden short cry, often because of fear or pain
a short sharp high cry which a person or an animal makes because they are excited, in pain, surprised etc

name: estate
trans: 地产； 庄园； 个人财产， 遗产

sentences.english: a country estate
sentences.chinese: 乡村的庄园

detailed_translations.chinese: 土地， 住宅区， 地产； 财产， 遗产； 庄园， 种植园
detailed_translations.english: a large area of land in the country, usually with one large house on it and one owner

name: acoustic
trans: 非电声乐器的， 原声的； 听觉的， 声音的

sentences.english: In our case, we have found the true acoustic echo beacon.
sentences.chinese: 但在这种情况下，我们发现了真正的声学‘回声灯塔’ ”。

sentences.english: This gives it excellent thermal and acoustic properties, but the suitability of the product for a large-scale commercial project was questioned.
sentences.chinese: 这给了它出色的热学和声学属性，但是这种产品是否适合于一个大尺度的商业项目还是个问题。

detailed_translations.chinese: 有关声音的, 声学的
detailed_translations.english: relating to sound and the way people hear things

name: articulate
trans: 善于表达的； 发音清晰的， 口齿清楚的
明确表达， 清楚说明； 清晰地吐， 清晰地发； 用关节连接

sentences.english: Many people are unable to articulate the unhappiness they feel.
sentences.chinese: 许多人都表达不出内心的痛苦。

detailed_translations.chinese: 清晰地发（音）；明确有力地表达；用关节连接；使相互连贯
detailed_translations.english: to express your ideas or feelings in words

detailed_translations.chinese: 发音清晰的；口才好的；有关节的
detailed_translations.english: writing or speech that is articulate is very clear and easy to understand even if the subject is difficult

sentences.english: an old brass bedstead
sentences.chinese: 老式黄铜床架

sentences.english: to clean/polish the brass
sentences.chinese: 擦净 / 擦亮黄铜器

detailed_translations.english: a very hard bright yellow metal that is a mixture of  copper  and  zinc

name: dignify
trans: 使有尊严， 使高贵； 美化

sentences.english: Tragic literature dignifies sorrow and disaster.
sentences.chinese: 悲剧性文学使悲伤和灾难显得尊贵。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使高贵；增威严；授以荣誉

name: bluster
trans: 虚张声势地恫吓； 猛刮

detailed_translations.chinese: 虚张声势地恫吓； 猛刮

sentences.english: two minutes to traverse the park
sentences.chinese: 两分钟横穿公园

detailed_translations.english: a sideways movement across a very steep slope in mountain-climbing

detailed_translations.chinese: 穿过；反对；详细研究；在…来回移动
detailed_translations.english: to move across, over, or through something, especially an area of land or water

name: impending
trans: 即将发生的， 迫近的

sentences.english: On the morning of the expedition, I awoke with a feeling of impending disaster.
sentences.chinese: 远征出发的那天早上，我醒来就有一种大难临头的感觉。

detailed_translations.chinese: 即将发生的；迫切的；悬挂的
detailed_translations.english: an impending event or situation, especially an unpleasant one, is going to happen very soon

name: rigorous
trans: 缜密的， 谨慎的； 严格的， 严厉的

sentences.english: a rigorous analysis of defence needs
sentences.chinese: 对国防需求的缜密分析

sentences.english: the rigorous standards required by the college
sentences.chinese: 大学规定的严格标准

detailed_translations.english: careful, thorough, and exact

sentences.english: Players use the cursor to grab, bend, pull, and wiggle the chain of amino acids anywhere along its length, folding the protein into its optimum shape.
sentences.chinese: 玩家们用光标沿着链长方向在任意位置上抓取、弯曲、拉伸和摆动氨基酸链，把蛋白质折叠成最合适的形状。

sentences.english: Each codon either codes for an amino acid or tells the cell to stop making a protein chain.
sentences.chinese: 每一个密码子或者编码一种氨基酸，或者告诉这些细胞停止生产这个蛋白质链。

sentences.english: The vitamins were chosen because they control the amounts of an amino acid called homocysteine in the blood.
sentences.chinese: 选用维生素是因为他们控制了血液中一种叫高半胱氨酸的氨基酸的含量。

sentences.english: amino group or radical
amino acid

detailed_translations.english: of, consisting of, or containing the group of atoms -NH2

name: secular
trans: 现世的； 世俗的； 非宗教的

sentences.english: secular education
sentences.chinese: 世俗教育

sentences.english: our modern secular society
sentences.chinese: 我们的现代世俗社会

detailed_translations.chinese: 世俗的；长期的；现世的；不朽的
detailed_translations.english: not connected with or controlled by a church or other religious authority

detailed_translations.chinese: 修道院外的教士，(对宗教家而言的) 俗人

sentences.english: Cooking fumes may activate the alarm.
sentences.chinese: 烹调时的油烟可能会触发警报器。

sentences.english: The yeast’s growth is activated by sugar and warmth.
sentences.chinese: 糖分和温暖的环境会激发酵母菌的生长。

detailed_translations.chinese: 刺激；使活动；使活泼；使产生放射性
detailed_translations.english: to make an electrical system or chemical process start working

name: strenuous
trans: 费劲的， 费力的， 艰苦的； 精力充沛的； 奋力的

sentences.english: a strenuous climb
sentences.chinese: 艰难的攀登

sentences.english: The doctor advised Ken to avoid strenuous exercise.
sentences.chinese: 医生建议肯避免剧烈运动。

detailed_translations.chinese: 紧张的；费力的；奋发的；艰苦的；热烈的
detailed_translations.english: needing a lot of effort or strength

name: lethargy
trans: 死气沉沉； 无精打采， 倦怠

sentences.english: New mothers often complain of lethargy and mild depression.
sentences.chinese: 初为人母者经常抱怨说身体疲倦乏力，有轻微的抑郁。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being lethargic

name: amusement
trans: 可笑； 娱乐， 消遣

sentences.english: Steve couldn’t hide his amusement.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫忍俊不禁。

sentences.english: The cats are a constant source of amusement to us.
sentences.chinese: 那些猫给我们带来无穷的乐趣。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling you have when you think something is funny

sentences.english: National boundaries are becoming increasingly meaningless in the global economy.
sentences.chinese: 在全球经济中，国界已经变得越来越没有意义。

sentences.english: We would need their agreement to build outside the city boundary .
sentences.chinese: 我们在市界以外的地方建房需要他们批准。

sentences.english: The stream curves round to mark the boundary of his property.
sentences.chinese: 小河打了个弯，为他这块地划出了边界。

sentences.english: Anything that crosses the boundary of a black hole cannot get back.
sentences.chinese: 任何物质只要跨越黑洞的界线就再也无法出来。

sentences.english: We walked through the churchyard towards the boundary wall .
sentences.chinese: 我们穿过教堂墓地，向院墙走去。

sentences.english: The property’s boundary line is 25 feet from the back of the house.
sentences.chinese: 这块地产的边界线在屋后25英尺的地方。

sentences.english: boundary disputes between neighbouring countries
sentences.chinese: 邻国之间的边界争端

detailed_translations.english: the real or imaginary line that marks the edge of a state, country etc, or the edge of an area of land that belongs to someone

name: shame
trans: 羞耻，羞愧，耻辱；可耻的人

sentences.english: He felt a deep sense of shame.
sentences.chinese: 他深深地感到羞愧。

sentences.english: Maria blushed with shame.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚羞得脸都红了。

sentences.english: (= it made her feel ashamed ) , she gained back all the weight she’d lost.
sentences.chinese: 让她感到惭愧的是，她减掉的体重全又长回来了。

sentences.english: He’s brought shame on the whole family.
sentences.chinese: 他使全家蒙羞。

sentences.english: (= it should not make you feel ashamed ) saying ‘I don’t know’.
sentences.chinese: 说一句"我不知道”也没什么可难为情的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 羞耻，羞愧；憾事，带来耻辱的人
detailed_translations.english: the feeling you have when you feel guilty and embarrassed because you, or someone who is close to you, have done something wrong
to make someone feel ashamed

name: endow
trans: 使天生具有， 赋予； 资助， 捐赠

sentences.english: The ambassador has endowed a $1 million public-service fellowships programme.
sentences.chinese: 大使资助了一个100万美元的公共服务奖学金项目。

sentences.english: You are endowed with wealth, good health and a lively intellect.
sentences.chinese: 你天生赋有财富、健康，和敏锐的智力。

detailed_translations.english: to give a college, hospital etc a large sum of money that provides it with an income

name: precipitate
trans: 使…突然降临；加速；降水；使突然陷入；

sentences.english: The riot was precipitated when four black men were arrested.
sentences.chinese: 这场骚乱是因为四名黑人男子的被捕而突然引发的。

sentences.english: I don't think we should make precipitate decisions.
sentences.chinese: 我认为我们不应该做出仓促的决定。

detailed_translations.english: a solid substance that has been chemically separated from a liquid

detailed_translations.chinese: 使沉淀；促成；猛抛；使陷入
detailed_translations.english: to make something serious happen suddenly or more quickly than was expected

detailed_translations.chinese: 突如其来的；猛地落下的；急促的
detailed_translations.english: A precipitate action or decision happens or is made more quickly or suddenly than most people think is sensible

sentences.english: That culture was characterized by fear, intimidation, favoritism, a very ego-centric CEO.
sentences.chinese: 之前那种文化的特征是：敬畏、威胁、徇私，还有一位以自我为中心的首席执行官。

sentences.english: In 2013, the company began to expand the software R & D team, for various industries, to expand the RFID technology centric industry solutions.
sentences.chinese: 2013年，公司开始扩大软件研发团队，面向各个行业，扩展以RFID技术为中心的行业解决方案。

sentences.english: An automatic tracing centric wavelength demodulation system based on the edge filter which can measure the wavelength of the narrow-band back-reflected spectrum FBG is described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种基于边缘滤波器，可带中心波长自动跟踪，主要应用于海底水声信号的检测的光纤光栅波长解调器。

detailed_translations.english: being central or having a centre

name: mandate
trans: 授权；委托书，授权令；任期

sentences.english: Matters debated in meetings do not become a mandate automatically.
sentences.chinese: 会议上讨论的事宜并不能自动成为一项指令。

detailed_translations.chinese: 授权；命令，指令；委托管理；受命进行的工作
detailed_translations.english: if a government or official has a mandate to make important decisions, they have the authority to make the decisions because they have been elected by the people to do so
to give someone the right or power to do something

name: slog
trans: 艰难行进； 埋头苦干； 猛击

sentences.english: He’s been slogging round the streets delivering catalogues.
sentences.chinese: 他奔波在街头递送商品目录。

detailed_translations.chinese: 艰难行进； 埋头苦干； 猛击
detailed_translations.english: to make a long hard journey somewhere, especially on foot

name: financial
trans: 财政的， 财务的， 金融的

sentences.english: financial transactions
sentences.chinese: 财务往来

sentences.english: financial assistance
sentences.chinese: 财务援助

sentences.english: a financial advisor
sentences.chinese: 财务顾问

sentences.english: Organic farmers should be encouraged with financial incentives.
sentences.chinese: 应对实行有机栽培的农民给予经济上的鼓励。

sentences.english: It was a wonderful film, but not exactly a financial success (= something that makes a profit ) .
sentences.chinese: 这是一部出色的影片，但在票房上不是很成功。

detailed_translations.english: relating to money or the management of money

sentences.english: We all went back to our respective homes to wait for news.
sentences.chinese: 我们都各自回家等待消息。

sentences.english: the respective roles of teachers and students
sentences.chinese: 教师和学生各自不同的角色

detailed_translations.english: used before a plural noun to refer to the different things that belong to each separate person or thing mentioned

name: inactivate
trans: 使不活动， 使不活跃

detailed_translations.chinese: 使不活泼, 阻止活动
detailed_translations.english: to render inactive

sentences.english: The scandal was widely reported in the national media .
sentences.chinese: 这一丑闻在全国媒体上被广泛报道。

sentences.english: The role of the news media in forming public opinion is very important.
sentences.chinese: 新闻媒体对于社会舆论的形成具有非常重要的作用。

sentences.english: The 11-day trial generated intense media interest .
sentences.chinese: 11天的审讯引起了媒体的高度关注。

sentences.english: A great deal of media hype surrounded the release of the group’s latest CD.
sentences.chinese: 媒体对这个组合最新唱片的发行进行了大肆炒作。

sentences.english: There will be another war somewhere else and the whole international media circus will move on.
sentences.chinese: 别的地方还会有战争，全球的媒体又会一窝蜂地拥过去。

detailed_translations.chinese: 新闻媒介， 传播媒介
detailed_translations.english: all the organizations, such as television, radio, and newspapers, that provide news and information for the public, or the people who do this work

name: exalt
trans: 高度赞扬， 褒扬； 提升， 提拔

sentences.english: But it can also inspire and uplift and exalt, because power can be used to help people accomplish marvelous things.
sentences.chinese: 但是，权力也可以激励人、振奋人和提升人，因为它可以帮助人们成就非同寻常的事业。

detailed_translations.english: to put someone or something into a high rank or position

name: reversible
trans: 可逆的， 可翻转的； 正反两用的； 可恢复原状的

sentences.english: A lot of chemical reactions are reversible.
sentences.chinese: 很多化学反应都是可逆的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可逆的；可撤消的；可反转的
detailed_translations.english: a change that is reversible can be changed back to how it was before

name: define
trans: 定义， 解释； 限定

sentences.english: the ability to define clients’ needs
sentences.chinese: 确定客户需求的能力

sentences.english: The duties of the post are difficult to define.
sentences.chinese: 这一职位的职责很难界定。

sentences.english: Define precisely what you mean by ‘crime’.
sentences.chinese: 把你说的 “犯罪” 明确定义一下。

detailed_translations.english: to describe something correctly and thoroughly, and to say what standards, limits, qualities etc it has that make it different from other things

sentences.english: Federal funds have to be used as dictated by Washington.
sentences.chinese: 联邦款项得按照华盛顿规定的途径使用。

sentences.english: The US government attempted to dictate the terms of the agreement.
sentences.chinese: 美国政府企图规定协议的条款。

sentences.english: teenagers following the dictates of fashion
sentences.chinese: 赶时髦的青少年

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone exactly what they must do or how they must behave
an order, rule, or principle that you have to obey

sentences.english: Papa flicked the ash from his cigar.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸弹去雪茄上的烟灰。

detailed_translations.chinese: 轻弹；忽然摇动；轻轻拂去
detailed_translations.english: to make something move away by hitting or pushing it suddenly or quickly, especially with your thumb and finger

detailed_translations.chinese: 弹开；快速的轻打；轻打声
detailed_translations.english: a short quick sudden movement or hit with a part of your body, whip etc

name: memorize
trans: 记住， 记忆， 熟记

sentences.english: He studied his map, trying to memorize the way to Rose's street.
sentences.chinese: 他研究了地图，努力记住去罗丝家那条街的路。

detailed_translations.english: to learn words, music etc so that you know them perfectly

name: render
trans: 给予， 提供； 致使； 递交， 呈献； 表达； 翻译

sentences.english: an obligation to render assistance to those in need
sentences.chinese: 为有困难的人提供援助的义务

sentences.english: a bill of $3,200 for services rendered
sentences.chinese: 一张3,200美元服务费的账单

detailed_translations.english: to give something to someone or do something, because it is your duty or because someone expects you to

name: haven
trans: 港口； 庇护所， 避难所； 栖息处

sentences.english: ...Lake Baringo, a freshwater haven for a mixed variety of birds.
sentences.chinese: …百瑞高湖，一个适合各种鸟类的淡水栖息地。

detailed_translations.english: a place where people or animals can live peacefully or go to in order to be safe

detailed_translations.chinese: 为……提供避难处；安置……于港中

sentences.english: Inert gases like neon and argon have eight electrons in their outer shell.
sentences.chinese: 像氖和氩这样的惰性气体，在它们的外电子层有8个电子。

detailed_translations.english: a colourless gas that is found in small quantities in the air and is used in glass tubes to produce a bright light in electric advertising signs. It is a chemical element: symbol Ne

sentences.english: The shareholders have manifested their intention to sell the shares.
sentences.chinese: 股东们表明了要出售股票的意图。

detailed_translations.english: to show a feeling, attitude etc
a list of passengers or goods carried on a ship, plane, or train
plain and easy to see

name: relieve
trans: 缓解， 减轻； 使轻松， 使宽慰； 调剂； 接替， 换班

sentences.english: Drugs helped to relieve the pain.
sentences.chinese: 药物有助于舒缓疼痛。

sentences.english: A secretary was hired to relieve her of some of the administrative work.
sentences.chinese: 一个秘书被雇来为她减轻一些行政工作的负担。

detailed_translations.english: to reduce someone’s pain or unpleasant feelings

sentences.english: The hunter trailed the wounded buffalo through the bush.
sentences.chinese: 猎人在灌木丛中追踪那只受伤的美洲野牛。

sentences.english: To remind American citizens to protect the environment, the government issued this buffalo nickel.
sentences.chinese: 为了提醒美国公民保护环境，政府就发行了这种野牛镍币。

sentences.english: Humans then may develop living communities where the deer, buffalo, elk and bear, or elephant, giraffe and hippo freely roam again.
sentences.chinese: 或许有一天，人类会组织生活社区，在那里鹿、野牛、麋鹿、熊、大象、长颈鹿和河马会再一次自由倘佯。

detailed_translations.english: an African animal similar to a large cow with long curved horns

sentences.english: We always endeavor to please our customers.
sentences.chinese: 我们总是竭尽全力让顾客满意。

sentences.english: an outstanding example of human endeavor
sentences.chinese: 人类努力进取的突出例证

detailed_translations.english: to try very hard
an attempt to do something new or difficult

sentences.english: quartz crystals
sentences.chinese: 石英晶体

sentences.english: a quartz watch
sentences.chinese: 石英表

detailed_translations.english: a hard mineral substance that is used in making electronic watches and clocks

sentences.english: Living together as a prelude to marriage is now considered acceptable in many countries.
sentences.chinese: 婚前同居如今在许多国家都已被接受。

detailed_translations.english: if an event is a prelude to a more important event, it happens just before it and makes people expect it

detailed_translations.chinese: 成为…的序幕；演奏…作为前奏曲

sentences.english: We stayed in adjacent rooms.
sentences.chinese: 我们住在毗连的房间里。

sentences.english: the building adjacent to the library
sentences.chinese: 紧挨着图书馆的建筑

detailed_translations.english: (of an area, a building, a room, etc.) next to or near sth

name: transport
trans: 运输； 运输系统， 运载工具

sentences.english: trucks used for transporting oil
sentences.chinese: 运输石油的卡车

sentences.english: Canals were used for the transport of goods.
sentences.chinese: 利用运河来运输货物。

detailed_translations.english: to take goods, people etc from one place to another in a vehicle
the process or business of taking goods from one place to another
a surly or bad-tempered person

name: specific
trans: 明确的， 具体的； 特定的， 特有的

sentences.english: games suitable for specific age groups
sentences.chinese: 适合特定年龄组的游戏

sentences.english: a specific example of alcohol’s effect on the body
sentences.chinese: 酒精对身体影响的具体例子

detailed_translations.english: a specific thing, person, or group is one particular thing, person, or group
particular details

sentences.english: I fell down the steps and sprained my ankle .
sentences.chinese: 我从台阶上摔下来，扭伤了脚踝。

sentences.english: Rubin suffered a right ankle sprain when she rolled over on her ankle.
sentences.chinese: 鲁宾摔倒时身体压到了脚踝上导致右脚踝扭伤。

detailed_translations.english: to damage a joint in your body by suddenly twisting it
A sprain is the injury caused by spraining a joint

name: prioritize
trans: 划分优先顺序； 优先处理

sentences.english: You need to prioritize your tasks.
sentences.chinese: 你需要按照轻重缓急安排自己的工作。

detailed_translations.english: to put several things, problems etc in order of importance, so that you can deal with the most important ones first

name: engage
trans: 从事于， 忙于； 吸引； 订婚； 聘用

sentences.english: She engaged the clutch and the car moved.
sentences.chinese: 她踩下离合器，汽车便开动了。

sentences.english: The wheel engages with the cog and turns it.
sentences.chinese: 轮子咬住轮齿并带动它转动。

detailed_translations.english: if you engage part of a machine, or if it engages, it moves so that it fits into another part of the machine

name: adroit
trans: 精明的， 干练的； 熟练的， 灵巧的

sentences.english: an adroit negotiator
sentences.chinese: 一个谈判高手

detailed_translations.english: clever and skilful, especially in the way you use words and arguments

name: appetite
trans: 胃口， 食欲； 欲望

sentences.english: Her husband always had a huge appetite.
sentences.chinese: 她丈夫向来胃口极大。

sentences.english: Symptoms include tiredness and loss of appetite.
sentences.chinese: 症状包括疲倦和食欲不振。

detailed_translations.english: a desire for food

sentences.english: I don’t think such frivolity helps the organization’s public image.
sentences.chinese: 我认为这种愚蠢的行为无益于这个组织的公众形象。

detailed_translations.english: behaviour or activities that are not serious or sensible, especially when you should be serious or sensible

sentences.english: the government’s long-term economic strategy
sentences.chinese: 政府的长期经济策略

sentences.english: a company’s business strategy
sentences.chinese: 公司的经营策略

detailed_translations.english: a planned series of actions for achieving something

name: remainder
trans: 剩余物， 残余； 其他的人； 差数， 余数

sentences.english: The remainder must be paid by the end of June.
sentences.chinese: 剩余款项必须在6月底之前支付。

detailed_translations.chinese: [数] 余数，残余；剩余物；其余的人
detailed_translations.english: the part of something that is left after everything else has gone or been dealt with

name: clumsy
trans: 笨拙的； 不得体的， 冒犯人的； 复杂难懂的， 难处理的

sentences.english: A clumsy waiter spilled wine all over her new skirt.
sentences.chinese: 一名笨手笨脚的服务员把葡萄酒洒得她新裙子上到处都是。

sentences.english: a clumsy attempt to catch the ball
sentences.chinese: 笨拙的接球动作

detailed_translations.english: moving or doing things in a careless way, especially so that you drop things, knock into things etc

name: territory
trans: 领土， 版图； 领域， 地盘

sentences.english: Hong Kong is a Chinese territory.
sentences.chinese: 香港是中国的领土。

sentences.english: The company is moving into unfamiliar territory with this new software.
sentences.chinese: 该公司正通过这种新软件进入一个不熟悉的领域。

detailed_translations.english: land that is owned or controlled by a particular country, ruler, or military force

name: summon
trans: 传唤， 传讯； 召集， 召开； 鼓起， 振作

sentences.english: Robert summoned the waiter for the bill.
sentences.chinese: 罗伯特召唤服务员结账。

sentences.english: It took her a full month to summon the courage to tell her mother.
sentences.chinese: 她用了整整一个月的时间才鼓起勇气告诉了母亲。

detailed_translations.english: to order someone to come to a place

name: grovel
trans: 摇尾乞怜， 奴颜婢膝

sentences.english: I saw him grovelling in the road for his hat.
sentences.chinese: 我看到他趴在路上找帽子。

detailed_translations.english: to praise someone a lot or behave with a lot of respect towards them because you think that they are important and will be able to help you in some way – used to show disapproval

name: maintain
trans: 维持， 保持； 维修， 保养； 主张， 坚持； 赡养， 负担

sentences.english: Careers Officers maintain contact with young people when they have left school.
sentences.chinese: 年轻人离开学校以后，职业指导员和他们保持联系。

sentences.english: Britain wants to maintain its position as a world power.
sentences.chinese: 英国想保持其世界强国的地位。

sentences.english: A lot depends on building and maintaining a good relationship with your customers.
sentences.chinese: 和顾客建立并保持良好关系很重要，很多事情要取决于此。

sentences.english: The hotel prides itself on maintaining high standards.
sentences.chinese: 这家酒店以保持高标准而自豪。

sentences.english: How can we maintain control of spending?
sentences.chinese: 我们如何保持对开支的控制？

sentences.english: Critics maintain that these reforms will lead to a decline in educational standards.
sentences.chinese: 批评者坚称这些改革会导致教育标准下降。

detailed_translations.english: to make something continue in the same way or at the same standard as before

name: shift
trans: 转移； 改变； 轮班

sentences.english: They need to shift from farming to industry, and they need to do so desperately.
sentences.chinese: 他们需要从农业领域转移到工业领域。 他们需要拼命地那么做。

sentences.english: the shift from one type of economic system to another
sentences.chinese: 从一种经济体系向另一种经济体系的转变

detailed_translations.english: to change a situation, discussion etc by giving special attention to one idea or subject instead of to a previous one
a change in the way people think about something, in the way something is done etc

sentences.english: ‘Don’t go,’ I implored her.
sentences.chinese: “不要走。”我哀求她。

detailed_translations.english: to ask for something in an emotional way

name: rehabilitate
trans: 使恢复原状， 修复； 改造， 使恢复正常生活； 恢复…的名誉

sentences.english: a special unit for rehabilitating stroke patients
sentences.chinese: 协助中风患者康复的特殊病房

detailed_translations.chinese: 恢复地位；使残疾者恢复正常的生活
detailed_translations.english: to help someone to live a healthy, useful, or active life again after they have been seriously ill or in prison

sentences.english: She was not an accountant and didn't have the expertise to verify all of the financial details.
sentences.chinese: 她不是会计，不具有核查所有这些财政细目的专业知识。

detailed_translations.english: Expertise is special skill or knowledge that is acquired by training, study, or practice

name: bargain
trans: 特价商品，廉价货；协议；交易

sentences.english: I’ve kept my side of the bargain and I expect you to keep yours.
sentences.chinese: 我履行了我的承诺，希望你也履行你的承诺。

sentences.english: women bargaining with traders
sentences.chinese: 和商贩讨价还价的女人

detailed_translations.english: an agreement, made between two people or groups to do something in return for something else
to discuss the conditions of a sale, agreement etc, for example to try and get a lower price

name: elective
trans: 选举的； 可选择的； 选修的

sentences.english: the 34 elective seats in the National Assembly
sentences.chinese: 国民议会中的34个选举席位

detailed_translations.english: an elective position or organization is one for which there is an election
a course that students can choose to take, but they do not have to take it in order to graduate

sentences.english: Forming the pivot of the exhibition is a large group of watercolours.
sentences.chinese: 构成这个展览核心的是一大批水彩画。

detailed_translations.english: a central point or pin on which something balances or turns

detailed_translations.chinese: 以…为中心旋转；把…置于枢轴上
detailed_translations.english: to turn or balance on a central point, or to make something do this

sentences.english: Doctors had tried to dissuade patients from smoking.
sentences.chinese: 医生曾试图说服病人不要抽烟。

detailed_translations.english: to persuade someone not to do something

name: sneaker
trans: 鬼鬼祟祟的人， 卑鄙者； 运动鞋

sentences.english: a pair of white sneakers
sentences.chinese: 一双白色的运动鞋

detailed_translations.chinese: 运动鞋；卑鄙者；鬼鬼祟祟做事的人
detailed_translations.english: a type of light soft shoe with a rubber  sole (= bottom )  , used for sports

name: conclusive
trans: 确定的， 确凿的， 不容置疑的； 结论性的

sentences.english: Her attorneys claim there is no conclusive evidence that any murders took place.
sentences.chinese: 她的律师们声称没有任何发生过谋杀的确凿证据。

detailed_translations.chinese: 确实的； 最后的； 决定性的
detailed_translations.english: showing that something is definitely true

sentences.english: The study encompasses the social, political, and economic aspects of the situation.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究涵盖了这一局势的社会、政治和经济三方面。

detailed_translations.english: to include a wide range of ideas, subjects, etc

name: sustenance
trans: 食物； 生计； 维持

sentences.english: Without sustenance, the animals will soon die.
sentences.chinese: 没有食物，动物很快就会死亡。

sentences.english: Potatoes were their only means of sustenance.
sentences.chinese: 马铃薯是他们唯一的食物。

detailed_translations.english: food that people or animals need in order to live

sentences.english: a food allergy
sentences.chinese: 食物过敏

detailed_translations.english: a medical condition in which you become ill or in which your skin becomes red and painful because you have eaten or touched a particular substance

name: disinterested
trans: 客观的， 无私的， 公正的； 无兴趣的， 不关心的

sentences.english: A lawyer should provide disinterested advice.
sentences.chinese: 律师应该提供客观公正的建议。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无私的；公正的；冷漠的；廉洁的
detailed_translations.english: able to judge a situation fairly because you are not concerned with gaining any personal advantage from it

detailed_translations.chinese: 使不再有利害关系；使无兴趣（disinterest的过去分词）

sentences.english: envelopes and stamps
sentences.chinese: 信封和邮票

sentences.english: She tore open the envelope and frantically read the letter.
sentences.chinese: 她撕开信封慌忙看信。

sentences.english: He got a job stuffing envelopes (= filling them with letters ) at the campaign headquarters.
sentences.chinese: 他找了一份在竞选总部装信封的工作。

detailed_translations.english: a thin paper cover in which you put and send a letter

sentences.english: You are advised to deposit your valuables in the hotel safe.
sentences.chinese: 建议您把贵重物品存到酒店保险箱里。

sentences.english: As the river slows down, it deposits a layer of soil.
sentences.chinese: 河水流速变慢时，一层泥土便沉积下来。

sentences.english: I’d like to make a deposit (= pay some money ) into my savings account.
sentences.chinese: 我想存一笔钱到我的储蓄账户里。

sentences.english: fatty deposits on the heart
sentences.chinese: 心脏上沉积的脂肪层

detailed_translations.english: to put money or something valuable in a bank or other place where it will be safe
an amount of money that is paid into a bank account

name: dissipate
trans: 消散， 消失； 挥霍， 浪费

sentences.english: As he thought it over, his anger gradually dissipated.
sentences.chinese: 他想明白后，怒气就渐渐消了。

sentences.english: Little by little, the smoke was dissipated by the breeze.
sentences.chinese: 在微风的吹拂下烟雾渐渐地消散了。

detailed_translations.english: to gradually become less or weaker before disappearing completely, or to make something do this

detailed_translations.chinese: 使消散， 使消失， 驱散； 浪费， 挥霍
detailed_translations.english: to gradually become less or weaker before disappearing completely, or to make something do this

name: recount
trans: 讲述， 描述； 重新清点， 重计

sentences.english: The defeated candidate demanded a recount.
sentences.chinese: 落选的候选人要求重新计票。

sentences.english: He then recounted the story of the interview for his first job.
sentences.chinese: 他然后叙述了有关他第一份工作面试的故事。

detailed_translations.english: a second count of votes that happens in an election because the result was very close
to tell someone a story or describe a series of events

sentences.english: He took out a metal flask from a canvas bag.
sentences.chinese: 他从帆布袋里拿出了一个金属水瓶。

detailed_translations.english: a special type of bottle that you use to keep liquids either hot or cold, for example when travelling

sentences.english: Prices are subject to fluctuation.
sentences.chinese: 价格可能会有波动。

detailed_translations.english: a change in a price, amount, level etc

name: pliable
trans: 易弯曲的， 柔韧的； 易受影响的； 顺从的

sentences.english: a shoe made of soft pliable leather
sentences.chinese: 柔韧的皮革做成的鞋子

detailed_translations.chinese: 易弯曲的， 柔软的； 易受影响的
detailed_translations.english: able to bend without breaking or cracking

sentences.english: Two flashes mean danger.
sentences.chinese: 两次闪光表示危险。

sentences.english: Lightning flashed overhead.
sentences.chinese: 头顶上电光闪闪。

detailed_translations.english: a bright light that shines for a short time and then stops shining
to shine suddenly and brightly for a short time, or to make something shine in this way

sentences.english: the continents of Asia and Africa
sentences.chinese: 亚洲及非洲大陆

detailed_translations.english: a large mass of land surrounded by sea
able to control your sexual desires

name: disturbance
trans: 打扰； 骚动； 心神不安， 烦恼

sentences.english: There were disturbances in the crowd as fans left the stadium.
sentences.chinese: 球迷离开体育场时，人群中发生了骚乱。

sentences.english: When a helicopter lands, it can cause a disturbance to local residents.
sentences.chinese: 直升机降落会惊扰当地居民。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which people behave violently in public

sentences.english: ...a close confidant of the president.
sentences.chinese: ...总统的一位亲密心腹。

detailed_translations.english: someone you tell your secrets to or who you talk to about personal things

sentences.english: They grabbed each other’s hands in simultaneous panic.
sentences.chinese: 他们俩同时惊慌起来，相互抓住对方的手。

sentences.english: Up to twenty users can have simultaneous access to the system.
sentences.chinese: 最多可有20名用户同时登该系统。

sentences.english: The speeches will be broadcast live, with simultaneous translation (= immediate translation, as the person is speaking ) into English.
sentences.chinese: 这些演讲将作现场直播，并配有英语同声传译。

detailed_translations.english: things that are simultaneous happen at exactly the same time

name: guarantee
trans: 保证， 担保； 保证书

sentences.english: The bank will only lend me money if my parents guarantee the loan.
sentences.chinese: 只有我父母作担保，银行才会给我贷款。

sentences.english: I’m afraid there’s no guarantee of success.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕不能保证一定会成功。

detailed_translations.english: to promise that you will pay back money that someone else has borrowed, if they do not pay it back themselves
a formal promise that something will be done

name: improvise
trans: 即兴创作； 临时准备

sentences.english: I forgot to bring my notes, so I had to improvise.
sentences.chinese: 我忘了带笔记，只好临时发挥。

detailed_translations.english: to do something without any preparation, because you are forced to do this by unexpected events

sentences.english: We think of these strategies as having been in response to competition and in response to predation.
sentences.chinese: 我们认为，它们的这种生存策略是为了应对生存竞争和其他生物的捕食。

sentences.english: The fastest land animal in the world, cheetahs once thrived in Africa and Asia, but lion predation haunts their young, and farms and ranching have reduced their habitat.
sentences.chinese: 猎豹是陆地上速度最快的动物，曾在亚非大地上大量生长，但它们的幼兽常为狮子等捕食，栖息场所也因不断增加的农庄和牧场而缩减。

detailed_translations.english: when an animal kills and eats another animal

sentences.english: I recommend the butter chicken - it’s delicious.
sentences.chinese: 我推荐黄油焗鸡，非常好吃。

sentences.english: Can you recommend a good lawyer?
sentences.chinese: 你能介绍一位好律师吗？

detailed_translations.english: to say that something or someone is good, or suggest them for a particular purpose or job

sentences.english: programmes to help demobilized soldiers fit into civilian life
sentences.chinese: 帮助复员军人适应平民生活的方案

detailed_translations.chinese: 使复员, 使退伍, 遣散
detailed_translations.english: to send home the members of an army, navy etc, especially at the end of a war

sentences.english: Spreading wastewater over fields, and allowing it to leach back through the soil into local waterways, turns out to be a reasonable way to purify it.
sentences.chinese: 将废水浇灌到田里，这些水经过土壤的过滤后又重新流回当地的水系，这已经被证明是非常合理的污水净化方法。

detailed_translations.english: the act or process of leaching
if a substance leaches or is leached from a larger mass such as the soil, it is removed from it by water passing through the larger mass

sentences.english: the artist’s prodigious output
sentences.chinese: 那位艺术家惊人的高产

detailed_translations.chinese: 惊人的，异常的，奇妙的；巨大的
detailed_translations.english: very large or great in a surprising or impressive way

sentences.english: Please look for it in the hotel lost-and-found office.
sentences.chinese: 请到酒店失物招领处找找。

detailed_translations.english: a place where things that are lost are kept until someone comes to claim them

name: knack
trans: 诀窍； 技能， 本领； 习惯， 癖好

sentences.english: He's got the knack of getting people to listen.
sentences.chinese: 他有让人们倾听的诀窍。

detailed_translations.chinese: 诀窍；本领；熟练技术；巧妙手法
detailed_translations.english: a natural skill or ability

sentences.english: Mortgage defaults have risen in the last year.
sentences.chinese: 按揭借款违约在近一年里呈上升趋势。

sentences.english: to default on a loan/debt
sentences.chinese: 拖欠借款 / 债务

detailed_translations.english: failure to do something that you are supposed to do according to the law or because it is your duty
to not do something that you are supposed to do, especially that you are legally supposed to do

name: indolent
trans: 懒惰的， 懒散的； 不活跃的

sentences.english: The former investment banker has not been indolent: his department has been a factory for acronyms since the crisis began.
sentences.chinese: 这位前投资银行家并非懒惰，自危机开始以来，他的部门已成为加工厂的代称。

sentences.english: In a 1942 presentation at the New York Academy of Medicine, the scientists reported that after lobotomy, patients did sometimes become “indolent” or “outspoken.
sentences.chinese: 在1942年纽约医学专科学院的一个介绍会中，一些科学家提出，额叶切除术后，病人的确有时变得“懒惰”或“直言”。

detailed_translations.english: lazy

sentences.english: The tropic sun glared down on us all day.
sentences.chinese: 热带的太阳整日灼晒着我们。

sentences.english: There was a restaurant a little way off Broadway where one could be served almost al fresco in a tropic array of screening flora.
sentences.chinese: 离百老汇不远有一家餐馆，在那里用餐几乎像是置身于户外一排热带遮护植物中一样。

detailed_translations.english: one of the two imaginary lines around the world, either the Tropic of Cancer which is 23.5˚ north of the  equator  , or the Tropic of Capricorn which is 23.5˚ south of the equator

sentences.english: Beer is a beverage of the remotest time.
sentences.chinese: 啤酒是一种最古老的饮料。

sentences.english: And not only food: frequently there must be a beverage.
sentences.chinese: 而且不仅仅为了食物，还常常必须有饮料。

sentences.english: In this case, you want to provide the user with a way to say the desired beverage.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下，您想为用户提供一种方法，让他们说出自己想要的饮料。

detailed_translations.chinese: 措辞, 用语, 言语
detailed_translations.english: the choice and use of words and phrases to express meaning, especially in literature

sentences.english: Those tomatoes aren’t ripe yet.
sentences.chinese: 那些番茄还没熟。

sentences.english: The conditions were ripe for social change.
sentences.chinese: 社会变革的时机已经成熟。

detailed_translations.english: fully grown and ready to be eaten

sentences.english: Women tend to attribute their success to external causes such as luck.
sentences.chinese: 女性往往把她们的成功归因于外因，如运气。

detailed_translations.english: If you attribute something to an event or situation, you think that it was caused by that event or situation
a quality or feature, especially one that is considered to be good or useful

sentences.english: genetic defects
sentences.chinese: 遗传性缺陷

sentences.english: each person’s genetic make-up
sentences.chinese: 每个人的遗传特征

sentences.english: genetic research
sentences.chinese: 基因研究

detailed_translations.english: relating to genes or genetics

sentences.english: All her life, Kelly had stuck with difficult tasks and challenges, and triumphed.
sentences.chinese: 凯利在一生中遭遇了种种艰巨任务与挑战，但成功了。

detailed_translations.english: If someone or something triumphs, they gain complete success, control, or victory, often after a long or difficult struggle
an important victory or success after a difficult struggle

sentences.english: He passed into a deep slumber.
sentences.chinese: 他酣然入梦。

detailed_translations.english: sleep
to sleep

name: arouse
trans: 唤醒， 唤起； 激起， 引起

sentences.english: Matt’s behavior was arousing the interest of the neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 马特的行为渐渐引起了邻居的兴趣。

sentences.english: Anne had to be aroused from a deep sleep.
sentences.chinese: 不得不把安妮从沉睡中唤醒。

detailed_translations.english: to make you become interested, expect something etc; to wake someone

sentences.english: a bird’s nest
sentences.chinese: 鸟窝

sentences.english: In May the females build a nest and lay their eggs.
sentences.chinese: 雌鸟在5月份筑巢产蛋。

sentences.english: Young eagles leave the nest after only two months.
sentences.chinese: 雏鹰仅仅两个月以后就会飞离鸟巢。

detailed_translations.english: a place made or chosen by a bird to lay its eggs in and to live in
to build or use a nest

sentences.english: ...slick television ads touting the candidates.
sentences.chinese: …吹嘘那些候选人的华而不实的电视广告。

detailed_translations.chinese: 兜售；招徕；刺探赛马情报
detailed_translations.english: to try to persuade people to buy goods or services you are offering

sentences.english: The Bolsheviks expropriated the property of the landowners.
sentences.chinese: 布尔什维克征收了地主的土地。

detailed_translations.english: if a government or someone in authority expropriates your private property, they take it away for public use

name: consensus
trans: 共识， 一致同意； 舆论

sentences.english: The EU Council of Finance Ministers failed to reach a consensus on the pace of integration.
sentences.chinese: 欧盟财政部长会议未能就一体化的进度达成共识。

sentences.english: the current consensus of opinion
sentences.chinese: 目前观点上的一致

sentences.english: The general consensus was that technology was a good thing.
sentences.chinese: 大家都认为科技是好东西。

sentences.english: the consensus politics of the fifties
sentences.chinese: 50年代的共识政治

detailed_translations.english: an opinion that everyone in a group agrees with or accepts

sentences.english: The Coca-Cola bottle is one of the classic designs of the last century.
sentences.chinese: 可口可乐瓶是上个世纪的经典设计之一。

detailed_translations.chinese: 最优秀的，典型的，标准的；传统式样的，典雅的
detailed_translations.english: having all the features that are typical or expected of a particular thing or situation

detailed_translations.chinese: 文学名著， 经典作品， 杰作； 优秀的典范； 古典文学， 古典语文研究
detailed_translations.english: a book, play, or film that is important and has been admired for a long time

name: embellish
trans: 装饰； 对…添枝加叶， 渲染

sentences.english: The boat was embellished with carvings in red and blue.
sentences.chinese: 这艘船饰有红、蓝雕刻。

detailed_translations.english: to make something more beautiful by adding decorations to it

sentences.english: a metric tonne
sentences.chinese: 一公吨

sentences.english: The parts all come in metric sizes now.
sentences.chinese: 现在配件都采用公制规格。

detailed_translations.english: using or connected with the  metric system  of weights and measures

name: absolute
trans: 完全的， 绝对的； 地道的； 无疑的， 确凿的； 不受限制的， 不受约束的

sentences.english: I have absolute confidence in her.
sentences.chinese: 我对她充满信心。

sentences.english: Some of the stuff on TV is absolute rubbish.
sentences.chinese: 电视上播放的有些东西简直就是垃圾。

sentences.english: How did you do that? You’re an absolute genius.
sentences.chinese: 你是怎么做的？ 你绝对是个天才。

sentences.english: That meal last night cost an absolute fortune.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚那顿饭花了一大笔钱。

detailed_translations.english: complete or total

name: retract
trans: 收回， 撤销； 缩回

sentences.english: The sea otter can retract the claws on its front feet.
sentences.chinese: 海獭能缩回前掌上的爪子。

detailed_translations.english: if part of a machine or an animal’s body retracts or is retracted, it moves back into the main part

name: gossip
trans: 传播流言飞语， 说长道短
闲话，流言飞语；爱说长道短的人

sentences.english: Who knows how much of the gossip was true.
sentences.chinese: 有谁知道这些流言蜚语有多少是真的呢？

sentences.english: You must avoid gossip and focus on what you have to do.
sentences.chinese: 务必避免流言蜚语，关注你必须做的事务。

detailed_translations.chinese: 流言蜚语；爱说长道短的人
detailed_translations.english: information that is passed from one person to another about other people’s behaviour and private lives, often including unkind or untrue remarks

sentences.english: The steam engine was the greatest technological advance of the 19th century.
sentences.chinese: 蒸汽机是19世纪最伟大的技术进步。

detailed_translations.english: related to technology

sentences.english: I grabbed my bag and ran off.
sentences.chinese: 我抓起我的包就跑。

sentences.english: Two men grabbed her and pushed her to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 两名男子抓住她，把她推倒在地上。

sentences.english: Kay grabbed hold of my arm to stop herself falling.
sentences.chinese: 凯抓住我的手臂，以免自己摔倒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 抓取，攫取；赶紧做；抓住；抓，夺
detailed_translations.english: to take hold of someone or something with a sudden or violent movement
to suddenly try to take hold of something

sentences.english: The son of a Huguenot silversmith, Apollos Rivoire, and Deborah Hitchbourn, Revere received a rudimentary "writing-school" education before turning to his father's trade.
sentences.chinese: 他是胡格诺派银匠阿波罗·里维尔和黛博拉·赫奇博的儿子，他还没读到他父亲的程度就获得了基本的写作结业证书。

sentences.english: So he returned the silver to his mother, and she took two hundred shekels of silver and gave them to a silversmith, who made them into the image and the idol. And they were put in Micah's house.
sentences.chinese: 米迦将银子还他母亲，他母亲将二百舍客勒银子交给银匠，雕刻一个像，铸成一个像，安置在米迦的屋内。

sentences.english: A silversmith was asked, "How do you know when the silver is pure?"
sentences.chinese: 有人问一位银匠：「你怎么知道银要炼到何时才算纯净呢？」

detailed_translations.english: someone who makes jewellery and other things out of silver

sentences.english: That's an antecedent standard. Moral desert.
sentences.chinese: 道德应得，那是一个先行标准。

sentences.english: Some patients state that lesions develop at the site of antecedent trauma.
sentences.chinese: 一些患者指出，病灶出现在先前的创伤部位。

sentences.english: The user can then explore the lattice by using specified criteria, such as support and confidence bounds, or by placing restrictions on the antecedent sequence.
sentences.chinese: 用户然后可以使用指定的条件（比如支持和置信界限），或在先前的序列上设置限制来分析该格子。

detailed_translations.english: an event, organization, or thing that is similar to the one you have mentioned but existed earlier

name: remains
trans: 剩余物， 残留物； 古代遗物， 遗迹， 遗址； 遗骸

sentences.english: extensive Roman remains (= of ancient buildings ) at Arles
sentences.chinese: 阿尔勒的一大片古罗马遗迹

detailed_translations.english: the parts of something that are left after the rest has been destroyed or has disappeared

sentences.english: ...a granular fertilizer.
sentences.chinese: ...一种粒状化肥。

detailed_translations.english: consisting of granules

name: incorporate
trans: 纳入， 合并； 包含； 吸收； 注册成立

sentences.english: It allows you to harness existing technologies and incorporate them into one application.
sentences.chinese: 它允许您利用现有的技术并将它们合并到同一个应用程序中。

sentences.english: The next step is to generate the report and then incorporate it as an affiliated document of the master document.
sentences.chinese: 紧接着的步骤就是产生这个报告，然后将它作为主文档的附属文档与主文档合并。

sentences.english: The graphite is mixed with clay from Mississippi in which ammonium hydroxide is used in the refining process.
sentences.chinese: 石墨要与产自密西西比河床的粘土混合，在精炼过程中，还要用到氢氧化铵。

sentences.english: So inside the graphite, the pebbles are literally dropped in place and discharged through the bottom and then recycled.
sentences.chinese: 所以，在石墨里面，卵石是,掉进去了，还通过这个底部排出去了,然后被回收了。

sentences.english: From the standpoint of know-how the only difference between the miner of graphite in Ceylon and the logger in Oregon is in the type of know-how.
sentences.chinese: 从知道者的立场来看所谓的知道之间的不同不过是锡兰的矿工之于石墨和俄勒冈的伐木工人之间在某一类别的知道而已。

detailed_translations.english: a soft black substance that is a kind of  carbon  , used in pencils, paints, and electrical equipment

sentences.english: The city boasts two excellent museums.
sentences.chinese: 这个城市以拥有两个优秀的博物馆而自豪。

sentences.english: The Society boasts 3,000 members worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 这个协会以拥有3,000名来自世界各地的会员而自豪。

sentences.english: It is the charity's proud boast that it has never yet turned anyone away.
sentences.chinese: 该慈善机构自吹自擂，声称从来没有拒绝过任何人。

detailed_translations.english: if a place, object, or organization boasts something, it has something that is very good

detailed_translations.chinese: 自夸，吹嘘；以拥有…而自豪
detailed_translations.english: to talk too proudly about your abilities, achievements, or possessions

detailed_translations.chinese: 自吹自擂， 自夸的话
detailed_translations.english: Boast is also a noun

sentences.english: Let me reiterate the most important points.
sentences.chinese: 我来把最重要的几点重申一遍。

detailed_translations.english: to repeat a statement or opinion in order to make your meaning as clear as possible

sentences.english: We were attacked on our left flank.
sentences.chinese: 我们的左翼受到攻击。

detailed_translations.english: the side of an army in a battle, or a sports team when playing

detailed_translations.chinese: 守侧面；位于…的侧面；攻击侧面
detailed_translations.english: to be on both sides of someone or something

name: counterpart
trans: 相对物； 职位相当的人； 副本

sentences.english: As soon as he heard what was afoot, he telephoned his German and Italian counterparts to protest.
sentences.chinese: 他一听到在进行中的事，马上就给德国和意大利相应人员打电话抗议。

detailed_translations.chinese: 副本；配对物；极相似的人或物
detailed_translations.english: Someone's or something's counterpart is another person or thing that has a similar function or position in a different place

sentences.english: Decorate with orange segments.
sentences.chinese: 用几瓣橙子作点缀。

detailed_translations.english: a part of something that is different from or affected differently from the whole in some way

sentences.english: a shirt with black and white stripes
sentences.chinese: 黑白条纹衬衫

detailed_translations.english: a line of colour, especially one of several lines of colour all close together
to mark with a stripe or stripes

name: sovereign
trans: 君主的；至高无上的；独立自主的
君主， 元首， 最高统治者

sentences.english: In March 1889, she became the first British sovereign to set foot on Spanish soil.
sentences.chinese: 1889年3月，她成为首位踏上西班牙国土的英国君主。

sentences.english: a sovereign ruler
sentences.chinese: 最高统治者

detailed_translations.english: a king or queen
having the highest power in a country

name: gourd
trans: 葫芦； 葫芦制成的容器

sentences.english: I refused the last but washed down the fruit and vegetables with clear, cold water from a hollowed gourd.
sentences.chinese: 我没有动第三碗，只就着一只葫芦里干净的凉水，把水果和蔬菜风卷残云地吃了下去。

sentences.english: "I keep these stocks as my security, my backup, " he says, looking down at the gourd casks filled with what I now realize are seeds.
sentences.chinese: “我保存这些存货作为我的保障，我的后备，”他一边说，一边低头觑着那些葫芦罐，我这才认出那里面装满的是种子。

sentences.english: The practice of carving and lighting the gourd is a Celtic custom brought to America by Irish immigrants, who used the more-plentiful turnip back home.
sentences.chinese: 在葫芦上刻鬼脸并作为灯笼的习俗最早来自于凯尔特民族，由爱尔兰移民传至美国，而美国人更常用芜菁。

detailed_translations.english: a round fruit whose outer shell can be used as a container, or the container made from this fruit

name: attractive
trans: 吸引人的， 有魅力的； 引起注意的

sentences.english: an attractive young woman
sentences.chinese: 妩媚动人的年轻女子

sentences.english: Women seem to find him attractive .
sentences.chinese: 女性似乎觉得他很有吸引力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 有吸引力的， 引起注意的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is attractive is good looking, especially in a way that makes you sexually interested in them

sentences.english: We cater to an exclusive clientele.
sentences.chinese: 我们满足一个特殊客户群的需求。

detailed_translations.chinese: 投合，迎合；满足需要；提供饮食及服务
detailed_translations.english: to provide and serve food and drinks at a party, meeting etc, usually as a business

name: superb
trans: 极好的， 高质量的， 上乘的； 华丽的

sentences.english: The food was superb.
sentences.chinese: 食物好吃极了。

sentences.english: superb weather
sentences.chinese: 极好的天气

detailed_translations.english: extremely good

sentences.english: The bridge is a triumph of modern engineering.
sentences.chinese: 这座桥是现代工程的一大成就。

sentences.english: a degree in engineering
sentences.chinese: 工程学学位

detailed_translations.english: the activity of applying scientific knowledge to the design, building and control of machines, roads, bridges, electrical equipment, etc.

name: duplicate
trans: 复写； 复制； 使加倍

sentences.english: A duplicate copy should be made for the county record office.
sentences.chinese: 应该制作一个副本呈交县档案室。

sentences.english: a duplicate key
sentences.chinese: 配制的钥匙

detailed_translations.chinese: 完全一样的， 复制的
detailed_translations.english: exactly the same as something, or made as an exact copy of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 完全一样的东西，复制品
detailed_translations.english: an exact copy of something that you can use in the same way

detailed_translations.chinese: 复制， 复印； 重复
