trans: 基本的，本质的；极其重要的，必不可少的
要素， 实质； 必需品

sentences.english: Window locks are fairly cheap and absolutely essential.
sentences.chinese: 窗锁相当便宜，绝对有必要安装。

sentences.english: Even in small companies, computers are an essential tool.
sentences.chinese: 即使在小公司里，计算机也是不可或缺的工具。

detailed_translations.english: extremely important and necessary
something that is necessary to do something or in a particular situation

sentences.english: huge cuts in public expenditure
sentences.chinese: 大幅度削减公共开支

sentences.english: government expenditure on education
sentences.chinese: 政府的教育开支

sentences.english: {"GLOSS":["spending by a company on buildings, machinery, equipment etc"],"COLLOINEXA":["capital expenditure"]}
sentences.chinese: 〔公司的〕资本开支

detailed_translations.chinese: 经费， 支出额； 花费， 支出， 消耗
detailed_translations.english: the total amount of money that a government, organization, or person spends during a particular period of time

sentences.english: a blocked air vent
sentences.chinese: 堵塞的通风口

sentences.english: a volcanic vent
sentences.chinese: 火山口

detailed_translations.english: a hole or pipe through which gases, liquid etc can enter or escape from an enclosed space or container
to express feelings of anger, hatred etc, especially by doing something violent or harmful

sentences.english: Reporters asked him to clarify his position (= say exactly what his beliefs are ) on welfare reform.
sentences.chinese: 记者们要求他阐明他在福利改革问题上的立场。

detailed_translations.english: to make something clearer or easier to understand

name: furnace
trans: 火炉， 熔炉； 锅炉

sentences.english: The metal glowed in the furnace.
sentences.chinese: 金属在熔炉里发出灼热的光。

sentences.english: An adjustable plate, as in the flue of a furnace or stove, for controlling the draft.
sentences.chinese: 挡板，调节风门一种可调节的薄片，如在熔炉或火炉的通气管中的，用来控制气流。

sentences.english: The graceful preface was laced by a commonplace maid near the furnace in the palace without any trace of embrace.
sentences.chinese: 这份优雅的前言是由一个平凡的侍女在宫殿里的火炉边，不留住拥抱过的痕迹而系上带子的。

detailed_translations.english: a large container for a very hot fire, used to produce power, heat, or liquid metal

name: haunt
trans: 出没于；萦绕在心头；长期缠扰

sentences.english: The pub is said to be haunted by the ghost of a former landlord.
sentences.chinese: 据说这个酒吧里经常有一位前任房主的鬼魂出没。

detailed_translations.chinese: 常出没于；使苦恼，使担忧；萦绕在心头，缠绕
detailed_translations.english: if the soul of a dead person haunts a place, it appears there often
a place that someone likes to go to often

name: scarf
trans: 围巾， 披巾， 头巾

sentences.english: Hey, your scarf is slipping off.
sentences.chinese: 喂， 你的围巾快掉了。

sentences.english: The scarf flapped her face.
sentences.chinese: 围巾轻拂着她的脸。

sentences.english: She muffled her throat with a scarf.
sentences.chinese: 她用围巾围住脖子。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of cloth that you wear around your neck, head, or shoulders, especially to keep warm

name: congenial
trans: 情投意合的； 相宜的， 适宜的； 适当的， 合适的

sentences.english: Compost provides congenial conditions for roots to develop.
sentences.chinese: 堆肥为根部的生长提供了适宜的条件。

detailed_translations.chinese: 意气相投的；性格相似的；适意的；一致的
detailed_translations.english: suitable for something

name: graphics
trans: 图形， 图像； 制图法， 制图学

sentences.english: In this in-depth motion graphics tutorial you will learn how to use vector shapes for 3D motion graphics.
sentences.chinese: 在这种深入的运动图形教程中，您将学习如何使用矢量图形的3D动态图像。

detailed_translations.chinese: 图形， 图像； 制图法， 制图学
detailed_translations.english: pictures or images that are designed to represent objects or facts, especially in a computer program

name: observe
trans: 遵守， 奉行； 观察； 察觉， 看到； 评说， 评论

sentences.english: Scientists have observed a drop in ozone levels over the Antarctic.
sentences.chinese: 科学家已经观察到南极洲上方的臭氧浓度有所下降。

sentences.english: Predators have been observed to avoid attacking brightly coloured species.
sentences.chinese: 据观察发现，食肉动物会避免袭击色彩鲜艳的物种。

sentences.english: The army was observing a ceasefire.
sentences.chinese: 军队当时在遵守一项停火协议。

sentences.english: ‘Sid looks ill,’ Doherty observed.
sentences.chinese: “锡德看上去病了。”多尔蒂说道。

detailed_translations.english: to see and notice something

name: meaningful
trans: 意味深长的； 有目的的， 有用意的； 有意义的

sentences.english: Sam and Barbara exchanged meaningful glances.
sentences.chinese: 萨姆和芭芭拉交换了会意的眼神。

detailed_translations.english: a look that clearly expresses the way someone feels, even though nothing is said

name: furnish
trans: 提供， 供应； 布置， 为…配备家具

sentences.english: Will these finds furnish more information on prehistoric man?
sentences.chinese: 这些发现是否能提供更多有关史前人类的资料？

sentences.english: Having bought the house, they couldn’t afford to furnish it.
sentences.chinese: 买下房子后，他们没有钱买家具了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 装备，布置 （房间、建筑物）；供应，提供
detailed_translations.english: to put furniture and other things into a house or room

sentences.english: The larynx, or voice box, sits lower in the throat in humans than in chimps, one of several .
sentences.chinese: 人类的喉（亦称音箱），其在咽部的位置要低于黑猩猩，这是人们能说话的原因之一。

sentences.english: Objective: To investigate the emergency treatment and experience of penetrating larynx injury.
sentences.chinese: 目的：探讨开放性喉外伤的急诊治疗方法和经验。

sentences.english: A series of detect confirm this cambium is belonged to malign, made complete larynx resection finally.
sentences.chinese: 一系列的检测证实此新生组织属恶性，最终作了全喉切除术。

detailed_translations.english: the part in your throat where your voice is produced

name: excavation
trans: 挖掘， 发掘； 出土文物； 挖掘现场

sentences.english: A second excavation, in 1985, lasted a year and was cut short for technical reasons.
sentences.chinese: 第二次挖掘是在1985年，因为技术原因持续了一年就突然停止了。

sentences.english: If he thinks I’m particular about excavation records, you should see him taking pictures!
sentences.chinese: 如果他觉得我对挖掘纪录很挑剔，你应该看看他是怎么拍照的。

sentences.english: Blue flags define the excavation perimeter, while yellow ones mark the location of fossils or stone tools.
sentences.chinese: 蓝旗用来显示发掘地的周长，而黄旗用来标明发掘出化石或石制工具的地点。

name: rare
trans: 稀有的， 罕见的； 半熟的

sentences.english: This species of plant is becoming increasingly rare.
sentences.chinese: 这种植物越来越罕见。

sentences.english: I only saw Helen on the rare occasions when I went into her shop.
sentences.chinese: 我只有偶尔去海伦店里时才会见到她。

sentences.english: It is very rare for her to miss a day at school.
sentences.chinese: 她很少有哪一天不上学的。

detailed_translations.english: not seen or found very often, or not happening very often

sentences.english: a special diet that excludes dairy products
sentences.chinese: 不包含奶制品的特别食谱

sentences.english: The judges decided to exclude evidence which had been unfairly attained.
sentences.chinese: 法官裁决不接纳以不正当手段获取的证据。

detailed_translations.english: to deliberately not include something

name: amalgamation
trans: 融合， 合并； 联合， 结合

sentences.english: Both light and dark work together to create amalgamation.
sentences.chinese: 光明和黑暗一起工作来创造融合。

sentences.english: This shift includes an amalgamation of light and dark again in earth's field.
sentences.chinese: 这一变迁包括在地球的能量场中再次融合光明与黑暗。

sentences.english: Ethnic amalgamation ethnic assimilation and ethnic fusion of culture are three kinds of different phenomena in ethnic relation.
sentences.chinese: 民族融合、民族同化和民族文化融合是民族关系中存在的三种不同的现象。

sentences.english: artistic creativity
sentences.chinese: 艺术创造力

sentences.english: Teachers have been attacked for stifling creativity in their pupils.
sentences.chinese: 教师被批评压抑了学生的创造力。

sentences.english: Editors complain about the lack of creativity in the ideas put to them.
sentences.chinese: 编辑们抱怨说交给他们的选题缺乏创意。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to use your imagination to produce new ideas, make things etc

name: enlighten
trans: 启发， 启迪； 开导； 阐明

sentences.english: Baldwin enlightened her as to the nature of the experiment.
sentences.chinese: 鲍德温给她讲解了这个实验的性质。

detailed_translations.english: to give someone more knowledge and greater understanding about something

sentences.english: a needy family
sentences.chinese: 贫困家庭

sentences.english: There will be efforts to get larger amounts of food to the needy.
sentences.chinese: 将努力把更多的食品送给穷人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 贫困的；贫穷的；生活艰苦的
detailed_translations.english: having very little food or money
The needy are people who are needy

sentences.english: It is a matter of the utmost urgency to find out what has happened to these people.
sentences.chinese: 当务之急是弄清楚这些人出了什么事。

sentences.english: Security matters are treated with the utmost seriousness.
sentences.chinese: 安全问题受到极为严肃的对待。

sentences.english: The medical staff did their utmost(= tried as hard as they could ) to save the patient’s life.
sentences.chinese: 医护人员竭尽全力挽救那位病人的生命。

detailed_translations.english: greatest; most extreme
the most that can be done

name: deduct
trans: 扣除， 减去； 推论， 演绎

sentences.english: The company deducted this payment from his compensation.
sentences.chinese: 公司从他的补偿金中扣除了这笔款项。

detailed_translations.english: to take away an amount or part from a total

name: image
trans: 形象， 印象； 画像； 影像， 映像； 意象， 比喻

sentences.english: attempts to improve the image of the police
sentences.chinese: 提升警察形象的努力

sentences.english: He had the clearest image in his mind of his mother and father.
sentences.chinese: 他脑海中对父母的印象极其清晰。

detailed_translations.english: the opinion people have of a person, organization, product etc, or the way a person, organization etc seems to be to the public

name: voracious
trans: 狼吞虎咽的， 贪婪的； 求知欲强的

sentences.english: Pigs are voracious feeders.
sentences.chinese: 猪的食量很大。

sentences.english: Kids can have voracious appetites.
sentences.chinese: 小孩子有时胃口很大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 贪婪的；贪吃的；狼吞虎咽的
detailed_translations.english: eating or wanting large quantities of food

name: unpredictable
trans: 不可预知的； 无法预言的

sentences.english: He is utterly unpredictable.
sentences.chinese: 他这个人完全让人捉摸不透。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不可预知的；不定的；出乎意料的
detailed_translations.english: If you describe someone or something as unpredictable, you mean that you cannot tell what they are going to do or how they are going to behave

name: topography
trans: 地形学； 地形， 地貌

sentences.english: The topography of the river's basin has changed significantly since the floods.
sentences.chinese: 洪水过后，这条河的流域地形已经明显改变了。

detailed_translations.english: the science of describing an area of land, or making maps of it

name: ribbon
trans: 带状物； 丝带， 缎带； 绶带； 色带

sentences.english: little girls with ribbons in their hair
sentences.chinese: 头发上系着丝带的小姑娘们

sentences.english: a bundle of letters tied with pale blue ribbon
sentences.chinese: 一捆用淡蓝色丝带扎好的信

sentences.english: The ribbon was cut and the new station was officially open.
sentences.chinese: 剪彩后，新车站正式开始运营。

detailed_translations.chinese: 带；缎带；（勋章等的）绶带；带状物；勋表
detailed_translations.english: a narrow piece of attractive cloth that you use, for example, to tie your hair or hold things together

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…撕成条带；用缎带装饰

name: portray
trans: 描绘； 扮演， 饰演

sentences.english: Romantic artists portrayed nature as wild and powerful.
sentences.chinese: 浪漫主义艺术家描绘的大自然是狂野而强大的。

sentences.english: The President likes to portray himself as a friend of working people.
sentences.chinese: 总统喜欢以工薪阶层的朋友自居。

detailed_translations.english: to describe or show someone or something in a particular way, according to your opinion of them

sentences.english: The old man was in a trance, thinking of his past life.
sentences.chinese: 这位老人回想着自己过去的生活， 神情恍惚。

sentences.english: The stillness of her head and features was remarkable: she might have been in a trance, her eyes open, yet unseeing.
sentences.chinese: 很明显，她的头和她的面目安详沉静：她似乎在那儿发怔出神，眼睛睁得大大的，但是却看不见。

sentences.english: Having fallen into a trance state, they acted in accordance with these supernaturalist beliefs: dancing wildly for days on end.
sentences.chinese: 人们陷入了恍惚状态，他们的行动与超自然主义者的信仰相一致：接连数日疯狂地跳舞。

detailed_translations.english: a state in which you behave as if you were asleep but are still able to hear and understand what is said to you

sentences.english: I gave the floor a good scrub .
sentences.chinese: 我把地板仔细刷洗了一遍。

detailed_translations.chinese: 矮树；洗擦；擦洗者；矮小的人（或物）
detailed_translations.english: low bushes and trees that grow in very dry soil
to rub something hard, especially with a stiff brush, in order to clean it

detailed_translations.chinese: 矮小的；临时凑合的；次等的
detailed_translations.english: small, stunted, or inferior

name: profound
trans: 巨大的， 深远的； 知识渊博的； 深奥的

sentences.english: a profound question
sentences.chinese: 深刻的问题

sentences.english: Jenner is a profound thinker.
sentences.chinese: 詹纳是个思想深刻的人。

detailed_translations.english: showing great knowledge and understanding

name: affirm
trans: 断言， 坚持声称； 证实， 确认

sentences.english: The general affirmed rumors of an attack.
sentences.chinese: 将军证实了袭击的传闻。

sentences.english: Both sides affirmed their commitment to the ceasefire.
sentences.chinese: 双方均申明答应停火。

detailed_translations.english: to state publicly that something is true

name: homogeneous
trans: 同类的， 相似的， 同质的

sentences.english: a homogeneous society
sentences.chinese: 同种族人组成的社会

detailed_translations.english: consisting of people or things that are all of the same type

sentences.english: The columns were of white marble.
sentences.chinese: 柱子是白色的大理石。

sentences.english: a marble statue
sentences.chinese: 大理石雕像

detailed_translations.chinese: 大理石；大理石制品；弹珠
detailed_translations.english: a type of hard rock that becomes smooth when it is polished, and is used for making buildings,  statue s  etc

sentences.english: Can you waggle your ears?
sentences.chinese: 你的耳朵会动吗？

detailed_translations.english: to move something up and down or from side to side using short quick movements

sentences.english: priestly garb
sentences.chinese: 牧师装束

detailed_translations.english: a particular style of clothing, especially clothes that show your type of work or look unusual

name: necessity
trans: 必需品； 必要， 需要； 必然性

sentences.english: I’m afraid it’s become a matter of economic necessity.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕这已成了一个经济需求的问题。

detailed_translations.english: when something is necessary

name: frame
trans: 设计， 构成； 给…镶框； 表达

sentences.english: Newman played a central role in framing the new law.
sentences.chinese: 纽曼在拟定新法的过程中发挥了主要作用。

name: salon
trans: 营业性的厅； 沙龙； 客厅， 会客厅

sentences.english: a literary salon
sentences.chinese: 文学沙龙

detailed_translations.chinese: 沙龙；客厅；画廊；美术展览馆
detailed_translations.english: a room in a very large house, where people can meet and talk

name: vocal
trans: 声音的，嗓音的，发声的；直言不讳的

sentences.english: vocal music
sentences.chinese: 声乐

sentences.english: Allison’s vocal style is influenced by country and blues music.
sentences.chinese: 艾利森的演唱风格受到乡村音乐和布鲁斯音乐的影响。

sentences.english: a female vocal group
sentences.chinese: 女子歌唱组合

detailed_translations.chinese: 喜欢畅所欲言的，直言不讳的；嗓音的，发声的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the voice or to singing
the part of a piece of music that is sung rather than played on an instrument

sentences.english: The tradition has its origins in the Middle Ages.
sentences.chinese: 这一传统源于中世纪。

sentences.english: old folk tales of unknown origin
sentences.chinese: 起源不明的古老民间传说

detailed_translations.chinese: 起源， 起因； 出身， 血统
detailed_translations.english: the place or situation in which something begins to exist

name: plow
trans: 耕田， 犁田， 耕作

sentences.english: He teamed one horse and one cow to a plow.
sentences.chinese: 他把一匹马和一头牛套在犁上。

sentences.english: The huge animals use their heads like a plow to push snow aside in search of food.
sentences.chinese: 这些庞大的动物在找食物时用他们的头像犁一样将雪推到一边。

sentences.english: In 1930, a farmer with a tractor-pulled plow, combine, and truck could do the job in 20 hours.
sentences.chinese: 1930年，农民使用拖拉机牵引的犁、联合收割机和卡车只需20小时便可完成这些工作。

name: clasp
trans: 握紧； 抱紧； 扣住， 扣牢

sentences.english: the firm clasp of her hand
sentences.chinese: 她有力的握手

detailed_translations.english: a small metal object for fastening a bag, belt, piece of jewellery etc
to hold someone or something tightly, closing your fingers or arms around them

name: hover
trans: 徘徊， 彷徨； 翱翔， 盘旋

sentences.english: Her younger brother hovered in the background watching us.
sentences.chinese: 她的弟弟在后面走来走去，观察着我们。

detailed_translations.english: if a bird, insect, or  helicopter  hovers, it stays in one place in the air

sentences.english: The gang picked their victims at random.
sentences.chinese: 这帮犯罪分子随意选择对象下手。

sentences.english: The company has introduced random drug testing of its employees.
sentences.chinese: 公司已实行对雇员的随机毒品测试。

detailed_translations.english: without any definite plan, aim, or pattern
happening or chosen without any definite plan, aim, or pattern

name: personality
trans: 个性； 性格； 名人

sentences.english: Despite their different personalities, they became the best of friends.
sentences.chinese: 尽管个性不同，他们还是成了最好的朋友。

sentences.english: Unfortunately, the illness can lead to changes in personality.
sentences.chinese: 不幸的是，这种病会导致性格变化。

detailed_translations.english: someone’s character, especially the way they behave towards other people

name: terminology
trans: 专门用语， 术语； 术语学

sentences.english: computer terminology
sentences.chinese: 计算机术语

detailed_translations.english: the technical words or expressions that are used in a particular subject

sentences.english: The animal raised its head, suddenly alert.
sentences.chinese: 那只动物突然警觉地抬起头来。

sentences.english: Taking notes is one of the best ways to stay alert in lectures.
sentences.chinese: 记笔记是听课时集中注意力的最佳方法之一。

detailed_translations.english: giving all your attention to what is happening, being said etc
to make someone realize something important or dangerous

detailed_translations.chinese: 警戒， 戒备； 警报
detailed_translations.english: a warning to be ready for possible danger

name: rate
trans: 估价； 评级， 评价； 把…列为

sentences.english: $20 an hour is the going rate (= the usual amount paid ) for private tuition.
sentences.chinese: 每小时20美元是私人授课的一般收费。

sentences.english: The company seems to rate him very highly (= think he is very good) .
sentences.chinese: 公司好像对他的评价很高。

detailed_translations.english: a charge or payment that is set according to a standard scale
to think that someone or something has a particular quality, value, or standard

sentences.english: a two-acre plot of land
sentences.chinese: 一块两英亩的土地

sentences.english: a vegetable plot
sentences.chinese: 一块菜地

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of land for building or growing things on
to make a secret plan to harm a person or organization, especially a political leader or government

name: sanction
trans: 同意，许可；惩罚，实施制裁
同意， 许可； 约束； 制裁

sentences.english: a resolution to impose sanctions (= start using sanctions ) on DPRK
sentences.chinese: 对朝鲜实施制裁的决议

sentences.english: the threat of trade sanctions
sentences.chinese: 贸易制裁的威胁

sentences.english: The UN security council may impose economic sanctions .
sentences.chinese: 联合国安理会可能会实施经济制裁。

sentences.english: Any talk about lifting sanctions (= ending them ) is premature.
sentences.chinese: 现时就谈取消制裁为时过早。

sentences.english: We assembled here today are issuing a new decree to be heardin every city, in every foreign capital, and in every hall of power.
sentences.chinese: 今天我们聚集于此，是为了颁布新的命令，让它在每座城市、每个国家的首都、每座权力的殿堂回响。

an official order or decision, especially one made by the ruler of a country

name: traditional
trans: 传统的， 惯例的； 口传的， 传说的

sentences.chinese: 传统的意大利烹饪

sentences.english: a traditional Irish folk song
sentences.chinese: 传统的爱尔兰民歌

sentences.english: a traditional method of brewing beer
sentences.chinese: 传统的啤酒酿造方法

detailed_translations.english: being part of the traditions of a country or group of people

sentences.chinese: 当地的一个环境保护团体

detailed_translations.english: the protection of natural things such as animals, plants, forests etc, to prevent them from being spoiled or destroyed

sentences.chinese: 展性钢

detailed_translations.english: something that is malleable is easy to press or pull into a new shape

name: supplement
trans: 补充， 增补； 增刊； 补遗， 附录

sentences.chinese: 各种维生素和其他膳食补充剂

detailed_translations.chinese: 增补， 补充； 增刊， 副刊
detailed_translations.english: something that you add to something else to improve it or make it complete
to add something, especially to what you earn or eat, in order to increase it to an acceptable level

sentences.english: a well-heeled businessman
sentences.chinese: 有钱的生意人

detailed_translations.english: rich

sentences.english: an essay comparing and contrasting (= showing how two things are similar and different ) Verdi and Wagner and their operas
sentences.chinese: 把威尔第和瓦格纳以及他们的歌剧进行比较和对照的一篇文章

detailed_translations.chinese: 形成对比， 对比之下显出区别
detailed_translations.english: if two things contrast, the difference between them is very easy to see and is sometimes surprising
something that is very different from something else
if two things contrast, the difference between them is very easy to see and is sometimes surprising

trans: 易碎的； 脆弱的； 尖利的

sentences.english: In systems such as this we also often find that there are either no tests around this configuration code, or the tests that do exist are brittle and/or not realistic.
sentences.chinese: 在这样的系统中，我们经常会发现对于这些配置代码没有进行测试，或者尽管存在测试，但它很脆弱且/或不切实际。

sentences.english: But while our screens are brittle, theirs is flexible––at what they say is one tenth the price.
sentences.chinese: 但我们的屏幕都很脆弱，他们的却很柔软，而且价钱是我们的十分之一。

name: affinity
trans: 密切关系； 吸引力； 喜爱

sentences.english: He has a close affinity with the landscape and people he knew when he was growing up.
sentences.chinese: 他对他成长过程中所熟悉的景色和人们有一种很强的亲切感。

detailed_translations.chinese: 密切关系；吸引力；姻亲关系；类同
detailed_translations.english: a close relationship between two things because of qualities or features that they share

name: mediate
trans: 调解， 调停， 斡旋

sentences.english: The former president has agreed to mediate the peace talks.
sentences.chinese: 前总统同意就和谈进行斡旋。

detailed_translations.english: to try to end a quarrel between two people, groups, countries etc

name: amplify
trans: 放大； 增强； 详述， 充实

sentences.english: an amplified guitar
sentences.chinese: 带有扩音设备的电吉他

detailed_translations.chinese: 放大， 增强； 扩大； 详述， 进一步阐述
detailed_translations.english: to make sound louder, especially musical sound

trans: 通货膨胀， 物价上涨； 膨胀

sentences.chinese: 通货膨胀率现已超过16%。

detailed_translations.english: a continuing increase in prices, or the rate at which prices increase

trans: 清除， 外理， 处置； 变卖

sentences.english: bomb disposal experts
sentences.chinese: 拆弹专家

detailed_translations.english: when you get rid of something

sentences.english: They were joined together in holy matrimony .
sentences.chinese: 他们通过神圣的婚姻结合在一起。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being married

name: recede
trans: 退， 后退； 渐渐远去； 逐渐减弱

sentences.english: The flood waters finally began to recede in November.
sentences.chinese: 11 月，洪水终于开始退去。

detailed_translations.english: if water recedes, it moves back from an area that it was covering

sentences.english: Around 350 delegates attended the conference.
sentences.chinese: 大约有350名代表参加了大会。

detailed_translations.english: someone who has been elected or chosen to speak, vote, or take decisions for a group

detailed_translations.english: to choose someone to do a particular job, or to be a representative of a group, organization etc

name: literature
trans: 文学； 文学作品； 文献

sentences.english: He has read many of the major works of literature.
sentences.chinese: 他读过许多重要的文学作品。

sentences.english: Italian literature
sentences.chinese: 意大利文学

sentences.english: literature on the history of science
sentences.chinese: 科学史的文献资料

detailed_translations.chinese: 文学，文学作品；文献；文献
detailed_translations.english: books, plays, poems etc that people think are important and good

name: sphere
trans: 球； 范围， 领域； 阶层

sentences.chinese: 因为地球旋转，所以它不是个完完全全的球体。

detailed_translations.english: a ball shape

detailed_translations.chinese: 包围；放入球内；使…成球形

name: digest
trans: 消化， 吸收； 领悟

sentences.english: Most babies can digest a wide range of food easily.
sentences.chinese: 大多数婴儿能轻易地消化很多种食物。

sentences.english: I struggled to digest the news.
sentences.chinese: 我费力地琢磨着那条新闻。

sentences.english: a monthly news digest
sentences.chinese: 每月新闻摘要

detailed_translations.english: to change food that you have just eaten into substances that your body can use
a short piece of writing that gives the most important facts from a book, report etc

name: melodious
trans: 旋律优美的， 悦耳的

sentences.chinese: 他说话的声音轻柔悦耳。

detailed_translations.english: something that sounds melodious sounds like music or has a pleasant tune

name: ethnology
trans: 民族学， 文化人类学

sentences.chinese: 西西伯利亚的养鹿业类型学研究是俄罗斯民族学的一个重要课题。

sentences.english: From the perspective of ethnology and the historical background, the five emperors had no blood relationship but emerged from the development and division of the clans and tribes.
sentences.chinese: 从民族学的角度及当时的历史背景分析，五帝之间并非直系血缘的父子、子孙关系，而是氏族、部落发展过程中的分裂与分化。

detailed_translations.chinese: 民族学， 文化人类学
detailed_translations.english: the scientific study and comparison of different races of people

sentences.english: the ability to walk
sentences.chinese: 行走的能力

sentences.english: The test measures your mathematical ability.
sentences.chinese: 这种测试考查的是数学能力。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being able to do something

sentences.english: The Senate had a sufficient majority to override the presidential veto (= not accept his refusal ).
sentences.chinese: 参议院有足够的多数票可以推翻总统的否决。

detailed_translations.english: a refusal to give official permission for something, or the right to refuse to give such permission
if someone in authority vetoes something, they refuse to allow it to happen, especially something that other people or organizations have agreed

name: delight
trans: 快乐， 高兴； 令人高兴的事， 乐趣

sentences.chinese: 孩子们在高兴地尖叫。

sentences.english: He is delighting audiences with his wit and humour.
sentences.chinese: 他在用自己的智慧和幽默娱乐观众。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of great pleasure and satisfaction
to give someone great satisfaction and enjoyment

sentences.english: a proficient typist
sentences.chinese: 熟练的打字员

detailed_translations.english: able to do something well or skilfully

sentences.english: The Creole language is really various dialects arranged on a continuum.
sentences.chinese: 克里奥 耳语其实是多种方言的一个统一体。

sentences.english: All the organisms in an ecosystem are part of an evolutionary continuum.
sentences.chinese: 生态系统中的所有生物都是进化连续体的一个环节。

trans: 吸引，招引；画，描绘；拖，拉；引起，激起；拨出，抽出；提取，支取；推断出；打成平局
平局， 和局； 抽签

sentences.chinese: 凯蒂画了一间小茅舍，旁边流淌着一条小溪。

sentences.chinese: 她让小女孩把刚才和她说话的那个男人画出来。

sentences.chinese: 基思在画一张看上去很复杂的图表。

sentences.chinese: 她的教练昨天说，她会是取得奥运代表队里一个席位的一名强有力的竞争者。

detailed_translations.english: someone or something that is in competition with other people or things

name: slender
trans: 细长的； 苗条的， 纤细的； 微薄的， 不足的

sentences.chinese: 她身材修长，穿着时髦。

sentences.chinese: 这家公司维持下去的希望很渺茫。

detailed_translations.english: thin in an attractive or graceful way

sentences.english: What time does the train reach the terminus?
sentences.chinese: 火车什么时间到达终点站?。

sentences.english: Trains vomit out crowds of passengers at a terminus.
sentences.chinese: 成群的旅客在终点站从列车中挤出来。

sentences.english: Casablanca was the terminus of a long rickety railway line .
sentences.chinese: 卡莎布兰卡是一长而软弱的铁路线的终点。

detailed_translations.english: the station or stop at the end of a railway or bus line

name: oral
trans: 口头的， 口述的； 口腔的

sentences.english: oral history
sentences.chinese: 口述的历史

sentences.english: an oral agreement
sentences.chinese: 口头协议

detailed_translations.english: spoken, not written
a spoken test, especially in a foreign language

sentences.english: the government’s promise to compensate victims of the flood
sentences.chinese: 政府对水灾灾民给予补偿的许诺

sentences.english: The firm will compensate workers for their loss of earnings.
sentences.chinese: 公司将补偿工人的收入损失。

detailed_translations.english: to pay someone money because they have suffered injury, loss, or damage

name: conscious
trans: 自觉的， 意识到的； 有知觉的， 有意识的； 有意的， 刻意的

sentences.english: I became conscious of someone watching me.
sentences.chinese: 我察觉到有人在监视我。

sentences.english: a conscious act of cruelty
sentences.chinese: 有意而为的残暴行径

detailed_translations.english: noticing or realizing something

name: transaction
trans: 交易， 业务； 办理， 处理

sentences.english: The bank charges a fixed rate for each transaction.
sentences.chinese: 银行对每一笔业务收取固定费用。

sentences.english: the transaction of government business
sentences.chinese: 处理政府事务

detailed_translations.english: a business deal or action, such as buying or selling something

name: accomplishment
trans: 成就； 完成； 才艺， 技艺

sentences.english: It was a major accomplishment for a player who had been injured so recently.
sentences.chinese: 对于一个刚受过伤的选手来说，这是很好的成绩。

detailed_translations.english: something successful or impressive that is achieved after a lot of effort and hard work

name: pants
trans: 内裤， 短裤； 裤子

sentences.english: She was wearing dark blue pants and a white sweater.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着深蓝色长裤和白色毛衣。

sentences.english: a pair of pants
sentences.chinese: 一件内裤

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing that covers you from your waist to your feet and has a separate part for each leg

name: placid
trans: 平静的， 安静的； 温和的， 文静的

sentences.chinese: 一个胖胖的、安静的婴儿

sentences.chinese: 她安安静静坐着等候。

detailed_translations.english: a placid person does not often get angry or upset and does not usually mind doing what other people want them to

name: solitary
trans: 孤独的； 单独的， 独自的； 单个的； 唯一的， 仅有的

sentences.english: a long, solitary walk
sentences.chinese: 独自一人的长距离散步

detailed_translations.english: doing something without anyone else with you
someone who lives completely alone

sentences.english: Any proposal must be seconded by two other members of the committee.
sentences.chinese: 任何提案须有委员会其他两位委员附议。

detailed_translations.english: to formally support a suggestion made by another person in a meeting

name: laudable
trans: 值得赞美的， 值得称赞的

sentences.english: a laudable attempt
sentences.chinese: 值得称道的尝试

detailed_translations.english: deserving praise, even if not completely successful

name: edge
trans: 徐徐移动； 略为增加； 给…加边

sentences.chinese: 把鸡蛋放在盘子中间，盘边一圈放些蔬菜和香草。

sentences.english: He stood at the water’s edge staring across the lake.
sentences.chinese: 他站在水边，凝视着湖对面。

sentences.english: A leaf was on the ground, curling up at the edges.
sentences.chinese: 地上有一片叶子，叶边卷曲着。

sentences.english: a knife with a sharp edge
sentences.chinese: 刀刃锋利的小刀

detailed_translations.english: the part of an object that is furthest from its centre

sentences.chinese: 他指挥一个管弦乐队。

sentences.english: She conducted an orchestra of forty instruments.
sentences.chinese: 她在一个拥有40种乐器的管弦乐队里当指挥。

sentences.chinese: 有了足够的证据，我们才能提出起诉。

sentences.english: Unauthorized absence is sufficient reason for dismissal.
sentences.chinese: 旷工足以成为解雇的理由。

sentences.english: We need sufficient time to deal with the problem.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要足够的时间来处理这个问题。

detailed_translations.english: as much as is needed for a particular purpose

sentences.english: Sometimes his eyes would glaze over for a second or two.
sentences.chinese: 有时候他会两眼发直地愣一两秒钟。

detailed_translations.english: if your eyes glaze over, they show no expression, usually because you are very bored or tired

a liquid that is used to cover plates, cups etc made of clay to give them a shiny surface

name: claim
trans: 声称， 断言； 要求； 索赔

sentences.english: I don’t claim to be a feminist, but I’d like to see more women in top jobs.
sentences.chinese: 我不会自称是女权主义者，但我希望看到更多的女性担任高职。

sentences.english: Opposition leaders will claim victory if the turnout is lower than 50%.
sentences.chinese: 如果投票率低于 50%，反对党领袖将宣布获胜。

detailed_translations.chinese: 声称，主张；对…提出要求，索取；使失踪或死亡；需要，值得
detailed_translations.english: to state that something is true, even though it has not been proved

detailed_translations.chinese: 要求； 认领； 索赔； 声称， 断言
detailed_translations.english: a statement that something is true, even though it has not been proved

name: widespread
trans: 分布广泛的， 普遍的

sentences.english: the widespread use of chemicals in agriculture
sentences.chinese: 化学品在农业中的广泛使用

detailed_translations.english: existing or happening in many places or situations, or among many people

sentences.english: an antique rosewood desk
sentences.chinese: 古董红木书桌

detailed_translations.chinese: 古老的，年代久远的；过时的，古董的；古风的，古式的
detailed_translations.english: antique furniture, jewellery etc is old and often valuable

detailed_translations.chinese: 古董，古玩；古风，古希腊和古罗马艺术风格
detailed_translations.english: a piece of furniture, jewellery etc that was made a very long time ago and is therefore valuable

name: thaw
trans: 融化，解冻；化冻；变暖；变得友善

sentences.english: The lake thawed in March.
sentences.chinese: 3月里，湖水解冻了。

detailed_translations.english: if ice or snow thaws, or if the sun thaws it, it turns into water
a period of warm weather during which snow and ice melt

name: fasten
trans: 使固定； 系牢， 扎牢； 握住， 抓牢

sentences.english: ‘I’m going now,’ she said, fastening her coat.
sentences.chinese: “现在我要走了。”她一边说，一边扣上大衣。

sentences.english: Fasten your seat belt.
sentences.chinese: 请系好安全带。

detailed_translations.english: to join together the two sides of a coat, shirt, bag etc so that it is closed
to firmly close a window, gate etc so that it will not open, or to become firmly closed

sentences.english: fumes from a toxic waste dump
sentences.chinese: 有毒废料堆产生的毒气

sentences.english: a highly toxic pesticide
sentences.chinese: 毒性很强的杀虫剂

detailed_translations.english: containing poison, or caused by poisonous substances

name: contest
trans: 竞争； 争辩， 就…提出异议
竞赛； 辩论； 争夺

sentences.english: Stone decided to hold a contest to see who could write the best song.
sentences.chinese: 斯通决定举行一场比赛，看谁能够写出最佳歌曲。

sentences.english: I only entered the contest for fun.
sentences.chinese: 我只是为了好玩才参加这次比赛的。

sentences.english: It is clear that the election will be a close contest .
sentences.chinese: 显然这次选举将是一场难分高下的角逐。

sentences.english: the 1975 Liberal leadership contest
sentences.chinese: 1975年自由党的领导权之争

detailed_translations.english: a competition or a situation in which two or more people or groups are competing with each other

detailed_translations.chinese: 争夺， 与…竞争； 对…提出质疑， 辩驳
detailed_translations.english: to say formally that you do not accept something or do not agree with it

name: asymmetrical
trans: 不均匀的， 不对称的

sentences.english: asymmetrical patterns
sentences.chinese: 不对称图案

detailed_translations.english: having two sides that are different in shape

name: turmoil
trans: 骚动， 混乱； 焦虑

sentences.english: She lived through the turmoil of the French Revolution.
sentences.chinese: 她经历过法国大革命的混乱之后仍旧活着。

detailed_translations.english: a state of confusion, excitement, or anxiety

name: clench
trans: 握紧， 抓牢； 咬紧

sentences.english: a cigar clenched between his teeth
sentences.chinese: 他叼在嘴里的一支雪茄

detailed_translations.english: to hold something tightly in your hand or between your teeth

sentences.english: a conflict between tradition and modernity
sentences.chinese: 传统与现代的冲突

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being modern

name: schematic
trans: 图解的； 纲要的； 严谨的

sentences.english: a schematic diagram of DNA
sentences.chinese: 脱氧核糖核酸结构简图

detailed_translations.english: showing the main parts of something in a simple way

sentences.english: The trial has rekindled painful memories of the war.
sentences.chinese: 这场审判又唤起了人们对战争的痛苦回忆。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone have a particular feeling, thought etc again

sentences.english: The industry underwent a period of rapid expansion.
sentences.chinese: 该产业经历了一轮快速扩张。

detailed_translations.english: when something increases in size, range, amount etc

name: wrench
trans: 扭伤； 痛苦， 难受； 扳手

sentences.english: I wrenched the packet from his grasp.
sentences.chinese: 我用力夺过他攥在手里的纸袋。

sentences.english: He grabbed the rope and gave it a wrench.
sentences.chinese: 他抓住绳子猛地一拉。

detailed_translations.english: to twist and pull something roughly from the place where it is being held
a twisting movement that pulls something violently

sentences.english: No special license will be regranted to anyone from now on.
sentences.chinese: 特殊许可证今后不得向任何人再行发放。

sentences.english: Remind me to renew the driver's license.It will lapse next month.
sentences.chinese: 提醒我更换驾驶执照，它下个月就失效了。

sentences.english: The next time the client connects to the server, it will obtain another license.
sentences.chinese: 在客户端下一次连接到服务器时，它将获得另一个许可证。

detailed_translations.english: to give official permission for someone to do or produce something, or for an activity to take place

sentences.english: Steam puffed out of the chimney.
sentences.chinese: 蒸汽从烟囱里一股一股地喷出来。

sentences.english: The boiler was puffing thick black smoke.
sentences.chinese: 锅炉一股股地冒出浓浓的黑烟。

sentences.english: Don’t puff smoke into my face.
sentences.chinese: 别把烟朝我脸上喷。

sentences.english: I took a puff on the cigarette and started coughing.
sentences.chinese: 我抽了一口烟就开始咳嗽起来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 喷出，张开；使膨胀；夸张；使骄傲自满
detailed_translations.english: if smoke, steam etc puffs from somewhere, or if something puffs it, it comes out in little clouds

detailed_translations.chinese: 粉扑；泡芙；蓬松；一阵喷烟；肿块；吹嘘，宣传广告
detailed_translations.english: Puff is also a noun

name: expand
trans: 扩张； 膨胀； 伸展， 伸开

sentences.english: Water expands as it freezes.
sentences.chinese: 水结冰时会膨胀。

sentences.english: Sydney’s population expanded rapidly in the 1960s.
sentences.chinese: 20世纪60年代，悉尼的人口迅速增加。

sentences.english: exercises that expand the chest muscles
sentences.chinese: 扩展胸肌的运动

sentences.english: his expanding waistline
sentences.chinese: 他那逐渐增大的腰围

detailed_translations.english: to become larger in size, number, or amount, or to make something become larger

sentences.english: The home team squandered a number of chances in the first half.
sentences.chinese: 主队在上半场浪费了几次机会。

detailed_translations.english: to carelessly waste money, time, opportunities etc

sentences.english: I created a background synchronizer that used RestKit as it seemed to have everything I needed.
sentences.chinese: 我创建了一个背景同步，用restkit好像有我需要的一切。

sentences.english: A frame synchronizer with recognizer and discriminator is described, which consists mainlyof a type 8951 singlechip computer, a type 8254 programmable counter and a GAL chip.
sentences.chinese: 在激光水下通信的节头内插入捕获序列，用8951，8254，GAL等芯片构成识别判决式帧同步器。

name: perimeter
trans: 周长； 外缘， 边缘

sentences.english: ...the perimeter of the airport.
sentences.chinese: …机场周边。

detailed_translations.chinese: 周长；周界；[眼科] 视野计
detailed_translations.english: the whole length of the border around an area or shape

name: essay
trans: 散文， 随笔； 短文； 评论

sentences.english: an essay on Bernard Shaw
sentences.chinese: 关于萧伯纳的文章

sentences.english: We asked Jason to write an essay about his hometown.
sentences.chinese: 我们让杰森写一篇关于他家乡的短文。

detailed_translations.english: a short piece of writing about a particular subject by a student as part of a course of study

name: retrieve
trans: 取回， 索回； 挽回， 扭转颓势； 检索

sentences.english: She bent down to retrieve her earring.
sentences.chinese: 她俯身去捡回耳环。

detailed_translations.chinese: 重新得到， 取回， 收回； 挽回， 补救； 检索
detailed_translations.english: to find something and bring it back

sentences.english: Of the 100 companies surveyed, 10% had a turnover of £50 m to £99 m.
sentences.chinese: 被调查的 100 家公司中，10% 的公司营业额在 5,000 万到 9,900 万英镑之间。

sentences.english: She turned to survey her daughter’s pale face.
sentences.chinese: 她转过头审视女儿苍白的面容。

sentences.english: We conducted a survey of parents in the village.
sentences.chinese: 我们对这个村子的孩子父母作了一次调查。

sentences.english: a geological survey
sentences.chinese: 地质勘察

detailed_translations.english: to ask a large number of people questions in order to find out their attitudes or opinions
a set of questions that you ask a large number of people in order to find out about their opinions or behaviour

sentences.english: James bore her no malice (= did not feel any malice towards her ) .
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯对她并无恶意。

detailed_translations.english: the desire to harm someone because you hate them

sentences.english: The match had to be postponed until next week.
sentences.chinese: 比赛不得不推迟到下周举行。

sentences.english: His trial has been postponed indefinitely (= no one knows when it will happen ) .
sentences.chinese: 对他的审判被无限期推迟了。

detailed_translations.english: to change the date or time of a planned event or action to a later one

name: codify
trans: 把…编成法典， 使法律成文化； 整理， 系统化

sentences.english: The latest draft of the agreement codifies the panel's decision.
sentences.chinese: 该协议的最新草案将专家小组的决定编篡成了法规条款。

detailed_translations.chinese: 编纂；将编成法典；编成法典
detailed_translations.english: to arrange laws, principles, facts etc in a system

sentences.english: a shark’s dorsal fin
sentences.chinese: 鲨鱼的背鳍

detailed_translations.english: on or relating to the back of an animal or fish

name: code
trans: 法典， 法规； 密码， 代码

sentences.english: The spy sent his message in code.
sentences.chinese: 这个间谍用密码发送情报。

sentences.english: But we have not yet implemented this in the code.
sentences.chinese: 但我们在代码中尚未实现此功能。

sentences.english: The hacker came smack up against the company's policy of keeping its records in code.
sentences.chinese: 这个计算机黑客突然碰壁了，因这家公司实行了用密码保存公司纪录的政策。

sentences.english: I let the silver nitrate react with pieces of brain hardened in potassium dichromate.
sentences.chinese: 我让已被重铬酸钾硬化的一些脑组织细胞与硝酸银反应。

sentences.english: Tomatoes is a remarkable vegetable for your skin as it is high in vitamin A, vitamin C, and potassium.
sentences.chinese: 您的皮肤来说西红柿是一个了不起的蔬菜，因为它富含维生素A ，维生素C ，和钾。

sentences.english: They also contain a rich supply of vitamins A and C, folate, potassium, magnesium and fiber, which may reduce the risk of certain cancers.
sentences.chinese: 他们还包含了丰富的维生素A和C ，叶酸，钾，镁，纤维，这些都是可以减少患有某些癌症风险的元素。

detailed_translations.english: a common soft silver-white metal that usually exists in combination with other substances, used for example in farming. It is a chemical element: symbol K

name: displace
trans: 取代； 撤职； 迫使…离开家园

sentences.english: Coal has been displaced by natural gas as a major source of energy.
sentences.chinese: 作为一种主要能源，煤的地位已为天然气所取代。

sentences.english: immigrants who displace US workers in the job market
sentences.chinese: 在就业市场上取代美国工人的移民

detailed_translations.english: to take the place or position of something or someone

sentences.english: The rain was hammering against the window.
sentences.chinese: 雨点不停地敲打着窗户。

detailed_translations.english: to hit something many times, especially making a loud noise
a tool with a heavy metal part on a long handle, used for hitting nails into wood
to hit something with a hammer in order to force it into a particular position or shape

name: ideology
trans: 思想体系； 意识形态

sentences.english: the ideologies of fascism and terrorism
sentences.chinese: 法西斯主义和恐怖主义的意识形态

sentences.english: a new ideology based on individualism
sentences.chinese: 基于个人主义的新思想体系

detailed_translations.english: a set of beliefs on which a political or economic system is based, or which strongly influence the way people behave

name: seal
trans: 海豹； 封铅， 封条； 印， 图章

sentences.english: The document carried the seal of the governor’s office.
sentences.chinese: 文件上盖有州长办公室的章。

sentences.english: He broke the wax seal and unrolled the paper.
sentences.chinese: 他揭去封蜡，把纸卷展开。

sentences.english: The window was sealed shut.
sentences.chinese: 这扇窗户被封了起来。

detailed_translations.english: a mark that has a special design and shows the legal or official authority of a person or organization
to close an entrance or a container with something that stops air, water etc from coming in or out of it

sentences.english: The state police are investigating the incident.
sentences.chinese: 州警察正调查此事。

sentences.english: The study investigates the impact of violent TV programming on children.
sentences.chinese: 该研究调查暴力电视节目对儿童的影响。

sentences.english: I heard a noise and went downstairs to investigate.
sentences.chinese: 我听见响声，就下楼去看个究竟。

detailed_translations.english: to try to find out the truth about something such as a crime, accident, or scientific problem

name: storage
trans: 库房； 贮藏； 存储

sentences.english: the storage of highly radioactive material
sentences.chinese: 高放射性材料的存放

sentences.english: storage costs
sentences.chinese: 保管费用

detailed_translations.english: the process of keeping or putting something in a special place while it is not being used

sentences.english: The orange layer is known as the troposphere, where all of the weather and clouds are generated and contained.
sentences.chinese: 橘黄色的那一层被称为“对流层”，那里是所有的气候状况和云层形成和演变的地方。

sentences.english: The lowest layer of the atmosphere is known as the troposphere, which is constantly in motion, causing the weather.
sentences.chinese: 地球大气层的最底层是所谓的对流层，这一层的大气不断运动，引起了气象变化。

sentences.english: The reasons are as below, the Pacific jet stream or planetary waves in troposphere can directly affect the Pacific center of action of the AO.
sentences.chinese: 这主要是因为太平洋急流或准定常行星波在对流层中直接影响了位于该区域的北极涛动的活动中心。

detailed_translations.english: the lowest atmospheric layer, about 18 kilometres (11 miles) thick at the equator to about 6 km (4 miles) at the Poles, in which air temperature decreases normally with height at about 6.5°C per km

sentences.english: a big tax swindle
sentences.chinese: 巨额税款诈骗

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which someone gets money by deceiving someone else
to get money from someone by deceiving them

name: illusion
trans: 幻觉， 错觉； 幻想中的事物

sentences.english: She was under no illusion that he loved her.
sentences.chinese: 她不再幻想他爱她了。

sentences.english: It is an illusion that the Arctic is dark in winter.
sentences.chinese: 认为北极冬天一片黑暗是错误的。

sentences.english: She had no illusions about her physical attractiveness.
sentences.chinese: 她对自己外表的吸引力不抱幻想。

sentences.english: ‘I hate to shatter your illusions,’ he said.
sentences.chinese: “我不愿意打破你的幻想。”他说。

detailed_translations.chinese: 幻想， 错误的观念； 错觉， 幻觉， 假象
detailed_translations.english: an idea or opinion that is wrong, especially about yourself

sentences.english: high productivity levels in manufacturing
sentences.chinese: 制造业中的高生产率

sentences.english: It cost the country $4 million in lost productivity .
sentences.chinese: 它对该国造成了400万美元的生产力损失。

detailed_translations.english: the rate at which goods are produced, and the amount produced, especially in relation to the work, time, and money needed to produce them

name: reserve
trans: 储备；自然保护区；谨慎；替补队员；后备部队

sentences.english: Do you have to reserve tickets in advance?
sentences.chinese: 你必须预先订票吗？

detailed_translations.english: to arrange for a place in a hotel, restaurant, plane etc to be kept for you to use at a particular time in the future

detailed_translations.chinese: 储备； 保留； 拘谨， 矜持； 替补队员， 后备部队； 自然保护区
detailed_translations.english: a supply of something kept to be used if it is needed

sentences.english: The prisoners subsisted on one mug of the worst quality porridge three times a day.
sentences.chinese: 犯人一天三次靠一杯最差的粥维持生活。

detailed_translations.english: to stay alive when you only have small amounts of food or money

sentences.english: Concept artist Terryl Whitlatch wanted the colo claw fish to have an invertebrate look, so her early designs were based on an earwig.
sentences.chinese: 概念画家特丽尔·惠特拉奇希望科洛爪鱼拥有无脊椎动物的外表，所以她的早期设计是以蠼螋为基础的。

sentences.english: There was a hierarchical system in neurobiology, and working in invertebrate animals was not looked upon favorably, except in a very special case: the squid giant axon.
sentences.chinese: 神经生物学中有一个等级系统，无脊椎动物的研究不被看好，除了非常特殊的例子：枪乌贼巨大的轴突。

sentences.english: Smithers, don't you think it's ironic that your irregular night-time activities are in inverse proportion to your reputation as an expert in the area of invertebrate research?
sentences.chinese: 斯密德斯，难道你不认为自己无规律的夜生活与你作为无脊椎动物研究领域的专家的声望成反比是具有讽刺意味的吗？

detailed_translations.english: a living creature that does not have a  backbone

sentences.english: Diving off the cliffs is dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 从悬崖上跳水是很危险的。

sentences.english: The first time you dive on a coral reef is an experience you will never forget.
sentences.chinese: 第一次在珊瑚礁潜水是毕生难忘的经历。

sentences.english: The submarine began to dive.
sentences.chinese: 潜水艇开始下潜。

sentences.english: Thankfully, the pilot managed to pull out of the dive and regain control.
sentences.chinese: 幸亏驾驶员设法将俯冲的飞机拉起，恢复了对飞机的控制。

detailed_translations.english: to jump into deep water with your head and arms going in first

detailed_translations.chinese: 跳水（的动作）；潜水（的动作）；俯冲
detailed_translations.english: a jump into deep water with your head and arms going in first

name: sympathy
trans: 同情， 同情心； 赞同， 支持

sentences.english: Our sympathies are with the families of the victims.
sentences.chinese: 我们向受害者家庭表示慰问。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being sorry for someone who is in a bad situation

sentences.english: Survivors of the crash were rescued by helicopter.
sentences.chinese: 空难的生还者被直升机救了出来。

sentences.english: a daring rescue at sea
sentences.chinese: 英勇的海上营救行动

detailed_translations.english: to save someone or something from a situation of danger or harm
when someone or something is rescued from danger

sentences.english: We stopped by Alice’s house for a brief visit.
sentences.chinese: 我们顺路在艾丽斯家小坐片刻。

sentences.english: Let’s keep this conversation brief; I have a plane to catch.
sentences.chinese: 我们长话短说吧，我还要赶飞机。

sentences.english: A Defense Department spokesman briefed reporters.
sentences.chinese: 一位国防部发言人向记者们介绍了情况。

detailed_translations.english: continuing for a short time

detailed_translations.chinese: 向…介绍基本情况，做…的提要
detailed_translations.english: If someone briefs you, especially about a piece of work or a serious matter, they give you information that you need before you do it or consider it
a short spoken or written statement giving facts about a law case

name: recover
trans: 复原， 恢复； 重新获得； 收回

sentences.english: After a few days of fever, she began to recover.
sentences.chinese: 发烧几天之后，她开始恢复。

sentences.english: Two bodies were recovered from the wreckage.
sentences.chinese: 残骸中找到了两具尸体

detailed_translations.english: to get better after an illness, accident, shock etc

sentences.english: ...problems caused by the influx of refugees.
sentences.chinese: …难民大量涌入所造成的问题。

detailed_translations.english: the arrival of large numbers of people or large amounts of money, goods etc, especially suddenly

name: determine
trans: 查明， 确定； 决心， 决定； 支配， 影响

sentences.english: Investigators are still trying to determine the cause of the fire.
sentences.chinese: 调查人员仍在设法弄清失火的原因。

detailed_translations.english: to find out the facts about something

name: devastate
trans: 破坏， 毁坏； 令人震惊， 使难以承受

sentences.english: The city centre was devastated by the bomb.
sentences.chinese: 市中心被这枚炸弹摧毁了。

detailed_translations.english: to damage something very badly or completely

sentences.english: He's embarking on a new career as a writer.
sentences.chinese: 他正开始一个当作家的新生涯。

detailed_translations.chinese: 上船； 着手， 开始工作
detailed_translations.english: to go onto a ship or a plane, or to put or take something onto a ship or plane

sentences.english: My cousin Mark helped me to bring in the bags.
sentences.chinese: 我表弟马克帮我把包提了进来。

detailed_translations.english: the child of your uncle or aunt

sentences.english: a group of highly intelligent (= very intelligent )students
sentences.chinese: 一组聪明异常的学生

sentences.english: Sontag was once famously described as the most intelligent woman in America.
sentences.chinese: 桑塔格曾被称为美国最聪明的女人，这是众人皆知的事。

detailed_translations.english: an intelligent person has a high level of mental ability and is good at understanding ideas and thinking clearly

name: confer
trans: 授予； 协商， 商讨

sentences.english: He conferred with Hill and the others in his office.
sentences.chinese: 他和希尔以及他办公室里的其他人进行了商议。

detailed_translations.english: to discuss something with other people, so that everyone can express their opinions and decide on something
to officially give someone a title etc, especially as a reward for something they have achieved

name: friction
trans: 摩擦； 摩擦力； 矛盾， 冲突

sentences.english: Check your rope frequently, as friction against the rock can wear it away.
sentences.chinese: 要经常检查绳索，因为与岩石摩擦会使它磨损。

detailed_translations.english: when one surface rubs against another

sentences.english: coffee and walnut cake
sentences.chinese: 咖啡核桃蛋糕

detailed_translations.english: a nut that you can eat, shaped like a human brain

sentences.english: It rained incessantly for the whole two weeks.
sentences.chinese: 雨不间断地下了整整两个星期。

sentences.english: The machines roar incessantly during the hours of daylight.
sentences.chinese: 机器在白天隆隆地响个不停。

sentences.english: It 's fine to make conversation and inquire into your friend's well-being — but don't ask incessantly.
sentences.chinese: 你可以和朋友交流，关心以下她的近况，但别总是不停地询问。 㐺。

sentences.english: Much subsequent poetry in england was influenced by imagist lord and practice .
sentences.chinese: 后来的英国诗歌中有许多诗受到了意象主义的箴言和实践的影响。

name: radiation
trans: 放射； 辐射； 放射物， 放射线； 辐射的热

sentences.english: An accident at the power station could result in large amounts of radiation being released.
sentences.chinese: 发电站事故会造成大量核辐射泄漏。

sentences.english: a lethal dose of radiation
sentences.chinese: 致命剂量的辐射

sentences.english: Sun creams work by blocking harmful ultraviolet radiation.
sentences.chinese: 防晒霜可隔离有害的紫外线辐射。

detailed_translations.english: a form of energy that comes especially from nuclear reactions, which in large amounts is very harmful to living things

name: luxury
trans: 奢侈， 奢华； 奢侈品

sentences.english: He was leading a life of luxury in Australia.
sentences.chinese: 他在澳大利亚过着豪华舒适的生活。

sentences.english: The dress is lambswool – pure luxury.
sentences.chinese: 礼服是用羔羊毛制作的——绝对奢华。

sentences.english: luxuries like chocolate and perfume
sentences.chinese: 巧克力、香水之类的奢侈品

detailed_translations.english: very great comfort and pleasure, such as you get from expensive food, beautiful houses, cars etc

sentences.english: Next, move to the diagonal section at the back-right side of the diamond.
sentences.chinese: 下一个,在钻石的背面-正确的边移到对角线的区段。

sentences.english: And then there is this group of about half a dozen right down the diagonal middle.
sentences.chinese: 然后有一个包含六个元素的元素组,在周期表的对角线的中部。

sentences.english: The average reader reads about 240 words per minute, where as a diagonal reader ‘reads’ (actually scans) closer to 15 words per second or about 900 words per minute.
sentences.chinese: 一般读者每分钟阅读240字，而作为一个对角线读者的“阅读速度”（到不如说是浏览）接近每秒15字或大约每分钟900字。

name: knit
trans: 编结， 编织； 紧密结合， 使紧凑； 愈合； 皱紧， 皱

sentences.english: My grandmother taught me how to knit.
sentences.chinese: 我祖母教过我编织。

sentences.english: She’s knitting a sweater.
sentences.chinese: 她在织毛衣。

detailed_translations.english: to make clothing out of wool, using two knitting needles

name: aroma
trans: 芳香， 香味； 气氛， 氛围

sentences.english: the aroma of fresh coffee
sentences.chinese: 新煮咖啡的香味

detailed_translations.english: a strong pleasant smell

sentences.english: He was engaged in subversive activities .
sentences.chinese: 他参与了颠覆活动。

to join two things together using cement , glue, etc.

sentences.english: the New York City subway
sentences.chinese: 纽约市的地铁

sentences.english: a crowded subway station
sentences.chinese: 拥挤的地铁站

sentences.english: Boston has the oldest subway system in the US.
sentences.chinese: 波士顿拥有美国最老的地铁运输系统。

detailed_translations.english: a railway system that runs under the ground below a big city

name: scourge
trans: 鞭子； 祸害； 鞭笞

sentences.english: Economic anarchy scourged the post-war world.
sentences.chinese: 经济混乱蹂躏战后世界。

detailed_translations.english: to hit someone with a whip as punishment in the past
a  whip  used to punish people in the past

sentences.english: Have steps been taken to acquaint breeders with their right to apply for licenses?
sentences.chinese: 已经采取措施让饲养动物者了解他们申请执照的权利了吗？

detailed_translations.english: If you acquaint someone with something, you tell them about it so that they know it. If you acquaint yourself with something, you learn about it.

sentences.english: If you don't exercise your muscles, they weaken and atrophy.
sentences.chinese: 如果不锻炼你的肌肉，肌力就削弱和萎缩了。

sentences.english: If compassion can only be activated by sustained attention, which is prevented by fast-cut editing, then the ability to be genuinely moved by another’s story could atrophy.
sentences.chinese: 如果只能通过持续的关注激活同情心，而这种关注又受到快速切断编辑的阻碍，那么，被他人的故事真正打动的能力就会萎缩。

sentences.english: The compounds "likely have an effecton motor neurons"—responsible for controlling movements—"but that isa hunch at present, based on the type of atrophy we saw, " Hughes said inan email.
sentences.chinese: 这些化合物“可能对运动神经元（负责控制运动）产生作用”----“根据我们观察到的萎缩症类型，目前这只是个预测，”休斯在一封电子邮件中说。

sentences.english: Mash the bananas to a pulp .
sentences.chinese: 把香蕉捣成糊状。

sentences.english: timber grown for wood pulp
sentences.chinese: 种植以制造纸浆的树木

sentences.english: a soft pulp of leaves and mud
sentences.chinese: 树叶和泥巴混成的浆液

detailed_translations.english: a very soft substance that is almost liquid, made by crushing plants, wood, vegetables etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 使…化成纸浆；除去…的果肉
detailed_translations.english: to beat or crush something until it becomes very soft and almost liquid

name: undergraduate
trans: 大学肄业生； 大学本科生

sentences.english: second-year undergraduates
sentences.chinese: 大学二年级学生

detailed_translations.english: a student at college or university, who is working for their first degree

sentences.english: "If you can stop the enzymes involved in that process with a small molecule or chemical," says Dunman, "that chemical could be an antibiotic.
sentences.chinese: “如果能用一小分子或化学物质阻止这一酶的活性过程，”德明说，“这种化学物质就能够用来做抗生素。”

sentences.english: If we all recognize that antibiotic resistance is one of the greatest threats to public health that we face today, we have to do something about this.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们大家都能认识到耐抗生素（药性）已经成为我们今天面对的最大的公众健康威胁之一，我们就真的需要做点什么了。

detailed_translations.english: a drug that is used to kill  bacteria  and cure infections

name: joint
trans: 连接的； 共同的， 共有的， 联合的

sentences.english: The two ministers have issued a joint statement.
sentences.chinese: 两位部长发布了一项联合声明。

sentences.english: Both companies are involved in the joint development of a new medium-sized car.
sentences.chinese: 两家公司联合开发一款新的中型汽车。

sentences.english: The meal was a joint effort(= two or more people worked on it together ).
sentences.chinese: 这顿饭是大家一起做的。

sentences.english: Manchester United and Arsenal are joint favourites to win the title (= are thought to have the same chance of winning ).
sentences.chinese: 曼联和阿森纳均为夺冠的热门球队。

sentences.english: Both parties must sign the form if the account is to be in joint names(= belong to two named people ).
sentences.chinese: 如果这是联名账户的话，双方都必须在表格上签名。

detailed_translations.english: involving two or more people or groups, or owned or shared by them

name: separate
trans: 分离； 划分； 区别； 分居

sentences.english: The gym and the sauna are in separate buildings.
sentences.chinese: 健身房和桑拿浴室在不同的大楼里。

detailed_translations.english: not joined to or touching something else

name: reasonable
trans: 合理的， 适当的； 通情达理的； 公道的

sentences.english: a reasonable request
sentences.chinese: 合情合理的要求

sentences.english: Be reasonable — you can’t expect her to do all the work on her own!
sentences.chinese: 要讲道理，你不能指望她一个人干所有的工作！

sentences.english: I thought it was a perfectly reasonable (= completely reasonable ) question.
sentences.chinese: 我认为这个问题问得很有道理。

sentences.english: He had reasonable grounds (= good reasons but no proof ) for believing the law had been broken.
sentences.chinese: 他有合理的根据认为有人违法了。

sentences.english: good food at a reasonable price
sentences.chinese: 价格公道的美食

detailed_translations.english: fair and sensible

name: endangered
trans: 濒危的， 将要灭绝的

sentences.english: I think there are many endangered animals in the world, such as tigers and pandas.
sentences.chinese: 我认为有许多濒临灭绝的动物，如老虎和大熊猫，在世界。

sentences.english: I think our government should punish those people severely who kill the rare animals. It is our duty to protect the endangered animals.
sentences.chinese: 我认为政府应该严厉惩罚那些捕杀稀有动物的人。保护濒临灭绝的动物是我们的责任。

sentences.english: However, it holds six language families, two of which have only one remaining language, and almost all of the languages here are endangered.
sentences.chinese: 然而，它拥有六个语族，其中两个语族仅剩下一种语言，而且这儿几乎所有的语言都濒临灭绝。

detailed_translations.chinese: 濒危的， 将要灭绝的

name: haphazard
trans: 偶然的， 任意的； 无计划的， 无秩序的

sentences.english: It was strings of words borrowed from the different languages around them and put together in sort of haphazard ways.
sentences.chinese: 它只不过是从身边的不同语言当中,借用了一些单词串,以随意的方式将它们放在一起

sentences.english: All the master had to do was shake the tree a little and the garden was full of leaves again, spread out in haphazard patterns.
sentences.chinese: 大师什么都没有做，只是摇了摇树。 花园又重新被凋落的树叶覆盖了，整个花园展现出随意的样式。

detailed_translations.english: the piece of thread in a candle, that burns when you light it

sentences.english: a biannual report
sentences.chinese: 半年度报告

detailed_translations.english: happening twice each year

name: elicit
trans: 得出， 引出； 诱出

sentences.chinese: 我写给她的信没有得到回应。

detailed_translations.english: If you elicit a piece of information, you get it by asking the right questions

name: relegate
trans: 使贬职， 使降级； 放逐， 贬谪

sentences.english: Might it not be better to relegate the king to a purely ceremonial function?
sentences.chinese: 使该国王降级到一种纯粹礼仪性的职能难道不更好吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 使降位， 使降级； 把…委托给
detailed_translations.english: if a sports team is relegated, it is moved into a lower  division

name: ambiguity
trans: 模棱两可的话； 歧义

sentences.chinese: 法律上含混不清的地方

detailed_translations.chinese: 含糊；不明确；暧昧；模棱两可的话
detailed_translations.english: the state of being unclear, confusing, or not certain, or things that produce this effect

name: trivial
trans: 琐碎的， 微不足道的

sentences.english: a trivial detail

sentences.chinese: 我知道这事听起来微不足道，但我还是放心不下。

trans: 知道， 意识， 察觉

sentences.english: Health officials have tried to raise awareness (=  improve people’s knowledge  ) about AIDS.
sentences.chinese: 卫生部官员努力提高人们对艾滋病的认识。

detailed_translations.english: knowledge or understanding of a particular subject or situation

sentences.english: Don’t forget to send us a postcard!
sentences.chinese: 别忘了给我们寄张明信片！

detailed_translations.english: a card that can be sent in the post without an envelope, especially one with a picture on it

sentences.chinese: 中国古人说蒜能延寿。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of time that someone or something lives

sentences.english: a military helicopter
sentences.chinese: 军用直升机

sentences.english: military equipment
sentences.chinese: 军事设备

sentences.english: The government has threatened to take military action if the rebels do not withdraw from the area.
sentences.chinese: 政府警告说，如果叛乱分子不从该地区撤出，就要采取军事行动。

sentences.english: The United States is prepared to use military force to achieve its aims.
sentences.chinese: 美国准备动用武力达成目的。

sentences.english: a raid by European military forces
sentences.chinese: 欧洲军事力量发动的袭击

detailed_translations.english: used by, involving, or relating to the army, navy, or airforce
the military forces of a country

sentences.english: She gave a reluctant smile.
sentences.chinese: 她勉强笑了笑。

detailed_translations.english: slow and unwilling

name: conscientious
trans: 凭良心的； 认真谨慎的， 一丝不苟的

sentences.chinese: 一个认真负责的教师可能会想着把工作带回家去做。

sentences.english: a conscientious and hard-working student
sentences.chinese: 勤勉刻苦的学生

detailed_translations.english: careful to do everything that it is your job or duty to do

sentences.english: Shake the rope and let the coils unwind.
sentences.chinese: 抖动绳索把绳圈展开。

sentences.english: a coil of wire
sentences.chinese: 一圈金属线

sentences.chinese: 薄雾盘绕着山巅。

name: authoritative
trans: 官方的； 权威性的， 可信的； 专断的， 命令式的

sentences.english: the most authoritative work on English surnames
sentences.chinese: 有关英语姓氏的最权威著作

detailed_translations.english: an authoritative book, account etc is respected because the person who wrote it knows a lot about the subject

trans: 确保， 担保， 保证

sentences.chinese: 确保骑车人安全的设施

trans: 生物， 有机物； 有机体

sentences.chinese: 一切生物都要适应环境条件的变化。

sentences.english: Genes operate together in determining the characteristics of an individual organism.
sentences.chinese: 基因的共同作用决定生物个体的特性。

trans: 流行性的， 传染性的

sentences.chinese: 去年流感大暴发期间有五百多人死亡。

sentences.chinese: 死亡人数远远超过最初的预料。

sentences.chinese: 没有理由认为他在说谎。

detailed_translations.english: to think that something is probably true, based on what you know

sentences.chinese: 一个道德上无所顾忌的男人

detailed_translations.english: a belief about what is right and wrong that prevents you from doing bad things

name: remarkable

sentences.chinese: 她取得了显著的进步。

sentences.english: a remarkable coincidence
sentences.chinese: 不寻常的巧合

sentences.english: He’s a remarkable man .
sentences.chinese: 他是个了不起的人。

detailed_translations.english: unusual or surprising and therefore deserving attention or praise

sentences.english: Do you like its flavor?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢它的味道吗?。

sentences.english: When things had flavor , we knew what we were eating all the while ----and it satisfied us .
sentences.chinese: 当食物有滋味的时候，我们从头到尾都知道自己吃的是什么，从中得到满足。

sentences.english: I consider the eels to be the best quality protein in my line—a very unique flavor of fish, applewood smoke, and a momentary lingering of dark, fall honey.
sentences.chinese: 我认为，在我的行当里，鳗鱼是最优质的蛋白质——一种非常独特的风味鱼，用苹果木烟熏，在暗处晾一会，再抹上秋天的蜂蜜。

sentences.chinese: 洞穴的幽深处

name: extract
trans: 取出； 提取， 榨取
提出物； 摘录， 选段； 精， 汁

sentences.english: You’ll have to have that tooth extracted.
sentences.chinese: 你得把那颗牙拔掉。

sentences.english: Oils are extracted from the plants.
sentences.chinese: 从这些植物中提炼出油。

sentences.english: I’ve only seen short extracts from the film.

detailed_translations.english: expressing your opinions honestly and directly, even when doing this might annoy some people

name: obscure

sentences.chinese: 名不见经传的诗人

sentences.english: The details of his life remain obscure.
sentences.chinese: 他的生平不详。

sentences.english: Trees obscured his vision; he couldn't see much of the square's southern half.
sentences.chinese: 树木遮住了他的视线，他不怎么看得见广场南半部。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不著名的，不重要的；费解的，模糊不清的
detailed_translations.english: not well known and usually not very important
If one thing obscures another, it prevents it from being seen or heard properly

sentences.english: noxious fumes
sentences.chinese: 有毒烟雾

detailed_translations.chinese: 有害的；有毒的；败坏道德的；讨厌的
detailed_translations.english: harmful or poisonous

sentences.english: I'll bolster you up.
sentences.chinese: 我支持你。

sentences.english: More timbers are needed to bolster the roof of the mine.
sentences.chinese: 需要更多的木材支撑矿顶。

sentences.english: If you have a bolster or several pillows, place your lower back onto the support.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有一个支撑或者一些枕头，将你的下半身靠在这些支撑上。

detailed_translations.english: a long firm  pillow  , usually shaped like a tube

name: region
trans: 层； 地区， 区域； 范围

sentences.english: efforts to bring peace to the region
sentences.chinese: 给这个地区带来和平的努力

detailed_translations.english: a large area of a country or of the world, usually without exact limits

sentences.english: He had been deceived by a young man claiming to be the son of a millionaire.
sentences.chinese: 他被一个自称是百万富翁之子的年轻人骗了。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone believe something that is not true
to make someone believe something that is not true

name: ingenious
trans: 巧妙的； 聪明的， 机敏的； 善于创造发明的； 设计独特的， 别致的

sentences.english: an ingenious device
sentences.chinese: 精巧的装置

sentences.english: an ingenious cook
sentences.chinese: 心灵手巧的厨师

detailed_translations.english: (of an object, a plan, an idea, etc.) very suitable for a particular purpose and resulting from clever new ideas

sentences.english: Teachers will be asked to fill in a questionnaire.
sentences.chinese: 教师们将被要求填写一份调查问卷。

detailed_translations.english: a written set of questions which you give to a large number of people in order to collect information

sentences.english: The company looks poised to make a significant breakthrough in China.
sentences.chinese: 该公司看上去稳将在中国实现一次重大突破。

detailed_translations.english: an important new discovery in something you are studying, especially one made after trying for a long time

name: snack
trans: 快餐， 小吃， 点心

sentences.english: I grabbed a quick snack.
sentences.chinese: 我赶紧吃了点零食。

sentences.english: Drinks and light snacks are served at the bar.
sentences.chinese: 酒吧里供应饮料和小吃。

sentences.english: snack foods like crisps and peanuts
sentences.chinese: 炸薯片和花生之类的小吃

detailed_translations.english: a small amount of food that is eaten between main meals or instead of a meal

name: amphibious
trans: 两栖的； 水陆两用的

sentences.english: amphibious creatures
sentences.chinese: 两栖生物

detailed_translations.chinese: [生物] 两栖的，水陆两用的；具有双重性的
detailed_translations.english: able to live both on land and in water

name: imprint
trans: 使铭记， 使牢记； 压印
印记， 印痕； 持久的影响

sentences.english: She could see the imprint of her fingers on his pale face.
sentences.chinese: 她可以看到自己的手指在他苍白的脸上留下的印痕。

sentences.english: As I arrived, the shimmering skyline of domes and minarets was imprinted on my memory.
sentences.chinese: 当我到达时，穹顶和尖塔形成的泛着微光的空中轮廓线铭刻在我的记忆中。

detailed_translations.chinese: 印记；痕迹；特征；版本说明
detailed_translations.english: the mark left by an object being pressed into or onto something
When something is imprinted on your memory, it is firmly fixed in your memory so that you will not forget it

sentences.english: Ellis Island has become one of America's most popular tourist destinations.
sentences.chinese: 埃利斯岛已经成为美国最受欢迎的游览地之一。

detailed_translations.english: the place that someone or something is going to

sentences.english: the yoke of tradition
sentences.chinese: 传统的枷锁

detailed_translations.english: a wooden bar used for keeping two animals together, especially cattle, when they are pulling heavy loads
to closely connect two ideas, people, or things

sentences.english: a vertical line
sentences.chinese: 垂直线

sentences.english: the vertical axis of a graph
sentences.chinese: 图的纵轴

sentences.english: vertical window blinds
sentences.chinese: 垂直百叶窗

sentences.english: The wall is several degrees off the vertical.
sentences.chinese: 这堵墙倾斜了有好几度。

detailed_translations.english: pointing up in a line that forms an angle of 90˚ with a flat surface
a vertical line or position

sentences.english: He spoke of the necessity for a reciprocal relationship that would be useful for all sides.
sentences.chinese: 他谈及需要建立对各方都有益的互惠关系。

sentences.english: Such treaties provide reciprocal rights and obligations.
sentences.chinese: 此类协议规定了相互之间的权利与义务。

detailed_translations.chinese: 互惠的；相互的；倒数的，彼此相反的
detailed_translations.english: a reciprocal arrangement or relationship is one in which two people or groups do or give the same things to each other

detailed_translations.chinese: [数] 倒数；互相起作用的事物

sentences.english: an education system that perpetuates the divisions in our society
sentences.chinese: 使我们的社会持续分化的一种教育制度

name: pure
trans: 纯洁的； 纯净的； 完全的； 纯理论的， 抽象的

sentences.english: rings made of pure gold
sentences.chinese: 纯金制成的戒指

sentences.english: Our beef patties are 100% pure.
sentences.chinese: 我们的牛肉饼是100%的纯牛肉。

sentences.english: His motives were pure.
sentences.chinese: 他动机纯正。

detailed_translations.english: not mixed with anything else; with nothing added

name: damp
trans: 弄湿； 减弱， 抑制

sentences.english: Damp had stained the walls.
sentences.chinese: 墙上留下了潮湿的痕迹。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使潮湿；使阻尼；使沮丧，抑制
detailed_translations.english: to dampen something
water in walls or in the air that causes things to be slightly wet
slightly wet, often in an unpleasant way

sentences.english: The report emphasizes the importance of improving safety standards.
sentences.chinese: 报告强调了改进安全标准的重要性。

sentences.english: Logan made a speech emphasizing the need for more volunteers.
sentences.chinese: 罗根发表演讲，强调需要更多的志愿者。

detailed_translations.english: to say something in a strong way

name: brighten

sentences.english: The time is limited, so he abridge his composition.
sentences.chinese: 时间有限，他缩短了他的作文。

sentences.english: She decided to abridge her stay in campus since she wants to hunt for a job immediately.
sentences.chinese: 考虑到她想要马上找工作，他决定缩短在校园里逗留的时间。

name: penalty
trans: 处罚， 惩罚； 罚金； 犯规的处罚

sentences.english: No littering. Penalty $500.
sentences.chinese: 禁止乱扔垃圾。 违者罚款500美元。

sentences.english: Withdrawing the money early will result in a 10% penalty.
sentences.chinese: 提前支取这笔钱将被处以10%的罚金。

sentences.english: If he is convicted, he could receive the death penalty (= be killed as a punishment ) .
sentences.chinese: 一旦定罪，他可能会被判处死刑。

detailed_translations.english: a punishment for breaking a law, rule, or legal agreement

name: scale
trans: 鳞；规模；比例；刻度；【音】音阶；等级，级别

sentences.english: A structural survey revealed the full scale of the damage.
sentences.chinese: 结构检验揭示了实际受损程度。

sentences.english: I was shocked by the sheer scale (= very big scale ) of the destruction.
sentences.chinese: 破坏程度之大让我大为震惊。

sentences.english: Large firms benefit from economies of scale (= ways of saving money because they are big ) .
sentences.chinese: 大公司从规模经济中得益。

detailed_translations.chinese: 大小，规模；等级，级别；天平，磅秤；比例；刻度，标度；鳞
detailed_translations.english: the size or level of something, or the amount that something is happening
to climb to the top of something that is high and difficult to climb

sentences.english: Lefkas has an abundance of lush green vegetation.
sentences.chinese: 莱夫卡斯有葱郁茂盛的植被。

detailed_translations.chinese: 植被；植物，草木；呆板单调的生活
detailed_translations.english: plants in general

sentences.english: ...another gin and tonic.
sentences.chinese: …又一杯加奎宁水的杜松子酒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 杜松子酒；网；[机] 三角起重机
detailed_translations.english: a strong alcoholic drink made mainly from grain, or a glass of this drink

detailed_translations.chinese: 喝杜松子酒； 用陷阱(或网)捕捉，诱捕(猎物)

sentences.english: an engaging smile
sentences.chinese: 迷人的微笑

detailed_translations.chinese: 迷人的， 美丽动人的
detailed_translations.english: pleasant and attracting your interest

name: contributor
trans: 投稿者； 贡献者， 捐助者； 促成物

sentences.english: campaign contributors
sentences.chinese: 竞选捐助人

sentences.english: Over time, developers subdivided the land.
sentences.chinese: 开发商们渐渐地把这块土地进行了再分割。

detailed_translations.english: to divide into smaller parts something that is already divided

name: nosy
trans: 爱管闲事的， 好打听的

sentences.english: Don’t be so nosy!
sentences.chinese: 别这么爱管闲事！

sentences.english: a nosy neighbor
sentences.chinese: 爱管闲事的邻居

detailed_translations.chinese: 爱管闲事的， 好打听的
detailed_translations.english: always wanting to find out things that do not concern you, especially other people’s private affairs

sentences.english: the salient points of the report
sentences.chinese: 这份报告的要点

detailed_translations.english: the salient points or features of something are the most important or most noticeable parts of it

name: buck
trans: 猛然弓背跃起；猛然震荡；抵制，反抗

sentences.english: He was a rebel who bucked the system (=  opposed rules or authority  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他是一个反抗体制的叛逆者。

sentences.english: He owes me ten bucks.
sentences.chinese: 他欠我十美元。

detailed_translations.english: to oppose something in a direct way
a US, Canadian, or Australian dollar

sentences.english: The ship ran upon the iceberg.
sentences.chinese: 轮船撞到冰山上。

sentences.english: Their ship circled the iceberg.
sentences.chinese: 他们的船绕过了冰山。

sentences.english: The glacier calved a large iceberg.
sentences.chinese: 冰川崩解而产生一个大冰山。

detailed_translations.english: a very large mass of ice floating in the sea, most of which is under the surface of the water

name: station
trans: 安置； 派驻， 驻扎

sentences.english: I want to get off at the next station.
sentences.chinese: 我要在下一站下车。

sentences.english: Grand Central Station
sentences.chinese: 中央火车站

sentences.english: Is there a waiting room in the station?
sentences.chinese: 车站里有候车室吗？

sentences.english: the city bus station
sentences.chinese: 市内公共汽车站

detailed_translations.english: a place where trains or buses regularly stop so that passengers can get on and off, goods can be loaded etc, or the buildings at such a place
to send someone in the military to a particular place for a period of time as part of their military duty

name: feeble
trans: 虚弱的， 衰弱的， 无力的

sentences.english: His voice sounded feeble and far away.
sentences.chinese: 他的声音听上去既无力又遥远。

sentences.english: She was too feeble to leave her room.
sentences.chinese: 她身体虚弱，无法走出自己的房间。

detailed_translations.chinese: 虚弱的， 衰弱的， 无力的； 无效的， 无益的
detailed_translations.english: extremely weak

name: herb
trans: 药草， 香草； 草本植物

sentences.english: Sprinkle the dish with chopped fresh herbs.
sentences.chinese: 在菜肴上撒些切碎的新鲜香草。

detailed_translations.english: a small plant that is used to improve the taste of food, or to make medicine

name: herd
trans: 放牧； 成群， 聚集
牧群，兽群；人群，芸芸众生

sentences.english: Chobe is also renowned for its large herds of elephant and buffalo.
sentences.chinese: 乔贝还以其大群的大象和水牛而闻名。

sentences.english: It was Tom’s duty to herd the cows.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆的职责是放牛。

detailed_translations.english: a group of animals of one kind that live and feed together
to make animals move together in a group

sentences.english: She would be able to stretch out her cramped limbs and rest for a few hours.
sentences.chinese: 她将可以伸开蜷缩的四肢，休息几个小时。

sentences.english: She sat on a limb of the tree and looked down.
sentences.chinese: 文例句：她坐在一根大树枝上往下看.

detailed_translations.english: an arm or leg

sentences.english: Shute's prose is stark and chillingly unsentimental.
sentences.chinese: 舒特的散文刻板而冷峻。

detailed_translations.english: language in its usual form, as opposed to poetry

sentences.english: Clearly, the amount of money people save increases in inverse proportion to the amount they spend.
sentences.chinese: 显然，人们储蓄的增加与消费成反比。

sentences.english: the inverse relationship between prices and interest rates
sentences.chinese: 价格和利率之间的反比关系

detailed_translations.english: if there is an inverse relationship between two amounts, one gets bigger at the same rate as the other gets smaller
the complete opposite of something

name: cognition
trans: 感知， 认知， 认识

sentences.english: the regions of the brain that are responsible for memory and cognition
sentences.chinese: 大脑主管记忆与认知的区域

detailed_translations.english: the process of knowing, understanding, and learning something

sentences.english: I have never betrayed a confidence.
sentences.chinese: 我从未泄露过别人的秘密。

sentences.english: They spent their evenings drinking wine and sharing confidences.
sentences.chinese: 晚上他们就喝喝酒，说说知心话。

detailed_translations.english: a secret or a piece of information that is private or personal

name: cuisine
trans: 烹饪； 烹调法， 烹调风格

sentences.english: French cuisine
sentences.chinese: 法式烹饪

sentences.english: vegetarian cuisine
sentences.chinese: 素食烹饪

detailed_translations.english: a particular style of cooking

name: arbitrary
trans: 任意的； 专制的， 专断的

sentences.english: an arbitrary decision
sentences.chinese: 武断的决定

sentences.english: the arbitrary arrests of political opponents
sentences.chinese: 对政敌的任意逮捕

detailed_translations.english: decided or arranged without any reason or plan, often unfairly

name: intent
trans: 专心的， 专注的； 急切的

sentences.english: his intent gaze
sentences.chinese: 他专注的凝视

detailed_translations.chinese: 专心的， 专注的； 急切的
detailed_translations.english: giving careful attention to something so that you think about nothing else
what you intend to do

sentences.english: Embrace brevity, but do not sacrifice readability.
sentences.chinese: 拥抱简洁，但不要牺牲可读性。

sentences.english: This has the advantage of retaining some level of readability while making it equally clear what text has not been translated.
sentences.chinese: 这样做的好处是，在同样可以指明什么文本没有翻译的同时，保持了一定程度的可读性。

sentences.english: I find that this actually increases the readability of methods: there is no chance of confusing local variables and instance variables when glancing through a method.
sentences.chinese: 我认为这事实上增加了方法的可读性：即使粗略的浏览一个方法，也不会有混淆局部变量和实例变量的机会。

name: interrogate
trans: 审问， 讯问， 盘问

sentences.english: The police interrogated the suspect for several hours.
