trans: 减损； 贬低， 诋毁

sentences.english: They feared that the publicity surrounding him would detract from their own election campaigns.
sentences.chinese: 他们担心围绕他的宣传会有损他们自已的竞选活动。

detailed_translations.english: If one thing detracts from another, it makes it seem less good or impressive

name: pin
trans: 大头针； 钢钉； 胸针； 徽章

sentences.english: a diamond pin
sentences.chinese: 一枚钻石胸针

sentences.chinese: 他把姓名牌别在自己的短外套上。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of metal, sometimes containing jewels, that you fasten to your clothes to wear as a decoration
to fasten something somewhere, or to join two things together, using a pin

name: pit
trans: 大坑， 深坑； 矿井； 陷阱

sentences.english: Dad first went down the pit (= worked in a coal mine ) when he was 15 years old.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸第一次下煤矿井时才15岁。

sentences.english: a national strike against pit closures
sentences.chinese: 抗议关闭煤矿井的全国性罢工

detailed_translations.chinese: 矿井；深坑；陷阱；（物体或人体表面上的）凹陷；（英国剧场的）正厅后排；正厅后排的观众
detailed_translations.english: a coal mine

detailed_translations.chinese: 使竞争；窖藏；使凹下；去…之核；使留疤痕
detailed_translations.english: to put small marks or holes in the surface of something

name: motif
trans: 主题， 主旨； 图形

sentences.english: The theme of creation is a recurrent motif in Celtic mythology.
sentences.chinese: 天地万物的创造是凯尔特神话中反复出现的主题。

detailed_translations.english: an idea, subject, or image that is regularly repeated and developed in a book, film, work of art etc

name: stock
trans: 库存，现货；备用物；股份，股票；世系，血统；家畜，

sentences.english: We stock a wide range of kitchen equipment.
sentences.chinese: 我们备有各种厨房用品。

detailed_translations.english: if a shop stocks a particular product, it keeps a supply of it to sell
something that is available in a shop and does not have to be ordered

detailed_translations.chinese: 原料，库存品；股本，公债；世系，血统；汤汁；家畜，牲畜
detailed_translations.english: a liquid made by boiling meat or bones and vegetables, which is used to make soups or to add  flavour  to other dishes

name: suspend
trans: 吊， 悬挂； 暂缓， 暂停， 中止

sentences.english: Sales of the drug will be suspended until more tests are completed.
sentences.chinese: 这种药品在完成进一步检验之前将暂停销售。

sentences.english: Talks between the two countries have now been suspended.
sentences.chinese: 两国间的对话现已中止。

detailed_translations.english: to officially stop something from continuing, especially for a short time

name: swap
trans: 交换， 掉换； 交换物， 被调换者

sentences.english: a fair swap
sentences.chinese: 公平交换

sentences.english: We can do a swap if you like.
sentences.chinese: 如果你愿意我们可以交换。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which you give something to someone and get another thing in return
to give something to someone and get something in return

name: ritual
trans: 仪式的； 习惯的， 例行的
典礼，仪式；例行公事，老规矩

sentences.english: ancient pagan rituals
sentences.chinese: 古老的异教仪式

sentences.english: the importance of religion and ritual in our lives
sentences.chinese: 我们生活中宗教和宗教仪式的重要性

sentences.english: The lady of the house performs the sacred ritual of lighting two candles.
sentences.chinese: 由女主人来完成点燃两根蜡烛的神圣仪式。

detailed_translations.english: a ceremony that is always performed in the same way, in order to mark an important religious or social occasion

sentences.english: a device that protects your computer against electrical surges
sentences.chinese: 一台计算机电涌保护设备

detailed_translations.chinese: 汹涌；大浪，波涛；汹涌澎湃；巨涌
detailed_translations.english: a sudden quick movement of a liquid, electricity, chemical etc through something
if a feeling surges or surges up, you begin to feel it very strongly

name: basin
trans: 盆， 脸盆； 盆地； 流域

sentences.english: a wash basin
sentences.chinese: 洗脸盆

sentences.english: Fill the basin with the cake mixture.
sentences.chinese: 在盆里装入蛋糕拌料。

sentences.english: countries around the Pacific Basin
sentences.chinese: 太平洋盆地周围的国家

detailed_translations.english: a round container attached to the wall in a bathroom, where you wash your hands and face

sentences.english: resolute opposition
sentences.chinese: 坚决的反对

sentences.english: resolute leadership
sentences.chinese: 果断的领导

sentences.english: She remained resolute in her belief that the situation would improve.
sentences.chinese: 她依然坚信情况将会好转。

detailed_translations.english: doing something in a very determined way because you have very strong beliefs, aims etc

sentences.english: He was privately tutored.
sentences.chinese: 他是由家庭教师教的。

detailed_translations.english: someone who gives private lessons to one student or a small group, and is paid directly by them

sentences.english: Senator Kennedy
sentences.chinese: 肯尼迪参议员

detailed_translations.english: a member of the Senate or a senate

name: reconcile
trans: 使协调； 使和解； 使顺从

sentences.english: The possibility remains that the two theories may be reconciled.
sentences.chinese: 这两种理论仍是有可能协调的。

sentences.english: The pair were reconciled after Jackson made a public apology.
sentences.chinese: 杰克逊公开道歉之后，这两个人又言归于好了。

detailed_translations.english: if you reconcile two ideas, situations, or facts, you find a way in which they can both be true or acceptable

sentences.english: an attempt to quantify the region’s social and economic decline
sentences.chinese: 对该地区社会和经济衰退进行量化的尝试

detailed_translations.english: to calculate the value of something and express it as a number or an amount

name: annul
trans: 宣布无效， 取消， 废除

sentences.english: Their marriage was annulled last year.
sentences.chinese: 他们的婚姻关系去年宣告解除。

detailed_translations.english: to officially state that a marriage or legal agreement no longer exists

name: tempt
trans: 引诱， 诱惑； 吸引

sentences.english: If you leave valuables in your car it will tempt thieves.
sentences.chinese: 如果把贵重物品留在车上，会招来小偷的。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone want to have or do something, even though they know they really should not

sentences.english: The old ethic of hard work has given way to a new ethic of instant gratification.
sentences.chinese: 旧有的崇尚勤勉的道德观已被及时行乐的新观念所取代。

detailed_translations.english: a general idea or belief that influences people’s behaviour and attitudes

name: basic
trans: 基本的， 基础的； 初步的， 初级的

sentences.english: the basic principles of chemistry
sentences.chinese: 化学的基本原理

sentences.english: The basic idea is simple.
sentences.chinese: 基本思想很简单。

sentences.english: basic research
sentences.chinese: 基础研究

sentences.english: basic information
sentences.chinese: 基本信息

detailed_translations.english: forming the most important or most necessary part of something

name: twist
trans: 转折， 突然变化； 卷曲物

sentences.english: Her hands began to twist the handles of the bag she carried.
sentences.chinese: 她的双手开始拧她拎着的那个包的拎柄。

sentences.english: He smiled, a slow cynical twist of his lips.
sentences.chinese: 他笑了，嘴巴慢慢一歪，带着嘲笑的意味。

detailed_translations.english: to bend or turn something, such as wire, hair, or cloth, into a particular shape
a twisting action or movement

name: absolve
trans: 赦免； 免除； 宽恕

sentences.english: A police investigation yesterday absolved the police of all blame in the incident.
sentences.chinese: 警方昨天的调查为其开脱了在这件事故中所有的责任。

trans: 独处， 隐居； 隔离； 与世隔绝， 归隐

sentences.chinese: 他们享受了十天与世隔绝的宁静生活。

sentences.english: Imagine trying to balance a chest of drawers on just one of its legs, on top of a boulder, and you get an idea of what Gray gets up to.
sentences.chinese: 想像自己尝试仅仅依靠衣柜的一个腿把它平稳地放到一个大圆石上，你就知道格雷达到了什么境界。

name: locate
trans: 使坐落于； 找出， 定位

sentences.english: The business is located right in the center of town.
sentences.chinese: 这家商店就在市中心。

detailed_translations.english: to be in a particular position or place
of or relating to the Mesolithic
the period between the Palaeolithic and the Neolithic, in Europe from about 12 000 to 3000 bc, characterized by the appearance of microliths

sentences.english: a rose bush
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰丛

sentences.english: The child was hiding in the bushes.
sentences.chinese: 那孩子躲在灌木丛里。

detailed_translations.english: a plant with many thin branches growing up from the ground

detailed_translations.chinese: 以灌木装饰；使…精疲力竭
如灌木般长得低矮的；粗野的

sentences.english: The sloth-like times come when we lose touch with our inner muse.
sentences.chinese: 当我们与内心沉思失去联系的时候，懒惰就会出现。

sentences.english: I want to be a better writer and maybe my muse will provide the motivation.
sentences.chinese: 我希望成为一名更好的作者，也许我的沉思将为我提供动力。

sentences.english: Initially it will be really hard to ignore the mind that wants to plan for the future and muse about the past, but with time you will see through its insanity.
sentences.chinese: 开始时，忽视想要计划将来沉思过去的思想是很困难的，但是随着时间的推移，你将看穿它的荒谬。

detailed_translations.english: to say something in a way that shows you are thinking about it carefully

sentences.english: In the case of this battle, the combat did only last a singleday.
sentences.chinese: 在译成战役的情况下，这场战斗仅仅持续了短短的一天。

sentences.english: We will remove our combat brigades from Iraq by the end of next summer, and all of our troops by the end of 2011.
sentences.chinese: 我们会在明年夏末从伊拉克撤回我们的战斗旅，在2011年末，我们所有军队都将从伊拉克撤出。

sentences.english: These people would then be given training in vigilance and combat not just to defend themselves but also the borders.
sentences.chinese: 这些人会被提供警戒和战斗训练，不仅是为了保护自己，而且要保护边界安全。

detailed_translations.english: fighting, especially during a war

sentences.english: She despised her neighbours.
sentences.chinese: 她看不起她的邻居。

detailed_translations.english: to dislike and have a low opinion of someone or something

sentences.english: carbon/sulphur dioxide
sentences.chinese: 二氧化碳／硫

detailed_translations.english: a chemical compound that contains two atoms of oxygen and one atom of another chemical element

name: grievous
trans: 令人忧伤的； 极严重的

sentences.english: a grievous shortage of hospital beds
sentences.chinese: 医院床位的严重短缺

detailed_translations.english: very serious and causing great pain or suffering

name: oblong
trans: 矩形的，长方形的；椭圆形的
矩形， 长方形； 椭圆形

sentences.english: an oblong table
sentences.chinese: 长方形桌子

sentences.english: ...an oblong table.
sentences.chinese: ...一张长方形桌子。

detailed_translations.english: an oblong shape has four straight sides at 90 degrees to each other, two of which are longer than the other two
An oblong is a shape which has two long sides and two short sides and in which all the angles are right angles

name: unity
trans: 团结一致， 统一， 联合； 协调； 统一体

sentences.english: economic unity
sentences.chinese: 经济统一

sentences.english: European unity
sentences.chinese: 欧洲的一体化

detailed_translations.english: when a group of people or countries agree or are joined together

sentences.english: Genetics is also bringing about dramatic changes in our understanding of cancer.
sentences.chinese: 遗传学也正使我们对癌症的理解发生巨大的变化。

detailed_translations.english: the study of how the qualities of living things are passed on in their genes

name: pursue
trans: 继续； 从事于； 追击， 追踪； 追求

sentences.english: She plans to pursue a career in politics.
sentences.chinese: 她计划从政。

sentences.english: Students should pursue their own interests , as well as do their school work.
sentences.chinese: 除了完成课业之外，学生也应该追求自己的兴趣。

sentences.english: a campaign promise to pursue policies that will help the poor
sentences.chinese: 贯彻扶贫政策的竞选承诺

detailed_translations.english: to continue doing an activity or trying to achieve something over a long period of time

name: vulgar
trans: 下流的， 粗俗的； 普通的， 通俗的

sentences.chinese: 粗俗的行为

detailed_translations.english: remarks, jokes etc that are vulgar deal with sex in a very rude and offensive way

name: catastrophe
trans: 灾难， 灾祸； 困难

sentences.chinese: 从各个方面来看，战争都会是一场灾难。

detailed_translations.english: a terrible event in which there is a lot of destruction, suffering, or death

name: convey
trans: 运送， 运输； 传达， 表达

sentences.english: All this information can be conveyed in a simple diagram.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些信息可以通过一张简单的图表来表示。

sentences.english: Ads convey the message that thin is beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 广告传递的信息是: 瘦就是美。

sentences.english: He was sent to convey a message to the UN Secretary General.
sentences.chinese: 他被派去向联合国秘书长传达一条信息。

detailed_translations.english: to communicate or express something, with or without using words

sentences.english: a convex lens
sentences.chinese: 凸透镜

sentences.english: a convex mirror
sentences.chinese: 凸镜

detailed_translations.english: curved outwards, like the surface of the eye

trans: 赎回； 偿清， 付清； 兑换； 弥补， 补偿； 履行， 遵守

sentences.english: Olivier’s performance redeemed an otherwise second-rate play.
sentences.chinese: 奥利维尔的表演补救了一出本是二流水平的戏。

detailed_translations.chinese: 赎回；挽回；兑换；履行；补偿；恢复

trans: 颅骨， 头骨； 脑袋； 头脑

sentences.chinese: 她丈夫后来因颅骨碎裂而接受治疗。

sentences.english: Organizational effectiveness does not lie in that narrow minded concept called rationality. It lies in the blend of clearheaded logic and powerful intuition.
sentences.chinese: 组织的有效性并不在于那个称为合理性的坐井观天的概念。它是清晰的逻辑和强有力的直觉的融合。

sentences.english: But whoever has undergone the intense experience of successful advances made in this domain is moved by profound reverence for the rationality made manifest in existence.
sentences.chinese: 但凡是曾经在这个领域里胜利前进中有过深切经验的人，对存在中所显示出来的合理性，都会感到深挚的崇敬。

sentences.english: The military conceptual model is the first abstract to the military action world(space), the accuracy and rationality it expresses the military system is the key point of battle simulation.
sentences.chinese: 军事概念模型是对军事行为空间进行的第一次抽象，它对军事系统表达的准确性和合理性将是作战仿真模拟质量的关键。

sentences.english: Monogamy is rare in most animal groups, but is common among birds.
sentences.chinese: 单配偶现象在大多数兽类群体里很少见，但在鸟类中却很常见。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一夫一妻制；[动] 单配偶，[动] 单配性
detailed_translations.english: the custom of being married to only one husband or wife

trans: 暗指， 影射， 间接提到

sentences.chinese: 和朋友们一起时，她有时暗示她感到儿子的困境要怪她自己。

detailed_translations.english: If you allude to something, you mention it in an indirect way

sentences.english: He had slumped into a state of torpor from which nothing could rouse him.
sentences.chinese: 他陷入了一种麻木状态，什么事都不能唤起他的兴趣。

detailed_translations.english: Torpor is the state of being completely inactive mentally or physically, for example, because of illness or laziness

sentences.chinese: 令父母失望的是，菲尔和帕姆都再也不去教堂了。

to feel annoyed and disappointed

sentences.chinese: 由于岛上没有天然食肉动物，牧群的数量迅速增加。

trans: 首领； 酋长， 族长

sentences.english: Safety is our chief concern .

sentences.english: The chief reason for this is that people are living longer.
sentences.chinese: 这主要是因为人们更长寿了。

sentences.english: his chief rival for the job

sentences.chinese: 控方的主要证人

sentences.chinese: 她拿这笔钱的原因有很多，但最主要的是为了报复。

detailed_translations.english: most important

sentences.chinese: 处罚与现行的纪律规则一致。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which two people, ideas, or statements agree with each other

detailed_translations.chinese: 使符合；使一致；调节；授予，赠与，给予

sentences.chinese: 公司财产甚至可能被没收。

detailed_translations.chinese: （因犯罪、失职、违约等）丧失（权利、名誉、生命等）

name: foremost
trans: 最先的； 最著名的， 最重要的

sentences.english: Economic concerns are foremost on many voters’ minds.
sentences.chinese: 经济是许多选民关心的首要问题。

sentences.english: Rostropovich was long considered the world’s foremost cellist.

name: automatic
trans: 自动的；无意识的；必然的，自然的
自动手枪； 自动换挡汽车

sentences.english: an automatic weapon
sentences.chinese: 自动武器

sentences.english: an automatic gearbox
sentences.chinese: 自动变速箱

sentences.english: My camera is fully automatic .
sentences.chinese: 我的照相机是全自动的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 自动的； 必然发生的； 无意识的
detailed_translations.english: an automatic machine is designed to work without needing someone to operate it for each part of a process
a weapon that can fire bullets continuously

sentences.english: The plane just disintegrated in mid-air.
sentences.chinese: 飞机就在半空中解体了。

detailed_translations.english: to break up, or make something break up, into very small pieces

trans: 连续不断的， 连贯的

sentences.english: It had rained for four consecutive days.
sentences.chinese: 雨接连下了四天。

sentences.english: Can they win the title for the third consecutive season?
sentences.chinese: 他们能连续第三个赛季赢得冠军称号吗？

detailed_translations.english: consecutive numbers or periods of time follow one after the other without any interruptions

sentences.chinese: 一种介质向另一种介质渗透和同化的过程。

sentences.english: The first period of the English Renaissance was one of imitation and assimilation.
sentences.chinese: 英国文艺复兴初期只是一个学习模仿与同化的阶段。

sentences.english: Ethnic amalgamation ethnic assimilation and ethnic fusion of culture are three kinds of different phenomena in ethnic relation.
sentences.chinese: 民族融合、民族同化和民族文化融合是民族关系中存在的三种不同的现象。

sentences.english: Which number is the quotient in the equation?
sentences.chinese: 在这个等式中，哪个数是商？

sentences.english: The paper discusses the relation of entropy change and quotient of heat-temperature based on the second law of thermodynamics.
sentences.chinese: 通过热力学第二定律，从理论上分析熵变与热温商之间的关系，再进一步由实践验证。

sentences.english: This paper discusses the calculus of residues of quotient function at ist pole, then obtains some computational formulas by the use of determinant.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了商函数在其极点处的残数计算，得到几个用行列式表示的计算公式，并介绍了它们的应用。

sentences.chinese: 我关掉电视时，孩子们都发出不满的抱怨声。

sentences.english: A range of official Disney merchandise was on sale.
sentences.chinese: 一系列正版的迪士尼商品在出售。

sentences.english: They inspected the merchandise carefully.
sentences.chinese: 他们仔细地检查了商品。

detailed_translations.english: goods that are being sold
to try to sell goods or services using methods such as advertising

sentences.english: As the last Ice Age came to an end, somebody picked a pebble out of a small river not far from Bethlehem.
sentences.chinese: 随着最后一个冰河时代宣告结束，有人从伯利恒附近流水淙淙的小溪边，捡起了一枚鹅卵石。

sentences.english: And what I do is, I select a hard stone hammer, in this case a quartzite pebble about the size of a cricket ball, and I elect to hit it in one place - and this is where I start to knap.
sentences.chinese: “现在你瞧瞧，这儿呢，我挑了块燧石，比较细长的，要削薄下来工作量并不大。” “我要做的就是，选择一块够硬的石锤，这次我选这块是个头有板球大小的石英岩卵石。

name: conduct
trans: 引导； 传导； 进行； 管理， 指挥； 表现
行为； 管理， 实施

sentences.english: The Senator’s conduct is being investigated by the Ethics Committee.
sentences.chinese: 该参议员的行为正受到道德委员会的调查。

sentences.english: an inquiry into the conduct of the police
sentences.chinese: 对警方行为的调查

sentences.english: his arrest for disorderly conduct
sentences.chinese: 他因妨害治安行为而遭逮捕

detailed_translations.chinese: 举止， 行为； 指导； 管理； 实施
detailed_translations.english: the way someone behaves, especially in public, in their job etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 进行； 管理， 指挥， 引导； 传输， 传导
detailed_translations.english: to stand in front of a group of musicians or singers and direct their playing or singing

sentences.english: It’s difficult to earn a livelihood as an artist.
sentences.chinese: 搞艺术很难谋生。

sentences.english: Bates says he will lose his livelihood if his driving licence is taken away.
sentences.chinese: 贝茨说，如果驾照被吊销，他就没有了谋生的手段。

detailed_translations.english: the way you earn money in order to live

sentences.english: an annual reunion
sentences.chinese: 一年一度的聚会

sentences.english: a family reunion
sentences.chinese: 家庭聚会

sentences.english: a high-school reunion
sentences.chinese: 高中同学联谊聚会

detailed_translations.english: a social meeting of people who have not met for a long time, especially people who were at school or college together

name: fantastic
trans: 荒诞的， 奇异的； 极好的； 极大的

sentences.english: You look fantastic!
sentences.chinese: 你看上去棒极了！

sentences.english: It’s a fantastic place, really beautiful!
sentences.chinese: 这真是个好地方，漂亮极了！

detailed_translations.chinese: 极好的， 极出色的， 了不起的； 极大的； 难以相信的； 异想天开的， 不实际的； 奇异的， 古怪的
detailed_translations.english: extremely good, attractive, enjoyable etc

sentences.english: This paper approaches English euphemisms from Peirce s semiotics.
sentences.chinese: 英语委婉语作为一种语言符号，也具有这些性质。

sentences.english: With the aid of concepts in topology such as space, region, boundary and displacement, Lotman described the space structure of cultural semiotics.
sentences.chinese: 洛特曼借助拓扑学中空间、域、界、移等概念，对文化符号域的空间结构进行了描述。

detailed_translations.english: the way in which people communicate through signs and images, or the study of this

name: indecipherable
trans: 无法破译的； 难以领悟的

sentences.chinese: 难以辨认的签名

detailed_translations.chinese: 无法解释的；破译不出的；难辨认的
detailed_translations.english: impossible to read or understand

sentences.english: His father and mother immigrated when he was two.
sentences.chinese: 他的父母在他两岁时移民到这里。

detailed_translations.english: to come into a country in order to live there permanently

name: apparatus
trans: 器械， 器具， 设备， 装置； 机构， 组织； 器官

sentences.english: Astronauts have special breathing apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 航天员有专门的呼吸装装备。

sentences.english: The tax will require a massive administrative apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 税收需要大规模的行政机构。

detailed_translations.chinese: 器械，器具，仪器；机构，组织
detailed_translations.english: the set of tools and machines that you use for a particular scientific, medical, or technical purpose

trans: 腐烂， 腐朽； 衰退， 衰落

sentences.chinese: 她的尸体已经开始腐烂。

sentences.english: Most archaeological finds are broken, damaged, or decayed.
sentences.chinese: 大部分考古发现物都已破裂、损坏或腐烂。

sentences.english: decaying organic matter
sentences.chinese: 腐烂的有机物

sentences.english: In Orthodox Europe, mass religion seems to have decayed less.
sentences.chinese: 在正教会流行的欧洲地区，集体宗教信仰的影响力似乎衰退得没那么严重。

sentences.chinese: 蛀牙

name: incidental
trans: 偶然的； 附带发生的， 伴随而来的

sentences.english: Increased motivation is more than an incidental benefit of reward schemes.
sentences.chinese: 积极性提高不仅仅是奖励计划附带的益处。

detailed_translations.chinese: 附带的；偶然的；容易发生的
detailed_translations.english: happening or existing in connection with something else that is more important

detailed_translations.chinese: 附带事件；偶然事件；杂项

name: induct
trans: 使正式就任； 使了解， 传授； 使入伍

sentences.english: The government shoulders ethic obligation, she has to induct and maintain the rationalization of the living world.
sentences.chinese: 政府在生活世界中引导和维护生活世界的合理化，肩负著伦理责任；

name: fracture
trans: 断裂， 折断； 分裂

sentences.english: a stress fracture in his left knee
sentences.chinese: 他左膝上的应力性骨折

sentences.english: a hairline fracture
sentences.chinese: 细小的裂缝

sentences.english: The immense pressure causes the rock to fracture.
sentences.chinese: 巨大的压力造成岩石断裂。

detailed_translations.english: a crack or broken part in a bone or other hard substance
if a bone or other hard substance fractures, or if it is fractured, it breaks or cracks

name: lessen
trans: 变小， 变少， 减轻

sentences.english: Gradually her anxiety lessened.
sentences.chinese: 她的焦虑慢慢减轻了。

detailed_translations.english: to become smaller in size, importance, or value, or make something do this

sentences.english: the women’s figure skating championships
sentences.chinese: 女子花样滑冰锦标赛

sentences.english: Greece won the European Championship.
sentences.chinese: 希腊队赢得了欧洲锦标赛的冠军。

detailed_translations.chinese: 锦标赛；冠军称号；冠军的地位
detailed_translations.english: a competition to find which player, team etc is the best in a particular sport

sentences.english: The fashion world just keeps recycling old ideas.
sentences.chinese: 时装界就是不停地翻新旧观念。

detailed_translations.english: to use something such as an idea, writing etc again instead of developing something new

sentences.english: He led them away from a marsh.
sentences.chinese: 他把他们带离沼泽。

sentences.english: My urine and excrement are recycled by a system of ducts, pipes, wires, plants, and marsh-microbes, and redeemed into water and food which I can eat.
sentences.chinese: 由众多的导管、管线、植物和沼泽微生物构成的系统回收了我的尿液和粪便，并将其还原成水和食物供我食用。

detailed_translations.english: an area of low flat ground that is always wet and soft

detailed_translations.chinese: 沼泽的；生长在沼泽地的

sentences.english: ...a sapphire engagement ring.
sentences.chinese: …一枚蓝宝石订婚戒指。

detailed_translations.english: a transparent bright blue jewel

name: drift
trans: 漂流； 漂泊； 大意， 主旨； 倾向， 趋势

sentences.english: Smoke drifted up from the jungle ahead of us.
sentences.chinese: 我们前方的丛林里有烟升起。

sentences.english: Jenni spent the year drifting around Europe.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮这一年来一直在欧洲各地漂泊。

sentences.english: a drift towards longer working hours
sentences.chinese: 工作时间不知不觉的变长

sentences.english: the drift from the countryside to the cities
sentences.chinese: 大量人口从乡村往城市的流动

detailed_translations.english: to move slowly on water or in the air
a slow change or development from one situation, opinion etc to another

sentences.english: "In anthropology, you can't equate third gender with homosexuality," he said.
sentences.chinese: “在人类学中，你不能将同性恋和第三性别混同，”他说。

sentences.english: When I was a student at Cambridge I remember an anthropology professor holding up a picture of a bone with 28 incisions carved in it.
sentences.chinese: 当我还在剑桥读书的时候，我记得有一位人类学的教授拿出一张照片，上面是一根有28个切口的骨头。

sentences.english: Not to be the skunk at this party, but I think it's important to ask whether neuroscience reveals anything more than we already know from, say, anthropology.
sentences.chinese: 我并不想成为派对上的讨厌鬼，但我认为很重要的是，要问清楚神经科学是否揭示出我们已知之外的东西，比如人类学。

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of people, their societies,  culture s  etc

sentences.english: The country was plunged into economic chaos.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家陷入了经济大混乱。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which everything is happening in a confused way and nothing is organized or arranged in order

name: abundant
trans: 大量的， 充足的， 丰富的

sentences.english: an abundant supply of fresh water
sentences.chinese: 充足的淡水供应

sentences.english: abundant opportunities for well qualified staff
sentences.chinese: 提供给高素质的员工的大量机会

detailed_translations.chinese: 丰富的， 富裕的； 大量的， 充足的
detailed_translations.english: something that is abundant exists or is available in large quantities so that there is more than enough

name: absorption
trans: 吸收； 全神贯注， 专心致志

sentences.english: This controls the absorption of liquids.
sentences.chinese: 这可以控制液体的吸收。

detailed_translations.chinese: 吸收；全神贯注，专心致志
detailed_translations.english: a process in which something takes in liquid, gas, or heat

sentences.english: Melanin is the dark brown pigment of the hair, skin and eyes.
sentences.chinese: 黑色素是头发、皮肤以及眼睛中的深棕色色素。

sentences.english: The artist Sandy Lee uses natural pigments in her work.
sentences.chinese: 画家桑迪·李在她的作品中使用天然颜料。

detailed_translations.english: a natural substance that makes skin, hair, plants etc a particular colour

name: forecast
trans: 预报； 预测， 预料

sentences.english: The weather forecast is good for tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 天气预报说明天是晴天。

sentences.english: Rain was forecast for the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 预报周末有雨。

detailed_translations.english: a description of what is likely to happen in the future, based on the information that you have now
to make a statement saying what is likely to happen in the future, based on the information that you have now

name: deteriorate
trans: 变坏， 恶化； 变质

sentences.english: Ethel’s health has deteriorated.
sentences.chinese: 埃塞尔的健康状况恶化了。

sentences.english: America’s deteriorating economy
sentences.chinese: 美国日渐恶化的经济

detailed_translations.english: to become worse

name: recognize
trans: 认出， 识别； 认可

sentences.english: I didn’t recognize you in your uniform.
sentences.chinese: 你穿上制服我认不出你了。

sentences.english: It was malaria, but Dr Lee hadn’t recognized the symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 这是疟疾，但李医生没有认出症状。

sentences.english: One must recognise that homesickness is natural.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须承认思乡是正常的。

detailed_translations.english: to know who someone is or what something is, because you have seen, heard, experienced, or learned about them in the past

sentences.english: The building opposite us is the warehouse.
sentences.chinese: 我们对面的那个建筑是仓库。

sentences.english: Each warehouse reports back to the retailer which portion (if any) of the customer order it was able to fulfil.
sentences.chinese: 每个仓库把它能完成客户定单的哪个部分（如果有）的报告返回给零售商。

sentences.english: This option allows organizations to pay only for the volume of compressed user data they manage in their warehouse.
sentences.chinese: 该定价方式允许组织只为他们在其仓库中管理的压缩的用户数据量进行付费。

detailed_translations.english: a large building for storing large quantities of goods

sentences.english: A long cobbled street bisects the town from east to west.
sentences.chinese: 一条长长的鹅卵石街道从东向西把小镇一分为二。

detailed_translations.english: to divide something into two equal parts

name: induce
trans: 引起， 导致； 诱使， 劝诱； 感应

sentences.english: Nothing would induce me to vote for him again.
sentences.chinese: 没有什么能诱使我再投他的票了。

sentences.english: Doctors said surgery could induce a heart attack.
sentences.chinese: 医生们说手术可能导致心脏病。

detailed_translations.english: to persuade someone to do something, especially something that does not seem wise

sentences.english: abnormal behaviour
sentences.chinese: 反常行为

sentences.english: an abnormal level of cholesterol
sentences.chinese: 胆固醇水平异常

sentences.english: My parents thought it was abnormal for a boy to be interested in ballet.
sentences.chinese: 我父母认为一个男孩子对芭蕾舞感兴趣并不正常。

detailed_translations.english: very different from usual in a way that seems strange, worrying, wrong, or dangerous

sentences.english: My enthusiasm for the project was waning.
sentences.chinese: 我对这个项目的热情逐渐减退了。

sentences.english: The group’s influence had begun to wane by this time.
sentences.chinese: 此时，这个团体的影响力已经开始减弱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 衰落；变小；亏缺；退潮；消逝
detailed_translations.english: if something such as power, influence, or a feeling wanes, it becomes gradually less strong or less important

name: shrewd
trans: 敏捷的， 机灵的； 精明的

sentences.english: Malcolm is a shrewd businessman.
sentences.chinese: 马尔科姆是个精明的商人。

sentences.english: She was shrewd enough to guess who was responsible.
sentences.chinese: 她很精明，一猜就知道是谁干的。

sentences.english: Capra looked at her with shrewd eyes.
sentences.chinese: 卡普拉眼神犀利地看着她。

detailed_translations.english: good at judging what people or situations are really like

sentences.english: The question baffled me completely.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题把我彻底难倒了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使…困惑；使…受挫折；用挡板控制
detailed_translations.english: if something baffles you, you cannot understand or explain it at all

sentences.english: The molecules of oxygen gas contain just two atoms.
sentences.chinese: 氧分子中只有两个原子。

detailed_translations.english: the smallest unit into which any substance can be divided without losing its own chemical nature, usually consisting of two or more atoms

name: sewerage
trans: 排水系统； 污水处理； 污水

sentences.english: ...without access to any services such as water or sewerage.
sentences.chinese: ...不能享受任何如供水或污水处理的服务。

detailed_translations.english: the system by which waste material and used water are carried away in sewers and then treated to stop it being harmful

name: resign
trans: 辞去， 辞职； 放弃； 顺从， 听从

sentences.english: A hospital administrator has resigned over claims he lied to get the job.
sentences.chinese: 一位医院主管因为有人声称他的职位是骗来的而辞职了。

detailed_translations.english: to officially announce that you have decided to leave your job or an organization
to officially announce that you have decided to leave your job or an organization

name: diligent
trans: 勤奋的， 刻苦的， 勤勉的

sentences.english: a diligent student
sentences.chinese: 勤勉的学生

detailed_translations.chinese: 勤勉的；用功的，费尽心血的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is diligent works hard and is careful and thorough

sentences.english: Mix the meat with the onion, carrot, and some seasoning.
sentences.chinese: 将肉、洋葱、胡萝卜及一些佐料拌在一起。

detailed_translations.chinese: 调味品；佐料；风干；增添趣味的东西
detailed_translations.english: salt, pepper, spices etc that give food a more interesting taste

name: sophisticated
trans: 老练的， 见多识广的； 精密的； 复杂的， 先进的； 高雅的， 有教养的

sentences.english: sophisticated software
sentences.chinese: 很先进的软件

sentences.english: a highly sophisticated weapons system
sentences.chinese: 非常精密的武器系统

detailed_translations.english: a sophisticated machine, system, method etc is very well designed and very advanced, and often works in a complicated way

name: anomaly
trans: 反常， 异常； 异常的人

sentences.english: In those days, a woman professor was still an anomaly.
sentences.chinese: 那个时候，女教授仍旧十分稀罕。

detailed_translations.english: something that is noticeable because it is different from what is usual

name: chivalrous
trans: 有骑士精神的； 彬彬有礼的， 殷勤的

sentences.english: He was handsome, upright, and chivalrous.
sentences.chinese: 他英俊、正直、对女士彬彬有礼。

detailed_translations.chinese: 骑士精神的； 对女人彬彬有礼的
detailed_translations.english: a man who is chivalrous behaves in a polite, kind, generous, and honourable way, especially towards women

name: dateline
trans: 日期栏； 国际日期变更线

sentences.english: Countries are free to choose whether the dateline passes to the east or west, and Samoa's decision will mean all new maps will need to change.
sentences.chinese: 国家可自由选择是位于国际日期变更线的东侧还是西侧，萨摩亚的这一决定意味着所有的新地图将需要做出变动。

detailed_translations.chinese: 日期栏； 国际日期变更线
detailed_translations.english: the  international date line

sentences.english: He had nearly a thousand acres of grazing and arable land.
sentences.chinese: 他拥有近千亩的牧场和可耕地。

detailed_translations.english: Grazing or grazing land is land on which animals graze

name: reside
trans: 居住于， 定居； 存在， 在于

sentences.english: He spent most of his time in Rutherglen, where his family resided.
sentences.chinese: 他大部分时间都在拉瑟格伦度过，他的家人就在那里居住。

detailed_translations.english: to live in a particular place

sentences.english: ceramic ware
sentences.chinese: 陶瓷制品

sentences.english: He travelled from town to town selling his wares.
sentences.chinese: 他走乡串镇出售自己的货品。

detailed_translations.english: objects made of the material or in the way or place mentioned

sentences.english: To make an aluminum can, that takes energy.
sentences.chinese: 为了制造一个铝罐，就得消耗能源。

sentences.english: And she sat and sat on that aluminum throne ever since.
sentences.chinese: 自那以后，她就一直坐在那个铝制的宝座上。

sentences.english: He says not only does arsenic belong under phosphorus, I predict that there is an element that lies below aluminum and above indium.
sentences.chinese: 他认为不仅砷属于在磷下面，我预言还有一个元素,是在铝之上和铟的下边的。

name: prize
trans: 应获奖的； 优秀的， 典范性的
奖品；奖金；难能可贵的东西

sentences.english: In this month’s competition you could win a prize worth £3,000.
sentences.chinese: 在本月的竞赛中您可以赢得价值3,000英镑的奖品。

sentences.english: The first prize has gone to Dr John Gentle.
sentences.chinese: 获得一等奖的是约翰·金特尔博士。

sentences.english: The prizes are awarded (= given ) every year to students who have shown original thinking in their work.
sentences.chinese: 这些奖项每年颁发给在学习中表现出创造性思维的学生。

sentences.english: The total prize money was £30,000.
sentences.chinese: 奖金总额为3万英镑。

detailed_translations.english: something that is given to someone who is successful in a competition, race, game of chance etc
to think that someone or something is very important or valuable
good enough to win a prize or having won a prize

sentences.english: Ken had an accident at work and had to go to hospital.
sentences.chinese: 肯在工作中出了事故，不得不去医院。

sentences.english: I had a slight accident with your coffee.
sentences.chinese: 出了个小小的意外，我把你的咖啡弄洒了。

sentences.english: a train accident
sentences.chinese: 火车事故

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which someone is injured or something is damaged without anyone intending them to be

name: marine
trans: 海的；海生的；海上贸易的

sentences.english: the enormous variety of marine life
sentences.chinese: 海洋生物繁多的种类

sentences.english: the effects of oil pollution on marine mammals
sentences.chinese: 石油污染对海洋哺乳动物的影响

sentences.english: marine biology
sentences.chinese: 海洋生物学

detailed_translations.english: relating to the sea and the creatures that live there

sentences.english: The bus overturned and fell into a ravine.
sentences.chinese: 这辆公共汽车翻了车，掉进了一处深谷。

detailed_translations.english: a deep narrow valley with steep sides

name: incompatible
trans: 不兼容的； 不协调的， 合不来的

sentences.english: Politeness and truth are often mutually incompatible.
sentences.chinese: 礼貌和实话往往互不相容。

sentences.english: Business interests are incompatible with public office.
sentences.chinese: 商业利益与公职不可兼得。

detailed_translations.english: two things that are incompatible cannot exist or be accepted together

sentences.english: John’s departure had upset their daily routine .
sentences.chinese: 约翰的离去打乱了他们的日常生活。

sentences.english: Try to get into a routine (= develop a fixed order of doing things ) .
sentences.chinese: 尽量养成一套习惯。

sentences.english: my daily exercise routine
sentences.chinese: 我每天的锻炼习惯

sentences.english: Dressing is a task which we do every day as a matter of routine (= done regularly and not unusual ) .
sentences.chinese: 穿衣打扮是我们每天必做的事情。

sentences.english: You mustn’t worry. These are just routine enquiries.
sentences.chinese: 你不必担心，这只是例行的询问。

detailed_translations.english: the usual order in which you do things, or the things you regularly do
happening as a normal part of a job or process

name: distasteful
trans: 令人反感的， 讨厌的； 味道不佳的

sentences.english: What follows is John’s story. Parts of it may seem distasteful, even shocking.
sentences.chinese: 接下来是约翰的叙述，其中有些部分也许令人不快，甚至令人震惊。

detailed_translations.english: unpleasant or morally offensive

sentences.english: Of course, we'll consult closely with our allies every step of the way, because the security and defense of our allies, both in Europe and Asia, is not negotiable.
sentences.chinese: 当然，我们将在前行道路上就每一步骤与我们的盟国密切磋商，因为我们欧洲和亚洲盟国的安全与防卫是不容讨价还价的。

name: tariff
trans: 关税； 价目表， 收费表

sentences.english: America wants to eliminate tariffs on items such as electronics.
sentences.chinese: 美国想要取消电子类产品的关税。

detailed_translations.english: a tax on goods coming into a country or going out of a country

sentences.english: We walked along by the side of the canal.
sentences.chinese: 我们沿着运河边往前走。

sentences.english: the Panama Canal
sentences.chinese: 巴拿马运河

detailed_translations.chinese: 运河；[地理] 水道；[建] 管道；灌溉水渠
detailed_translations.english: a long passage dug into the ground and filled with water, either for boats to travel along, or to take water to a place

name: enlist
trans: 征募； 从军， 参军； 谋取

sentences.english: a convicted murderer
sentences.chinese: 已定罪的谋杀犯

sentences.english: an escaped convict
sentences.chinese: 越狱犯

detailed_translations.english: to prove or officially announce that someone is guilty of a crime after a trial in a law court
someone who has been proved to be guilty of a crime and sent to prison

name: validate
trans: 使有效， 使生效； 证实

sentences.english: The Supreme Court has validated the lower court’s interpretation of the law.
sentences.chinese: 最高法院已经认可下级法院对这条法规的阐释。

sentences.english: Many scientists plan to wait until the results of the study are validated by future research.
sentences.chinese: 许多科学家计划等到调查结果被今后的研究证实了以后再作定论。

detailed_translations.english: to prove that something is true or correct, or to make a document or agreement officially and legally acceptable

name: dynamical
trans: 动态的； 动力的； 充满活力的

sentences.english: This article studies the dynamical action of a predator-prey system with age structure .
sentences.chinese: 摘要研究了一类捕食者具有年龄结构的捕食系统的动力学行为。

detailed_translations.chinese: 动力的， 电动的；有生气的

sentences.english: Ethiopia has no surplus food.
sentences.chinese: 埃塞俄比亚没有多余的食物。

detailed_translations.english: more than what is needed or used
an amount of something that is more than what is needed or used

sentences.english: ...a good grade of plywood.
sentences.chinese: …高品质的胶合板。

detailed_translations.english: The grade of a product is its quality, especially when this has been officially judged

sentences.english: Pop music was condemned as decadent and crude.
sentences.chinese: 流行音乐被指责为堕落而又粗俗。

detailed_translations.english: having low moral standards and being more concerned with pleasure than serious matters

name: gradient
trans: 坡度； 倾斜度， 斜率； 梯度

sentences.english: a steep gradient
sentences.chinese: 陡坡

detailed_translations.english: a slope or a degree of slope, especially in a road or railway

sentences.english: An unhappy family life may inhibit children’s learning.
sentences.chinese: 不幸福的家庭生活可能会阻碍儿童的学习。

detailed_translations.english: to prevent something from growing or developing well

sentences.english: Certain plants play an additional role in weathering .
sentences.chinese: 某些植物起了风化作用的辅助作用。

sentences.english: A climate with high temperature and arid condition is highly favourable for salt weathering.
sentences.chinese: 高温和干旱相结合的气候最有利于盐风化过程。

detailed_translations.english: the mechanical and chemical breakdown of rocks by the action of rain, snow, cold, etc

name: intimate
trans: 亲密的，密切的；详尽的，精通的；个人隐私的

sentences.english: an intimate friend of Picasso’s
sentences.chinese: 毕加索的一个密友

sentences.english: an intimate relationship
sentences.chinese: 亲密的关系

sentences.english: She’s on intimate terms with people in government.
sentences.chinese: 她与政府官员关系密切。

detailed_translations.english: having an extremely close friendship
a close personal friend
to make people understand what you mean without saying it directly

name: disclose
trans: 泄露， 透露； 揭发

sentences.english: Some companies have already voluntarily disclosed similar information .
sentences.chinese: 一些公司已经主动透露了类似的信息。

sentences.english: He refused to disclose the identity of the politician.
sentences.chinese: 他拒绝透露那位政治家的身份。

detailed_translations.english: to make something publicly known, especially after it has been kept secret

name: religion
trans: 宗教； 宗教信仰； 宗派， 教派

sentences.english: The U.S. Constitution promises freedom of religion.
sentences.chinese: 美国宪法保证宗教信仰自由。

sentences.english: a course on philosophy and religion
sentences.chinese: 关于哲学和宗教的课程

sentences.english: the Islamic religion
sentences.chinese: 伊斯兰教

detailed_translations.english: a belief in one or more gods

sentences.english: This diagram will illustrate what I mean.
sentences.chinese: 这个图表可说明我的意思。

sentences.english: This is a simpler diagram than the one I just showed you but the principles are the same.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个比我刚展示的还要更简单的图解，但是原理是一样的。

sentences.english: A table or diagram containing the name and address range of each peripheral addressable by the processor within the memory space.
sentences.chinese: 一个在内存空间中的，包含每个外设的名字和可由处理器设置的地址范围的表格或图表。

detailed_translations.english: to show or represent something in a diagram

detailed_translations.chinese: 图解， 简图， 图表
detailed_translations.english: a simple drawing or plan that shows exactly where something is, what something looks like, or how something works

sentences.english: a meeting covering many disparate subjects
sentences.chinese: 涉及许多不同议题的会议

sentences.english: the difficulties of dealing with disparate groups of people
sentences.chinese: 和不同的人群打交道的难处

detailed_translations.chinese: 不同的；不相干的；全异的
detailed_translations.english: consisting of things or people that are very different and not related to each other

name: defiant
trans: 反叛的， 挑衅的， 公然违抗的

sentences.english: The players are in a defiant mood as they prepare for tomorrow's game.
sentences.chinese: 在准备明天的比赛时，球员们态度挑衅。

detailed_translations.chinese: 挑衅的；目中无人的，蔑视的；挑战的
detailed_translations.english: If you say that someone is defiant, you mean they show aggression or independence by refusing to obey someone

name: tragedy
trans: 惨事， 灾难； 悲剧

sentences.english: The tragedy happened as they were returning home from a night out.
sentences.chinese: 悲剧发生在他们夜里外出归来的路上。

sentences.english: Tragedy struck the family when their two-year-old son was killed in an accident.
sentences.chinese: 悲剧降临到这个家庭，他们两岁的儿子在一次事故中丧生。

detailed_translations.english: a very sad event, that shocks people because it involves death

sentences.english: iron oxide
sentences.chinese: 氧化铁

detailed_translations.english: a substance which is produced when a substance is combined with oxygen

name: startling
trans: 惊人的， 令人吃惊的

sentences.english: Paddy’s words had a startling effect on the children.
sentences.chinese: 帕迪的话在孩子们身上产生了惊人的效果。

sentences.english: a startling discovery
sentences.chinese: 令人震惊的发现

detailed_translations.english: very unusual or surprising

sentences.english: Sixty acres of woods and ponds are home to camels, zebra, bison, water buffalo, ostrich and antelope.
sentences.chinese: 六十英亩的森林和池塘是骆驼，斑马，野牛，水牛，鸵鸟和羚羊的家园。

sentences.english: But the biggest obstacle is the ranchers themselves, whose cattle compete with prairie dogs and bison for grass and space.
sentences.chinese: 但最大的阻碍来自牧场主本身，他们的牲畜与土拨鼠和野牛们竞争着草场和空间。

sentences.english: Watching bison up close is mesmerizing, like watching a grass fire about to leap out of control.
sentences.chinese: 近距离观察野牛会使人生疑，就像看到一场失控的大火即将恣肆于草原。

detailed_translations.english: an animal like a large cow, with hair on its head and shoulders

name: chart
trans: 用图说明；制图；记录，跟踪；计划

sentences.english: a chart showing last year’s sales
sentences.chinese: 显示去年销售情况的一份图表

sentences.english: a weather chart
sentences.chinese: 天气图

sentences.english: the theatre’s seating chart
sentences.chinese: 剧场的座位图

detailed_translations.english: information that is clearly arranged in the form of a simple picture, set of figures,  graph  etc, or a piece of paper with this information on it

detailed_translations.chinese: 用图表表示， 在图上表示
detailed_translations.english: if a record charts, it enters the weekly list of the most popular records

name: evoke
trans: 唤起， 引起， 激起

sentences.english: The photographs evoked strong memories of our holidays in France.
sentences.chinese: 那些照片勾起了我们到法国度假的深刻回忆。

sentences.english: His appearance is bound to evoke sympathy.
sentences.chinese: 他的外表肯定会引起人们的同情。

sentences.english: Her speech evoked a hostile response.
sentences.chinese: 她的讲话引起了敌对的反应。

detailed_translations.chinese: 唤起， 引起， 使人想起
detailed_translations.english: to produce a strong feeling or memory in someone

name: attend
trans: 出席， 参加； 照料， 看管； 专心， 注意； 陪同

sentences.english: Only 12 people attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 只有12个人出席了会议。

sentences.english: Please let us know if you are unable to attend.
sentences.chinese: 如果不能出席，请通知我们。

sentences.english: On his deathbed the General was attended by several doctors.
sentences.chinese: 将军临终时有几名医生在照料他。

detailed_translations.english: to go to an event such as a meeting or a class

name: shovel
trans: 铲， 铁铲； 挖掘机

sentences.english: ...a coal shovel.
sentences.chinese: …一把煤铲。

sentences.english: The workmen shovelled gravel onto the road.
sentences.chinese: 工人们把碎石铲到路面上。

detailed_translations.english: a tool with a rounded blade and a long handle used for moving earth, stones etc
to lift and move earth, stones etc with a shovel

sentences.english: The system already exists in embryo.
sentences.chinese: 该体系已具雏形。

detailed_translations.english: an animal or human that has not yet been born, and has just begun to develop

sentences.english: ...the accounting firm of Leventhal & Horwath.
sentences.chinese: …利文撒尔与霍瓦特会计事务所。

detailed_translations.english: accountancy

name: align
trans: 结盟； 排整齐； 校准； 使一致

sentences.english: The desks were neatly aligned in rows.
sentences.chinese: 书桌一行行排得整整齐齐。

sentences.english: Make sure that all the holes align.
sentences.chinese: 确保所有的洞眼成一条直线。

detailed_translations.english: to arrange things so that they form a line or are parallel to each other, or to be in a position that forms a line etc

name: secure
trans: 安全的，有保障的；可靠的；确定的；

sentences.english: There are no secure jobs these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今已经没有铁饭碗了。

sentences.english: We want a secure future for our children.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望我们的孩子未来生活无虞。

sentences.english: United’s position at the top of the league seems relatively secure.
sentences.chinese: 联队在联赛中的头名位置似乎相对稳固。

detailed_translations.english: a situation that is secure is one that you can depend on because it is not likely to change
to make something safe from being attacked, harmed, or lost

name: intoxication
trans: 醉， 醉酒； 极度兴奋

sentences.english: Intoxication interferes with memory and thinking, speech and coordination.
sentences.chinese: 醉酒影响记忆、思考，讲话和协调性。

detailed_translations.english: Intoxication is the state of being drunk

sentences.english: A wasp stung me on the arm.
sentences.chinese: 黄蜂蜇了我的手臂。

sentences.english: Years of dealing with plasters and wasp stings on the beach mean handbags and subsequently backpacks are stuffed with remedies.
sentences.chinese: 和药膏和沙滩上黄蜂叮咬打了多年交道，结果是我的手提包和背包里塞满了药物。

detailed_translations.chinese: 黄蜂；[昆] 胡蜂；易怒的人
detailed_translations.english: a thin black and yellow flying insect that can sting you

name: canopy
trans: 天篷； 罩盖， 遮篷； 天蓬似的树阴

sentences.english: the forest canopy
sentences.chinese: 森林的树冠层

detailed_translations.english: a cover made of cloth that is fixed above a bed, seat etc as a decoration or as a shelter

sentences.english: Each atomic cluster is made up of neutrons and protons.
sentences.chinese: 每个原子团簇是由中子和质子组成的。

detailed_translations.english: a part of an atom that has no electrical charge

sentences.english: How many coaches can that locomotive pull?
sentences.chinese: 那个机车能拉多少节客车?。

sentences.english: A chamber, such as the furnace of a steam locomotive, in which fuel is burned.
sentences.chinese: 火箱，燃烧室一种燃料在里面燃烧的内室，例如蒸汽机车的燃烧室。

sentences.english: Displaying some of his versatility, here Iqbal shows an HO electric locomotive, track and signals he made.
sentences.chinese: 展示了他的一些多才多艺，在这里伊克巴尔显示，一何电力机车，轨道和信号，他所作的。

detailed_translations.english: a railway engine

sentences.english: bathroom tiles
sentences.chinese: 浴室瓷砖

detailed_translations.english: a flat square piece of baked clay or other material, used for covering walls, floors etc

sentences.english: People who travel by rail still read an immense amount.
sentences.chinese: 人们坐火车旅行时仍然会读很多书。

sentences.english: Regular visits from a social worker can be of immense value to old people living alone.
sentences.chinese: 对于独居老人来说社工的经常探望很重要。

detailed_translations.english: extremely large

name: avenue
trans: 途径， 手段； 大街

sentences.english: Fifth Avenue
sentences.chinese: 第五大街

sentences.english: Shaftesbury Avenue
sentences.chinese: 沙夫茨伯里街

sentences.english: a tree-lined avenue
sentences.chinese: 林荫道

detailed_translations.english: used in the names of streets in a town or city

name: vacate
trans: 腾出， 空出； 离， 退

sentences.english: Clay will vacate the position on June 19.
sentences.chinese: 克莱将于6月19日离职。

detailed_translations.english: to leave a job or position so that it is available for someone else to do

sentences.english: Every business has its own inherent risks.
sentences.chinese: 每笔生意本身都有风险。

sentences.english: I’m afraid the problems you mention are inherent in the system.
sentences.chinese: 你提及的这些问题恐怕本来就存在于这个体制中。

detailed_translations.english: a quality that is inherent in something is a natural part of it and cannot be separated from it

name: brush
trans: 画笔； 刷子； 轻碰； 小冲突

sentences.english: a scrubbing brush
sentences.chinese: 硬毛刷，板刷

detailed_translations.english: an object that you use for cleaning, painting, making your hair tidy etc, made with a lot of hairs,  bristle s  , or thin pieces of plastic, fastened to a handle

sentences.english: He was now in a more advantageous position.
sentences.chinese: 他现在的位置更有利。

detailed_translations.english: helpful and likely to make you successful

sentences.english: On any given day in the Houston area, half the hospital beds are empty.
sentences.chinese: 在休斯敦地区，任何一天医院的床位都有一半是空的。

sentences.english: The rules are to be followed in any given situation.
sentences.chinese: 这些规则在任何情况下都要遵守。

detailed_translations.chinese: 规定的，特定的；假设的；已知的；有癖好的，有倾向的
detailed_translations.english: any particular time, situation, amount etc that is being used as an example
taking something into account

sentences.english: bales of hay.
sentences.chinese: 中文例句: 一捆捆的干草。

detailed_translations.english: long grass that has been cut and dried, used as food for cattle

name: encroach
trans: 侵占； 侵蚀， 蚕食

sentences.english: The shrubs encroached ever more on the twisting drive.
sentences.chinese: 灌木丛蚕食了越来越多蜿蜒的车道。

detailed_translations.english: to gradually take more of someone’s time, possessions, rights etc than you should

sentences.english: a pronounced Polish accent
sentences.chinese: 明显的波兰口音

sentences.english: This disability is more pronounced in men.
sentences.chinese: 这种障碍在男性中表现得更为明显。

detailed_translations.chinese: 显著的；断然的；讲出来的
detailed_translations.english: very great or noticeable

detailed_translations.chinese: 发音；宣告；断言（pronounce的过去分词）

name: perish
trans: 灭亡； 湮灭， 毁灭； 老化

sentences.english: Hundreds perished when the ship went down.
sentences.chinese: 轮船沉没，数百人罹难。

detailed_translations.english: to die, especially in a terrible or sudden way

name: definite
trans: 清楚的， 确切的； 肯定的

sentences.english: It’s impossible for me to give you a definite answer.
sentences.chinese: 我不可能给你明确的答复。

sentences.english: We need to record sufficient data to enable definite conclusions to be reached.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要记录足够的数据，才能得出明确的结论。

sentences.english: He’d shown definite signs of resigning himself to the situation.
sentences.chinese: 他明显表现出安于这种状况的样子。

sentences.english: Fix a definite date for the delivery of your computer.
sentences.chinese: 请为你的电脑定个确切的交货日期。

detailed_translations.english: clearly known, seen, or stated

name: stipulate
trans: 规定， 明确要求； 约定

sentences.english: Laws stipulate the maximum interest rate that banks can charge.
sentences.chinese: 法律对银行可以收取的最高利率作了规定。

detailed_translations.english: if an agreement, law, or rule stipulates something, it must be done

name: wary
trans: 小心翼翼的， 留神的， 警惕的

sentences.english: Keep a wary eye on the weather before you set sail.
sentences.chinese: 出航前要密切注意天气。

sentences.english: She had a wary expression on her face.
sentences.chinese: 她脸上带着小心谨慎的表情。

detailed_translations.chinese: 谨慎的；机警的；惟恐的；考虑周到的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is wary is careful because they think something might be dangerous or harmful

name: adapt
trans: 适合； 适应； 调整； 改编， 改写

sentences.english: The ability to adapt is a definite asset in this job.
sentences.chinese: 适应能力是做这份工作的绝对有利条件。

sentences.english: Many children buy books after they have been adapted for television.
sentences.chinese: 许多小孩子都是在书被改编成电视剧之后才去买的。

detailed_translations.english: to gradually change your behaviour and attitudes in order to be successful in a new situation

name: batch
trans: 一批，一组，一群；一批生产的量

sentences.english: an overnight batch file
sentences.chinese: 夜间批处理文件

detailed_translations.chinese: 一批；一炉；一次所制之量
detailed_translations.english: a group of people or things that arrive or are dealt with together
to group (items) for efficient processing

name: stagecoach
trans: 公共马车， 驿站马车

sentences.english: The Pony Express was much faster than the stagecoach.
sentences.chinese: 驿马快信要比当时的公共马车快多了。

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle pulled by horses that was used in past times for carrying passengers and letters

sentences.english: Insufficient resources have been devoted to the health service.
sentences.chinese: 用于医疗保健服务的资源不足。

detailed_translations.english: not enough, or not great enough

name: intrinsic
trans: 固有的， 本质的， 内在的

sentences.english: the intrinsic interest of the subject
sentences.chinese: 该话题本身的趣味

detailed_translations.english: being part of the nature or character of someone or something

name: guilty
trans: 有罪的， 犯罪的； 内疚的

sentences.english: She looked self-conscious and guilty.
sentences.chinese: 她看上去很不自然，很内疚的样子。

sentences.english: He was found not guilty of the death of PC Jones.
sentences.chinese: 关于警员琼斯的死，他被判无罪。

detailed_translations.english: feeling very ashamed and sad because you know that you have done something wrong

sentences.english: New safety measures were being demanded after last night’s horrific train crash.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚发生严重的火车相撞事故后，民众要求制定新的安全措施。

sentences.english: The new bridge was erected as a temporary measure to replace the one which was destroyed by floods.
sentences.chinese: 建这座新桥是为了临时代替被洪水毁坏的那座桥。

detailed_translations.english: an action, especially an official one, that is intended to deal with a particular problem

name: vestige
trans: 遗迹， 残余； 丝毫， 一点儿

sentences.english: We represent the last vestige of what made this nation great – hard work.
sentences.chinese: 我们代表了曾经使这个国家伟大的仅存的品质–勤奋。

detailed_translations.english: a small part or amount of something that remains when most of it no longer exists

sentences.english: ...interstellar space.
sentences.chinese: ...星际空间。

detailed_translations.english: happening or existing between the stars

sentences.english: luminous paint
sentences.chinese: 发光涂料

sentences.english: Her large dark eyes were almost luminous.
sentences.chinese: 她那双黑色的大眼睛几乎是亮闪闪的。

detailed_translations.english: shining in the dark

name: lash
trans: 将系牢，捆绑；猛烈打击；鞭打；猛烈抨击，严厉斥责

sentences.english: Giant waves lashed the sea wall.
sentences.chinese: 巨浪拍打着海堤。

detailed_translations.chinese: 鞭打；冲击；摆动；扎捆；煽动；讽刺
detailed_translations.english: to tie something tightly to something else with a rope

detailed_translations.chinese: 鞭打；睫毛；鞭子；责骂；讽刺
detailed_translations.english: a hit with a whip, especially as a punishment

name: maritime
trans: 海的， 海事的； 航海的

sentences.english: San Francisco has lost nearly all of its maritime industry.
sentences.chinese: 旧金山几乎失去了所有海运业。

detailed_translations.chinese: 海的；海事的；沿海的；海员的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the sea or ships

name: rattle
trans: 发出咔嗒声；使紧张，使恐惧

sentences.english: His mocking smile rattled her more than his anger.
sentences.chinese: 他那种嘲讽的微笑比他的愤怒更让她慌乱。

sentences.english: It was hard not to get rattled when the work piled up.
sentences.chinese: 工作积了一大堆，哪能不着急呢。

sentences.english: His confidence was rattled by the accident.
sentences.chinese: 这场事故动摇了他的自信。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使发出咯咯声；喋喋不休；使慌乱，使惊慌
detailed_translations.english: to make someone lose confidence or become nervous

detailed_translations.chinese: 喋喋不休的人；吓吱声，格格声
detailed_translations.english: a short repeated sound, made when something shakes

sentences.english: The door must be warped. It won’t close properly.
sentences.chinese: 这门肯定是变形了，关不严。

detailed_translations.english: a part of something that has become bent or twisted from its original shape
if something warps, or if heat or cold warps it, it becomes bent or twisted, and loses its original shape

name: basement
trans: 地下室， 地窖； 建筑物的底部

sentences.english: They bought an old schoolhouse to live in and built a workshop in the basement.
sentences.chinese: 他们买了座旧校舍居住，还在地下室建了个作坊。

detailed_translations.english: a room or area in a building that is under the level of the ground

name: injurious
trans: 侮辱的， 诽谤的； 造成伤害的， 有害的

sentences.english: ...substances that are injurious to health.
sentences.chinese: ...有害健康的物质。

detailed_translations.english: causing injury, harm, or damage

name: chant
trans: 圣歌；单调的吟唱；反复呼喊的话语

sentences.english: ...a Gregorian chant.
sentences.chinese: …一首格列高利圣歌。

detailed_translations.english: a regularly repeated tune, often with many words sung on one note, especially used for religious prayers
to repeat a word or phrase again and again

sentences.english: a hippie commune
sentences.chinese: 嬉皮士群体

detailed_translations.chinese: 谈心，亲密交谈；密切联系
detailed_translations.english: to talk or converse intimately
a group of people who live together and who share the work and their possessions

name: babble
trans: 胡言乱语； 含糊不清地说； 喋喋不休

sentences.english: Similar to us, birds learn to sing by mimicking the adults, and the early chirps are akin to a baby's babble.
sentences.chinese: 和人类一样，鸟类通过模仿长者学习鸣叫，最开始鸣叫时类似于婴儿的牙牙学语。

sentences.english: If your child often has a pacifier in his mouth, he may be less likely to babble and practice talking, or the pacifier may distort his speech.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的宝宝经常含着奶嘴，那这样可能会减少宝宝牙牙学语，练习说话的机会，或者奶嘴可能会搅乱他的言语发展。

name: focalize
trans: 调节焦距； 使聚焦； 使集中

detailed_translations.chinese: 调节焦距； 使聚焦； 使集中

sentences.english: the Mayor’s ceremonial duties
sentences.chinese: 市长的礼仪职责

sentences.english: Native American ceremonial robes
sentences.chinese: 美洲印第安人的礼袍

detailed_translations.english: used in a ceremony or done as part of a ceremony
a special ceremony, or special formal actions

sentences.english: Hypocrite and toady and inebriate!
sentences.chinese: 伪君子谄媚者和醉鬼。

detailed_translations.english: to pretend to like an important person and do things for them, so that they will help you – used to show disapproval
someone who pretends to like an important person and does things for them, so that that person will help them – used to show disapproval

sentences.english: Mother is devoted to Dad although they squabble all the time.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈深爱着爸爸，虽然他们总是为琐事争吵。

sentences.english: There have been minor squabbles about phone bills.
sentences.chinese: 为电话账单已闹过口角。

detailed_translations.english: to argue about something unimportant
Squabble is also a noun

name: rustic
trans: 乡村的； 淳朴的； 用粗糙木材制作的

sentences.english: The village had a certain rustic charm .
sentences.chinese: 这个村庄有一种迷人的田园风情。

detailed_translations.chinese: 乡村的；纯朴的；粗野的；手工粗糙的
detailed_translations.english: simple, old-fashioned, and not spoiled by modern developments, in a way that is typical of the countryside
someone from the country, especially a farm worker

sentences.english: Mexico's Mount Colima began spewing lava and ash last night.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥科利马山昨晚开始喷发熔岩和火山灰。

detailed_translations.english: hot liquid rock that flows from a volcano,or this rock when it has become solid

name: minimal
trans: 最小的； 最低限度的

sentences.english: The storm caused only minimal damage.
sentences.chinese: 暴风雨只造成了轻微破坏。

sentences.english: The cost to taxpayers would be minimal.
sentences.chinese: 纳税人的支出将是最少的。

sentences.english: This is a practical course, with only a minimal amount of theory.
sentences.chinese: 这是实践课程，只有少量理论。

detailed_translations.english: very small in degree or amount, especially the smallest degree or amount possible

name: ecology
trans: 生态； 生态学； 生态环境

sentences.english: the natural ecology of the Earth
sentences.chinese: 地球的自然生态

sentences.english: plant ecology
sentences.chinese: 植物生态学

detailed_translations.english: the way in which plants, animals, and people are related to each other and to their environment, or the scientific study of this

name: venomous
trans: 有毒的， 分泌毒液的； 恶意的， 狠毒的

sentences.english: Lisa shot him a venomous glance.
sentences.chinese: 莉萨恶狠狠地瞪了他一眼。

sentences.english: Reid reserved his most venomous attack for the Rail Authority.
sentences.chinese: 里德攻击铁路当局还有最厉害的一招没使出来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 有毒的；恶毒的；分泌毒液的；怨恨的
detailed_translations.english: full of hatred or anger

sentences.english: He was wrong, and courageous enough to admit it.
sentences.chinese: 他是错了，而且有勇气承认自己错了。

sentences.english: a courageous decision
sentences.chinese: 勇敢的决定

detailed_translations.english: brave

name: prudent
trans: 谨慎的； 深谋远虑的

sentences.english: prudent house buyers
sentences.chinese: 谨慎的购房者

detailed_translations.english: sensible and careful, especially by trying to avoid unnecessary risks

name: secrete
trans: 分泌； 藏匿， 躲藏

sentences.english: The toad’s skin secretes a deadly poison.
sentences.chinese: 蟾蜍的皮肤会分泌一种致命毒素。

detailed_translations.english: if a part of an animal or plant secretes a liquid substance, it produces it

sentences.english: It takes a steady hand to perform surgery.
sentences.chinese: 做手术手要稳。

sentences.english: The plane steadied, and the passengers relaxed
sentences.chinese: 飞机平稳后，乘客们松了一口气。

detailed_translations.english: firmly held in a particular position and not moving or shaking
to hold someone or something so they become more balanced or controlled, or to become more balanced or controlled

sentences.english: Please enclose a cheque with your order.
sentences.chinese: 请随订单附上支票。

sentences.english: The pool area is enclosed by a six-foot wall.
sentences.chinese: 游泳区用六英尺高的高墙围了起来。

detailed_translations.english: to put something inside an envelope as well as a letter

sentences.english: The central section of the book is a historical overview of drug use.
sentences.chinese: 本书的中心部分是对药物使用的一个历史概述。

detailed_translations.english: a short description of a subject or situation that gives the main ideas without explaining all the details

name: disease
trans: 疾病； 弊端， 恶疾

sentences.english: His father died of heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 他父亲死于心脏病。

sentences.english: She contracted the disease while she was abroad on holiday.
sentences.chinese: 她在国外度假时染上了这种疾病。

detailed_translations.chinese: 病， 疾病； 不健全， 弊端
detailed_translations.english: an illness which affects a person, animal, or plant

sentences.english: His relations with colleagues, differences of opinion notwithstanding, were unfailingly friendly.
sentences.chinese: 他与同事们尽管有意见分歧，但关系一直很融洽。

detailed_translations.english: Notwithstanding is also an adverb
in spite of something

name: volatile
trans: 挥发性的， 易挥发的； 不稳定的； 反复无常的

sentences.english: an increasingly volatile political situation
sentences.chinese: 日益动荡的政治局势

sentences.english: the highly volatile stock and bond markets
sentences.chinese: 相当不稳定的股票和债券市场

detailed_translations.chinese: [化学] 挥发性的；不稳定的；爆炸性的；反复无常的
detailed_translations.english: a volatile situation is likely to change suddenly and without warning
designating automatic muscular movements stimulated by ideas, as in absent-minded acts

name: generic
trans: 种类的， 属的； 一般的， 普通的

sentences.english: With this generic list node structure, you can now define lists and list operations that work regardless of the type of data stored in them.
sentences.chinese: 使用这个通用的列表节点结构，您现在可以定义列表和不需要考虑存储在列表中的数据类型的列表操作。

sentences.english: If your client code needs this kind of specific functionality, then this generic layer is not enough -- at least as it has been described so far.
sentences.chinese: 如果您的客户机代码需要这种特定的功能，那么这个一般层是不够的 ― 至少从迄今对它描述来看是不够的。

name: endorse
trans: 签名； 宣传， 代言； 签署； 赞同， 支持

sentences.english: I can endorse their opinion wholeheartedly.
sentences.chinese: 我可以全心全意地支持他们的观点。

detailed_translations.chinese: 背书；认可；签署；赞同；在背面签名
detailed_translations.english: to express formal support or approval for someone or something

name: alike
trans: 一样地，相似地；同样程度地

sentences.english: My mother and I are alike in many ways.
sentences.chinese: 我和母亲在许多方面很相似。

detailed_translations.english: very similar
used to emphasize that you mean both the people, groups, or things that you have just mentioned

sentences.english: The film reveals Fellini’s genius.
sentences.chinese: 这部影片展现了费里尼的天赋。

sentences.english: a work of pure genius
sentences.chinese: 天才之作

detailed_translations.english: a very high level of intelligence, mental skill, or ability, which only a few people have

name: infrastructure
trans: 基础设施， 基础结构

sentences.english: Some countries lack a suitable economic infrastructure.
sentences.chinese: 一些国家缺乏适当的经济基础设施。

sentences.english: a $65 billion investment package in education, health care and infrastructure
sentences.chinese: 用于教育、医疗和基础设施的650亿美元一揽子投资计划

detailed_translations.chinese: 基础设施；公共建设；下部构造
detailed_translations.english: the basic systems and structures that a country or organization needs in order to work properly, for example roads, railways, banks etc

name: typical
trans: 典型的， 有代表性的

sentences.english: typical British weather
sentences.chinese: 典型的英国天气

sentences.english: This advertisement is a typical example of their marketing strategy.
sentences.chinese: 这则广告是他们营销策略的一个典型例子。

detailed_translations.english: having the usual features or qualities of a particular group or thing

sentences.english: The United Nations imposed an arms embargo against the country.
sentences.chinese: 联合国对该国施行了武器贸易禁运。

sentences.english: The fruit was embargoed.
sentences.chinese: 水果被禁运了。

sentences.english: They embargoed oil shipments to the U.S.
sentences.chinese: 他们禁止了对美国石油船运。

detailed_translations.english: an official order to stop trade with another country

detailed_translations.chinese: 禁止， 禁止出入港口
detailed_translations.english: If goods of a particular kind are embargoed, people are not allowed to import them from a particular country or export them to a particular country

name: wither
trans: 枯萎， 凋谢； 衰退； 萎缩； 破灭

sentences.english: The flowers in Isabel's room had withered.
sentences.chinese: 伊莎贝尔房间里的花朵已经枯萎了。

detailed_translations.english: if plants wither, they become drier and smaller and start to die

name: quotation
trans: 引文， 引语， 语录； 报价

sentences.english: The following quotation is taken from a nineteenth century travel diary.
sentences.chinese: 下文引自19世纪的一篇旅行日记。

sentences.english: a dictionary of quotations
sentences.chinese: 引语词典，语录汇编

sentences.english: a quotation for car insurance
sentences.chinese: 汽车保险的报价单

detailed_translations.english: a sentence or phrase from a book, speech etc which you repeat in a speech or piece of writing because it is interesting or amusing

name: nocturnal
trans: 夜行性的； 夜间发生的

sentences.english: Hamsters are nocturnal creatures.
sentences.chinese: 仓鼠是夜行动物。

detailed_translations.chinese: 夜的；夜曲的；夜间发生的
detailed_translations.english: an animal that is nocturnal is active at night

sentences.english: They are sprayed with oil to prevent corrosion.
sentences.chinese: 它们被喷了油以防腐蚀。

sentences.english: Check for signs of corrosion.
sentences.chinese: 检查一下有没有腐蚀的痕迹。

detailed_translations.chinese: 腐蚀；腐蚀产生的物质；衰败
detailed_translations.english: the gradual destruction of metal by the effect of water, chemicals etc or a substance such as  rust  produced by this process

name: notorious
trans: 臭名昭著的， 声名狼藉的

sentences.english: a notorious computer hacker
sentences.chinese: 声名狼藉的电脑黑客

sentences.english: notorious cases of human rights abuses
sentences.chinese: 臭名昭著的践踏人权案

detailed_translations.english: famous or well-known for something bad

name: illustrative
trans: 作为例证的； 用做说明的； 解释性的

sentences.english: graphics and other illustrative material
sentences.chinese: 图表和其他图解材料

detailed_translations.chinese: 说明的；作例证的；解说的
detailed_translations.english: helping to explain the meaning of something

sentences.english: Water contains hydrogen and oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 水含有氢和氧。

sentences.english: Water can be reduced to oxygen and hydrogen by electrolysis.
sentences.chinese: 水通过电解可以分解为氧和氢。

sentences.english: The first bubbles to escape from the liquid are a mixture of air and hydrogen.
sentences.chinese: 从该液体中最先逸出的气泡是空气和氢的混合物。

detailed_translations.english: Hydrogen is a colourless gas that is the lightest and commonest element in the universe

name: superimpose
trans: 使重叠， 使叠加； 添加

sentences.english: The image of a seemingly tiny dancer was superimposed on the image of the table.
sentences.chinese: 一个看似很小的舞蹈者的影像被叠加在了那张桌子的影像上。

detailed_translations.english: to put one picture, image, or photograph on top of another so that both can be partly seen

sentences.english: An infant’s skin is very sensitive.
sentences.chinese: 幼儿的皮肤非常敏感。

sentences.english: infant formula milk
sentences.chinese: 婴(幼)儿配方奶

detailed_translations.english: a baby or very young child
intended for babies or very young children

name: artifact
trans: 人工制品， 手工艺品

sentences.english: In the wrong hands this powerful artifact has the ability to unravel the soul.
sentences.chinese: 在错误手这强有力的人工制品有能力解开灵魂。

sentences.english: I dread to think what the carbon footprint must be like of moving that coal but we have no choice.
sentences.chinese: 我都不敢想象为了运这些煤产生了多少碳足迹，但我们没有选择。

sentences.english: By removing whales, sharks and large fish, we ve reduced the amount of carbon stored in these populations.
sentences.chinese: 由于猎杀鲸鱼，鲨鱼和大型鱼类，我们也就减少了碳在这些物种群的储存量。

sentences.english: Across the world, forests and the soil beneath them absorb about a quarter of all carbon emissions.
sentences.chinese: 纵观全球，森林与它们脚下的土壤能吸收大约碳排放总量的四分之一。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical substance that exists in a pure form as diamonds,  graphite  etc, or in an impure form as coal, petrol etc. It is a chemical  element  : symbol C

sentences.english: How then would this dinosaur have moved?
sentences.chinese: 那么这种恐龙要如何移动呢？

sentences.english: Like shark and dinosaur teeth they would break, but then regenerate.
sentences.chinese: 它们就像鲨鱼和恐龙的牙齿一样会断裂，但也会再生。

sentences.english: From there you can look straight down to the dinosaur fossils displayed on the floor below.
sentences.chinese: 从那儿往向下看，你可以看到陈列在地面上的恐龙化石。

detailed_translations.english: one of a group of  reptile s  that lived millions of years ago

sentences.english: the New Jersey Turnpike
sentences.chinese: 新泽西付费高速公路

detailed_translations.english: a large road for fast traffic that drivers have to pay to use

sentences.english: They've been deprived of the fuel necessary to heat their homes.
sentences.chinese: 他们无法得到住房取暖必需的燃料。

detailed_translations.english: If you deprive someone of something that they want or need, you take it away from them, or you prevent them from having it

sentences.english: the tantalizing smell of fried bacon
sentences.chinese: 诱人的煎熏猪肉的味道

detailed_translations.english: making you feel a desire to have or do something

sentences.english: The eagle hovered, ready to swoop at any moment.
sentences.chinese: 鹰在天空盘旋，随时准备俯冲下来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 猛扑；突然袭击；突然下降；飞扑
detailed_translations.english: if a bird or aircraft swoops, it moves suddenly down through the air, especially in order to attack something
a sudden surprise attack on a place in order to get something or take people away – used especially in news reports

name: floral
trans: 花的， 像花的； 饰以花的， 绘有花的

sentences.english: a scarf with a bold floral pattern
sentences.chinese: 印有鲜艳花卉图案的围巾

sentences.english: a pretty floral dress
sentences.chinese: 漂亮的印花连衣裙

sentences.english: a light floral fragrance
sentences.chinese: 幽幽的花香

sentences.english: There were floral tributes (= flowers sent as a sign of respect after someone has died ) from his colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 有他同事敬献的鲜花。

detailed_translations.english: made of flowers or decorated with flowers or pictures of flowers

name: pest
trans: 害虫； 令人讨厌的人

sentences.english: a chemical used in pest control
sentences.chinese: 用于防治虫害的一种化学品

detailed_translations.chinese: 害虫；有害之物；讨厌的人
detailed_translations.english: a small animal or insect that destroys crops or food supplies

name: swoon
trans: 昏厥， 昏倒； 痴迷

sentences.english: Virtually every woman in the '20s swooned over Valentino.
sentences.chinese: 在20年代，几乎每位女性都痴迷于华伦天奴这个品牌。

detailed_translations.chinese: 昏厥， 昏倒； 痴迷
detailed_translations.english: to fall to the ground because you have been affected by an emotion or shock

sentences.english: This could be magnesium.
sentences.chinese: 这也可能是镁。

sentences.english: But, we know for example that magnesium, when it reacts, it reacts with both of its electrons, not just one of its electrons.
sentences.chinese: 但是我们知道，拿镁来说，当它发生反应的时候，并不只是，某一个电子反应，而是两个价电子都发生反应。

sentences.english: So, if we want to get more magnesium into the marketplace at an affordable price, not by government edict, what do we have to do?
sentences.chinese: 所以如果我们想把更多的镁,投诸市场，并让它保持在一个不太昂贵的价格，而且不靠政府法令，我们应该怎样做？

detailed_translations.english: Magnesium is a light, silvery white metal which burns with a bright white flame

sentences.english: the infancy of radio broadcasting
sentences.chinese: 无线电广播的初期阶段

detailed_translations.english: the period of a child’s life before they can walk or talk

sentences.english: the importance of preserving the national heritage
sentences.chinese: 保护民族遗产的重要性

sentences.english: beautiful old buildings which are part of our heritage
sentences.chinese: 属于我们遗产一部分的漂亮古建筑

detailed_translations.chinese: 遗产；传统；继承物；继承权
detailed_translations.english: the traditional beliefs, values, customs etc of a family, country, or society

sentences.english: the Supreme Allied Commander in Europe
sentences.chinese: 欧洲盟军最高指挥官

sentences.english: a country where the car reigns supreme
sentences.chinese: 汽车占绝对优势地位的国家

detailed_translations.chinese: 最高的；至高的；最重要的
detailed_translations.english: having the highest position of power, importance, or influence

name: philosophy
trans: 哲学； 哲学体系， 思想体系； 人生观， 人生哲学

sentences.english: Emma studies philosophy at university.
sentences.chinese: 埃玛在大学攻读哲学。

detailed_translations.english: the study of the nature and meaning of existence, truth, good and evil, etc

sentences.english: a steep slope
sentences.chinese: 陡坡

sentences.english: a gentle
sentences.chinese: 缓坡

sentences.english: She looked back up the grassy slope.
sentences.chinese: 她回头望了一眼那绿草如茵的坡地。

sentences.english: a pleasant garden that slopes down to the river
sentences.chinese: 一座向河边倾斜的宜人花园

detailed_translations.english: a piece of ground or a surface that slopes
if the ground or a surface slopes, it is higher at one end than the other

name: outrageously
trans: 令人不能容忍地； 肆无忌惮地

sentences.english: The passing of time somehowencouraged people like Abe to be acting so outrageously, thinking there are notmany people like you who can challenge him with the real life experience.
sentences.chinese: 时间的流逝，让一些像安倍一样的人开始肆无忌惮起来，认为不会有多少像你一样，具有真是生活经历的人能够挑战他。

detailed_translations.chinese: 令人不能容忍地； 肆无忌惮地

name: lapse
trans: 期满终止， 失效； 衰退； 背弃

sentences.english: I had a little lapse of concentration in the middle of the race.
sentences.chinese: 我在比赛中走了一下神。

sentences.english: He was a genius and because of it you could accept lapses of taste.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个天才，因此他偶失得体，人们也可以接受。

detailed_translations.english: A lapse of something such as concentration or judgment is a temporary lack of that thing, which can often cause you to make a mistake

name: regenerate
trans: 复兴， 振兴； 再生

sentences.english: Small nodules form as the liver cells regenerate.
sentences.chinese: 肝细胞再生时会形成一些小结节。

detailed_translations.chinese: 新生， 再生， 起革新作用
detailed_translations.english: to grow again, or make something grow again
to grow again, or make something grow again

name: latent
trans: 潜在的， 隐伏的； 潜伏的； 休眠的

sentences.english: latent aggression
sentences.chinese: 潜在的侵略

detailed_translations.english: something that is latent is present but hidden, and may develop or become more noticeable in the future

name: forestall
trans: 预防， 预先阻止； 先发制人

sentences.english: a measure intended to forestall further attacks
sentences.chinese: 意在预先阻止进一步攻击的措施

detailed_translations.chinese: 先发制人，预先阻止；垄断，屯积；领先；占先一步
detailed_translations.english: to prevent something from happening or prevent someone from doing something by doing something first

name: terrific
trans: 极好的； 非常的， 极度的； 可怕的

sentences.english: That’s a terrific idea!
sentences.chinese: 这个主意真棒！

sentences.english: The actress who played the lawyer was terrific.
sentences.chinese: 扮演律师的女演员表演十分出色。

detailed_translations.chinese: 极妙的； 极大的； 令人恐惧的
detailed_translations.english: very good, especially in a way that makes you feel happy and excited

sentences.english: The poem's first stanza tells how the speaker meets a fellow "nobody" — a friend.
sentences.chinese: 这首诗的第一段描写诗人如何遇到了另一位“无名小卒”-- 一位朋友。

sentences.english: The women shrieked with glee and the men shouted the last word of each stanza with the singer.
sentences.chinese: 女人们都高兴的叫起来了，那些男人就和着他，把每句的最后一个词喊了出来。

sentences.english: The point of it all, says Fish, is that the structure of Carroll's stanza provides all the clues they need to design a sentence that makes sense.
sentences.chinese: 这个练习的全部意义就在于，卡罗尔这首诗诗节的结构就是在告诉学生们，要写出一个有意义的句子，他们必须注意其结构。

detailed_translations.english: a group of lines in a repeated pattern forming part of a poem

sentences.english: Amanda soon found her niche at the club.
sentences.chinese: 阿曼达很快就在俱乐部里找到了一份理想的工作。

detailed_translations.chinese: 壁龛；合适的职业；[亦称作 niche market]【商业】有利可图的市场(或形势等)
detailed_translations.english: a hollow place in a wall, often made to hold a statue

name: worship
trans: 祭拜； 崇拜， 崇敬

sentences.english: The ceremony must take place in a recognized place of worship.
sentences.chinese: 该仪式必须在获得认可的敬拜场所举行。

sentences.english: He absolutely worships her.
sentences.chinese: 他太崇拜她了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 礼拜；崇拜；崇拜: 爱慕：崇敬
detailed_translations.english: the activity of praying or singing in a religious building in order to show respect and love for a god
to admire and love someone very much

name: lawn
trans: 草地， 草坪； 操场

sentences.english: I spent all morning mowing the lawn (= cutting the grass ).
sentences.chinese: 我整个上午都在修剪草坪。

sentences.english: a carefully tended lawn

detailed_translations.english: a disease that affects a particular part of your body and is caused by bacteria or a virus

sentences.chinese: 你怎么这么固执？

sentences.chinese: 我的个性很固执。

sentences.chinese: 保尔有时倔得像头驴。
