name: formulate
trans: 阐明， 确切表达； 规划， 构想； 制定

sentences.english: By visualizing where you want to be, you start helping your mind formulate ways to achieve that next goal in your life.
sentences.chinese: 通过把你想达到的程度形象化，你就开始帮助自己的头脑制定目标——为了达到你生活中的下一个目标。

sentences.english: With so much content floating around these days, if you want your writing to be read then you've got to take up an interesting topic, thoughtfully formulate your thoughts, and back up your argument.
sentences.chinese: 每天面对这么多漂浮在你身边的信息和内容，如果您希望您的文字被别人阅读，那么你可要找一个有趣的话题，花店功夫制定您的想法，并支持你的论点。

detailed_translations.english: to develop something such as a plan or a set of rules, and decide all the details of how it will be done

name: glorify
trans: 吹捧， 美化； 赞美， 赞扬

sentences.chinese: 本杂志决不美化各种犯罪团伙。

detailed_translations.english: to praise someone or something, especially God

sentences.english: He emigrated to Belgium.
sentences.chinese: 他移民去了比利时。

detailed_translations.english: to leave your own country in order to live in another country

sentences.english: They followed the sinuous trail deep into the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 他们沿着弯弯曲曲的小径进入深山。

trans: 三角形； 三角形物体

sentences.chinese: 是的，它象一个三角形。

sentences.english: So, we have to find the area of the triangle.
sentences.chinese: 因此我们必须求出三角形的面积。

sentences.english: It can measure not only the sine wave, square wave, triangle wave, a sharp pulse but also can measure other characteristics of the signal wave.
sentences.chinese: 它不仅可以测量正弦波、方波、三角波、尖脉冲信号和其他具有周期特性的信号的频率，而且还可以测量它们的周期。

detailed_translations.english: a flat shape with three straight sides and three angles

someone who is not a legal citizen of the country they are living or working in

sentences.english: a child’s linguistic development
sentences.chinese: 儿童的语言发展

name: ivory

sentences.chinese: 乳白色真丝婚纱

trans: 不足的， 缺乏的； 有缺陷的， 不完善的

sentences.chinese: 多发性硬化（以下称为MS）

sentences.chinese: 这种葡萄酒是用橡木酒桶放陈的。

sentences.chinese: …一家大型连锁超市。

detailed_translations.english: a number of shops, hotels, cinemas etc owned or managed by the same company or person

name: efficient

sentences.chinese: 效率高的秘书

sentences.english: an efficient use of land
sentences.chinese: 土地的有效使用

sentences.chinese: 如今的照明设备更加节能。

sentences.chinese: 对战争的坚决支持使这个国家团结了起来。

trans: 反转；彻底转变，颠倒；撤销，废除；交换；

sentences.english: Reverse the paper in the printer.
sentences.chinese: 把打印机中的纸翻过来。

sentences.english: The wrong attitude will have exactly the reverse effect.
sentences.chinese: 这种错误的态度会得到恰好相反的结果。

detailed_translations.english: Reverse means opposite from what you expect or to what has just been described

sentences.chinese: 那对夫妇想收养他们代养的一个黑人小孩。

detailed_translations.english: a container for putting things in

sentences.chinese: 什么娱乐设施现在是可用的？

detailed_translations.english: friendly and preferring to be with other people

name: beam

束， 波束， 光线； 梁； 笑容， 喜色

sentences.chinese: …高能激光束。

detailed_translations.english: a long heavy piece of wood or metal used in building houses, bridges etc

sentences.english: ...a black bird with a yellow beak.
sentences.chinese: …一只有着黄喙的黑鸟。

sentences.english: historical fiction

sentences.chinese: 她脖子上戴着一串绿色的玻璃珠子。

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement for a meeting at an agreed time and place, for a particular purpose

sentences.chinese: 滴滴涕是最初合成于1874年的杀虫剂。

sentences.chinese: 穿越森林的孤独跋涉

软式墙网球， 壁球； 果汁汽水

sentences.english: Her suggestions were always squashed.
sentences.chinese: 她的建 议总是受到压制。

detailed_translations.english: a game played by two people who use  rackets  to hit a small rubber ball against the walls of a square court

sentences.chinese: 美国有两大政党。

sentences.english: The government’s major concern is with preventing road accidents.
sentences.chinese: 政府关注的大事是预防道路交通事故。

sentences.english: Smoking is one of the major causes of cancer.
sentences.chinese: 吸烟是引发癌症的元凶之一。

sentences.english: the major developments in computer technology
sentences.chinese: 计算机技术的重大进步

sentences.chinese: 他主修政治学。

detailed_translations.english: very large or important, when compared to other things or people of a similar kind

sentences.english: The playwright does something remarkable in this scene, but without any impression of straining after an effect.
sentences.chinese: 剧作家在这场中有许多惊人妙笔，但并不给人留下竭力追求表面效果的印象。

sentences.english: His plays have been translated into every major living language and are performed more often than those of any other playwright.
sentences.chinese: 他的剧本被翻译成所有主要使用着的语言，并且表演次数远远超过其他任何剧作家。

sentences.english: His plays have been translated into every major living language and are performed more often than those of any other playwright.
sentences.chinese: 他的剧本被翻译成世界上多种主要语言，并且表演次数远远超过其他任何剧作家。

detailed_translations.english: someone who writes plays

name: interrupt
trans: 打扰； 中断； 阻碍

sentences.english: Will you stop interrupting me!
sentences.chinese: 别打断我的话！

sentences.english: Sorry to interrupt, but I need to ask you to come downstairs.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉打扰了，我得请你下楼来。

detailed_translations.english: to stop someone from continuing what they are saying or doing by suddenly speaking to them, making a noise etc

name: beat
trans: 打拍子，指挥；敲打；打败，胜过；跳动
跳动；节拍，节奏；有规律的敲击

sentences.english: Somebody was beating at the door.
sentences.chinese: 有人在打门。

sentences.english: Brazil were beaten 2–1.
sentences.chinese: 巴西队以1比2告负。

sentences.english: Labour easily beat the Conservatives in the last election.
sentences.chinese: 工党在上一届选举中轻松击败保守党。

detailed_translations.english: to hit sb/sth many times, usually very hard

sentences.english: a feasible solution
sentences.chinese: 可行的解决方法

detailed_translations.english: a plan, idea, or method that is feasible is possible and is likely to work

name: prescribe
trans: 开处方； 规定； 指示

sentences.english: The physician examines the patient then diagnoses the disease and prescribes medication.
sentences.chinese: 内科医生检查了病人，然后对疾病作出诊断，并开出药方。

sentences.chinese: 法律规定这种罪行应受何处罚？

detailed_translations.english: to say what medicine or treatment a sick person should have

sentences.english: I didn't even have the chance to proofread my own report.
sentences.chinese: 我甚至没有机会校对自己的报告。

detailed_translations.english: to read through something that is written or printed in order to correct any mistakes in it

sentences.english: The company has identified 60 potential customers.
sentences.chinese: 该公司已确定了60位潜在的客户。

detailed_translations.english: likely to develop into a particular type of person or thing in the future
the possibility that something will develop in a particular way, or have a particular effect

sentences.english: the television lounge
sentences.chinese: 电视放映室

detailed_translations.english: a public room in a hotel or other building, that is used by many people as a place to relax

name: gross
trans: 总的，毛的；粗俗的，粗野的；令人不快的

sentences.english: He abused the Admiral in the grossest terms.
sentences.chinese: 他用最粗俗的字眼辱骂那位海军上将。

detailed_translations.english: If you say that someone's speech or behaviour is gross, you think it is very coarse, vulgar, or unacceptable

sentences.english: to resist change
sentences.chinese: 抵制变革

sentences.english: He tried to pin me down, but I resisted.
sentences.chinese: 他试图制伏我，但我奋力反抗。

sentences.chinese: 那位作家未发表作品的档案

detailed_translations.english: a place where a large number of historical records are stored, or the records that are stored
to put documents, books, information etc in an archive

name: disarm
trans: 解除武装； 裁军； 消除， 消解

sentences.chinese: 要让叛乱分子解除武装并非易事。

detailed_translations.english: to reduce the size of your army, navy etc, and the number of your weapons

name: extrapolate
trans: 外推； 推断， 推知

sentences.english: Extrapolating from his latest findings, he reckons about 80% of these deaths might be attributed to smoking.
sentences.chinese: 从他最近的发现推断，他估计大约80%的这类死亡可能归因于吸烟。

name: stimulate
trans: 刺激； 激励， 激发

sentences.english: the President’s plan to stimulate economic growth
sentences.chinese: 总统刺激经济增长的计划

sentences.english: Her interest in art was stimulated by her father.
sentences.chinese: 她对艺术的兴趣是她父亲激发的。

detailed_translations.english: to encourage or help an activity to begin or develop further

name: reciprocity
trans: 互惠， 互助； 互惠主义

sentences.english: They said they would press for reciprocity with Greece in the issuing of visas.
sentences.chinese: 他们说，他们将会对希腊施压，以达成签证发放的互惠。

detailed_translations.chinese: 相互作用（复数reciprocities）；相互性；互惠主义
detailed_translations.english: a situation in which two people, groups, or countries give each other similar kinds of help or special rights

sentences.english: The economy had eclipsed the environment as an election issue.
sentences.chinese: 经济作为竞选话题已经盖过环境问题。

detailed_translations.english: to become more important, powerful, famous etc than someone or something else, so that they are no longer noticed
an occasion when the sun or the moon cannot be seen, because the Earth is passing directly between the moon and the sun, or because the moon is passing directly between the Earth and the sun

name: square
trans: 正方形的；成直角的，方的；平方的
使成正方形； 求平方； 使打成平局

sentences.english: First of all, draw a square.
sentences.chinese: 首先，画一个正方形。

sentences.english: She lives in Hanover Square.
sentences.chinese: 她住在汉诺威广场。

detailed_translations.english: a shape with four straight equal sides with 90˚ angles at the corners

name: careless
trans: 粗心的， 疏忽的； 无忧无虑的； 不关心的， 冷漠的

sentences.english: It was careless of him to leave the door unlocked.
sentences.chinese: 他忘了锁门，真是粗心大意。

sentences.english: a careless mistake
sentences.chinese: 粗心造成的错误

sentences.english: careless driving
sentences.chinese: 粗心驾驶

sentences.english: Careless talk can be disastrous for a business.
sentences.chinese: 谈话不慎有时会给企业带来灾难性的损失。

sentences.english: She gave a careless shrug.
sentences.chinese: 她漠然地耸了耸肩。

detailed_translations.english: not paying enough attention to what you are doing, so that you make mistakes, damage things etc

name: soak
trans: 浸泡， 浸湿， 浸透

sentences.english: Soak the clothes in cold water.
sentences.chinese: 把衣服浸泡在冷水里。

sentences.english: Let the pans soak; I’ll wash them later.
sentences.chinese: 把锅泡着吧，我过一会儿再洗。

detailed_translations.english: if you soak something, or if you let it soak, you keep it covered with a liquid for a period of time, especially in order to make it softer or easier to clean
if you soak something, or if you let it soak, you keep it covered with a liquid for a period of time, especially in order to make it softer or easier to clean

sentences.english: They gave him drugs to counteract his withdrawal symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 他们给他服药以消除他的脱瘾症状。

detailed_translations.english: to reduce or prevent the bad effect of something, by doing something that has the opposite effect

name: deserted
trans: 荒废的， 空无一人的； 被离弃的， 被遗弃的

sentences.english: At the edge of the desert, he came across a deserted church.
sentences.chinese: 在沙漠的边缘地带，他碰巧发现了一个被遗弃的教堂。

sentences.english: Poor farmers are deserting their parched farm fields and coming here looking for jobs.
sentences.chinese: 贫穷的农民丢下干旱的农田，来这里寻找工作。

detailed_translations.english: a wife etc who has been left by her husband etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 遗弃（desert的过去式和过去分词）
detailed_translations.english: If people or animals desert a place, they leave it and it becomes empty

name: commute
trans: 上下班往返， 经常往返； 代偿； 减刑

sentences.english: Baldry’s 20-year prison sentence was commuted to three years.
sentences.chinese: 鲍德里二十年的刑期被减至三年。

detailed_translations.chinese: 乘公交车上下班，经常乘车往返于两地
减； 折合， 折偿； 上下班交通
detailed_translations.english: to regularly travel a long distance to get to work

name: sustain
trans: 保持， 维持； 支持， 支撑； 经受， 承受

sentences.english: He leant against her so heavily that she could barely sustain his weight.
sentences.chinese: 他重重地靠在她身上，让她几乎撑不住了。

sentences.english: Which planets can sustain life?
sentences.chinese: 哪些行星可以维持生命的存在？

detailed_translations.english: to hold up the weight of something

sentences.english: West Berlin always had a large anarchist community.
sentences.chinese: 西柏林一直存在一个大的无政府主义群体。

detailed_translations.english: someone who believes that governments, laws etc are not necessary

sentences.english: We’d classify Drabble’s novels under ‘Romance’.
sentences.chinese: 我们把德拉布尔的小说归类为“言情小说”。

sentences.english: Families are classified according to the father’s occupation.
sentences.chinese: 各个家庭按父亲的职业分类。

detailed_translations.english: to decide what group something belongs to

sentences.english: The aircraft had reached its cruising altitude of about 39,000 feet.
sentences.chinese: 那架飞机已经达到了大约三万九千英尺的巡航高度。

detailed_translations.english: the height of an object or place above the sea

sentences.english: They have made an urgent request for international aid.
sentences.chinese: 他们紧急请求国际援助。

sentences.english: To request more information, please call our toll free number.
sentences.chinese: 欲知详情，请拨打我们的免费电话。

detailed_translations.english: a polite or formal demand for something
to ask for something in a polite or formal way

name: colony
trans: 群， 群体； 殖民地； 聚居地

sentences.english: Algeria was formerly a French colony.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔及利亚以前是法国的殖民地。

detailed_translations.english: a country or area that is under the political control of a more powerful country, usually one that is far away

sentences.english: In the wagon.
sentences.chinese: 在货车里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 四轮马车， 大篷车； 铁路货车， 客货两用车
detailed_translations.english: a strong vehicle with four wheels, used for carrying heavy loads and usually pulled by horses

sentences.english: Explanation: Significant digits truncated during CAST from numeric to character.
sentences.chinese: 说明：在从数字到字符科协截断有效数字。

sentences.english: If the data type of the field is numeric, the field is added to the Values area, with a default aggregation of sum.
sentences.chinese: 如果这个字段的数据类型为数值，那么这个字段就会增加到值区域，形成一个求和的默认集合。

sentences.english: Propagation of seismic wave in complex medium is mostly simulated by numeric solution of oneway or two-way wave equation.
sentences.chinese: 复杂介质中地震波的传播多是通过求取单程或双程波动方程的数值解进行模拟的。

name: debut
trans: 首次演出； 初次亮相

sentences.english: She made her debut in a 1937 production of "Hamlet."
sentences.chinese: 她在1937年《哈姆雷特》的演出中首次登台。

detailed_translations.english: the first public appearance of an entertainer, sports player etc or of something new and important

name: uphold
trans: 支持， 维护； 维持

sentences.english: We have a duty to uphold the law.
sentences.chinese: 维护法律是我们的责任。

detailed_translations.english: to defend or support a law, system, or principle so that it continues to exist

sentences.english: You can have a spiritual dimension to your life without being religious.
sentences.chinese: 即使你不信宗教，也可以在生命中拥有精神层面的内容。

detailed_translations.chinese: 方面;[数] 维；尺寸；次元；容积 vt标出尺寸
detailed_translations.english: a part of a situation or a quality involved in it

name: nostalgia
trans: 思乡病， 乡愁； 怀旧之情， 恋旧

sentences.english: He might be influenced by nostalgia for the surroundings of his happy youth.
sentences.chinese: 他也许被他对快乐青年时代的环境的怀念影响了。

detailed_translations.english: Nostalgia is an affectionate feeling you have for the past, especially for a particularly happy time

sentences.english: What have I done to deserve this?
sentences.chinese: 我做了什么事，要得到这样的报应？

sentences.english: I’m sorry for the kids. They deserve better (= deserve to be treated in a better way ) .
sentences.chinese: 我为这些孩子感到难过，他们应该过得更好。

sentences.english: Ledley deserves a place in the team.
sentences.chinese: 莱德利应该在队里占有一席之地。

sentences.english: Paula deserves a special mention for all the help she has given us.
sentences.chinese: 应该特别提一下葆拉，她给了我们许多帮助。

sentences.english: I would never hit anyone, even if they deserved it.
sentences.chinese: 我决不会打人，哪怕他欠揍。

sentences.english: What has he done to deserve this punishment ?
sentences.chinese: 他做了什么，竟会受到这样的惩罚？

sentences.english: People who are sent to prison for drunk-driving get what they deserve .
sentences.chinese: 那些醉酒驾车被送进监狱的人是罪有应得的。

detailed_translations.english: to have earned something by good or bad actions or behaviour

name: process
trans: 过程； 程序， 手续； 工序， 制作法

sentences.english: the Israeli-Egyptian peace process
sentences.chinese: 以－埃和平进程

sentences.english: Recycling is an industrial process.
sentences.chinese: 回收利用是一个工业流程。

sentences.english: All university applications are processed through this system.
sentences.chinese: 所有大学入学申请都是由这个系统处理的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 过程，进程；；工序；工艺流程
detailed_translations.english: a series of actions that are done in order to achieve a particular result
to deal with an official document, request etc in the usual way

sentences.english: That allowed England to harness the creative potential of its artisan classes in a way that no other country had managed before.
sentences.chinese: 如此，使得英国得以在某种程度上利用本国工匠阶层创造性潜能产生巨大的能量，此为他国以前没有做到之事。

sentences.english: All of it appeared to be handmade, probably by a 17th century artisan.
sentences.chinese: 这里的一切似乎都是手工制作的，很可能出自一位17世纪工匠之手。

sentences.english: That would certainly not be true of the members of the artisan class or the military class for that reason.
sentences.chinese: 那对工匠阶级,与军人阶级,绝对不可能为真。

detailed_translations.english: someone who does skilled work, making things with their hands

name: sprout
trans: 发芽，抽条，生长；迅速出现，涌现出

sentences.english: Move the pots outside when the seeds begin to sprout.
sentences.chinese: 种子开始发芽时把盆搬到外面去。

sentences.english: Trees were starting to sprout new leaves.
sentences.chinese: 树上开始抽出新叶。

detailed_translations.english: if vegetables, seeds, or plants sprout, they start to grow, producing  shoots  ,  buds  , or leaves
a small green vegetable like a very small  cabbage

name: restore
trans: 恢复； 修复； 归还， 交还

sentences.english: She was hoping that the Mediterranean climate would restore her to full health.
sentences.chinese: 她希望地中海的气候能使她的身体完全复原。

sentences.english: The National Guard was called in to restore order (= make people stop fighting and breaking the law ) when riots broke out.
sentences.chinese: 暴乱爆发后，国民警卫队被调来恢复秩序。

sentences.english: initiatives to restore peace in the Middle East
sentences.chinese: 恢复中东和平的倡议

sentences.english: a Victorian fireplace restored to its former glory
sentences.chinese: 恢复了昔日华美的维多利亚时代的壁炉

sentences.english: The treaty restored Okinawa to Japan.
sentences.chinese: 该条约将冲绳归还给了日本。

detailed_translations.english: to make something return to its former state or condition

sentences.english: As the liquid cools, it becomes viscous.
sentences.chinese: 这液体冷却后会变黏稠。

detailed_translations.english: (of a liquid 液体) thick and sticky; not flowing freely

sentences.english: Seeing those old school photographs has made me feel quite nostalgic.
sentences.chinese: 看到那些学生时代的旧照片，我不禁产生了怀旧之情。

sentences.english: a nostalgic look back at the 1950s
sentences.chinese: 对20世纪50年代的怀念

detailed_translations.english: if you feel nostalgic about a time in the past, you feel happy when you remember it, and in some ways you wish that things had not changed

name: alternative
trans: 可供替代的； 非传统的
可供选择的事物；选择的自由，选择的余地

sentences.english: An alternative route is along the Via Unione.
sentences.chinese: 另一条路线是沿着联合路走。

detailed_translations.chinese: 两者选一的， 供选择的； 另类的
detailed_translations.english: an alternative idea, plan etc is different from the one you have and can be used instead

detailed_translations.chinese: 替换物，选择；选择的自由
detailed_translations.english: something you can choose to do or use instead of something else

sentences.english: The onlookers were shouting, cheering, and waving banners.
sentences.chinese: 观众挥动着横幅，又是叫喊又是欢呼。

sentences.english: She’d never felt the need to carry the banner of feminism.
sentences.chinese: 她从来都不觉得有必要打出女权主义的旗号。

detailed_translations.english: a long piece of cloth on which something is written, often carried between two poles

sentences.english: The doctor had encountered several similar cases in the past.
sentences.chinese: 那位医生过去曾碰到过好几个类似病例。

detailed_translations.english: to experience something, especially problems or opposition
an occasion when you meet someone, or do something with someone you do not know

sentences.english: a Scotch and soda
sentences.chinese: 一杯加苏打水的苏格兰威士忌

detailed_translations.chinese: 碳酸钠， 纯碱； 汽水， 苏打水
detailed_translations.english: water that contains bubbles and is often added to alcoholic drinks

name: landslide
trans: 山崩， 塌方； 压倒性胜利

sentences.english: The storm caused landslides and flooding in Savona.
sentences.chinese: 暴风雨引发了萨沃纳的山崩和水灾。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden fall of a lot of earth or rocks down a hill, cliff etc

sentences.english: About 160 species of rare birds live in the swamps and prairie there.
sentences.chinese: 大约有160种珍稀鸟类栖息在这里的沼泽地和大草原上。

sentences.english: How many an afternoon antinia and i have trailed along the prairie under the magnificence .
sentences.chinese: 有多少个下午，我同安东妮亚在大草原上这种壮丽的景色中慢慢地走着啊！

sentences.english: From your English garden variety to your prairie wildflower, floral prints tell a sweet story.
sentences.chinese: 从英式花园的百花齐放到大草原的野花儿，印花叙述着甜美的故事。

detailed_translations.english: a wide open area of fairly flat land in North America which is covered in grass or wheat

sentences.english: You've never approved of Henry, have you?
sentences.chinese: 你从未赞赏过亨利，是吧？

detailed_translations.english: to think that someone or something is good, right, or suitable

name: chafe
trans: 擦破， 擦痛； 恼怒， 焦躁

sentences.english: My shorts were chafing my thighs.
sentences.chinese: 我的短裤蹭得我大腿疼。

detailed_translations.english: to rub part of your body to make it warm

name: chew
trans: 咀嚼； 思量， 熟思

sentences.english: This meat’s so tough I can hardly chew it!
sentences.chinese: 这肉太老了，我几乎嚼不动！

detailed_translations.english: the act of biting something many times with your teeth
to bite food several times before swallowing it

sentences.english: Military service entails frequent changes of domicile.
sentences.chinese: 服兵役需要频繁更换住所。

detailed_translations.chinese: 住宅；永久居住地；期票支付场所
detailed_translations.english: the place where someone lives

name: pedestrian
trans: 徒步的； 缺乏想象力的

sentences.english: More than a third of all pedestrian injuries are to children.
sentences.chinese: 所有受伤的行人中有1/3以上是儿童。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is walking, especially along a street or other place used by cars

name: hurry
trans: 急忙， 匆忙， 仓促

sentences.english: If we hurry, we’ll get there in time.
sentences.chinese: 要是赶紧的话，我们能及时到那里。

sentences.english: I hate having to hurry a meal.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌匆匆忙忙地吃饭。

sentences.english: We’ll have to hurry, otherwise we’ll miss the start.
sentences.chinese: 我们得赶紧，否则就会错过开头部分了。

sentences.english: There’s no need to hurry. We’ve got plenty of time.
sentences.chinese: 不必匆忙，我们有的是时间。

detailed_translations.english: to do something or go somewhere more quickly than usual, especially because there is not much time
to make someone do something more quickly

name: account
trans: 解释， 描述， 叙述； 账目； 账户

sentences.english: My salary is paid into my bank account.
sentences.chinese: 我的工资直接存入我的银行账户。

sentences.english: I’ve opened an account with Barclay’s Bank.
sentences.chinese: 我在巴克莱银行开了一个账户。

sentences.english: My husband and I have a joint account (=  one that is shared between two people  ) .
sentences.chinese: 我和丈夫有个联名账户。

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement in which a bank keeps your money safe so that you can pay more in or take money out

name: radioactive
trans: 放射性的， 有辐射的

sentences.english: the problem of how to dispose of radioactive waste
sentences.chinese: 如何处理放射性废物的问题

sentences.english: a consignment of highly radioactive plutonium
sentences.chinese: 发送的一批高放射性钚

detailed_translations.chinese: 放射性的， 有辐射能的
detailed_translations.english: a radioactive substance is dangerous because it contains  radiation (= a form of energy that can harm living things )

name: innocent
trans: 天真的； 清白的； 无恶意的

sentences.english: Nobody would believe that I was innocent.
sentences.chinese: 没人肯相信我是清白的。

sentences.english: The court found him innocent and he was released.
sentences.chinese: 法庭判他无罪，他被释放了。

sentences.english: She had always regarded Greg as a hopeless innocent where women were concerned.
sentences.chinese: 她过去一直认为格雷格在关于女人方面是一个不可救药的无知者。

detailed_translations.english: not guilty of a crime
An innocent is someone who is innocent

sentences.english: The modern Russian alphabet has 31 letters.
sentences.chinese: 现代俄语字母表有31个字母。

detailed_translations.english: a set of letters, arranged in a particular order, and used in writing

sentences.english: He strode toward her.
sentences.chinese: 他大步向她走去。

sentences.english: Paco reached the door in only three strides.
sentences.chinese: 帕科三大步就走到了门口。

detailed_translations.english: to walk quickly with long steps
a long step you make while you are walking

name: advance
trans: 前进，向前移动；发展，进步；促进；预付

sentences.english: I should warn you in advance that I’m not a very good dancer.
sentences.chinese: 我要先提醒你，我跳舞不是很好。

sentences.english: Many thanks, in advance, for your help.
sentences.chinese: 对你的帮助预先表示万分感谢。

sentences.english: Could you distribute copies well in advance of the meeting?
sentences.chinese: 开会前把复印件早早分发下去，好吗？

sentences.english: A line of US tanks slowly advanced.
sentences.chinese: 一列美军坦克缓缓前进。

detailed_translations.english: before something happens or is expected to happen
to move towards someone or something, especially in a slow and determined way – used especially to talk about soldiers

name: appreciate
trans: 赏识； 鉴赏， 欣赏； 感激

sentences.english: Thanks ever so much for your help, I really appreciate it.
sentences.chinese: 多谢你的帮助，我真的很感激。

sentences.english: I appreciate your concern , but honestly, I’m fine.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢你关心，不过说真的，我很好。

sentences.english: I’d appreciate it if you let me get on with my job.
sentences.chinese: 如果你能让我继续工作，我会非常感激。

sentences.english: Her abilities are not fully appreciated by her employer.
sentences.chinese: 她的才干没有得到雇主的充分赏识。

sentences.english: I’m not an expert, but I appreciate fine works of art.
sentences.chinese: 文例句：我不是专家，但我欣赏优秀的艺术作品。

detailed_translations.english: used to thank someone in a polite way or to say that you are grateful for something they have done

sentences.english: She bleached her hair blonde.
sentences.chinese: 她把头发漂成了金黄色。

sentences.english: The wood had been bleached by the sun .
sentences.chinese: 木头已被太阳晒得褪了色。

detailed_translations.english: to make something pale or white, especially by using chemicals or the sun
a chemical used to make things pale or white, or to kill  germ s

sentences.english: subjects as diverse as pop music and archaeology
sentences.chinese: 像流行音乐和考古学这样各不相同的学科

detailed_translations.english: very different from each other

name: rally
trans: 集合，召集；恢复，重新振作

sentences.english: After a shaky start, he rallied and won the title in style.
sentences.chinese: 虽然开局不顺，但他振作精神，最后漂亮地赢得了冠军。

sentences.english: The Tokyo stock market rallied later in the day.
sentences.chinese: 当天晚些时候东京股市止跌回升。

detailed_translations.chinese: 团结；重整；恢复；（网球等）连续对打
detailed_translations.english: to become stronger again after a period of weakness or defeat
a large public meeting, especially one that is held outdoors to support a political idea, protest etc

name: soft
trans: 柔软的； 柔和的； 不强烈的； 心肠软的； 软性的

sentences.english: a baby’s soft skin
sentences.chinese: 婴儿细嫩的皮肤

sentences.english: The fur was soft to the touch.
sentences.chinese: 这皮毛摸起来很柔滑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 软的，柔软的；温柔的，温和的；软弱的；笨的
detailed_translations.english: having a surface that is smooth and pleasant to touch

detailed_translations.chinese: 柔性；柔软的东西；柔软部分

name: fictitious
trans: 虚构的； 假的； 假装的， 虚伪的

sentences.english: a fictitious address
sentences.chinese: 杜撰的地址

sentences.english: fictitious characters
sentences.chinese: 虚构的人物

detailed_translations.chinese: 虚构的；假想的；编造的；假装的
detailed_translations.english: not true, or not real

name: prime
trans: 主要的；最初的；最好的；首先的
使准备好； 事先指点

sentences.english: Smoking is the prime cause of lung disease.
sentences.chinese: 抽烟是引发肺部疾病的首要原因。

sentences.english: Our prime concern is providing jobs for all young school leavers.
sentences.chinese: 我们的头等大事是为所有的年轻毕业生提供工作。

sentences.english: He was named as the prime suspect in the murder investigation.
sentences.chinese: 在那宗谋杀案的调查中他被定为主要嫌疑人。

sentences.english: Good management is of prime importance in business.
sentences.chinese: 良好的经营管理在商业领域尤为重要。

detailed_translations.english: most important
the time in your life when you are strongest and most active
to prepare someone for a situation so that they know what to do

name: intellect
trans: 智力， 理解力； 知识分子

sentences.english: He combined a formidable intellect with a talent for speaking.
sentences.chinese: 他不但智力超群，而且口才出众。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to understand things and to think intelligently

sentences.english: An old man came out and ambled over for a chat.
sentences.chinese: 一个老人出来，缓步走过去聊天。

detailed_translations.english: to walk slowly in a relaxed way

sentences.english: a loyal supporter of the team
sentences.chinese: 球队的忠实支持者

sentences.english: her many years of loyal service to the company
sentences.chinese: 她在公司多年的忠诚服务

sentences.english: loyal customers
sentences.chinese: 忠实客户

detailed_translations.english: always supporting your friends, principles, country etc

sentences.english: Do you have a colour preference ?
sentences.chinese: 你有什么颜色上的偏好吗？

sentences.english: Parents may be able to express a preference as to the school their child will attend.
sentences.chinese: 家长也许可以表明愿意让孩子就读哪所学校。

sentences.english: The amount of sugar you add will depend on personal preference .
sentences.chinese: 加多少糖取决于个人的喜好。

sentences.english: Many elderly people expressed a strong preference to live in their own homes.
sentences.chinese: 许多老年人强烈表示喜欢住在自己的家里。

sentences.english: In allocating housing, preference is given to families with young children.
sentences.chinese: 房屋优先分配给有年幼孩子的家庭。

detailed_translations.english: if you have a preference for something, you like it more than another thing and will choose it if you can

name: mainstream
trans: 主流， 主要倾向； 主流思想

sentences.english: Genet started as a rebel, but soon became part of the literary mainstream.
sentences.chinese: 热内起初很叛逆，但不久就回归了文学主流。

detailed_translations.english: the most usual ideas or methods, or the people who have these ideas or methods

sentences.english: There are fewer opportunities for new graduates this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年新毕业的大学生就业机会较少。

detailed_translations.english: a chance to do something or an occasion when it is easy for you to do something

name: dissolute
trans: 放荡的， 放纵的， 道德沦丧的

sentences.english: Jie was extremely tyrannical and dissolute.
sentences.chinese: 桀是个极端残暴，放荡的人。

sentences.english: Nellie was married twice, the first time to a dissolute diplomat whose death left her a wealthy woman.
sentences.chinese: 妮利结过两次婚，第一次嫁给了一个风流的外交官，外交官死后给他留下了大笔财富，使她成为一个有钱的女人。

sentences.english: I have also heard that he leads a dissolute lifestyle, but that is probably just a nasty rumor.
sentences.chinese: 我还听说他生活放荡不羁，但这也许只是恶意的谣言。

detailed_translations.english: having an immoral way of life, for example drinking too much alcohol or having sex with many people

name: court
trans: 法院，法庭；宫廷，朝廷；球场
献殷勤， 讨好； 招致； 求爱

sentences.english: It could not be proved in a court of law.
sentences.chinese: 这无法在法庭上证实。

sentences.english: The court case lasted six weeks.
sentences.chinese: 这场诉讼持续了六个星期。

sentences.english: Four people will appear in court today, charged with fraud.
sentences.chinese: 今天将有四个人因被指控犯有欺诈罪出庭受审。

sentences.english: The court ruled that no compensation was due.
sentences.chinese: 法庭判决不予赔偿。

sentences.english: She threatened to take the magazine to court (= take legal action against them ) if they didn’t publish an immediate apology.
sentences.chinese: 她威胁说如果这家杂志不立刻刊登道歉声明，她就要把他们告上法庭。

detailed_translations.english: the place where a trial is held, or the people there, especially the judge and the jury who examine the evidence and decide whether someone is guilty or not guilty

sentences.english: Bethan goes to chapel every Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 贝唐每个星期天都去教堂做礼拜。

detailed_translations.english: a small church, or a room in a hospital, prison, big church etc in which Christians pray and have religious services

name: distort
trans: 弄歪； 扭曲， 歪曲

sentences.english: His account was badly distorted by the press.
sentences.chinese: 他的话被报界严重歪曲。

sentences.english: an expensive subsidy which distorts the market
sentences.chinese: 扰乱市场秩序的高价补贴

detailed_translations.english: to report something in a way that is not completely true or correct

name: subsidiary
trans: 次要的； 辅助的， 附设的； 附属的

sentences.english: a subsidiary hypothesis
sentences.chinese: 一个附带假设

detailed_translations.english: connected with, but less important than, something else
a company that is owned or controlled by another larger company

name: venture
trans: 冒险，投机；投机活动，风险项目

sentences.english: business/commercial venture
sentences.chinese: 商业风投

sentences.english: When darkness fell, he would venture out.
sentences.chinese: 天黑以后，他就会壮着胆子出去。

detailed_translations.english: a new business activity that involves taking risks
to go somewhere that could be dangerous

name: interrelate
trans: 相互关联， 紧密联系

sentences.english: We will be discussing how the interests of state, parent and child interrelate.
sentences.chinese: 我们将讨论国家、父母和儿童之间的利益是如何相互关联的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 相互关联， 紧密联系
detailed_translations.english: if two things interrelate, they are connected and have an effect on each other

sentences.english: a highly corrosive substance
sentences.chinese: 一种腐蚀性很强的物质

detailed_translations.english: a corrosive liquid such as an acid can destroy metal, plastic etc

name: enthusiasm
trans: 热情； 积极性； 热衷的事物

sentences.english: Gillian and Darren greeted the speakers with great enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 吉利恩和达伦非常热情地接待了演讲者。

sentences.english: We went along to the local diving club, full of enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 我们兴高采烈地去了当地的潜水俱乐部。

sentences.english: They go about their tasks with little enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 他们执行任务时没多大干劲。

sentences.english: A delay of two hours did not dampen their enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 耽误了两小时没有减弱他们的热情。

detailed_translations.chinese: 热情， 热心， 热忱； 巨大兴趣
detailed_translations.english: a strong feeling of interest and enjoyment about something and an eagerness to be involved in it

sentences.english: You need a long series of data to be able to discern such a trend.
sentences.chinese: 你需要一大串数据才能认清这一趋势。

sentences.english: We could just discern a town in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 我们依稀看到远处有一座城镇。

detailed_translations.english: to notice or understand something by thinking about it carefully

sentences.english: Mr. Bint has a propensity to put off decisions to the last minute.
sentences.chinese: 宾特先生有一种将决定拖到最后一分钟的倾向。

detailed_translations.english: a natural tendency to behave in a particular way

name: entreat
trans: 乞求， 恳求， 请求

sentences.english: His friends entreated him not to go.
sentences.chinese: 他的朋友们恳求他不要去。

sentences.english: He entreated them to delay their departure.
sentences.chinese: 他恳求他们晚些再走。

detailed_translations.english: to ask someone, in a very emotional way, to do something for you

name: flexible
trans: 易弯曲的； 柔韧的； 灵活的， 可变通的

sentences.english: We can be flexible about your starting date.
sentences.chinese: 你具体从哪天开始，我们可以灵活一点。

sentences.english: The government needs a more flexible approach to education.
sentences.chinese: 政府在处理教育问题上需要更加灵活。

detailed_translations.english: a person, plan etc that is flexible can change or be changed easily to suit any new situation

sentences.english: Dogs are surprisingly agile.
sentences.chinese: 狗出奇地敏捷。

detailed_translations.english: able to move quickly and easily

sentences.english: More vaccines are needed to replenish our stocks.
sentences.chinese: 还需要更多的疫苗来补充我们的储备。

detailed_translations.chinese: 补充，再装满；把…装满；给…添加燃料
detailed_translations.english: to put new supplies into something, or to fill something again

sentences.english: I would rather hoe in the garden than run on the playground.
sentences.chinese: 我宁愿在花园里锄草，不愿在运动场上跑来跑去。

sentences.english: I would rather hoe in the garden than run about on the playground.
sentences.chinese: 我宁愿在花园里锄草，不愿在运动场上跑来跑去。

sentences.english: I would rather hoe in the garden than run about on the playground .
sentences.chinese: 我宁愿在花园锄草，也不愿在运动场上跑来跑去。

detailed_translations.english: a garden tool with a long handle, used for removing  weeds (= unwanted plants )  from the surface of the soil

name: amenable
trans: 顺从的， 服从劝导的； 有服从义务的

sentences.english: She was always a very amenable child.
sentences.chinese: 她一向是个很听话的孩子。

detailed_translations.chinese: 有责任的：顺从的，服从的；有义务的；经得起检验的
detailed_translations.english: willing to accept what someone says or does without arguing

name: depict
trans: 描写， 描述， 描绘

sentences.english: a book depicting life in pre-revolutionary Russia
sentences.chinese: 描写革命前俄国人生活的一本书

detailed_translations.english: to describe something or someone in writing or speech, or to show them in a painting, picture etc

name: sustainable
trans: 不破坏生态平衡的， 可持续的； 足可支撑的； 可忍受的

sentences.english: The government should do more to promote sustainable agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 政府应该做更多工作来推动可持续农业的发展。

sentences.english: the sustainable use of rainforest resources
sentences.chinese: 雨林资源的可持续利用

sentences.english: Cycling is a totally sustainable form of transport.
sentences.chinese: 骑自行车是一种绝对环保的交通方式。

sentences.english: environmentally sustainable development
sentences.chinese: 生态环境的可持续发展

detailed_translations.english: able to continue without causing damage to the environment

name: hop
trans: 单足跳行；齐足跳行；跳上

sentences.english: a little girl hopping and skipping
sentences.chinese: 一个蹦蹦跳跳的小女孩

detailed_translations.chinese: 单足跳跃，单足跳行；齐足跳跃，齐足跳行
detailed_translations.english: to move by jumping on one foot
to move by jumping on one foot
a short jump

sentences.english: Singapore seceded from the Federation of Malaysia and became an independent sovereign state.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡脱离马来西亚联邦成为一个独立的主权国家。

detailed_translations.english: if a country or state secedes from another country, it officially stops being part of it and becomes independent

sentences.english: the highly characteristic (= very typical ) flint walls of the local houses
sentences.chinese: 当地房子非常有特色的燧石墙

sentences.english: Violent images are a defining characteristic of his work.
sentences.chinese: 暴力形象是他作品的一个鲜明特征。

detailed_translations.english: very typical of a particular thing or of someone’s character
a quality or feature of something or someone that is typical of them and easy to recognize

sentences.english: The interior walls are all painted white.
sentences.chinese: 室内墙壁都粉刷成了白色。

sentences.english: The interior of the church was dark.
sentences.chinese: 教堂里很暗。

detailed_translations.english: inside or indoors
the inner part or inside of something

sentences.english: For these people, land is inextricably interwoven with life itself.
sentences.chinese: 对那些人来说，土地和生活本身紧密交织在一起。

detailed_translations.english: if two things are interwoven, they are closely related or combined in a complicated way

name: rouse
trans: 唤起， 唤醒； 激起， 鼓舞； 激怒

sentences.english: His banging roused the neighbours.
sentences.chinese: 他重重的关门声把邻居都吵醒了。

detailed_translations.english: to wake someone who is sleeping deeply

name: capability
trans: 能力； 性能； 容量； 潜质

sentences.english: the country’s manufacturing capability
sentences.chinese: 该国的生产能力

sentences.english: I can speak French, but simultaneous translation is beyond my capabilities (= too difficult ).
sentences.chinese: 我能讲法语，但是同声传译我做不了。

detailed_translations.english: the natural ability, skill, or power that makes a machine, person, or organization able to do something, especially something difficult

sentences.english: sparks from the fire
sentences.chinese: 火里飞出的火星

sentences.english: The scrape of metal on metal sent up a shower of sparks .
sentences.chinese: 金属之间互相摩擦，迸出一串火星。

detailed_translations.english: a very small piece of burning material produced by a fire or by hitting or rubbing two hard objects together
a very small piece of burning material produced by a fire or by hitting or rubbing two hard objects together

name: integral
trans: 构成整体所必需的， 不可或缺的； 完整的

sentences.english: Rituals, celebrations, and festivals form an integral part of every human society.
sentences.chinese: 仪式、庆典和节日是每个人类社会不可缺少的组成部分。

detailed_translations.english: Something that is an integral part of something is an essential part of that thing

sentences.english: Halley’s comet
sentences.chinese: 哈雷彗星

detailed_translations.english: an object in space like a bright ball with a long tail, that moves around the sun

name: assembly
trans: 集会； 集会者； 装配， 安装； 立法机构， 议会

sentences.english: Police have imposed conditions on public assemblies.
sentences.chinese: 警方给公共集会设置了条件。

sentences.english: Restrictions on freedom of assembly have gradually been relaxed.
sentences.chinese: 对集会自由的限制渐渐放宽了。

sentences.english: an assembly point
sentences.chinese: 集合地点

sentences.english: instructions for assembly
sentences.chinese: 装配说明（书）

detailed_translations.english: the meeting together of a group of people for a particular purpose

sentences.english: You see he mentioned smelting.
sentences.chinese: 你看他提到了熔炼。

sentences.english: When he said smelting, I said, OK, you got it.
sentences.chinese: 当他说熔炼，我会说，好，你明白了。

sentences.english: A mixture of a metal with its sulfides, produced by smelting the sulfide ores of copper, lead, or nickel.
sentences.chinese: 锍，冰铜一种带有硫化物的金属混合物，由熔炼铜、铅或镍的硫化物矿石而制成。

sentences.english: Sorry, I can’t spare the time.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我抽不出时间。

sentences.english: Have you got any spare boxes?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有多余的盒子？

sentences.english: You could sleep in the spare bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 你可以睡那间空着的客房。

sentences.english: Do you have any spare cash?
sentences.chinese: 你手头有闲钱吗？

sentences.english: I’ll go and see if there are any spare seats.
sentences.chinese: 我去看看是否还有空余的座位。

sentences.english: A decline in beer sales had left the industry with spare capacity (= the ability to produce more than can be sold ) .
sentences.chinese: 啤酒销售量的下降使该行业出现产能闲置。

detailed_translations.english: to make something such as time, money, or workers available for someone, especially when this is difficult for you to do
not being used or not needed at the present time

sentences.english: the age of the silicon chip
sentences.chinese: 芯片时代

sentences.english: chip technology
sentences.chinese: 芯片技术

detailed_translations.chinese: 屑片， 碎片； 炸土豆条； 集成电路片， 集成块； 缺口， 瑕疵
detailed_translations.english: a small piece of  silicon  that has a set of complicated electrical connections on it and is used to store and  process  information in computers

name: replicate
trans: 复制； 再制， 再生

sentences.english: There is a need for further research to replicate these findings.
sentences.chinese: 需要进一步的研究来验证这些结果。

detailed_translations.english: if you replicate someone’s work, a scientific study etc, you do it again, or try to get the same result again

detailed_translations.chinese: 复制品；八音阶间隔的反覆音

name: emotional
trans: 感情的， 情绪的； 引起情感的； 易动感情的

sentences.english: She provided emotional support at a very distressing time for me.
sentences.chinese: 在我非常痛苦的时候，她是我的情感支柱。

sentences.english: Ann suffered from depression and a number of other emotional problems.
sentences.chinese: 安患了抑郁症，还遇到一些其他的情绪问题。

sentences.english: the physical and emotional state of the patient
sentences.chinese: 患者的生理和情绪状态

sentences.english: The funeral was a very emotional experience for all of us.
sentences.chinese: 那次葬礼对我们大家来说都是一次无比伤感的经历。

sentences.english: He became very emotional when we had to leave.
sentences.chinese: 当我们不得不离开时，他非常伤感。

detailed_translations.chinese: 情绪(上)的，情感(上)的；激起感情的； 敏感的；情绪激动的〔尤指哭泣〕
detailed_translations.english: relating to your feelings or how you control them

name: noticeable
trans: 明显的， 值得注意的

sentences.english: Alcohol has a noticeable effect on the body.
sentences.chinese: 酒精对身体有明显的影响。

sentences.english: It was noticeable that many of them avoided answering the question.
sentences.chinese: 显而易见，他们中的许多人对这个问题都避而不答。

detailed_translations.english: easy to notice

sentences.english: A large crowd had assembled outside the American embassy.
sentences.chinese: 一大群人聚集在美国大使馆外。

sentences.english: He looked around at the assembled company (=  all the people who had come there  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他环顾四周聚集的人群。

sentences.english: She had assembled a collection of her favourite songs.
sentences.chinese: 她收集了一些自己最喜欢听的歌。

sentences.english: The aircraft will continue to be assembled in France.
sentences.chinese: 飞机将继续在法国组装。

detailed_translations.english: if you assemble a large number of people or things, or if they assemble, they are gathered together in one place, often for a particular purpose

name: hibernation
trans: 冬眠； 休眠， 蛰伏

sentences.english: "In fact, " she said after a while, "We have gone into hibernation.
sentences.chinese: “实际上，”过了一会儿，她说道，“我们已经被困在这里过冬了。

sentences.english: After all, he reasoned, some single-celled creatures are known to enter a hibernation-like state and survive for years with no air or food.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟，他推断，众所周知一些单细胞生物可以进入一种类似冬眠的状态，并在没有空气和水的状态下生存数年。

sentences.english: Heart rate tracking for three of the Alaska bears showed a drop from 55 beats per minute on average before hibernation to 14 erratic ones per minute in winter.
sentences.chinese: 对三头阿拉斯加的黑熊的心率追踪显示出它们在冬眠前的平均每分钟 55 下降低到了冬天里每分钟飘忽不定的 14 下。

name: transition
trans: 过渡， 过渡时期； 转变

sentences.english: Making the transition from youth to adulthood can be very painful.
sentences.chinese: 从青少年过渡到成年有时是一个非常痛苦的过程。

sentences.english: a society that is in transition
sentences.chinese: 一个正在转型的社会

sentences.english: the period of transition to full democracy
sentences.chinese: 向全面民主的过渡时期

detailed_translations.english: when something changes from one form or state to another

name: march
trans: 前进， 进发； 行进， 齐步走； 游行示威
行进，行军；示威游行；进行曲；进行，进展

sentences.english: On 29 August the royal army marched into Inverness.
sentences.chinese: 8月29日皇家军队开进因弗内斯。

sentences.english: The police decided not to ban the march.
sentences.chinese: 警方决定不禁止这次示威游行。

detailed_translations.english: if soldiers or other people march somewhere, they walk there quickly with firm regular steps
an organized event in which many people walk together to express their ideas or protest about something

name: blast
trans: 爆炸；发出尖响；猛烈抨击
一阵； 爆炸； 冲击波； 响声

sentences.english: I had the gas fire going full blast .
sentences.chinese: 我把煤气取暖器开到最大。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden strong movement of wind or air
to criticize someone or something very strongly – used especially in news reports

name: repel
trans: 击退， 驱逐； 排斥； 抵制， 拒绝； 使反感， 使厌恶

sentences.english: The smell repelled him.
sentences.chinese: 这气味让他反感。

detailed_translations.english: if something repels you, it is so unpleasant that you do not want to be near it, or it makes you feel ill

name: publicize
trans: 宣传， 推广， 宣扬

sentences.english: television’s failure to publicize the unemployment issue
sentences.chinese: 电视未能报道失业问题

detailed_translations.english: to give information about something to the public, so that they know about it

sentences.english: The Labour Department figures underscore the shaky state of the economic recovery.
sentences.chinese: 劳工部的数字突出显示了经济复苏的不稳定。

detailed_translations.english: to emphasize the fact that something is important or true

sentences.english: She takes her inspiration from shells and stones she finds on the seashore.
sentences.chinese: 她从她在海岸边发现的贝壳和石头里获取灵感。

detailed_translations.english: the land at the edge of the sea, consisting of sand and rocks

name: series
trans: 系列， 连续； 连续剧

sentences.english: the series of events that led to the outbreak of war
sentences.chinese: 导致战争爆发的一系列事件

sentences.english: The police are investigating a series of attacks in the area.
sentences.chinese: 警方在调查该地区发生的一连串袭击事件。

sentences.english: There’s been a whole series of accidents on this road.
sentences.chinese: 这条路上发生了一连串的交通事故。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一系列， 连续； 丛书， 连续剧
detailed_translations.english: several events or actions of a similar type that happen one after the other

sentences.english: We cultivated maize and watermelons.
sentences.chinese: 我们种植玉米和西瓜。

detailed_translations.english: to plant and take care of a particular crop

name: thrive
trans: 茂盛； 茁壮成长； 兴旺， 繁荣

sentences.english: plants that thrive in tropical rain forests
sentences.chinese: 在热带雨林蓬勃生长的植物

sentences.english: a business which managed to thrive during a recession
sentences.chinese: 在经济萧条时期也能顺利发展的一家企业

detailed_translations.english: to become very successful or very strong and healthy

name: imaginative
trans: 富有想象力的； 创新的

sentences.english: an imaginative use of computer technology
sentences.chinese: 计算机技术的妙用

sentences.english: children’s imaginative play
sentences.chinese: 儿童富有想象力的游戏

sentences.english: an imaginative solution to the litter problem
sentences.chinese: 解决乱扔垃圾的问题的有创意的方法

detailed_translations.english: containing new and interesting ideas

name: treadmill
trans: 踏车； 枯燥乏味的工作

sentences.english: the treadmill of working in the office
sentences.chinese: 单调枯燥的办公室工作

detailed_translations.chinese: 踏车； 累人的活； 单调的例行工作， 乏味繁重的工作
detailed_translations.english: work or a way of life that seems very boring because you always have to do the same things

name: represent
trans: 代表； 表现； 描绘； 象征

sentences.english: Mr Kobayashi was chosen to represent the company at the conference.
sentences.chinese: 小林先生被选中代表公司出席会议。

detailed_translations.chinese: 作为…的代表， 表示， 象征； 描绘， 表现
detailed_translations.english: to officially speak or take action for another person or group of people

name: dispatch
trans: 分派， 派遣； 发送

sentences.english: Goods are normally dispatched within 24 hours.
sentences.chinese: 货物一般在24小时内派送。

sentences.english: I was carrying dispatches from the ambassador.
sentences.chinese: 我正拿着大使的急件。

detailed_translations.english: to send someone or something somewhere for a particular purpose
a message or report sent quickly from one military officer to another or between government officials

name: corpus
trans: 文集， 文献， 汇编； 语料库

sentences.english: the entire corpus of Shakespeare’s works
sentences.chinese: 莎士比亚作品全集

detailed_translations.english: A corpus is a large collection of written or spoken texts that is used for language research

name: inconvenient
trans: 不便的； 让人不舒服的

sentences.english: Monday’s a bit inconvenient for me. How about Wednesday?
sentences.chinese: 周一我不太方便，周三如何？

sentences.english: Am I calling at an inconvenient time?
sentences.chinese: 我电话打得不是时候吧？

detailed_translations.english: causing problems, often in a way that is annoying

name: dramatize
trans: 改编成戏剧； 戏剧化， 戏剧性地表现

sentences.english: a novel dramatized for television
sentences.chinese: 被改编成电视剧的小说

detailed_translations.chinese: 使戏剧化；编写剧本；改编成戏剧
detailed_translations.english: to make a book or event into a play or film

sentences.english: It seems an absurd idea.
sentences.chinese: 这似乎是个荒唐的想法。

detailed_translations.english: completely stupid or unreasonable

sentences.english: You do not need any prior knowledge of the subject.
sentences.chinese: 你无需事先具备该方面的知识。

sentences.english: Changes may not be made without the prior approval of the council.
sentences.chinese: 未经委员会事先同意，不得作出改变。

sentences.english: Vegetarian meals are provided by prior agreement.
sentences.chinese: 经事先协商可提供素食。

sentences.english: Some prior experience with the software is needed.
sentences.chinese: 要求事先熟悉这个软件。

detailed_translations.english: existing or arranged before something else or before the present situation

sentences.english: The study found that some alcoholics had clear personality traits showing up early in childhood.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究发现一些酗酒者早在孩童时就表现出明显的个性特征。

detailed_translations.english: a particular quality in someone’s character

name: landmark
trans: 路标， 地标； 〈喻〉里程碑

sentences.english: My keys were here a minute ago but now they’ve vanished.
sentences.chinese: 我的钥匙刚刚还在这里，现在却不翼而飞了。

sentences.english: The bird vanished from sight.
sentences.chinese: 那只鸟从视线中消失了。

sentences.english: She seemed to have just vanished into thin air (= suddenly disappeared in a very mysterious way ).
sentences.chinese: 她好像就蒸发了似的。

detailed_translations.english: to disappear suddenly, especially in a way that cannot be easily explained

name: vault
trans: 拱顶；金库，保险库；撑杆跳

sentences.english: The robber vaulted over the counter and took $200 in cash.
sentences.chinese: 抢劫犯跃过柜台，抢走了200美元现金。

detailed_translations.english: a roof or ceiling that consists of several arches that are joined together, especially in a church
to jump over something in one movement, using your hands or a pole to help you

sentences.english: a concave lens
sentences.chinese: 凹透镜

detailed_translations.english: a concave surface is curved inwards in the middle

sentences.english: By hunting or gathering away from the group, both chimpanzee and dolphin moms ensure that what they find goes to their young.
sentences.chinese: 黑猩猩和海豚妈妈们远离群体打猎和收集食物，并保证他们所找到的食物都给孩子们。

sentences.english: Daniel: Yes, like a dolphin.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼尔: 嗯，像海豚一样。

detailed_translations.english: a very intelligent sea animal like a fish with a long grey pointed nose

name: enactment
trans: 制订， 颁布； 法律， 法规

sentences.english: We support the call for the enactment of a Bill of Rights.
sentences.chinese: 我们支持《权利法案》制定的呼吁。

detailed_translations.english: The enactment of a law is the process in a legislature by which the law is agreed upon and made official

sentences.english: The picture shows six of the nine planets in the solar system.
sentences.chinese: 这张图片展示太阳系9个行星中的6个行星。

detailed_translations.english: A planet is a large, round object in space that moves around a star. The Earth is a planet.

sentences.english: Botany, Entomology Herpetology, mammalogy, and ornithology.
sentences.chinese: 收藏植物学、 虫学、虫学、 乳动物学和鸟类学。

sentences.english: Birds communicate by songs, and avian vocalization is a main aspect of ornithology.
sentences.chinese: 鸟类鸣声是鸟类交流的“语言”，也是鸟类学研究的主要内容之一。

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of birds

name: prerequisite
trans: 必备的， 作为先决条件的

sentences.english: A person with ambition is the prerequisite to success.
sentences.chinese: 一个人有雄心壮志是成功的先决条件。

sentences.english: Historical changes to the production of embroidered shoes with embroidery into a local evaluation of the level of ingenuity of a girl prerequisite.
sentences.chinese: 历史的变革使绣花鞋的制作与刺绣水平成为当地评价一个姑娘心灵手巧的先决条件。

sentences.english: Anyone has the possibility to succeed, but the prerequisite of success is your own, both industry knowledge learning and the cultivation of innovation ability, requires great effort.
sentences.chinese: 任何人都有成功的可能性，但成功的先决条件在于你自身，无论是行业知识的学习还是创新能力的培养，都需要付出极大的努力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 必备的， 作为先决条件的

detailed_translations.english: something that is necessary before something else can happen or be done

name: count
trans: 数，计算；算入；看做，认为；值得考虑，有重要意义
计数， 计算； 总数； 罪状

sentences.english: Davis was found not guilty on all counts .
sentences.chinese: 戴维斯受到指控的各项罪名均不成立。

detailed_translations.english: one of the crimes that someone is charged with

name: creep
trans: 缓慢行进； 爬行； 悄悄地移动

sentences.english: He crept back up the stairs, trying to avoid the ones that creaked.
sentences.chinese: 他蹑手蹑脚地回楼上，尽量避开那些嘎吱作响的梯级。

detailed_translations.chinese: 爬行；蔓延；慢慢地移动；起鸡皮疙瘩
detailed_translations.english: if something such as an insect, small animal, or car creeps, it moves slowly and quietly

detailed_translations.chinese: 爬行；毛骨悚然的感觉；谄媚者

name: deciduous
trans: 落叶的； 非永久的， 短暂的

sentences.english: Deciduous antlers; deciduous leaves; deciduous teeth .
sentences.chinese: 脱落的鹿角；落叶；脱落的牙齿。

detailed_translations.chinese: 非永久的； 短暂的； 脱落的； 落叶的
detailed_translations.english: deciduous trees lose their leaves in winter

name: scholar
trans: 学者； 奖学金获得者

sentences.english: a Shakespearean scholar
sentences.chinese: 研究莎士比亚的学者

detailed_translations.english: someone who knows a lot about a particular subject, especially one that is not a science subject

sentences.english: Customs officials have made a series of contradictory statements about the equipment.
sentences.chinese: 海关官员们对于这种设备做出了一系列相互矛盾的陈述。

detailed_translations.chinese: 矛盾的；反对的；反驳的；抗辩的
detailed_translations.english: two statements, beliefs etc that are contradictory are different and therefore cannot both be true or correct

name: accompany
trans: 为…伴奏； 陪伴， 陪同； 伴随， 和…一起发生

sentences.english: Children under 14 must be accompanied by an adult.
sentences.chinese: 14岁以下儿童必须有成人陪同。

sentences.english: Wherever her husband went, she would accompany him.
sentences.chinese: 不论丈夫去哪里，她都陪伴左右。

detailed_translations.chinese: 陪同， 伴随； 为…伴奏
detailed_translations.english: to go somewhere with someone

name: immediate
trans: 即刻的； 当前的； 最接近的； 紧接的， 紧靠的

sentences.english: Our immediate response to the attack was sheer horror.
sentences.chinese: 我们对攻击的第一反应就是非常惊恐。

sentences.english: They promise immediate action to help the unemployed.
sentences.chinese: 他们承诺立即采取行动帮助失业者。

sentences.english: If the eyes are affected, seek immediate medical attention.
sentences.chinese: 如果眼睛感染了要立即就医。

sentences.english: The funeral was attended by her immediate family (= her parents, children, brothers and sisters) only.
sentences.chinese: 只有她的直系亲属参加了葬礼。

detailed_translations.english: happening or done at once and without delay

name: perspicuous
trans: 明白易懂的； 明了的

detailed_translations.chinese: 明了的；清晰明白的；易懂的
detailed_translations.english: (of speech or writing) easily understood; lucid

sentences.english: a drug that has a beneficial effect on the immune system
sentences.chinese: 有益于免疫系统的一种药物

sentences.english: an arrangement that is mutually beneficial
sentences.chinese: 一项互惠互利的协定

detailed_translations.english: having a good effect

name: blame
trans: 过失， 责备； 责任

sentences.english: Don’t blame me – it’s not my fault.
sentences.chinese: 别来怪我——又不是我的错。

sentences.english: I blame his mother. She does everything for him.
sentences.chinese: 怪他母亲不好，她什么事都要为他做。

detailed_translations.english: to say or think that someone or something is responsible for something bad

name: confusion
trans: 困惑； 混乱， 混淆

sentences.english: a scene of indescribable confusion
sentences.chinese: 难以形容的混乱场面

sentences.english: To avoid confusion, the teams wore different colours.
sentences.chinese: 为了避免混淆，各队穿着不同颜色的服装。

detailed_translations.english: a very confusing situation, that usually has a lot of noise and action, so that it is difficult for someone to understand it or control it

name: platitude
trans: 陈词滥调， 老生常谈

sentences.english: His excuse was the platitude ‘boys will be boys.’
sentences.chinese: 他还是那一套理由:“男孩总归是男孩。”

detailed_translations.english: a statement that has been made many times before and is not interesting or clever – used to show disapproval

sentences.english: Anderson was to sing at the Constitution Hall auditorium.
sentences.chinese: 安德森将要在宪法厅的观众席演唱。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a theatre where people sit when watching a play, concert etc

name: session
trans: 会议； 开庭； 开庭期； 一节

sentences.english: Board members met in closed session (= with nobody else present ) .
sentences.chinese: 委员会成员举行了闭门会议。

detailed_translations.english: a formal meeting or group of meetings, especially of a law court or parliament

name: tactile
trans: 触觉的； 有触觉的； 可感触的

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["tactile sensations"]}
sentences.chinese: 触觉

detailed_translations.chinese: [生理] 触觉的，有触觉的；能触知的
detailed_translations.english: relating to your sense of touch

name: extrinsic
trans: 外来的， 外在的， 非本质的

sentences.english: Nowadays there are fewer extrinsic pressures to get married.
sentences.chinese: 现在，结婚与否很少受到来自外部的压力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 外来的， 外在的， 非本质的
detailed_translations.english: Extrinsic reasons, forces, or factors exist outside the person or situation they affect

name: bland
trans: 平淡的， 乏味的； 清淡的； 沉稳的

sentences.english: a few bland comments
sentences.chinese: 不痛不痒的几句评语

detailed_translations.english: without any excitement, strong opinions, or special character

detailed_translations.chinese: 使…变得淡而无味；除掉…的特性
变得平淡无奇；丧失特性

sentences.english: ...a type of bacteria that include the microbes responsible for tuberculosis and leprosy.
sentences.chinese: …包括引起结核病和麻风病的微生物在内的一类细菌。

detailed_translations.english: an extremely small living thing which you can only see if you use a  microscope  . Some microbes can cause diseases.

name: reception
trans: 招待会； 反响； 接纳， 接待； 接收

sentences.english: She was unsure of her reception after everything that had happened.
sentences.chinese: 发生了这些事后，她对自己是否还受欢迎没把握。

sentences.english: The plans received a mixed reception from unions (= some people liked them, others did not ) .
sentences.chinese: 各工会对这些计划反响不一。

detailed_translations.english: a particular type of welcome for someone, or a particular type of reaction to their ideas, work etc

sentences.english: the sole American in the room
sentences.chinese: 房间里唯一的美国人

sentences.english: Griffiths is the sole survivor of the crash.
sentences.chinese: 格里菲思是此次撞车事故唯一的幸存者。

sentences.english: The soles of his feet were caked in mud.
sentences.chinese: 他的脚掌上沾满了泥巴。

sentences.english: the soles of her shoes
sentences.chinese: 她鞋子的鞋底

detailed_translations.english: the sole person, thing etc is the only one
the bottom surface of your foot, especially the part you walk or stand on

name: lumber
trans: 木材， 木料； 杂物

sentences.english: A blue bus lumbered past.
sentences.chinese: 一辆蓝色公共汽车慢吞吞地驶过。

detailed_translations.chinese: 伐木；喧闹地向前走；笨重地行动，缓慢地移动
detailed_translations.english: to move in a slow awkward way

detailed_translations.chinese: 木材；废物，无用的杂物；隆隆声
detailed_translations.english: pieces of wood used for building, that have been cut to specific lengths and widths

name: solo
trans: 独唱， 独奏， 独舞

sentences.english: a gorgeous piano solo
sentences.chinese: 一首极其美妙的钢琴独奏曲

sentences.english: He had just completed his final solo album.
sentences.chinese: 他刚刚完成他最后一张个人专辑。

sentences.english: When did you first fly solo?
sentences.chinese: 你第一次单独飞行是什么时候？

sentences.english: a solo effort
sentences.chinese: 独自的努力

sentences.english: a solo album
sentences.chinese: 独唱专辑

detailed_translations.english: a piece of music for one performer
done alone without anyone else helping you

name: monitor
trans: 显示器； 监视器； 班长

sentences.english: a heart monitor
sentences.chinese: 心脏监测仪

detailed_translations.chinese: 班长；监视器，检测器；显示器
detailed_translations.english: a television or part of a computer with a screen, on which you can see pictures or information
to carefully watch and check a situation in order to see how it changes over a period of time

name: tuition
trans: 学费； 教学， 讲授

sentences.english: I had to have extra tuition in maths.
sentences.chinese: 我不得不上数学补习课。

detailed_translations.english: teaching, especially in small groups

sentences.english: By mid-morning, the temperature was already above 100 degrees Fahrenheit.
sentences.chinese: 到上午10点左右，气温已超过华氏100度了。

detailed_translations.english: Fahrenheit is a scale for measuring temperature, in which water freezes at 32 degrees and boils at 212 degrees. It is represented by the symbol °F.
a scale of temperature in which water freezes at 32˚ and boils at 212˚

name: tangible
trans: 可触摸的， 可感知的； 明确的， 确凿的； 有形的， 实际的

sentences.english: The silence of the countryside was almost tangible .
sentences.chinese: 乡村的寂静几乎能感觉得到。

detailed_translations.chinese: 有形的；切实的；可触摸的
detailed_translations.english: if something is tangible, you can touch or feel it

name: congest
trans: 充满， 拥塞； 充血

sentences.english: How much is the postage for a postcard?
sentences.chinese: 寄一张明信片的邮资是多少？

detailed_translations.english: the money charged for sending a letter, package etc by post

sentences.english: Most of the criticism has been pretty tame.
sentences.chinese: 评论的大部分内容很乏味。

sentences.english: I decided that teaching was too tame for me.
sentences.chinese: 我最终认为教书对我来说太枯燥。

detailed_translations.chinese: 驯服的，顺从的；沉闷的，乏味的
detailed_translations.english: dull and disappointing

detailed_translations.chinese: 制服， 控制并利用； 驯化， 驯服
detailed_translations.english: to reduce the power or strength of something and prevent it from causing trouble

sentences.english: And the Hare said to him, 'The piece of red gold that thou seekest is in the cavern that is behind thee.
sentences.chinese: 小野兔告诉他说：“你所寻找的那块红色的金子就在你身后的大洞穴里。

detailed_translations.english: a large  cave

name: material
trans: 物质的， 身体上的； 重要的； 实质性的， 客观存在的

sentences.english: materials like wood or stone
sentences.chinese: 木材或石头之类的材料

sentences.english: harmful radioactive material
sentences.chinese: 有害的放射性材料

sentences.english: a paper company which imports raw materials (= substances which have not been treated ) from North America
sentences.chinese: 从北美进口原材料的纸业公司

sentences.english: recycled material
sentences.chinese: 再生材料

sentences.english: Anita is collecting material for a novel.
sentences.chinese: 安妮塔正在收集小说素材。

sentences.english: a society that places high importance on material rewards
sentences.chinese: 重视物质回报的社会

detailed_translations.english: a solid substance such as wood, plastic, or metal
relating to your money, possessions, living conditions etc, rather than the needs of your mind or soul

name: adjoin
trans: 贴近， 紧挨， 毗连

sentences.english: A vacant plot of land adjoins his house.
sentences.chinese: 有一块空地紧挨着他家。

detailed_translations.english: to be next to or joined to sth

name: spectacular
trans: 壮观的场面； 壮观的演出

sentences.english: a mountainous area with spectacular scenery
sentences.chinese: 景色壮丽的山区

sentences.english: a spectacular success
sentences.chinese: 辉煌的成就

sentences.english: a television spectacular

detailed_translations.english: a colour or type of colour

sentences.chinese: …如“翻开新的一页”这样熟悉的习语和比喻。

sentences.chinese: 法国外交官

sentences.english: Veiled beneath the Persian Gulf, a once-fertile landmass may have supported some of the earliest humans outside Africa some 75,000 to 100,000 years ago, a new review of research suggests.
sentences.chinese: 一项新的研究评论表明，在波斯湾的海底，也许存在过一片肥沃的土地，它曾在约75,000到100,000年前供养着除非洲大陆之外最早的人类先祖。

sentences.english: "The visitors to the snow-covered landmass are endangering not just the Antarctic region by their actions, but also the rest of the world, " he said.
sentences.chinese: 他说，“游客参观冰雪覆盖大陆的行为不仅危及到南极地区，而且危及到世界其它地区。”

trans: 总统， 校长， 主席

name: muscular
trans: 肌肉的； 肌肉发达的； 强健的， 强壮的

sentences.chinese: 她动作敏捷，身体强壮，身材苗条，肌肉结实。

detailed_translations.chinese: 订书钉，U形钉；主食；主要产品

to fasten two or more things together with a staple

sentences.chinese: 我发给他一个通知，提醒他开会的事。

trans: 协作， 合作； 勾结， 通敌

sentences.chinese: 后来他和儿子迈克尔合作，把一个有关食品生产的文本翻译成英语。

sentences.chinese: 现在天气暖和了，雪开始融化。

sentences.chinese: 把混合物冷藏过夜。

sentences.chinese: 我们有了第一位伤员，有一位队员因腿部痉挛退出了。

sentences.english: The first item always on that was the overnight casualty report from Iraq and Afghanistan, and I would often come and see that had been circled by the president or that he would be reflecting on that.
sentences.chinese: 上面的第一条永远是,这一晚在伊拉克和阿富汗,士兵的伤亡报告，我来的时候会看到那条消息,被布什总统圈了出来,他看着报告会陷入沉思。

sentences.chinese: …南非黑人就业和人口的空间分布。

地下的； 秘密的， 不公开的 记 组合词： under + ground → 地下的

trans: 季度的， 每季一次的

sentences.chinese: 我们出版一份季刊。

sentences.english: The rent is payable quarterly.
sentences.chinese: 房租按季度支付。

sentences.chinese: 红利是按季度还是按年度支付没有区别。

detailed_translations.chinese: 季度的，按季度的；一年四次的
detailed_translations.english: produced or happening four times a year

sentences.chinese: 系统中有任何变化都会通知你。

sentences.english: In August we were notified that our article had been rejected.
sentences.chinese: 8月份我们接到通知，说我们的文章不予采用。

detailed_translations.english: to formally or officially tell someone about something

sentences.english: The boys tried not to smirk.
sentences.chinese: 男孩们强忍住得意的笑。

sentences.english: On New Year's Eve we had a barbecue on the beach.
sentences.chinese: 除夕那天我们在海滩上举行了烧烤野餐。

to cook food on a metal frame over a fire outdoors

sentences.english: Once upon a time, there was an abbess in a small abbey .
sentences.chinese: 很久以前，一个小修道院里有一个女修道院院长。

sentences.english: One solution to this agency problem is to have no alienable residual claims and to contract with donors to apply all net cash flows to output.
sentences.chinese: 解决这种代理问题的方案是让剩余索取权不具有可转让性，并且和捐赠者签定契约，把现金流用在适当的地方。

detailed_translations.english: (of property) transferable to another owner

name: buoyant
trans: 有浮力的， 漂浮的； 轻快的， 快乐的； 繁荣的； 看涨的

sentences.chinese: 欣欣向荣的经济

detailed_translations.chinese: 轻快的；有浮力的；上涨的
detailed_translations.english: buoyant prices etc tend to rise

sentences.english: intrepid explorers
sentences.chinese: 勇敢的探险家

name: generalize

sentences.chinese: 她总爱把自己对丈夫的看法推及所有的男人。

name: accredit
trans: 委任， 授权； 把…归于； 正式认可

sentences.english: That should see you think his accredit what.
sentences.chinese: 那要看你想给他授权什么。

sentences.english: To this, use accredit statement is a very good processing means.
sentences.chinese: 对此，使用授权声明是一个很好的处理方式。

sentences.english: The cream contains vitamin A to nourish the skin.
sentences.chinese: 这种护肤霜含有滋养肌肤的维生素A。

sentences.english: a well nourished baby
sentences.chinese: 营养良好的婴儿

detailed_translations.english: to give a person or other living thing the food and other substances they need in order to live, grow, and stay healthy

sentences.english: If God turns off one faucet, he can turn on another.
sentences.chinese: 如果上帝关住一个你的水龙头，他能开启另一个”。

sentences.english: Your security is not in your bank account; your security is in the Lord. If God turns off one faucet, he can turn on another.

sentences.chinese: 诚然，用户体验设计师可以帮助人们提高几乎关于任何事物——一个门把手，一个水龙头，一个购物车——的体验。

sentences.chinese: 你能不能帮我把这条裙子改长？

sentences.english: The days lengthened as summer approached.
sentences.chinese: 随着夏天来临，白天变长了。

detailed_translations.english: to make something longer or to become longer

sentences.english: Methods of tunnel excavation in unconsolidated formations and the collapse zone treatment are intro-duced according to the formation properties fo exit section of Yangzong No.
sentences.chinese: 针对阳宗海一号隧道出口段的地层特点，介绍了在松散土体地层中遂道施工方法的选择及在施工中出现坍塌的处理方法。

name: strike
trans: 碰，撞，撞击；侵袭；突然想到；给…以深刻印象；罢工；敲响

sentences.english: The government has promised that the army will be called in to help if there is a firemen’s strike.
sentences.chinese: 政府承诺，如消防员罢工，就将调军队来协助。

detailed_translations.english: a period of time when a group of workers deliberately stop working because of a disagreement about pay, working conditions etc

sentences.chinese: 拿破仑控制了大半个欧洲。

detailed_translations.english: to defeat or control a person or group, especially using force

sentences.english: She alleged that there was rampant drug use among the male members of the group.
sentences.chinese: 她指称该组织中有大量的男性成员吸毒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 断言， 宣称， 硬说
detailed_translations.english: to say that something is true or that someone has done something wrong, although it has not been proved

name: positive
trans: 肯定的； 积极的； 确凿的； 自信的， 乐观的； 正电的

sentences.english: At least something positive has come out of the situation.
sentences.chinese: 至少这个情况也产生了一些积极的东西。

sentences.english: Write down all the positive things about your life.
sentences.chinese: 记下生活中所有好的事情。

sentences.english: The rural environment was having a positive effect on the children’s health.
sentences.chinese: 乡村环境对孩子们的健康有好处。

sentences.english: It’s been a very positive experience for her.
sentences.chinese: 那对她来说是一次非常有益的经历。

sentences.english: TV can be a positive influence .
sentences.chinese: 电视也会有好的影响。

sentences.english: the positive contribution to the community made by many older people
sentences.chinese: 许多老年人为社区做出的积极贡献

sentences.english: It’s been a difficult time but, on the positive side , I feel physically fine.
sentences.chinese: 日子过得不容易，不过从好的方面看，我的身体状况还不错。

sentences.english: Women should be portrayed in a more positive light .
sentences.chinese: 应该从更正面的角度来描绘女性。

detailed_translations.chinese: 确实的， 明确的； 积极的， 肯定的
detailed_translations.english: good or useful

sentences.english: He took aim and squeezed the trigger.
sentences.chinese: 他瞄准目标，扣动了扳机。

sentences.english: The assassination triggered off a wave of rioting.
sentences.chinese: 这次暗杀事件引发了一阵骚乱。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a gun that you pull with your finger to fire it
to make something happen very quickly, especially a series of events

sentences.english: A large detachment of police was used to segregate the two rival camps of protesters.
sentences.chinese: 一大队分遣警察被派来隔离两群敌对的抗议者。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使隔离；使分离；在…实行种族隔离
detailed_translations.english: to separate one group of people from others, especially because they are of a different race, sex, or religion

sentences.english: We can grow sorghum or maize on this plot.
sentences.chinese: 这块地可以种高粱或玉米。

sentences.english: The maize and millet were just putting forth ears.
sentences.chinese: 玉米粟子刚刚吐穗。

sentences.english: The researchers say it should be possible to transfer this process to rice by inserting genes from maize or from wild relatives of rice that also use it.
sentences.chinese: 科学家说，通过把来自玉米或者具有此功能的水稻野生亲属的基因插入水稻中，就有可能让水稻也具有这一功能。

detailed_translations.english: a tall plant with large yellow seeds that grow together on a  cob (= long hard part )  , and that are cooked and eaten as a vegetable

name: meticulous
trans: 细心的， 小心翼翼的

sentences.english: He kept meticulous accounts.
sentences.chinese: 他的账记得一丝不苟。

sentences.english: Their planning and preparation were meticulous.
sentences.chinese: 他们的计划和准备工作都很周密。

sentences.english: He cleaned the tools with meticulous care.
sentences.chinese: 他十分认真地清洁了工具。

sentences.english: The book describes his journey in meticulous detail.
sentences.chinese: 这本书很详细地描述了他的旅程。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一丝不苟的；小心翼翼的；拘泥小节的
detailed_translations.english: very careful about small details, and always making sure that everything is done correctly

name: rental
trans: 租金额； 租赁， 出租

sentences.english: Video rental is usually £3.
sentences.chinese: 录像带的租金通常是3英镑。

detailed_translations.english: the money that you pay to use a car, television, or other machine over a period of time

name: prospect
trans: 前景，前途；可能性；景象；期望

sentences.english: The prospect of marriage terrified Alice.
sentences.chinese: 想到要结婚，艾丽斯害怕极了。

sentences.english: I had no job, no education, and no prospects .
sentences.chinese: 我没有工作，没受过什么教育，前途渺茫。

detailed_translations.english: a particular event which will probably or definitely happen in the future – used especially when you want to talk about how you feel about it

sentences.english: The coastline can now be monitored by radar.
sentences.chinese: 现在能用雷达监测海岸线了。

sentences.english: We could see the plane quite clearly on the radar screen.
sentences.chinese: 我们在雷达屏幕上可清晰地看到飞机。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that uses radio waves to find the position of things and watch their movement

name: withhold
trans: 拒绝给， 不给； 抑制； 忍住

sentences.english: I withheld payment until they had completed the work.
sentences.chinese: 我扣着钱，直到他们完工。

sentences.english: Ian was accused of withholding vital information from the police.
sentences.chinese: 伊恩被控向警方隐瞒重要信息。

detailed_translations.english: to refuse to give someone something

name: kinetic
trans: 运动的， 运动引起的； 动力学的

sentences.english: kinetic energy
sentences.chinese: 动能

detailed_translations.english: relating to movement

sentences.english: "I think the feedback can be helpful because we all have blinders on when we fall in love, " says Eva Ritvo, a Miami psychiatrist who specialize sin marriage and family therapy.
sentences.chinese: 专门从事婚姻与家庭疗法研究的迈阿密精神病专家瑞塔沃说：“我认为信息回馈是有用的，因为人们在恋爱时都会变得盲目。

sentences.english: The research work is being done by a small group of dedicated and imaginative scientists who specialize in extracting from various sea animals substances that may improve the health of the human race.
sentences.chinese: 一小部分富有想像力和敬业精神的科学家正在进行这项研究，他们专门研究从各种海洋动物中提取能增进人类健康的物质。

detailed_translations.english: to limit all or most of your study, business etc to a particular subject or activity

detailed_translations.chinese: 使适应特殊目的， 使专用于

name: rotate
trans: 转动， 旋转； 轮流

sentences.english: The Earth rotates on its axis once every 24 hours.
sentences.chinese: 地球每24小时绕地轴自转一周。

sentences.english: Rotate the pan halfway through the baking time.
sentences.chinese: 烘烤到一半时把盘子转一下。

detailed_translations.english: to turn with a circular movement around a central point, or to make something do this
to turn with a circular movement around a central point, or to make something do this

sentences.english: In this instance I think she was mistaken.
sentences.chinese: 在这一点上我认为她弄错了。

detailed_translations.english: an example of a particular kind of situation

sentences.english: This policy is scarcely consonant with the government’s declared aims.
sentences.chinese: 这项政策与政府所宣称的目标基本上不符。

detailed_translations.english: relating to a combination of musical notes that sounds pleasant
a speech sound made by partly or completely stopping the flow of air through your mouth

sentences.english: despair so great it threatened to engulf him
sentences.chinese: 几乎要将他压垮的绝望情绪

detailed_translations.english: if an unpleasant feeling engulfs you, you feel it very strongly

name: inheritance
trans: 遗产， 继承物； 继承； 遗传

sentences.english: Lucinda has to fight for her life and her inheritance in this gripping novel.
sentences.chinese: 在这部扣人心弦的小说里，露辛达不得不为自己的生命与所继承的遗产进行抗争。

detailed_translations.english: money, property etc that you receive from someone who has died

name: reptile
trans: 爬行动物， 爬虫类； 卑鄙的人

sentences.english: Bird evolved from reptiles, so the first bird must have come out of an egg--laid by a reptile.
sentences.chinese: 禽类是由爬虫类进化而来，所以，第一只禽鸟肯定是从爬虫类孵化的蛋里出来的。

sentences.english: No matter how dry your skin gets, you will never turn into an alligator or any other type of reptile.
sentences.chinese: 不论皮肤多么干燥，你永远不会变成美洲鳄或任何其他一种皮肤粗糙的爬行动物。

sentences.english: This small reptile, which measures just 10 centimeters long, can swim through the sand dunes at up to 15 centimeters per second.
sentences.chinese: 这种身长只有10厘米小型爬行动物，可以在沙子中以最快每秒15厘米的速度游动。

detailed_translations.english: a type of animal, such as a snake or  lizard  , whose body temperature changes according to the temperature around it, and that usually lays eggs to have babies

sentences.english: His two albums released on cassette have sold 10 million copies.
sentences.chinese: 他以磁带形式发行的两张专辑已售出1000万份。

detailed_translations.english: a small flat plastic case containing  magnetic tape  , that can be used for playing or recording sound

name: receptive
trans: 接受得快的； 善于接受的， 能接纳的

sentences.english: You might find them in a more receptive mood tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 也许他们明天会更乐于接受意见。

sentences.english: a receptive audience
sentences.chinese: 愿意倾听的观众

detailed_translations.english: willing to consider new ideas or listen to someone else’s opinions

name: blade
trans: 刀刃， 刀片； 叶片； 草叶； 桨叶

sentences.english: a razor blade
sentences.chinese: 剃刀刀片

detailed_translations.english: the flat cutting part of a tool or weapon

name: solution
trans: 溶液； 解答， 解决

sentences.english: The best solution would be for them to separate.
sentences.chinese: 最好的解决方法是他们分开。

sentences.english: he solution of glucose in water
sentences.chinese: 葡萄糖在水中的溶解

detailed_translations.english: a way of solving a problem or dealing with a difficult situation

name: foreshorten
trans: 用透视法缩小； 缩短， 节略

sentences.english: She could see herself in the reflecting lenses, which had grotesquely foreshortened her.
sentences.chinese: 她可以在反射镜头中看到自己被怪异地缩短了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 用透视法缩小； 缩短， 节略
detailed_translations.english: To foreshorten someone or something means to draw them, photograph them, or see them from an unusual angle so that the parts of them that are furthest away seem smaller than they really are

name: diverge
trans: 分开， 叉开； 分歧； 偏离

sentences.english: The two species diverged millions of years ago.
sentences.chinese: 这两个物种从数百万年前开始朝不同方向演变。

sentences.english: Global growth rates are diverging markedly.
sentences.chinese: 世界各地的增长率在发生明显的分化。

detailed_translations.english: if similar things diverge, they develop in different ways and so are no longer similar

name: opponent
trans: 对立的， 反对的， 对抗的
