sentences.english: She bowled out her opponent.
sentences.chinese: 她打败了她的对手。

sentences.english: The soldier jabbed at his opponent.
sentences.chinese: 那个战士猛击他的对手。

sentences.english: He avowed himself an opponent of all alliances.
sentences.chinese: 他声称他是所有联盟的反对者。

detailed_translations.english: someone who you try to defeat in a competition, game, fight, or argument

sentences.english: measures to accelerate the rate of economic growth
sentences.chinese: 加快经济增长速度的措施

detailed_translations.english: if a process accelerates or if something accelerates it, it happens faster than usual or sooner than you expect

name: emblem
trans: 徽章； 标记， 象征

sentences.english: ...the emblem of the Soviet Union.
sentences.chinese: …苏联的国徽。

detailed_translations.english: a picture, shape, or object that is used to represent a country, organization etc

sentences.english: Despite her recent surgery she has been carrying on regardless.
sentences.chinese: 尽管她最近动了手术，她却一直在不顾一切地继续工作。

detailed_translations.english: without being affected or influenced by something

name: confiscate
trans: 没收， 充公， 征用

sentences.english: Miss Williams confiscated all our sweets.
sentences.chinese: 威廉斯老师没收了我们所有的糖果。

sentences.english: Many opposition supporters had their goods confiscated.
sentences.chinese: 许多反对党支持者的财产被充公了。

detailed_translations.english: to officially take private property away from someone, usually as a punishment

name: filial
trans: 子女的； 子孙后代的

sentences.english: her filial duty
sentences.chinese: 她的孝道

detailed_translations.chinese: 孝顺的；子女的，当做子女的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the relationship of a son or daughter to their parents

sentences.english: Carrying goods by train costs nearly three times more than carrying them by barge.
sentences.chinese: 通过铁路运货的成本比驳船运货成本高出近3倍。

detailed_translations.english: a large low boat with a flat bottom, used for carrying goods on a canal or river

sentences.english: ...a pet turtle.
sentences.chinese: …一只宠物龟。

detailed_translations.english: a  reptile  that lives mainly in water and has a soft body covered by a hard shell

sentences.english: This is a book about meteorology.
sentences.chinese: 这本书是讲气象的。

sentences.english: It plays an increasingly important part in meteorology for cloud, precipitation, hail and thunderstorm detection as well as the navigation of aircraft and ships.
sentences.chinese: 它在对云层、降水、冰雹和雷暴的气象探测以及在船舰和飞机的导航中，起着日益重要的作用。

sentences.english: All of this depends on certain assumptions and the meteorology, the geology and the hydrology of the area plus the contours of the land around this particular power plant.
sentences.chinese: 所有的这些都是根据某些假设,和气象状态，地质情况，还有，水文请跨国,在加上土地的等高线,在这个特定的核能电站的周围。

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of weather conditions

name: occur
trans: 发生， 出现； 存在于

sentences.english: A third of accidental deaths occur in the home.
sentences.chinese: 有三分之一的意外死亡发生在家里。

sentences.english: The explosion occurred at 5.30 a.m.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸发生在清晨5点30分。

detailed_translations.english: to happen

name: illustrate
trans: 说明， 解释； 加插图于； 显示…存在

sentences.english: Let me give an example to illustrate the point.
sentences.chinese: 让我举个例子来说明这一点。

sentences.english: She illustrated her discussion with diagrams.
sentences.chinese: 她用图表来说明她的论述。

detailed_translations.english: to make the meaning of something clearer by giving examples

sentences.english: This may have been a draw for the royal couple, since Prince William apparently enjoys his scuba, according to ABC News.
sentences.chinese: 这可能是吸引到这对皇家夫妇的地方，因为威廉王子，据ABC广播公司新闻网说，是很喜欢水肺潜水的。

name: definitive
trans: 确定的，最后的，决定性的；

sentences.english: a definitive agreement to buy the company
sentences.chinese: 收购这家公司的最终协议

detailed_translations.chinese: 决定性的；最后的；限定的
detailed_translations.english: a definitive agreement, statement etc is one that will not be changed

sentences.english: flowers waving in the breeze
sentences.chinese: 在微风中摇曳的花儿

detailed_translations.chinese: 微风；轻而易举的事；煤屑；焦炭渣；小风波
detailed_translations.english: a gentle wind

name: trash
trans: 无价值之物，废物；拙劣的文学作品；没用的人

sentences.english: Will someone take out the trash (= take it outside the house ) ?
sentences.chinese: 谁把垃圾拿出去好吗？

sentences.english: Just put it in the trash .
sentences.chinese: 就把它扔到垃圾桶里吧。

detailed_translations.english: things that you throw away, such as empty bottles, used papers, food that has gone bad etc

sentences.english: A mature cow has horns.
sentences.chinese: 成年母牛头上长有角。

detailed_translations.english: a container in the shape of an animal’s horn, used in the past for drinking from, carrying  gunpowder  etc

name: troupe
trans: 剧团； 马戏团； 芭蕾舞团

sentences.english: ...troupes of travelling actors.
sentences.chinese: …巡回演出的演员剧团。

detailed_translations.english: a group of singers, actors, dancers etc who work together

name: transit
trans: 运输， 运送； 中转； 转变； 交通运输系统

sentences.english: baggage that is lost or damaged in transit
sentences.chinese: 在运输过程中丢失或损坏的行李

sentences.english: transit by air or sea
sentences.chinese: 空运或海运

detailed_translations.english: the process of moving goods or people from one place to another

sentences.english: I had a sore throat and aching limbs.
sentences.chinese: 我喉咙疼，四肢酸痛。

sentences.english: Mac’s still sore because I didn’t invite him.
sentences.chinese: 马克还在因为我没邀请他而生气呢。

sentences.english: They were starving and covered with sores.
sentences.chinese: 他们在挨饿，身上长满了疮。

detailed_translations.english: a part of your body that is sore is painful, because of infection or because you have used a muscle too much
a painful, often red, place on your body caused by a wound or infection

name: position
trans: 位置； 职位； 立场； 姿势， 姿态； 见解

sentences.english: Lie in a comfortable position .
sentences.chinese: 以一个舒服的姿势躺下。

sentences.english: Our hotel was in a superb central position near St Mark’s Square.
sentences.chinese: 我们的酒店处于极佳的中心位置，在圣马克广场附近。

sentences.english: Bruce is thinking of applying for the position.
sentences.chinese: 布鲁斯正在考虑申请那个职位。

detailed_translations.english: the way someone is standing, sitting, or lying

name: curtail
trans: 缩短， 缩减， 削减

sentences.english: The new law will curtail police powers.
sentences.chinese: 这条新法规将削弱警方的权力。

detailed_translations.english: to reduce or limit something

name: glow
trans: 暗淡的光； 容光焕发； 喜悦

sentences.english: The bedside lamp glowed dimly.
sentences.chinese: 床头灯发出暗淡的光。

sentences.english: The fireplace was still glowing with the remains of last night’s fire.
sentences.chinese: 壁炉中，隔夜的余烬依然在微微发光。

sentences.english: The red tip of his cigarette was glowing in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 他那红红的烟头在黑暗中幽幽发光。

sentences.english: The moisturizer gave my face a healthy glow that lasted all day.
sentences.chinese: 这种润肤霜给我脸上带来了持续整天的一种健康的红光。

detailed_translations.english: to produce or  reflect  a soft steady light
A glow is a pink colour on a person's face, usually because they are healthy or have been exercising

name: patent
trans: 有专利的； 显而易见的

sentences.english: a patent lock
sentences.chinese: 专利锁

sentences.english: He held a number of patents for his many innovations.
sentences.chinese: 他为他的许多革新申请了几项专利。

detailed_translations.english: protected by a patent
A patent is an official right to be the only person or company allowed to make or sell a new product for a certain period of time.

name: sheath
trans: 鞘， 外壳； 套； 护皮； 紧身连衣裙

sentences.english: His sword was back in its sheath.
sentences.chinese: 他的剑插回了剑鞘。

detailed_translations.chinese: 鞘；护套；叶鞘；女子紧身服装
detailed_translations.english: a cover for the blade of a knife or sword

sentences.english: So how do you train them to respond to TNT the way they respond to pollen?
sentences.chinese: 那么你如何才能训练它们，使得它们对TNT炸药的反应与对花粉的反应一样呢？

sentences.english: The problem occurs because plants need to transfer pollen by wind and insect to fertilization and reproduce.
sentences.chinese: 发生这样的问题是因为植物需要通过风和昆虫传递花粉进行受精繁殖。

sentences.english: "Almost all were incorrectly labeled based on their pollen and nectar contents, " he said.
sentences.chinese: 他说，“根据花粉和花蜜含量，几乎所有的产品标签都有问题。”

detailed_translations.english: a fine powder produced by flowers, which is carried by the wind or by insects to other flowers of the same type, making them produce seeds

name: remodel
trans: 重新塑造， 改造； 改编； 改变

sentences.english: Workmen were hired to remodel and enlarge the farm buildings.
sentences.chinese: 雇用了工人来改造和扩建农场的房子里。

detailed_translations.english: To remodel something such as a building or a room means to give it a different form or shape

name: groove
trans: 沟； 槽； 唱片上的纹路

sentences.english: The bolt slid easily into the groove.
sentences.chinese: 插销顺畅地滑入凹槽。

sentences.english: a shallow groove cut into the cliff
sentences.chinese: 悬崖上的一道浅槽

detailed_translations.chinese: [建] 凹槽，槽；最佳状态；惯例
detailed_translations.english: a thin line cut into a hard surface

name: certificate
trans: 证书， 证明书； 文凭， 结业证书

sentences.english: birth/death/marriage certificate (=giving details of someone’s birth, death, or marriage)
sentences.chinese: 出生/死亡/结婚证书

sentences.english: a degree certificate
sentences.chinese: 学位证书

detailed_translations.chinese: 证书，证件，执照；（毕业）文凭，合格证书
detailed_translations.english: an official document that states that a fact or facts are true

name: dispersal
trans: 疏散； 散布， 散开

sentences.english: the role of birds in the dispersal of seeds
sentences.chinese: 鸟类对传播种子的作用

detailed_translations.english: the process of spreading things over a wide area or in different directions

sentences.english: But it does happen in quantum mechanics.
sentences.chinese: 但它在量子力学中就发生了。

sentences.english: What happens when you try to copy one quantum variable onto another?
sentences.chinese: 您试图把一个量子变量拷贝到另一个上时发生了什么事？

sentences.english: If quantum computing can become a reality in the near future, it can provide a more effective and safer way to interact with the Internet, even for the development of human beings.
sentences.chinese: 若量子计算在不久的将来能够成为现实，便可以与量子通信一起为互联网，甚至人类的发展提供一种更有效、更安全的信息交互方式。

detailed_translations.english: a unit of energy in nuclear physics

name: racket
trans: 球拍； 喧嚷， 吵闹； 勒索， 诈骗

sentences.english: The old machine used to make an awful racket .
sentences.chinese: 这台旧机器以前噪音大得吓人。

detailed_translations.english: a loud noise

name: mess
trans: 弄脏， 弄乱； 搞糟

sentences.english: What a mess!
sentences.chinese: 太乱了！

sentences.english: Sorry – the place is a bit of a mess .
sentences.chinese: 对不起——这里有些乱。

sentences.english: When I got home, the house was a complete mess .
sentences.chinese: 我回到家时，屋子里一片狼藉。

sentences.english: You can make cookies if you promise not to make a mess in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 如果你答应不把厨房搞得乱七八糟，你可以去做甜饼。

sentences.english: She hates mess.
sentences.chinese: 她讨厌到处乱糟糟的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 凌乱状态，混乱的局面；困境
detailed_translations.english: if there is a mess somewhere or a place is a mess, things there are dirty or not neatly arranged

detailed_translations.chinese: 弄糟， 弄脏， 搞乱
detailed_translations.english: to make something look untidy or dirty

name: sour
trans: 酸的； 馊的； 乖戾的， 尖酸刻薄的； 酸痛的

sentences.english: Rachel sampled the wine. It was sour.
sentences.chinese: 雷切尔尝了尝葡萄酒，是酸的。

sentences.english: sour cherries
sentences.chinese: 酸樱桃

detailed_translations.chinese: 酸的；发酵的；刺耳的；酸臭的；讨厌的
detailed_translations.english: having a sharp acid taste, like the taste of a  lemon  or a fruit that is not ready to be eaten
if milk sours, or if something sours it, it begins to have an unpleasant sharp taste

name: transform
trans: 使变形； 改造， 改革； 转换

sentences.english: Increased population has transformed the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 人口的增加使景观发生了变化。

detailed_translations.english: to completely change the appearance, form, or character of something or someone, especially in a way that improves it

name: magnitude
trans: 巨大； 重要性； 星等， 星球的亮度

sentences.english: an increase of this order of magnitude
sentences.chinese: 如此大幅度的增长

sentences.english: The star varies in brightness by about three magnitudes.
sentences.chinese: 星体的亮度大约分三个星等。

detailed_translations.english: the great size or importance of something

name: genuine
trans: 真的， 非人造的； 真诚的， 诚实的

sentences.english: ‘Did he really?’ Her surprise seemed genuine.
sentences.chinese: “他真的这样？”她好像是真的惊讶。

detailed_translations.english: a genuine feeling, desire etc is one that you really feel, not one you pretend to feel

name: agitate
trans: 鼓动， 煽动； 激怒， 使激动， 使不安； 搅动

sentences.english: All you need to do is gently agitate the water with a finger or paintbrush.
sentences.chinese: 你只需要用手指或刷子轻轻搅动水。

detailed_translations.english: to shake or mix a liquid quickly

sentences.english: Its molecules can be agitated by microwave energy.
sentences.chinese: 微波能量可以使其分子随之运动。

detailed_translations.english: a very short electric wave that is used in cooking food and sending messages by radio, and in radar

sentences.english: Lose yourself in the play. Be a dinosaur, or a gorilla, or a villain.
sentences.chinese: 放下自己的架子，扮演一只恐龙，或者是大猩猩，甚至是一个坏蛋。

sentences.english: In fact, he found that there was scarcely any information on gorilla cognition at all.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，他发现任何有关大猩猩认知的信息都非常稀少。

sentences.english: The most famous albino animal of all was Snowflake the gorilla, who lived at Barcelona Zoo from 1966 until his death from skin cancer in 2003.
sentences.chinese: 最著名的白化动物是大猩猩雪花。 自1966年以来，他一直生活在巴塞罗纳动物园，直到2003年死于皮肤癌。

detailed_translations.english: a very large African monkey that is the largest of the  apes

name: immune
trans: 免疫的， 有免疫力的； 不受影响的； 免除的， 豁免的

sentences.english: Once we’ve had the disease, we’re immune for life.
sentences.chinese: 我们一旦得过这种病，就获得了终身免疫力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 免疫的， 有免疫力的， 不受影响的； 免除的， 豁免的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is immune to a particular disease cannot catch it

sentences.english: a holiday brochure
sentences.chinese: 度假手册

detailed_translations.english: a thin book giving information or advertising something

name: downside
trans: 缺点， 负面； 底侧； 下降趋势

sentences.english: Digital cell phones offer more security, but the downside is that they have less power.
sentences.chinese: 数字手机安全性更好，但其劣势在于电力不足。

detailed_translations.chinese: 负面，缺点；下降趋势；底侧

name: equation
trans: 等式， 方程式； 等同， 相等； 均衡

sentences.english: When children enter the equation , further tensions may arise within a marriage.
sentences.chinese: 有了孩子以后，婚姻中可能出现新的矛盾。

detailed_translations.english: a problem or situation in which several things must be considered and dealt with

name: impressive
trans: 给人深刻印象的； 感人的

sentences.english: The figures certainly look impressive.
sentences.chinese: 这些数字看上去确实很可观。

sentences.english: Among the guests was an impressive array of authors and critics.
sentences.chinese: 来宾中有不少出色的作家和评论家。

detailed_translations.english: something that is impressive makes you admire it because it is very good, large, important etc

sentences.english: As for the gold, this modern-day prospector pans it like it's 1848.
sentences.chinese: 至于黄金，这位现代探矿者淘金的法子还和1848年时相差无几。

sentences.english: The prospector panned off bits of a sand and gravel scooped from the bed of a stream.
sentences.chinese: 探矿者淘选从河床里挖出的少量含金泥沙和砂砾。

sentences.english: His adversaries include ruthless prospectors, cheating gamblers, savage Indians, and Mother Nature at her unforgiving worst. On his side is fellow prospector Shorty, a precursor of Gabby Hayes.
sentences.chinese: 他的敌人包括了无情的勘探者、诈骗的赌徒、野蛮的印第安人以及大自然恶劣的环境。

detailed_translations.english: someone who looks for gold, minerals, oil etc

name: compound
trans: 使恶化， 使加重； 混合

sentences.english: ...the big compound eyes of dragonflies.
sentences.chinese: …蜻蜓的大复眼。

detailed_translations.english: Compound is used to indicate that something consists of two or more parts or things
a substance containing atoms from two or more  elements

detailed_translations.chinese: 使恶化， 加重； 使化合， 使合成
detailed_translations.english: to make a difficult situation worse by adding more problems

sentences.english: However, I believe in questionings, doubtings, searchings, skepticism, and I discredit credulity or blind faith.
sentences.chinese: 然而，我也相信询问、质疑、探索与怀疑，但拒绝轻信或盲从的信仰。

sentences.english: Lily: : But the interviewers don't think so, they discredit the unmarried women above the normal age have mentality defects, although they are turly bright people.
sentences.chinese: 但是面试官却认为年龄这么大了还没结婚也没男朋友，怀疑她们有心理缺陷，尽管她们确实是人才。 。

detailed_translations.english: the loss of other people’s respect or trust

sentences.english: It took an extraordinary amount of work.
sentences.chinese: 这费了相当多的功夫。

sentences.english: It’s extraordinary that he should make exactly the same mistake again.
sentences.chinese: 真想不到他又犯了完全相同的错误。

sentences.english: The U.S. has called for an extraordinary emergency meeting of the UN Human Rights Commission to examine the crisis.
sentences.chinese: 美国已要求召开一次联合国人权委员特别紧急会议来调查这次危机。

detailed_translations.chinese: 非同寻常的；特别的（会议）
detailed_translations.english: very unusual or surprising

sentences.english: ...her passion for collecting frog spawn.
sentences.chinese: ...她对采蛙卵的热爱。

detailed_translations.english: the eggs of a fish or  frog  laid together in a soft mass

detailed_translations.chinese: 产卵；酿成，造成；大量生产
detailed_translations.english: to make a series of things happen or start to exist

sentences.english: sensory stimuli such as music
sentences.chinese: 音乐等的感官刺激

sentences.english: sensory deprivation
sentences.chinese: 感觉丧失

detailed_translations.english: relating to or using your senses of sight, hearing, smell, taste, or touch

sentences.english: The meaning of the poem has always been a puzzle.
sentences.chinese: 那首诗的含义始终是个谜。

sentences.english: He thought he had solved the puzzle.
sentences.chinese: 他认为他已经解开了那个谜。

sentences.english: What puzzles me is why his books are so popular.
sentences.chinese: 令我不解的是，他的书为什么如此受欢迎。

detailed_translations.english: something that is difficult to understand or explain
to confuse someone or make them feel slightly anxious because they do not understand something

sentences.english: She lost the election by a mere 20 votes.
sentences.chinese: 她仅仅以20票之差落选。

sentences.english: a London suburb
sentences.chinese: 一个伦敦郊区

sentences.english: a kid from the suburbs
sentences.chinese: 来自郊区的小孩子

detailed_translations.chinese: 郊区， 郊外， 近郊
detailed_translations.english: an area where people live which is away from the centre of a town or city

name: taut
trans: 绷紧的； 肌肉结实的； 结构严谨的， 紧凑的

sentences.english: The rope was stretched taut.
sentences.chinese: 绳子绷紧了。

detailed_translations.english: stretched tight

name: simplify
trans: 简化， 使简单， 使单纯

sentences.english: an attempt to simplify the tax system
sentences.chinese: 简化税制的尝试

sentences.english: The law needs to be simplified.
sentences.chinese: 这部法律需要简化。

sentences.english: a simplified version of the game
sentences.chinese: 这个游戏的简化版

detailed_translations.english: to make something easier or less complicated

sentences.english: Its nozzle was smeared with some kind of lubricant.
sentences.chinese: 它的喷嘴上涂了种润滑油。

detailed_translations.english: a substance such as oil that you put on surfaces that rub together, especially parts of a machine, in order to make them move smoothly and easily

sentences.english: a tube of glue
sentences.chinese: 一管胶水

sentences.english: The sheets are glued together with strong adhesive.
sentences.chinese: 薄板用强力胶粘在一起。

detailed_translations.english: a sticky substance used for joining things together
to join two things together using glue

sentences.english: the Earth’s orbital path
sentences.chinese: 地球的运行轨道

detailed_translations.english: relating to the orbit of one object around another

sentences.english: Each sculptural planter is made-to-order with handmade glass and lead-free solder and comes with everything you need but the plants.
sentences.chinese: 每个艺术花盆都是定制的。 它们由手工制作的玻璃和无铅焊料接合而成，交付使用时，万事俱备，只欠花卉。

sentences.english: This superior reliability comes from advances in packaging techniques and epitaxial structure, together with the use of hard solder construction.
sentences.chinese: 这种超级可靠性来自于封装技术和外延结构的发展，也得益于硬焊接架构的使用。

sentences.english: You can either solder them together properly with a metal strip on the front, or just try positioning the metal correctly inside the case with the cells.
sentences.chinese: 你可以使用前面的金属条将他们焊在一起，或者只是定位好电池盒里面的电池单元的金属条。

detailed_translations.english: a soft metal, usually a mixture of  lead  and  tin  , which can be melted and used to join two metal surfaces, wires etc
to join or repair metal surfaces with solder

sentences.english: the enveloping darkness
sentences.chinese: 笼罩四周的黑暗

detailed_translations.english: to cover or wrap something or someone up completely

name: firm
trans: 结实的； 坚定的， 坚决的

sentences.english: She works for an electronics firm.
sentences.chinese: 她在一家电子公司工作。

detailed_translations.english: a business or company, especially a small one

name: reflect
trans: 反射， 映现； 显示， 表明； 仔细考虑， 深思

sentences.english: The drop in consumer spending reflects concern about the economy.
sentences.chinese: 消费支出的下降反映出人们对经济的担忧。

detailed_translations.english: if a person or a thing is reflected in a mirror, glass, or water, you can see an image of the person or thing on the surface of the mirror, glass, or water

sentences.english: The adventitious birth of our fourth child completely changed our plan.
sentences.chinese: 第四个孩子偶然的出生，完全改变了我们的计画。

detailed_translations.english: happening by chance

name: ongoing
trans: 正在进行的；不间断的；继续存在的

sentences.english: their ongoing search for a new director
sentences.chinese: 他们仍在寻找一个新主任

sentences.english: ongoing negotiations
sentences.chinese: 还在进行的谈判

sentences.english: The discussions are still ongoing.
sentences.chinese: 讨论仍在继续。

detailed_translations.english: continuing, or continuing to develop

name: outfit
trans: 全套装备； 全套服装

sentences.english: She bought a new outfit for the party.
sentences.chinese: 她为了这次派对买了套新衣服。

sentences.english: a cowboy outfit
sentences.chinese: 一套牛仔服装

detailed_translations.english: a set of clothes worn together, especially for a special occasion
to provide someone or something with a set of clothes or equipment, especially ones that are needed for a particular purpose

name: ignorant
trans: 无知的， 愚昧的； 无知觉的

sentences.english: an ignorant and uneducated man
sentences.chinese: 不学无术的人

detailed_translations.english: not knowing facts or information that you ought to know

name: extort
trans: 勒索， 敲诈， 强夺

sentences.english: Corrupt government officials were extorting money from him.
sentences.chinese: 腐败的政府官员那时正向他勒索钱财。

detailed_translations.english: to illegally force someone to give you something, especially money, by threatening them

name: trample
trans: 踩碎； 践踏， 摧残

sentences.english: There was a small fence to stop people trampling on the flowers.
sentences.chinese: 有一道小小的围栏，防止人们践踏花草。

detailed_translations.english: to step heavily on something, so that you crush it with your feet
the act of trampling

name: negligible
trans: 可以忽略的， 微不足道的； 无关紧要的

sentences.english: The damage done to his property was negligible.
sentences.chinese: 对他财产造成的损失微不足道。

detailed_translations.english: too slight or unimportant to have any effect

name: setback
trans: 挫折， 阻碍； 倒退

sentences.english: The team’s hopes of playing in Europe suffered a setback last night.
sentences.chinese: 球队赴欧洲参加比赛的希望昨晚遇到了阻碍。

detailed_translations.chinese: 挫折， 倒退， 失败
detailed_translations.english: a problem that delays or prevents progress, or makes things worse than they were

sentences.english: spray from the waves
sentences.chinese: 海浪溅起的水雾

sentences.english: a new hair styling spray
sentences.chinese: 一种新的定型喷发剂

sentences.english: Most farmers use pesticide sprays.
sentences.chinese: 大多数农民都使用喷雾杀虫剂。

sentences.english: She sprayed herself with perfume.
sentences.chinese: 她往身上喷了香水。

detailed_translations.english: water in very small drops that is blown from the sea etc or sent up by vehicles on a wet road
to force liquid out of a container so that it comes out in a stream of very small drops and covers an area

name: distinguish
trans: 区别， 辨别； 使有别于， 成为…的特征； 看清， 听出； 使杰出， 使著名

sentences.english: The factor that distinguishes this company from the competition is customer service.
sentences.chinese: 使这家公司在竞争中脱颖而出的是其客户服务。

sentences.english: The main distinguishing feature of this species is the leaf shape.
sentences.chinese: 这一品种的主要特征是叶子的形状。

detailed_translations.english: to be the thing that makes someone or something different or special

name: primordial
trans: 原始的， 最初的； 基本的

sentences.english: the primordial seas
sentences.chinese: 原始海洋

detailed_translations.english: existing at the beginning of time or the beginning of the Earth

name: husbandry
trans: 耕种， 务农， 农牧业

sentences.english: animal husbandry
sentences.chinese: 畜牧业

detailed_translations.english: farming

sentences.english: Do you like my new haircut?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢我的新发型吗？

detailed_translations.english: when you have a haircut, someone cuts your hair for you

name: decorative
trans: 装饰性的， 做装饰用的

sentences.english: a decorative panel above the door
sentences.chinese: 门楣上的饰板

detailed_translations.english: pretty or attractive, but not always necessary or useful

name: pointed
trans: 尖的， 尖角的； 尖锐的， 尖刻的

sentences.english: a pointed beard
sentences.chinese: 一把山羊胡

detailed_translations.english: having a point at the end

sentences.english: an enthusiastic supporter of reform
sentences.chinese: 改革的热心支持者

detailed_translations.english: feeling or showing a lot of interest and excitement about something

sentences.english: Her legs were elongated by the very high heels which she wore.
sentences.chinese: 她穿的高跟鞋非常高，使她的腿显得长了。

detailed_translations.english: to become longer, or make something longer than normal

sentences.english: One of the most common symptoms of schizophrenia is hearing imaginary voices.
sentences.chinese: 精神分裂症最常见的症状之一是幻听。

detailed_translations.english: something wrong with your body or mind which shows that you have a particular illness

sentences.english: Three civilians were injured during the fray.
sentences.chinese: 三个平民在冲突中受伤。

sentences.english: The fabric is very fine or frays easily.
sentences.chinese: 这种布料很细，或者说是容易磨损。

sentences.english: The stitching had begun to fray at the edges.
sentences.chinese: 边缘处的针脚已经开始磨损了。

detailed_translations.english: an argument or fight

detailed_translations.chinese: 使磨损；变得令人紧张、急躁
detailed_translations.english: If something such as cloth or rope frays, or if something frays it, its threads or fibres start to come apart from each other and spoil its appearance

sentences.english: Our bodies can sweat, thereby losing heat by evaporation.
sentences.chinese: 我们的身体会流汗，由此能通过蒸发散热。

detailed_translations.english: with the result that something else happens

name: wield
trans: 支配， 掌权， 行使

sentences.english: The Church wields immense power in Ireland.
sentences.chinese: 在爱尔兰，教会操纵着大权。

detailed_translations.english: to have a lot of power or influence, and to use it

sentences.english: a disastrous first marriage
sentences.chinese: 以失败告终的第一次婚姻

sentences.english: The move proved disastrous (= was disastrous ) for the company.
sentences.chinese: 这一行动对公司来说是一场灾难。

detailed_translations.english: very bad, or ending in failure

name: impulse
trans: 冲动， 一时的念头； 刺激， 推动力； 脉冲

sentences.english: a sudden impulse to laugh
sentences.chinese: 突然想笑的冲动

sentences.english: It is the passions which provide the main impulse of music.
sentences.chinese: 激情是音乐创作的主要动力。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden strong desire to do something without thinking about whether it is a sensible thing to do

sentences.english: The liquid will crystallize at 50 degrees centigrade.
sentences.chinese: 这种液体在50摄氏度时结晶。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使结晶；明确；使具体化；做成蜜饯
detailed_translations.english: if a liquid crystallizes, it forms  crystals

sentences.english: Several other subspecies of gull are found in the region.
sentences.chinese: 几个海鸥的其他亚种在此地区被找到。

detailed_translations.english: a group of similar plants or animals that is smaller than a  species

name: shower
trans: 淋浴； 下阵雨； 洒落， 纷纷降落； 抛撒
阵雨，暴雨；淋浴；一阵，一大批

sentences.english: Why does the phone always ring when I’m in the shower?
sentences.chinese: 为什么电话铃总是在我洗澡的时候响？

sentences.english: I’d like to use the shower if that’s all right.
sentences.chinese: 如果可以的话，我想用一下这里的淋浴。

sentences.english: The bathroom has a separate shower cubicle (= a shower in a separate part of the room ) .
sentences.chinese: 卫生间里有一个独立的淋浴间。

sentences.english: I need a shower.
sentences.chinese: 我需要洗个淋浴。

sentences.english: Mike shaved and showered.
sentences.chinese: 迈克刮了脸，冲了个淋浴。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that you stand under to wash your whole body
to wash your whole body while standing under a shower

name: infectious
trans: 传染性的， 传染病的； 有感染力的

sentences.english: infectious diseases
sentences.chinese: 传染性疾病

detailed_translations.english: an infectious illness can be passed from one person to another, especially through the air you breathe

name: concur
trans: 同时发生； 意见一致

sentences.english: And so, a lot of people see this as a sort of … or create a scenario, an Orwellian scenario, a Big Brother type scenario but I don't concur.
sentences.chinese: 所以，大多数人会把这个现象视为一种……或者说创作一幕剧情，一幕奥威尔式或是“老大哥”式的剧情，但是我并不同意这样的看法。

detailed_translations.english: to agree with someone or have the same opinion as them

sentences.english: What you said was true. It was, nevertheless, a little unkind.
sentences.chinese: 你说的都是实话，只不过有点刻薄。

sentences.english: Although the market has been flat, residential property costs remain high. Nevertheless, the fall-off in demand has had an impact on resale values.
sentences.chinese: 尽管市场一直疲软，房价持续偏高。然而需求的减少还是对二手房价格产生了影响。

detailed_translations.english: You use nevertheless when saying something that contrasts with what has just been said.
in spite of a fact that you have just mentioned

name: prominent
trans: 卓著的， 杰出的； 突起的， 凸出的

sentences.english: a prominent Russian scientist
sentences.chinese: 杰出的俄罗斯科学家

sentences.english: The World Cup will have a prominent place on the agenda.
sentences.chinese: 世界杯赛将占据议程表的重要位置。

sentences.english: a prominent nose
sentences.chinese: 高鼻子

detailed_translations.english: important

sentences.english: diabetic patients requiring insulin
sentences.chinese: 胰岛素依赖型糖尿病患者

detailed_translations.english: a substance produced naturally by your body which allows sugar to be used for energy

name: ironic
trans: 说反话的， 讽刺的； 出乎意料的

sentences.english: Your car was stolen at the police station! How ironic!
sentences.chinese: 你的车在警察局被偷！真让人哭笑不得！

sentences.english: It’s ironic that her husband smoked for thirty years, and yet she’s the one who died of lung cancer.
sentences.chinese: 具有讽刺意味的是，她丈夫吸烟30年，而死于肺癌的却是她。

sentences.english: In an ironic twist , the most trustworthy character in the film turned out to be the thief.
sentences.chinese: 影片中故事情节来了一个出乎意料的转折，最可信赖的人原来是小偷。

detailed_translations.english: an ironic situation is one that is unusual or amusing because something strange happens, or the opposite of what is expected happens or is true

sentences.english: We have to tackle the fundamental cause of the problem.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须解决问题的根本原因。

sentences.english: the fundamental principles of liberty and equality
sentences.chinese: 自由和平等这两个基本原则

detailed_translations.english: relating to the most basic and important parts of something

sentences.english: As for composers, modernists like Béla Bartók were hieratic and formalist, and postmodernists, like John Adams, were playful and interested in deconstructing.
sentences.chinese: 说到作曲家，现代主义者如贝拉•巴托克是僧侣似的、形式主义的，而后现代主义者如约翰•亚当斯则是顽皮的、精于解构的。

detailed_translations.english: of or relating to priests

sentences.english: They understood that our power alone cannot protect us, nor does it entitle us to do as we please.
sentences.chinese: 他们懂得单凭实力无法保护我们的安全，实力也并不赋予我们随心所欲的权利。

detailed_translations.english: to give someone the official right to do or have something

sentences.english: A night on the town may help to break the monotony of the week.
sentences.chinese: 去城里待一晚也许有助改变一周工作生活的单调。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being always the same, which makes something boring, especially someone’s life or work

name: outline
trans: 轮廓； 概要， 大纲

sentences.english: a research proposal outline
sentences.chinese: 研究计划梗概

detailed_translations.english: the main ideas or facts about something, without the details
to describe something in a general way, giving the main points but not the details

sentences.english: The counselor bounced up to denounce discount.
sentences.chinese: 顾问上升蹦跳指责折扣。

sentences.english: The next day as I was talking to my financial counselor he gave me advice on how I might avoid running out of money.
sentences.chinese: 隔天，当我跟我的理财顾问谈话时，他也提出建议，告诉我如何避免金钱耗尽。

sentences.english: What about using that background and talent in a different field, say as an admissions counselor for a nearby college or university?
sentences.chinese: 将你的资历和才能用在别的行业会怎么样呢？ 比如说去当附近一所大学或学院的招生顾问。

name: fade
trans: 褪色； 凋谢； 逐渐消失

sentences.english: the fading evening light
sentences.chinese: 渐暗的暮色

sentences.english: a pair of faded jeans
sentences.chinese: 一条褪了色的牛仔裤

sentences.english: The sun had faded the curtains.
sentences.chinese: 太阳把窗帘晒得褪了色。

detailed_translations.english: to lose colour and brightness, or to make something do this

name: overdue
trans: 过期未付的， 逾期的； 过度的， 过火的； 迟到的， 延误的

sentences.english: an overdue gas bill
sentences.chinese: 逾期未付的煤气账单

sentences.english: The library books are overdue.
sentences.chinese: 图书馆的书过期未还。

sentences.english: The baby was a week overdue (= it was expected to be born a week ago ).
sentences.chinese: 宝宝超过预产期有一周了。

detailed_translations.english: not done, paid, returned etc by the time expected

name: nominal
trans: 名义上的； 微不足道的

sentences.english: the nominal head of the rebellion
sentences.chinese: 这次叛乱名义上的领导人

sentences.english: Their conversion to Christianity was only nominal.
sentences.chinese: 他们只是名义上皈依了基督教。

detailed_translations.chinese: 名义上的， 有名无实的； 很少的， 象征性的； 名词性的
detailed_translations.english: officially described as being something, when this is not really true

sentences.english: The government was unable to curb the excesses of the secret police.
sentences.chinese: 政府无法约束秘密警察的过分行为。

sentences.english: the worst excesses of journalism
sentences.chinese: 新闻工作中那些最糟糕的越轨行为

detailed_translations.english: harmful actions that are socially or morally unacceptable

name: perspective
trans: 展望； 观点， 看法； 远景； 透视图， 透视法； 前途

sentences.english: the artist’s use of perspective
sentences.chinese: 那位画家对透视法的运用

sentences.english: a perspective of the whole valley
sentences.chinese: 山谷全景

sentences.english: His father’s death gave him a whole new perspective on life.
sentences.chinese: 父亲的死使他对生活有了全新的看法。

detailed_translations.english: a method of drawing a picture that makes objects look solid and shows distance and depth, or the effect this method produces in a picture

name: galaxy
trans: 星系； [G-]银河系， 银河； 群英

sentences.english: Astronomers have discovered a distant galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 天文学家们发现了一个遥远的星系。

detailed_translations.chinese: 银河；[天] 星系；银河系；一群显赫的人
detailed_translations.english: one of the large groups of stars that make up the universe

name: invade
trans: 侵入， 侵略； 侵扰

sentences.english: The Romans invaded Britain 2,000 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 2,000年前古罗马人入侵了英国。

detailed_translations.english: to enter a country, town, or area using military force, in order to take control of it

name: intervening
trans: 介于中间的， 发生于期间的

sentences.english: During those intervening years Bridget had married her husband Robert.
sentences.chinese: 在其间的那些年里，布里奇特与罗伯特结为夫妻。

detailed_translations.chinese: 介于中间的， 发生于期间的
detailed_translations.english: An intervening period of time is one that separates two events or points in time

name: clump
trans: 聚集， 成群； 以沉重的脚步行走

sentences.english: I heard the clump of Ralph’s boots going up the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 我听到拉尔夫上楼，他的靴子踩得噔噔响。

detailed_translations.english: a group of trees, bushes, or other plants growing very close together

detailed_translations.chinese: 形成一丛；以沉重的步子行走
detailed_translations.english: to walk with slow noisy steps

name: thorough
trans: 彻底的； 详尽的； 一丝不苟的

sentences.english: The doctor gave him a thorough check-up.
sentences.chinese: 医生给他做了一次全面的体检。

sentences.english: a thorough and detailed biography
sentences.chinese: 详尽的传记

sentences.english: The police investigation was very thorough.
sentences.chinese: 警方的调查十分彻底。

sentences.english: thorough notes of the meeting
sentences.chinese: 详尽的会议记录

detailed_translations.english: including every possible detail

name: democracy
trans: 民主政体， 民主制度； 民主国家； 民主精神

sentences.english: a return to democracy after 16 years of military rule
sentences.chinese: 16年军人统治后民主制度的恢复

detailed_translations.english: a system of government in which every citizen in the country can vote to elect its government officials

sentences.english: the Korean peninsula
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜半岛

detailed_translations.english: a piece of land almost completely surrounded by water but joined to a large area of land

sentences.english: The school has evolved its own style of teaching.
sentences.chinese: 学校逐步形成了自己的教学风格。

sentences.english: Businesses need to evolve rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 各项业务需要快速发展。

detailed_translations.english: to develop and change gradually over a long period of time

sentences.english: letters of congratulation
sentences.chinese: 祝贺信

sentences.english: Give Oscar my congratulations.
sentences.chinese: 请向奥斯卡转达我的祝贺。

detailed_translations.english: when you tell someone that you are happy because they have achieved something or because something nice has happened to them

sentences.english: How could she abandon her own child?
sentences.chinese: 她怎么能抛弃自己的孩子呢？

detailed_translations.chinese: 离弃， 丢弃； 遗弃； 抛弃； 放弃
detailed_translations.english: to leave someone, especially someone you are responsible for

sentences.english: Now experts are extolling the virtues of the humble potato.
sentences.chinese: 现在专家们在颂扬粗陋的马铃薯的种种好处。

detailed_translations.english: to praise something very much

name: household
trans: 家庭的，家用的；家喻户晓的

sentences.english: household chores
sentences.chinese: 家务杂活

sentences.english: ...growing up in a male-only household.
sentences.chinese: …在全体成员均为男性的家庭里长大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 家庭的， 家喻户晓的
detailed_translations.english: relating to looking after a house and the people in it
A household is all the people in a family or group who live together in a house

name: adverse
trans: 负面的； 不利的； 逆的

sentences.english: They fear it could have an adverse effect on global financial markets.
sentences.chinese: 他们担心这会对全球金融市场产生不利影响。

sentences.english: Miller’s campaign has received a good deal of adverse publicity .
sentences.chinese: 米勒的竞选活动招来许多负面报道。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不利的；相反的；敌对的（名词adverseness，副词adversely）
detailed_translations.english: not good or favourable

name: bulletin
trans: 新闻简报； 公告， 布告； 简报

sentences.english: At 3:30 p.m. a bulletin was released announcing that the president was out of immediate danger.
sentences.chinese: 下午3:30发布了公告，宣布总统暂时脱离了危险。

detailed_translations.english: an official statement that tells people about something important

sentences.english: Yeah, , now you know how the sex ratio matters!
sentences.chinese: 是的，现在你知道性别比例的问题了吧！ ！

sentences.english: The ratio could reach one in four within a year.
sentences.chinese: 一年之内这个比例可以达到四分之一。

sentences.english: When using profiling it is typical to consider only the ratio (or percentage) of time spent in certain areas.
sentences.chinese: 当使用分析时，它是典型的考虑时间花费在某些领域的比例（或百分比）。

detailed_translations.english: a relationship between two amounts, represented by a pair of numbers showing how much bigger one amount is than the other

name: junction
trans: 交叉点， 汇合处； 连接， 接合

sentences.english: the junction of Abbot Road and Mill Street
sentences.chinese: 阿伯特路与米尔街的交叉口

sentences.english: Junction 5 on the M40
sentences.chinese: 40号高速公路上的第5交叉口

detailed_translations.english: a place where one road, track etc joins another

sentences.english: Well, electrolysis of water consumes energy.
sentences.chinese: 好了，电解水消耗了能量。

sentences.english: Abstr: In zinc extraction process, fluorine and chlorine, leached into the solution, affect the normal operation of electrolysis.
sentences.chinese: 文章摘要： 湿法锌冶炼中，随浸出进入系统的氟、氯离子影响电解的正常进行。

sentences.english: Instead, he says, the solution to large-scale hydrogen production lies in using renewable electricity to extract hydrogen from water via electrolysis.
sentences.chinese: 相反他认为大规模生产氢的解决方案在于使用可更新的电通过电解方式从水中提取氢。

detailed_translations.english: the process of separating a liquid into its chemical parts by passing an electric current through it

sentences.english: These days, her bandanna is usually red.
sentences.chinese: 这些天，她的印花大手帕通常是红色的。

sentences.english: The next morning, he bundled up some food in a red bandanna handkerchief, told his parents good-by, and set off into the world .
sentences.chinese: 次日早晨，他用一块红色的印花大手帕包了一些点心，告别了双亲，出发去闯天下。

name: instinct
trans: 本能， 直觉； 生性， 天性

sentences.english: Her instinct told her that something was wrong.
sentences.chinese: 直觉告诉她有些不对劲。

detailed_translations.chinese: 本能； 直觉， 生性
detailed_translations.english: a natural tendency to behave in a particular way or a natural ability to know something, which is not learned

sentences.english: The seafood here is a gourmet's delight.
sentences.chinese: 这儿的海鲜是美食家的一大享受。

sentences.english: Flavoured coffee is sold at gourmet food stores and coffee shops.
sentences.chinese: 调味咖啡在美食店和咖啡馆出售。

sentences.english: The couple share a love of gourmet cooking.
sentences.chinese: 这对夫妇都有烹饪美食的爱好。

detailed_translations.english: someone who knows a lot about food and wine and who enjoys good food and wine
Gourmet food is nicer or more unusual or sophisticated than ordinary food, and is often more expensive

name: reputation
trans: 名声， 声望， 名誉

sentences.english: Alice Munro has a reputation for being a very depressing writer.
sentences.chinese: 艾丽斯•门罗有文风抑郁的名声。

detailed_translations.english: the opinion that people have about someone or something because of what has happened in the past

name: spike
trans: 长钉， 大钉； 猛增， 急升

sentences.english: a clumsy attempt to spike rumours of a cabinet split
sentences.chinese: 企图阻止在报纸上传播内阁分裂谣言的笨拙做法

detailed_translations.english: shoes with metal points on the bottom, worn by people who run races, play golf etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 阻止；以大钉钉牢；用尖物刺穿
detailed_translations.english: to prevent someone from saying something or printing something in a newspaper

sentences.english: ...flowering shrubs.
sentences.chinese: …开花的灌木。

detailed_translations.english: a small bush with several woody stems

name: presentation
trans: 提供， 显示； 介绍， 陈述； 赠送； 表演

sentences.english: the presentation ceremony
sentences.chinese: 颁奖仪式

sentences.english: Dr Evans thanked him for coming to make the presentations .
sentences.chinese: 埃文斯博士感谢他来颁奖。

detailed_translations.chinese: 提供， 显示； 外观， 图像； 授予， 赠送； 报告， 介绍； 表演
detailed_translations.english: the act of giving someone a prize or present at a formal ceremony

sentences.english: Could that be the genesis?
sentences.chinese: 那有可能是起源吗？

sentences.english: This refers to the genesis and function of consciousness and language.
sentences.chinese: 这里指的是意识,和语言的起源及功能。

detailed_translations.english: the beginning or origin of something

name: subliminal
trans: 下意识的， 潜意识的

sentences.english: a subliminal message
sentences.chinese: 潜在的含义

detailed_translations.chinese: [生理] 阈下的；潜在意识的；微小得难以察觉的
detailed_translations.english: affecting your mind in a way that you are not conscious of

sentences.english: Your wedding ring can be engraved with a personal inscription at no extra cost.
sentences.chinese: 你的结婚戒指可以刻上个人题字不另收费。

sentences.english: The shop will also engrave your child's name on the side.
sentences.chinese: 商店也将在一侧刻上你孩子的名字。

sentences.english: ...a bottle engraved with her name.
sentences.chinese: …一个刻有她名字的瓶子。

detailed_translations.chinese: 雕刻；  铭记， 深印于 ， 铭刻
detailed_translations.english: If you engrave something with a design or words, or if you engrave a design or words on it, you cut the design or words into its surface

name: tavern
trans: 小旅馆， 客栈； 小酒店

sentences.english: Murphy’s Tavern
sentences.chinese: 墨菲酒馆

detailed_translations.english: a  pub  where you can also stay the night

name: glimmer
trans: 闪烁的微光；隐约的迹象；一丝，一线

sentences.english: In the east there is the slightest glimmer of light.
sentences.chinese: 东方有一丝闪烁的微光。

detailed_translations.english: a light that is not very bright
to shine with a light that is not very bright

name: awkward
trans: 别扭的； 笨拙的； 难处理的， 棘手的； 难操纵的

sentences.english: I hoped he would stop asking awkward questions .
sentences.chinese: 我希望他不要再问令人难堪的问题。

sentences.english: There was an awkward moment when she didn’t know whether to shake his hand or kiss his cheek.
sentences.chinese: 她不知道是该跟他握手还是亲他的脸颊，一时很尴尬。

sentences.english: an awkward silence
sentences.chinese: 令人尴尬的沉默

sentences.english: A laugh can help people over an awkward situation.
sentences.chinese: 笑可以助人化解尴尬。

sentences.english: Philip’s remarks put her in an awkward position (=  made it difficult for her to know what to do  ) .
sentences.chinese: 菲利普的话使她很窘迫。

detailed_translations.english: making you feel embarrassed so that you are not sure what to do or say

sentences.english: waterproof adhesive
sentences.chinese: 防水黏合剂

sentences.english: ...adhesive tape.
sentences.chinese: …胶布。

detailed_translations.english: a substance such as glue that you use to stick two things together
An adhesive substance is able to stick firmly to something else

sentences.english: a monumental arch
sentences.chinese: 纪念拱门

detailed_translations.chinese: 不朽的；纪念碑的；非常的
detailed_translations.english: relating to a monument or built as a monument

sentences.english: an interesting old ruin
sentences.chinese: 一处有意思的古老废墟

sentences.english: the ruins of a bombed-out office block
sentences.chinese: 被炸毁的办公楼的废墟

sentences.english: Jefferson was ruined by the lawsuit.
sentences.chinese: 杰弗逊因为那场官司倾家荡产。

sentences.english: This illness has ruined my life.
sentences.chinese: 这个病毁掉了我的生活。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a building that is left after the rest has been destroyed
to make someone lose all their money

sentences.english: Katie almost spilled her milk.
sentences.chinese: 凯蒂差点把牛奶洒出来。

detailed_translations.english: if you spill a liquid, or if it spills, it accidentally flows over the edge of a container
if you spill a liquid, or if it spills, it accidentally flows over the edge of a container

sentences.english: It’s Dad’s birthday and we’re going out for a meal to celebrate.
sentences.chinese: 今天是爸爸的生日，我们打算出去吃饭庆祝一下。

sentences.english: My folks are celebrating their 50th anniversary.
sentences.chinese: 我父母正在庆祝他们结婚50周年。

sentences.english: poems that celebrate the joys of love
sentences.chinese: 赞美爱之喜悦的诗歌

detailed_translations.english: to show that an event or occasion is important by doing something special or enjoyable

sentences.english: She rocked the cradle to quieten the child.
sentences.chinese: 她摇动摇篮，让宝宝安静下来。

sentences.english: Athens is often regarded as the cradle of democracy.
sentences.chinese: 雅典常常被认为是民主的发源地。

detailed_translations.english: a small bed for a baby, especially one that moves gently from side to side

sentences.english: The castles abut a natural forest.
sentences.chinese: 与城堡毗邻的是一片天然森林。

sentences.english: Today people think of it as a "frontier province", which lie just below the Tibetan plateau and abut Vietnam, Laos and Burma.
sentences.chinese: 今天，人们认为它是一个“边省”，这是在青藏高原及毗邻的越南、老挝和缅甸。

sentences.english: Frontier trade is not only the special form of the economic and trade among the abut countries' frontier regions, but also the important component part of the country's foreign trade.
sentences.chinese: 边境贸易是毗邻国家边境地区之间经济、贸易活动的特殊形式，是国家对外经贸活动的重要组成部分。

detailed_translations.english: if one piece of land or a building abuts another, it is next to it or touches one side of it

sentences.english: The folkway and custom of Shijiazhuang Village, Anqiu City, are profound and famous.
sentences.chinese: 安丘市石家庄村的民俗风情是很浓厚且著名的。

sentences.english: Abstr: The Liangshan is the bigest agglomeration, where the industrious and brave Yi people lived here who passed on the old tradional customs. The marriage customs still kept unique folkway.
sentences.chinese: 文章摘要： 凉山是彝族最大的聚居区，居住在这里的彝族同胞们勤劳勇敢，代代相传着古老的传统习俗，其中婚姻习俗仍然保留着独特民风民俗。

sentences.english: the mountainous coast of Wales
sentences.chinese: 威尔士多山的海岸

sentences.english: mountainous waves
sentences.chinese: 如山的巨浪

detailed_translations.english: having many mountains

sentences.english: a research laboratory
sentences.chinese: 研究实验室

sentences.english: tests on laboratory animals
sentences.chinese: 在实验室动物身上做的试验

detailed_translations.english: a special room or building in which a scientist does tests or prepares substances

sentences.english: a geometric design
sentences.chinese: 几何图形设计

detailed_translations.chinese: 几何学的；[数] 几何学图形的
detailed_translations.english: having or using the shapes and lines in  geometry  , such as circles or squares, especially when these are arranged in regular patterns

sentences.english: He is well grounded in Latin.
sentences.chinese: 他拉丁语的功底很扎实。

sentences.english: I must brush up on my Latin.
sentences.chinese: 我必须把拉丁语重温一下。

sentences.english: This word comes from Latin.
sentences.chinese: 这个词源于拉丁语。

detailed_translations.english: the language used in ancient Rome

sentences.english: I got out of the car to inspect the damage.
sentences.chinese: 我下车查看损坏情况。

sentences.english: Police inspected the scene and interviewed all the staff.
sentences.chinese: 警察仔细检查了现场并询问了所有员工。

sentences.english: General Allenby arrived to inspect the troops.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦比将军前来检阅部队。

detailed_translations.english: to examine something carefully in order to find out more about it or to find out what is wrong with it

name: campaign
trans: 竞选活动； 活动； 战役

sentences.english: Jones ran a good campaign.
sentences.chinese: 琼斯的活动搞得很成功。

sentences.english: Police have launched a campaign to crack down on drug dealers.
sentences.chinese: 警方发起了一场严厉打击毒贩的运动。

detailed_translations.english: a series of actions intended to achieve a particular result relating to politics or business, or a social improvement

name: vital
trans: 生死攸关的； 至关重要的； 精力充沛的， 有活力的

sentences.english: The work she does is absolutely vital.
sentences.chinese: 她所做的工作至关重要。

sentences.english: It is vital to be honest with your children.
sentences.chinese: 对自己的孩子坦诚十分重要。

sentences.english: The tourist industry is of vital importance to the national economy.
sentences.chinese: 旅游业对国家的经济至关重要。

sentences.english: Richardson played a vital role in the team’s success.
sentences.chinese: 理查森对球队的成功起了极重要的作用。

sentences.english: The samples could give scientists vital information about long-term changes in the earth’s atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 这些样本可以给科学家提供关于地球大气长期变化的极其重要的资料。

detailed_translations.english: extremely important and necessary for something to succeed or exist

name: conflict
trans: 冲突； 不一致； 争论

sentences.english: the threat of industrial conflict in the coalfields
sentences.chinese: 煤田发生劳资纠纷的风险

sentences.english: Marx points out the potential conflicts below the surface of society.
sentences.chinese: 马克思指出了隐藏在社会表层之下的潜在矛盾。

sentences.english: His views on the literal truth of the Bible brought him into conflict with other Christian leaders.
sentences.chinese: 他坚持《圣经》字面真理的观点使他与其他的基督教领袖发生了冲突。

sentences.english: Doctors exercise considerable power and often come into conflict with politicians.
sentences.chinese: 医生行使很大的权力，常常和政客们发生冲突。

sentences.english: a lawyer specializing in conflict resolution
sentences.chinese: 专门解决纠纷的律师

detailed_translations.english: a state of disagreement or argument between people, groups, countries etc

name: engraving
trans: 雕刻术， 刻版术； 版画

sentences.english: ...a colour engraving of oranges and lemons.
sentences.chinese: ...一副绘有橙子和柠檬的彩色版画。

detailed_translations.english: a picture made by cutting a design into metal, putting ink on the metal, and then printing it

name: rough
trans: 粗糙不平的；粗暴的；艰难的

sentences.english: Her hands were rough from hard work.
sentences.chinese: 她的双手因为干重活而变得很粗糙。

sentences.english: the rough terrain at the base of the mountains
sentences.chinese: 山脚下崎岖不平的地形

sentences.english: We were bumping over the rough ground.
sentences.chinese: 我们在崎岖的地面上颠簸而行。

sentences.english: a rough translation
sentences.chinese: 粗略的翻译

detailed_translations.english: having an uneven surface

sentences.english: The dispute culminated last week in a lawsuit against the government.
sentences.chinese: 这场针对政府诉讼案的争论在上星期达到了高潮。

detailed_translations.english: a problem or complaint that a person or organization brings to a court of law to be settled

name: sequential
trans: 序列的； 连续的； 随之而来的

sentences.english: ...the sequential story of the universe.
sentences.chinese: ...宇宙的变迁史。

detailed_translations.english: relating to or happening in a sequence

name: detect
trans: 发现， 察觉； 探测； 查明

sentences.english: Many forms of cancer can be cured if detected early.
sentences.chinese: 如果发现得早，许多种癌症都可以治愈。

sentences.english: ...a sensitive piece of equipment used to detect radiation.
sentences.chinese: …一台探测辐射的敏感仪器。

detailed_translations.english: to notice or discover something, especially something that is not easy to see, hear etc

name: derivative
trans: 派生的，引出的；无创意的
派生词， 衍生词； 派生物

sentences.english: the derivatives market
sentences.chinese: 金融衍生品市场

detailed_translations.chinese: [化学] 衍生物，派生物；导数
detailed_translations.english: something that has developed or been produced from something else

name: amateur
trans: 业余爱好的； 业余的

sentences.english: a gifted amateur
sentences.chinese: 有天赋的业余爱好者

sentences.english: Mickelson won his first major golf tournament while still an amateur.
sentences.chinese: 米克尔森还是业余选手时就赢得了他第一个高尔夫球锦标赛大奖。

sentences.english: ...professional athletes and amateur runners.
sentences.chinese: …专业运动员和业余赛跑运动员。

detailed_translations.chinese: 爱好者；业余爱好者；外行
detailed_translations.english: someone who does an activity just for pleasure, not as their job
Amateur sports or activities are done by people as a hobby and not as a job

sentences.english: And over the years, modders have introduced several innovations that have grown into entire product categories—like mountain bikes, heart-lung machines, and rodeo kayaks.
sentences.chinese: 这些年来，游戏制作者们已经引进了一些进入整个生产线的创新产品——想山地车、心肺呼吸器、竞技皮划艇.

sentences.english: The spurs cause blunt trauma to the shoulders which again never have time to heal properly before the horse is ridden and spurred in another rodeo.
sentences.chinese: 马刺会造成肩膀的钝伤，这些伤从来都没有等到痊愈就会被在另一场竞技秀中再次被骑和刺。

detailed_translations.english: a type of entertainment in which  cowboy s  ride wild horses, catch cattle with ropes, and ride in races

sentences.english: We offer financial assistance to students.
sentences.chinese: 我们向学生提供经济援助。

sentences.english: Can I be of any assistance (=  can I help you  ) ?
sentences.chinese: 我能帮什么忙吗？

detailed_translations.english: help or support

name: commerce
trans: 贸易， 商业； 交往， 交流

sentences.english: measures promoting local commerce and industry
sentences.chinese: 促进地方工商业发展的措施

detailed_translations.english: the buying and selling of goods and services

name: canvass
trans: 游说， 拉选票； 细查

sentences.english: I'm canvassing for the Republican Party.
sentences.chinese: 我在为共和党拉选票。

detailed_translations.chinese: 细究；彻底检查；向…拉票或拉生意
detailed_translations.english: If you canvass for a particular person or political party, you go around an area trying to persuade people to vote for that person or party

name: gulf
trans: 海湾； 分歧， 隔阂， 鸿沟

sentences.english: the Gulf of Mexico
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥湾

detailed_translations.english: a large area of sea partly enclosed by land

name: causal
trans: 原因的， 因果关系的

sentences.english: Rawlins stresses that it is impossible to prove a causal link between the drug and the deaths.
sentences.chinese: 罗林斯强调说证实毒品与死亡之间的因果关系是不可能的。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the connection between two things, where one causes the other to happen or exist

sentences.english: Geologists describe the motion of the plates and the consequences of such motion as plate tectonics .
sentences.chinese: 地质学家把板块运动及这种运动所造成的后果看作是板块构造运动。

sentences.english: The job of plate tectonics is to unravel the clues in that snapshot to learn the dance steps to determine where the dancers have been and where they are going.
sentences.chinese: 板块构造学的工作就是要揭示那快照的线索，了解它的舞步，确定舞蹈者曾去过和将要去哪里。

name: wonder
trans: 惊奇， 惊异； 奇迹， 奇事

sentences.english: What are they going to do now, I wonder ?
sentences.chinese: 我想知道，他们现在打算怎么办呢？

sentences.english: He’s been leaving work early a lot – it makes you wonder , doesn’t it?
sentences.chinese: 他最近经常提早下班——让人觉得奇怪，是不是？

detailed_translations.english: to think about something that you are not sure about and try to guess what is true, what will happen etc

name: mansion
trans: 公寓， 府邸； 大厦

sentences.english: a beautiful country mansion
sentences.chinese: 漂亮的乡村宅第

detailed_translations.english: a very large house

sentences.english: You have to practice and see the real gull, the good in every one of them, and to help them see it in themselves.
sentences.chinese: 你应该通过练习去认识真正的海鸥，要看到每只海鸥的美德，并帮助他们去认识自己的美德。

detailed_translations.english: a large common black and white sea bird that lives near the sea
to fool, cheat, or hoax

name: summary
trans: 概括的， 概要的； 即刻的， 立即的

sentences.english: A brief summary is given on a separate sheet.
sentences.chinese: 摘要另写一页。

sentences.english: It says torture and summary execution are common.
sentences.chinese: 据说酷刑和草草处决很常见。

detailed_translations.english: a short statement that gives the main information about something, without giving all the details
a summary report, statement etc gives the main facts in a report etc without any of the details or explanations

sentences.english: First impressions can often prove illusory.
sentences.chinese: 第一印象往往被证明是不真实的。

detailed_translations.english: false but seeming to be real or true

sentences.english: a nickel alloy
sentences.chinese: 镍合金

sentences.english: ...a large glass jar filled with pennies, nickels, dimes, and quarters.
sentences.chinese: …一个装满1分、5分、10分和25分硬币的大玻璃罐。

detailed_translations.english: a hard silver-white metal that is often combined with other metals, for example to make steel. It is a chemical element: symbol Ni

sentences.english: She tried to accustom herself to the tight bandages.
sentences.chinese: 她尝试着使自己习惯那些紧绷的绷带。

detailed_translations.english: to make yourself or another person become used to a situation or place

name: entail
trans: 牵涉； 使必要， 需要

sentences.english: A new computer system entails a lot of re-training.
sentences.chinese: 使用新的计算机系统需要大量的再培训。

sentences.english: Some foreign travel is entailed in the job.
sentences.chinese: 做这份工作有时要到国外出差。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使需要，必需；承担；遗传给；蕴含
detailed_translations.english: to involve something as a necessary part or result

name: inferior
trans: 劣等的，较差的；次要的；级别低的
下级， 下属， 晚辈

sentences.english: I felt very inferior among all those academics.
sentences.chinese: 与那些大学教师在一起，我自惭形秽。

sentences.english: wine of inferior quality
sentences.chinese: 劣质葡萄酒

sentences.english: inferior goods
sentences.chinese: 质量低劣的商品

detailed_translations.english: not good, or not as good as someone or something else
someone who has a lower position or rank than you in an organization

name: dramatic
trans: 戏剧的； 引人注目的； 突然的， 巨大的； 戏剧性的

sentences.english: A superb goal by Owen earned United a dramatic victory yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天欧文的一个超级入球为联队赢得了激动人心的胜利。

sentences.english: Some of the most dramatic events in American history happened here.
sentences.chinese: 美国历史上一些最震撼人心的事件发生在这里。

sentences.english: the dramatic scenery of the Grand Canyon
sentences.chinese: 大峡谷的壮丽景致

detailed_translations.chinese: 引人注目的， 激动人心的； 戏剧的
detailed_translations.english: exciting or impressive

detailed_translations.chinese: 古时的小型竖琴, 小型立式钢琴
detailed_translations.english: a small  upright piano

sentences.english: The male mosquito never stings.
sentences.chinese: 雄蚊不叮。

sentences.english: Are your mosquito bites still itching?
sentences.chinese: 你被蚊子咬的地方还痒吗?

sentences.english: The frog darted out its tongue to catch a mosquito.
sentences.chinese: 这只青蛙突然伸出舌头捕捉蚊子。

detailed_translations.english: a small flying insect that sucks the blood of people and animals, sometimes spreading the disease  malaria

sentences.english: Kangaroos harbour a vast range of parasites.
sentences.chinese: 袋鼠身上有各种各样的寄生虫。

detailed_translations.english: a plant or animal that lives on or in another plant or animal and gets food from it

name: artificial
trans: 人工的， 人造的， 假的； 矫揉造作的， 假装

sentences.english: artificial flowers
sentences.chinese: 假花

sentences.english: artificial light
sentences.chinese: 人造光

sentences.english: artificial fertilizers
sentences.chinese: 化肥

detailed_translations.english: not real or not made of natural things but made to be like something that is real or natural

sentences.english: They did blood tests on him for signs of vitamin deficiency.
sentences.chinese: 他们给他做了血检看是否有缺乏维生素的迹象。

sentences.english: There are deep deficiencies in this law.
sentences.chinese: 这条法律存在严重的缺陷。

detailed_translations.english: a lack of something that is necessary

name: imaginary
trans: 想象中的， 虚构的， 假想的

sentences.english: As she listened, she played an imaginary piano on her knees.
sentences.chinese: 她边听边在膝盖上作弹钢琴状。

sentences.english: We must protect older people from harm, whether it is real or imaginary.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须保护老人免受伤害，无论这伤害是真实的还是假想的。

detailed_translations.english: not real, but produced from pictures or ideas in your mind

name: removal
trans: 除去； 移动， 搬迁

sentences.english: the removal of rubbish
sentences.chinese: 移除垃圾

sentences.english: stain removal
sentences.chinese: 去污

detailed_translations.english: when something is taken away from, out of, or off the place where it is

sentences.english: Have you any comment to make about the cause of the disaster?
sentences.chinese: 你对发生灾难的原因有何评论？

sentences.english: The results are a clear comment on government education policy.
sentences.chinese: 这些结果是对政府教育政策明显的批评。

detailed_translations.english: an opinion that you express about someone or something

sentences.english: The benzene vaporized and formed a huge cloud of gas.
sentences.chinese: 苯蒸发形成了一大团气体。

detailed_translations.english: to change into a vapour, or to make something, especially a liquid, do this

sentences.english: The desire for peace transcended political differences.
sentences.chinese: 对和平的渴望超越了政治分歧。

detailed_translations.english: to go beyond the usual limits of something

name: spiny
trans: 长满刺的， 多刺的， 带刺的； 棘手的

sentences.english: spiny sea urchins
sentences.chinese: 多刺的海胆

sentences.english: spiny bushes
sentences.chinese: 多刺的灌木丛

detailed_translations.english: a spiny animal or plant has lots of stiff sharp points

name: chronological
trans: 按年代顺序排列的， 年代学的

sentences.english: We arranged the documents in chronological order .
sentences.chinese: 我们把这些文件按时序排列。

detailed_translations.chinese: 按年代顺序排列的；依时间前后排列而记载的
detailed_translations.english: arranged according to when things happened or were made

name: humanitarian
trans: 人道主义者， 博爱者， 慈善家

sentences.english: And on each of those issues we have said that we would consider that and, in fact, have provided some humanitarian support.
sentences.chinese: 对于每一件这样的事情，我们都说过，我们将会对此进行考虑，事实上，我们向他们提供了人道主义援助。

sentences.english: But part of trying to do what is right for the Burmese people is to provide humanitarian assistance in this time of extreme need.
sentences.chinese: 但是，对缅甸人民来说，正确的行动部分是为他们提供人道主义援助，而在目前这个时刻更是极端的需要”。

sentences.english: But otherwise, it is best left to the humanitarian experts, who will be there after you are gone and therefore need to preserve their independence and their impartiality.
sentences.chinese: 但是，如果不能，最好将这些任务留给人道主义专家，这些专家在部队撤退之后仍将留在那，因此需要保持他们的独立和公正。

sentences.english: The factory employs over 2,000 people.
sentences.chinese: 这家工厂雇用了2,000多名员工。

sentences.english: The report examines teaching methods employed in the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 这个报告探讨了课堂教学方法。

sentences.english: Her days are employed in gardening and voluntary work.
sentences.chinese: 她的时间都花在搞园艺和做义工上。

detailed_translations.english: to pay someone to work for you

name: surcharge
trans: 额外费用，增收费，附加费

sentences.english: No person shall prior to leaving the paid area fail or refuse to pay any fare surcharge or other sum leviable in accordance with these by-laws .
sentences.chinese: 任何人不得在未付或拒付按照本附例可征收的任何车费、附加费或其它款项情况下离开已付车费区域。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone pay an additional amount of money
money that you have to pay in addition to the basic price of something

name: sturdy
trans: 健壮的， 结实的； 稳固的； 顽强的

sentences.english: That chair doesn’t look very sturdy.
sentences.chinese: 那把椅子看上去不太结实。

sentences.english: They kept up a sturdy opposition to the plan.
sentences.chinese: 他们一直坚决反对那项计划。

detailed_translations.english: (of an object) strong and not easily damaged

sentences.english: the fable of the fox and the crow
sentences.chinese: 狐狸和乌鸦的寓言故事

detailed_translations.english: a traditional short story that teaches a moral lesson, especially a story about animals

name: balcony
trans: 阳台； 楼厅， 楼座

sentences.english: Has your flat got a balcony?
sentences.chinese: 你的公寓有阳台吗？

detailed_translations.english: a structure that you can stand on, that is attached to the outside wall of a building, above ground level

name: instill
trans: 慢慢灌输； 逐渐培养

sentences.english: We must instill a sense of duty in our children.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须在我们的孩子当中灌输一种责任感。

sentences.english: I aim to instill in them the pleasure of giving.
sentences.chinese: 我的目的在于灌输给他们给予的乐趣。

name: consist
trans: 在于， 存在于； 由…组成， 由…构成

sentences.english: My diet consisted almost exclusively of chocolate-covered cookies and glasses of milk.
sentences.chinese: 我的饮食几乎只包含裹上巧克力的曲奇饼和一杯杯牛奶。

detailed_translations.chinese: 由…组成； 在于； 一致

name: palatable
trans: 美味的， 可口的； 合意的， 认可的

sentences.english: a very palatable wine
sentences.chinese: 口感极佳的酒

detailed_translations.english: palatable food or drink has a pleasant or acceptable taste

name: compatible
trans: 协调的， 一致的； 兼容的； 能和睦相处的

sentences.english: The new software is IBM compatible (= can be used with IBM computers ) .
sentences.chinese: 这个新软件与IBM的计算机兼容。

detailed_translations.english: if two pieces of computer equipment are compatible, they can be used together, especially when they are made by different companies

name: critic
trans: 评论家， 批评家； 吹毛求疵者

sentences.english: Mather was a film critic for many years.
sentences.chinese: 马瑟做过多年的电影评论家。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to make judgments about the good and bad qualities of art, music, films etc

sentences.english: ...streets of low-cost tenements.
sentences.chinese: …低成本旧式公寓街。

detailed_translations.english: a large building divided into apartments, especially in the poorer areas of a city

sentences.english: It has at least one gene necessary for photosynthesis—so far it’s the only animal known with this ability.
sentences.chinese: 它有至少一个基因是光合作用所必需的——到目前为止这是唯一被发现具有此项能力的动物。

sentences.english: The belt of vegetation that crosses Africa below the Sahara is very dark because most of the sunlight is absorbed by plants for photosynthesis.
sentences.chinese: 在撒哈拉沙漠下方，横贯非洲中部的植被带颜色非常深，因为植物由于光合作用吸收了大多数太阳光。

sentences.english: As the ocean warms, it becomes more stratified, with the warmer water remaining at the top where the organisms need to be in order to do photosynthesis.
sentences.chinese: 但是随着海水变暖，它的层次会更加分明，温度更高的海水会停留在表面，而这里正是生物体进行光合作用必需的地方。

detailed_translations.english: the production by a green plant of special substances like sugar that it uses as food, caused by the action of sunlight on  chlorophyll (= the green substance in leaves )
a separate part of something such as a newspaper article where extra information is given

sentences.english: exotic birds with colourful crests
sentences.chinese: 羽冠鲜艳多彩的珍禽

detailed_translations.english: the top or highest point of something such as a hill or a wave
to reach the top of a hill or mountain

name: profession
trans: 职业； 同行； 专业； 宣称

sentences.english: people who work in the professions
sentences.chinese: 从事专业性工作的人

sentences.english: nurses, social workers, and other people in the caring professions
sentences.chinese: 护士、社工和其他从事护理行业的人

detailed_translations.english: a job that needs a high level of education and training

name: deplore
trans: 悲叹， 哀叹， 公开谴责

sentences.english: The UN deplored the invasion as a ‘violation of international law’.
sentences.chinese: 联合国谴责这次入侵 “违反了国际法” 。

detailed_translations.chinese: 谴责；悲悼；哀叹；对…深感遗憾
detailed_translations.english: to disapprove of something very strongly and criticize it severely, especially publicly

name: compress
trans: 压缩； 缩短； 浓缩

sentences.english: Light silk is best for parachutes, as it compresses well and then expands rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 轻质丝绸最适合制作降落伞，因为这种面料便于压缩，而且展开迅速。

sentences.english: Isobel nodded, her lips compressed.
sentences.chinese: 伊索贝尔紧闭着双唇点了点头。

sentences.english: The miners used rock drills and compressed air to drive through hard rock.
sentences.chinese: 矿工使用钻岩机和压缩空气来凿穿坚硬的岩石。

detailed_translations.english: to press something or make it smaller so that it takes up less space, or to become smaller
a small thick piece of material that you put on part of someone’s body to stop blood flowing out or to make it less painful

name: grimly
trans: 冷酷地； 严肃地； 坚定地

sentences.english: I have exercised like this — obsessively, a bit grimly — for years, but recently I began to wonder: Why am I doing this?
sentences.chinese: 我痴迷得有点冷酷地这样锻炼了几年，可是，最近我开始疑惑：我为什么要这么做？

sentences.english: Others more grimly said they saw bodies in the streets that they could not retrieve.
sentences.chinese: 其他人更冷酷地说他们看见了街上没来得及收的尸体。

name: cherish
trans: 爱护， 珍爱； 怀有， 抱有

sentences.english: In marriage, a man promises to cherish his wife.
sentences.chinese: 在婚姻中，男人承诺要爱护妻子。

sentences.english: his most cherished possession
sentences.chinese: 他最珍爱的物品

detailed_translations.english: to love someone or something very much and take care of them well

sentences.english: She outlived her husband by 20 years.
sentences.chinese: 她比她丈夫多活了20年。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比…活得长；比…经久；经受住；渡过…而存在
detailed_translations.english: to remain alive after someone else has died

name: patronize
trans: 以高人一等的态度对待； 光顾； 赞助， 资助

sentences.english: Don’t patronize me!
sentences.chinese: 别对我摆出一副纡尊降贵的样子！

sentences.english: The program focuses on kids’ interests without patronizing them.
sentences.chinese: 该节目以平等的态度关注孩子们的兴趣。

detailed_translations.chinese: 以高人一等的态度对待； 光顾； 赞助， 资助
detailed_translations.english: to talk to someone in a way which seems friendly but shows that you think they are not as intelligent or do not know as much as you

sentences.english: an eminent lawyer
sentences.chinese: 杰出的律师

detailed_translations.english: an eminent person is famous, important, and respected

sentences.english: He got out of the car and looked underneath.
sentences.chinese: 他下车往底下看了看。

sentences.english: It’s near where the railway goes underneath the road.
sentences.chinese: 它靠近铁路从公路下方穿过的地方。

sentences.english: She was wearing a smart jacket with a T-shirt underneath.
sentences.chinese: 她穿了件时髦的夹克，里面是一件 T 恤衫。

sentences.english: Her blonde hair was hidden underneath a baseball cap.
sentences.chinese: 一顶棒球帽裹住了她的满头金发。

sentences.english: He has on his jeans and a long-sleeved blue denim shirt with a white T-shirt underneath.
sentences.chinese: 他身穿牛仔裤和一件蓝色长袖粗斜纹棉布衬衫，里面还有件白色T恤衫。

sentences.english: The shooting-range is lit from underneath by rows of ruby-red light fixtures.
sentences.chinese: 射击场被一排排宝石红照明装置从下面照亮。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在…的下面；在…的形式下；在…的支配下
detailed_translations.english: directly under another object or covered by it
Underneath is also an adverb
the bottom surface of something, or the part of something that is below or under something else

name: spectrum
trans: 谱， 光谱， 频谱； 范围， 幅度

sentences.english: The two articles here represent opposite ends of the spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 这里的两篇文章代表了两个极端的观点。

sentences.english: the electromagnetic spectrum
sentences.chinese: 电磁（波）谱

detailed_translations.english: a complete range of opinions, people, situations etc, going from one extreme to its opposite

sentences.english: I was trying to think of some way to prolong the conversation.
sentences.chinese: 我在想方设法拖长这次谈话。

detailed_translations.english: to deliberately make something such as a feeling or an activity last longer

sentences.english: They refused to give me a refund .
sentences.chinese: 他们拒绝给我退款。

sentences.english: Return your purchase within 14 days for a full refund .
sentences.chinese: 14 天之内退货可以全额退款。

sentences.english: You should go down there and demand a refund.
sentences.chinese: 你应该到那里去，要求退款。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that is given back to you if you are not satisfied with the goods or services that you have paid for
to give someone their money back, especially because they are not satisfied with the goods or services they have paid for

name: distress
trans: 痛苦，忧伤；贫困，窘迫；遇难
使痛苦， 使悲伤， 使忧虑

sentences.english: The dream had distressed her greatly.
sentences.chinese: 这场梦使她深感不安。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel very upset

name: remnant
trans: 残余物； 布头； 遗迹

sentences.english: Beneath the present church were remnants of Roman flooring.
sentences.chinese: 在目前的这座教堂下面还有残余的古罗马地板。

detailed_translations.english: a small part of something that remains after the rest of it has been used, destroyed, or eaten

sentences.english: The interview was broadcast live across Europe.
sentences.chinese: 这次采访向整个欧洲进行了现场直播。

detailed_translations.chinese: 播送，播放；（无线电或电视）广播；播撒（种子）
detailed_translations.english: to send out radio or television programmes
a programme on the radio or on television

sentences.english: compressible, since text files such as SQL or properties are highly redundant
sentences.chinese: 可压缩，因为文本文件，如SQL或配置文件压缩率很高

sentences.english: But plain old bzip2 on the original XML file does 11 bytes better at generating a compressible structure than do my attempts.
sentences.chinese: 原始 XML 文件上普通的旧 bzip2 在生成可压缩的结构上比我的尝试好 11 个字节。

sentences.english: The second technique is to take advantage of the very specific structure of XML documents to produce more compressible representations.
sentences.chinese: 第二种技术是利用 XML 文档非常特定的结构生成更 可压缩的表示。

name: steep
trans: 陡的，陡峭的；急剧的；过高的

sentences.english: The road became rocky and steep.
sentences.chinese: 路变得崎岖陡峭起来。

sentences.english: a steep climb to the top
sentences.chinese: 到山顶的一段陡坡

sentences.english: steep cuts in benefits
sentences.chinese: 救济金的大幅度削减

detailed_translations.english: a road, hill etc that is steep slopes at a high angle

sentences.english: the classical theory of relativity
sentences.chinese: 经典相对论

detailed_translations.english: belonging to a traditional style or set of ideas

name: immunity
trans: 免疫力； 保护； 免除， 豁免

sentences.english: To protect you against small pox or diphtheria, you are vaccinated with a small amount of the toxin, and then your body develops immunity against that toxin.
sentences.chinese: 为了避免你长小脓包或得白喉病，所以会给你的身体接种小量毒素，然后你的身体会针对这些毒素产生免疫力。

sentences.english: Very few people will have any immunity to this particular combination, which is what gives the concern that this will be a pandemic rather than just a normal seasonal flu outbreak.
sentences.chinese: 因为很少有人具备对这种特别的混合病毒的免疫力。 人们因此担心，这将不仅仅是正常的季节性流感疫情，而是一次传染病的大流行。

sentences.english: But a new study shows that people with true expertise in a subject have some immunity to the siren song of corporate sponsorship.
sentences.chinese: 一项新的研究发现，在某一方面有真才实学的人们对广告赞助商的“糖衣炮弹”有一定的免疫力。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being immune to a disease

name: privilege
trans: 特权， 特殊待遇； 特殊利益， 优惠； 荣耀， 荣幸

sentences.english: He had no special privileges and was treated just like every other prisoner.
sentences.chinese: 他不享受特权，待遇和任何其他犯人一样。

detailed_translations.english: a special advantage that is given only to one person or group of people

name: shroud
trans: 裹尸布， 寿衣； 遮蔽物

sentences.english: The fog rolled in, and a grey shroud covered the city.
sentences.chinese: 大雾滚滚而来，一张灰色的天幕笼罩着这个城市。

detailed_translations.chinese: 寿衣；覆盖物；船的横桅索；[电] 护罩
detailed_translations.english: a cloth that is wrapped around a dead person’s body before it is buried
to cover or hide something

sentences.english: Germany brought on a substitute at half time.
sentences.chinese: 德国队在比赛半场时换上一名替补队员。

sentences.english: substitute goalkeeper
sentences.chinese: 替补守门员

detailed_translations.english: someone who does someone else’s job for a limited period of time, especially in a sports team or school
to use something new or diffe-rent instead of something else

name: criss-cross
trans: 构成十字形图案；交叉往来

sentences.english: They criss-crossed the country by bus.
sentences.chinese: 他们乘坐公共汽车在乡间交叉往返。

sentences.english: Slash the tops of the loaves with a serrated knife in a criss-cross pattern.
sentences.chinese: 用一把锯齿刀把面包顶部切成十字交叉状。

detailed_translations.chinese: 构成十字形图案；交叉往来
detailed_translations.english: If a person or thing criss-crosses an area, they travel from one side to the other and back again many times, following different routes. If a number of things criss-cross an area, they cross it, and cross over each other.
A criss-cross pattern or design consists of lines crossing each other

sentences.english: Grade A eggs must be of uniform size.
sentences.chinese: A 级鸡蛋必须大小相同。

detailed_translations.chinese: 统一的；一致的；相同的；均衡的；始终如一的
detailed_translations.english: being the same in all its parts or among all its members
a particular type of clothing worn by all the members of a group or organization such as the police, the army etc

name: choppy
trans: 波浪起伏的， 不平静的； 不连贯的， 支离破碎的

sentences.english: The small boat bobbed about on the choppy water.
sentences.chinese: 小船在波浪起伏的水面上颠簸。

detailed_translations.chinese: 波涛汹涌的；波浪起伏的；不断改变方向的
detailed_translations.english: choppy water has a lot of waves and is not smooth to sail on

name: blaze
trans: 燃烧， 着火； 发光， 放光彩； 怒视
火焰；光辉，强烈的光；迸发

sentences.english: Some 4,000 firefighters are battling the blaze.
sentences.chinese: 约有四千名消防人员正在与大火搏斗。

sentences.english: the blaze of light from the security lamps
sentences.chinese: 安全灯的强光

sentences.english: The room was warm, with a fire blazing in the hearth.
sentences.chinese: 房间里暖融融的，壁炉里的火熊熊燃烧。

detailed_translations.english: a big dangerous fire – used especially in news reports
to burn very brightly and strongly

name: bountiful
trans: 慷慨的； 大量的， 充足的

sentences.english: bountiful harvests
sentences.chinese: 大丰收

detailed_translations.english: if something is bountiful, there is more than enough of it

name: meager
trans: 不足的， 贫乏的； 消瘦的

sentences.english: His meager wage is not enough to support their five children.
sentences.chinese: 靠他一个人的微薄工资不足以养活他们的五个孩子。

sentences.english: Do you think those savings are meager, or not worth the effort?
sentences.chinese: 你认为这些节省的开支是微薄的，或者是不值得努力获得的吗？

sentences.english: It was medieval European monks who introduced scientific brewing techniques in an effort to produce a nutritious beverage to supplement their meager diets.
sentences.chinese: 正是中世纪欧洲的僧侣们引进科学的啤酒酿造技术，制造有营养的饮料， 从而补充了他们贫乏的饮食。

name: scatter
trans: 使分散， 驱散， 散开； 撒播

sentences.english: The sound of gunfire made the crowd scatter in all directions.
sentences.chinese: 枪声使人群四散奔逃。

detailed_translations.english: if a group of people or animals scatter, or if something scatters them, they move quickly in different directions

name: violate
trans: 违反， 违背； 亵渎； 侵犯， 干扰

sentences.english: 34 protesters were arrested for violating criminal law.
sentences.chinese: 34名抗议者因违反刑法而被逮捕。

sentences.english: regimes that violate human rights
sentences.chinese: 侵犯人权的政权

detailed_translations.english: to disobey or do something against an official agreement, law, principle etc

sentences.english: ...so-called alternative fuels such as ethanol and methanol.
