sentences.chinese: ...诸如乙醇和甲醇的所谓替代燃料。

detailed_translations.english: a type of poisonous alcohol that can be made from wood

sentences.english: He was steering with only one hand.
sentences.chinese: 他只用一只手在驾驶。

detailed_translations.english: to control the direction a vehicle is going, for example by turning a wheel

sentences.english: Effect on the controlling oriental tobacco budworm , Helicoverpa assulta by using sex pheromone.
sentences.chinese: 与用性信息素诱剂防治烟青虫的效果>>相似的文献。

sentences.english: And when neighboring fruits sense this pheromone, they ripen faster, so that all fruits mature at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 当周围植物感测到这种信息素时，它们会更快成熟，而所有的水果就能同时成熟了。

sentences.english: Honeybee is polyandry and eusocial-insect that they produce by colony fission and swarming who communicate with dancing and pheromone.
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂是多雄性真社会性昆虫，分蜂是这个庞大家族繁衍的重要手段，它们通过信息素和蜂舞来传递信息。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical that is produced by people’s and animals’ bodies and is thought to influence the behaviour of other people or animals

sentences.english: a collective decision made by all board members
sentences.chinese: 董事会所有成员作出的集体决定

sentences.english: our collective responsibility for the environment
sentences.chinese: 我们对环境的共同责任

detailed_translations.english: shared or made by every member of a group or society

name: buddy
trans: 密友； 搭档， 伙伴

sentences.english: We’re good buddies.
sentences.chinese: 我们是好朋友。

detailed_translations.chinese: 伙伴，好朋友；密友；小男孩
detailed_translations.english: a friend

sentences.english: The country has undergone massive changes recently.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家最近经历了巨大的变化。

sentences.english: He has been released from prison to undergo medical treatment in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 他获释出狱去美国接受治疗。

sentences.english: She has been undergoing tests since Monday.
sentences.chinese: 她从星期一开始一直在接受各种检查。

sentences.english: Teachers should be expected to undergo mid-career training and development.
sentences.chinese: 教师应该参加中期职业培训和发展活动。

detailed_translations.english: if you undergo a change, an unpleasant experience etc, it happens to you or is done to you

name: outlying
trans: 边远的， 偏僻的； 无关的， 题外的

sentences.english: one of the outlying suburbs
sentences.chinese: 边远郊区之一

detailed_translations.english: far from the centre of a city, town etc or from a main building

detailed_translations.chinese: 放在…外面；在撒谎上胜过（outlie的ing形式）

name: delineate
trans: 描绘， 描述； 解释

sentences.english: Biography must to some extent delineate characters.
sentences.chinese: 在某种程度上，传记一定要描述人物。

detailed_translations.english: If you delineate something such as an idea or situation, you describe it or define it, often in a lot of detail

name: agency
trans: 代理处， 经销机构； 专门机构

sentences.english: a UN agency responsible for helping refugees
sentences.chinese: 负责为难民提供帮助的联合国机构

sentences.english: the Environmental Protection Agency
sentences.chinese: 环保局

detailed_translations.english: an organization or department, especially within a government, that does a specific job

name: coupon
trans: 礼券， 优惠券； 配给券， 票证

sentences.english: The coupon entitles you to ten cents off your next purchase.
sentences.chinese: 这张优惠券可以让你在下次购物时节省10分钱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 息票；赠券；联票；[经] 配给券
detailed_translations.english: a small piece of printed paper that gives you the right to pay less for something or get something free

name: multitude
trans: 大量， 众多； 群众， 民众； 人群

sentences.english: I had never seen such a multitude of stars before.
sentences.chinese: 我以前从未见过这么多的星星。

sentences.english: a multitude of possible interpretations
sentences.chinese: 种种可能的解释

detailed_translations.english: a very large number of people or things

sentences.english: The woods are inhabited by many wild animals.
sentences.chinese: 很多野生动物栖居在这片森林里。

sentences.english: inhabited islands
sentences.chinese: 有人居住的岛屿

detailed_translations.english: if animals or people inhabit an area or place, they live there

name: innate
trans: 天生的， 固有的； 内在的， 直觉的

sentences.english: Children have an innate ability to learn language.
sentences.chinese: 儿童学习语言的能力是与生俱来的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 先天的；固有的；与生俱来的
detailed_translations.english: an innate quality or ability is something you are born with

name: siege
trans: 包围， 围困； 封锁

sentences.english: The siege lasted almost four months.
sentences.chinese: 这次封锁历时近四个月。

sentences.english: a three-day police siege at a remote country cottage
sentences.chinese: 警方对一座偏僻村舍历时三天的包围

detailed_translations.chinese: 围攻；包围；围城；不断袭击；长期努力
detailed_translations.english: a situation in which an army or the police surround a place and try to gain control of it or force someone to come out of it

name: gratify
trans: 使满意， 使高兴； 满足

sentences.english: He was gratified by Lucy’s response.
sentences.chinese: 他对露西的回答很满意。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel pleased and satisfied

sentences.english: a fascinating book
sentences.chinese: 一本引人入胜的书

sentences.english: That sounds absolutely fascinating .
sentences.chinese: 那听起来极具吸引力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 迷人的， 有极大吸引力的
detailed_translations.english: extremely interesting

sentences.english: By the age of seven, children are capable of thinking in abstract terms .
sentences.chinese: 儿童到了七岁就具有抽象思维的能力。

sentences.english: Human beings are the only creatures capable of abstract thought (=  thinking about ideas  ) .
sentences.chinese: 人类是唯一具有抽象思维能力的动物。

detailed_translations.english: based on general ideas or principles rather than specific examples or real events

detailed_translations.chinese: 摘要，梗概；抽象派艺术作品
detailed_translations.english: a painting, design etc which contains shapes or images that do not look like real things or people

sentences.english: The Republicans have stuck to their conservative agenda.
sentences.chinese: 共和党人坚持自己的保守议题。

detailed_translations.chinese: 议程；日常工作事项；日程表
detailed_translations.english: a list of problems or subjects that a government, organization etc is planning to deal with

name: liquid

trans: 匿名的， 不具名的； 无特色的， 无个性特征的

detailed_translations.english: to make something seem real in order to deceive people

sentences.english: The United States was working to desegregate the military, schools, and all public facilities.
sentences.chinese: 美国当时正在着手废除对军队、学校和所有公共设施实施的种族隔离。

sentences.chinese: 听着，当你开始觉得虚弱的时候，就对自己说：‘我像 钢梁 一样强壮’。

sentences.chinese: 一名工人在建筑工地的钢梁上散步，摄于2011年5月5日江苏省南京市。

sentences.english: You’re very lucky to have perfect teeth.

sentences.english: a perfect performance

sentences.chinese: 她更喜欢喝黑咖啡。

trans: 天文学的； 极大的， 庞大的

sentences.english: He ascribed his failure to bad luck.

to push a boat along in the water using a pole

sentences.chinese: 巴黎的诱惑与魅力吸引了所有到此游玩的人。

sentences.chinese: 它的诱惑与魅力吸引了所有到那游玩的人。

sentences.chinese: 欧洲航空公司的航班每逢周二从盖特威克机场起飞。

sentences.chinese: 大片大片的林地

sentences.chinese: 他说一切金属都是由水银和硫黄按不同比例构成的。

sentences.chinese: 他们每天在这种危险的环境下工作很长时间，从带有水银的泥沙中淘出金沙。

sentences.chinese: 因为玻璃水银温度计对于人类和环境都有害处，现在已经逐步被淘汰不再建议使用了。

sentences.english: talcum powder
sentences.chinese: 滑石[爽身]粉

sentences.chinese: 把糖碾成粉末。

sentences.chinese: 美国授予了二战期间的英国首相温斯顿·丘吉尔爵士荣誉公民的称号。

sentences.chinese: 希拉的所有收入总计为10万英镑。

sentences.chinese: 她绝不会放弃自己的素食主义原则。

sentences.chinese: 车上有大片锈斑。

sentences.chinese: 金属开始生锈。

name: trace
trans: 查出，找到；追溯；探索；描摹；追述
痕迹； 微量， 少许； 扫描线

sentences.english: There was no trace of anyone having entered the room since then.
sentences.chinese: 没有任何迹象表明在那以后有人进过这房间。

sentences.chinese: 彼得拉已完全没有德国口音。

sentences.chinese: 警察未能找到毒品的蛛丝马迹。

sentences.chinese: 我看到桑德拉的脸上闪过一丝微笑。

sentences.english: We finally traced him to an address in Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 我们终于追查到他在芝加哥的一个地址。

to find or discover sb/sth by looking carefully for them/it

trans: 非写实的； 程式化的

sentences.chinese: 用非写实手法画的太阳

name: array
trans: 布置， 排列； 部署

sentences.chinese: 盥洗台上摆放整齐的化妆品

sentences.chinese: 我们参观了当地的市场，看到了漂亮地摆放着的水果蔬菜。

sentences.english: The government is doing everything possible to combat terrorism .
sentences.chinese: 政府正在尽其所能打击恐怖主义。

trans: 被提名者， 被任命者

sentences.chinese: 民主党被提名的总统候选人

detailed_translations.english: someone who has been officially suggested for an important position, duty, or prize

sentences.english: Under federal law, it is illegal to discriminate against minorities and women.
sentences.chinese: 联邦法律规定，歧视少数民族和妇女是违法的。

sentences.english: He is incapable of discriminating between a good idea and a terrible one.
sentences.chinese: 他没能力在一个好主意和一个坏主意之间进行区分。

detailed_translations.english: to treat a person or group differently from another in an unfair way

sentences.english: soldiers learning camouflage technique
sentences.chinese: 在学习伪装技术的士兵

sentences.english: the camouflage netting over the tanks
sentences.chinese: 坦克上的伪装网

detailed_translations.english: a way of hiding something, especially soldiers and military equipment, by using paint, leaves etc to make it look like the things around it
to hide something, especially by making it look the same as the things around it, or by making it seem like something else

sentences.english: Police have been tracking the four criminals all over Central America.
sentences.chinese: 警方一直在中美洲到处追捕这四名罪犯。

detailed_translations.english: to search for a person or animal by following the marks they leave behind them on the ground, their smell etc
a line of marks left on the ground by a moving person, animal, or vehicle

sentences.english: Any annex is the integral part of this contract.
sentences.chinese: 本合同一切附件均为本合同的有效组成部分。

detailed_translations.english: to take control of a country or area next to your own, especially by using force

sentences.english: She seemed enslaved by hatred.
sentences.chinese: 她似乎被仇恨所左右。

detailed_translations.chinese: 束缚；征服；使某人成为奴隶
detailed_translations.english: to make someone a slave

sentences.english: The centennial Olympics was in Atlanta, Georgia.
sentences.chinese: 奥运会百年庆典在乔治亚州的亚特兰大举行。

detailed_translations.english: The centennial of an event such as someone's birth is the 100th anniversary of that event

sentences.english: the government’s tight monetary policy
sentences.chinese: 政府从紧的货币政策

sentences.english: objects of little monetary value
sentences.chinese: 不值钱的物件

detailed_translations.english: relating to money, especially all the money in a particular country

name: rush
trans: 冲，突进；奔，急速流动；仓促从事；突袭

sentences.english: A small girl rushed past her.
sentences.chinese: 一个小女孩从她身边匆匆经过。

sentences.english: Mo rushed off down the corridor.
sentences.chinese: 莫匆匆走过走廊。

detailed_translations.english: to move very quickly, especially because you need to be somewhere very soon
to do or decide something too quickly, especially so that you do not have time to do it carefully or well

name: demolish
trans: 拆除； 破坏； 驳倒， 推翻

sentences.english: The entire east wing of the building was demolished in the fire.
sentences.chinese: 大楼的整个东翼都被大火烧毁了。

detailed_translations.english: to completely destroy a building

name: shellfish
trans: 贝类， 有壳的水生动物

sentences.english: Fish and shellfish are the specialties.
sentences.chinese: 鱼和甲壳类水生动物是特产。

detailed_translations.chinese: 甲壳类动物；贝类等有壳的水生动物
detailed_translations.english: an animal that lives in water, has a shell, and can be eaten as food, for example  crab s  ,  lobster s  , and  oyster s

name: trade
trans: 交易， 买卖； 互相交换
贸易，商业；交易；职业，行业

sentences.english: They had to travel into town to trade the produce from their farm.
sentences.chinese: 他们不得不到镇上去出售他们农场的产品。

sentences.english: We traded necklaces.
sentences.chinese: 我们交换了项链。

detailed_translations.english: to buy and sell goods, services etc as your job or business

name: gush
trans: 喷出， 涌出； 迸发， 发作

sentences.english: All that pent-up frustration gushed out in a torrent of abuse.
sentences.chinese: 所有压抑着的失望与不快通过一阵痛骂全都发泄了出来。

detailed_translations.english: if words or emotions gush out, you suddenly express them very strongly
a large quantity of something, usually a liquid, that suddenly pours out of something

name: derivation
trans: 起源， 发源； 派生

sentences.english: The derivation of its name is obscure.
sentences.chinese: 它名字的根源起源鲜为人知。

detailed_translations.english: the origin of something, especially a word

sentences.english: Factory chimneys spewed fumes out into the sky.
sentences.chinese: 工厂的烟囱向空中喷吐浓烟。

detailed_translations.english: to flow out of something quickly in large quantities, or to make something flow out in this way

sentences.english: a comic novel
sentences.chinese: 滑稽小说

detailed_translations.english: amusing you and making you want to laugh

detailed_translations.chinese: 连环漫画；喜剧演员；滑稽人物
detailed_translations.english: a magazine for children that tells a story using comic strips

name: weave
trans: 迂回行进；编织；编造，编纂

sentences.english: hand-woven scarves
sentences.chinese: 手织围巾

sentences.english: Only a few of the women still weave.
sentences.chinese: 只有数量很少的妇女还在编织。

sentences.english: traditional basket weaving
sentences.chinese: 传统的编篮技术

detailed_translations.chinese: 迂回行进；编织；编造，编纂
detailed_translations.english: to make cloth, a carpet, a basket etc by crossing threads or thin pieces under and over each other by hand or on a loom
the way in which a material is woven, and the pattern formed by this

sentences.english: The journey normally takes about two hours.
sentences.chinese: 这段旅程通常需要大约两小时。

sentences.english: Normally, I park behind the theatre.
sentences.chinese: 通常我把车停在剧院后面。

sentences.english: The system seems to be working normally now.
sentences.chinese: 目前该系统似乎运行正常。

detailed_translations.english: usually

sentences.english: The governor gave only a vague outline of his tax plan.
sentences.chinese: 州长只是含糊地大致说了一下他的税务计划。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不明确的； 含糊的； 暧昧的
detailed_translations.english: unclear because someone does not give enough detailed information or does not say exactly what they mean

sentences.english: It is unlikely that the marine industry will fare any better in September.
sentences.chinese: 海运业不大可能在9月份有所好转。

detailed_translations.english: If you say that someone or something fares well or badly, you are referring to the degree of success they achieve in a particular situation or activity
the price you pay to travel somewhere by bus, train, plane etc

sentences.english: A juridical precedent is nothing but "authenticated custom".
sentences.chinese: 司法惯例只不过是“权威的惯例”罢了。

sentences.english: Yet each country has its own juridical protection system for such nonage criminals since they belong to a special group of legal person.
sentences.chinese: 未成年人属于特殊的法律主体，在处理未成年人违法犯罪问题时须依据司法保护制度进行。

sentences.english: These revolt methods bring the cost on the economy, juridical risk to them, also bring the risk of politics.
sentences.chinese: 农民的这些抗争方式既给他们带来经济上的代价、法律上的风险，同时也带来政治上的风险。

detailed_translations.english: relating to judges or the law

name: ephemeral
trans: 短暂的， 转瞬即逝的

sentences.english: Fashion is by nature ephemeral.
sentences.chinese: 从本质上说，时尚不过是一时的潮流。

detailed_translations.english: existing or popular for only a short time

sentences.english: He passes the ball with unerring accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 他传球准确无误。

sentences.english: They questioned the accuracy of the information in the file.
sentences.chinese: 他们怀疑档案中信息的正确性。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being exact or correct; the ability to do sth skilfully without making mistakes

sentences.english: We were taught how to curtsy to the Queen.
sentences.chinese: 有人教我们如何向女王行屈膝礼。

sentences.english: She gave a curtsy.
sentences.chinese: 她行了个屈膝礼。

detailed_translations.english: if a woman curtsies, she bends her knees with one foot in front of the other as a sign of respect for an important person
Curtsy is also a noun

name: setting
trans: 环境； 背景； 布景； 曲； 底座， 底板

sentences.english: I’ve worked with children in various settings, mainly in secondary school.
sentences.chinese: 我在许多地方教过孩子，主要是在中学。

sentences.english: The heating system was already on its highest setting.
sentences.chinese: 取暖系统已经调到了最高挡。

detailed_translations.english: the place where something is or where something happens, and the general environment

name: score
trans: 得分， 分数； 乐谱； 抓痕， 划痕； 二十

sentences.english: At half-time the score was one all.
sentences.chinese: 半场时的比分是一比一。

sentences.english: What’s the score?
sentences.chinese: 比分是多少？

sentences.english: Is anybody keeping score (= making a record of the score ) ?
sentences.chinese: 有没有人负责记分？

sentences.english: The final score was Southampton two, Leeds United nil.
sentences.chinese: 最后的比分是二比零，南安普敦队击败利兹联队。

sentences.english: The school’s test scores have not improved.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校的考试成绩没有提高。

detailed_translations.english: the number of points that each team or player has won in a game or competition

sentences.english: He quoted a short passage from the Bible.
sentences.chinese: 他引用了《圣经》里的一小段。

sentences.english: A military spokesman was quoted as saying that the border area is now safe.
sentences.chinese: 报道引述军方一位发言人的话，说边境地区现在很安全。

sentences.english: They quoted a price of £15,000.
sentences.chinese: 他们报价1.5万英镑。

detailed_translations.english: to repeat exactly what someone else has said or written

name: unanimous
trans: 全体一致的， 一致同意的

sentences.english: It was decided by a unanimous vote that the school should close.
sentences.chinese: 关闭学校是大家一致通过的决定。

sentences.english: The decision to appoint Matt was almost unanimous.
sentences.chinese: 任命马特的决定几乎是一致通过的。

detailed_translations.english: a unanimous decision, vote, agreement etc is one in which all the people involved agree

name: quota
trans: 配额， 限额， 定额

sentences.english: The government has decided to scrap quotas on car imports.
sentences.chinese: 政府决定取消汽车进口配额。

sentences.english: There are plans to introduce strict immigration quotas.
sentences.chinese: 有计划要推行严格的移民限额制度。

detailed_translations.english: an official limit on the number or amount of something that is allowed in a particular period

name: scorn
trans: 轻蔑， 鄙视； 不屑于

sentences.english: Researchers greeted the proposal with scorn.
sentences.chinese: 研究者们对这个提议报以轻蔑的态度。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that someone or something is stupid or does not deserve respect

detailed_translations.chinese: 轻蔑， 鄙视； 拒绝， 不屑
detailed_translations.english: to show that you think that something is stupid, unreasonable, or not worth accepting

name: thermal
trans: 热的，热量的；保暖的，防寒的

sentences.english: thermal energy
sentences.chinese: 热能

detailed_translations.english: relating to or caused by heat
a rising current of warm air used by birds

sentences.english: Tonight we have Paul Duke on percussion (= playing a percussion instrument ) .
sentences.chinese: 今晚我们请到保罗·杜克先生负责打击乐。

sentences.english: a range of percussion instruments
sentences.chinese: 一组打击乐器

detailed_translations.english: musical instruments such as drums, bells etc which you play by hitting them

name: nationalism
trans: 国家主义； 民族主义， 民族优越感

sentences.english: Scottish national­ism
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰民族主义

detailed_translations.chinese: 民族主义, 国家主义
detailed_translations.english: the desire by a group of people of the same race, origin, language etc to form an independent country

sentences.english: But no one knew where the sulfur came from.
sentences.chinese: 但是，没有人知道硫来自何处。

sentences.english: Well, this chlorine has taken one electron from the sulfur.
sentences.chinese: 对了，这个氯从硫那里得到了一个电子。

sentences.english: These pollutants are called aerosols and they include soot as well as compounds of nitrogen and sulfur and other stuff into the air.
sentences.chinese: 通常，我们称这些污染物为悬浮微粒，它们包含烟尘以及氮硫与进入大气的其他物质的混合物。

name: terrain
trans: 地势， 地形； 地带

sentences.english: rocky terrain
sentences.chinese: 多石的地形

detailed_translations.chinese: [地理] 地形，地势；领域；地带
detailed_translations.english: a particular type of land

name: navigate
trans: 航行， 横渡； 导航； 设法完成

sentences.english: The river is too dangerous to navigate.
sentences.chinese: 这河道太危险，不适宜航行。

detailed_translations.english: to sail along a river or other area of water

name: culpable
trans: 有罪的； 该谴责的， 难辞其咎的

sentences.english: Both parties were held to be to some extent culpable.
sentences.chinese: 双方都被追究了一定的责任。

detailed_translations.chinese: 有罪的；该责备的；不周到的；应受处罚的
detailed_translations.english: deserving blame

name: raw
trans: 生的， 未烹制的； 自然状态的， 未经加工的； 生疏的， 无经验的； 粗犷的； 原始的， 未经处理的

sentences.english: raw meat
sentences.chinese: 生肉

sentences.english: grated raw carrots
sentences.chinese: 磨碎的生胡萝卜

sentences.english: Cabbage can be eaten raw.
sentences.chinese: 洋白菜可以生吃。

sentences.english: raw sugar
sentences.chinese: 原糖

detailed_translations.english: not cooked

sentences.english: Sprinkle the meat with salt and place in the pan.
sentences.chinese: 给肉撒点盐，然后放进平锅里。

detailed_translations.english: to scatter small drops of liquid or small pieces of something
a small amount of something, especially scattered on top of something

sentences.english: The fluorescent lamps for backlighting have made progress in technology with the development of liquid crystal display.
sentences.chinese: 随着液晶显示的发展，背光照明用荧光灯取得了技术进步。

sentences.english: In the condition of that when the light is insufficient (such as in the cloudy day or in the night), we can meet the backlighting problem.
sentences.chinese: 在自然光线不足（阴雨、夜晚）的逆光情况下，要得到较为理想的车牌图像，需要进行人工补光。

name: municipal
trans: 市政的； 内政的； 地方性的

sentences.english: the municipal waste dump
sentences.chinese: 城市垃圾场

sentences.english: municipal elections
sentences.chinese: 市级选举

detailed_translations.english: relating to or belonging to the government of a town or city

sentences.english: We will institute a number of measures to better safeguard the public.
sentences.chinese: 我们将制定许多措施更好地保护公众。

sentences.english: research institutes
sentences.chinese: 研究所

detailed_translations.english: If you institute a system, rule, or course of action, you start it

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔从事科研或教育等的〕机构；学院；研究院
detailed_translations.english: an organization that has a particular purpose such as scientific or educational work, or the building where this organization is based

name: endure
trans: 忍受， 忍耐； 持久， 持续

sentences.english: It seemed impossible that anyone could endure such pain.
sentences.chinese: 似乎谁都不可能忍受这样的疼痛。

detailed_translations.english: to be in a difficult or painful situation for a long time without complaining

name: feign
trans: 装作， 假装； 伪造

sentences.english: Feigning a headache, I went upstairs to my room.
sentences.chinese: 我假装头痛，上楼到自己房间去了。

detailed_translations.english: to pretend to have a particular feeling or to be ill, asleep etc

name: poster
trans: 海报， 招贴画； 发布消息的人

sentences.english: A team of volunteers were putting up posters .
sentences.chinese: 一队志愿者正在张贴海报。

sentences.english: a poster campaign for the election
sentences.chinese: 选举的海报宣传

detailed_translations.english: a large printed notice, picture, or photograph, used to advertise something or as a decoration

name: shortly
trans: 不久； 简要地； 不耐烦地

sentences.english: Ms Jones will be back shortly.
sentences.chinese: 琼斯女士很快就会回来。

detailed_translations.english: soon

sentences.english: the criteria we use to select candidates
sentences.chinese: 我们挑选候选人的标准

detailed_translations.english: a standard that you use to judge something or make a decision about something

sentences.english: In essence his message was very simple.
sentences.chinese: 实质上他想表达的意思很简单。

detailed_translations.english: the most basic and important quality of something

sentences.english: The size of your pores is determined by the amount of oil they produce.
sentences.chinese: 毛孔的大小取决于毛孔分泌油脂的多少。

sentences.english: We spent hours poring over travel brochures.
sentences.chinese: 我们花了几个小时仔细研究旅游宣传册。

detailed_translations.english: one of the small holes in your skin that liquid, especially  sweat  , can pass through, or a similar hole in the surface of a plant
If you pore over or through information, you look at it and study it very carefully

name: ambient
trans: 周围的， 周围环境的； 产生轻松氛围的

sentences.english: ...ambient sounds of children in the background.
sentences.chinese: ...背景处环绕着孩子们的声音。

detailed_translations.english: The ambient temperature is the temperature of the air above the ground in a particular place

sentences.english: ...her insistence on personal privacy.
sentences.chinese: …她对个人隐私权的坚持。

detailed_translations.english: when you demand that something should happen and refuse to let anyone say no

sentences.english: People in manual occupations have a lower life expectancy.
sentences.chinese: 干体力活的人预期寿命较短。

detailed_translations.english: manual work involves using your hands or your physical strength rather than your mind
a book that gives instructions about how to do something, especially how to use a machine

sentences.english: ornamental gardens
sentences.chinese: 装饰性花园

sentences.english: The pillars in the centre are purely ornamental.
sentences.chinese: 位于中心的那些柱子纯粹是作装饰用的。

detailed_translations.english: designed to make something look attractive rather than to be used for a particular purpose

name: sentimental
trans: 情感的； 伤感的， 多愁善感的

sentences.english: She said a sentimental goodbye.
sentences.chinese: 她依依不舍地道别。

detailed_translations.chinese: 伤感的；多愁善感的；感情用事的；寓有情感的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is sentimental is easily affected by emotions such as love, sympathy, sadness etc, often in a way that seems silly to other people

sentences.english: The chopper shot upward in a manoeuver matched by the other pilot.
sentences.chinese: 这架直升飞机向上冲去，另一架飞机也以相同的移动方向冲了上去。

sentences.english: The president has tried to manoeuver the campaign away from himself.
sentences.chinese: 总统试图操控该活动，使其远离自身。

sentences.english: That will allow them to manoeuvre the satellite into the shuttle's cargo bay.
sentences.chinese: 那将使得他们能把人造卫星移入飞船的货物舱。

detailed_translations.english: a skilful or careful movement that you make, for example in order to avoid something or go through a narrow space
to move or turn skilfully or to move or turn something skilfully, especially something large and heavy

sentences.english: a dual system of education
sentences.chinese: 二元[双元]教育体系

detailed_translations.english: having two of something or two parts

name: retire
trans: 退休， 引退， 退役； 退出； 撤退； 就寝

sentences.english: At the age when most people retire, he is ready to face a new career.
sentences.chinese: 在大多数人退休的年纪，他准备要面对一项新事业。

sentences.english: I retired late that evening.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上我睡得晚。

detailed_translations.english: to stop working, usually because you have reached a certain age

name: dexterous
trans: 惯用右手的； 灵巧的， 熟练的

sentences.english: dextrous use of the needle
sentences.chinese: 灵巧的针法

detailed_translations.chinese: 灵巧的；敏捷的；惯用右手的
detailed_translations.english: skilful and quick when using your hands

name: aspect
trans: 方面； 朝向， 方向； 外表， 外观

sentences.english: a south-facing aspect
sentences.chinese: 朝南方向

detailed_translations.english: one part of a situation, idea, plan etc that has many parts

sentences.english: Our youngest daughter is a vegetarian.
sentences.chinese: 我们的小女儿是个素食主义者。

sentences.english: dishes suitable for vegetarians
sentences.chinese: 适合素食者的菜肴

sentences.english: I’m thinking about becoming a vegetarian.
sentences.chinese: 我在考虑戒除荤食。

sentences.english: Yasmin sticks to a strict vegetarian diet.
sentences.chinese: 亚斯敏坚持一种严格的纯素饮食。

detailed_translations.english: someone who does not eat meat or fish
Someone who is vegetarian never eats meat or fish

name: aggressive
trans: 侵略的， 挑衅的； 强有力的； 敢作敢为的， 有进取心的

sentences.english: Jim’s voice became aggressive.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆的声音凶了起来。

sentences.english: Teachers apparently expect a certain amount of aggressive behaviour from boys.
sentences.chinese: 老师显然料到男孩子多少会有些好勇斗狠的行为。

sentences.english: A successful businessman has to be aggressive.
sentences.chinese: 成功的实业家必须得有股冲劲。

detailed_translations.chinese: 挑衅的，好斗的；有上进心的
detailed_translations.english: behaving in an angry threatening way, as if you want to fight or attack someone

name: resilience
trans: 弹力， 弹性； 复原力； 适应力

sentences.english: And I think what we're seeing in the economy now is the inherent resilience of the American economy and the American people.
sentences.chinese: 而且我认为，我认为，在经济方面，我们现在看到的是美国经济和美国人民一直以来所固有的弹性。

sentences.chinese: 他前后甩动着他的包。

sentences.chinese: 他们想压制政敌言论的明显企图

sentences.chinese: 他派出三名侦察兵到前面侦察大桥的情况。

sentences.chinese: 她能给马备鞍并没有什么值得惊讶的。

sentences.chinese: 自行车的车架、车轮、车把和车座都用以此方式制造的纸板制成，然后组装在一起。

sentences.chinese: 一位叔叔慷慨解囊，出钱供她上音乐课。

sentences.chinese: 拿破仑从莫斯科的撤退

sentences.chinese: 赞成行为主义的心理学者。

sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢德夫，他好像也不喜欢我。

sentences.chinese: 两个男人互相吹捧，盛赞对方让自己受益匪浅。

sentences.chinese: 周围炮弹四处飞落，我们奔跑着寻找地方躲避。

sentences.chinese: 一枚爆炸的迫击炮弹

sentences.chinese: 这是一道肉食者们都喜欢的美味素食。

sentences.chinese: 通宵药店

sentences.chinese: 他们的车大些，所以更舒适些。

交易； 兑换； 交换； 交流

sentences.chinese: 我们在圣诞节时交换礼物。

sentences.chinese: 在这个地方人们可以聊天和交流想法。

sentences.chinese: 我用四盒磁带换你的麦当娜激光唱片很公平。

name: crooked
trans: 不诚实的； 欺诈的； 弯曲的

sentences.chinese: 你的领带歪了。

sentences.english: narrow crooked streets

name: contiguous

sentences.chinese: 美国的48个互相毗连的州

sentences.chinese: 土壤为植物根部提供养分。

sentences.chinese: “组织”这个词常常给人一种整洁的感觉。
