sentences.english: The original 1965 bottle is now a collector’s item (= one of a set of objects people like to collect because they are interesting or valuable ).
sentences.chinese: 这瓶1965年生产的原装酒现在是收藏品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔尤指清单上、一群或一组事物中的〕一项，一件，一条
detailed_translations.english: a single thing, especially one thing in a list, group, or set of things

name: canvas
trans: 画布； 油画； 帆布

sentences.english: a canvas bag
sentences.chinese: 帆布包

detailed_translations.english: strong cloth used to make bags, tents, shoes etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 用帆布覆盖，用帆布装备

name: superintendent
trans: 主管， 负责人； 指挥者， 管理者； 警长

sentences.english: a young park superintendent
sentences.chinese: 年轻的公园负责人

sentences.english: the superintendent of the Methodist Church in Hawaii
sentences.chinese: 夏威夷卫理公会负责人

detailed_translations.english: someone who is officially in charge of a place, job, activity etc

name: invasive
trans: 侵入的， 侵略的； 开刀的

sentences.english: invasive bladder cancers
sentences.chinese: 扩散性膀胱癌

detailed_translations.english: an invasive disease spreads quickly and is difficult to stop

name: calculable
trans: 可计算的； 能预测的； 可信的

sentences.english: clear and calculable benefits
sentences.chinese: 显而易见、算得出的好处

detailed_translations.chinese: 可计算的；能预测的；可靠的
detailed_translations.english: something that is calculable can be measured by using numbers, or studying the facts available

name: hollow
trans: 空心的，中空的；凹陷的；空洞的，虚伪的；沉闷的，

sentences.english: a hollow tree
sentences.chinese: 空心树

sentences.english: Any threat to bring in the police is a hollow one.
sentences.chinese: 任何要叫警察来的威胁都是虚张声势。

sentences.english: The steps were hollowed by centuries of use.
sentences.chinese: 经过几个世纪的踩踏，台阶上出现了凹痕

detailed_translations.chinese: 空的,中空的;；空洞的,无价值的
detailed_translations.english: having an empty space inside
to make the surface of something curve inwards

name: shipwright
trans: 造船者， 造船工人； 修船工

sentences.english: What is he that builds stronger than either the mason, the shipwright, or the carpenter?
sentences.chinese: 能比石匠、船匠和木匠建造出更坚固的建筑的人，他是谁？

sentences.english: But she knew that was only because, like Peter the Great in a shipwright's yard, he was studying what he wanted to know.
sentences.chinese: 但是苔丝知道，那只是因为他要学习他想学习的东西，就像彼得大帝到造船厂里去学习一样。

detailed_translations.english: someone who builds or repairs ships

name: epic
trans: 史诗般的； 艰苦卓绝的； 壮丽的， 宏大的
史诗；史诗般的电影；壮举

sentences.english: an epic tale of mutiny on the high seas
sentences.chinese: 关于公海哗变的惊心动魄的故事

sentences.english: epic poetry
sentences.chinese: 史诗

detailed_translations.english: an epic book, poem, or film tells a long story about brave actions and exciting events

detailed_translations.chinese: 史诗；叙事诗；史诗般的作品
detailed_translations.english: a book, poem, or film that tells a long story about brave actions and exciting events

name: downtown
trans: 在市中心； 往市中心

sentences.english: By day he worked downtown for American Standard.
sentences.chinese: 白天，他在市中心为美国标准公司工作。

sentences.english: ...an office in downtown Chicago.
sentences.chinese: …芝加哥市中心的一间办公室。

sentences.english: ...in a large vacant area of the downtown.
sentences.chinese: …在市中心的一大块空地上。

detailed_translations.english: Downtown is also an adverb
Downtown places are in or toward the centre of a large town or city, where the stores and places of business are
Downtown is also a noun

name: rely
trans: 依赖， 依靠； 信赖， 信任

sentences.english: I knew I could rely on David.
sentences.chinese: 我知道我可以信赖戴维。

sentences.english: They relied heavily on the advice of their professional advisers.
sentences.chinese: 他们非常依赖专业顾问的建议。

detailed_translations.english: to depend on something in order to continue to live or exist

sentences.english: Two or three fishing boats were moored alongside the pier.
sentences.chinese: 有两三艘渔船停泊在码头边。

sentences.english: Colliford is higher, right up on the moors.
sentences.chinese: 考里弗德更高，正好在荒野之上。

detailed_translations.english: to fasten a ship or boat to the land or to the bottom of the sea using ropes or an  anchor
A moor is an area of open and usually high land with poor soil that is covered mainly with grass and heather

name: slide
trans: 滑动； 滑坡， 滑道； 幻灯片

sentences.english: He slid open the door of the glass cabinet.
sentences.chinese: 他滑开玻璃柜的门。

detailed_translations.english: to move smoothly over a surface while continuing to touch it, or to make something move in this way
to move smoothly over a surface while continuing to touch it, or to make something move in this way
a large structure with steps leading to the top of a long sloping surface which children can slide down

sentences.english: Banpo antimony deposit is a typical fracture - controlling and hydrothermal fluid filling deposit.
sentences.chinese: 半坡锑矿床是典型的断裂控矿，热液充填型矿床。

sentences.english: There exist two type mineral deposits including Fuzichong-type skarn deposit and Niuwei-type hydrothermal filling deposit in the Fuzichong Pb-Zn ore belt.
sentences.chinese: 佛子冲铅锌成矿带包括两种矿床类型，即佛子冲式夕卡岩型矿床和牛卫式热液充填（交代）型矿床。

sentences.english: Shangmanggang tectonic-altered rock type Au deposit is founded in south Lushui-Ruili region. The Au deposit is controlled by source bed, structure and hydrothermal solution.
sentences.chinese: 滇西泸水—瑞丽地区南部的上芒岗金矿为该区新发现的构造蚀变岩型金矿，金源、构造、热液蚀变是主要的控矿因素。

name: sticky
trans: 黏的， 黏性的； 闷热的； 棘手的

sentences.english: There’s some sticky stuff in your hair.
sentences.chinese: 你的头发上有什么黏糊糊的东西。

sentences.english: a sticky floor
sentences.chinese: 黏糊糊的地板

detailed_translations.english: made of or covered with a substance that sticks to surfaces

sentences.english: Grill the bacon until crisp.
sentences.chinese: 将培根烤至酥脆。

sentences.english: swordfish grilled over charcoal
sentences.chinese: 炭火烤的剑鱼

detailed_translations.english: if you grill something, or if it grills, you cook it by putting it on a flat metal frame with bars across it, above or below strong direct heat
a part of a  cooker  in which strong heat from above cooks food on a metal shelf below

name: care
trans: 关心， 关怀； 介意； 担忧
小心，谨慎；照看，照料；忧虑，焦虑

sentences.english: ‘He looked angry.’ ‘ I don’t care !’
sentences.chinese: “他好像很生气。”“我不管！”

sentences.english: She felt that nobody cared.
sentences.chinese: 她觉得没有人在乎。

sentences.english: The picture had been drawn with great care.
sentences.chinese: 这幅图画得非常用心。

detailed_translations.english: to think that something is important, so that you are interested in it, worried about it etc
when you are careful to avoid damage, mistakes etc

name: pattern
trans: 模式，方式；样式，图案；样品，样本
仿制； 使形成， 促成

sentences.english: Weather patterns have changed in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 气候模式近年已经发生了变化。

sentences.english: A general pattern began to emerge .
sentences.chinese: 一个总体模式开始显现。

sentences.english: Their descriptions seemed to follow a set pattern (= always develop in the same way ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的描述似乎依据固定的模式。

sentences.english: His behavior fits a pattern of violent acts.
sentences.chinese: 他的举动符合暴力行为的模式。

sentences.english: a dress pattern
sentences.chinese: 连衣裙的纸样

detailed_translations.english: the regular way in which something happens, develops, or is done

name: settle
trans: 安定， 安顿， 定居； 结束， 解决； 决定， 确定； 平静下来； 支付， 结算； 飞落， 停留

sentences.english: When the children had settled, Miss Brown gave out the new reading books.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们静下来后，布朗小姐给他们发新的故事书。

sentences.english: She breathed deeply to settle her nerves (= stop herself from feeling worried or frightened ) .
sentences.chinese: 她深深地吸了口气平静自己的情绪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 安排， 安放； 调停； 支付， 核算； 安家； 飞落， 停留； 安定
detailed_translations.english: to become quiet and calm, or to make someone quiet and calm

name: increment
trans: 增加； 增量； 定期的加薪

sentences.english: The average yearly increment in productivity was 4.5 per cent.
sentences.chinese: 生产率的年平均增长量是4.5%。

detailed_translations.english: the amount by which a number, value, or amount increases

name: harsh
trans: 恶劣的， 严酷的； 刺耳的； 粗糙的， 毛糙的

sentences.english: The hostages are being held in harsh conditions.
sentences.chinese: 人质被拘押在恶劣环境中。

sentences.english: a young girl suddenly exposed to the harsh realities of life
sentences.chinese: 骤然暴露于残酷现实生活中的小女孩

detailed_translations.english: harsh conditions are difficult to live in and very uncomfortable

name: smother
trans: 使窒息而死； 厚厚地覆盖； 抑制， 扼杀； 把闷熄

sentences.english: A teenage mother was accused of smothering her 3-month-old daughter.
sentences.chinese: 一个少女妈妈被指控闷死自己三个月大的女儿。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使窒息；抑制；（用灰等）闷熄；忍住
detailed_translations.english: to kill someone by putting something over their face to stop them breathing

detailed_translations.chinese: 窒息状态；令人窒息的浓烟

name: cramped
trans: 狭小的， 狭窄的； 受限制的； 密小难认的

sentences.english: The kitchen was small and cramped.
sentences.chinese: 这间厨房又小又窄。

sentences.english: a cramped apartment
sentences.chinese: 狭小的公寓套房

sentences.english: The troops slept in cramped conditions with up to 20 in a single room.
sentences.chinese: 士兵们睡在拥挤的环境里，一个房间多达20人。

detailed_translations.english: a cramped room, building etc does not have enough space for the people in it

detailed_translations.chinese: 用夹钳夹；约束（cramp的过去分词）

name: vehicle
trans: 交通工具， 车辆； 工具， 手段

sentences.english: a description of the stolen vehicle
sentences.chinese: 对被盗车辆的描述

sentences.english: Have you locked your vehicle?
sentences.chinese: 你锁车了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a machine with an engine that is used to take people or things from one place to another, such as a car, bus, or truck

name: scrape
trans: 刮掉，擦掉；发出刺耳的刮擦声；

sentences.english: Scrape the carrots and slice them thinly.
sentences.chinese: 把这些胡萝卜去皮切成薄片。

sentences.english: The two of them scraped their dishes clean.
sentences.chinese: 他们两个把盘子擦得干干净净。

sentences.english: I heard the side of the car scrape against the wall.
sentences.chinese: 我听到汽车的侧面蹭着墙了。

sentences.english: the scrape of iron on stone
sentences.chinese: 铁摩擦石头发出的嚓嚓声

sentences.english: She emerged from the overturned car with only a few scrapes and bruises.
sentences.chinese: 她从翻了的车里钻出来，只擦破一点皮，碰了几块淤青。

detailed_translations.english: to remove something from a surface using the edge of a knife, a stick etc
the action of one thing rubbing roughly against another

sentences.english: They are charring wood in a kiln.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在窑内将木头烧成木炭。

sentences.english: That morning we fired our first kiln of charcoal.
sentences.chinese: 那天上午，我们烧了我们的第一窑木炭。

sentences.english: CRAFT SUPPLIES: Whether it’s small items like yarn or big items like a kiln, craft hobbies don’t have to be hard on your wallet.
sentences.chinese: 手工艺品： 无论是小到像纱这样的东西，还是大到像窑这样的东西，对于手工艺的兴趣不会让你为荷包发愁。

detailed_translations.english: a special oven for baking clay pots, bricks etc

name: bleak
trans: 阴冷的； 无望的， 令人沮丧的； 乏味的； 荒凉的

sentences.english: a bleak January afternoon
sentences.chinese: 一月里一个阴冷的下午

sentences.english: The landscape was bleak.
sentences.chinese: 景色一片凄凉。

detailed_translations.english: cold and without any pleasant or comfortable features

sentences.english: ...adverse meteorological conditions.
sentences.chinese: …不利的气象条件。

detailed_translations.english: Meteorological means relating to meteorology

sentences.english: a velvet cushion
sentences.chinese: 天鹅绒垫子

sentences.english: a cushion cover
sentences.chinese: 垫子套

detailed_translations.chinese: 垫子；起缓解作用之物；（猪等的）臀肉；银行储蓄
detailed_translations.english: a cloth bag filled with soft material that you put on a chair or the floor to make it more comfortable

detailed_translations.chinese: 给…安上垫子；把…安置在垫子上；缓和…的冲击
detailed_translations.english: to make the effect of a fall or hit less painful, for example by having something soft in the way

name: glorious
trans: 壮丽的， 辉煌的； 光荣的； 令人愉快的， 极好的

sentences.english: a truly glorious future
sentences.chinese: 无比美好的将来

sentences.english: a glorious victory
sentences.chinese: 光荣的胜利

sentences.english: glorious views of the coast
sentences.chinese: 沿海的迷人景色

detailed_translations.english: having or deserving great fame, praise, and honour

sentences.english: ...bilateral talks between Britain and America.
sentences.chinese: …英美之间的双边会谈。

detailed_translations.english: involving two groups or nations

sentences.english: A broad valley opened up leading to a high, flat plateau of cultivated land.
sentences.chinese: 一个宽阔的山谷展开，通向一片平坦的高原耕地。

sentences.english: Inflation rates have reached a plateau.
sentences.chinese: 通货膨胀率已趋平稳。

detailed_translations.english: a large area of flat land that is higher than the land around it

name: aptitude
trans: 适合， 恰当； 天资， 才能， 资质

sentences.english: He drifted into publishing and discovered an aptitude for working with accounts.
sentences.chinese: 他偶入出版界，发现自己具有管账的天资。

detailed_translations.english: natural ability or skill, especially in learning

sentences.english: The little daisy was as happy as if the day had been a great holiday, but it was only Monday.
sentences.chinese: 小雏菊快乐得就像在过一个不寻常的假日，但这天只是星期一。

sentences.english: A crisp white blouse was paired with a slim single-fold black pencil skirt with a daisy for daytime sophistication.
sentences.chinese: 一件轻薄的白色宽松上衣，搭配细长的绣着雏菊的黑色单层铅笔裙作为混搭日装。

sentences.english: Then it noticed the little daisy, and nodded to it, and kissed it with its beak and said: “You must also fade in here, poor little flower.
sentences.chinese: 这时他注意到了那朵小雏菊，向她点头，吻了她并说：“你在这儿一定也会枯萎，可怜的小花儿。

detailed_translations.english: a white flower with a yellow centre

name: stress
trans: 强调； 重读； 焦虑不安
压力；强调；精神压力，紧张；重音，重读

sentences.english: Crawford stressed the need for more housing downtown.
sentences.chinese: 克劳福德强调市中心需要建更多的住宅。

sentences.english: She stressed the importance of a balanced diet.
sentences.chinese: 她强调了均衡饮食的重要性。

detailed_translations.english: to emphasize a statement, fact, or idea

name: reliance
trans: 依靠， 依赖； 信任

sentences.english: the country’s heavy reliance on trade
sentences.chinese: 该国对贸易的严重依赖

detailed_translations.english: when someone or something is dependent on someone or something else

name: display
trans: 陈列； 展示； 显示

sentences.english: a dazzling display (= very good display ) of flowers
sentences.chinese: 令人目眩神迷的花卉展

sentences.english: The window display caught her eye.
sentences.chinese: 橱窗陈列吸引了她的目光。

sentences.english: shop windows displaying the latest fashions
sentences.chinese: 展示最新时装的商店橱窗

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement of things for people to look at or buy
to show something to people, or put it in a place where people can see it easily

sentences.english: Dexter gnawed his pen thoughtfully.
sentences.chinese: 德克斯特若有所思地咬着钢笔。

sentences.english: A rat had gnawed a hole in the box.
sentences.chinese: 老鼠在箱子上咬了一个洞。

detailed_translations.english: to keep biting something hard

name: disorder
trans: 混乱， 凌乱； 动乱， 骚乱； 失调， 紊乱

sentences.english: severe eating disorders such as bulimia and anorexia
sentences.chinese: 像贪食症和厌食症这类严重的进食障碍

detailed_translations.chinese: 混乱， 杂乱， 骚乱
detailed_translations.english: a situation in which a lot of people behave in an uncontrolled, noisy, or violent way in public

name: aggravate
trans: 恶化， 加重； 激怒

sentences.english: Their money problems were further aggravated by a rise in interest rates.
sentences.chinese: 由于利率上调，他们的财务问题更加严重。

sentences.english: Building the new road will only aggravate the situation .
sentences.chinese: 建造那条新路只会使情况恶化。

detailed_translations.english: to make a bad situation, an illness, or an injury worse

sentences.english: The disquiet will boil over in the long run.
sentences.chinese: 这种不安情绪终有一天会爆发的。

sentences.english: Of course it was a brutal and harrowing time, but that isn't the reason for my disquiet.
sentences.chinese: 那当然是一段残忍而痛苦的岁月，但这并非我不安的原因。

sentences.english: Recent reports speculated that disquiet among political and military elites over Kim's choice of successor was the real reason behind the meeting's delay.
sentences.chinese: 近期有报道推测，金正日选择金正云做接班人导致政界和军界高层不安，是党代会推迟的真正原因。

detailed_translations.english: anxiety or unhappiness about something

name: addictive
trans: 使人上瘾的； 使人沉醉的， 醉心的

sentences.english: Tobacco is highly addictive .
sentences.chinese: 烟草很容易使人上瘾。

detailed_translations.english: if a substance, especially a drug, is addictive, your body starts to need it regularly and you are unable to stop taking it

sentences.english: She still spins the yarn and knits sweaters for her family.
sentences.chinese: 她仍在为她的家人纺线织毛衣。

detailed_translations.english: thick thread made of cotton or wool, which is used to knit things

sentences.english: With half a smile, and half a spurn.
sentences.chinese: 半带微笑，半带弃绝。

sentences.english: I spurn your offer.
sentences.chinese: 我拒绝你的提议。

sentences.english: Orchids and orchid bees are a classic example of this relationship.
sentences.chinese: 兰花和兰蜂就是这种关系的典型例子。

sentences.english: 'Girls need a laboratory, like an orchid needs a nursery, ' says Ms. Beyer.
sentences.chinese: 拜尔说，女孩需要一个实验室，就像兰花需要苗圃；

sentences.english: "If I see any kind of flower, I can do it in gelatin," she says. "I took my orchid gelatinas to friends' parties, and they were wowed.
sentences.chinese: “如果我看见一种花，我就能把它制成胶冻，”她说，“我把我的兰花胶冻带到了朋友的聚会上，他们都啧啧称奇。

detailed_translations.english: a plant that has flowers which are brightly coloured and usually shaped

sentences.english: In my childhood, local dairies bought milk from local farmers.
sentences.chinese: 在我小时候，本地的乳品公司向当地农场主收购牛奶。

sentences.english: dairy products/produce
sentences.chinese: 乳制品；奶类产品

detailed_translations.english: a place on a farm where milk is kept and butter and cheese are made
made from milk

sentences.english: The team’s coach was given a plaque.
sentences.chinese: 那个队的教练得到一块匾牌。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of flat metal, wood, or stone with writing on it, used as a prize in a competition or attached to a building to remind people of an event or person

sentences.english: Loud noise can damage the delicate membrane in the ear.
sentences.chinese: 很响的噪声会损伤脆弱的耳膜。

detailed_translations.english: a very thin piece of skin that covers or connects parts of your body

sentences.english: Laura is very mature for her age.
sentences.chinese: 相对她的年龄来说劳拉是很成熟的。

sentences.english: We’re mature enough to disagree on this issue but still respect each other.
sentences.chinese: 我们都很成熟，尽管我们对此事意见不同，但还是彼此尊重。

sentences.english: As the fish matures, its colours and patternings change.
sentences.chinese: 随着发育成熟，这种鱼的颜色和斑纹都会改变。

detailed_translations.english: someone, especially a child or young person, who is mature behaves in a sensible and reasonable way, as you would expect an adult to behave
to become fully grown or developed

name: scavenger
trans: 捡破烂的人， 拾荒者； 食腐动物

sentences.english: He struck at one with his knife lashed to the end of an oar and watched the scavenger sliding down into deep water.
sentences.chinese: 他用绑在桨的一头的刀子击中了其中的一条，并看着这条食腐动物滑到深海里去了。

name: alleviate
trans: 减轻， 缓解， 缓和

sentences.english: measures to alleviate poverty
sentences.chinese: 扶贫措施

detailed_translations.english: to make something less painful or difficult to deal with

name: talent
trans: 天赋； 才干； 人才

sentences.english: He has a lot of talent , and his work is fresh and interesting.
sentences.chinese: 他很有天赋，作品新颖有趣。

sentences.english: a persuasive speaker with a natural talent for leadership
sentences.chinese: 有领导天赋、颇有辩才的演说者

sentences.english: His latest book reveals hidden talents.
sentences.chinese: 他最新的一本书展现了他深藏不露的才能。

sentences.english: Sadly, she inherited none of her father’s musical talent.
sentences.chinese: 可惜的是，她一点都没有继承她父亲的音乐天赋。

sentences.english: He is a great talent.
sentences.chinese: 他是个了不起的人才。

sentences.english: Britain’s footballing talent
sentences.chinese: 英国的足球天才

detailed_translations.english: a natural ability to do something well

sentences.english: ‘You, a scientist!’ he scoffed.
sentences.chinese: “就你，还科学家！”他讥笑道。

detailed_translations.english: an expression of derision
to laugh at a person or idea, and talk about them in a way that shows you think they are stupid

name: sacrificial
trans: 供奉的， 献祭的， 牺牲的

sentences.english: a sacrificial ceremony
sentences.chinese: 献祭仪式

sentences.english: a sacrificial lamb
sentences.chinese: 献祭用的羔羊

detailed_translations.chinese: 供奉的， 献祭的， 牺牲的
detailed_translations.english: relating to or offered as a sacrifice

name: factual
trans: 实际的， 真实的， 事实的

sentences.english: Try to keep your account of events as factual as possible.
sentences.chinese: 你要尽量如实地说明情况。

detailed_translations.english: based on facts or relating to facts

name: negotiate
trans: 谈判， 商议； 商定， 达成； 通过， 越过

sentences.english: His first aim is to get the warring parties back to the negotiating table (= discussing something ).
sentences.chinese: 他的首要目标就是把交战各方拉回到谈判桌上。

detailed_translations.english: to discuss something in order to reach an agreement, especially in business or politics

sentences.english: What do a hummingbird, a moth, and a maple tree have in common?
sentences.chinese: 蜂鸟、蛾子和枫树之间有什么共同之处呢？

sentences.english: Around streetlights in leafy suburbs what often seems like a moth at first glance may in fact be a small bat.
sentences.chinese: 在绿树成荫的郊区，街灯周围经常有乍一看象蛾子的飞行物，而事实上可能是一只微蝠。

sentences.english: Authorities say the mob of 'roos is endangering a species of local lizard and the threatened gold sun moth through overgrazing.
sentences.chinese: 有关部门表示，由于过度放牧，这些袋鼠已经对一种当地蜥蜴和金日蛾的生存构成了威胁。

detailed_translations.english: an insect related to the  butterfly  that flies mainly at night and is attracted to lights. Some moths eat holes in cloth.

name: germ
trans: 微生物， 细菌； 萌芽

sentences.english: Put disinfectant down the toilet to kill any germs.
sentences.chinese: 在抽水马桶里投放消毒剂杀菌。

sentences.english: germ cells containing DNA
sentences.chinese: 含DNA的生殖细胞

detailed_translations.english: a very small living thing that can make you ill

name: shatter
trans: 粉碎， 破碎； 破灭； 散开， 吹散； 给予极大打击

sentences.english: The explosion shattered the building.
sentences.chinese: 这次爆炸把大楼炸成一片废墟。

sentences.english: A tragic accident shattered her dreams of Olympic glory.
sentences.chinese: 一场不幸的意外事故使她获得奥运奖牌的梦想破灭了。

detailed_translations.english: to break suddenly into very small pieces, or to make something break in this way

sentences.english: Part of the explanation may be credentialism in some rich countries.
sentences.chinese: 在一些富裕国家这可以部分解释为文凭主义。

sentences.english: I glimpsed a figure at the window.
sentences.chinese: 我瞥见窗前有个身影。

sentences.english: They caught a glimpse of a dark green car.
sentences.chinese: 他们瞥见一辆深绿色的汽车。

detailed_translations.english: to see someone or something for a moment without getting a complete view of them
a quick look at someone or something that does not allow you to see them clearly

sentences.english: ...ground covered over with moss.
sentences.chinese: …长满青苔的地面。

detailed_translations.english: a very small green plant that grows in a thick soft furry mass on wet soil, trees, or rocks

sentences.english: She hired a detective to find out if her husband was having an affair.
sentences.chinese: 她雇了一个私人侦探调查她丈夫是否有外遇。

detailed_translations.english: a police officer whose job is to discover information about crimes and catch criminals

name: transfer
trans: 转移； 转学； 转让； 换乘

sentences.english: He was transferred for a fee of £8 million.
sentences.chinese: 他以800万英镑的转会费转到了其他球队。

detailed_translations.chinese: 搬， 转移； 调动， 转学； 转让， 过户； 乘车， 转乘
detailed_translations.english: to move from one place, school, job etc to another, or to make someone do this, especially within the same organization

sentences.english: ...a tropical tree that is bled regularly for its resin.
sentences.chinese: …定期被采割树脂的一棵热带树。

detailed_translations.english: a thick sticky liquid that comes out of some trees

sentences.english: She looked back on those days with affection .
sentences.chinese: 她深情地回顾那些日子。

sentences.english: Their father never showed them much affection .
sentences.chinese: 他们的父亲对他们从来没有表现出多少慈爱。

sentences.english: Anne had two men trying to win her affections.
sentences.chinese: 安妮有两个男人追求。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of liking or loving sb/sth very much and caring about them

name: diversion
trans: 消遣， 娱乐； 转移， 转换

sentences.english: ...the illegal diversion of profits from secret arms sales.
sentences.chinese: …销售秘密武器所得收益的非法转移。

sentences.english: The party will make a pleasant diversion.
sentences.chinese: 晚会会是一个很不错的消遣。

detailed_translations.english: a change in the direction or use of something, or the act of changing it

name: omit
trans: 省略， 删去； 遗漏， 忽略

sentences.english: Please don’t omit any details, no matter how trivial they may seem.
sentences.chinese: 请不要忽略任何细节，不管它多细小。

detailed_translations.english: to not include someone or something, either deliberately or because you forget to do it

sentences.english: The staff are always courteous and helpful.
sentences.chinese: 员工们总是彬彬有礼、乐于帮助。

sentences.english: a courteous reply
sentences.chinese: 恭敬有礼的回答

detailed_translations.english: polite and showing respect for other people

sentences.english: a nuclear limitation treaty
sentences.chinese: 核限制条约

detailed_translations.chinese: 限制， 限度； 局限
detailed_translations.english: the act or process of controlling or reducing something

sentences.english: When you define the project, you make sure that you have an agreement with the project sponsor on what work should be completed in this project.
sentences.chinese: 在你定义项目的时候，你要确保和项目发起人在项目应该完成的所有工作内容上达成一致意见。

sentences.english: It is important that your sponsor be truly committed to the value of the project to ensure that funds and support are not in jeopardy if adoption is not immediate.
sentences.chinese: 发起人必须真正认可项目的价值，这一点很重要，只有这样才能确保在推广没有立即见效时资金和支持不会随之消失。

detailed_translations.english: someone who officially introduces or supports a proposal for a new law

sentences.english: I go jogging every morning.
sentences.chinese: 我每天早晨都去慢跑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 慢跑；轻推；蹒跚行进；使颠簸
detailed_translations.english: to run slowly and steadily, especially as a way of exercising
a slow steady run, especially done as a way of exercising

sentences.english: A postmortem was ordered to try to ascertain the cause of death.
sentences.chinese: 下令验尸以查明死因。

detailed_translations.chinese: 弄清， 查明； 确定
detailed_translations.english: to find out something

sentences.english: He took a small key from his pocket and slowly inserted it into the lock.
sentences.chinese: 他从衣袋里掏出一把小钥匙，然后缓缓地将其插入锁孔里。

detailed_translations.english: to put something inside or into something else

detailed_translations.chinese: 插入物；管芯；镶块；[机械]刀片
detailed_translations.english: something that is designed to be put inside something else

name: jot
trans: 草草记下， 匆匆记下

sentences.english: Could you just jot his name on there?
sentences.chinese: 你能就把他的名字简单记在那儿吗？

detailed_translations.english: If you jot something short such as an address somewhere, you write it down so that you will remember it

sentences.english: a Neolithic burial ground
sentences.chinese: 一块新石器时代的墓地

detailed_translations.english: relating to the last period of the stone age, about 10,000 years ago, when people began to live together in small groups and make stone tools and weapons

name: highlight
trans: 强调，突出；以强烈光线照射

sentences.english: Your résumé should highlight your skills and achievements.
sentences.chinese: 你的简历应该突出自己的技能和成绩。

sentences.english: That weekend in Venice was definitely the highlight of our trip.
sentences.chinese: 在威尼斯度过的那个周末无疑是我们这次旅行最精彩的部分。

detailed_translations.english: to make a problem or subject easy to notice so that people pay attention to it
the most important, interesting, or enjoyable part of something such as a holiday, performance, or sports competition

sentences.english: customer details held on a database
sentences.chinese: 存储在数据库内的客户详细信息

detailed_translations.english: a large amount of data stored in a computer system so that you can find and use it easily

sentences.english: The lungs consist of millions of tiny air sacs.
sentences.chinese: 肺包含数百万个小肺泡。

detailed_translations.english: a part inside a plant or animal that is shaped like a bag and contains liquid or air

sentences.english: You’ll just have to be patient and wait till I’m off the phone.
sentences.chinese: 你只能耐心点，等我打完电话。

sentences.english: She was tough but wonderful with her patients.
sentences.chinese: 她很严厉，但对病人很好。

detailed_translations.english: able to wait calmly for a long time or to accept difficulties, people’s annoying behaviour etc without becoming angry
someone who is receiving medical treatment from a doctor or in a hospital

name: reject
trans: 拒绝， 抵制； 抛弃， 摈弃， ， 丢弃； 拒收， 不录用； 排斥
被拒货品， 不合格产品

sentences.english: Sarah rejected her brother’s offer of help.
sentences.chinese: 萨拉拒绝了她弟弟的帮助。

sentences.english: Dexter flatly rejected (= completely rejected ) calls for his resignation.
sentences.chinese: 德克斯特断然拒绝让他辞职的要求。

sentences.english: His proposal was rejected outright (= completely rejected ) .
sentences.chinese: 他的建议被彻底否决了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 拒绝； 拒纳， 退回， 摈弃
detailed_translations.english: to refuse to accept, believe in, or agree with something

detailed_translations.chinese: 被拒货品， 不合格产品
detailed_translations.english: a product that has been rejected because there is something wrong with it

name: sheer
trans: 陡峭的；完全的，十足的，全然的；绝对的；极薄的

sentences.english: cliffs which rose sheer from the sea
sentences.chinese: 从海面垂直拔起的悬崖

detailed_translations.english: straight up or down in an almost vertical line
to change direction suddenly, especially in order to avoid something

detailed_translations.chinese: 完全的，十足的；陡峭的，垂直的；极薄的，透明的
detailed_translations.english: a sheer drop, cliff, slope etc is very steep and almost vertical

name: imitation
trans: 模仿， 仿效； 仿制； 仿造品

sentences.english: The remake of ‘Casablanca’ was a pale imitation (= something that is much less good than the thing it imitates ) of the original movie.
sentences.chinese: 重拍的《卡萨布兰卡》远不如原版。

sentences.english: ...a complete set of Dickens bound in imitation leather.
sentences.chinese: …用人造革装帧的一整套《狄更斯全集》。

detailed_translations.english: when you copy someone else’s actions
Imitation things are not genuine but are made to look as if they are

sentences.english: All the guests paid her extravagant compliments.
sentences.chinese: 所有客人都对她赞不绝口。

sentences.english: Being compared to Abba is a great compliment.
sentences.chinese: 能和阿巴乐队相提并论是极大的赞誉。

detailed_translations.chinese: 恭维；称赞；问候；致意；道贺
detailed_translations.english: a remark that shows you admire someone or something
to say something nice to someone in order to praise them

sentences.english: It’s a miracle you weren’t killed!
sentences.chinese: 你没有死真是奇迹！

sentences.english: By some miracle, we managed to catch the plane.
sentences.chinese: 我们奇迹般地赶上了飞机。

sentences.english: the economic miracle of the 1950s
sentences.chinese: 20世纪50年代的经济奇迹

sentences.english: She’s our miracle baby.
sentences.chinese: 她是我们的奇迹宝宝。

detailed_translations.english: something very lucky or very good that happens which you did not expect to happen or did not think was possible

name: rinse
trans: 漂洗， 冲洗， 洗涤； 染发剂

sentences.english: Let me just rinse my hands.
sentences.chinese: 让我冲个手。

sentences.english: Rinse the vegetables under a cold tap.
sentences.chinese: 把蔬菜放在冷水龙头下冲洗。

detailed_translations.english: to wash clothes, dishes, vegetables etc quickly with water, especially running water, and without soap

detailed_translations.chinese: 冲洗；漂洗；[轻] 染发剂；染发
detailed_translations.english: when you rinse something

sentences.english: Please pay the full amount (=  of money  ) by the end of the month.
sentences.chinese: 请在月底前全额付清。

detailed_translations.english: a quantity of something such as time, money, or a substance

sentences.english: The commander said that the army would comply with the ceasefire.
sentences.chinese: 指挥官说过部队会遵从停火协议。

sentences.english: Some beaches had failed to comply with environmental regulations.
sentences.chinese: 一些海滩没能遵守环保规定。

detailed_translations.english: to do what you have to do or are asked to do

name: sap
trans: 液， 汁； 精力； 笨蛋

sentences.english: The leaves, bark and sap are also common ingredients of local herbal remedies.
sentences.chinese: 树叶、树皮和树液也是当地草药疗法的常用药材。

detailed_translations.chinese: [植] 树液；精力，元气；活力；坑道
detailed_translations.english: the watery substance that carries food through a plant

detailed_translations.chinese: 使衰竭，使伤元气；挖掘以破坏基础

name: spellbind
trans: 用妖术迷惑； 迷住， 使入迷

sentences.english: Many people are spellbound by football.
sentences.chinese: 许多人为足球而着迷。

detailed_translations.chinese: (过去式 spellbound, 过去分词 spellbound)迷住；迷惑
detailed_translations.english: to cause to be spellbound; entrance or enthral

name: nectar
trans: 花蜜； 甘美的饮料， 琼浆玉液

sentences.english: Bees gather nectar from flowers.
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂从花朵上采集花蜜。

sentences.english: Upon returning to the hive, they deposit the nectar into pockets, called honeycombs, in the hive’s walls. It is from here that we get honey.
sentences.chinese: 一返回蜂房，它们便将花蜜储存在被称作“六角形蜂窝”的蜂房壁上的小巢中，我们就是从那里采集蜂蜜的。

detailed_translations.english: the sweet liquid that bees collect from flowers

sentences.english: the feudal system
sentences.chinese: 封建制度

sentences.english: feudal society
sentences.chinese: 封建社会

detailed_translations.chinese: 封建制度的；领地的；世仇的
detailed_translations.english: relating to feudalism

sentences.english: the United Kingdom
sentences.chinese: 联合王国

sentences.english: the animal/plant/mineral kingdom
sentences.chinese: 动物界/植物界/矿物界〔大自然三界〕

detailed_translations.english: a country ruled by a king or queen

name: spread
trans: 展开；蔓延，扩散；散布；涂，敷
传播， 蔓延； 涉及幅度， 活动范围

sentences.english: The cancer had spread to her liver.
sentences.chinese: 癌已经扩散到她的肝脏。

sentences.english: The news spread like wildfire.
sentences.chinese: 消息如野火般迅速传开。

detailed_translations.english: if something spreads or is spread, it becomes larger or moves so that it affects more people or a larger area

name: puppet
trans: 木偶； 玩偶； 傀儡， 受人操纵的人

sentences.english: a 20-minute puppet show
sentences.chinese: 20分钟的木偶表演

sentences.english: When the invasion occurred he seized power and ruled the country as a puppet of the occupiers.
sentences.chinese: 他趁入侵之时夺取了政权，作为占领者的傀儡统治着这个国家。

sentences.english: The government is in danger of becoming a mere puppet of the military.
sentences.chinese: 政府面临沦为军方傀儡的危险。

detailed_translations.english: a model of a person or animal that you move by pulling wires or strings, or by putting your hand inside it

name: educated
trans: 受过教育的， 有教养的

sentences.english: a highly educated woman
sentences.chinese: 很有修养的女子

detailed_translations.english: having been well taught and learned a lot

name: favor
trans: 帮助； 赞同， 支持； 偏爱

sentences.english: Both countries seem to favour the agreement.
sentences.chinese: 两个国家似乎都更倾向于这份协议。

detailed_translations.english: to prefer someone or something to other things or people, especially when there are several to choose from

name: latter
trans: 后面的，后半期的；后者的

sentences.english: In the latter case, buyers pay a 15% commission.
sentences.chinese: 在后一种情况下，买家付15%的佣金。

detailed_translations.english: being the second of two people or things, or the last in a list just mentioned

sentences.english: an appointment at an outpatient clinic
sentences.chinese: 门诊预约

detailed_translations.english: a place, often in a hospital, where medical treatment is given to people who do not need to stay in the hospital

sentences.english: He wanted to affiliate with a U.S. firm because he needed expert advice in legal affairs.
sentences.chinese: 他想成为一家美国公司的会员，因为他需要法律事务方面的专家意见。

detailed_translations.english: if a group or organization affiliates to or with another larger one, it forms a close connection with it
a company, organization etc that is connected with or controlled by a larger one

name: simply
trans: 简单地， 简明地； 简直； 仅仅， 只； 朴素地， 简朴地

sentences.english: Try to express yourself more simply.
sentences.chinese: 尽量把你的意思表达得更简单明了。

sentences.english: To put it simply, the tax cuts mean the average person will be about 3% better off.
sentences.chinese: 简单地说，这次减税意味着普通人的收入将增加 3% 左右。

sentences.english: We had to live very simply on my father’s small salary.
sentences.chinese: 我们只能靠父亲微薄的工资过着非常简朴的生活。

detailed_translations.english: if you say or explain something simply, you say it in a way that is easy for people to understand

sentences.english: New genes emerge as dominant, no longer recessive or latent, and organisms change.
sentences.chinese: 新的基因出现并支配，不在隐性潜伏，然后生物就突变了。

sentences.english: Eye colour is inherited, however brown eyes are dominant across the world while blue eyes are a recessive trait.
sentences.chinese: 眼睛的颜色是天生的，世界上褐色眼睛占主导地位，而蓝色眼睛是一种隐性特征。

sentences.english: The reports said blond hair was caused by a recessive gene, so both sides of the family have to have it to extend the shade into the next generation.
sentences.chinese: 报道中说金发是由一种隐性基因造成，因此只有在家庭中的双方都携带这种基因的情况下这种发色才能遗传给下一代。

detailed_translations.english: a recessive  gene  is passed to children from their parents only if both parents have the gene

sentences.english: I had no dollars, but offered him an equivalent amount of sterling.
sentences.chinese: 我没有美金，但给了他等值的英镑。

detailed_translations.english: having the same value, purpose, job etc as a person or thing of a different kind
something that has the same value, purpose, job etc as something else

name: momentary
trans: 片刻的， 瞬间的， 暂时的

sentences.english: There was a momentary pause.
sentences.chinese: 停顿了片刻。

detailed_translations.chinese: 瞬间的；短暂的；随时会发生的
detailed_translations.english: continuing for a very short time

sentences.english: It would be hypocritical to say I travel at 70 mph simply because that is the law.
sentences.chinese: 如果仅仅因为法律规定的时速是70英里我就说自己的行驶时速是70英里，那就太虚伪了。

detailed_translations.english: behaving in a way that is different from what you claim to believe – used to show disapproval

name: constricted
trans: 狭窄的； 收缩的； 抑制的， 约束的

detailed_translations.chinese: 狭窄的； 收缩的； 抑制的， 约束的

name: sensational
trans: 轰动性的， 引起哗然的， 耸人听闻的； 〈口〉极好的， 绝妙的

sentences.english: a sensational discovery
sentences.chinese: 引起轰动的发现

sentences.english: The show was a sensational success.
sentences.chinese: 这次演出取得了轰动性的成功。

sentences.english: a sensational 6-0 victory
sentences.chinese: 轰动性的6比0大胜

detailed_translations.chinese: 轰动的；耸人听闻的；非常好的；使人感动的
detailed_translations.english: very interesting, exciting, and surprising

sentences.english: The explorers paddled their canoe cautiously upstream.
sentences.chinese: 探险者们谨慎地把独木舟向上游划去。

sentences.english: At a summer job working as park naturalists that year, I flipped the canoe Air and I were paddling and we had to push it to shore.
sentences.chinese: 那年我在公园里做暑期兼职，我把独木舟翻转个身，然后我们一起合力将它推到岸边，这样我们就可以划船了。

sentences.english: I remember the first time I visited a village in Vietnam, in 1995: we endured hours and hours of rutty roads or long hours in a canoe to reach project sites.
sentences.chinese: 我记得1995年第一次访问越南一个村落，我们捱过很多小时的路途颠簸、坐了很多小时的独木舟，才到达项目的所在地。

detailed_translations.english: to travel by canoe
a long light boat that is pointed at both ends and which you move along using a  paddle

sentences.english: He hammered the wedge into the crack in the stone.
sentences.chinese: 他用锤子把楔子砸入石缝里。

sentences.english: The phone was wedged under his chin.
sentences.chinese: 电话夹在他下巴下面。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of wood, metal etc that has one thick edge and one pointed edge and is used especially for keeping a door open or for splitting wood
to force something firmly into a narrow space

name: alienate
trans: 使疏远， 使不友好； 转让， 让渡

sentences.english: The latest tax proposals will alienate many voters.
sentences.chinese: 最新的纳税提案将失去远许多选民的支持。

detailed_translations.english: to do something that makes someone unfriendly or unwilling to support you

sentences.english: I hope he’s awake now.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他现在醒着。

sentences.english: She was still only half awake when I brought her a cup of coffee.
sentences.chinese: 我给她端去咖啡的时候，她还是半睡半醒的样子。

sentences.english: How do you stay awake during boring lectures?
sentences.chinese: 听无聊的课你是怎样不让自己睡着的？

sentences.english: Emma lay awake half the night, worrying.
sentences.chinese: 埃玛忧心忡忡，半宿都没睡着。

sentences.english: The noise brought him wide awake (=  completely awake  ) .
sentences.chinese: 那声音使他睡意全无。

sentences.english: It was midday when she awoke.
sentences.chinese: 她醒来时已是中午。

detailed_translations.english: not sleeping
to wake up, or to make someone wake up

name: plague
trans: 鼠疫； 传染病； 祸患， 灾害

sentences.english: Financial problems continued to plague the company.
sentences.chinese: 资金问题持续困扰着该公司。

detailed_translations.english: to cause pain, suffering, or trouble to someone, especially for a long period of time

name: perpetual
trans: 连续不断的； 永久的， 长期的

sentences.english: the perpetual snows of the mountaintops
sentences.chinese: 山顶的终年积雪

detailed_translations.english: permanent

sentences.english: In retrospect, I wonder if we should have done more.
sentences.chinese: 回过头看，我在想我们是否应该做得更多些。

detailed_translations.english: thinking back to a time in the past, especially with the advantage of knowing more now than you did then

sentences.english: Politics fascinated Franklin's father.
sentences.chinese: 政治让富兰克林的父亲着迷。

detailed_translations.english: If something fascinates you, it interests and delights you so much that your thoughts tend to concentrate on it

name: offer
trans: 提供；自愿给予；提出，提议
提议； 报价， 出价； 特价

sentences.english: Can I offer you something to drink?
sentences.chinese: 我给你拿点喝的好吗？

sentences.english: I can’t turn down the offer of a free trip to Milan!
sentences.chinese: 我怎能拒绝免费去米兰旅行的机会！

detailed_translations.english: to ask someone if they would like to have something, or to hold something out to them so that they can take it
a statement saying that you are willing to do something for someone or give them something

name: diplomatic
trans: 外交的， 从事外交的； 有策略的， 有手腕的， 老练的

sentences.english: Diplomatic efforts to end the fighting began on October 25.
sentences.chinese: 停战的外交努力于10月25日开始。

detailed_translations.english: relating to or involving the work of diplomats

name: projector
trans: 放映机， 幻灯机， 投影仪

sentences.english: ...a slide projector.
sentences.chinese: …幻灯机。

detailed_translations.chinese: [仪] 投影仪；放映机；探照灯；设计者
detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that makes a film or picture appear on a screen or flat surface

sentences.english: the rough draft of his new novel
sentences.chinese: 他的新小说的草稿

sentences.english: I read the first draft and thought it was very good.
sentences.chinese: 我读了第一稿，觉得非常好。

sentences.english: All parties eventually approved the final draft (= finished form ) of the peace treaty.
sentences.chinese: 各方最后都同意了和平条约的终稿。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of writing or a plan that is not yet in its finished form
to write a plan, letter, report etc that will need to be changed before it is in its finished form

sentences.english: Sarah was loath to tell her mother what had happened.
sentences.chinese: 萨拉不愿意告诉母亲所发生的事。

detailed_translations.english: to be unwilling to do something

name: complex
trans: 合成的， 综合的； 复杂的， 错综的， 难以理解的
建筑群； 综合体， 集合体； 情结

sentences.english: a complex system of highways
sentences.chinese: 复杂的公路网

sentences.english: Photosynthesis is a highly complex process.
sentences.chinese: 光合作用是一个非常复杂的过程。

sentences.english: Peter seemed to have an instant understanding of the most complex issues.
sentences.chinese: 再复杂的问题彼得似乎也是一看就明白。

sentences.english: It was a very complex relationship between two complex people.
sentences.chinese: 这是两个复杂的人之间非常复杂的关系。

detailed_translations.chinese: 由许多部分组成的，复合的；复杂的，难懂的
detailed_translations.english: consisting of many different parts and often difficult to understand

detailed_translations.chinese: 综合体， 集合体； 情结， 夸大的情绪反应
detailed_translations.english: a group of buildings, or a large building with many parts, used for a particular purpose

sentences.english: The room is kept at 72 degrees and 50% relative humidity.
sentences.chinese: 房间的温度保持在72度，相对湿度50%。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of water contained in the air

sentences.english: He is not allowed solid food yet, only fluids.
sentences.chinese: 他还不能吃固体食物，只能进流食。

sentences.english: a powerful cleaning fluid
sentences.chinese: 一种强力清洁液

detailed_translations.english: a liquid
fluid movements are smooth, relaxed, and graceful

sentences.english: a political pamphlet
sentences.chinese: 政治宣传册

detailed_translations.english: a very thin book with paper covers, that gives information about something

sentences.english: healthful mountain air
sentences.chinese: 有利于健康的山区空气

detailed_translations.english: likely to make you healthy

sentences.english: Several writers have posited the idea of a universal consciousness.
sentences.chinese: 几个作者都假设一种普遍意识的思想。

detailed_translations.english: to suggest that a particular idea should be accepted as a fact

sentences.english: an ornate gold mirror
sentences.chinese: 华丽的金镜子

detailed_translations.chinese: 华丽的；装饰的；（文体）绚丽的
detailed_translations.english: covered with a lot of decoration

sentences.english: The city has become a huge, bustling metropolis.
sentences.chinese: 这座城市已变成繁忙的大都市。

detailed_translations.english: a very large city that is the most important city in a country or area

name: documentation
trans: 文件； 归档， 文献记录

sentences.english: Applicants must provide supporting documentation .
sentences.chinese: 申请人必须提供证明文件。

detailed_translations.chinese: 文件, 证明文件, 史实, 文件编制
detailed_translations.english: official documents, reports etc that are used to prove that something is true or correct

sentences.english: Computer courses continue to proliferate.
sentences.chinese: 计算机课程层出不穷。

detailed_translations.english: if something proliferates, it increases quickly and spreads to many different places

name: personal
trans: 个人的， 私人的； 亲自的

sentences.english: My personal view is that we shouldn’t offer him the job.
sentences.chinese: 我个人认为我们不该给他这份工作。

sentences.english: Style and colour are a matter of personal taste .
sentences.chinese: 款式和颜色是个人爱好问题。

sentences.english: She took full personal responsibility for all the arrangements.
sentences.chinese: 她个人对所有的安排承担全部责任。

sentences.english: When I went to her room all her personal belongings had gone.
sentences.chinese: 我到她房间时，她所有的私人物品都已不在了。

sentences.english: After Alan’s death, his mother received his personal effects .
sentences.chinese: 艾伦死后，他母亲接收了他的私人物品。

sentences.english: I know from personal experience that you can’t trust Ralph.
sentences.chinese: 根据我的亲身经验，我认为你不能相信拉尔夫。

sentences.english: the personal qualities needed to be successful in business
sentences.chinese: 生意成功所需要的个人素质

sentences.english: The car is for personal use only.
sentences.chinese: 这辆汽车仅供私人使用。

sentences.english: On a personal level he felt sympathy for them, but he had a job to do.
sentences.chinese: 从个人角度他很同情他们，但是他有任务在身。

sentences.english: celebrities with their own personal trainer
sentences.chinese: 拥有私人健身教练的名流

detailed_translations.english: belonging or relating to one particular person, rather than to other people or to people in general

name: plastic
trans: 塑料的； 可塑的； 做作的， 虚伪的

sentences.english: a plastic spoon
sentences.chinese: 塑料汤匙

sentences.english: plastic bags
sentences.chinese: 塑料袋

detailed_translations.english: made of plastic

sentences.english: Don’t delay – send off for the information now.
sentences.chinese: 别犹豫——即刻去函索取信息。

sentences.english: He delayed his decision on whether to call an election.
sentences.chinese: 在是否宣布举行选举一事上，他推迟作出决定。

detailed_translations.english: to wait until a later time to do something

name: onslaught
trans: 冲击； 攻击， 猛攻

sentences.english: The press launched another vicious onslaught on the president.
sentences.chinese: 新闻界对这位总统进行了新一轮的恶毒抨击。

detailed_translations.english: a large violent attack by an army

name: transient
trans: 短暂的， 转瞬即逝的； 临时的

sentences.english: transient fashions
sentences.chinese: 短暂的时尚

detailed_translations.english: continuing only for a short time

detailed_translations.chinese: 瞬变现象；过往旅客；候鸟

sentences.english: He faces six charges of bringing the game into disrepute .
sentences.chinese: 他面临六项破坏这项运动声誉的指控。

sentences.english: This theory fell into disrepute in the fifties.
sentences.chinese: 这一理论在50年代时声誉尽失。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which people no longer admire or trust someone or something

name: plank
trans: 木板； 政策要点， 政纲的核心

sentences.english: Clamp one end of the plank to the edge of the table.
sentences.chinese: 把厚木板的一端用夹具固定在桌子的边上。

sentences.english: Frank put the first plank down and nailed it in place.
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克放下第一块厚木板，把它钉在合适的位置上。 。

detailed_translations.english: to cover or provide (an area) with planks
a long narrow piece of wooden board, used especially for making structures to walk on

sentences.english: In its heyday, the studio's boast was that it had more stars than there are in heaven.
sentences.chinese: 该制片厂吹嘘，它在鼎盛时期拥有的明星比天上的星星还多。

detailed_translations.english: the time when someone or something was most popular, successful, or powerful

sentences.english: Clean the rug by sponging it gently.
sentences.chinese: 用湿布轻轻擦洗以清洁小地毯。

detailed_translations.english: to put paint on a surface using a sponge
a piece of a soft natural or artificial substance full of small holes, which can suck up liquid and is used for washing

name: deal
trans: 处理， 对付； 给予； 做买卖， 经营

sentences.english: The prime minister promised farmers a new deal (= a new and fairer system ) .
sentences.chinese: 首相向农民保证推行一项新政策。

detailed_translations.english: treatment of a particular type that is given or received

sentences.english: As the sun sets over Tokyo, another case is about to reach its climax on a bridge across a spaghetti of railway lines.
sentences.chinese: 当太阳在在东京落下时，在一座横跨意大利面条似的铁路线的桥上，另一事件正要到达它的巅峰。

sentences.english: Standing in the next room, in the middle of what looked like piles of concrete spaghetti, I began to feel overpowered.
sentences.chinese: 站在下一个房间里，在这一大堆看起来就像水泥做的意大利细面条中间，我真有点受不了了。

sentences.english: Comments: This prank was one of the first to ever to be pulled on television, and although it seems a little bit out there today, at the time spaghetti was considered a delicacy in the U. K.
sentences.chinese: 点评： 瑞士面条大丰收是第一个上电视的恶作剧，尽管该主意在今天看来仍然有点不足为道，但当时恶作剧中的主角“面条”成为了英国饭桌上的精美食物。

detailed_translations.english: a type of  pasta  in very long thin pieces, that is cooked in boiling water

sentences.english: an insulated attic
sentences.chinese: 隔热[隔音]的阁楼

sentences.english: Pipes may need insulating against the cold.
sentences.chinese: 管道可能需要隔温以防冰冻。

detailed_translations.english: to cover or protect something with a material that stops electricity, sound, heat etc from getting in or out

name: scheme
trans: 密谋， 秘密策划， 图谋
计划，方案；阴谋；体系，体制

sentences.english: The money will be used for teacher training schemes.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱将用于教师培训计划。

sentences.english: a pension scheme
sentences.chinese: 退休金计划

sentences.english: a get-rich-quick scheme
sentences.chinese: 快速致富的手段

detailed_translations.english: an official plan that is intended to help people in some way, for example by providing education or training

sentences.english: the areas affected by the hurricane
sentences.chinese: 受飓风影响的地区

sentences.english: a disease that affects the central nervous system
sentences.chinese: 影响中枢神经系统的疾病

sentences.english: decisions which affect our lives
sentences.chinese: 影响我们生活的决定

sentences.english: Trading has been adversely affected by the downturn in consumer spending.
sentences.chinese: 贸易受到消费支出回落的不利影响。

sentences.english: We were all deeply affected by her death.
sentences.chinese: 我们都为她的去世深感悲痛。

detailed_translations.english: to do something that produces an effect or change in something or in someone’s situation

name: drain
trans: 下水道， 排水沟； 排放； 消耗

sentences.english: He flushed the drain.
sentences.chinese: 他用水冲排水沟。

sentences.english: The boat drifted helplessly along the drain until some people saw him.
sentences.chinese: 船儿无助地顺着排水沟漂流直到有人看见他。

detailed_translations.english: something that continuously uses a lot of time, money etc

name: smoothly
trans: 顺利地； 平稳地； 平静地

sentences.english: Traffic flowed smoothly.
sentences.chinese: 路上交通畅通。

detailed_translations.english: in a steady way, without stopping and starting again

sentences.english: The town was isolated by the floods.
sentences.chinese: 洪水使该镇与外界隔绝。

sentences.english: The US has sought to isolate Cuba both economically and politically.
sentences.chinese: 美国一直想在经济和政治上孤立古巴。

detailed_translations.english: to separate one person, group, or thing from other people or things

name: civil
trans: 市民的， 公民的， 平民的； 民事的； 国家的， 政府的； 文明的， 有教养的

sentences.english: They were married in a civil ceremony in May.
sentences.chinese: 他们在五月份举行了世俗婚礼。

detailed_translations.chinese: 公民的；民间的；文职的；有礼貌的；根据民法的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the people who live in a country

sentences.english: These skills were passed on to subsequent generations.
sentences.chinese: 这些技能代代相传。

sentences.english: subsequent pages of the book
sentences.chinese: 接下去的书页

detailed_translations.english: happening or coming after something else

name: indicate
trans: 表明， 显示； 指出， 指示； 象征， 预示； 暗示， 间接提及

sentences.english: The study indicates a connection between poverty and crime.
sentences.chinese: 研究显示贫穷和犯罪有关联。

detailed_translations.english: to show that a particular situation exists, or that something is likely to be true

sentences.english: Exercise can increase your metabolic rate.
sentences.chinese: 运动可以提高新陈代谢率。

sentences.english: the metabolic activity of the brain
sentences.chinese: 大脑的新陈代谢活动

detailed_translations.chinese: 代谢作用的， 新陈代谢的
detailed_translations.english: relating to your body’s metabolism

name: completion
trans: 完成， 实现； 结束

sentences.english: The house is nearing completion (= almost finished ) .
sentences.chinese: 房子即将完工。

sentences.english: The project has a completion date of December 22nd.
sentences.chinese: 该项目的完成日期是12月22日。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being finished

name: contain
trans: 包含， 容纳； 控制； 防止…蔓延

sentences.english: The thieves stole a purse containing bank-notes.
sentences.chinese: 小偷们偷到了一个里面有钞票的钱包。

sentences.english: The museum contains a number of original artworks.
sentences.chinese: 这家博物馆藏有一些原创艺术品。

detailed_translations.english: if something such as a bag, box, or place contains something, that thing is inside it

sentences.english: People who drop litter can be fined in some cities.
sentences.chinese: 在有些城市，乱扔垃圾的人会被罚款。

sentences.english: A litter of notes, papers, and textbooks were strewn on the desk.
sentences.chinese: 一堆笔记、考卷和课本乱七八糟地摊在桌子上。

sentences.english: The floor was littered with papers.
sentences.chinese: 地板上乱七八糟扔了许多报纸。

detailed_translations.english: waste paper, cans etc that people have thrown away and left on the ground in a public place
to leave waste paper, cans etc on the ground in a public place

name: sew
trans: 缝， 做针线活； 缝补， 缝上

sentences.english: I learned to sew at school.
sentences.chinese: 我在学校学会了缝纫。

detailed_translations.english: to use a needle and thread to make or repair clothes or to fasten something such as a button to them
to use a needle and thread to make or repair clothes or to fasten something such as a button to them

sentences.english: ...the small oval framed picture of a little boy.
sentences.chinese: …一个小男孩的镶在椭圆形框架里的小幅照片。

detailed_translations.english: Oval things have a shape that is like a circle but is wider in one direction than the other
a shape like a circle, but wider in one direction than the other

name: column
trans: 专栏； 圆柱， 支柱； 纵队

sentences.english: He writes a weekly column for ‘The Times’.
sentences.chinese: 他每周为《泰晤士报》写一篇专栏文章。

detailed_translations.english: an article on a particular subject or by a particular writer that appears regularly in a newspaper or magazine

sentences.english: No where in the article does it mention her financial status. So…what is it that leads everyone to assume she was indigent?
sentences.chinese: 在文章中哪也没提及她的财务状况。那么…究竟是什么导致每个人都认为她是贫困的？

sentences.english: They "either fail to pay anything or pay a greatly-reduced amount designed for indigent or low income patients lacking insurance, " according to DHS.
sentences.chinese: 他们“一分钱都不付或者只支付非常少的费用，原先为贫困或短缺保险的低收入病人设定的费用。”

detailed_translations.english: very poor

sentences.english: ...recent biographies of Stalin.
sentences.chinese: …近年的斯大林传记。

detailed_translations.english: a book that tells what has happened in someone’s life, written by someone else

name: procedure
trans: 程序， 手续， 步骤

sentences.english: On board, we were given the usual talk on safety procedures (= what to do if an accident happens, or to prevent an accident ) .
sentences.chinese: 在飞机上，我们听了例行的飞行安全讲解。

detailed_translations.english: a way of doing something, especially the correct or usual way

name: sample
trans: 抽样调查； 品尝， 体验

sentences.english: They took a blood sample to test for hepatitis.
sentences.chinese: 他们取了血样做肝炎化验。

detailed_translations.english: a small part or amount of something that is examined in order to find out something about the whole

detailed_translations.chinese: 从…抽样； 品尝， 体验
detailed_translations.english: to taste food or drink in order to see what it is like

sentences.english: These programs can be integrated with your existing software.
sentences.chinese: 这些程序能和你的已有的软件整合成一体。

detailed_translations.english: to combine two or more things so that they work together; to combine with sth else in this way

name: operant
trans: 运转中的；生效的；操作性的

sentences.english: The actual tests would employ the well-honed methods of operant conditioning, developed initially on pigeons, in which the test subject has first to work out what is going on by trial and error.
sentences.chinese: 实际的测试会采用精确的操作性条件反射方法，测试对象首先要清楚实验的过程和错误。

detailed_translations.chinese: 运转中的；生效的；操作性的
detailed_translations.english: producing effects; operating
a person or thing that operates

sentences.english: A cellist is always shortening and lengthening the strings.
sentences.chinese: 大提琴演奏家总是在压缩或拉长弦

sentences.english: The music was also of the highest caliber, including tenor Placido Domingo and cellist Yo-Yo Ma.
sentences.chinese: 音乐表演也是一流的，有男高音歌唱家多明戈和大提琴演奏家马友友。

sentences.english: Performed consecutively and in order, as they were by the cellist David Finckel and the pianist Wu Han in Alice Tully Hall on Sunday evening, they provide a vivid snapshot of his artistic development.
sentences.chinese: 上周日晚，在爱丽丝杜利音乐大厅，大提琴家大卫·芬科尔和钢琴家吴涵依次演奏了这五部作品，为听众清晰呈现了贝多芬音乐艺术的发展。

detailed_translations.english: someone who plays the cello

sentences.english: We have had lots of applicants for these positions.
sentences.chinese: 对这些职位我们已有了很多申请人。

detailed_translations.english: someone who has formally asked, usually in writing, for a job, university place etc

name: awesome
trans: 使人敬畏的； 使人恐惧的

sentences.english: an awesome responsibility
sentences.chinese: 一项令人惊惧的责任

sentences.english: the awesome sweep of the scenery
sentences.chinese: 连绵的壮丽景色

detailed_translations.english: extremely impressive, serious, or difficult so that you feel great respect, worry, or fear

name: admiration
trans: 钦佩， 赞赏， 羡慕

sentences.english: Daniel gazed at her in admiration .
sentences.chinese: 丹尼尔用爱慕的眼神注视着她。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of great respect and liking for something or someone

sentences.english: a space probe on its way to Jupiter
sentences.chinese: 飞向木星的一个太空探测器

detailed_translations.english: the planet that is fifth in order from the sun and is the largest in the solar system

name: pique
trans: 恼怒， 生气； 怨恨

sentences.english: Privately, Zarich was piqued that his offer was rejected.
sentences.chinese: 提议遭到拒绝，扎里克私下里很气愤。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel annoyed or upset, especially by ignoring them or making them look stupid
a feeling of being annoyed or upset, especially because someone has ignored you or insulted you

sentences.english: These disks are the remnants of planetary formation.
sentences.chinese: 这些圆盘是行星形成的剩余物质。

sentences.english: OK, this is the Bohr model, Bohr model of the atom is planetary or nuclear.
sentences.chinese: 好的，这就是波尔模型，波尔的原子模型是行星模型或者核心模型。

sentences.english: One question that has baffled planetary scientists is how oceans formed on the surface of terrestrial planets like Earth -- rocky planets made of silicate and metals.
sentences.chinese: 一个困扰着行星科学家的问题是：海洋是怎样在像地球这样由硅酸盐和金属组成的石质行星的表面形成的？

sentences.english: Ozone in the stratosphere is important because it absorbs some of the Sun’s dangerous ultraviolet radiation.
sentences.chinese: 在平流层的臭氧是重要的，因为它吸收了一些太阳中危险的紫外线辐射。

sentences.english: Birds perceive the world differently tohumans, being able to see light in the ultraviolet range of the spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 鸟类感知世界的方式和人类不同，他们能够在紫外线光谱范围内看见光线。

sentences.english: But it also says there is no evidence to support disinfecting toothbrushes in the microwave or with ultraviolet devices on the market.
sentences.chinese: 但它也说，没有证据支持在微波炉或市面上销售的紫外线设备中对牙刷消毒。

detailed_translations.english: ultraviolet light cannot be seen by people, but is responsible for making your skin darker when you are in the sun

sentences.english: How did they diagnose you?
sentences.chinese: 他们怎么给你的诊断的？

sentences.english: What tools do you need to help you diagnose the problem, and where do you get them?
sentences.chinese: 您需要什么工具来帮助您诊断问题，可以从哪里获得这些工具？

sentences.english: Evidently this springs from some defect in their nature, but it is one not altogether easy either to diagnose of to cure.
sentences.chinese: 这种情形显然源于他们本性上的某种缺陷，但是这种缺陷既不容易诊断也不容易治疗。

detailed_translations.english: to find out what illness someone has, or what the cause of a fault is, after doing tests, examinations etc

sentences.english: Local residents have drawn up a petition to protest the hospital closure.
sentences.chinese: 当地居民已草拟了一份请愿书，抗议关闭医院。

sentences.english: Villagers petitioned the local authority to provide better bus services.
sentences.chinese: 村民请愿要求地方当局提供更好的公共汽车服务。

detailed_translations.english: a written request signed by a lot of people, asking someone in authority to do something or change something
to ask the government or an organization to do something by sending them a petition

sentences.english: Things have changed somewhat since then.
sentences.chinese: 从那时候起，情况就有些不一样了。

detailed_translations.english: more than a little but not very

sentences.english: The stolen car was found in the vicinity of the station.
sentences.chinese: 被盗汽车在车站附近被发现。

sentences.english: There used to be a mill in the vicinity.
sentences.chinese: 附近曾有一座磨坊。

detailed_translations.english: in the area around a particular place

sentences.english: a rather earnest young man
sentences.chinese: 相当认真的一个年轻人

sentences.english: Matthews was in earnest conversation with a young girl.
sentences.chinese: 马修斯在和一个年轻姑娘认真地谈话。

sentences.english: an earnest desire to offer something useful to society
sentences.chinese: 为社会做贡献的真诚愿望

detailed_translations.english: very serious and sincere
if something starts happening in earnest, it begins properly – used when it was happening in a small or informal way before

sentences.english: So that satisfies the definition of validity.
sentences.chinese: 所以这满足了有效性的定义。

sentences.english: Does this argument satisfy the definition of validity or does it not?
sentences.chinese: 这个论点满足有效性的定义吗？,还是不满足？

sentences.english: While each of these might have some validity, in many cases the same general comments may also apply to many of the other projects you work on.
sentences.chinese: 尽管其中每个问题可能具有某些正确性，但是在许多情况下，一般性评论还可能适用于您从事的其他项目。

sentences.english: small creatures that hide in crevices in the rock
sentences.chinese: 藏在岩石缝里的小生物

detailed_translations.english: a narrow crack in the surface of something, especially in rock

sentences.english: a type of cloud that precedes rain
sentences.chinese: 下雨前出现的一种云

sentences.english: Lunch will be preceded by a short speech from the chairman.
sentences.chinese: 午餐开始之前主席会发表一段简短的讲话。

sentences.english: The guard preceded them down the corridor.
sentences.chinese: 警卫带领他们穿过了走廊。

detailed_translations.english: to happen or exist before something or someone, or to come before something else in a series

name: humorous
trans: 幽默的， 滑稽的， 诙谐的

sentences.english: humorous stories
sentences.chinese: 诙谐的故事

sentences.english: The film has some mildly humorous moments.
sentences.chinese: 那部电影中有些略显幽默的片段。

detailed_translations.english: funny and enjoyable

name: bet
trans: 打赌； 敢说， 确信

sentences.english: How much do you want to bet?
sentences.chinese: 你想赌多少钱？

sentences.english: a £50 bet
sentences.chinese: 50英镑的赌注

detailed_translations.english: to risk money on the result of a race, game, competition, or other future event
an agreement to risk money on the result of a race, game etc or on something happening, or the money that you risk

sentences.english: What differentiates these two periods of history?
sentences.chinese: 这两个历史时期的差别在哪里？

detailed_translations.english: to recognize or express the difference between things or people

detailed_translations.chinese: 区分， 区别； 使不同， 使有差异
detailed_translations.english: to recognize or express the difference between things or people

name: discharge
trans: 释放； 放； 解雇； 清偿； 履行

sentences.english: Sewage is discharged directly into the sea.
sentences.chinese: 污水被直接排放到海里。

sentences.english: the discharge of toxic waste into the sea
sentences.chinese: 有毒废物向海里的排放

detailed_translations.english: to send out gas, liquid, smoke etc, or to allow it to escape
when gas, liquid, smoke etc is sent out, or the substance that is sent out

name: disadvantage
trans: 缺点， 障碍， 不利之处

sentences.english: Criminal behaviour can be linked to economic disadvantage.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪行为可能会与经济困难有关。

detailed_translations.english: something that causes problems, or that makes someone or something less likely to be successful or effective

name: plaster
trans: 在…上抹灰泥， 厚厚地涂

sentences.english: She gets sunburned even when she plasters herself from head to toe in factor 7 sun lotion.
sentences.chinese: 即使她从头到脚涂抹上防晒系数是7的防晒霜，她也会被晒伤。

detailed_translations.english: a substance used to cover walls and ceilings with a smooth even surface. It consists of  lime  , water, and sand.

detailed_translations.chinese: 减轻；粘贴；涂以灰泥；敷以膏药；使平服
detailed_translations.english: If you plaster yourself in some kind of sticky substance, you cover yourself in it

sentences.english: a metropolitan area of South Australia
sentences.chinese: 南澳大利亚的一个都市区

sentences.english: ...the Ukrainian Catholic representatives, Metropolitan Volodymyr and Bishop Sofron.
sentences.chinese: 乌克兰的天主教代表——弗拉基米尔大主教和索夫龙主教

detailed_translations.english: relating or belonging to a very large city
a metropolitan is an important priest in the Orthodox and Catholic Churches. He has authority over other priests and is in charge of a particular area.

sentences.english: ...her cultural eclecticism.
sentences.chinese: ...她的文化折中主义。

detailed_translations.english: Eclecticism is the principle or practice of choosing or involving objects, ideas, and beliefs from many different sources

name: garbage
trans: 垃圾， 废物； 废话， 无聊的东西； 垃圾箱

sentences.english: Can you take out the garbage when you go?
sentences.chinese: 你走的时候把垃圾带出去好吗？

detailed_translations.english: waste material, such as paper, empty containers, and food thrown away

name: suspicious
trans: 可疑的， 令人怀疑的； 不信任的， 猜疑的， 多疑的

sentences.english: His reluctance to answer my questions made me suspicious .
sentences.chinese: 他不愿回答我的问题，这引起我的怀疑。

sentences.english: She gave him a suspicious glance.
sentences.chinese: 她向他投去怀疑的一瞥。

sentences.english: You’ve got a very suspicious mind!
sentences.chinese: 你真是疑心太重！

detailed_translations.english: thinking that someone might be guilty of doing something wrong or dishonest

name: complain
trans: 诉苦， 抱怨； 投诉； 控告

sentences.english: Residents are complaining because traffic in the area has increased.
sentences.chinese: 由于这个地区的交通流量有所增加，居民都在抱怨。

sentences.english: ‘You never ask my opinion about anything,’ Rod complained.
sentences.chinese: “你什么事都不问问我的看法。”罗德抱怨道。

sentences.english: Employees complained bitterly about working conditions.
sentences.chinese: 雇员们对工作条件十分不满。

detailed_translations.english: to say that you are annoyed, not satisfied, or unhappy about something or someone

name: polygamy
trans: 一夫多妻制， 一妻多夫制， 多配偶制

sentences.english: Abuse and coercion are only the most obvious dangers of polygamy .
sentences.chinese: 滥交和强迫性行为只是一夫多妻制最显见的危害所在。

sentences.english: The sect, which broke from the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints more than a century ago, believes polygamy brings glorification in heaven.
sentences.chinese: 这个教派，原本是一个多世纪以前从摩门教末世圣徒教会分离出来的，相信一夫多妻制可以升上天堂。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一夫多妻制， 一妻多夫制
detailed_translations.english: the practice of having more than one husband or wife at the same time

name: renovate
trans: 修复； 更新， 翻新

sentences.english: The hotel has been renovated and redecorated.
sentences.chinese: 酒店已经翻新，并重新装饰。

detailed_translations.english: to repair a building or old furniture so that it is in good condition again

name: adjust
trans: 调整， 调节； 适合， 适应； 校正， 校准

sentences.english: They’ll soon settle in – kids are very good at adjusting.
sentences.chinese: 他们很快就会习惯的——小孩子适应能力很强。

detailed_translations.english: to gradually become familiar with a new situation
to change or move something slightly to improve it or make it more suitable for a particular purpose

name: debt
trans: 债务； 负债情况； 罪过

sentences.english: He had enough money to pay off his outstanding debts.
sentences.chinese: 他有足够的钱偿还亏欠的债务。

sentences.english: students who run up huge debts
sentences.chinese: 欠下巨额债务的学生

detailed_translations.english: a sum of money that a person or organization owes

sentences.english: a perpendicular line
sentences.chinese: 垂直线

sentences.english: a perpendicular wall of rock
sentences.chinese: 直立的石壁

detailed_translations.chinese: 垂直的，正交的；直立的；陡峭的
detailed_translations.english: not leaning to one side or the other but exactly vertical
an exactly vertical position or line

sentences.english: Use a minimum of ordinate and abscissa values so they do not run together.
sentences.chinese: 使用最低限度的协调与横坐标值使他们不跑在一起。

sentences.english: It helps co - ordinate the different parts of our bodies when we have sports.
sentences.chinese: 它帮助公司——纵坐标的不同部分我们的身体当我们有运动。

sentences.english: Drag onto the page, then drag one line end to ordinate origin and one to the feature.
sentences.chinese: 拖到绘图页上，然后将一个线端拖到坐标原点，一个线端拖到部件。

detailed_translations.english: the vertical or y-coordinate of a point in a two-dimensional system of Cartesian coordinates

sentences.english: French and German were deemed essential.
sentences.chinese: 法语和德语被认为是必需的。

detailed_translations.english: to think of something in a particular way or as having a particular quality

name: stiffen
trans: 变僵硬； 变坚定， 变强硬

sentences.english: a campaign to stiffen rules against drink-driving
sentences.chinese: 要求对酒后驾车严加管制的运动

sentences.english: Their opposition only stiffened my resolve .
sentences.chinese: 他们的反对只是更加坚定了我的决心。

detailed_translations.english: to become stronger, more severe, or more determined, or to make something do this

sentences.english: ...the introduction of legislation to compel cyclists to wear a helmet.
sentences.chinese: …强制骑车人戴头盔的法律的引入。

detailed_translations.english: to force someone to do something

name: depress
trans: 降低， 削弱； 使沮丧； 使萧条

sentences.english: The thought of taking the exam again depressed him.
sentences.chinese: 想到要补考，他就心情沮丧。

sentences.english: It depresses me that nobody seems to care.
sentences.chinese: 似乎没有人在乎，这让我感到很沮丧。

sentences.english: Depress the clutch fully.
sentences.chinese: 把离合器踩到底。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel very unhappy

sentences.english: a ruby pendant
sentences.chinese: 红宝石吊坠

detailed_translations.english: a jewel, stone etc that hangs from a thin chain that you wear around your neck

name: repress
trans: 克制， 抑制； 镇压， 压制

sentences.english: He had long ago repressed the painful memories of his childhood.
sentences.chinese: 他长久压抑着儿时的痛苦记忆。

detailed_translations.english: if someone represses upsetting feelings, memories etc, they do not allow themselves to express or think about them

sentences.english: See if you can solve this riddle .
sentences.chinese: 看看你能不能猜出这个谜语。

detailed_translations.english: to solve, explain, or interpret (a riddle or riddles)

detailed_translations.chinese: 谜语；粗筛；谜一般的人、东西、事情等
detailed_translations.english: a question that is deliberately very confusing and has a humorous or clever answer

sentences.english: Have customers been fully apprised of the advantages?
sentences.chinese: 客户有没有被充分告知各项好处呢？

detailed_translations.english: to tell or give someone information about something

name: candid
trans: 坦白的， 直率的， 直言不讳的

sentences.english: It struck me as an unusually candid confession for a politician.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得这对一个政治家来说是非常坦率的告白了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 公正的；坦白的；率直的；偷拍的
detailed_translations.english: telling the truth, even when the truth may be unpleasant or embarrassing

name: client
trans: 委托人， 当事人； 顾客

sentences.english: a meeting with an important client
sentences.chinese: 与一位重要客户的会面

detailed_translations.english: someone who gets services or advice from a professional person, company, or organization

sentences.english: ...its usual diet of plankton and other small organisms.
sentences.chinese: ...它通常赖以为食的浮游生物和其他微生物。

detailed_translations.english: the very small forms of plant and animal life that live in water, especially the sea, and are eaten by fish

name: conversion
trans: 转变， 变换； 改变信仰， 皈依

sentences.english: ...the conversion of disused rail lines into cycle routes.
sentences.chinese: …把废弃的铁路改变成自行车道。

detailed_translations.english: when you change something from one form, purpose, or system to a different one

name: brilliant
trans: 给人印象深刻的； 闪耀的； 杰出的， 卓越的

sentences.english: She closed her eyes against the brilliant light.
sentences.chinese: 强烈的光线下，她闭起了眼睛。

sentences.english: We sat outside in the brilliant sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 我们坐在外面，沐浴在灿烂的阳光下。

sentences.english: She was dressed in brilliant white.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着一身耀眼的白色。

sentences.english: The film was absolutely brilliant.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影极为出色。

detailed_translations.english: brilliant light or colour is very bright and strong

name: practical
trans: 实用的； 实际的； 现实的

sentences.english: Candidates should have training and practical experience in basic electronics.
sentences.chinese: 应征者应该具备基础电子学方面的培训和实践经验。

sentences.english: the practical problems of old age
sentences.chinese: 老年的实际问题

sentences.english: They provide financial and practical help for disabled students.
sentences.chinese: 他们为残障学生提供经济上的援助以及实际的帮助。

sentences.english: a combination of theoretical and practical training
sentences.chinese: 理论培训和实践培训的结合

sentences.english: They haven’t thought about the practical consequences of the new regulations.
sentences.chinese: 他们没有考虑过新法规会产生什么实际后果。

sentences.english: In practical terms, this means spending more time with each student.
sentences.chinese: 具体地说，这意味着花更多的时间和每个学生在一起。

detailed_translations.english: relating to real situations and events rather than ideas, emotions etc

sentences.english: deductive reasoning
sentences.chinese: 演绎推理

detailed_translations.english: using the knowledge and information you have in order to understand or form an opinion about something

sentences.english: His breathing was deep and regular.
sentences.chinese: 他的呼吸深沉而均匀。

sentences.english: When I picked up the phone, all I heard was heavy breathing (=  loud breathing  ) .
sentences.chinese: 我拿起电话，只听到粗重的呼吸声。

detailed_translations.english: the process of breathing air in and out

name: bound
trans: 跳跃； 弹回； 形成…的界线， 给…划界

sentences.english: Don’t lie to her. She’s bound to find out.
sentences.chinese: 别骗她，她肯定会发现的。

sentences.english: When you are dealing with so many patients, mistakes are bound to happen.
sentences.chinese: 你要照顾这么多病人，失误在所难免。

detailed_translations.english: to be very likely to do or feel a particular thing

name: falter
trans: 衰退， 衰落； 发抖， 结巴地说； 蹒跚

sentences.english: Laurie’s voice faltered as she tried to thank him.
sentences.chinese: 劳丽想谢谢他，却说得结结巴巴的。

sentences.english: ‘I can’t,’ she faltered.
sentences.chinese: “我做不到。”她支支吾吾地说道。

detailed_translations.english: to speak in a voice that sounds weak and uncertain, and keeps stopping

sentences.english: Spaniels are my favourite breed of dog.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙猎犬是我最喜欢的犬种。

sentences.english: Eagles breed during the cooler months of the year.
sentences.chinese: 鹰在一年中较凉爽的季节交配繁殖。

detailed_translations.english: a type of animal that is kept as a pet or on a farm
if animals breed, they  mate in order to have babies

name: elusive
trans: 难以理解的， 难懂的； 难捕捉的； 逃避的

sentences.english: She enjoys a firm reputation in this country but wider international success has been elusive.
sentences.chinese: 她在这个国家享有稳固的声誉，但却一直难以在国际上取得更大的成功。

detailed_translations.chinese: 难懂的；易忘的；逃避的；难捉摸的
detailed_translations.english: an elusive result is difficult to achieve

name: appraise
trans: 估价； 估量； 评价， 评定

sentences.english: Greenpeace has been invited to appraise the environmental costs of such an operation.
sentences.chinese: 绿色和平组织已受邀评估这样一次行动对环境的影响。

detailed_translations.english: to officially judge how successful, effective, or valuable something is

name: pyramid

详述； 详细制订， 精心制作

sentences.chinese: 绣有精美图案的真丝衣服

If you elaborate on something that has been said, you say more about it, or give more details

sentences.english: What important dream have you yet to realize and fulfill?

sentences.chinese: 她希望睡一觉之后会消除疲劳。

sentences.english: After computer printers and duffle bags had been carried to dorm rooms, everyone gathered in the gymnasium, students on one side of the bleachers, parents on the other.
sentences.chinese: 电脑打印机和行李包都运进了宿舍之后，所有人都到学校的体育馆集合，学生在露天看台的一侧，家长们在另一侧。

detailed_translations.english: a  gym

sentences.english: This little spheroid sports thousands of tiny hairs around the outer edge of its body called cilia that propel it at lightning speeds through freshwater scum.
sentences.chinese: 这个小小的球状体的身体外壳上有着上千条细小的发丝，叫做纤毛，推进它以闪电般的速度穿行于淡水泡沫中。

sentences.english: The difference of the marks between the geoid and the spheroid is determined by the direction of geological processes in upper envelopes of the earth.
sentences.chinese: 地球体与球体之间标志的差异，是由地球外壳中地质作用的方向所确定的。

sentences.chinese: 一个牧牛人赶着一群牛在一家石油加工厂附近经过。

sentences.chinese: 他把她诱骗到家里，然后用父亲的枪把她打死。

sentences.english: In Book One alone there are four primary instances of what we can think of as this primary simile dynamic.
sentences.chinese: 仅第一本里就有四个主要的例证,我们可以看作最初的明喻来源的动力。

sentences.english: Lister said people should follow the 1946 advice of writer George Orwell: "Never use a metaphor, simile, or other figure of speech which you are used to seeing in print.
sentences.chinese: 李斯特说人们最好遵循作家乔治·奥威尔1946年提出的建议：“不要使用那些在各种出版物上频繁出现的暗喻、明喻或其他修辞格。”

sentences.english: The simile is a common device and a useful one, but similes coming in rapid fire, one right on top of another, are more distracting than illuminating.
sentences.chinese: 明喻是常用的修辞术，也很好用，但是像连珠炮式的比喻与其说是富有启发性，不如说是在转移注意力。

sentences.chinese: 这种药会引发肝脏炎症。

sentences.chinese: 一直搅拌到糖溶解掉。

sentences.chinese: 女性在职场中仍然面临歧视。

sentences.english: It takes a long time to overcome these kinds of prejudices.
sentences.chinese: 战胜这些偏见需要假以时日。

sentences.chinese: 你没有量准角度。

detailed_translations.english: someone who enters another country to live there permanently

sentences.chinese: 他急需治疗。

sentences.english: The report called for urgent action to reduce lead in petrol.

sentences.chinese: 一个小包袱，里面主要是衣服
