sentences.chinese: 他被塞进一辆小汽车，被带到50英里外的警察局。

detailed_translations.english: a group of things such as papers, clothes, or sticks that are fastened or tied together

detailed_translations.chinese: 收集， 归拢； 把…塞入
detailed_translations.english: If someone is bundled somewhere, someone pushes them there in a rough and hurried way

sentences.english: But the rain might have come too late to save many farmers' corn and soybean crops.
sentences.chinese: 但这场雨可能来得太晚了，无力挽救许多农民的玉米和大豆作物。

sentences.english: Through baking and shelf life experiments, the application of soybean protein to the cake was studied.
sentences.chinese: 通过焙烤和货架期实验，就大豆蛋白在蛋糕中的应用进行了研究。

sentences.english: If the answer is no, you really need to get some professional counseling to determine if this marriage should be saved.
sentences.chinese: 如果回答是否定的，你就真的该去咨询一下专家，决定一下你是否改维持这段婚姻了。

sentences.english: In this study, the participants who took advantage of group and individual counseling offered as part of the diets had far greater success than those who chose to go it alone.
sentences.chinese: 在这个研究中，充分利用作为饮食原则一部分的团队和个人咨询的参与者你那些选择自己进行的参与者得到了更大的成效。

sentences.english: Despite counseling and written advice about how to maintain their new weights, they gained an average of 12 pounds back over the next year.
sentences.chinese: 尽管有如何保持研究者各自重获得的新体重方面的咨询与书面建议，但在过去一年里平均每人仍增重12磅左右。

name: thorn
trans: 刺， 荆棘； 带刺小灌木

sentences.english: a long, low hedge of thorns
sentences.chinese: 一长排矮矮的荆棘树篱

detailed_translations.english: a sharp point that grows on the stem of a plant such as a rose

name: break
trans: 破，裂，碎；使中止，打断，断绝；损坏，弄坏；违犯；打破；破晓
打断， 中止； 休息时间； 破裂

sentences.english: I had to break a window to get into the house.
sentences.chinese: 我只得打破一扇窗户进屋。

detailed_translations.english: if you break something, you make it separate into two or more pieces, for example by hitting it, dropping it, or bending it

sentences.english: ...music by Strauss, Mozart, Beethoven, and other great composers.
sentences.chinese: …施特劳斯、莫扎特、贝多芬及其他伟大作曲家创作的音乐。

detailed_translations.english: someone who writes music

name: predominate
trans: 统治， 支配， 占优势

sentences.english: In this type of case, the rights of the parent predominate.
sentences.chinese: 像这样的案例，要首先考虑父母的权利。

detailed_translations.english: to have the most importance or influence, or to be most easily noticed

sentences.chinese: 渗透性材料

sentences.english: a systematic approach to solving the problem

detailed_translations.english: done according to a system or plan, in a thorough, efficient or determined way

sentences.english: Suntanning first came into vogue in the mid-1930s.
sentences.chinese: 晒黑皮肤最早流行于20世纪30年代中期。

sentences.english: The ability of coal to release a combustible gas has long been known.
sentences.chinese: 煤能够释放易燃气体这一点早已为人所知。

detailed_translations.english: able to burn easily

sentences.english: Professor Dippet told him that he was too young at eighteen, but invited him to reapply in a few years, if he still wished to teach.
sentences.chinese: 迪佩特教授说他才十八岁，太年轻了，但欢迎他过两年再来申请，如果到那时他还想教书的话。

sentences.english: The new guidelines also mandate that products include directions to reapply regularly and prohibit brands from claiming on their labels that their sunscreens are sweat proof or waterproof.
sentences.chinese: 新准则还强制规定，产品要定期进行方向再申请，并禁止在其标签上声称，其防晒霜是防汗或防水的。

sentences.english: Nanny put on a shawl and told the girls to do likewise.
sentences.chinese: 南妮披上披肩，并叫女孩们也这样做。

sentences.english: The clams were delicious. Likewise, the eggplant was excellent.
sentences.chinese: 蛤蜊味道鲜美，茄子也同样美味。

sentences.english: ‘You’re always welcome at our house.’ ‘Likewise.’
sentences.chinese: “欢迎你随时来我家做客。”“你也一样。

detailed_translations.english: in the same way

sentences.english: bacon and eggs
sentences.chinese: 咸猪肉煎蛋

detailed_translations.english: salted or smoked meat from the back or sides of a pig, often served in narrow thin pieces

sentences.english: She keeps a bottle of gin hidden behind a stack of books.
sentences.chinese: 她在一堆书的后面藏了一瓶杜松子酒。

detailed_translations.english: to deliberately put or keep something or someone in a place where they cannot easily be seen or found

sentences.english: The color is used for the area covered by a (multi-)polygon or the line of a (multi-)linestring.
sentences.chinese: 颜色用于显示一个（多）多边形所覆盖的区域或一个（多）行字符串的行。

sentences.english: If the horizontal line drawn is aligned with a polygon vertex, then only the segments that are below the line are counted.
sentences.chinese: 如果所绘制的水平线与一个多边形顶点对齐，那么只会计算位于该线下方的部分。

sentences.english: Although the bounding box is a polygon defining the area represented for the user, I simplify and use one point of this data.
sentences.chinese: 尽管这个边界框是一个用于定义表示用户的区域的多边形，但我简化并使用这些数据的一个点。

detailed_translations.english: a flat shape with three or more sides

name: corporate
trans: 法人的， 公司的； 共同的， 全体的

sentences.english: The company is moving its corporate headquarters (= main offices ) from New York to Houston.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司要把总部从纽约迁到休斯敦。

sentences.english: Vince is vice-president of corporate communications.
sentences.chinese: 文斯是负责企业宣传的副总裁。

sentences.english: Corporate America is not about to be converted to the environmentalist cause.
sentences.chinese: 美国企业界不打算投身环保事业。

sentences.english: changing the corporate culture (= the way that people in a corporation think and behave ) to accept family-friendly policies
sentences.chinese: 改变公司文化，采取更关怀家庭的政策

sentences.english: an advertising campaign intended to reinforce our corporate identity
sentences.chinese: 旨在加强我们公司形象的广告宣传活动

sentences.english: The yacht can be hired for corporate hospitality (= entertainment provided by companies for their customers ) .
sentences.chinese: 可以租下这艘游艇用于公司招待客户。

detailed_translations.chinese: 法人团体的， 公司的； 全体的， 共同的
detailed_translations.english: belonging to or relating to a corporation

sentences.english: (= I have been told ) to give the package to him personally.
sentences.chinese: 我接到的指示是亲手把包裹交给他。

sentences.english: Make sure you carry out the doctor’s instructions.
sentences.chinese: 你一定要遵照医生的嘱咐。

sentences.english: The school gives instruction in first aid.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校教授急救课

detailed_translations.english: a statement telling someone what they must do

name: shuffle
trans: 拖着脚走； 洗； 蒙混； 搅乱

sentences.english: Is it my turn to shuffle?
sentences.chinese: 轮到我洗牌了吗？

sentences.english: Just shuffle the cards .
sentences.chinese: 请洗牌吧。

detailed_translations.chinese: 洗牌；推诿，推卸；拖曳，慢吞吞地走；搅乱
detailed_translations.english: to mix  playing card s  into a different order before playing a game with them

detailed_translations.chinese: 洗牌，洗纸牌；混乱，蒙混；拖着脚走
detailed_translations.english: a slow walk in which you do not lift your feet off the ground

name: constant
trans: 坚定的；稳定的；不变的，持续的

sentences.english: There was a constant stream of visitors to the house.
sentences.chinese: 参观这幢房子的游客川流不息。

sentences.english: Amy lived in constant fear of being attacked.
sentences.chinese: 埃米一直生活在害怕遭到袭击的恐惧之中。

sentences.english: He kept in constant contact with his family while he was in Australia.
sentences.chinese: 他在澳大利亚时一直和家人保持着联系。

sentences.english: travelling at a constant speed
sentences.chinese: 以恒定速度行驶

detailed_translations.english: happening regularly or all the time

sentences.english: a debatable point
sentences.chinese: 有争议的地方

sentences.english: Whether the object was used for rituals is highly debatable .
sentences.chinese: 这一物件是否曾用作礼器有很大的争议。

detailed_translations.chinese: 未决定的， 有争执的
detailed_translations.english: things that are debatable are not certain because people have different opinions about them

sentences.english: The nation lamented the death of its great war leader.
sentences.chinese: 举国上下都在哀悼他们伟大的战时领袖。

detailed_translations.english: to express feelings of great sadness about something
a song, piece of music, or something that you say, that expresses a feeling of sadness

sentences.english: The response to the jury’s verdict was one of outrage.
sentences.chinese: 陪审团的裁决引发了愤慨。

sentences.english: a sense of moral outrage
sentences.chinese: 一种义愤填膺的感觉

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of great anger and shock

detailed_translations.chinese: 凌辱，强奸；对…施暴行；激起愤怒
detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel very angry and shocked

name: diffuse
trans: 散播， 传播； 漫射， 扩散
扩散的， 漫射的； 冗长的

sentences.english: The pollutants diffuse into the soil.
sentences.chinese: 污染物渗进了土壤。

sentences.english: Their ideas diffused quickly across Europe.
sentences.chinese: 他们的观点很快在欧洲传播开来。

sentences.english: His writing is diffuse and difficult to understand.
sentences.chinese: 他写的东西冗长难懂。

detailed_translations.english: to make heat, light, liquid etc spread through something, or to spread like this
using a lot of words and not explaining things clearly and directly

name: communal
trans: 公共的， 共享的； 社区的

sentences.english: a communal bathroom
sentences.chinese: 一个公用浴室

detailed_translations.english: shared by a group of people or animals, especially a group who live together

name: split
trans: 分开，分裂；撕裂；分担，分享；断绝关系，分手
裂口； 分化， 分裂

sentences.english: The branch split under their weight.
sentences.chinese: 树枝承受不住他们的重量断裂了。

sentences.english: In a severe gale the ship split in two.
sentences.chinese: 在一次强劲的大风中那艘船断成了两半。

sentences.english: If the chicken is fairly small, you may simply split it in half.
sentences.chinese: 要是鸡不太大，你把它分成两半就行。

detailed_translations.english: to divide or separate something into different parts or groups, or to be divided into different parts or groups
If something splits or if you split it, it is divided into two or more parts

name: contagious
trans: 传染性的； 有感染力的

sentences.english: her contagious enthusiasm
sentences.chinese: 她那富有感染力的热情

detailed_translations.english: if a feeling, attitude, or action is contagious, other people are quickly affected by it and begin to have it or do it

name: immerse
trans: 使浸没于； 使沉浸于， 使陷入

sentences.english: She immersed herself in her work.
sentences.chinese: 她埋头工作。

detailed_translations.english: to become or make sb completely involved in sth

name: publication
trans: 出版， 发行； 出版物； 公布， 发表

sentences.english: The guide is being translated into several languages for publication near Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 这本指南正被翻译成好几种语言，准备在圣诞节前后出版。

sentences.english: a delay in the publication of the exam results
sentences.chinese: 考试成绩的延期公布

detailed_translations.english: the act of printing a book, a magazine, etc. and making it available to the public; a book, a magazine, etc. that has been published

sentences.english: My feelings for Lauren were pure lust.
sentences.chinese: 我对劳伦的感觉纯粹是肉欲。

detailed_translations.english: very strong sexual desire, especially when it does not include love

sentences.english: He looked at her with sardonic amusement.
sentences.chinese: 他带着嘲讽的愉悦神情看着她。

detailed_translations.english: showing that you do not have a good opinion of someone or something, and feel that you are better than them

name: squirt
trans: 喷射； 〈口， 贬〉无名小辈

sentences.english: Some kids squirted a water pistol in her face.
sentences.chinese: 有几个小孩用水枪朝她脸上喷水。

sentences.english: It just needs a little squirt of oil.
sentences.chinese: 它只需喷点油。

detailed_translations.english: if you squirt liquid or if it squirts somewhere, it is forced out in a thin fast stream

detailed_translations.chinese: 喷射； 〈口， 贬〉无名小辈
detailed_translations.english: Squirt is also a noun

name: sow
trans: 播种， 种； 灌输； 煽动

sentences.english: Sow the seeds in late March.
sentences.chinese: 三月底播种。

detailed_translations.english: to plant or scatter seeds on a piece of ground
a fully grown female pig

sentences.english: petroleum-based products
sentences.chinese: 石油产品

detailed_translations.english: oil that is obtained from below the surface of the Earth and is used to make petrol,  paraffin  , and various chemical substances

name: novice
trans: 生手， 新手； 新信徒

sentences.english: The computer course is ideal for novices.
sentences.chinese: 这门计算机课程非常适合初学者。

sentences.english: This trail is not recommended for novice bikers.
sentences.chinese: 不建议自行车新手走这条小路。

detailed_translations.english: someone who has no experience in a skill, subject, or activity

name: portraiture
trans: 画像技法； 肖像， 画像

sentences.english: The dispute illuminates the primitive nature of our attitude to portraiture.
sentences.chinese: 这一争论阐释了我们对肖像画的态度的本性。

sentences.english: Whatever our instincts to see a portrait as a tribute to a great person, the reality is that portraiture is a window on the past, warts and all.
sentences.chinese: 无论我们将肖像视为向伟大人物致敬的本能是什么，现实是肖像画是一扇毫不掩饰的面对过往的窗户。

sentences.english: He said these included the inclusion of a small, fleshy bulge at the upper corner of Shakespeare’s left eye, a detail typical of the minor adjustments made in original portraiture.
sentences.chinese: 他说，这些改变如莎士比亚的左眼上角微小凸起的肌肉，这是画家对原来肖像画所做细小调整的典型细节。

detailed_translations.english: the art of painting or drawing pictures of people

sentences.english: a diplomat who had a peripheral role in the negotiations
sentences.chinese: 在谈判中发挥辅助作用的外交官

sentences.english: Her involvement in the case was peripheral.
sentences.chinese: 她在这宗案件中是从犯。

detailed_translations.chinese: 外围的；次要的；（神经）末梢区域的
detailed_translations.english: not as important as other things or people in a particular activity, idea, or situation
a piece of equipment that is connected to a computer and used with it, for example a  printer

name: incoming
trans: 引入的；新任的；正来临的，刚收到的

sentences.english: When others check in their code, you will see it as incoming to your workspace.
sentences.chinese: 当其他人核查他们的代码时，您将看到它像引入您的工作空间一样。

sentences.english: Reject no incoming request, regardless of the impact they may have on service level agreements.
sentences.chinese: 不拒绝任何传入的请求，不管它们会对服务水平协议产生什么影响。

sentences.english: You can see how using this mechanism enables you to influence the behavior of the ESB, and how it handles incoming requests based on policy definitions you store in the registry.
sentences.chinese: 您可以看到使用此机制如何使您能够影响 ESB 的行为，以及它如何基于您存储在注册中心的策略定义对传入请求进行处理。

name: inanimate
trans: 无生命的； 无生气的

sentences.english: an inanimate object
sentences.chinese: 无生命的物体

detailed_translations.english: not living

sentences.english: Your arms should be at the same level as your desk.
sentences.chinese: 手臂应该与桌子齐平。

sentences.english: The floors in the old house were not completely level.
sentences.chinese: 老房子的地面不是完全平整的。

detailed_translations.english: the height of something in relation to the ground or to another object
flat and not sloping in any direction

name: preserve
trans: 保护， 维护； 保存， 保养

sentences.english: We must encourage the planting of new trees and preserve our existing woodlands.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须鼓励栽种新树木，同时也要保护现有的林地。

detailed_translations.english: to save something or someone from being harmed or destroyed

sentences.english: lush carpets
sentences.chinese: 华丽的地毯

detailed_translations.chinese: 丰富的，豪华的；苍翠繁茂的
detailed_translations.english: very beautiful, comfortable, and expensive
an  alcoholic

name: establish
trans: 建立， 设立； 安置， 使定居； 确定， 证实

sentences.english: He’d already begun to establish quite a reputation as a journalist.
sentences.chinese: 身为记者，他已经声名鹊起。

sentences.english: He had three years in which to establish himself as Prime Minister.
sentences.chinese: 他有三年时间来确立自己首相的地位。

detailed_translations.english: to make people accept that you can do something, or that you have a particular quality

sentences.english: One of the two mammoth museums.
sentences.chinese: 两个猛犸象博物馆中的一个。

sentences.english: Partial remains of five mastodons, three Ice Age bison and a juvenile Columbian mammoth, as well as plant matter and insects, have also been found.
sentences.chinese: 同时发现的还有五头乳齿象、三头冰河期野牛和一只少年哥伦比亚猛犸象的遗骸，以及植物和昆虫。

detailed_translations.english: an animal like a large hairy  elephant  that lived on Earth thousands of years ago
extremely large

name: relevant
trans: 相关的， 有关的； 中肯的， 贴切的； 有价值的， 有意义的

sentences.english: Relevant documents were presented in court.
sentences.chinese: 法庭上出示了相关的文件。

sentences.english: We received all the relevant information.
sentences.chinese: 我们收到了所有相关信息。

detailed_translations.english: directly relating to the subject or problem being discussed or considered

sentences.english: The company’s financial difficulties have deterred potential investors.
sentences.chinese: 该公司的财务困境令潜在的投资者望而却步。

detailed_translations.english: to stop someone from doing something, by making them realize it will be difficult or have bad results

sentences.english: synthetic chemicals
sentences.chinese: 合成化学品

detailed_translations.english: produced by combining different artificial substances, rather than being naturally produced

name: proclaim
trans: 宣布， 声明； 显示

sentences.english: The President proclaimed the republic’s independence.
sentences.chinese: 总统宣布共和国独立。

detailed_translations.chinese: 宣告，公布；声明；表明；赞扬
detailed_translations.english: to say publicly or officially that something important is true or exists

sentences.english: She bunched the cloth up and threw it away.
sentences.chinese: 她把布揉成一团扔了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 集中， 挤在一起； 形成一束
detailed_translations.english: to pull material together tightly in folds
a group of things that are fastened, held, or growing together
to hold or tie things together in a bunch

name: jolt
trans: 震动， 颠簸； 震惊； 一阵强烈的感情等

sentences.english: We jolted along rough wet roads through an endless banana plantation.
sentences.chinese: 我们沿崎岖潮湿的公路颠簸着驶过无边无际的香蕉种植园。

detailed_translations.english: to move suddenly and roughly, or to make someone or something move in this way

detailed_translations.chinese: 颠簸；摇晃；震惊；严重挫折
detailed_translations.english: a sudden shock

sentences.english: large-scale military offensives which could jeopardize the UN peace process
sentences.chinese: 可能会破坏联合国和平进程的大规模军事进攻

detailed_translations.english: to risk losing or spoiling something important

sentences.english: Wright grew frustrated with American provincialism.
sentences.chinese: 赖特对美国的地方偏狭观念愈发感到沮丧。

detailed_translations.english: Provincialism is the holding of old-fashioned attitudes and opinions, which some people think is typical of people in areas away from the capital city or any large city of a country

name: predominant
trans: 占优势的， 主导的， 支配的； 显著的， 盛行的

sentences.english: the predominant group in society
sentences.chinese: 社会中的主导群体

sentences.english: In this painting, the predominant colour is black.
sentences.chinese: 这幅画的主色调是黑色。

detailed_translations.english: more powerful, more common, or more easily noticed than others

name: domesticate
trans: 驯养， 驯化； 使精于家务， 使喜爱家居

sentences.english: We domesticated the dog to help us with hunting.
sentences.chinese: 我们驯养狗来帮助我们打猎。

detailed_translations.english: to make an animal able to work for people or live with them as a pet

name: recipe
trans: 食谱； 方法， 秘诀， 诀窍

sentences.english: a recipe book
sentences.chinese: 一本烹饪书

detailed_translations.english: a set of instructions for cooking a particular type of food

sentences.english: The peacocks roost in nearby shrubs.
sentences.chinese: 那只孔雀在附近的灌木丛里栖息。

detailed_translations.english: if a bird roosts, it rests or sleeps somewhere
a place where birds rest and sleep

sentences.english: It’s not easy to apportion blame (=  say who deserves to be blamed  ) when a marriage breaks up.
sentences.chinese: 婚姻破裂很难说是谁的错。

detailed_translations.english: to decide how something should be shared among various people

name: mental
trans: 精神的； 智力的； 精神健康的

sentences.english: The centre provides help for people suffering from mental illness .
sentences.chinese: 该中心对精神病患者提供帮助。

sentences.english: Stress has an effect on both your physical and mental health .
sentences.chinese: 压力对身体健康和心理健康都有影响。

detailed_translations.chinese: 心理的， 精神的， 思想上的； 精神病的； 智力的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the health or state of someone’s mind

name: decent
trans: 体面的； 适当的， 得体的； 令人满意的； 正派的

sentences.english: a decent burial
sentences.chinese: 得体的葬礼

sentences.english: Paul visited the local bars more frequently than was decent for a senior lecturer.
sentences.chinese: 保罗过于频繁地光顾当地酒吧，不太合乎高级讲师的身份。

sentences.english: The chairman did the decent thing (= did what people thought he ought to ) and resigned.
sentences.chinese: 主席体面地辞去了职务。

detailed_translations.english: following moral standards that are acceptable to society

name: afloat
trans: 漂浮的；有偿债能力的，能维持下去的

sentences.english: They talked modestly of their valiant efforts to keep the tanker afloat.
sentences.chinese: 他们谦虚地谈论了他们为让油轮保持不沉而付出的英勇努力。

detailed_translations.english: If someone or something is afloat, they remain partly above the surface of water and do not sink

detailed_translations.chinese: 漂浮的；有偿债能力的，能维持下去的
detailed_translations.english: floating on water

name: switch
trans: 转变， 改变； 交换， 掉换
开关，电闸；转换，改变；枝条，鞭子

sentences.english: The terrorists will switch tactics .
sentences.chinese: 恐怖分子会改变战术。

detailed_translations.english: to change from doing or using one thing to doing or using another

name: auxiliary
trans: 辅助的， 补助的， 补充的； 备用的， 后备的

sentences.english: a nursing auxiliary
sentences.chinese: 护理辅助人员

detailed_translations.chinese: 助动词；辅助者，辅助物；附属机构
detailed_translations.english: a worker who provides additional help for another group of workers
auxiliary workers provide additional help for another group of workers

name: savage
trans: 凶残的；野蛮的，未开化的

sentences.english: a savage dog
sentences.chinese: 一条凶猛的狗

sentences.english: a savage murder
sentences.chinese: 凶残的谋杀

detailed_translations.chinese: 野蛮的；残酷的；狂怒的；荒凉的
detailed_translations.english: very violent or cruel

detailed_translations.chinese: 未开化的人；粗鲁的人；残暴成性的人
detailed_translations.english: a very offensive word for someone who has a simple, traditional way of life
if an animal such as a dog savages someone, it attacks them and injures them badly

name: viable
trans: 可行的， 可实施的； 可生长发育的

sentences.english: viable seeds
sentences.chinese: 可存活的种子

detailed_translations.chinese: 可行的；能养活的；能生育的
detailed_translations.english: a viable idea, plan, or method can work successfully

sentences.english: Victor’s facial expression didn’t change.
sentences.chinese: 维克托脸上的表情没有变化。

sentences.english: facial hair
sentences.chinese: 脸部的汗毛

detailed_translations.chinese: 面部的，表面的；脸的，面部用的
detailed_translations.english: on your face or relating to your face
if you have a facial, you have a beauty treatment in which your face is cleaned and creams are rubbed into it

name: by-product
trans: 副产品； 副作用， 意外结果

sentences.english: The raw material for the tyre is a byproduct of oil refining.
sentences.chinese: 这种轮胎的原料是汽油提炼的副产品。

detailed_translations.english: something additional that is produced during a natural or industrial process

sentences.english: No one could console her when Peter died.
sentences.chinese: 彼得去世时没人能够安慰她。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel better when they are feeling sad or disappointed
a flat board that contains the controls for a machine, piece of electrical equipment, computer etc

name: auspicious
trans: 吉兆的， 吉利的； 幸运的

sentences.english: The new boy had an auspicious first day in the elementary school.
sentences.chinese: 这个新来的男孩在小学校里有幸运的第一天。

sentences.english: On the reverse the same inscription is repeated, besides a row of five Swastikas as auspicious symbols signifying security and good luck.
sentences.chinese: 倒转的同样碑刻是重复的，此外一排五个纳粹党所用的十字记号如幸运的符号表示安全和好运。

detailed_translations.english: showing that something is likely to be successful

name: chance
trans: 碰巧， 偶然发生； 冒…的险
机会；可能性，偶然性；偶然的事

sentences.english: If someone invited me over to Florida, I’d jump at the chance (= use the opportunity eagerly ) .
sentences.chinese: 如果有人邀请我去佛罗里达，我会赶紧抓住这个机会。

sentences.english: There’s always the chance that something will go wrong.
sentences.chinese: 总有可能会出现问题。

sentences.english: If we did move to London, I’d stand a much better chance (= have a much better chance ) of getting a job.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们真的搬到伦敦去，我找到工作的机会就大多了。

sentences.english: There is little chance of her being found alive.
sentences.chinese: 她生还的可能性很小。

detailed_translations.english: a time or situation which you can use to do something that you want to do

sentences.english: When somebody comes for treatment I always ask them if they are on any medication.
sentences.chinese: 有人来治疗时，我总是会问他们是否在服药。

detailed_translations.chinese: 药物；药物治疗；药物处理
detailed_translations.english: medicine or drugs given to people who are ill

name: demanding
trans: 苛求的， 难满足的； 需要高的， 费力的

sentences.english: a demanding job
sentences.chinese: 高要求的工作

detailed_translations.chinese: 苛求的；要求高的；吃力的
detailed_translations.english: needing a lot of ability, effort, or skill

sentences.english: an electric drill
sentences.chinese: 电钻

sentences.english: rifle drill
sentences.chinese: 步枪操练

sentences.english: Drill a hole in each corner.
sentences.chinese: 在每个角上钻一个孔。

detailed_translations.english: a tool or machine used for making holes in something
to make a hole in something using a drill

sentences.english: The number of prisoners increased as a corollary of the government's determination to combat violent crime.
sentences.chinese: 政府决心打击暴力犯罪，其后果是囚犯数量增加了。

detailed_translations.english: something that is the direct result of something else

name: conjure
trans: 变魔术， 变戏法； 召唤

sentences.english: The magician conjured a rabbit out of his hat.
sentences.chinese: 魔术师从帽子里变出一只兔子来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 变魔术， 变戏法； 召唤
detailed_translations.english: to perform clever tricks in which you seem to make things appear, disappear, or change by magic

name: acknowledge
trans: 承认， 确认； 对…表示感谢

sentences.english: The family acknowledge the need for change.
sentences.chinese: 全家人都承认需要改变一下。

sentences.english: I would be grateful if you would acknowledge receipt of this letter.
sentences.chinese: 收到此信后请告知，不胜感谢。

detailed_translations.english: to admit or accept that something is true or that a situation exists

sentences.english: ...the information receptors in our brain.
sentences.chinese: …我们大脑中的信息感受器。

detailed_translations.chinese: [生化] 受体；接受器；感觉器官
detailed_translations.english: a nerve ending which receives information about changes in light, heat etc and causes the body to react in particular ways

name: dormant
trans: 静止的； 休眠的； 隐匿的

sentences.english: a huge dormant volcano
sentences.chinese: 一座巨大的休眠火山

detailed_translations.chinese: 休眠的；静止的；睡眠状态的；隐匿的
detailed_translations.english: not active or not growing at the present time but able to be active later

sentences.english: a hotel lobby
sentences.chinese: 宾馆大堂

sentences.english: I’ll meet you in the entrance lobby.
sentences.chinese: 我们在入口大厅见。

sentences.english: The group is lobbying for a reduction in defence spending.
sentences.chinese: 该团体正在游说政府削减国防开支。

detailed_translations.english: a wide passage or large hall just inside the entrance to a public building
to try to persuade the government or someone with political power that a law or situation should be changed

name: pulse
trans: 脉搏， 脉率； 脉冲

sentences.english: His breathing was shallow and his pulse was weak .
sentences.chinese: 他呼吸很浅，脉搏微弱。

sentences.english: She felt his neck. There was no pulse.
sentences.chinese: 她摸了摸他的颈部，没有脉搏。

sentences.english: Her pulse raced (= beat very quickly ) with excitement.
sentences.chinese: 她激动得脉搏急速跳动。

detailed_translations.english: the regular beat that can be felt, for example at your wrist, as your heart pumps blood around your body
to move or flow with a steady quickbeat or sound

sentences.english: the descriptive passages in the novel
sentences.chinese: 小说中的描写性段落

detailed_translations.english: giving a description of something

name: reconstruction
trans: 复兴； 改造， 再建

sentences.english: ...America's part in the postwar reconstruction of Germany.
sentences.chinese: …美国在战后德国重建中扮演的角色。

detailed_translations.english: the work that is done to repair the damage to a city, industry etc, especially after a war

name: hereditary
trans: 遗传的； 可继承的， 世袭的

sentences.english: a hereditary peer
sentences.chinese: 世袭贵族

detailed_translations.chinese: 遗传的；世袭的；世代相传的
detailed_translations.english: a quality or illness that is hereditary is passed from a parent to a child before the child is born

name: stumble
trans: 绊脚； 蹒跚而行； 结巴

sentences.english: In her hurry, she stumbled and spilled the milk all over the floor.
sentences.chinese: 匆忙中她绊了一下，把牛奶洒得满地都是。

sentences.english: I make it into the darkness with only one stumble.
sentences.chinese: 我只踉跄了一下就把它弄进了黑暗中。

detailed_translations.chinese: 跌， 绊；结结巴巴地说话
detailed_translations.english: to hit your foot against something or put your foot down awkwardly while you are walking or running, so that you almost fall
Stumble is also a noun

name: lineage
trans: 宗系， 世系， 血统

sentences.english: a family of ancient lineage
sentences.chinese: 古老世家

detailed_translations.english: the way in which members of a family are descended from other members

name: lighthearted
trans: 无忧无虑的； 愉快的

sentences.english: "He whistles as he goes, lighthearted wretch, /Cold and yet cheerful" (William Cowper).
sentences.chinese: 他边走边吹口哨，无忧无虑的小家伙/寒冷但仍然很高兴“ （威廉姆·考珀）。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无忧无虑的； 愉快的

sentences.english: families who hoarded food during the strike
sentences.chinese: 罢工期间囤积食品的家庭

detailed_translations.english: to collect and save large amounts of food, money etc, especially when it is not necessary to do so
a collection of things that someone hides somewhere, especially so they can use them later

sentences.english: Test scores vary from school to school.
sentences.chinese: 测验成绩各校不同。

sentences.english: The heights of the plants vary from 8 cm to 20 cm.
sentences.chinese: 这些植物的高度从8厘米到20厘米不等。

sentences.english: Medical treatment varies greatly from state to state.
sentences.chinese: 医疗制度州与州之间差异很大。

sentences.english: Cooking times may vary slightly, depending on your oven.
sentences.chinese: 烹饪时间可能略有不同，因烤炉而异。

sentences.english: Charges vary according to size.
sentences.chinese: 费用因大小而异。

sentences.english: She has tried different diets with varying degrees of success.
sentences.chinese: 她试过各种不同的节食方式，效果各不相同。

sentences.english: tests of varying levels of difficulty
sentences.chinese: 难易程度不一的测验

sentences.english: Quentin’s mood seems to vary according to the weather.
sentences.chinese: 昆廷的情绪似乎随天气而变化。

detailed_translations.english: if several things of the same type vary, they are all different from each other

name: coherent
trans: 条理清楚的， 连贯的； 有表达能力的

sentences.english: The three years of the course are planned as a coherent whole.
sentences.chinese: 这三年的课程是作为连贯的整体来安排的。

sentences.english: a coherent account of the incident
sentences.chinese: 对该事件条理分明的陈述

sentences.english: He's so calm when he answers questions in interviews. I wish I could be that coherent.
sentences.chinese: 他如此镇定地回答了访谈中的问题。我希望我也能那样有条不紊。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一致的，协调的；(话语等)条理清楚的
detailed_translations.english: if a piece of writing, set of ideas etc is coherent, it is easy to understand because it is clear and reasonable

sentences.english: We crept carefully along the narrow ledge.
sentences.chinese: 我们小心翼翼地沿着狭窄的岩架爬行。

sentences.english: He leapt onto a ledge of rock.
sentences.chinese: 他跳到一个岩架上。

detailed_translations.english: a narrow flat piece of rock that sticks out on the side of a mountain or cliff

name: delta
trans: 三角洲； 希腊字母表的第四个字母

sentences.english: the Nile delta
sentences.chinese: 尼罗河三角洲

detailed_translations.chinese: （河流的）三角洲；德耳塔（希腊字母的第四个字）
detailed_translations.english: the fourth letter of the Greek alphabet

name: episode
trans: 一段时期； 片段， 插曲； 一集

sentences.english: I'd like to try and forget the whole episode.
sentences.chinese: 我倒想尽量把那段经历全部忘掉。

sentences.english: One of the funniest episodes in the book occurs in Chapter 6.
sentences.chinese: 书中最有趣的片段之一在第6章。

detailed_translations.chinese: （人生的）一段经历；（小说的）片段，插曲
detailed_translations.english: an event, a situation, or a period of time in sb's life, a novel, etc. that is important or interesting in some way

name: infrared
trans: 红外线的；产生红外线的

sentences.english: Both the model and the satellite sensor use infrared energy to measure clouds.
sentences.chinese: 模型和卫星传感器都使用红外能量来进行云的估算。

sentences.english: "This is an exciting result, " says Tinetti. "This is the first near-infrared spectrum of a planet.
sentences.chinese: 迪奈蒂说：“这是个令人兴奋的结果，这是行星上发现的第一个近红外光谱。

sentences.english: His discovery of the electromagnetic spectrum led to the development of television, radio, microwaves, as well as aiding in the development of radio and infrared telescopes.
sentences.chinese: 他发现的电磁特性最终导致电视、广播、微波炉的发明，并且也对无线电和红外望远镜的发明起到了重要作用。

detailed_translations.english: Infrared radiation is similar to light but has a longer wavelength, so we cannot see it without special equipment

name: respondent
trans: 回答者，响应者；调查对象；被告

sentences.english: Upon receipt of a copy of the arbitration application, the respondent shall, within the time limit prescribed by the Arbitration Rules, submit its defence to the arbitration commission.
sentences.chinese: 被申请人收到仲裁申请书副本后，应当在仲裁规则规定的期限内向仲裁委员会提交答辩书。

detailed_translations.english: someone who has to defend their own case in a law court, especially in a  divorce  case

sentences.english: He continued to ponder the problem as he walked home.
sentences.chinese: 他一边往家走一边继续思考那个问题。

detailed_translations.english: to spend time thinking carefully and seriously about a problem, a difficult question, or something that has happened

name: animate
trans: 赋予生命， 使有活力

sentences.english: Laughter animated his face for a moment.
sentences.chinese: 笑容使他的脸上一时增添了生气。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使有生气；使活泼；鼓舞；推动
detailed_translations.english: to give life or energy to something
living

name: scene
trans: 地点， 现场； 景色； 一场， 一个镜头； 场面； 活动领域， 圈子

sentences.english: Hamlet, Act 5 Scene 2
sentences.chinese: 《哈姆雷特》第5幕第2场

sentences.english: battle scenes
sentences.chinese: 战斗场面

sentences.english: The police soon arrived at the scene of the crime .
sentences.chinese: 警察很快就到达了案发现场。

sentences.english: He photographed a wide range of street scenes.
sentences.chinese: 他拍下了丰富多彩的街景。

detailed_translations.english: part of a play during which there is no change in time or place

sentences.english: He vowed to achieve certain objectives before the end of his presidency.
sentences.chinese: 他立誓要在他的总统任期结束之前实现某些目标。

sentences.english: the best way to accomplish your objectives
sentences.chinese: 完成目标的最佳方法

sentences.english: The degree program has two main objectives.
sentences.chinese: 该学位课程有两个主要目标。

sentences.english: Managers should set specific performance objectives for their teams.
sentences.chinese: 经理应该为自己的团队制定明确的绩效目标。

sentences.english: The main objective was to improve children’s knowledge of geography.
sentences.chinese: 主要目的是要增长儿童的地理知识。

sentences.english: A clear objective was set and adhered to.
sentences.chinese: 定下了明确的目标并坚持到底。

sentences.english: One of your first business objectives should be to get your own office.
sentences.chinese: 你的首要工作目标之一应该是拥有自己的办公室。

detailed_translations.english: something that you are trying hard to achieve, especially in business or politics

name: exert
trans: 运用， 行使； 施加； 努力， 竭力

sentences.english: They exerted considerable influence within the school.
sentences.chinese: 他们在校内施加了很大的影响力。

sentences.english: Environmental groups are exerting pressure on the government to tighten pollution laws.
sentences.chinese: 环境保护组织在向政府施加压力，要求从严执行环保法律法规。

detailed_translations.english: to use your power, influence etc in order to make something happen

name: scandal
trans: 丑事， 丑闻； 恶意诽谤， 流言蜚语； 可耻的行为

sentences.english: It caused quite a scandal when he left his wife.
sentences.chinese: 他离开妻子成了一大丑闻。

sentences.english: The college has recently been involved in a drugs scandal .
sentences.chinese: 这所大学最近卷入了毒品丑闻。

sentences.english: He has been at the centre of a political scandal .
sentences.chinese: 他成了一桩政治丑闻的焦点。

sentences.english: a major scandal involving the government
sentences.chinese: 涉及政府的一桩重大丑闻

sentences.english: a series of financial scandals
sentences.chinese: 一连串金融丑闻

sentences.english: a sex scandal that ruined his reputation
sentences.chinese: 让他名誉扫地的性丑闻

sentences.english: They had already left the country when the scandal broke .
sentences.chinese: 丑闻爆出时他们已经离开了这个国家。

detailed_translations.chinese: 丑事， 丑闻； 流言蜚语； 反感， 愤慨
detailed_translations.english: an event in which someone, especially someone important, behaves in a bad way that shocks people

name: dormancy
trans: 休眠； 催眠状态； 隐匿

sentences.english: Automatic logoff feature helps alleviate such risks by automatically disabling the session using recommended time-out values for dormancy.
sentences.chinese: 自动下线特性通过对休眠使用推荐的超时值，可以帮助降低此类风险。

sentences.english: All nine were put in dimensional locks, essentially powered down into energetic dormancy through the technology of the Alliance. Many other magnificent Temple Crystals were lost.
sentences.chinese: 这 九个水晶都放置着维度锁，基本上经由(外星)联盟的技术将其能量降至休眠的状态 。

sentences.english: After a 20-year period of dormancy, the volcanobegan to erupt once more.
sentences.chinese: 在20年的休眠后，这座火山又再一次肆虐。

sentences.english: His career has been hindered by injury.
sentences.chinese: 由于受伤，他的事业受到了阻碍。

sentences.english: policies that will hinder rather than help families
sentences.chinese: 对家庭有害无益的政策

detailed_translations.english: to make it difficult for something to develop or succeed

name: scent
trans: 香味，香气；气味；踪迹，线索；香水

sentences.english: a yellow rose with a lovely scent
sentences.chinese: 香气怡人的黄玫瑰

detailed_translations.english: a pleasant smell that something has

sentences.english: Her paintings have been exhibited all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 她的绘画作品在世界各地展出。

detailed_translations.english: to show something in a public place so that people can go to see it
something, for example a painting, that is put in a public place so that people can go to see it

name: adjunct
trans: 附加物， 附件； 附加语， 修饰语

sentences.english: For me, it represents a potent adjunct to antidepressant medications and, for some patients, it’s something you can take in lieu of pills.
sentences.chinese: 对于我，它是一个抗抑郁剂曾用药物的强有力的助手，对一些病人来说，它是能够代替药丸的东西。

sentences.english: " Lyte urges caution as well."It MAY, in really big capitals, prove to be an adjunct to therapy, but there are a number of steps that need to be done.
sentences.chinese: 我们在花费了大量的人力物力之后，也许，也许证明它可以成为一种附属的治疗手段，但是我们仍然有大量的工作要做。

detailed_translations.english: something that is added or joined to something that is bigger or more important

sentences.english: mushroom soup
sentences.chinese: 蘑菇汤

detailed_translations.chinese: 蘑菇，伞菌；蘑菇形物体；暴发户
detailed_translations.english: one of several kinds of  fungus  with stems and round tops, some of which can be eaten

detailed_translations.chinese: 蘑菇的；蘑菇形的；迅速生长的
迅速增加；采蘑菇；迅速生长
detailed_translations.english: to grow and develop very quickly

sentences.english: New satellites will allow cars to pinpoint their position within an inch .
sentences.chinese: 新的卫星系统将让汽车精确他们的位置到每一英寸。

sentences.english: The feature could, for example, pinpoint areas being threatened by a quickly approaching tornado and alert residents of impending danger via their computers or cell phones.
sentences.chinese: 例如，精确地定位正遭受龙卷风攻击的区域并通过计算机和手机警告危险地区的人们。

detailed_translations.english: to find or show the exact position of something
a very small area or  dot  of something

name: altruistic
trans: 利他的， 无私心的， 为他人着想的

sentences.english: Were his motives entirely altruistic?
sentences.chinese: 他的动机是完全无私的吗？

detailed_translations.english: altruistic behaviour shows that you care about and will help other people, even though this brings no advantage for yourself

name: extremity
trans: 末端； 极端， 极度

sentences.english: In spite of the extremity of her seclusion she was sane.
sentences.chinese: 尽管完全与世隔绝，她依然神智清醒。

sentences.english: In the past, the region had been protected by its forbidding geography and the extremities of its climate.
sentences.chinese: 过去，这个地区受到令人生畏的地理条件和极端的天气状况的保护。

detailed_translations.english: The extremity of a situation or of someone's behaviour is the degree to which it is severe, unusual, or unacceptable

name: deny
trans: 否认； 拒绝承认； 拒绝给予

sentences.english: The government denied the existence of poverty among 16- and 17-year-olds.
sentences.chinese: 政府否认十六七岁的青少年当中存在贫困问题。

detailed_translations.english: to say that something is not true, or that you do not believe something

sentences.english: Would you rather be an alchemist or a chemist?
sentences.chinese: 那么，你想做一个炼金术士，还是一个化学家呢？

sentences.english: At first glance, it all seems an alchemist's illusion.
sentences.chinese: 乍看上去， 它完全象是一位炼金术士的幻术。

sentences.english: The original museum of 1683 was based on the collections of Elias Ashmole, alchemist and antiquarian , a leading figure of "The New Philosophy".
sentences.chinese: 1683年老馆里的展品基本是伊莱亚斯·阿什莫尔的藏品。 他是一位炼金术士和古文物收集者，也是“新哲学”的领军人物。

detailed_translations.english: An alchemist was a scientist in the Middle Ages who tried to discover how to change ordinary metals into gold

sentences.english: Orders came that we should spade the trench in an hour.
sentences.chinese: 有命令要我们必须在一小时内挖好战壕。

sentences.english: From nine to eleven he planned to dig a hole, or trench, and possibly find something good to eat buried in the dirt.
sentences.chinese: 九点到十一点，他打算挖一个洞，或者一条小沟也行，没准儿还能从脏土里翻出什么好吃的呢。

sentences.english: The bridge lies like a trench in the fortress of the moat, which is shaped to blend in with the outlines of the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 这座桥就像是坐落在护城河中的一条沟渠，这种造型是为了使它与周围的风景融合在一起。

detailed_translations.english: a long narrow hole dug into the surface of the ground

name: miserable
trans: 痛苦的； 可怜的； 令人不快的

sentences.english: I’ve been so miserable since Pat left me.
sentences.chinese: 自从帕特离我而去后，我十分痛苦。

sentences.english: I spent the weekend feeling miserable .
sentences.chinese: 我那个周末心情很糟糕。

sentences.english: Jan looks really miserable .
sentences.chinese: 简看上去很痛苦。

sentences.english: Why do you make yourself miserable by taking on too much work?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么揽这么多活儿，把自己弄得很辛苦呢？

detailed_translations.english: extremely unhappy, for example because you feel lonely, cold, or badly treated

sentences.english: Then the deal is that when you sell the house they subtract -you've got to pay this.
sentences.chinese: 那么当你售出房子后，他们会从中减去，这个余额，这就是你要付给他们的。

sentences.english: That is, if you find that a sensor consistently overestimates by a certain value, you can subtract that value before the final value is reported.
sentences.chinese: 也就是说，如果您发现某个传感器总是偏高于某个特定数值，那么就可以减去该数值后再报告最终的数值。

sentences.english: Thus, if you have staff activities in loops and want to run the above request, you need to ensure that you subtract only events which belong together.
sentences.chinese: 因此，如果您在循环中具有人员活动，并且想要运行以上的请求，那么您必须确保您只减去了属于一起的事件。

detailed_translations.english: to take a number or an amount from a larger number or amount

sentences.english: Eight years of effort have hardly put a dent in drug trafficking.
sentences.chinese: 八年的努力几乎没有减少贩毒活动。

sentences.chinese: 我还记得三十年前袭击我们的一次飓风。

sentences.english: Our love is not fierce, not hot, but despite the tsunami hurricane, also vowed.
sentences.chinese: 我们的爱，不剧烈，不炙热，可是任凭海啸飓风，也矢志不渝。

sentences.english: If an earthquake, hurricane, winter storm, or other disaster strikes your community, you might not have access to food , water, and electricity for days or even weeks.
sentences.chinese: 如果有地震、飓风、暴风雪或其他的灾害突袭你的家园，你可能会好几天甚至好几个星期都得不到食物、水和电。

detailed_translations.english: a storm that has very strong fast winds and that moves over water

sentences.english: Any illness of the lungs or throat , such as asthma or a cough.
sentences.chinese: 消耗病，痨病肺部或喉咙的任何一种病变，如哮喘或咳嗽。

sentences.english: It scares me sometimes because I do have asthma and when I walk, I do gasp for air.
sentences.chinese: 她说：“我会担心体重，因为我有哮喘，我走路的时候总是气喘吁吁。

sentences.english: Another aspect of this problem is control of asthma among children in these populations.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题的另一个方面是在这些群体的儿童中控制哮喘。

detailed_translations.english: a medical condition that causes difficulties in breathing

sentences.english: He wants to hike round the world.
sentences.chinese: 他打算徒步旅行环游世界一周。

sentences.english: You can organize a picnic in the park, a group hike or bike ride, or meet up with friends for one of those free local events.
sentences.chinese: 你可以组织在公园野餐一群徒步旅行或者骑自行车或者和朋友会面为其中的一个免费本地事件。

a long walk in the mountains or countryside
to increase a price, tax etc by a large amount

sentences.english: Some species weave designs into their webs, creating zigzag patterns that can either attract prey, like bees, in bright sunlight, or camouflage the net in the shade.

sentences.english: Located at 4210 Silver Hill Road just outside of Washington, D.C., the museum is a massive zigzag-shaped edifice constructed of five interconnected pods—each pod larger than a football field.
sentences.chinese: 这座博物馆位于华盛顿特区郊外的银山路4210号，建得宏伟壮观，五个相互连通的分区组成之字形，每个分区的面积比足球场还大。

detailed_translations.english: to move forward in sharp angles, first to the left and then to the right etc
a pattern that looks like a line of z’s joined together

detailed_translations.english: to move forward in sharp angles, first to the left and then to the right etc

sentences.chinese: 在阵亡之前他奉命执行过200多次军事任务。

sentences.chinese: 男人什么样，女人什么样，不能一概而论。

sentences.english: Similarly, every time a biologist discovers a new species, there is the opportunity to honour someone or something.
sentences.chinese: 类似地，每次一位生物学家发现一个新物种，就又有了一个纪念某人或某事的机会。

sentences.english: One biologist developed a formula for how much genetic material would have to be to saved in the act of altruism for it to be worthwhile.
sentences.chinese: 一位生物学家发展了一套公式，用来计算到底有多少遗传物质可以被保留下来的时候，利他的行为才是值得的。

sentences.english: An evolutionary biologist would say physical activity is the only voluntary means you have of varying or regulating your energy expenditure.
sentences.chinese: 一个进化生物学家会说体力活动是唯一的志愿就是你的不同或管理您的能源开支的。

sentences.chinese: ...一位养牛场场主。

busy and noisy activity

detailed_translations.english: concerned with trade

sentences.chinese: 电动马达

sentences.english: That’s a nice motor you’ve got, Dave.
sentences.chinese: 你这车不错啊，戴夫。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a machine that makes it work or move, by changing power, especially electrical power, into movement

trans: 进入； 使用； 存取

sentences.chinese: 入口是右边的一扇小门。

trans: 原始的，远古的；简单的，粗糙的

sentences.chinese: 原始艺术

sentences.chinese: 他努力克服自己的羞怯。

sentences.chinese: 地震地层学-- 按照地震资料解释进行地层学和沉积相的研究。

sentences.chinese: 地震地层学是按照地震资料解释进行地层学和沉积相的研究。

sentences.chinese: 锶同位素地层学在海相地层的对比和定年中具有十分重要的作用。

sentences.chinese: 我从书店订购了一些新书。

sentences.chinese: 他在书店偶然发现了一些笑话集。

sentences.chinese: 在  技术书店 浏览关于这些和其他技术主题的图书。

sentences.chinese: 这一裁决迫使航空公司公布航班晚点信息。

sentences.chinese: 默里已经加入其他民主党参议员反对这项立法了。

sentences.chinese: 有些被子植物的种子有蛛丝般的翅膀，例如蒲公英和乳草属植物的种子。

sentences.chinese: 《被子植物和花粉传播者共同进化的早期阶段》——美国国家科学院论文集105: 240-245.

sentences.english: “The angiosperm radiation revisited, an ecological explanation for Darwin’s abominable mystery.” Ecology Letters 12: 865-872.
sentences.chinese: 其中Berendse, F. and Scheffer, M. 2009年对相关假设作了一个精巧的摘编，见《重温被子植物的发散，针对达尔文糟糕透顶的神秘轮生态学解析》——生态学通讯12: 865-872.

sentences.english: Each year they audit our accounts and certify them as being true and fair.
sentences.chinese: 每年他们都会审核我们的账目，以证明其准确合理。

sentences.chinese: 仙人掌……，在春天到来前都应该把它放在浴室里。

sentences.chinese: 他说他来做这份工作，给他几个铜板就行。

sentences.chinese: 他的头发恢复到了原来的铜色。

sentences.english: I found her remarks deeply offensive.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得她的话令人非常恼火。

sentences.chinese: 这种布具有丝的质地。

sentences.english: What is the texture of your experience?
sentences.chinese: 这次经历的实质是什么？

sentences.chinese: 在一片美国经济疲软的传言中，美元贬值了。

sentences.chinese: 示威者在“处死暴君！”的叫喊声中将国旗撕得粉碎。

sentences.chinese: 一颗实验人造卫星从卡纳维拉尔角发射升空。

sentences.english: The book launched his career as a novelist.

detailed_translations.english: to send a weapon or spacecraft into the sky or into space

sentences.chinese: 这个湖几乎填满了泥沙和植被。

detailed_translations.english: sand, mud, soil etc that is carried in water and then settles at a bend in a river, an entrance to a port etc

name: detectable

sentences.chinese: 医生们说该疾病很可能是遗传的，但在出生时是不可发现的。

sentences.chinese: 玫瑰花苞

to produce buds

trans: 在最上面， 在最重要的位置

sentences.chinese: 李明博说，他决定这项自由贸易协议时，该协议的经济利益在他心中是最重要的。

sentences.chinese: 将其名称用于最高级的类。

sentences.chinese: 法官说仲裁是一个公正且迅速有效率的决定过程。

detailed_translations.english: Expeditious means quick and efficient

sentences.chinese: 我被迫尝试一次骑马疾驰。

detailed_translations.english: a very fast speed

detailed_translations.english: if a horse gallops, it moves very fast with all its feet leaving the ground together

sentences.english: a palace built in a neoclassical style
sentences.chinese: 新古典主义风格的宫殿

detailed_translations.english: neoclassical art or architecture copies the style of ancient Greece or Rome

trans: 巨大的； 大量的； 范围广的

sentences.chinese: 过去的五年内，毕业率大幅度提高。

detailed_translations.chinese: 巨大的， 大量的； 浩瀚的

trans: 符号， 标志； 象征

sentences.chinese: 包装盒上的这个标识保证这种食物是有机生产的。

sentences.chinese: …为每艘游艇配备12张帆的存货。

detailed_translations.english: moral goodness of character and behaviour

name: coverage

sentences.chinese: 这场比赛的现场直播

sentences.english: perishable goods such as butter, milk, fruit and fish
sentences.chinese: 黄油、牛奶、水果和鱼等易变质的商品

name: gradual
trans: 逐渐的， 逐步的； 坡度平缓的， 不陡的

sentences.chinese: 气候渐渐发生了变化。

sentences.chinese: 制造业的逐渐衰退

sentences.chinese: 教育是一个循序渐进的过程。

name: figure

sentences.chinese: 眼下，改革是当务之急。

detailed_translations.english: to be an important part of a process, event, or situation, or to be included in something

detailed_translations.chinese: 数字；人物；算术；体型，风姿；轮廓；画像，塑像；图，图形

sentences.chinese: 年轻的囚犯正在被年纪较大、刑期长的犯人带坏。

sentences.chinese: 剧烈运动增加氧的消耗。

sentences.chinese: 拥有棕色或淡褐色眼睛的人比其它颜色眼睛的人更让人感到可靠。

sentences.chinese: 明，长长的睫毛，淡褐色的眼睛，几颗雀斑和一张英俊的白种人的脸，像螃蟹一样四肢爬行，那可能是患小儿麻痹症的结果。

sentences.chinese: 在他那双有名的淡褐色眼睛下面出现了黑眼圈，他不断朝门，朝后面，朝酒吧看去。
